name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000001
text: Sentinel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000002
text: If you choose to go to Klaipeda, I recommend taking the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}The deep woods are dangerous, so try to stay away from there if you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000003
text: Man in Hiding

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000004
text: F-Finally...! Has help arrived?{nl}Huh?! It's just a kid? Hey... Are there still Vubbes outside?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000005
text: Ugh. Go away! Don't talk to me! We'll get caught by the Vubbes!{nl}This is my place so leave!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000006
text: What? Don't lie to me! I can smell the Vubbes from here.{nl}You can't fool an adult! Go away! Do not come near this barrel!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000007
text: F-Finally...! Has help arrived?{nl}Huh?! It's just a kid? What are you looking at? Close the lid and move along!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000008
text: What's that paper you're holding? It looks familiar...{nl}Let me see that! What are you doing? Hey, there's an adult speaking to you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000009
text: This paper, it's mine! I'm never giving it away again!!{nl}It's... not something you need - I'll just rip it apart. There.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000010
text: Sheesh, that's lame...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000011
text: After all the goddesses had vanished, these dreams were one of the first things that came up.{nl}Maybe one of these people will be the one who brings the goddesses back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000012
text: Soldier Blak

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000013
text: Be warned!{nl}Monsters are attacking, so all civilians must evacuate!{nl}Why are those civilians in the military zone anyway?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000014
text: Ah, so you are the Revelator! I'm sorry, I didn't recognize you.{nl}Monsters are attacking the supply base at the moment.{nl}I need to get some important rations out from the base. Please help me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000015
text: It was peaceful not too long ago, but now they are coming in groups.{nl}What's happening exactly?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000016
text: Even so, I felt uneasy...{nl}Who knew that they'd attack in such an absurd manner?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000017
text: The rations are in the First Supply Warehouse, which you can get to using the road {nl}on the upper side. Please bring back whatever leftovers you find...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000018
text: I wrote down who Sparnas is. Maybe it will be useful in the future.{nl}Though I may not appear so right now, I was a biologist four years ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000019
text: Please pass this report to Luders.{nl}He is probably at the Center Supply Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000020
text: Officer Luders

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000021
text: Ah, you must be the so called Revelator. Nice to meet you.{nl}Is this Blak's report?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000022
text: Hmm... Is that so?{nl}It appears they simply destroyed the supplies and ran away. But even if Chupacabras had wings, {nl}surely they can't do something like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000023
text: This isn't enough.{nl}I am sorry, but please bring us Moody's report from Amzina Curved Path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000024
text: I feel better since Luders is here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000025
text: Soldier York

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000026
text: The Siaulambs are crossing the road. I am in a panic myself, and I don't know what to do.{nl}I'm sure Luders won't allow this to happen... What should we do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000027
text: Do you think the problem will be resolved just by defeating Sparnas?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000028
text: Thanks to your help, I think I can hold myself together.{nl}But... won't this kind of thing happen again? What should I do then...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000029
text: Sparnas? We don't have a clear answer about it.{nl}It just appeared from the sky without any signs and destroyed all the supplies we had. Then, it {nl}quickly disappeared. We got headaches just hearing its cries.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000030
text: The place I just talked about is the Second Supply Warehouse.{nl}It is depressing to think how these kinds of things will be recurring in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000031
text: Take it. I made some bait from old grains in the supplies.{nl}I will lure it from up there, so you stay here. Sparnas will definitely appear at one of these {nl}two places. Don't let it escape. Destroy it for sure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000032
text: We may not get a second chance if we don't defeat it this time.{nl}It doesn't seem like they're idiots.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000033
text: I heard the sound of fighting so I came in a hurry. Did you defeat it?{nl}I only spotted the Siaulambs at my spot.{nl}Thank you. You have performed a meritorious deed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000034
text: Adjutant General Paulina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000035
text: We should recover the stolen supplies.{nl}We can't call ourselves soldiers of the kingdom if we don't do anything about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000036
text: The stolen supplies were taken by the Siaulambs in every Supply Warehouse, {nl}recover the supplies and bring them to Volda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000037
text: I feel so fed up having to endure this all the time. Reinforcements should be coming soon.{nl}But what can we expect from such an incompetent kingdom?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000038
text: Adjutant General Volda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000039
text: Thank you very much, but you must be late for other matters.{nl}Besides we can't just sit here and wait. We plan to keep attacking.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000040
text: Secret Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000041
text: The goddess already foresaw this.{nl}Nothing can escape from her vision.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000042
text: Liaison Officer Niels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000043
text: Hello.{nl}Have you seen an old man who has lost his way?{nl}His name is Jonas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000044
text: You haven't seen him?{nl}Now, which direction would that feeble old fellow have wandered off towards?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000045
text: Jonas is a descendant of the family that has been protecting this Royal Mausoleum.{nl}He is a very important person to our lab team so please take good care of him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000046
text: Archivist Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000047
text: Our family has been waiting for you for a long time.{nl}It is time to give you something that we have been protecting for quite a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000048
text: It is good to hear that Jonas has regained his consciousness.{nl}You are the person who casted the light signal, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000049
text: Ahylas has come to meet whoever lit the signal.{nl}Meet him downstairs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000050
text: We haven't heard any news from Kepeck for a long time, not since we sent him supplies.{nl}We don't have enough people to form a search team, so please help us find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000051
text: Historian Viode

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000052
text: Always be prepared for monster attacks.{nl}Especially in places like here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000053
text: Mercenary Mirta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000054
text: }Didn't I already warn you?{nl}Be careful next time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000055
text: Historian Kepeck

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000056
text: Niels must have sent you.{nl}Well, since you're in a hurry, document it yourself and take it back to Niels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000057
text: If you go straight, take the road to your right and cross the bridge, {nl}you will see the artifacts of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}Archive them and take it back to Niels. He will understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000058
text: So these are Kepeck's notes... Mercenary Mirta was looking for this.{nl}You helped confirm the safety of two individuals. Thank you for your efforts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000059
text: Ahylas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000060
text: Now take the unsealing stone and go to Broken Pillar Canyon. {nl}The Disciple of Gustas will teach you how to release the seal there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000061
text: Were you not guided yet?{nl}Take it to the Disciple of Gustas in Broken Pillar Canyon.{nl}It is made to let only the chosen one enter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000062
text: Disciple of Gustas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000063
text: Did you release the seal of Pagasa Cliff?{nl}You have to start from that seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000064
text: Words engraved into a rock

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000065
text: Do not touch or push the rock.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000066
text: I was waiting for you.{nl}The next seal is located on the way to the Collapsed Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000067
text: You don't know how eagerly we have waited for this moment.{nl}We really wanted to meet you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000068
text: Gustas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000069
text: It's you.{nl}You are much more gallant than what I had imagined.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000070
text: Soldier Alan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000071
text: Are you the new recruit?{nl}I received a patrolling order, but I guess you can go my behalf.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000072
text: You're good for a newbie.{nl}I have a memory of something horrible happening there once, so I don't want to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000073
text: I'm remembering something...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000074
text: }You know that we are dispatched here to defeat Gaigalas, right?{nl}Rookie. Can you take this report to Commander Wallace?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000075
text: Commander Wallace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000076
text: Why did you bring this report without Alan coming?{nl}Are you a new recruit or something?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000077
text: I can return home after Gaigalas is defeated.{nl}Well, I'd like to go home as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000078
text: Commander Wallace is at Bird Footprint Junction.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000079
text: I don't care how good you are. You are new here.{nl}This is an order. Bring me some sap from Kepa Raiders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000080
text: Soldiers these days, they lack guts.{nl}I hope you'll be a good influence to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000081
text: It's clear that we will win this battle.{nl}Why? Because the Owls are helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000082
text: Kepa Raiders are near Ianutis Waterfall.{nl}To defeat Gaigalas, we will surely need them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000083
text: Soldier Weiz

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000084
text: Hey, rookie, are you on a break?{nl}Get some fat from Duckys in Lengvas Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000085
text: We will lure Gaigalas using Ducky Fat.{nl}Hey rookie, don't loaf around, alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000086
text: Today will be the last day for Gaigalas.{nl}Are you ready, rookie?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000087
text: Next, we will get leather from Cronewts in Lengvas Garden.{nl}Hurry, soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000088
text: We will win for sure this time.{nl}The goddesses are on our side.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000089
text: You are pretty good for a rookie.{nl}It's disorganized here at the moment, so you can keep those ingredients for now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000090
text: Get to know our soldiers while I make preparations for the battle.{nl}I will call you before we confront Gaigalas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000091
text: When we burn the Ducky Fat, Gaigalas will appear after smelling the odor.{nl}Lengvas Garden will be a good place to burn it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000092
text: My heart is pounding.{nl}I feel like my soul is throbbing with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000093
text: Old Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000094
text: There is no one in this forest. Why are you here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000095
text: Gaigalas?{nl}Defeating it without any assistance will be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000096
text: I have seen many deaths here.{nl}And I don't want to see any more sacrifices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000097
text: I need Kepa Raider Sap and Cronewt Leather.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000098
text: Why do you have that?{nl}Hand it to me and I will make a Memory Fragment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000099
text: With this Memory Fragment, I will revive the memories of our sleeping comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000100
text: It will be difficult to defeat it without a Memory Fragment.{nl}Please bring me Infro Holder Horns.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000101
text: How come you have all these ingredients?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000102
text: Those are people who are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger for Gaigalas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000103
text: We can calm them if we defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Please go see the Worrying Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000104
text: Worrying Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000105
text: Please help me wake my sleeping comrades and complete the magic of that day.{nl}With the Memory Fragment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000106
text: They may become satiated.{nl}I will stand here while remembering my comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000107
text: You will find Gaigalas when you go to Ishimtini Access Way.{nl}Please avenge the fallen soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000108
text: I was in an isolated place so I did not fall asleep.{nl}But, watching it all was painful for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000109
text: My comrades were attacked while they were trying to help the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000110
text: (Jonas recovered awareness after drinking the medicine.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000111
text: Archaeologist Dezic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000112
text: I am looking for my assistant named Airine.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can go look for her?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000113
text: I told her not to get excited even if she finds something.{nl}And yet she did it again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000114
text: Thanks.{nl}I'll go look for Airine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000115
text: Technician Heinen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000116
text: }This cable car can only be ridden by those with a permit. I'm afraid I have to tell you to turn back {nl}towards Vienesa Highlands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000117
text: However, if you defeat the troublesome monsters around this area, I'll think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000118
text: }Isn't it better to use the cable car rather than getting injured passing through the monsters? {nl}Of course, this is if you can ride the cable car.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000119
text: Much better than I expected.{nl}I want to propose a deal to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000120
text: I'll let you keep using the cable car if you destroy the strange seal at Nutoles Cliff.{nl}The monsters seem to be increasing in numbers because of that seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000121
text: As promised, you can use the cable car as much as you want.{nl}Just tell William over there or Cyneburg on the other side that I gave my permission.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000122
text: That barrier... Hmm. When exactly did it form?{nl}I know it has been there for quite some time now, but I can't remember for how long exactly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000123
text: I am certain that barrier was responsible for the increasing number of monsters lately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000124
text: We don't have many soldiers guarding this area.{nl}Who in their right mind would come here in this day and age?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000125
text: Rolandas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000126
text: No one knows what the Great King Zachariel tried to protect.{nl}And I'm sure that we're not the only ones who want to solve that mystery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000127
text: Hurry, use the Great King's Key to release the seals.{nl}You should know what to do next afterwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000128
text: I found Airine, but I don't know how to rescue her.{nl}She is imprisoned in Rodoma 2nd Ruins, I can't rescue her myself...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000129
text: Assistant Airine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000130
text: I can't move because of the barrier.{nl}Please break the three barriers in Rodoma Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000131
text: Are you not done yet? Ah, geez...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000132
text: I didn't expect that I would be taken into this kind of thing.{nl}Oh, the mess I caused from chasing that boy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000133
text: Mercenary Glen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000134
text: So many researchers are disappearing these days.{nl}I'm trying to find clues by defeating some Sauga. Can you help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000135
text: The Saugas split their loot fairly among themselves.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000136
text: Fortunately they are very old.{nl}So that means these cases are not due to monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000137
text: This place is very dangerous; many have gone missing due to monsters or missteps.{nl}However, that is not what interests me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000138
text: When those people disappeared, no one close to them noticed.{nl}It's as if memories about those who disappeared are erased. Interesting, isn't it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000139
text: Please defeat all monsters nearby to prevent anything from happening.{nl}There were reports that the monsters at the 1st Architects' Site had turned violent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000140
text: Splendid.{nl}We will be safe for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000141
text: Monsters are coming!{nl}They probably found out I was released.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000142
text: The goddesses have sent you?{nl}I never thought that you would protect me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000143
text: Where did that huge scorpion go? This is very bad!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000144
text: I should go see Dezic.{nl}I hope to see you again in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000145
text: Someone must have done something strange to the monsters protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}What were they thinking?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000146
text: Sir, get a hold of yourself. Sir!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000147
text: New Researcher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000148
text: I lost my important research materials at the Abandoned Old Workshop.{nl}The monsters must have taken them... Should I just leave them behind?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000149
text: I am elated that I get to see the Royal Mausoleum myself, but the monsters... they are frightening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000150
text: Thank you so much.{nl}You should also check the Records Repository.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000151
text: The entrance to the Royal Mausoleum is hidden within this gigantic canyon somewhere.{nl}The start of the canyon begins here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000152
text: Many experts have come here to conduct research on the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues about Medzio Diena here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000153
text: Why are there so many monsters in the canyon when there is so little plant life around?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000154
text: What happened to my request? Is it not done yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000155
text: Look closely at the ground.{nl}It may have fallen down.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000156
text: Hmm, only these ones?{nl}Well, thank you for finding this much at least.{nl}I can just copy the others from the beginning again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000157
text: Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going. I have to research these wild flowers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000158
text: I guess what I saw was an illusion.{nl}I must reward you for protecting a mineralogist like me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000159
text: Yes.{nl}Bring me my archives from Niels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000160
text: Jonas told you to bring his archives?{nl}Okay. In return, please bring him some medicine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000161
text: The medicine will help him ease his mind.{nl}Davio at the right side of the Excavation Camp has the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000162
text: Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}He was once very healthy, but these days he is old and weak.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000163
text: It was after Jonas went out to a visit with his servant.{nl}Jonas was found with dementia and the servant has gone missing even until today.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000164
text: Please take good care of Jonas.{nl}It would be a big problem if he got hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000165
text: Davio is at the right side of the camp.{nl}I hope the medicine will work well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000166
text: Finally, I remember everything.{nl}I am the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum... Who are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000167
text: Revelator. If this is the will of the goddess, then you must be qualified.{nl}You have a job to do, so follow me to Beacon Hill Pass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000168
text: I have made Niels and you worry...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000169
text: I will lead the way and you will handle any monsters we encounter.{nl}I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000170
text: The time is now. Please go on ahead to Beacon Hill Pass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000171
text: I am sure that you are qualified for this.{nl}Goddess Laima has led all these.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000172
text: Finally the hidden treasure can be passed down to someone.{nl}I regret not recognizing you sooner due to my senility.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000173
text: Great King Zachariel told us to bestow his hidden treasure upon a qualified person.{nl}You can check whether you are qualified with the Eyes of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000174
text: We have one more responsibility besides protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}And that is to protect the royal inheritance until a qualified person comes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000175
text: We have no idea what exactly the hidden treasure is.{nl}The king just told us to protect it so we are just following his order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000176
text: Medicine Dealer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000177
text: Hmm... Well, there's a herb that only grows around Metos Field.{nl}Please bring me it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000178
text: Metos Field would be the best place to wake up one's consciousness. Especially for an old man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000179
text: Good job. You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000180
text: Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000181
text: Merchant Davio

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000182
text: I brought that old man's medicine. {nl}But I spent a great deal of effort getting it. I ought to charge you more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000183
text: The gold that Lichenclops have in this town will be enough.{nl}Bring those to the Medicine Dealer in Kapas Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000184
text: This will be enough. Davio sent you, right?{nl} I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000185
text: To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000186
text: I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the memories of all workers after {nl}building the Royal Mausoleum. That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit {nl}senile.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000187
text: It was tough to get that old man's medicine.{nl}But, there's nothing I cannot get.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000188
text: It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have. Take it with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000189
text: That medicine works well. Make him swallow it somehow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000190
text: You're late.{nl}Did you bring my archive?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000191
text: Go to the Abandoned Old Workshop.{nl}Some old man is wandering around there. I think it's Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000192
text: What is that? It smells like mead!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000193
text: I feel dizzy.{nl}What am I doing here anyway?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000194
text: I am relieved you found me.{nl}When the monsters were chasing after me, I lost my belongings and all the materials.{nl}At the very least, could you find the scattered materials?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000195
text: I don't have much to say as a humble mercenary.{nl}Although I was okay even on Medzio Diena, I am certain this place is cursed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000196
text: How long has it been since I came here?{nl}Where is Mirta and who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000197
text: I'm trying to remember something but it keeps fading whenever I get close.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000198
text: Vaidotas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000199
text: That smell.. I think the purifying device in the mine is broken.{nl}We better repair it quickly. The kidnapped villagers might suffocate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000200
text: Do you know about the legend of Cunningham?{nl}The legend states that a great demon was sealed here in the Crystal Mine.{nl}There is a book with more details about it at the Mine Worker's Resting Place in Crystal Mine 2F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000201
text: Anyway, my guess is that the demon is re-awakening and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The bishop's dream and the Legend of Cunningham... I feel they may be a sign that something{nl}huge is about to happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000202
text: Only the goddess would know if it will be hope or despair.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000203
text: The purifier can be easily fixed by anyone, but it may be hard to find the parts needed.{nl}In that case, use the compass that I gave you to search for them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000204
text: Well then, I have some things to do so I will meet you at 3F of the Crystal Mine.{nl}In the name of the goddess, I pray for success in your struggles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000205
text: If you can't find the parts needed to repair the purifier, use the compass I gave you.{nl}It'll help you find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000206
text: Village Aunt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000207
text: You've come to save us? Right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000208
text: It's alright, We are going to be okay now!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000209
text: Village Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000210
text: Please save us. Please...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000211
text: Please release me. Please...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000212
text: Mr. Juan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000213
text: I get furious whenever I see those Vubbes who ruined my hometown.{nl}That's why I want to help people like you who fight against the Vubbes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000214
text: I would have left already if this wasn't my hometown.{nl}Where on earth were all the Vubbes hiding before they crawled out?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000215
text: Pharmacist Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000216
text: Thanks for your help last time.{nl}Without you, I would have never gotten this much ingredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000217
text: Perhaps the person that the goddess sent was you.{nl}You are the most merciful person I have ever seen among the Revelators.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000218
text: Soldier Jace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000219
text: I will protect this village for my dead comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000220
text: Even if the world changes, I will never forgive the Vubbes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000221
text: Soldier Edgar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000222
text: These are the rations that we gathered from East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I will never, ever lose them again. Ever.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000223
text: Thanks to you, I received this much food.{nl}I am relieved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000224
text: Knight Commander Uska

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000225
text: Is this slate the evidence of salvation?{nl}It just looks like an old slate to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000226
text: Ask the mayor of the Miners' Village about a way to Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}I will send the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000227
text: It would be good to ask the Bokor Master to interpret this slate.{nl}She lives at the end of Klaipeda's Residential Area so go pay her a visit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000228
text: Use your time wisely.{nl}No one else fully knows your future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000229
text: So you finally returned.{nl}What did the Bokor Master tell you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000230
text: I'm also curious about the girl who cracked the seal.{nl}This is not a seal that can easily be broken.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000231
text: If the Bokor Master told you that I would know it..{nl}There's one place that comes to mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000232
text: The high gardens that the goddess mentioned could be an area within Leaf Veil Plateau. {nl}I heard the Paladin Master is there, uploading a long term promise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000233
text: Miners' Village Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000234
text: Welcome. Aren't you our town's savior?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000235
text: Leaf Veil Plateau, huh? If you take the road between the two bridges below, you'll reach {nl}Silverstream Gorge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000236
text: So this revelation is from goddess Laima and we have to collect all these for the goddess {nl}to regain her powers?{nl}That is amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000237
text: Oh, please do not reveal the fact that a revelation has been found unless it is absolutely necessary.{nl}Doing so may only create confusion if the rumors spread.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000238
text: Ah, the report.{nl}So you see, those Siaulagos were doing something strange to the supplies, {nl}then they started running away when Sparnas appeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000239
text: I was spotted by those Siaulagos as they were running away, so I fought them...{nl}And as you can see, I lost. The report, I mean.{nl}Aren't they a pain to deal with?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000240
text: If you find the report, please hand it over to Luders right away.{nl}Though I am terrified to think about what those bastards did to our supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000241
text: Yes, after seeing Moody's report, I am confident that they had put something in our supplies to{nl}lure Sparnas. Perhaps some Old Grains that the birds go crazy on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000242
text: The soldiers on patrol found the place where the Siaulambs' stolen goods are stored.{nl}How about we steal them back?{nl}Let's make it known that we're not as weak as they think.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000243
text: You should fight fire with fire.{nl}We will keep attacking until they fully realize that they've made a mistake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000244
text: I hope that we won't be troubled with from now on.{nl}Thanks for your efforts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000245
text: The location is Ziedo Pond.{nl}I heard there are many Siaulambs, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000246
text: I have not heard anything else about the bishop's dream.{nl}Sorry, I can't be of much help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000247
text: Klaipeda Guard Captain

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000248
text: Go ahead to Klaipeda.{nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda Central Plaza.{nl}I heard the bishop also had a dream about the goddess... it appears to concern that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000249
text: Klaipeda Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000250
text: Thank you for making your way here.{nl}If there is still this much left even after Sir Titas handled it himself, can you imagine how {nl}it was before?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000251
text: Mercenary Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000252
text: Do you want to do a simple task for me?{nl}I'm a known face so it will be hard for me to do it myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000253
text: If you don't want to, then you don't have to.{nl}There are plenty of people around who can do this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000254
text: You passed.{nl}The strength you possess is tremendous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000255
text: It's definitely worth it.{nl}Even if the King spent all his assets building the Mausoleum, its size is huge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000256
text: Judging from this, these equipment are not permitted.{nl}Do not leave them lying around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000257
text: Okay. Bring me more evidence that those people are making counterfeits.{nl}Do whatever it takes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000258
text: I am looking for evidence of artifact forgery.{nl}Your first task will be to bring me any illegal digging tools that you find.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000259
text: Of course you should show us your skills.{nl}Defeating Desert Chupacabras or Zinutes will be enough to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000260
text: Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000261
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}I think this will be enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000262
text: )}{nl}If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble.{nl} If you choose not to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000263
text: Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000264
text: Go back, it's dangerous!{nl}Kepas will soon be marching in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000265
text: Oh, you're a Revelator. It must be fate that we are to fight together. {nl}Let me give you the inside scoop.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000266
text: You mentioned that we need to assemble, right?{nl}Help me find some missing belongings and I'll go as soon as I can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000267
text: Have you found my belongings yet? I can't go back without them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000268
text: Thank you. You found it sooner than I expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000269
text: If you follow the road to the north, you will find the Search Scout.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000270
text: Laimonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000271
text: Have you ever offered worship to the Statue?{nl}If not, I'd really recommend it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000272
text: That depends on which goddess it is.{nl}If you follow the road to the right you will find the Statue of Goddess Zemyna.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000273
text: I do worry that the monsters might harm the Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000274
text: I am happy that the statue is unharmed.{nl}The monsters here know to fear the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000275
text: Go down the Shadow Forest Road and you should arrive at Klaipeda shortly.{nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000276
text: Please do me a favor if you are headed to Klaipeda.{nl}It's not easy to go back and forth from Klaipeda because of the Infrorocktors nowadays.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000277
text: Maybe taking care of the statues will make the goddesses return sooner...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000278
text: Follow the road on the left at the camp crossroads.{nl}{-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000279
text: )} You'll meet the troops right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000280
text: )}Alright, good job.{nl}You'll arrive at Klaipeda shortly if you follow the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}Don't forget to drop by Sir Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000281
text: Battle Commander

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000282
text: I will have my men notify the troops to assemble.{nl}You may return to Sir Titas to let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000283
text: The errand shouldn't be anything too difficult.{nl}If you don't want to help, I'll send you off to Klaipeda right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000284
text: Search Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000285
text: It sure is a problem.{nl}I didn't know Kepas could grow that big.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000286
text: Shouldn't a Revelator be heading to Klaipeda instead of hanging around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000287
text: I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than be stationed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000288
text: When you see a Goddess Statue, try offering your worship.{nl}Surely something nice will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000289
text: This is a dangerous area. What are you doing here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000290
text: Thank you.{nl}I better go report the roaming Large Kepa to Sir Titas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000291
text: Weird... That is not a type of monster you'd face in a place like this.{nl}It must be hard to travel around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000292
text: Assemble already?{nl}That's tough. There's still a pile of missions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000293
text: First, defeat the Hanamings around here.{nl}Then, collect their petals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000294
text: Even if this wasn't about the Revelators, but the goddesses returning instead,{nl}I wouldn't abandon my mission before it was over.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000295
text: Yes. This will be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that will restore your stamina instantly. I have enough of it so I will give you this {nl}as a gift.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000296
text: Stamina is consumed when you move.{nl}You can recover stamina by destroying a Tree Root Crystal or by resting.{nl}But you might not have time for that when you are being chased by monsters.{nl}That's when this pill comes in handy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000297
text: I heard news from my men and was becoming worried.{nl}All is well if it ended up good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000298
text: Klaipeda Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000299
text: {nl}When do you think the goddess is coming back?{nl}Even if I ask the Revelators, all they say is that they must go to Klaipeda...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000300
text: Are you a Revelator?{nl}Didn't the goddess appear in your dream?{nl}I heard so from the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000301
text: Trooper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000302
text: I wonder what the goddesses are doing...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000303
text: Thank you for making your way here.{nl}I am Uska, the Knight Commander in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000304
text: The Bishop also dreamed of a revelation.{nl}He told me to send the Revelators to the Crystal Mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000305
text: Let me know when you are ready to go to the Crystal Mine.{nl}I'll tell you the location and how to get in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000306
text: The bishop told us to send the Revelators to the Crystal Mine.{nl}He said the goddess told him to do so.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000307
text: But the Miners' Village is at war with the Vubbes and its entrance is limited to authorized {nl}personnel only. Knight Aras is the one managing troops in the East Siauliai Woods. {nl}You should talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000308
text: Monsters have been around for a long time, {nl}but they only started becoming violent four years ago. {nl}The ones that were most affected would be the plant types. They did not exist before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000309
text: Of course, beasts were no exception.{nl}I thought the end was near when monsters that seem to have fused with demons appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000310
text: Knight Aras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000311
text: Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poata, because it was really reckless.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000312
text: You want to get into the Crystal Mine?{nl}The Miners' Village is currently at war with the Vubbes and it's very dangerous,{nl}thus I cannot permit that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000313
text: And our troops are in no condition to guard you.{nl}I'm sorry but you will have to go back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000314
text: If you can't defeat the Pokubus, you'll have to give up going into the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000315
text: Thank you.{nl}Do not worry, I'll keep my promise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000316
text: Outpost Sentinel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000317
text: Although I'm worried about the situation in the Miners' Village, I'm not getting used to the {nl}constant fighting and resting. If only the Chupacabras could be dealt with to some degree, {nl}we would be much more well off.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000318
text: Other monsters are also flooding into areas where Chupacabras live.{nl}Miners' Village is a problem on its own but there are just too many things to pay attention to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000319
text: Thank you.{nl}Your assistance really helps lift our spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000320
text: With your abilities, I have one more favor to ask.{nl}Can you help us drive out the Chupacabras in the supply camp too?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000321
text: I'm worried for the Miners' Village, but the situation here isn't so good either. {nl}It'd be great if we could prepare some countermeasures before the number of monsters {nl}grow even further...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000322
text: You're done already?{nl}I've never seen anyone as fast as you before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000323
text: I'm on a mission to find out the cause of the sudden increase in monsters in the Eastern Woods.{nl}I also act as the intermediary in supplying the Miners' Village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000324
text: There are other knights out in Miners' Village. {nl}Frankly, the battle here is taking longer than we thought, as we imagined the battle would {nl}end as soon as Aras was here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000325
text: Since you're going to help, please defeat the Giant Gray Chupacabras too.{nl}They are the culprits stealing our supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000326
text: Giant Gray Chupacabras should appear now that you have defeated the Chupacabras.{nl}Well then, thanks for assisting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000327
text: Thank you.{nl}Now I can finally get to work easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000328
text: Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000329
text: The movement of Weavers in the lower areas of the stream seems suspicious.{nl}Seems like they're trying to interfere with supplies to the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000330
text: We might have to give up our current supplies and support ourselves until the next batch of {nl}supplies arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000331
text: Thank you.{nl}With you helping us out like this, we will not be defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000332
text: Your next mission is to find the cause of the increasing number of monsters.{nl}Popolions have a big appetite, so I hope we can find a clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000333
text: Although the Miners' Village is in trouble, given that the situation has{nl}reached the Eastern Woods, we can't assure the safety of Klaipeda.{nl}We hope the Miners' Village is putting up a good fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000334
text: Operations Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000335
text: Were you sent by Aras?{nl}This is a piece of Vubbe clothing. Ah... I see...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000336
text: I think the Vubbes from the Miners' Village have made their way into the woods.{nl}Maybe that's also a reason behind the abnormal surge in monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000337
text: I better ask Aras to search for Vubbes in other regions too.{nl}In the meantime, I would like you to take a look at the upper areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000338
text: We haven't searched the upper areas yet.{nl}Of course we should be sending troops, but I ask for your help as this is an urgent matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000339
text: You saw a Vubbe Fighter but missed it?{nl}We also got a report of Vubbe Fighter appearing in the Southern area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000340
text: First, talk to the Search Scout by the bridge in the lower area of Bulves Farm.{nl}This will become a tedious, drawn out campaign if we let that Vubbe Fighter run loose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000341
text: So the Vubbe Fighters are the reason behind the growing number of monsters.{nl}Please find out how many Vubbe Fighters there are.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000342
text: Under the circumstances, it makes sense that the monsters are controlled by the Vubbe Fighters.{nl}But deep down, you just don't want to believe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000343
text: Following your report, there are no more Vubbe Fighters in these woods.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000344
text: It appears the Vubbe Fighters have been defeated. {nl}I alerted the Search Scout at the Nudeges Felled Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000345
text: Supply Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000346
text: We need Weaver Claws as a part of the supplies to be sent to Miners' Village, {nl}but we just don't have time to look for them. What do we do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000347
text: Actually, it doesn't make sense for the Supply Soldier to directly retrieve the supplies.{nl}It should have come straight from Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000348
text: Thank you.{nl}Unexpected help always feels good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000349
text: As a matter of fact, everything would also be better if the Pokubus weren't around.{nl}We couldn't retrieve all the supplies with them running amok.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000350
text: I don't know why they suddenly started to prey on the supplies.{nl}Could something be commanding them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000351
text: Thank you.{nl}I envy your ability.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000352
text: Eastern Woods Search Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000353
text: Oh, it's you.{nl}I have heard from the Operations Officer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000354
text: A Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudeges Felled Area.{nl}We received orders to kill it, but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000355
text: I'm just a Search Scout, but this was my first time seeing a Vubbe Fighter up close.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000356
text: Amazing, you got rid of it by yourself?{nl}Report this to Aras, he'll be very pleased to hear this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000357
text: You really defeated the Vubbe Fighter alone!{nl}What a relief, now the monsters will stop growing in numbers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000358
text: Of course. As promised, I will grant you access to the Miners' Village.{nl}Please wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000359
text: If you find any clues, let the Operations Officer in the northern area know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000360
text: The Miners' Village is in a dire situation.{nl}It'll take too long to organize the troops so please go ahead and support the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000361
text: They have low intelligence, but these monsters build groups and live as a community.{nl}They used to appear only occasionally in the deeper areas of the mines...{nl}Could they be expanding their forces?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000362
text: Whatever the reason is, the Vubbes expanding their territory is a big problem.{nl}Monsters that lose their territory to the Vubbes will be forced to make their way into our base.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000363
text: It's a single road from here on so you'll be able to find the people easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000364
text: Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for can be found in the Closed Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000365
text: One thing, there's something that keeps bothering me.{nl}A vague feeling of something alien.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000366
text: Miner

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000367
text: Thank you for saving us.{nl}It's like a dream to be saved by the Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000368
text: The Closed Area?{nl}If you absolutely need to get in there, gather the mysterious stones that the Vubbes carry.{nl}The Crystal Wall should open when you insert enough stones to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000369
text: I was collecting supplies to be sent to the Miners' Village, but the monsters stole them all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000370
text: The supply boxes contain dangerous explosives so collecting them will not be an easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000371
text: They couldn't have gone far.{nl}It would have been better if it just exploded on the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000372
text: Mercenary Lindt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000373
text: Thank you again.{nl}I should return to my commander soon. I think I can return to him after I get some more rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000374
text: I knew you would.{nl}One more thing, the ground near the Closed Area is weak so the entrance has been blocked {nl}for a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000375
text: The kidnapped people are veteran miners so they may know how to get in.{nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000376
text: It wasn't long ago that I felt a strange power while performing experiments in the Closed Area.{nl}It was different from the mana that we know but it was very warm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000377
text: But some force did not allow me to approach, as if it had an owner already.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the evidence of salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000378
text: Perhaps the evidence of salvation is the force I felt...{nl}That's what I think.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000379
text: All I see are monsters and we're out of supplies.{nl}I'm also curious how the battle situation is in Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000380
text: Until I'm assigned a new task, I'm thinking of going back to my duties as a search scout.{nl}Observing the monsters, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000381
text: The Miners' Village is under siege and entrance is prohibited for civilians.{nl}Remember that we can't guarantee your safety if you do not get my permission.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000382
text: You have to cheer up.{nl} Even Aras is holding on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000383
text: Goddess Zemyna overlooks the earth.{nl}There are rumors that the goddesses have abandoned us, but that's nonsense.{nl}The statues still shine beautifully when you pray to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000384
text: Vubbes suddenly came pouring in into the Siauliai Woods from the Crystal Mines.{nl}Thus, the Miners' Village situated between the Mines and the Woods became a battlefield.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000385
text: For safety reasons, I can't permit entrance to the Miners' Village. {nl}Of course it would be a different story if your skill are good enough to ensure your own safety {nl}without the guards' protection.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000386
text: Gosh, that could have been really dangerous.{nl}That huge thing was hiding so well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000387
text: It's very important to study the monsters at times like this.{nl}It's like weather forecasts where you try to understand the source to see what trends will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000388
text: I am certain that the Leaf Bugs at Uolos Farm stole them.{nl}They have stolen from us before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000389
text: Send my regards to the Guard Captain when you meet him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000390
text: In order to test if your skills are good enough to enter the Miners' Village,{nl}I need you to help us solve a problem we have.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000391
text: First, take back Bulves Farm from the Pokubus.{nl}This should be a fairly easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000392
text: (There seems to be a gap in the rock where you can insert something.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000393
text: Let's search Bulves Farm first.{nl}But don't chase them or something as it can be dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000394
text: You're making me wonder if you're an envoy of the goddess.{nl}Anyway, the supply camp is located further below the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000395
text: The Leaf Veil Plateau you are looking for is further in from the Silverstream Gorge.{nl}You can get to Silverstream Gorge by going down from the middle of Twin Bridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000396
text: The Crystal Mine has become infested with Vubbes, so be sure to stay together in groups of five.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000397
text: Equipment Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000398
text: Even at times like this, I struggle to find the best items I can. You can't go easy when dealing{nl}with your customers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000399
text: Monsters probably know I can tell which items are good as they attack and steal from people {nl}who buy items from me. I feel sorry for those who were attacked but it also proves that the {nl}items are worth it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000400
text: The monsters never raided Klaipeda, but with Sir Uska gone, it's hard to be at ease.{nl}You have you watch out for yourself at times like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000401
text: I want to travel with a single weapon in hand like an adventurer... Yeah there's no way I could.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000402
text: If you listen to the soldiers, they'll use terms only they can understand to make things sound {nl}complicated. But when I ask my soldier friend, he says it's not like they are talking about anything {nl}important.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000403
text: Be cautious of people who sell weapons from monsters without a permit.{nl}They'll try and scam you into to buying useless things or sell you things at ridiculously high prices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000404
text: Item Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000405
text: It's the little things you forget to buy that makes you regret when you travel.{nl}Better buy enough of them when you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000406
text: I feel sorry for the injured. Can't we just get along with the monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000407
text: I'd rather stay safe and at peace with lower sales than have sales shoot up because people are{nl}worried that the monsters might attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000408
text: I sell things that people need, but I sometimes think it would've been better if I was a healer,{nl}because that way I could be closer to the explorers to help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000409
text: I hear strange howlings from the distance. Could they be monster sounds?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000410
text: People say I'm weird and I talk too much, but I don't mind. Even if I'm as weird like they say, {nl}that doesn't mean the items I sell are weird.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000411
text: Blacksmith

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000412
text: Hello.{nl}I can help you repair items but I can't craft new ones because I don't have the materials.{nl}Go on and choose from whatever is available.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000413
text: Klaipeda Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000414
text: It's true these are tough times, but everyone is looking out for the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000415
text: Aside from everything else, I want to eat till I'm full.{nl}You need to eat to have strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000416
text: Why did the goddesses disappeared?{nl}Everyone is looking for where they've gone, but no one is asking why they disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000417
text: I can't eat, sleep, or move about freely because of those monsters.{nl}In the old days, we used gather herbs or pick fruits in the Siauliai Woods you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000418
text: Everyone is talking about the war wherever you go.{nl}Like who and how much people are hurt or who's assigned to where.{nl}All the stories about the war makes me sick!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000419
text: I heard they will send soldiers who aren't even trained into the nest of monsters.{nl}Might as well gather the old people and make them soldiers too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000420
text: My life is just a cycle of anxiety and anger.{nl}The goddess should return soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000421
text: There are suddenly many people who have had a revelation in their dreams.{nl}Could it be a sign that something is about to happen again?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000422
text: The bishop of Klaipeda saw a goddess in his dream.{nl}Did you also have such a dream, Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000423
text: Mother of a Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000424
text: )}My son has enlisted in the army.{nl}He said who would, if not him, at such difficult times like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000425
text: )}Monster are growing and the forest is too chaotic for people to live in.{nl}At least, Klaipeda is safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000426
text: )}Even if Klaipeda is safe, aren't the other cities in chaos?{nl}Putting aside the capital, Fedimian has totally collapsed except for the Divine District.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000427
text: )}It's a good thing that my son accomplished his dream of becoming a solder...{nl}But the monsters are rising and I'm worried he might get hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000428
text: )}Maybe Klaipeda is where the goddess has bestowed her blessings.{nl}I hope the blessings will also reach my son in the army.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000429
text: )}My husband used to be a miner. I am relieved that he isn't anymore.{nl}It would be too dangerous if the monsters raid at times like this, wouldn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000430
text: )}Many refugees came from fallen towns.{nl}Our food supplies are running short but we still have to help each other.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000431
text: I may not bring in the best of items, but shouldn't providing essentials be a skill of its own?{nl}I will work hard to get through these tough times.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000432
text: I think the best weapons and armor are the ones that you get used to over a long period of time.{nl}In order to do so, you must first start by buying good items.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000433
text: I used to pack my things and go around traveling in the past but I guess that would be {nl}problematic now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000434
text: Try using a variety of weapons. Eventually, you'll find one that fits you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000435
text: The armor that suits you will guarantee your safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000436
text: A single armor piece can mean the difference between life and death. Look around to see if you {nl}have everything you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000437
text: It's free to look around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000438
text: Look around and see if you need anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000439
text: Look around carefully. You might find something that can help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000440
text: Sometimes the things you are looking at without any thought may actually fit you very well, {nl}so take a look and think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000441
text: You can just look around. Find me anytime you need something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000442
text: We have enough items, so take a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000443
text: You need good weapons and armor to prepare for the monsters. That is what I'm selling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000444
text: Items I have for sale are flawless. These are all new.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000445
text: If you don't prepare your equipment now, you might regret it later when you're surrounded {nl}by monsters. Have a look around when you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000446
text: I've prepared the best items I can find. The prices aren't bad either so look around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000447
text: The things I sell are good both in price and quality.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000448
text: If you have the time, take a look at the items I have for sale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000449
text: I hope good items will find good owners.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000450
text: This used to be a bustling shopping area. But everyone left as it became difficult to live {nl}here...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000451
text: There were so many people back then that I didn't have the time for a friendly chat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000452
text: A lot of people seem to be coming thanks to Uska's recruitment notice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000453
text: You'll need a lot of preparation before going to battle against the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000454
text: Times are difficult but I decided not to raise prices. Have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000455
text: Some monsters will mistaken things for food and swallow them. They must be really hungry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000456
text: I once encountered a monster in Siauliai Woods. I just stood still and the monster went away...{nl}I guess there are monsters that do not make the first attack on people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000457
text: I've heard that some people sell things that are dropped from those who were running away {nl}from the monsters. I don't sell stuff like that, so don't worry about that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000458
text: Everything aside, I do not lie about my items being cheap. The stuff I sell is priced just right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000459
text: Feel free to look around anytime.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000460
text: Things can turn south if you don't prepare enough potions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000461
text: It's free to look around the things I sell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000462
text: How do you continue running a business if you don't make profits?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000463
text: I thought about moving my business to somewhere else, but I had to stay for the people who {nl}come to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000464
text: I don't think of making a lot of money. I just need enough to live by.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000465
text: I think we have to help each other at difficult times like these. I hope I can be of help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000466
text: Can I help you? I'll show you what we have prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000467
text: Please feel free to come back if you need anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000468
text: You don't necessarily have to buy things so feel free to look around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000469
text: I sold items even before the monsters appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000470
text: Don't you feel good just looking at the items even if you don't buy them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000471
text: You can find me anytime if you want a closer look at the items I'm selling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000472
text: What would it be like to go on an adventure fighting monsters? I was born and raised here, so {nl}I sometimes wonder how it would be in other areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000473
text: Sometimes when I see the soldiers who protect us from the monsters, I want to give them things {nl}for free. Although it's really not easy for me to do so...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000474
text: Better were the days when Commander Uska took care of Klaipeda himself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000475
text: Isn't there a way to defeat all the monsters running wild in Siauliai Woods?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000476
text: I hope some skilled person could drive out all the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000477
text: Living in a place where monsters are running wild outside is driving me nuts.{nl}And I can't think of going anywhere else because of the monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000478
text: I'd wipe out all the monsters if I had the skills.{nl}Why are the soldiers leaving the monsters alone?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000479
text: I am tired of living a life running away from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000480
text: Thinking of the peaceful days in the past makes me feel like I'm dreaming.{nl}Being awake is like a very long nightmare.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000481
text: I want to run away to another place if I can.{nl}Is there a future for the kingdom?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000482
text: I can't sleep well nowadays.{nl}It's all because of those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000483
text: To live at peace in a world where monsters are running wild... is impossible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000484
text: Does salvation even exist?{nl}Hanging on each day in hopes that the goddess will return is really miserable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000485
text: We can't go out nor can we live like this. Will we really be alright?{nl}I can't seem to find an answer no matter how much I think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000486
text: Getting used to a world where we live together with monsters, what could be more terrible {nl}and scary?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000487
text: I heard that there are people who study monsters.{nl}What is wrong with them?{nl}Those monsters are bad creatures that could attack us at any moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000488
text: I'm afraid that Klaipeda might become like the capital.{nl}It's already being called the fallen city, no?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000489
text: Many people are afraid of Bokors for summoning zombies.{nl}But we only curse the enemies of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000490
text: Intelligence, calm judgement and cold rationality.{nl}These are the qualities required for our Cryomancers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000491
text: Fire is grace sent to us by the Goddess Gabija.{nl}You cannot become a great Pyromancer if you overlook that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000492
text: It is vain death that lies at the end for those who only seek dauntlessness.{nl}If you wish to achieve true justice, lift the shield of Peltasta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000493
text: After the goddesses disappeared, the capital was destroyed on Medzio Diena.{nl}I hope more people will become Peltastas to protect the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000494
text: Rodelero Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000495
text: People say that the Divine District was a result of the goddess' blessing.{nl}What they don't know is that we Rodeleros also played a big role.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000496
text: Squire Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000497
text: We are in chaos nowadays, but we used to live in honorable times before.{nl}Well... that's all in the past now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000498
text: Wizard Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000499
text: No matter how much magic talent you have, it all goes to waste unless you actively train it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000500
text: You must be brave in order to protect the kingdom.{nl}But for that bravery to be distinguishable from recklessness, your skills need to be adequate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000501
text: The Goddesses may be all gone but my powers are still doing fine, right?{nl}I'm sure it must be proof that Goddess Gabija is at least safe somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000502
text: Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000503
text: Simplicity is best.{nl}Walk the path of an Elementalist if you wish to research the source of all else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000504
text: Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000505
text: It's painful to see people come to Klaipeda seeking refuge from the monsters.{nl}If they were Quarrel Shooters then they wouldn't have to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000506
text: Ranger Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000507
text: I heard monsters swarm in flocks outside of Klaipeda.{nl}If I could improve my skill instead of attacking them one by one...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000508
text: Sapper Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000509
text: People shouldn't do things they'll regret.{nl}Four years ago on Medzio Diena, I lost even those whom I wanted to ask for forgiveness.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000510
text: Archer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000511
text: Defeating enemies one by one from a distance is the beauty of the bow and arrow.{nl}It doesn't matter how many shots you have to take, the shots that actually hit are the ones {nl}that count, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000512
text: Priest Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000513
text: It does a priest no good to doubt the goddesses, for only faith can support a Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000514
text: Sadhu Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000515
text: Truthful and divine entities are inherent in all things.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000516
text: Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000517
text: You're late. {nl}So, you want to save the woman?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000518
text: Technician Orion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000519
text: The grounds at the throat of Geltonas tremble from the huge mouth, carrying death.{nl}Shaking like thunder. The huge mouth could bite one's head off.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000520
text: I think this phrase indicates very dangerous monsters.{nl}I think we should've just ripped up the note to begin with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000521
text: Please use this bait on the way to Geltonas Highland.{nl}If you hide in the trees it shouldn't be long before a monster comes out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000522
text: Good job.{nl}Let's get moving before any stronger monsters find us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000523
text: If this note is true, we might die at any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000524
text: There are things called Dumbleballs.{nl}According to some soldiers, the Siaulambs changed dramatically after eating a Dumbleball.{nl}It was as if they lost all fear... The solders said they'd never seen anything like it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000525
text: Fortunately, soldiers on patrol found the general locations where the Dumbleballs are held.{nl}If we can pinpoint the places and burn them down, then the tide of battle will tilt to our favor.{nl}Please look for an old wooden box at the 4th supply warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000526
text: Please don't ever think about eating it.{nl}I don't know what the ingredients are, but you will probably suffer from a terrible diarrhea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000527
text: That's good. Please destroy it.{nl}The next location will be the 2nd supply warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000528
text: It did such a dirty thing on our supplies.{nl}I can't withhold my anger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000529
text: Soldiers are reporting that other monsters are appearing at Amzina Curved Path.{nl}Please check if they are related to Sparnas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000530
text: Those silly things keep coming towards us.{nl}Now may be the only chance we have to go and get Sparnas.{nl}Tell me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000531
text: They really worked up a bunch of problems.{nl}If they were to make their move on the lifeline supplies, I won't just be beating them with {nl}the bat I set aside at the middle of the market.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000532
text: What? The Tutu?{nl}I don't have time to think about those insignificant critters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000533
text: When you level up, you can increase a status of your choice and become stronger. {nl}Would you like to try doing so now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000534
text: It's important to keep in mind what you want to become. {nl}That's never an easy thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000535
text: Yes. That's how you do it. {nl}Pretty simple, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000536
text: Aras is at the center region of the woods. {nl}But there has been a tremendous increase in monsters around here, so I suggest you don't go in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000537
text: Somehow Klaipeda has managed to hold back the monsters for now,{nl}but we have to find and remove the cause or we won't hold out for long.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000538
text: That strange feeling I had in Crystal Mine 3F,{nl}it keeps occurring to me that it might be related to that girl the townspeople keep talking about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000539
text: I just feel bad that I wasn't able to meet her face-to-face.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000540
text: Thank you for saving the villagers,{nl}but you're not thinking of going to the Closed Area, are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000541
text: Remove the final seal that is left from here.{nl}The odor in the air is changing. I am sure it's from a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000542
text: The demons are advancing. This is unusual.{nl}Even if it is sealed multiple times, I don't feel safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000543
text: I caught the smell of Biteregina.{nl}I'm glad that you're safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000544
text: Alright. The hidden door to the sanctum is now open and you may enter it.{nl}You should see one of the two seals that protect the legacy of the Great King Zachariel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000545
text: The only thing that remains to be done is for us to watch over the Great King Zachariel's eternal {nl}sleep. It was a real honor for me to meet you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000546
text: Well done.{nl}Morkus is waiting for you at Overlong Bridge Valley. You must hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000547
text: There are people who are after the Great King's inheritance.{nl}If the inheritance wasn't sealed away, those people would have taken them by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000548
text: Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, that's strange. It seems that it never happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000549
text: There is Gustas and then there is my senior.{nl}That means I am the youngest? No...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000550
text: Gustas is proud to protect the inheritance of Zachariel.{nl}I wonder what he's going to do after he relinquishes that position.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000551
text: Just how many things are hiding in this canyon?{nl}Could there be more of the king's inheritance here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000552
text: According to the old records, the king erased the stonemason's memories using magic to {nl}protect the Royal Mausoleum. I think it's amazing that he erased only those memories.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000553
text: Liaison Officer Nian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000554
text: You saw it, right? That's why I told you not to touch it.{nl}Because of this, we received an order to withdraw from this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000555
text: Well, if I am to be involved in this, can you at least do me a favor?{nl}Tell Adelle at the Excavation Team Camp to watch out for this kind of stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000556
text: We are looking for a stone with peculiar carvings.{nl}If you happen to come upon such a stone, please notify us instead of touching it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000557
text: Historian Adelle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000558
text: A stone? I might know of it.{nl}Do you want to to know what kind of stone it is?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000559
text: Monsters suddenly became violent and started attacking us.{nl}This isn't normal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000560
text: This should do.{nl}This evil energy... I'm certain that the demons are plotting something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000561
text: I'll consider you as a reliable ally then.{nl}You can get them from the nearby Hogmas. I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000562
text: Archaeologist Friedka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000563
text: I'm looking for a certain unique stone pillar. But as a scholar, getting it is beyond my skill.{nl}If you help me, you will be handsomely rewarded. Are you interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000564
text: I know that we received an order to withdraw, but know this,{nl}the reward will be well worth your time. You won't regret it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000565
text: Okay. First collect amulets from the Hogmas.{nl}After that, put those amulets on the stone pillar at the bottom of Geltonas Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000566
text: We should get out of here as soon as possible, before something big or worse finds us.{nl}I mean there's nothing wrong with research, but to do so in such a remote location.{nl}I'd rather the kingdom pays more attention to rescuing people than partake in these research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000567
text: Are you asking me how come a technician is at a place like this?{nl}As an advisor, of course. You'll need a technician like me to find out how this gigantic structure {nl}stood still for hundreds of years.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000568
text: We will find out about the true nature of this place soon enough. {nl}It just can't be found with equations no matter how long you scrutinize them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000569
text: According to this map, the thing we are looking for is at Stone Pillar Hill.{nl}Alright then. Would you please make a rubbing of it?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000570
text: It would be great if I could go.{nl}Too bad my body isn't what it used to be though.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000571
