text: Well done!{nl}I should get out of here since I got what I wanted.{nl}There is a mark here that was ruined by magic. I wonder who did it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000572
text: I must get out of here now.{nl}Maybe somewhere safe to continue my research.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000573
text: By the way, why are these stones acting like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000574
text: I'm sorry, I don't quite trust you yet.{nl}Come back when you have some more experience.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000575
text: I just saw those villagers being taken away, and yet I could do nothing. I can't accept that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000576
text: Belief in yourself. Endless confidence. {nl} These are the most important things when projecting yourself in reality. {nl} That is the nature of Psychokino and the power that moves the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000577
text: A Linker is someone who connects people with ropes of Mana.{nl}How strong the connection is depends on the quality of Mana.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000578
text: Cataphract Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000579
text: Cataphracts have the power to charge though any enemies that block their way.{nl}They are brave warriors whom fight on the front lines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000580
text: May I help you? {nl}Fortunately, we have some potions left in stock.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000581
text: Looking for some good equipment? {nl}I have prepared the best ones available. {nl}Look around, the prices aren't bad either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000582
text: Oh, this anvil is my small gift to you for saving me. {nl} It's a useful item that can upgrade your equipment. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000583
text: Well then, see you in the mines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000584
text: Miners' Village Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000585
text: The Silverstream Gorge emerges when you go down from the middle of Twin Bridge.{nl}You will be able to reach Leaf Veil Plateau if you head further to the east from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000586
text: Goddess Saule

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000587
text: To retrieve the revelation, please go to Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Now is our chance, as the Demon Lord Bramble is trying to recover his power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000588
text: Royal Mausoleum Foundation Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000589
text: I pass my words to the Revelator who comes here.{nl}I, the Great King Zachariel, sleep here to protect the goal of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000590
text: If the evil presence attacks, please protect this place by waking the sleeping Guardians up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000591
text: Royal Mausoleum Cube Manual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000592
text: A Guardian who is corrupted by evil will forget its responsibility to protect the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat these Guardians near the large cubes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000593
text: Defense System Manual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000594
text: A Guardian that forgot its mission to protect the Royal Mausoleum deserves to be destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000595
text: Guardian's Role

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000596
text: By recycling the power supply of the Guardians that forgot their mission, we can return them {nl}to be part of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000597
text: Guardian Stone Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000598
text: The evil presence has manipulated and corrupted the Guardians using their magic.{nl}Destroy the corrupted Guardians to stop it from spreading.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000599
text: The demons are trying to take over the roots of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}If the control magic becomes corrupted, we can't protect the Royal Mausoleum anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000600
text: The Guardians' corruption is spreading like a plague.{nl}We need to look for a special way to stop it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000601
text: We need to destroy the corrupted Guardians that are sleeping.{nl}First, collect condensed magic from the jars nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000602
text: I pray to the goddess for those sleeping Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000603
text: We should destroy those Guardians before they awaken to the demons' commands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000604
text: Destroy the Guardians using the condensed magic source.{nl}If something interferes, destroy it as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000605
text: You should destroy them before they wake up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000606
text: It's very sad to listen to the commands of demons as the Guardians of the tomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000607
text: This evil is very real.{nl}It could possibly reach the deepest parts of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000608
text: Royal Mausoleum Blueprint

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000609
text: When the evil presence gets too close to the goddess' revelation, the Guardians are programmed to destroy the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000610
text: The evil presence is getting close to the goddess' revelation.{nl}But it will never get the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000611
text: Revelator, go and get the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power from the Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000612
text: It was prepared to protect against beings that humans could not stand against.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000613
text: Pour the source of the Royal Mausoleum's power into the jars.{nl}It will create a false revelation as a decoy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000614
text: The evil presence will never get the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000615
text: The evil presence has obtained a false revelation.{nl}How foolish of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000616
text: Put the Guardian's will into this jar and go to the last Guardian.{nl}It will give you the power to destroy the evil presence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000617
text: The evil presence will never get the goddess' revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000618
text: To have Guardians perform their mission, you need to correct the regulatory magic that went awry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000619
text: If the Royal Mausoleum's power source is corrupted, the Guardians will forget their mission.{nl}You can purify the Royal Mausoleum's power source by lighting up the stone lanterns with {nl}the burning stones inside of a Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000620
text: Royal Mausoleum Regulatory Magic Manual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000621
text: The Royal Mausoleum Magic Regulator can be destroyed while the Activation Stone is being powered.{nl}The Activation Stone can be powered again through the Royal Mausoleum Regulatory Magic Manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000622
text: The demons have cut off the regulatory magic source.{nl}Please gather magical power from the nearby Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000623
text: Good.{nl}The provision to the magical power shortage will now proceed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000624
text: A path has been opened.{nl}Restore magical power by reigniting the stone lanterns of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000625
text: When the regulatory magic flows yet again, the Guardians will regain their reason.{nl}But that will take a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000626
text: Abnormal Guardians are attacking the Magic Vessels.{nl}Protect the Magic Vessels until the regulatory magic flows again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000627
text: The Magic Vessels is like the heart of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}It must never let it be destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000628
text: Order will surely return to this place.{nl}But it will take a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000629
text: The evil presence has corrupted the regulatory magic flow and is accumulating in the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Find and remove the corrupted cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000630
text: The Royal Mausoleum was designed perfectly.{nl}But the demons' plan seems beyond perfect.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000631
text: Our Guardians are under their control and are carrying out their tasks.{nl}This is our failure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000632
text: The evil presence has also corrupted the source of our magical power, the stone lanterns.{nl}Destroy the corrupted stone lanterns to stop the spread of corruption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000633
text: The evil energy is pervading the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We can no longer remain idle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000634
text: Perhaps this place will no longer be corrupted from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000635
text: Royal Mausoleum Archives

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000636
text: A Wheelen's Mark gives us power to face against the forces of evil..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000637
text: Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But, if their loyalty is to the enemies, they are worthless.{nl}The dogs who can't protect the Royal Mausoleum will lose the leash with the king's name on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000638
text: Great King Zachariel was proud to create the gigantic Guardians.{nl}He even put secret treasures inside of them, so that only the one who destroys these {nl}Guardians could get them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000639
text: The forces of evil will never reach the goddess' revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000640
text: Coben

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000641
text: I am looking for my brother.{nl}If you can help me, I may give you a reward.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000642
text: He was a really fantastic person.{nl}I can't imagine myself being like him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000643
text: Something is between the pages of this diary.{nl}A blueprint.. and oh, my brother had recorded a few things here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000644
text: I came here to look for my brother, but I am not as brave as he is.{nl}I want you to take a look at his monuments' writing on my behalf.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000645
text: Yes. My brother is a thief.{nl}My brother used to come to our shop once in a few years and tell us stories about his adventures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000646
text: So he challenged the great Mage Tower?{nl}That's my brother! He could certainly do that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000647
text: The Mage Tower was a fortress that demons could not even try to approach.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000648
text: We should look for the next monument.{nl}If the writing can't be seen clearly, rub it with Cockatrice Fat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000649
text: Mage Tower... Is there anything to steal there?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000650
text: Yes! He would not stop at stealing from the Mage Tower.{nl}I will go to Negyvas Field first so follow me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000651
text: You came. The next monument is in front of me, but I am just a drunken coward.{nl}I will stay at the road on the left side of Negyvas Field so you go and check it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000652
text: It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother would rather choose to die than look back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000653
text: How could he even think of using magic against the Archmage?{nl}That's my brother.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000654
text: We should check by rubbing Hallowventer Charcoal.{nl}The next monument is at the right side of Negyvas Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000655
text: He will do anything he sets his mind to.{nl}How could we have imagined that he could climb into the Mage Tower which even the demons {nl}failed to climb?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000656
text: You have to concentrate magic power?{nl}Ah! My brother left me something before.{nl}I brought it to give it back to him, but I don't know if it's right...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000657
text: My brother told me that it is a device that will charge magic power when it is installed at the {nl}right place. But he also told me that it could summon a strong monster so he said to to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000658
text: The Mage Tower should let us enter it without any complaints.{nl}If I could find my brother with this... It will be so good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000659
text: Yes. The monument, the monument...{nl}There is only one place left which I haven't been to. Follow me to the Karsta Hall Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000660
text: Soon I can meet my brother.{nl}Please check the last monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000661
text: His mind must have been like mine here.{nl}A famous name can be a burden sometimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000662
text: I am sure that my brother stood still even when he was confronting his death.{nl}But, even if we are in mud, living is more meaningful than dying..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000663
text: I don't need this anymore.{nl}Take it. Please use it for more valuable goals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000664
text: So what should I do?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000665
text: I will fight fire with fire.{nl}I will find the magician's weakness using magic and humiliate her in her own tower. Haha!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000666
text: Stonemason Canolyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000667
text: Are you going to Fedimian as well?{nl}We are stonemasons. We were called to rebuild Fedimian and were hurrying over there but..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000668
text: As you can see, we can't reach Fedimian even thought it is right in front of us, {nl}but those Cockatrices are a problem for us.{nl}Do you think you could take care of them for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000669
text: There is no reason for those monsters to be walking around. {nl}They are just there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000670
text: Hey, why did you take so long?{nl}While you were gone, the monsters came and stole everything from us!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000671
text: We can reimburse for the expenses for others, but what about the tool box? {nl}We lost Sprit of Stonemason to Moa..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000672
text: I guess it's true, all things with wings like shiny things.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000673
text: The toolbox wasn't there?{nl}Well. We can't do anything about it then. At least I can say we got our revenge on it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000674
text: Tara Miles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000675
text: I'm a doctor who came to help patients in Fedimian.{nl}I have some problems, can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000676
text: There's a sign of plague within those monster's trap.{nl}Fortunately, I think it's not too serious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000677
text: Okay.{nl}Let's talk again at Negyvas Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000678
text: You came. Please get some dust samples from the Hallowventers.{nl}There are many reasons that a plague could spread.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000679
text: It is important to cure diseases, but it is more important to prevent it in the first place.{nl}You wash your hands all the time, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000680
text: Thank you.{nl}We just need one more sample.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000681
text: This is an opportunity for us. The Big Cockatrices are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000682
text: Even if we fail at preventing the disease, we should be able to quickly make a medicine with{nl}our research results.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000683
text: You got them. Thank you so much.{nl}You've saved many lives in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000684
text: We can suppress the vicious energy if the magic of the tomb gets unleashed.{nl}I need the activating stone that is located inside the Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000685
text: Secret Location Manual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000686
text: We hid the secret treasures for the Revelator who would come someday.{nl}Find and absorb the Guardians' hidden energy to open the secret door.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000687
text: The hideout of my brother, whom I used to serve, is located at the Abandoned Farm up north.{nl}Please get my brother's diary there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000688
text: Grita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000689
text: It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were {nl}present before I lost my consciousness. Did something happen to Gabija?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000690
text: It may be better for Gabija to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a pole that we can ignite light on. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000691
text: Good. Since she knows that we came, she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabija.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000692
text: Guardian of the Royal Family's Secret Treasure

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000693
text: You are qualified to receive the secret treasure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000694
text: Denoptic is trying to control the defiled Guardians.{nl}Defeat him so that the Guardians will no longer be manipulated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000695
text: The magic regulator of the Royal Mausoleum can be destroyed {nl}using the activating stones found inside the Guardians.{nl}The regulatory magic of the Royal Mausoleum will {nl}then be released and will suppress the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000696
text: This evil presence left only names of the demons to the Guardians.{nl}The Guardians will destroy the Royal Mausoleum without knowing that the Revelator is here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000697
text: Stop Bearkaras, the final Guardian, before it destroys the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000698
text: Stop Bearkaras, the final Guardian, before it destroys the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000699
text: I thank you in the name of the goddesses!{nl}First, I'd like to request that you take care of the unsanitary Cockatrices that carry diseases.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000700
text: This monster is called a Moa. {nl}It ran away to the Leipsna Chapel Site to the west.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000701
text: The Royal Mausoleum Magic Regulator can be destroyed, {nl}while the Activation Stone is being powered.{nl}The Activation Stone can be powered again through the{nl}Royal Mausoleum Regulatory Magic Manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000702
text: Did Laima know that the world would turn out like this?{nl}She is the goddess of fate and foresight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000703
text: It would not be strange if the world ended tomorrow.{nl}However, I just want to know. Why the goddesses disappeared...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000704
text: Press {Img F1 40 40} to use your remaining Status Points on the status you want to enhance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000705
text: Press {Img F10 40 40} to open the Help menu for more information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000706
text: Press {Img F3 40 40} to open the Skill window.{nl}Use your Skill Points on the skills you want to enhance, then click on 'O' to confirm. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000707
text: Find and offer worship to all the Goddess Statues scattered around the world while you travel. You will surely be compensated for doing so. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000708
text: Press {Img F10 40 40} to open the Help window for more information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000709
text: The other troops are fighting at the Miners' Village and we are blocking the monsters from{nl}coming though here. I don't think the Vubbes are smart enough to make use of tactics... {nl}though I am concerned about that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000710
text: We have problems here, but I'm just as worried about the other troops fighting in the {nl}Miners' Village. Normally, they should have cleaning up by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000711
text: Watcher Gilbert

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000712
text: It's the Pantos again. {nl}They even stole the working parts. {nl}Well then, we've got to take them back, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000713
text: I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl}But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000714
text: Well done. {nl}Now attach this and grease it, then it should work correctly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000715
text: The Pantos hid some parts in the grasslands of Mieguista Slope. {nl}Try to get me those for the time being since it's urgent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000716
text: The Pantos think the grassland hides everything. {nl}I used to find that cute about them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000717
text: Watcher Matthew

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000718
text: I am looking for cable car parts, but I can't seem to find any. {nl}Maybe the Zignuts at Nepavy Grassland swallowed them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000719
text: If your looking for the Paladin Master, he's at Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}You can get there through the cable car.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000720
text: I want to go destroy those demons, but...{nl}the cable car hasn't been working right, so I need to work on fixing it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000721
text: If it wasn't for me, uncle Gilbert would have been going around looking through this huge area. {nl}I am really worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000722
text: This is a sacred land which we have served for generations. {nl}We used to hold prayer and important meetings here whenever there was a disaster. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000723
text: But the land has been like this ever since it fell to evil energy four years ago. {nl}I guess the elders couldn't have helped it either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000724
text: In the past, this cable car was just a rope with a basket. {nl}You had to put your life on the line whenever you crossed it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000725
text: So I traveled to Klaipeda and learned the skills to create it myself. {nl}I have to start looking for a successor, but Matthew doesn't seem interested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000726
text: Watcher Basil

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000727
text: The Shaman Doll is to be filled with Mushcaria's Enchanted Mane. {nl}The Mushcaria should be in the Tustanti Plateau, can you get its mane for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000728
text: They used to be considered mysterious creatures, worthy of respect. {nl}But nowadays you just go a few steps outside town and they are everywhere, preying on people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000729
text: I forgot that Mushcaria was still alive. {nl}Anyway, you did a good job.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000730
text: There is enough time, so go meet with Follower Algis first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000731
text: I am about to head down this path to the church. {nl}Our Paladin friend likes the word 'if' a lot. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000732
text: If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl}Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000733
text: Watcher Allen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000734
text: The barrier that used to stop the demons at Mazas Rest Place is broken. {nl}I want to fix it, could you lend me your help?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000735
text: The barrier was made a long time ago. {nl}And I failed to protect it, what do I tell our ancestors?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000736
text: I'm pretty dull and unsure on fixing the barrier, so could you inform to Kayetonas about it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000737
text: Follower Kayetonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000738
text: No wonder. I was bewildered when the demons suddenly appeared out of nowhere. {nl}I better let my brothers know about this. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000739
text: Watcher Kenneth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000740
text: You can't let your guard down just because the Demon Summoning Circles are gone. {nl}We don't even know what caused them to appear in the first place. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000741
text: Anyway, please inform Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000742
text: It might be a bit extreme, but I'm thinking about eradicating all the demon's souls.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000743
text: After you soften the demons up a bit, use the seal's power to draw their souls out.{nl}Then you get rid of the souls. Would you like to give it a try?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000744
text: It'd be better defeat the severed souls quickly. {nl}Wouldn't it be scary to see them come back to life?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000745
text: Honestly, I had my doubts, but it seems to be working? {nl}Please let Kayetonas know about this. {nl}I think he will be pleased, he is in Flower Greeting Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000746
text: Now, I think I can live. {nl}We have to keep it up and stop the demons. {nl}Please tell Kayetonas that protecting this place isn't easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000747
text: The demons are very strong.{nl}I will protect this place to block those demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000748
text: Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000749
text: My old friend, Algis, will explain. Please listen to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000750
text: I can see the monsters clearly from up here.{nl}We may get surrounded by them soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000751
text: The pieces of the destroyed barrier are scattered at Mazas Rest Place. {nl}Collect them and give them to Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000752
text: My poor deceased father would be happy if he knew I became a Watcher.{nl}But, I've already made a mistake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000753
text: We can say it's peaceful for now. For now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000754
text: They say that it's one of the devices prepared by the first Paladin against a demon invasion.{nl}There are several of those devices so that Emerald Bluffs is completely covered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000755
text: If any Watchers are struggling with the barriers, I'd like you to help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000756
text: I heard that the plan failed. {nl}I guess we have to do something before Gesti recovers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000757
text: Watcher Erra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000758
text: What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000759
text: I need the sap of Nepenthes, but it's not awake.{nl}I have no way to collect the sap if it doesn't wake up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000760
text: That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000761
text: Follower Rikke

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000762
text: The elders gave me many charms that will help me fend off the demons.{nl}I hope they help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000763
text: Those elders don't have any sense of reality.{nl}We should have gone to the church instead of those Paladins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000764
text: Good, good.{nl}Let's see if it can resist waking up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000765
text: Let's wake up the Nepenthes at Piene Field by burning it with this fat.{nl}The fluids will be of no use if they spoil, so we need to extract them while it's alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000766
text: Only a person like me can handle that monster.{nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000767
text: They protected their regions, but I guess they came down because of those demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000768
text: They're not listening?{nl}Could the Panto Totems in Valyma Sanctum be causing problems?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000769
text: I will give you a stronger charm, so use it after destroying the Panto Totem.{nl}Just like you did last time. You got it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000770
text: Ah, and if a brainwashed Panto injure an attacking Panto, that Panto will be on our side as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000771
text: As I thought, I still have some materials left. {nl}Thank you though.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000772
text: Follower Alfonsas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000773
text: Amazing.{nl}With this, my brothers at the church can fight without any worries.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000774
text: The Demon Summoning Circles are the biggest problem here.{nl}If we scribble on the circles, do you think the summoning formulas will become tangled?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000775
text: At the very least, the demons should stop crossing through after those circles are removed.{nl}Though I do hope for a better result.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000776
text: They're getting swallowed up into them.{nl}Very effective indeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000777
text: Follower Vaidas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000778
text: It is reassuring to hear that Brother Tomas will be in charge of the altar.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000779
text: Brother Vaidutis is waiting on the 1st floor. {nl}Gesti's barrier is blocking the way, but don't worry. It can simply be taken down by{nl}the power of the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000780
text: Follower Vaidas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000781
text: I regret that I didn't bring enough Holy Stones.{nl}I should have put them in all my pockets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000782
text: The altars in the church are made to stop demons. {nl}Of course, only we, the Paladins, know how to use them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000783
text: Is Brother Vaidutis alright?{nl}I would have been in serious trouble if not for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000784
text: Follower Tomas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000785
text: The Yognomes are trying to eat the altar.{nl}I want you to defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000786
text: If I had any Holy Stones, I would stick them in the Yognomes' mouths.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000787
text: Follower Tiberius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000788
text: I am making a Holy Bomb to attack demons with.{nl}I can complete it if I obtain Purified Essence. Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000789
text: Bombs in the church doesn't sound good, but..{nl}I think the goddess will forgive me this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000790
text: I want to test it out on Glizardon.{nl}I'll give you the Holy Bomb. Can you put it onto a Glizardon's back?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000791
text: If you think it'll be dangerous, I will also give you Romuva Holy Water.{nl}When you drink this water, you will be invisible to the demons for a short time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000792
text: Run away after setting the bomb on the back of Glizardon.{nl}Look at its size. It will not be fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000793
text: I only have one empty Holy Stone.{nl}Can you help me to fill this stone, please?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000794
text: We can sustain for a while if these stones can be filled without our brothers' help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000795
text: It is a strategy to attack the boss first when there are multiple enemies.{nl}This time, it will be Glizardon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000796
text: I would never have thought that you would defeat them this quickly.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000797
text: Follower Donatas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000798
text: Thank you. {nl}This is sufficient to make a transformation scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000799
text: You can transform into a demon by using this scroll. {nl}Persuade the demons to go to the altar on their own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000800
text: I get caught every time, maybe the demons know my scent. {nl}I'm sure it'll be easier for you since you haven't been around for long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000801
text: Alright. {nl}I think that should be enough for you to grasp their nature.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000802
text: The power of the altar makes conversion simple. {nl}First, you activate the power of Globejas Altar. {nl}Then, stay within the influence of the altar and fight the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000803
text: The demons have stronger minds than you might think. {nl}It will take a lot of effort to make them forget about Gesti.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000804
text: Don't trust the water's effects too much, or Glizardon may find out about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000805
text: I am thinking about an effective way to defeat the demons.{nl}You came just at the right time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000806
text: When you place the Holy Stone, it will absorb the lives of the nearby demons automatically.{nl}Defeat the demons that have already had their life absorbed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000807
text: You can obtain Vicious Essences from the demons.{nl}You can purify these essences at the Altar of Purification, which is down from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000808
text: Oh, they will find out if you are not confident enough. {nl}So it's better to fight the demons to gain some self confidence before using the scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000809
text: Epigraphist Raymond

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000810
text: This isn't the only monument.{nl}There's a fine monument at Irody Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000811
text: I wonder who mourned that traitor? Don't you think there would be a different reason?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000812
text: Surprisingly, this looks fine.{nl}We should get ready to restore it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000813
text: His monument is cased with a terrible magic because he was a traitor.{nl}We should use that magic instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000814
text: If we received support, then we would have hired mercenaries.{nl}Studying about the traitor doesn't mean that we praise the traitor, so I don't understand why{nl}we lost support.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000815
text: Thanks.{nl}Achat must have been drawn to the magic power cast upon the monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000816
text: It's kind of curious that something that looks like a tree stump would be interested in {nl}stone plates.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000817
text: I am sorry, but we can't find the one that we needed among the fragments you brought.{nl}I hope it has not already been eaten.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000818
text: If we burn the Tree Ambulo, do you think we can find the stone pieces that they swallowed?{nl}I stacked four piles of firewood over there, light them up and push the Tree Ambulo in {nl}when the wood is burning.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000819
text: Be careful though.{nl}It will be dangerous if a flaming Tree Ambulo runs into the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000820
text: Treasure Hunter Eden

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000821
text: I am a treasure hunter, not a monster hunter.{nl}I don't want this place to become my grave, having fought monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000822
text: I've collected all the fragments Raymond requested. {nl}Bring them back to Raymond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000823
text: Eden told you to give this to me?{nl}Hmm. It will take some time to restore it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000824
text: Can you take these restored tombstone fragments to my assistant at Irody Square?{nl}I think something good will happen when we finish restoring it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000825
text: Epigraphist Schmid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000826
text: This... Our master did it!{nl}Give it to me, please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000827
text: Not yet. A little more.{nl}I think I just need to do a little bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000828
text: Necromancer Drasius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000829
text: Please put the sacrifices in the jar at Dumbliu Pond.{nl}The summoned spirit will come to me if you succeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000830
text: It depends on how one uses necromancy.{nl}It could be good or bad depending on what Necromancer has in his mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000831
text: The experiment failed? I am so sorry.{nl}I should research more here to find out what went wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000832
text: Monument of Lydia Schaffen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000833
text: My name is Lydia Schaffen.{nl}For the reasons that I have endured this deep burden of sadness, I am now going to tell the truth {nl}about Ruklys on this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000834
text: There is no more charcoal besides what you have, so don't use it too freely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000835
text: I didn't know she studied with Ruklys, the traitor.{nl}Shoot. I've almost used up all the charcoal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000836
text: Eventually, Ruklys failed.{nl}He was destroyed by those who were jealous of him.{nl}He left to the goddess by my hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000837
text: What was Lydia Schaffen's relationship with Ruklys?{nl}I am not astute enough to understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000838
text: I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000839
text: The stage that Ruklys had reached was astonishing.{nl}But, his noble mission was too difficult to be accomplished on this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000840
text: Since I am on a long journey, my luggage is not heavy.{nl}It's better to buy anything from local shops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000841
text: Any archer would want to have good arrowheads.{nl}I will show you how to find good arrowheads, so how about you help me some?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000842
text: They aren't very quick, so this shouldn't be hard for you to do.{nl}I'm sure of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000843
text: Thanks. These are still hot to the touch.{nl}Aren't they nice?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000844
text: Wandering Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000845
text: Our platoon received orders to take care of a Unicorn.{nl}The details should be in the Operation Orders...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000846
text: Operation Order

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000847
text: How to lure a Unicorn.{nl}1. Collect Zolem Stones from Zolems{nl}2. Set the stones around Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000848
text: Guard Leaper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000849
text: This operation had failed several years ago.{nl}Where did you get this anyway?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000850
text: I understand. Please take the Unicorn's Horn to that girl over there.{nl}Her brother went missing after that tragedy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000851
text: Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000852
text: I told him not to go...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000853
text: It was really terrible.{nl}I was lucky since I almost was dispatched.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000854
text: If you have trouble pulling it over to the burning wood, just kick it in hard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000855
text: I need the flame of Infroburk at the Shiluma Altar Site.{nl}Get close to the back of that monster and heat these arrowheads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000856
text: I was trying to get something for myself while I had this signed contract with Raymond.{nl}But, now I have nothing besides stone fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000857
text: It'll be clear to you what's on Ruklys' memorial after you've restored it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000858
text: Great. {nl}Please leave activating the altar to me and go meet Vaidas at Himnas Chapel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000859
text: Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the {nl}extra energy to endure longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000860
text: Good. This will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000861
text: It feels so good to see them flying.{nl}But, they are too noisy so I need to study more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000862
text: I have never seen a stone filled with this much holiness.{nl}Thank you very much for giving it so much effort.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000863
text: The demons' attacks are stronger than we expected.{nl}If we are able to defeat Glizardon, then it will be easier to defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000864
text: Follower Vaidutis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000865
text: I came to say that Gesti went up to the 2nd floor, and I let my guard down. {nl}I would have been in big trouble if not for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000866
text: I studied the barrier at the gate, but the power of the basement altar is insufficient. {nl}Could you supply me with Power Crystals from the Corylus?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000867
text: Maybe the goddess knew it'd fail and that's why she said to wait for the Revelator. {nl}At least we hurt Gesti some, so that's good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000868
text: Well done. {nl} Making the Light Crystal with this will be enough power to break the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000869
text: Prepare yourself before bringing the Light Crystal to the gate. {nl}It can attract powerful monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000870
text: I think I'll stay here to stop the demons from entering the basement.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000871
text: It is an honor to fight with you, Revelator. {nl} Could you drive the demons from this area while Follower Algis investigates?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000872
text: If you don't mind, can you get Eyes of Madness from Rodelins?{nl}They are handy when you want to hide yourself from demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000873
text: I don't want those filthy things to be near me either.{nl}But, it's worse to face against those demons alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000874
text: Thanks.{nl}I will share them with the other brothers before the demons find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000875
text: You are indeed the Revelator.{nl}Now, we can concentrate on protecting the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000876
text: Don't worry, the barrier at the main entrance to the 1st floor can be offset by the church's {nl}power. That's what the altars are for. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000877
text: Let's take care of the Unknocker first. {nl}I'll lure the Unknocker, giving you a chance to attack it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000878
text: I want to request to you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they give us headaches.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000879
text: Be careful, I almost got attacked as well.{nl}They are really violent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000880
text: Good job. {nl}Their babbling laughter seems to have stopped.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000881
text: I am thinking of creating confusion by charading as a demon.{nl}Could you gather some cloth from Pawndel and Pawnd after defeating them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000882
text: It's a bit blasphemous, but we don't have much choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000883
text: Well done. {nl}It will probably be difficult for them to trust each other from now on. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000884
text: I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl}The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000885
text: But before that, it's important for us to understand the demons. {nl}Collect some demon souls for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000886
text: I remember the first time I converted the demons. {nl}I pray for their poor souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000887
text: Good job. {nl}If there are any good demons left, the goddess will look after them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000888
text: The Central Altar that suppresses the power of the demons suddenly stopped. {nl}Could you take a look at what's going on?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000889
text: Strange, it was definitely working.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000890
text: It was an ambush. {nl}We would have been in big trouble without your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000891
text: You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000892
text: Many structures in the Tenet Church are placed to ward against the demons. {nl}Each one in itself is a small barrier that contributes to a huge barrier. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000893
text: The most powerful barrier is on the 2nd floor. {nl}I heard that it can exert the greatest force when the Divine Utensil is there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000894
text: Gesti has made the first move. {nl}It will be difficult to approach her secretly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000895
text: We must change our plan. {nl}First, we'll need to go observe Gesti's actions. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000896
text: Let's start by retaking the Bell Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000897
text: From here, we can see what Gesti is up to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000898
text: Alright, bring back the Seal of Space from the Sventove Central Altar. {nl}Can you do this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000899
text: You must realize that the revelation is hidden in the sanctuary. {nl}The Seal of Space is the single key that will get you to the sanctuary. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000900
text: Not only can the Seal of Space get you to the sanctuary within the Tenet Church, {nl}it'll allow you to enter any location where the goddess have hid before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000901
text: The Seal of Space can only be used by the Revelator, so she won't be able to find the revelation {nl}right away. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000902
text: But the enemy is the Demon Queen herself. Even the Paladin Master couldn't defeat her.{nl}We have to use the powers of the destroyed altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000903
text: We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000904
text: When you are done, I will be able to restrict Gesti through the power of the Divine Sphere and {nl}the church. It may be for a short while but that's the best option we have.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000905
text: So you activated the Malda Altar? {nl}Now it will be safe to stay here for the time being. Good work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000906
text: Demons are going around the second floor searching every corner. {nl}Activating the Auka Altar will divert their attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000907
text: I'm relieved you're beside me. {nl}I think it was a good thing that Laima chose you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000908
text: Thank you for your hardwork. {nl}When this is over, I plan to gather all brothers and drive them away at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000909
text: I'll ring a bell to let you know when Gesti gets close to you, so please listen for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000910
text: So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Use the crest on the pillar beside me to go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared for the Revelator only.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000911
text: May the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000912
text: So Gesti just ran away. {nl}Fine. Since you got the revelation, we've completed the mission. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000913
text: So you are in search of Goddess Saule...{nl}The Iridescent Valley spoken of in the revelation {nl}should begin at Grassy Brookside located north of here.{nl}I bid thee farewell. I shall pray for the goddesses' blessings to be upon your path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000914
text: When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000915
text: Seems like Gesti has not noticed yet. {nl}We better prepare the Divine Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000916
text: All preparations have been made. {nl} The barriers of the church will soon weaken Gesti. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000917
text: Gesti will be enough for you to handle once she's weakened. {nl}When Gesti is cornered, I will make the final strike with the Divine Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000918
text: These are pieces of the barrier at Mazas Rest Place. {nl}Do not worry. There are ways to recover the barrier, so I'm sure it will be alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000919
text: I didn't know the demons would use summoning circles to come through. {nl} I suggest removing them all before they siege us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000920
text: Even with this many demons, you still managed to make it through. {nl}You may be the Revelator, but that's still impressive. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000921
text: It's the revelation. {nl}Cherish it and do not show it to anyone else. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000922
text: Come on. Go to the Paladin Master. {nl}He will tell you the way you must go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000923
text: I asked my precious friend Algis to go to the Tenet Church. {nl}I won't lose to Gesti, but it is important to have some back up plan just in case.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000924
text: This Divine Sphere was the weapon used against Gesti at Emerald Bluff.{nl}It has been passed down since the first Paladin.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000925
text: In the kingdom, there are several valuable weapons aside from this Divine Sphere. {nl}Those weapons saved many lives on Medzio Diena four years ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000926
text: Starting from now, I will focus on the Divine Sphere.{nl}In the meantime, please use your skills so that nothing can disturb me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000927
text: Sorry. My abilities weren't good enough. {nl}Gesti has now realized that the Holy Relic is not the revelation, and is probably heading {nl}straight to the church. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000928
text: But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000929
text: Go. The Tenet Church is at the Fallen Tree Garden.{nl}Stop Gesti from gaining the revelation at all costs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000930
text: It is too much for me to handle alone without any help from the other brothers. {nl}I'd better use the Malda Altar. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000931
text: Nearby demons will be branded when the Malda Altar is activated.{nl}Defeat the demons once they are branded.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000932
text: We still have a lot to do here.{nl}The goddess told us to never give up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000933
text: The world still needs more experience. {nl}We probably wouldn't have made it this far without the help of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000934
text: Activating the Tree Guard Post Barrier is taking longer than I thought. {nl}We have no time, let's charge it with demon souls instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000935
text: All souls are pure. So even if it's a demon's soul, it can still provide some divine power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000936
text: So the Tree Guard Post Barrier has been charged with demon souls, huh. {nl}It still needs some final touches for completion, but I'll take care of it from here. {nl}Great job.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000937
text: It's amazing you can use the barrier like that. {nl}Even the Paladins did not know about that. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000938
text: I am exhausted. I'd like to rest a little.{nl}Would you take care of the demons nearby to give me some time to recover?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000939
text: Holding off against this many enemies is by itself a great feat. {nl}It's all thanks to the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000940
text: Even though he's still young, Kenneth is amazing. {nl}I think we can trust him a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000941
text: I have received an urgent message from the Watchers.{nl}A gigantic demon monster is coming this way.{nl}Quickly, follow me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000942
text: Biteregina, which used to live in the deep forest, has appeared here.{nl}It even built a hive at the upper side of Rojus Plateau. Since it's dangerous, can you defeat it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000943
text: Thank you so much!{nl}How did it come from such a far forest?{nl}Strange, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000944
text: I can't do anything since the Seedmias are attacking us from every direction.{nl}Can you defeat them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000945
text: I really hope those Seedmias don't hit me on the head with those flower buds. {nl}They look horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000946
text: I received a mysterious charm from the elders that will brainwash Pantos to stand on our side.{nl}Are you up for a challenge?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000947
text: According to the elders, we are done with those Pantos.{nl}We can't continue the relationship anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000948
text: This barrier is impossible to open from the outside. {nl}Fortunately, the entrance to the basement looks secure. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000949
text: However, it's too dangerous to enter the basement with the Divine Sphere. {nl}I'll wait here so you go to the 1st floor through the basement and open the barrier. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000950
text: You have done what no other could easily do.{nl}The goddess must be proud of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000951
text: I would like to say that my faith is like a first-class blade that can cut through these demons, {nl}but in reality it isn't that simple. I hope you'll help us some.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000952
text: They must be defeated on sight.{nl}How are we supposed to protect the church otherwise?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000953
text: Defeat the demons around the Tree Guard Post Barrier. {nl}The souls of those demons should be able to fill its divine powers a little. I'm counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000954
text: Very good. Flowers in the fields should act like flowers in the fields.{nl}Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000955
text: We are the people following the Paladin Master.{nl}We will defeat the people who disobey the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000956
text: Everyone has their reasons for following him.{nl}Some of them received benefits from him and some of them were already Paladins like Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000957
text: Maybe the goddess knew it would happen and that's why she waited for the savior.{nl}I feel like I put a big burden on your shoulders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000958
text: Hasten your pursuit of Gesti.{nl}Tenet Church is in the Fallen Tree Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000959
text: This is the plan that has been passed on for hundreds of years since the first Paladin.{nl}We shall not fail this plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000960
text: Please fit the pieces together at Ruklys' memorial in front of me while I prepare the rubbings.{nl}With you working with us, this should be easy. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000961
text: I will follow you soon. Just a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000962
text: After we finish the rubbings, we can say farewell to this place.{nl}Can you help me a bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000963
text: The capital may already be in ruins, but I will protect Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000964
text: To place all your might towards a devastating strike against any enemy who threaten{nl}the kingdom. That is how Highlanders fight in battle. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000965
text: Good work. {nl}Honestly, I had my doubts, but the results seem to be fine. {nl}You just need to tell it like that to Kayetonas in Flower hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000966
text: It looks like even the Auka Altar lost its powers. {nl}There were stories about its powers wiping out dozens of demons in the past.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000967
text: It's hard to watch the Egnomes running around the Atgaila Chapel.{nl}Please clean up the Egnomes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000968
text: Many of the Paladin's treasures are also here. Do not let them fall into the hands of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000969
text: After using the charm on the Pantos, hit them several times.{nl}Try that on the Pantos in Levanda Habitat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000970
text: Isn't this city amazing? I want to stay here if I can.{nl}But, I prefer going to other places with my horse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000971
text: The space movement magic circle will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000972
text: I hope the monsters haven't broken the magic circle yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000973
text: Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000974
text: When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters won't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for demons' power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000975
text: I hope that crazy magician, Antares, won't disturb us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000976
text: He set a trap so well.{nl}I didn't like him even he was conscious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000977
text: We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000978
text: He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000979
text: Oh my goodness, why now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000980
text: The reason why he was imprisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000981
text: Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000982
text: There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000983
text: Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000984
text: Antares has done research on the flow of the demons' power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000985
text: The research materials should be here somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000986
text: This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000987
text: Let's go find the last valve at the central control room.{nl}When we destroy this, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000988
text: Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the Barrier Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000989
text: A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000990
text: Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000991
text: Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magic in case something happens.{nl}There was magic written in Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000992
text: I think I could manage to do something if I had Fallenlem cores.{nl}I haven't lost my knowledge of magic, I am merely unable to use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000993
text: Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000994
text: Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000995
text: The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have gone wrong when Antares exploded a while ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000996
text: Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000997
text: What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000998
text: Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. It seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_000999
text: And me.. I feel dizzy..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001000
text: If we stay like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001001
text: By the way, how do I know about the stabilizing device?{nl}I've never been to the 4th floor..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001002
text: Okay.. My memories keep coming back..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001003
text: Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001004
text: The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to fully stabilize it, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001005
text: It's almost done. Yes..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001006
text: You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to fully stabilize it so let's go to the Laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001007
text: I hope the device is still okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001008
text: Good! We can activate the device now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001009
text: You are the Revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001010
text: Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001011
text: There is a way to prevent it, but only you can do it.{nl}I beg of you to come to Karsta Hall Site at Crystal Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001012
text: This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all my power somehow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001013
text: I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001014
text: All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001015
text: Gabija did not hide herself.{nl}She just coudnl't come forward because she had to protect the tower from demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001016
text: I heard Agailla Flurry went because she coun't find a successor. {nl}I heard it was for something important.. But I don't know what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001017
text: Medzio Diena could strike again, whether at your kingdom or my hometown. {nl}The one responsible for such a plague would be someone worthy of my sword.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001018
text: Owyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001019
text: Reinforcement? We could really use your strength!{nl}Please defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001020
text: All the other magicians have either died or ran away.{nl}Goddess Gabija is the only one protecting the tower right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001021
text: The demons have attacked before, but this battle is taking longer than usual.{nl}I read about Helgasercle from a book. Maybe she has appeared again..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001022
text: As a follower of the great Flurry, I can't back away just yet!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001023
text: Oh, You're definitely the Revelator.{nl}You were on a roll!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001024
text: Can we have another go, with the same momentum?{nl}I will take care of the other monsters, you go focus on those troublesome Drakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001025
text: Those monsters are not as strong when we fight together!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001026
text: Now I feel safe.{nl}I will be okay by myself from here. Thanks!{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001027
text: Cordelier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001028
text: Black Coal Powder.. With that, we can unleash the seal that is written on this recipe.{nl}But I can't just find it. I am sorry, but could you bring me that powder?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001029
text: Isn't it better to just scratch the powder from the monsters nearby?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001030
text: Thanks!{nl}Now, I better get ready to unleash the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001031
text: Oh no... I forgot I need the Eternal Ember.{nl}I should have also requested this of you before.. Can you please get that for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001032
text: I should have requested this of you all at once.{nl}I'm sorry, I make mistakes all the time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001033
text: Could it be Ginklas? I hope it's just a bookshelf falling down in the reading room.{nl}Could you check the bookshelf, please?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001034
text: I've never seen a monster who could cause this much vibration.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001035
text: It was indeed Ginklas. You are so amazing!{nl}Because of you, I had enough time to prepare my magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001036
text: Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001037
text: I am much more than you could ever imagine.{nl}I wish to be released from these restraints. Please defeat the nearby monitors.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001038
text: Defeat the monitors.{nl}There's an Eye of Surveillance on Blindlems and Beleggs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001039
text: I shall be released soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001040
text: I can't tell you my name. {nl}Please defeat the monitors and release the seal on me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001041
text: Amazing. You possess great power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001042
text: My soul is ripped apart and locked within Soul Stones.{nl}Help me free by defeating the Slime Watcher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001043
text: Another me from somewhere else led you to this place. {nl}Now, I can be released.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001044
text: But, if I get released like this, I will be split into pieces.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001045
text: The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Ark.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001046
text: The Holy Ark that I was sealed within is broken, and the observers have taken those pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001047
text: Now, I can be released.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001048
text: As long as there are Eyes of Surveillance, I can't be released from my restraints.{nl}Please defeat the monitors and release me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001049
text: I am tied to a contract.{nl}I seem to be free, but am not really free.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001050
text: I was sealed when my sprit was ripped off by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat Infroroktors for me. I promise I will not be a burden to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001051
text: Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001052
text: This is way better without the monitors.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001053
text: Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Fallenlem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001054
text: His creations should have voices to ask with, and ears to listen. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001055
text: The pieces from my other self are able to call you now.{nl}Now, I can be released.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001056
text: My body is restrained. The Armas are mocking me.{nl}Please teach them some manners.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001057
text: You should give them a lesson so that they'll behave properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001058
text: You dealt with them well. {nl}I shall entrust you with the task of releasing this seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001059
text: Please unleash this seal on me.{nl}When you gather the essences of restraints from the observers, this seal will break.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001060
text: You will know when the time comes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001061
text: Suspicious Table

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001062
text: There's a Golem near here.{nl}I am too scared to go out. Please help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001063
text: This won't come out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001064
text: Thanks.{nl}I will stay here until it becomes safe, and then run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001065
text: Furry Odd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001066
text: Pleased to meet you. {nl}I am Furry Odd. I am a magician specialized in object variation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001067
text: I see the Revelator is here to help the goddess.{nl}While you do so, can you help me collect Variation Mediators from the monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001068
text: The magicians that ran away?{nl}What can we do.. For them, their lives are more important than the Goddess Gabija.{nl}I don't think they are cowards. They are just hopeless.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001069
text: Thanks. You are so reliable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001070
text: We have enough Mediators now so we can go defeat the remaining monsters.{nl}Do you want to come along?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001071
text: You are so great.{nl}I hope our magicians can be just as good as you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001072
text: There's a problem.{nl}I think I saw a Yonazolem inside the Machinery Room... I can't handle it by myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001073
text: I will take care of other monsters. Could you take care of Yonazolem, please?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001074
text: I am not strong enough to face Yonazolem.{nl}It's fortunate that you are here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001075
text: Thank you so much for helping me. It's so good that you are here.{nl}May the goddess bless you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001076
text: I can't stand it anymore. Please save me from the restraints.{nl}I will be released when you defeat the observers nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001077
text: The time to retrieve my body and spirit is near.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001078
text: I can't stand it anymore.{nl}Please destroy the monitors that imprison me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001079
text: So I guess I can be released now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001080
text: I promise. That there will be something in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001081
text: Simon Shaw

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001082
text: We have to stop Bearkaras, but there are so many monsters.{nl}Can you help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001083
text: Now it's time to get revenge!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001084
text: You are so great. {nl}Now we will be able to face against it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001085
text: I will go to the Small Hall to chase after Bearkaras, so please take care of the surrounding monsters.{nl}I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001086
text: There's no way I can defeat Bearkaras myself...{nl}Sorry you have to see me like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001087
text: Bearkaras is still near here.{nl}You are our last hope. We are counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001088
text: It was a good decision to trust you.{nl}I am more motivated because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001089
text: The contract needs to continues. Please release me.{nl}As those observers fall down, my spirit becomes free.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001090
text: It is too soon to tell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001091
text: It wasn't a long time ago, but it was frightening for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001092
text: Now only the last piece is left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001093
text: The last spirit is in the monitor Stone Whale.{nl}My spirit will be free when he gets defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001094
text: My body was ripped apart, humiliated... I can't forgive that..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001095
text: Quickly... We should continue the contract.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001096
text: I am Demon Lord Hauberk.{nl}I have become a pillar residing in the seal of this tower{nl}after having my soul ripped apart by Helgasercle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001097
text: I will leave now to find my remaining pieces.{nl}We will meet again someday in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001098
text: I'm glad to hear that you will help.{nl}I want you to get back the Flame Charm I set inside Black Drakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001099
text: Don't ever think of blocking its axe head-on.{nl}You will be crushed into a pulp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001100
text: You should go to the Great Cathedral to follow the revelation,{nl}But, unfortunately, you are not skillful enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001101
text: Train more at the entrace of Katin Forest. {nl}Believe that you will get your victory at the end.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001102
text: Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001103
text: Look at this busted cable car. The damage is pretty serious. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001104
text: It's obviously the work of the Grummer and Zignuts from the Cholras Winding Road. {nl}Give them a taste of your skills while I fix this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001105
text: This would not have happened if the elders had listened to what the young men said. {nl}But what's done is already done. What can we do about it now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001106
text: Good work. These are the parts the Pantos stole. {nl}I never imagined I'd be seeing them again like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001107
text: Watcher Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001108
text: The Pantos were not always such violent monsters. {nl}There must be a way to change them back. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001109
text: I want you to give the Baby Pantos at Nuosalus Trail some Plateau Sugar Beets.{nl}Perhaps then they will remember something and come to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001110
text: I really feel sorry for them. {nl}No matter how troubled the world is, they weren't like that before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001111
text: Alright. Thank you very much! {nl}Do you see that damaged cable car over there? I used to ride that when I was a kid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001112
text: Thank you! You've saved me and my friends from spending more than half of our lives {nl}just protecting the cable car. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001113
text: As I'm the only one who can fix the cable car, I'll take a look. {nl}Oh, of course, thanks for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001114
text: Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure roads. {nl}They would be a good source of magic for the shaman dolls. {nl} {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001115
text: It's fun. {nl}Some straws, seeds, and a bit of rope and those kinds of things can go around as if they are alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001116
text: Watcher Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001117
text: It's been a bit frightening ever since Simorph appeared around here.{nl}Witnessing the Pantos becoming this corrupted is no different.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001118
text: Won't you help me purify Labure road? {nl}The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001119
text: The corruption is extensive, but I think Labure Road has it worst. {nl}Maybe it's spreading through the roots?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001120
text: Look at these gentle Pantos. It's insane that we have to make the Pantos our enemies {nl}when the demons are charging in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001121
text: We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl}It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl}Bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001122
text: If you can persuade Capria, the Pantos should be tamed. Capria is the leader of the Pantos. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001123
text: Let's follow the Baby Pantos. They will surely lead the way to Capria.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001124
text: I wish Capria will understand us. {nl}We must do whatever it takes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001125
text: It got angry as soon as it saw the Baby Pantos? {nl}So the plan really did not work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001126
text: I worked very hard to fix the cable car, but I'm still worried about the Poata. {nl}A monster of that size could destroy the cable car.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001127
text: Our guards love to fight.{nl}Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the demons waiting to march in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001128
text: The Poata also destroyed the cable car at Nepavy Grassland. {nl}But it's not like we can guard it all the time. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001129
text: Even if we stay on guard, a fight with the Poata? {nl}That's not easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001130
text: You require a cable car in order to cross over to Leaf Veil Plateau from Silverstream Gorge.{nl}It is said that they used to go across by riding a basket fastened to rope.{nl}If you ask me, a cable car is bad enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001131
text: We're here to protect the Holy Land from the demons.{nl}It must be worse than expected if the Paladin Master is at Leaf Veil Plateau.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001132
text: I keep worrying about my brother at Emerald Bluff. {nl}I hope that he's alright.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001133
text: This place has a very sacred meaning to us. {nl}And we have a calling as Watchers, to protect this place. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001134
text: It has been protected for generations, since the day when we promised the first Paladin that {nl}we would protect it. And now that the demons have invaded, it is time to keep that promise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001135
