text: The Pantos changed and became wild after Medzio Diena, four years ago. {nl}Before that, we didn't really mind each other and even joked around together. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001136
text: I really wonder what has become of this sacred land?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001137
text: The Caprias were the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl}And then the Pantos.. now only the babies are left.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001138
text: Our family has been protecting this sacred land for a long time.{nl}Please cooperate with us to keep the reverent atmosphere here.{nl}- Watcher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001139
text: Thank you for helping out. {nl}You've reduced my workload quite a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001140
text: I'll have to make do with the dolls I have left.{nl}I can't complain when everyone else is risking their lives at Emerald Bluff, now can I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001141
text: We used to be on good terms with the Pantos. {nl}These days, we're constantly at each other's throats.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001142
text: I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}The dolls for spells. Isn't it exciting?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001143
text: Thank you. {nl}We might be able to go get more when more young men arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001144
text: I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil forces. {nl}I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001145
text: We can't do anything until Basil restores the shaman doll perfectly. {nl}Unless for special situations like this, we can use, um, nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001146
text: It would have been a disaster if the Wild Carnivore had legs.{nl}I'm glad it was killed beforehand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001147
text: I heard we promised the first Paladin three things in return for saving our family. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001148
text: To help build the Tenet Church, {nl}to appoint the Watchers to safeguard the sacred land covering the Holy Relic, {nl}and lastly, to protect each other together when the great danger arises that was foretold. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001149
text: I do not know what curse it was. {nl}There's got to be a record within the Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001150
text: Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001151
text: You don't need to be a Bokor to use it. {nl}It moves by itself to attack, or something like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001152
text: The demons could have used their hands to make it easier to fight. {nl}Maybe they are after the Holy Relic. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001153
text: Since the Holy Relic was hidden deep underground, {nl}who could have known that plants would be the reason for the world's overturn?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001154
text: You may use a bit of force if words aren't enough. {nl}We can't grow any further from each other anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001155
text: You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001156
text: If possible, defeat the Carnivore too. {nl}It was contaminated by evil energy and I can't stand watching it anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001157
text: Soil the Poata's nest at Margas Hill, and it will show up. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001158
text: Liaison Official Colin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001159
text: Rexipher? {nl}I've never heard this name before. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001160
text: It's been a while since they've withdrawn from Dense Mist Plateau because it is not worth researching.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001161
text: Royal Mausoleum Desk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001162
text: One does not simply try to obtain the secrets and precious wisdom of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}When the time comes and you are ready, you will be able to attain them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001163
text: Bring me the Bloodstone.{nl}It's not too late yet. You can still make it in time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001164
text: Make sure that you come back within the time frame.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001165
text: Don't yield your resolution to confront opportunity with preparation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001166
text: Since you told me about my brother's death, I'd like reward you.{nl}It's something I saved for when my brother and I could journey again, but I don't need it anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001167
text: Isn't that Drake Horn?{nl}You're going to sell all of them?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001168
text: No. It's too precious to be used that way. {nl}With this much amount, we could even make Drake's Epaulet.{nl}I will give you the recipe. Are you interested in making it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001169
text: With this key, we can open the treasure chest.{nl}But, you will need to look for the chest yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001170
text: Crafting is only possible during rest mode. {nl}You know this already right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001171
text: If it weren't for you, I would have continued believing that my brother was alive and {nl}well somewhere. You can't say you are not responsible for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001172
text: Well made.{nl}You will definitely need it sometime in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001173
text: For now, I will hold on to it.{nl}When you need it, don't forget to come and take it from me. I will give it to you when {nl}the time comes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001174
text: You sure know a lot of people. {nl}Every class master at Klaipeda and Fedimian knows your name.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001175
text: Do you want to bet on this? {nl}Answer every questions laid out at the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001176
text: The magicians on the 1st to 4th floors of the Mage Tower each offer a quiz that you can take.{nl}I will give you a small present if you can solve them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001177
text: Wow, you came up here! You are incredible.{nl}Well that's it for questions, should we do something else?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001178
text: It's nothing special. {nl}If you can completely collect the scattered pages of the book at the Laboratory on the 3rd floor, {nl}I will approve that as you answered the question.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001179
text: That book is very important to me so I can't just leave this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001180
text: Yes. That's correct! This is it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001181
text: The Thaumaturge Master told me to give it to you.{nl}If you hadn't done it, I would have kept it for myself.. Such a pity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001182
text: I heard your story before.{nl}You did a tremendous job at the Mage Tower right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001183
text: That's why I have a favor to ask you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001184
text: There is this pumpkin with lizard inside it. {nl}I heard it's somewhere... I am sure you will find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001185
text: Thank you. This is an wondrous jewel.{nl}It is rare that a Sadhu is interested in contemporary objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001186
text: That proves that it is an important object.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001187
text: Unknown being

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001188
text: So somebody has dared to confront me.{nl}Tell me the secret number. I can't say anything unless you tell me the number.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001189
text: You're a brave guy. {nl}There are five clues in 1st Mine Lot . {nl}No need to hurry. It will take a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001190
text: You found them. {nl} Then I'll start from now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001191
text: I'll give you a riddle. {nl} It is something you must do, have done most, and will have to do. {nl} Show your answer in action.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001192
text: Good work. {nl} You will be rewarded with proper compensation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001193
text: What do you think are the factors that affect outcomes?{nl}If you just focus on attacking, then you may receive more damages.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001194
text: If you ask me what the strongest weapon is, my answer would be my faith. Faith to an ally that {nl}you can truly rely on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001195
text: A Thaumaturge does not get stronger just by learning.{nl}You should experience it yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001196
text: Understanding of the origin of all things becomes the power of the Elementalists.{nl}Wind, water, fire, earth. The strongest power is drawn from the simplest of forms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001197
text: Stealth, detection, trap installation. {nl}Scouts are masters of search and observation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001198
text: We Sadhus are always on an eternal journey. {nl}When our journeys in this world come to an end, we continue it, in the afterlife.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001199
text: Nothing is unfair in real battles.{nl}You've gotta do anything to win. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001200
text: We should find it quickly...{nl}It may be an end to the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001201
text: I don't mind people learning my skills if I receive reasonable rewards.{nl}In truth, I will welcome them.{nl}Although, I won't chase after them to teach them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001202
text: But, yeah. {nl}Asking me to teach in the military is just too much ..{nl}Could it be another problem?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001203
text: Welcome! What do you need?{nl}The stuffs I have are not like old days, but I tried my best to prepare them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001204
text: Old Man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001205
text: You must have seen many artifacts since coming to this city.{nl}Yet in our long history, heroes are but a fraction of the dusts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001206
text: Especially Ruklys, one of Maven's disciple... I pity him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001207
text: There's an interesting story behind that gigantic Goddess statue.{nl}It's in a book called the

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001208
text: Silver of Fedimian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001209
text: , you should read it if you get the chance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001210
text: The spear in itself is a weapon of pure destruction.{nl}It is the best weapon anyone can easily learn and master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001211
text: Golem, that's awesome. {nl} And you remember what I taught you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001212
text: As I thought, Revelators view things differently. {nl}Though you seem to be different from the other Revelators...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001213
text: You looked so cool when you defeated the Golem. {nl}Where did you learn to do that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001214
text: I'm grateful for your help. {nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda, so go find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001215
text: I firmly believe that the goddess will return someday. No doubt about it. {nl}We have to believe it. If we do not believe in the goddess then who will?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001216
text: Please hurry and support the Miners' Village. {nl}Someone like you will be of great help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001217
text: I heard the stories. So you defeated the Vubbe Fighter, huh? {nl}That's incredible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001218
text: I was anxiously watching from a distance, but that fight was really awesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001219
text: Frankly, I'm scared. {nl}The Miners' Village, and now the Eastern Woods... Even Klaipeda is becoming dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001220
text: Although I've been very concerned about Miners' Village, {nl}at least you've calmed me down a bit, thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001221
text: Healer Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001222
text: We pray that the blessings of the goddess will always be with the Revelator who saved us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001223
text: I'm helping the refugees. {nl}The monsters attacked the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001224
text: Mine Manager Brinker

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001225
text: Still anxious. {nl}But thanks to you things are better than before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001226
text: I can't believe the Cunningham's story is true... I think it needs more research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001227
text: Everything has a source called Mana. {nl}And everyone can connect to each other's Mana if they want. {nl}As if unearthing a channel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001228
text: Have you ever seen Vubbes using pickaxes? {nl}I wonder what they are trying to find...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001229
text: Thank you very much for saving us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001230
text: If you still want to enter the Closed Area, collect Vubbe Magic Stones from the Vubbes. {nl}And then insert them inside a gap and the Crystal Wall should open.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001231
text: What are you doing here? Hurry and get into the mines. {nl}Weren't we supposed to meet in the 1st floor?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001232
text: No demon will be able to pass here.{nl}I will do my best to protect this place so they can't interrupt the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001233
text: Absolute faith is our greatest shield.{nl}In accordance with the goddess' will, we came to fight using our justice and conviction.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001234
text: Well done.{nl}As the Paladin Master, I salute to your accomplishment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001235
text: Watcher James

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001236
text: We must protect this place from the demons at any cost.{nl}The land here is sacred.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001237
text: I would have fled long time ago if it wasn't for that pledge.{nl}I am still the son of the great Watcher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001238
text: We have to somehow thwart these demons.{nl}I cannot let this danger pass to our brothers in the church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001239
text: We can't go in due to the barrier.{nl}To open the door, we should go through 1st floor of the basement.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001240
text: Will this world be peaceful when we meet again? I hope it will.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001241
text: I never expected those demons to come down this far.{nl}I hope our brothers can persist in their fight against them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001242
text: We have lots of things to protect so we should rather defeat those demons quietly than excitng them.{nl}I feel much more safe with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001243
text: I frankly thought it would be hard to stand still with only Paladins.{nl}I guess I placed too little faith in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001244
text: It will be better to fight them face to face instead of hiding.{nl}It will be even better if the opponents are the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001245
text: So humans can also defeat the demon king.{nl}I can't believe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001246
text: Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001247
text: You fought hard.{nl}May the goddess bless you in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001248
text: Let's pay more attention to the safety of our people here.{nl}Where is Jonas' maid?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001249
text: When I immerse myself in research, there are times when I'm not even aware that monsters {nl}have came. To think back about that moment, it is still frightening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001250
text: You got to start being more careful.{nl}I almost got involved in your carelessness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001251
text: I thought I could remember everything if I tried.{nl}I could be getting Alzheimer's? I can't even remember the face of the guy who I used to work with now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001252
text: There's a guy who I used to work with, but...{nl}I just can't remember his face.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001253
text: We don't have time to waste here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001254
text: Thanks for helping me last time.{nl}I only had my research materials with me. Not sure why the monsters were after them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001255
text: I've done a wrongful thing to Niels.{nl}I remember everything now. I feel embarrassed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001256
text: Security Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001257
text: The artifacts you discover here can't leave this area.{nl}Even if you are the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001258
text: A lot of scholars are doing their research here, so please do not make any loud noises.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001259
text: When suppliers are lacking, merchants like me are more needed.{nl}That's the way of this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001260
text: Why are monsters taking these.{nl}At least, it is fortunate that we still have this much materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001261
text: This is the first time I've been at such a dangerous place like this.{nl}This place is so deserted, I don't even know why there are even monsters here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001262
text: Gorath

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001263
text: Quite a number of people went missing. Where is this guy?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001264
text: Badat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001265
text: I lost the research materials again.{nl}How many time have you lost them so far?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001266
text: Stonemason Pipoti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001267
text: I shouldn't have done that.{nl}This is all because of me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001268
text: I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001269
text: Go and find the Disciples of Gustas at Broken Pillar Canyon with the crystal.{nl}They will teach you what you need to know about the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001270
text: Kevin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001271
text: This is a strange place.{nl}Those scholars, and those mercenaries just can't leave this place.{nl}Of course, us too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001272
text: Sculptor Hilda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001273
text: Look at these pillars.{nl}Aren't they beautiful?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001274
text: The beauty of these poles make us forget the monsters' scariness.{nl}They are really amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001275
text: Not only are they beautiful, but they also have writings on them.{nl}Maybe we should read them sometimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001276
text: The reason why this isolated canyon is beautiful is because it keeps a secret somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001277
text: The first mission of our family has now been achieved.{nl}It begins from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001278
text: Supply Commander Vio

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001279
text: The monsters are quiet today.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001280
text: We are veterans.{nl}Living as a mercenary these last few years, we do not panic even if we are cut off from society,{nl}and haven't heard anything as time flies by.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001281
text: Mercenary Eta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001282
text: I will come back soon so don't worry.{nl}This was an easy thing when I was young.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001283
text: How will the commander scold us this time...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001284
text: Archaeologist Laudi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001285
text: The goddess and the demons... Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum and the secret of the artifacts...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001286
text: Morkus Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001287
text: That guy the Old Man kept talking about, is he going to come at all??

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001288
text: The old man told us.{nl}When you go against your destiny, that also is a part of your destiny.{nl}Maybe the reason why we are trying hard is because that's our destiny.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001289
text: How come no one remembers him.{nl}The man with silver hair... Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001290
text: An unknown event that is being plotted by an unknown person...{nl}This is really scary...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001291
text: It's time for me to push forward with my research, but I can't focus at all.{nl}Moreover, where did my assistant go...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001292
text: Without Airine, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001293
text: Airine saved my life.{nl}Of course, thanks to you as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001294
text: I heard the story but I still can't believe it. {nl}About you defeating the Vubbe Fighter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001295
text: Where is the scholar. I am really worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001296
text: Without Dezic, I would have probably gone crazy among those monsters.{nl}Of course, thank you so much for your help as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001297
text: We are about to leave here, is there something wrong?{nl}I haven't heard that we would receive reinforcements.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001298
text: We should leave here soon.{nl}No one knows which stone will bring which monsters.{nl}Why is this happening...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001299
text: Don't you agree that we should leave because the worth of these archaeological {nl}findings here is practically nil? There are artifacts anywhere you step around here!!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001300
text: I think my senses aren't wrong. Something is definitely happening.{nl}As it stands, I can't give up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001301
text: The thing I want should be here, but I just can't figure out a way to find it.{nl}Hmm. What should I do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001302
text: My heart breaks knowing I have to leave such a wonderful place like this.{nl}But I don't have a choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001303
text: Do you think I am crazy enough to want to stay here longer?{nl}I am going to leave this place as quickly as I can. See you later somewhere!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001304
text: Historian Cyrenia Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001305
text: This feeling...{nl}Is it the feeling being a historian, or the fear that comes from human instinct..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001306
text: Adventurer Varkis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001307
text: What's it like being an adventurer? Of course it's not too dangerous.{nl}After all, the intense feeling of discovering something is what guides me through the day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001308
text: Historian Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001309
text: There's an old saying.{nl}A person who fights against beasts should be careful not to be a beast himself.{nl}When you look at the abyss for a long time, the abyss will also look at you..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001310
text: I have a feeling that I will meet you again.{nl}Farewell until then...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001311
text: I came here because the historians invited me to this place.{nl}They wanted my advice as a stonemason.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001312
text: I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001313
text: Liaison Officer Bale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001314
text: We are not responsible for the safety of a person who is not registered.{nl}Please go back to a safe place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001315
text: I am sorry for not being of any help, but you are not on the list.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001316
text: Historian Colin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001317
text: Hmm, nothing comes to mind at all. {nl}Yep... not at all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001318
text: How can I put all these materials in order?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001319
text: A person who uses a demon's name.. He must be crazy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001320
text: Wounded Historian Laulas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001321
text: There was a man taking over the excavation site.{nl}I feel powerless. How is he controlling those monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001322
text: Hurry! We must slow Rexipher somehow.{nl}No matter what the goddess' will may be, It won't do us good if everything falls in his hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001323
text: Ruklys Memorial

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001324
text: Who decapitated Ruklys?{nl}Who labeled Ruklys a traitor?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001325
text: The King tyrannized more as his spirit waned, and devastated his citizens' lives.{nl}I didn't die with him, so I am going to leave his spirit on this monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001326
text: It's okay even if you are not a swordsman.{nl}It's okay even if you are not the chosen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001327
text: The light that Ruklys left for you should be used against this chaotic world.{nl}If you immerse yourself in senseless killing, then it might turn against your head.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001328
text: I am looking for a person who will help me with my research.{nl}I lost my funding when they found out the research was on the traitor Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001329
text: Everything is my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead.. what can I do alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001330
text: Is there even anything valuable here?{nl}For the time being, I have been hired by Raymond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001331
text: Nameless Monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001332
text: (It is currently unreadable.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001333
text: Words cannot describe how dangerous this place is.{nl}The scholar told me to stay beside him because of the dangers around here...{nl}But I just can't stay and do nothing in front of an opportunity to find out the secret of Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001334
text: That's why... I have strayed out this far.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001335
text: This is amazing! As a scholar, I want to research more!{nl}But I'm not sure if it's okay to be out here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001336
text: To guide our spirits to a higher place through refining substances.{nl}That is the alchemists' ultimate goal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001337
text: Is the Netherbovine causing problems again?{nl}No monster will be able to step foot in Fedimian as long as we Rodelero are standing fast.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001338
text: Are you going to defeat Netherbovine? {nl}Splendid. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001339
text: The magic to control time is the essence of all magic.{nl}Agailla Flurry told me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001340
text: I used to live in the forest but came to Fedimian because I had ambitions.{nl}I'm glad to be of service if I can help given that over half of Fedimian is destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001341
text: I heard Netherbovine is going nuts outside Fedimian.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I can't go out and fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001342
text: Don't say poison is unfair.{nl}You gotta do anything to survive. You can't live in this world by just being fair.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001343
text: Are you going out to defeat Netherbovine outside Fedimian?{nl}If it weren't you, I would have fought.{nl}Pity on my end. But good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001344
text: Even after this beautiful city got destroyed, there are still quite a few threats around.{nl}I can go out and fight, but... I won't. Because there are more and more people who are willing{nl}to serve without any compensation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001345
text: Netherbovine. It is fortunate that we have some to fight against it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001346
text: I would go back in time if I could.{nl}I would have been able to save Fedimian with the magic I have now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001347
text: I knew you are not ordinary.{nl}Thanks for your support.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001348
text: I want to take a look at it more closely, but there are too many things interrupting me.{nl}Can you protect me from those monsters for a while?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001349
text: I never thought that I would be able to see these beautiful patterns.{nl}When you go to Garden of Pillar, there may be more beautiful patterns. Come with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001350
text: It seems that the Wandering Spirit wants to give the reward to someone in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001351
text: After I finished the work, the Unicorn appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001352
text: Thank you for the regards from Laimonas. {nl} Come on in to Klaipeda. Uska is waiting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001353
text: Don't forget to send my regards to the Knight Commander of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001354
text: When you are ready, please go to Aras in the Eastern Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001355
text: Welcome! {nl}Oh, you're the Revelator. I really wanted to meet you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001356
text: This is a Warp Scroll. {nl}You can go to any Goddess Statue or return to previous location by using it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001357
text: We'll give you more than what the Knights asked for so please help us find the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001358
text: I think Large Kepa is still out there. {nl} Would you take a look?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001359
text: It was there right? {nl} My senses are never wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001360
text: Even though Klaipeda is just around the corner, the supply situation here is not very good. {nl}Just think about how much worse it would be in other areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001361
text: My men should have returned by now but there is no sign of them. {nl} They know well that I'm too busy to check on them myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001362
text: My men said they were going to Delon Shelter. {nl}The Golem may appear at any moment, yet they looked so carefree.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001363
text: Rocktortuga is coming this way. {nl}Please lend us your strength to make sure it doesn't break through our defenses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001364
text: Have you seen any baby Poata? {nl}We better drive them out quickly so that the mother Poata won't keep showing up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001365
text: The Vubbes have built their base outside the village. {nl}Now that we don't even have able-bodied soldiers, something serious might happen if we don't {nl}drive them out of their base.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001366
text: Thank you so much for your bravery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001367
text: How can I express my gratitude. {nl}I'm sure the goddess sent you to us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001368
text: This patient told us that Chafer has appeared. {nl}Can you help us out and go check on it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001369
text: I must treat this patient at once... so thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001370
text: Those refugees are probably having a hard time getting here because of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001371
text: I can't help but think about it since he's worked here for so long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001372
text: Thank you. Now I can feel at ease and return to the village. {nl}May the blessing of the goddess always be with you .

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001373
text: Being attacked by the Golem will get them back to their senses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001374
text: Usually you can't find them no matter how hard you try. {nl}Strange, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001375
text: I am pleased that my friend was able to go back safely.{nl}I was worried because of the stories that Molich is wandering around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001376
text: After removing the seal, learn the next few steps for the other seal from the brothers there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001377
text: You have the Seal Release Crystal to release the seals.{nl}You are the person who Jonas sent right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001378
text: From now on, we will start releasing very important seals.{nl}The first seal is at the Pasagos Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001379
text: I heard you successfully released the seal at Pasagos Cliff.{nl}Go get the next step from my brothers at Pillars of the Courtyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001380
text: You should be going to the next seal at Broken Pillar Canyon once you unraveled the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001381
text: Find Gustas Jonas after releasing the seal.{nl}He will greet you respectfully.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001382
text: Are the monsters all taken care of?{nl}If so, things will get important from here on out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001383
text: I want you to bring me the artifacts that I couldn't get since it became too dangerous.{nl}Please examine the stone pillars at Alkune Stairway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001384
text: The devices attached to the artifacts may still be activated, and no one knows what will happen.{nl}Please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001385
text: Good. You have done well.{nl}I hope we will meet again soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001386
text: Powerless Security Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001387
text: I was attacked by Hogmas at Traceless Ruins.{nl}Fortunately, I was able to survive, but I need to find that chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001388
text: Thanks for caring.{nl}Be careful of those Hogmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001389
text: They probably haven't gone that far.{nl}I hope the necklace is safe even if others are not.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001390
text: There was nothing in the chest?{nl}Aww, that's a bummer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001391
text: We should find that necklace.{nl}If not, I will be kicked out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001392
text: When you use this scroll, the necklace will shine.{nl}You will be able to find it easily, even if it has been dropped on the ground or is in the hands of {nl}the Hogmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001393
text: If the necklace is that important, don't you think their boss would want it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001394
text: Thank you so much!{nl}I will take little bit more rest to recover my stamina and go back to the guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001395
text: What are you waiting for? {nl}Nothing good will come out when you drag time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001396
text: Powerless Security Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001397
text: I am still not feeling well. Got really startled not so long ago...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001398
text: What will Rexipher do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001399
text: So the Tzedej Altar has been attacked too?{nl}Regardless, we will still have a chance if we protect the other altars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001400
text: Please go to Sviesa's Altar.{nl}I will follow you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001401
text: Run and don't look back!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001402
text: If you look by the stones you will find Denoptic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001403
text: I will give you the scroll to open the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001404
text: I can't believe I have to go like this...{nl}I haven't even had a chance to say goodbye to my parents...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001405
text: I'm sorry... I'm sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001406
text: What is that?{nl}Succubus' Eyes...? Thank you for defeating it, but hand those over!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001407
text: As I've told you... I am quite dexterous, and have been interested in crafting since I was young.{nl}Alchemy, magic, medicines... I know about those Succubus' Eyes!{nl}The eyes that a Succubus put in my eyes because she was envious of the pretty necklace {nl}with the blessings of the Great Cathedral!{nl}I'll make you a new necklace with those eyes!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001408
text: It won't take long. {nl}Excuse me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001409
text: All done!{nl}The necklace should suit you well!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001410
text: Let's give up on this and move to the big transportation magic circle instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001411
text: The Asmodian attacked the tower is not the first time, but did Mase long earthquake up here. Thanks to {nl}, and whether they are by but Gabija disappeared in the world?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001412
text: That was a trap.{nl}It seems that they read every movements of us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001413
text: There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it it would be little late, let's give up on the magic circle and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001414
text: The Barrier Device is on the left end of his hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs right after we activate the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001415
text: The device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It seems okay yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001416
text: Good!{nl}There wouldn't be more monsters now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001417
text: Let's go to the next floor soon. {nl} Goddess Gabija is awaiting us. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001418
text: Refugee

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001419
text: I lost everything. {nl}I don't know how I can go on anymore. {nl}Would my life have become this miserable if not for Medzio Diena?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001420
text: Four years ago, it was on the eve of the so called 'Medzio Diena'. {nl}Suddenly, a huge tree emerged in the middle of the capital and the earth and sky turned {nl}upside down. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001421
text: I never knew a tree could grow that big. {nl}And the destruction of the capital began. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001422
text: Everything happened so fast, and nobody knew what to do. {nl}We didn't know whether to run away or try to stop it... Our minds just became blank.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001423
text: The destruction of the capital was just the beginning. {nl}Medzio Diena was simply a prelude to the catastrophes coming ahead. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001424
text: Monstrous plants sprouted up all over and began devouring people.{nl}Everyone started running, but before I knew it I was the only person left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001425
text: Enough. Don't ask any more questions. {nl}I... don't want to think about it anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001426
text: The Excavation Camp on Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum is past here.{nl}You can freely enter, but please be careful not to disturb the people doing research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001427
text: The one in charge of this Excavation Camp is Niels.{nl}If you have something regarding the research group, look for him in the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001428
text: We won't block anyone's entrance past here, but we can't guarantee one's safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001429
text: The researchers here receive support from the kingdom.{nl}The person in charge is Niels, so if you have any questions talk to him at the Excavation Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001430
text: The Royal Mausoleum should be protected.{nl}If it can't be protected, it will be destroyed itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001431
text: Fedimian is a very old city, and is surrounded by countless ruins and wonders. {nl}This includes the Mage Tower, the Cursed City and the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001432
text: Hundreds of years ago an archmage by the name of Agailla Flurry built that tower. {nl}Much of the magic used today saw their beginnings within that tower, and haven't changed {nl}much since.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001433
text: That city was abandoned after it was cursed with a spell that turned everything into stone. {nl}It is just beyond Pilgrim's Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001434
text: It used to be the place where the people who supported the former rebel Ruklys lived. {nl}The curse is still in effect today so it's difficult to travel there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001435
text: Goddess Zemyna has always protected us. {nl}I believe my older brother also leaves me to Zemyna's care.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001436
text: How many times must we pray to the Goddess Zemyna until she can hear our prayers?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001437
text: This is the Divine District of the city of Fedimian. {nl}The Market District is currently closed, please accept that inconvenience.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001438
text: The Divine City, Fedimian, also had a Market District besides its Divine District.{nl}But the Market District was completely destroyed due to the earthquake during Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001439
text: We are still reviving the city, but the city infrastructure is still old and crumbling quite a bit...{nl}At least, the Divine District is still left intact due to Zemyna's blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001440
text: Believer Alvydas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001441
text: It is because of our faith and dedication to Goddess Saule that we are able to endure {nl}such hardship. Would an unfaithful person want to stay in a terrible place like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001442
text: Believer Raminta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001443
text: If that evil energy spreads to other forests...{nl}then they will probably also turn... like Kvailas Forest.{nl}And then the entire kingdom may also... It scares me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001444
text: Believer Evaldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001445
text: Everyone is tired, but the evil energy never stops. So we at least try to stay happy. {nl} However, I don't know how long I can keep feeling happy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001446
text: Believer Zaneta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001447
text: I want to tell to the people out there that we are still here.{nl}The goddess always tells us that everything will be alright when the revelation comes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001448
text: Believer Simas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001449
text: I actually want to go to Fallen Worry Forest instead.{nl}I wanted to see the origin of the evil energy with my own eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001450
text: There are rumors about Golems appearing so don't go far too deep. {nl}It'll be safer to take the bigger roads where there {nl}are less monsters or just head straight to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001451
text: So, I guess there is actually someone good among those who say they've dreamed of a goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001452
text: I'm relieved that there are people who say they dreamed of a goddess. {nl}But there seem to be too many of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001453
text: A dream of one of the missing goddesses. Isn't that something amazing?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001454
text: The colleague who I used to work with has disappeared.{nl}He was definitely with me at the Forest of Fireflies, but I won't go back there. It's scary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001455
text: Where is he? I am scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001456
text: My colleague is dead?{nl}That's nonsense. If I had not tempted him..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001457
text: This map is useless now since my colleague is dead.{nl}Please pray that my colleague would go to the goddess safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001458
text: I'm screwed. Monsters took my bag. {nl}The bag contained everything I recorded on my journey.. What should I do?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001459
text: The goddess has surely sent help!{nl}Those monsters were last seen south of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001460
text: There are still a lot of things I must do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001461
text: The adventure can continue if I get my diary back.{nl}I am happy..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001462
text: Long time no see. {nl}I have a favor to ask you. Can you help?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001463
text: I want to put a monument up for my dead colleague.{nl}But I don't have any materials or tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001464
text: Thank you. The Klaipeda blacksmith should sell the tools.{nl}But first, I'd like to ask you to bring me boulders from High Winding Road {nl}that are known for their excellent quality.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001465
text: Tools for stonemasons? {nl}10,000 silver will do.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001466
text: I just figured out how I'm going to make it.{nl}I will make it quick, so please wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001467
text: It's finished. Place it at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Overlooking Crossroads.{nl}Maybe this can provide enough consolation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001468
text: I keep thinking about my colleague.{nl}I'll never see him again, right...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001469
text: Varkis' Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001470
text: I can't leave with all my things left here

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001471
text: I don't have any reason to stay in this land anymore.{nl}I want to meet the goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001472
text: It was made long ago, but any stones will break it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001473
text: Monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001474
text: We have all become like wind in the canyon.{nl}Although we have left, our times together will always remain with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001475
text: Architect Laudi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001476
text: I received a request to rebuild this structure, but after Medzio Diena, {nl}I have been stuck here since.{nl}I don't know if the original client is still alive or if we lack the materials, {nl}but I will finish rebuilding this structure no matter what happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001477
text: I will find the key to open the last seal.{nl}After opening a space with this scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001478
text: The spatial chasms may exist anywhere, but they might also not exist anywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001479
text: Hmm. Every bit as impressive as the rumors say.{nl}Rolandas will be waiting for you if you go to the base of the stone pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001480
text: Nothing beats traps when it comes to gathering enemies together and striking them all at once. {nl}Of course, they're also the best means of escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001481
text: If you think a companion is just a pet, that's a huge mistake. {nl}They are like an inseparable friend to us hunters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001482
text: Our family has been waiting for your appearance for a long time.{nl}With this igniter, please light the signal at the top.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001483
text: Since you have appeared, it is sending us a signal to greet you.{nl}After you light the signal, tell Niels that I am sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001484
text: There's nothing that Davio can't get! As long as you pay me enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001485
text: Do you need anything?{nl}I can get you anything as long as you pay me enough.{nl}But, it will be expensive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001486
text: Don't ever think about going by yourself without mercenaries.{nl}There are too many monsters out there, and some of them can't even be defeated by mercenaries.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001487
text: My soldiers should've been back by now, but I haven't heard from them.{nl}If you see them, can you tell them to come back to the camp?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001488
text: If I don't take care of them, no one will.{nl}I should re-train them, damn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001489
text: With things like this, I won't be able to face the Captain.{nl}I should get back the supplies that the Wendigos stole, but I'm deeply wounded.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001490
text: If I didn't have this wound, that monster would be nothing.{nl}I am really pissed off.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001491
text: Thanks.{nl}Since I got all those supplies back, I will try to cheer up myself one more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001492
text: The wound is deeper than I thought, and I can hardly move.{nl}I heard Canyon Apynys is good for alleviating pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001493
text: Yep. That's Canyon Apynys, alright.{nl}I am worried about the side effects, but I hope they go away soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001494
text: Do you have the Canyon Apynys?{nl}I feel like I'm going to lose consciousness just from breathing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001495
text: The blood has stopped, but my body feels numb.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can return safely?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001496
text: It is aching more than I thought.{nl}I'll have to give up a little strength to move quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001497
text: After I regain more energy, I should go back to the commander.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001498
text: The commander is looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I can't go back until I catch that again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001499
text: They are not ordinary stones, as they emanate some sort of energy.{nl}You will know when you see them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001500
text: I didn't know that I would meet Saugas again, I don't know if I should like it or dislike it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001501
text: Good work.{nl}Now shall we start?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001502
text: We will be ready when we rub Woodfung's poison on the stone with full of vigor.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait on the Alkune Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001503
text: The Saugas' just took the stones and disappeared?{nl}That's absurd.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001504
text: Are you afraid of them?{nl}I still have some more stones, so could you try luring them again from there?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001505
text: Did the Saugas run away because they caught my scent?{nl}I guess that is possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001506
text: So the Saugas were just causing trouble to their peers.{nl}Okay. I will go back to the camp slowly since the commander is worrying about me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001507
text: There's a scary monster called Denoptic here.{nl}I need the artifacts that Denoptic swallowed. Can you get them for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001508
text: I'm surprised, as this is the first time I've seen Denoptic eat stones. {nl}Is someone behind this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001509
text: How did you find the right piece!{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001510
text: Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monster at Odega Hills.{nl}It disturbs my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001511
text: Thank you.{nl}I wonder why there is no support here, because they do send mercenaries {nl}to those scholars at the entrance of the canyon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001512
text: If something were to happen to Airine, I don't know how I would live....

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001513
text: Why are monsters after these artifacts.{nl}Is there something that we should know?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001514
text: Anyways, thanks for helping me on the research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001515
text: Gotta run away from Niels.{nl}We should go see the stars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001516
text: There was something important..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001517
text: What are you doing here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001518
text: Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I am okay. You guys are crazy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001519
text: Just where exactly did that old man go to alone?{nl}He's not even in good shape...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001520
text: Instead of fighting, I chose to run away.{nl}I think my research will help us more than fighting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001521
text: Do those monsters like eating research materials or something?{nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001522
text: Sorry if I sounded mean.. it's just, I don't have energy to talk right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001523
text: I was a hunter before.{nl}Those monsters in the canyon are nothing to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001524
text: Damn... that was awesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001525
text: It was dangerous, but we got something out of it.{nl}Nevertheless, the disappearance incidents are a bit eerie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001526
text: It's raining heavily.{nl}Monsters are more erratic on these days.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001527
text: I wonder who is planning all this?{nl}I'm certain they're after the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001528
text: Manipulating monsters, that's not a human thing to do.{nl}Are they demons then? Ah... this is all very confusing.{nl}What have I seen?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001529
text: I guess I can't sleep tight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001530
text: Can you hear it? hear it? The screams of those who died without any reasons?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001531
text: The criminals who fabricate counterfeits of the Royal Mausoleum's artifacts roam about here.{nl}They already know my face, what should I do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001532
text: There are many monsters here, {nl}though it appears there are stone statues moving near the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Perhaps they'll attack when the king gets disturbed in his sleep?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001533
text: What do we do? {nl}To add to all the chaos in the village, the Vubbes have kidnapped the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001534
text: Hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001535
text: Oh, you're just in time. We need your help. {nl}Monsters stole all the aids and supplies meant for the refugees. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001536
text: Fortunately, we found them quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001537
text: I'll stay and aid the people left here. {nl}There are more people who need more than my aid, so please go on ahead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001538
text: I'm holding this because it looks like it's about to collapse. {nl}We need some stones to do something about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001539
text: We won't be able to handle it if this wall opens. {nl}How will you stop them then if people are already running away now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001540
text: Alright. That'll be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001541
text: I must go back to the village. {nl}But as you can see my arms are shaking. {nl}Can you defeat the monsters while I rest my arms for a while?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001542
text: The goddesses are so heartless. {nl}Had the goddesses not disappeared, the monsters wouldn't be invading.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001543
text: Now I can return to the village with peace of mind. {nl}This grace I shall never forget.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001544
text: I came here to hide from the monsters, but even this area is becoming dangerous. {nl}I'm trying to make it back to the village, so can you bring the other refugees to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001545
text: I see you came back safely. {nl}Well then, I must also prepare to leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001546
text: What do we do? I think there are even more monsters now than when we first came. {nl}And the patients have not recovered yet. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001547
text: Somehow I'll treat this man. Can you defeat the monsters around?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001548
text: In order for these people to safely return to the village,{nl}we have to defeat these monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001549
text: Thank you. The patient also regained his consciousness. {nl}Though... I think there is a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001550
text: This has to be because there is the evidence of salvation or something. {nl}I'm sure that's where the villagers were taken away to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001551
text: The goddess must have sent help... {nl}Follow the pathway on the right to find the Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001552
text: Thank you for saving me. {nl}Seems like you're the Revelator who's looking for evidence of salvation. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001553
text: I was taken in late so I was left here, the others were all brought to the mine. {nl}I'll tell you the rest of the story in the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001554
text: You came. {nl}First, let's clear the wagons blocking the way into the mines. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001555
text: The wagons can be demolished with these explosives that I have prepared. {nl}I'm concerned about the Vubbes that will come after hearing the explosion {nl}but with your skills, I think we'll be fine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001556
text: I'll let you take care of the Vubbes. {nl}I have things to attend to inside. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001557
text: Thank you. Thank you very much. {nl}You're a savior of our village. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001558
text: Oh, have you seen a girl about 5 years of age? {nl}I heard she was together with them when the villagers were kidnapped.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001559
text: Don't just stand there. {nl}Move if you want to help or go away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001560
text: Mine Manager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001561
text: I'm hanging on somehow but I'm losing strength in my arms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001562
text: I should have been more careful. {nl}It's all my fault.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001563
text: I have my roots deep in hunting. {nl}Don't worry about me. Go look after the others.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001564
text: As the mayor, I cannot just leave the village like this. {nl}How could the goddesses be so indifferent?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001565
text: Aren't you a Revelator? The Goddess must've sent help. {nl}In order to enter the mine, you must save a young man name Vaidotas first. {nl}He was kidnapped and brought to the Vubbe Outpost. {nl} Please, I'm begging for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001566
text: Kind Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001567
text: There are so many wandering spirits these days.{nl}This is really...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001568
text: Large Frame

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001569
text: It's about a problem.{nl}You should take a look at it yourself rather than me explaining it to you several times.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001570
text: What's the problem? {nl}Um... it's big, very big.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001571
text: You saw it right?{nl}He is called Sequoia. {nl}He once protected us owls, but now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001572
text: Some humans are absurdly attacking us owls.{nl}Hence, a few owls have been destroyed and there are an increasing number of people getting hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001573
text: That Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001574
text: There is an owl that knows this problem well.{nl}But what was its name...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001575
text: Ah, I can't concentrate.{nl}While I try to remember, can you take care of the Ellogua?{nl}Their spores are getting in my head so my memories are scrambled.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001576
text: We are made of ordinary wood so we are scared of moist and insects.{nl}We are keen to being broken as well.{nl}It would have been better if we were made of iron.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001577
text: Thank you!{nl}I can't scratch my head because I am a tree... Hehe...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001578
text: Hm! Yes, I finally remembered! {nl}Find the Anxious Owl.{nl}That owl was so close to Sequoia so it must know the method.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001579
text: Anxious Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001580
text: As promised, I will tell you. About Sequoia. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001581
text: Sequoia is obsessed with evil energy.{nl}Must face evil energy with divine power.{nl}Yes. We must face it!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001582
text: Please gather wood pieces from the broken sculpture.{nl}Ah. the ones with the power in them. Select well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001583
text: My friends became ordinary. {nl}Yes. Ordinary wooden sculptures. {nl}They must still have some divine power left, for sure. I believe...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001584
text: Okay. Good. This will be enough! {nl}We have enough materials. Good. Good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001585
text: Hm? Sequoia? I know it well. Big mouth, big hip...{nl}Look at this. Many of my friends fell down.{nl}Sequoia did this alright.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001586
text: But, monsters are keep trying to take them.{nl}What was that? Okay. The Essence of Spirits.{nl}If you get them again, I will tell you. The Essence of Spirits. My poor friends!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001587
text: They were very good friends. Bad. Yes. I mean those monsters.{nl}I will try harder for my friends. {nl}Yes. I look a little confused...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001588
text: Thanks. Yes. {nl}I will take you to a good place. For sure...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001589
text: Gather them, and string them together and stab Sequoia.{nl}Then it will be surprised and run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001590
text: You should succeed on your first try. Okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001591
text: Sometimes I miss it. The old Sequoia.{nl}Why was it possessed by evil energy? There is no way to know. I am just sad. A lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001592
text: Something is wrong. {nl}The Guide Owl is not in a good mood. I hope you go there quickly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001593
text: Take that stick with you. They are my friends.{nl}I think you will need it from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001594
text: It will be okay. That owl is strong.{nl}It will be okay. It will be okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001595
text: Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001596
text: I almost fell into eternal sleep if it weren't you.{nl}Sequoia is our enemy now. Enemy!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001597
text: Sequoia is not only us owls' problem.{nl}It is attacking any living creatures!{nl}Please help us defeat it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001598
text: If we keep letting Sequoia act like this, us owls will be completely destroyed.{nl}Many people will die as well...{nl}There will be a flood of wandering spirits and we won't have any owls to guide us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001599
text: Sequoia is too late.{nl}They are not only attacking humans, but they also attack us who used to be it's old friends!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001600
text: The memory of Sequoia and us together... was it weaker than the evil energy?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001601
text: Grave Protector Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001602
text: Thanks for saving me.{nl}I don't understand how I got attacked by those little things.{nl}Maybe I am too old now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001603
text: It seems that the Guide Owl finally made a decision.{nl}It once tried fervently to bring Sequoia back to the way it used to be...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001604
text: Anyways, It's good.{nl}I need the Essence of Spirit from the spirit that is wandering around the grave of unknown warrior.{nl}You can do anything, just bring us the Essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001605
text: Spirits that wander around for a long time will become no different than the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001606
text: Excellent, you collected the Essences.{nl}When you go back to the Guide Owl, it will empower your weapon with the power of the spirits.{nl}Whether such power will bring about something good... Only a goddess will know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001607
text: Although this is a personal matter, there is an angry owl at Cross Hill near here.{nl}After it fell into a deep sleep due to an incident, it became obsessed with evil energy.{nl}Please wake that angry owl up and persuade it to regain its consciousness again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001608
text: If it doesn't listen to you...{nl}Then please destroy it and let it go to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001609
text: I will do anything to bring it back to what it used to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001610
text: This is the symbol of the Guide Owl which guided his spirit.{nl}When it sleeps for a long time, it gets influenced by monsters.{nl}Many of its allies changed like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001611
text: I am sorry. Let me be alone for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001612
text: So you brought the power of the spirits.{nl}I will inject the power of the spirits into your stick.{nl}With this much power of the spirits in a stick like this, you will be able to destroy Sequoia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001613
text: You must succeed.{nl}If you think about those owls that were eaten by Sequoia or burnt into deaths, you must {nl}succeed this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001614
text: What?{nl}Sequoia ran away alive?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001615
text: That's a big problem!{nl}The Desperate Owl is over there...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001616
text: It is my mistake. I thought it too easy. {nl}I didn't know this would happen. {nl}If the Desperate Owl gets destroyed, then I...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001617
text: Please...{nl}Please help the Desperate Owl. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001618
text: Desperate Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001619
text: It was very scary.{nl}Thanks for saving me.{nl}Although it seems that Sequoia is going crazier than usual, I feel relieved...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001620
text: Anyways, it seems that Sequoia is moving towards the Desperate Owl.{nl}Please let nothing happen to it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001621
text: Sequoia was in a wild, angry state.{nl}I've never seen Sequoia like that before. We are going to be destroyed by it!{nl}Please lend us your strength!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001622
text: We must try everything we can.{nl}We will need the Blackened Boughs laying around since Sequoia burned the forest.{nl}I will string them together and make a stronger stick.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001623
text: Sequoia destroyed one of my friends, burned this forest, and...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001624
text: Even if we are fundamentally good hearted...{nl}I will curse Sequoia until the very moment I fall into deep sleep.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001625
text: This is plenty enough.{nl}It will be better if I could string my anger into it as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001626
text: I have made the cursed stick with the Blackened Boughs that you brought.{nl}Sequoia must be still near here.{nl}Please stab Sequoia using this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001627
text: Sequoia will swallow us and absorb more spirits' energy.{nl}At one time, he was our friend..{nl}But we, and Sequoia, have long forgotten about those days.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001628
text: To see the forest burning in flames.{nl}I'm fine by it. It's not shocking anymore.{nl}The day when the Sequoia was possessed with evil energy was worse than this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001629
text: I hope the owls don't feel disappointed due to their failure.{nl}Sequioia wasn't driven away, but that doesn't mean the stick had failed.{nl}The last two blows must have been especially fatal to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001630
text: However, if we leave Sequoia as it is, then the whole forest may be set ablazed.{nl}It will recover itself by swallowing us.{nl}Please destroy Sequoia now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001631
text: The scream from Sequoia is echoing even in my body.{nl}It wouldn't be difficult to defeat him now.{nl}You don't have time to waste anymore anyways.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001632
text: You defeated Sequoia.{nl}It was once our protector, but has met a tragic end.{nl}The thoughts we had about Sequoia... It'd be hard for you to understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001633
text: Some purifiers don't immediately start working. {nl}For those cases, I've put in a guide so follow it step-by-step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001634
text: There is a shopping plaza in the lower part of Klaipeda. {nl}Stop by and look around if you need anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001635
text: It'd be great if he continued to runaway. {nl}I mean, I'm not really sure. He was a really good friend of mine...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001636
text: Okay.{nl}Please find the Grave Protector Owl from the grave of the unknown warrior.{nl}If he could lend us his power, it will be a good chance to defeat Sequioa.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001637
text: Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001638
text: The thorny vines are plants too, so they must be weak to strong acid.{nl}What do you think? Does it seem like a good idea?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001639
text: The Filibo?{nl}I wouldn't be worried if it only steals food.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001640
text: It bites on any materials or military equipment that are made of wood, and breaks medicine {nl}jars. There are holes from tent to tent. Last but not least, it is not afraid of anything. {nl}It will attack even if it sees people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001641
text: Ha! Take that, repulsive pricks. I'm feeling refreshed now!{nl}The materials and tents have came. And the equipments and supplies should be arriving soon...{nl}Finally we'll use the carts to... carts? carts?!!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001642
text: Ah, I forgot about carts!{nl}I am sorry, but can you request carts to Pakelas?{nl}I can go myself, but I think I am gonna get scolded again... Haha...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001643
text: Adjutant General Pakelas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001644
text: Ah, aren't you that famous... Oh... It's so good to see you.{nl}Why have you come here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001645
text: Ah, carts... damn. Malt forgot them again... {nl}We have extra carts here, but most of them are waiting for maintenance, so I would check before{nl}taking them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001646
text: I must advise you to check the cart conditions.{nl}My soldiers should have check them, so I apologize for making you do it...{nl}I will scold Bran.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001647
text: What?{nl}These are the only carts that function normally?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001648
text: Damn. The materials and the equipment should be arriving anytime now...{nl}But I'm in a hurry, I need someone to get some Hamming Stem in the meantime.{nl}Ah, that headache again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001649
text: How should I scold Malt?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001650
text: This is great!{nl}Ah, my sincerest apology for all this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001651
text: So, does this mean that you will help me?{nl}Please get some claws from Velwrigglers at Rajuma Curved Path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001652
text: Our Revelator is so kind. Isn't he?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001653
text: Darn, it's just a graze, but it hurts so bad.{nl}Well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001654
text: It will be completed if I have Truffle poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001655
text: Where are the mushrooms from Truffles you say?{nl}Look closely at their horns. They are actually mushrooms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001656
text: Isn't it strange that mushrooms grow from their heads?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001657
text: Almost done.{nl}Please mix all the ingredients that you've gathered at the Altar of Harmony at Isdidu Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001658
text: In the past, the altar was the place to purify holy water or objects dedicated to Goddess Saule.{nl}Enough about the past, right now we just need to use it for a relevant purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001659
text: What was your impression when you saw the altar?{nl}I felt somewhat nostalgic whenever I see it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001660
text: Anyway, after mixing this, the acid solution will be complete!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001661
text: Please melt the thorny vines with this acid solution.{nl}The thorny vines are located on the upper side of Isdidu Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001662
text: I hope the Thorn Forest returns to what it used to look like.{nl}Birds are nowhere to be found right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001663
text: What is now the Thorn Forest was once a very beautiful forest.{nl}We, the Believers, used to hold sacred prayer ceremonies here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001664
text: After the Demon Lord Bramble came to our forest, it became like this.{nl}I can't even remember the last time I heard the sound of a songbird. How I miss the old and {nl}beautiful forest...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001665
text: Every now and then, I miss what the forest used to be.{nl}I also miss listening to the words of Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001666
text: Believer Virgis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001667
text: There's nothing that we can't accomplish with faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't accomplish, then it's because our faith is not strong enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001668
text: Believer Nojus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001669
text: Revelator, please be careful.{nl}It seems as if a similar aura to that of the ominous voice is resonating throught the entire forest.{nl}Especially from the direction of Fallen Worry Forest... I'm sharp-eared on such things...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001670
text: Supplies Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001671
text: I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received a list of neccessary supplies, but check out the length of this list.{nl}How am I suppose to handle all of these items on my own?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001672
text: I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need Plantain Grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001673
text: The people in charge must have forgot about our provisions.{nl}If not, do they think that we can live by eating nothing?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001674
text: Wow, that was fast.{nl}But we're not done yet.{nl}If it could be finished with Plantain Grass, then I would have finished it myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001675
text: What would reinvigorate our strength to fight is meat, good o' meat.{nl}The beef flanks from cows raised on apples are supreme, but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try hunting Tinis, which have a similar taste.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001676
text: If only the list of goods to appropriate was any longer, then I would not be acting so hesitantly.{nl}The Vubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays, it's the Zigris causing trouble...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001677
text: This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001678
text: So... We have everything we needed... I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Please wait a moment...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001679
text: Ah... They're worse than those Vubbes. For real!! The potion jars are all missing...{nl}Those Zigris recurrently steal things that seem unique to them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001680
text: They are more than just thieves.{nl}If anything looks good, they'll take it away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001681
text: We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while now.{nl}They will be scared just thinking about you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001682
text: We have everything we need now.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}I am relieved now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001683
text: Fortunately, everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigris... I want to show them how scary I am.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001684
text: The Vubbes planted a flag at their camp not so long ago.{nl}Now they've been driven out and the Zigris have settled in.{nl}This isn't really noteworthy, what's more important is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001685
text: that they just stole all the supplies that I worked so hard to gather! I can't forgive them.{nl}Let them learn pain. Burn down their flag.{nl}In the meantime, I will... count the remaining supplies again!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001686
text: Hahaha! Damn Zigris!{nl}Fear me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001687
text: Damn, I am out of it.{nl}I have a mountain of things to do, but the monsters won't stop coming...{nl}How about this? Since only I can do my job, maybe you can do something about the monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001688
text: Foreseeing Owl Sculptor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001689
text: So you finally came here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001690
text: Before we get into the assessment, we should defeat the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't proceed to the assessment like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001691
text: You are indeed growing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001692
text: You are indeed the person I was waiting for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001693
text: Okay. let's proceed to the assessment.{nl}You must awake the owls that will give you tests.{nl}Awake the three sculptures and try those three tests.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001694
text: I am sure you can do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001695
text: Examiner Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001696
text: I will wait at the assessment site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001697
text: Thanks.{nl}You woke me up.{nl}Are you read for the test?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001698
text: I will wait at the assessment site.{nl}Good luck...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001699
text: You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001700
text: Okay, then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001701
text: You passed the first test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001702
text: Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001703
text: You passed the second test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001704
text: This is gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001705
text: You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the Foreseeing Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001706
text: Now proceed to the Thorn Forest again.{nl}Somebody is waiting for you there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the sculpture together at the designated place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001707
text: Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid, please proceed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001708
text: You woke me up to take the test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001709
