text: I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman Master, the one who will help you.{nl}I'm not sure if you know about attribute training. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001710
text: Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001711
text: You'll be able to fight easier if you learn attributes. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001712
text: You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard Master. {nl}I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001713
text: Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001714
text: Does everything about attributes make sense? Now you'll be able to fight the enemies easier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001715
text: How you become strong depends on what choice you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choice and thoughts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001716
text: Good to see you. I am the Archer Master. {nl}Do you know about attribute training? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001717
text: Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001718
text: Mastering these attributes will help your skills in combat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001719
text: Willpower is the force that creates magic power. {nl}For a Wizard, there is no stronger weapon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001720
text: The archer gives an arrow as a present, but the enemy take it as death.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001721
text: There are those who fit with the sword and there are those who don't. {nl}It means that you should find something of value rather than readily throw your life away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001722
text: A Ranger's arrows target many, not only one.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001723
text: It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl}So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy, like shields or stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001724
text: One thing I'd like to tell you... I think your attack lacks something. {nl}If you learn skills, you'll be able to make more powerful attacks when you need to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001725
text: There are different skills for each class but you will be able to fight better when you learn them. {nl}Also, you can do a lot of things aside from attacking.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001726
text: What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills, right? {nl}Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001727
text: Oh, you said we need to assemble? {nl}Please let the Battle Commander know about it too. He's over there on the right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001728
text: Guiding spirits is an important task, but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001729
text: Blackened Boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001730
text: Others are violent as well, but the Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001731
text: Plantain Grass are all around here so you can easily find them.{nl}I'll be working on something else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001732
text: There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}Eight big scoops will do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001733
text: We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's steal back the jars that the Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001734
text: Monsters really like the Soul Crystal.{nl}They become strong when they absorb its power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001735
text: If something goes wrong... then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us.{nl}May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001736
text: Nice to meet you, follower of the goddess. {nl}Do you know about learning attributes?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001737
text: Welcome, you who follow the goal of the goddess.{nl}Do you know about training attributes?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001738
text: Now do you grasp what attributes are? {nl}Learning attributes will help you to easily defeat your enemies. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001739
text: Healing and helping others is the mission of the Clerics. {nl}How can you ignore people seeking help in the name of the goddess?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001740
text: People are still suffering from the wounds within their body and mind from Medzio Diena.{nl}They need our help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001741
text: I am sorry, but can you please find my companion, Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do some research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001742
text: I don't know where he went.{nl}But he will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001743
text: Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I just need to find the rest of my research materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001744
text: Thanks. I was thinking that the Tontus may have swallowed them.{nl}I promise that I will return to the Excavation Camp if you find them for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001745
text: I remember the most of it, but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the Mausoleum and etc.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001746
text: So this is all? Hmm...{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will now return to the Excavation Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001747
text: Monsters will gain nothing by stealing these research materials.{nl}And yet, there are many people claiming that they lost their materials. Isn't it strange?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001748
text: So you want to be our apprentice, eh?{nl}Do you know who we are?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001749
text: We should ask for more when we are in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001750
text: Good, good job. This will do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001751
text: Now go get me some lime from the monsters that swallowed some.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001752
text: After making this, I'm outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here long enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001753
text: Good. Go meet my partner in Pillars of the Courtyard with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001754
text: Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits like us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001755
text: I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some of the firewood that is scattered on the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001756
text: Vincent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001757
text: Ah, so you are the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001758
text: Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the Royal Mausoleum?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001759
text: You are very skillful for a beginner.{nl}By the way... do you know how we were able to survive in this world?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001760
text: I am looking for the poles that were used in building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}If you see unique poles, please let me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001761
text: Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001762
text: They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zluges Historic Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001763
text: I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001764
text: Because of your assistance, the study went well.{nl}But, I found some traces of magics on them. Outrageous, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001765
text: Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for should be marked.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001766
text: I am smarter than you guys think!{nl}Do you think I am gonna get deceived by you guys?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001767
text: It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, but I am afraid of making {nl}mistakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001768
text: A man with silver hair requested something of me, what was it?{nl}Or was it blonde hair?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001769
text: Foreseeing Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001770
text: Necroventer has obstructed the road to the Thorn Forest. {nl} You must defeat the Necroventer to enter the Thorn Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001771
text: Corrupted Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001772
text: Death to all who are resist Necroventer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001773
text: The Necroventer that had occupied Top Grip Peak has vanished.{nl}Top Grip Peak will become peaceful once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001774
text: Revelator! I wanted to meet you for a long time.{nl}Pitt and I applied to the military because we wanted to listen to your heroic stories.{nl}But we are just standing guards...It's sort of dreary.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001775
text: If you are okay, can you persuade our commander so we can go out to the battlefield?{nl}The commander may permit us to go if you ask him...{nl}And it will be a good experience for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001776
text: Wow, you are my role model. I respect you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001777
text: I think something good will happen since I met you.{nl}Yes... something good will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001778
text: Hehe, I'm no different... {nl}To solve the troubles of this forest, I want... no, I was called by the military.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001779
text: You probably saw them when you came a while ago. The Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient, {nl}but we have a solution. I was born here so I know them well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001780
text: Please gather the fluids that come out from Tinis.{nl}It has a gland that contains the fluids near it's tail.{nl}Be careful since it smells bad.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001781
text: I can make it quickly if I have them a lot.{nl}Yes. Very quickly...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001782
text: Wow, it's more than I thought. {nl}Please wait a bit. It will be done quickly...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001783
text: Okay... When you pour this onto the Thorny Bushes, they will die quickly.{nl}Yes. I grew... ah, no. I made that. I can guarantee its effectiveness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001784
text: What a lovely Thorny Bu...{nl}Ah! No. What am I saying...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001785
text: What was that? I thought we just needed to defeat the Thorny Bushes.{nl}How preposterous!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001786
text: The herbalist is not here, anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001787
text: So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys have no skills. There's little to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets... are you guys crazy enough to take those pets to the perilous battlefield?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001788
text: What's with those defiant glares? {nl}You guys don't wanna accept that you're not skillful?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001789
text: Okay. I like your attitudes. But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those Golems at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. {nl}Only then will I acknowledge your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001790
text: Fighting Golems will be easier than going to the battlefield.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001791
text: Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated Golems? or you just ran way from them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001792
text: Alright! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skills.{nl}Don't ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001793
text: Okay. Return back to Raimondas.{nl}Have some confidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001794
text: Good. Have you brought the evidence?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001795
text: Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001796
text: The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the Golem. Don't forget it.{nl}Newcomers these days... I don't find any confidence in them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001797
text: By the way... I don't see that hairy creature that went along with you guys.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001798
text: Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morku Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001799
text: That monster looked like the monster you guys used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morku Farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you guys used to have.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001800
text: Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If it really is what it is, I'm sorry for the loss.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001801
text: Ah... how could this... It's not true. This body must not be Spion's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely, it must be a different monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001802
text: No... No way... How could you be...{nl}No...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001803
text: Ah... Spion!! How... Because of me, you...{nl}We are so sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001804
text: The herbalist!! This is all because of the herbalist.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for Spion!{nl}Where the hell is that bastard?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001805
text: It's not your fault that Spion turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault, Spion would not have died like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001806
text: Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001807
text: Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found the identity of the broker sooner...{nl}Pitt, Bran, I am so incompetent... I am so sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001808
text: I want to thank you.{nl}You made them real soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001809
text: We must concentrate on capturing those demons now. May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001810
text: No one will help you even if you are defeated by Golems.{nl}You guys have to save yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001811
text: Well done.{nl}Let me take over from here.{nl}Those Siaulambs should practice running away from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001812
text: I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}Please accompany us. If you could help us, that will really help us out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001813
text: Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001814
text: If I was a little richer, then I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the goddess' blessing too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001815
text: I know many people are missing, but no one is trying to find them.{nl}They don't even know whether those people even existed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001816
text: In such a anarchic world, it's completely justified to hoard.{nl}Ah, forget I said anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001817
text: Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001818
text: No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001819
text: I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the Spiritual Stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001820
text: It's fortunate that both of you are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001821
text: Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001822
text: I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, {nl}but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001823
text: If you look closely at the stones across Apynys Habitat, it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't been digested fully yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001824
text: The evil presence has caused the Guardians to break the Royal Slate, which contains the rules of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat the Guardians and bring back the pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001825
text: Those Guardians are trying to break a stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Stop them. They are out of control.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001826
text: Everything at the Royal Mausoleum is designed for the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001827
text: With the Great King's will weakened within them, some Guardians now prioritize the Royal Slate more than the revelation.{nl}It's tragic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001828
text: The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are in place.{nl}We can prevent the evil beings from getting near the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001829
text: My wound is deep, so please pass the supplies on for me when you find them.{nl}You can find Kepeck at Apvija Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001830
text: I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the Great King's spell, you need to be more than qualified.{nl}You also need to possess courage and wisdom to release the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001831
text: There's a white oak tree at Zeme Highland.{nl}First, extract some fluids from it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001832
text: Preparations are ongoing to undo the seal at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}Please handle it with care as it is sap collected gradually throughout hundreds of years.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001833
text: This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001834
text: With this sap, I will prepare a crystal that can release the seal.{nl}In the meantime, please collect a bundle of Canyon Amalas at Pamirstas Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001835
text: You need to get one that isn't poisonous.{nl}You may pass out for a while if you get poisoned by it, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001836
text: Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is a real honor for it to be our generation to meet you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001837
text: This is it.{nl}Go to the Broken Pillar Canyon with the Seal Release Crystal.{nl}The Disciples of Gustas will give you a very warm welcome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001838
text: It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one can obtain it.{nl}The chosen one must possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001839
text: Of course our family's men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001840
text: This is a sap that we've collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monsters are after it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001841
text: The day for the Great King's inheritance to find an owner has finally come.{nl}Now, go to the Disciples of Gustas at Broken Pillar Canyon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001842
text: It's very fortunate that Jonas regained consciousness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001843
text: I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the Great King's keys?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001844
text: Alright. Now you need to find the map that indicates the seals' locations.{nl}There has been a lot of false information going around about its location, so you'll have to check {nl}various places.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001845
text: The map is something that should not be in the hands of those demons.{nl}But even I don't know its exact location.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001846
text: Nothing here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001847
text: But, there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map, so please check all those marked places.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001848
text: You found it.{nl}The inheritance of the Great King Zachariel is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001849
text: This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key, you will realize what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001850
text: He isn't breathing because of the poison.{nl}Hurry, borrow some antidote from the other people at Stone Pole Platform.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001851
text: Have you gotten any antidotes yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001852
text: Thank you!{nl}Fortunately, he is breathing again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001853
text: We'll rest a little more and return when he regains his strength.{nl}May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001854
text: The Revelator is here?! Thank the goddess.{nl}I am Rexipher, a historian. I am studying the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001855
text: We already have most of the answers.{nl}But for the last answer, I need to borrow your power as the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001856
text: There are things that only Revelator could see.{nl}The questions from the owner of the tomb...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001857
text: It is so good to meet a person like you, I guess this is divine grace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001858
text: Alright.{nl}The next epitaph is at Serno Highland. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001859
text: I wonder what they tried to protect by building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I'd like to see it with my own eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001860
text: Are you okay?{nl}The next epitaph is at Dykyne Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001861
text: The god is quiet. {nl}I think the tomb will be the same.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001862
text: It was dangerous.{nl}But conversely, we couldn't stop because it was dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001863
text: The next tomb is at the left side of Dykyne Fork.{nl}Is it the fourth tomb? I'm looking forward to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001864
text: What do I want to obtain from the Royal Mausoleum?{nl}That is a secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001865
text: The ordeal of the Great King Zachariel is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have recognized you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001866
text: The last epitaph is at Apatinis Cliff.{nl}I hope the Great King Zachariel will understand our sincerity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001867
text: Soon we should have all clues.{nl}I am looking forward to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001868
text: We finally have all five clues.{nl}Now let us begin the interpretation of these clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001869
text: Is that so...{nl}The clues are covered with something so I can barely see them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001870
text: How about this, can you bring me the teeth of Hogma?{nl}I understand that this will take some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001871
text: I will wait here patiently.{nl}No need to hurry since we have the clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001872
text: Oh, I didn't know I could count on you.{nl}I will see you at Isvalyta Historic Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001873
text: Explained about the writings on the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001874
text: Historian Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001875
text: There was an order to withdraw from here.{nl}I still have many things to research on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001876
text: Are you looking for someone?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001877
text: Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with that name on our list.{nl}You could try asking the other people to see if they know this Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001878
text: I searched the list and asked other people about it, however...{nl} there's no one with the name Rexipher.{nl}I am sorry that I couldn't be of help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001879
text: Rexipher? I am not sure.{nl}Are you sure that's the correct name?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001880
text: He must have a lot of courage if he runs around with the name Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001881
text: Hold on for a minute. I've seen this before from a book.{nl}Wasn't Rexipher a Demon Lord who is part of the army of Baiga, the Demon King?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001882
text: Using the name of a demon, that seems like he doesn't have any good intentions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001883
text: Rexipher?{nl} The one with silver hair, wearing a robe?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001884
text: He is a crazy person who can control monsters.{nl}He's the reason I'm wounded like this, and he also destroyed the altar which I used for research.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001885
text: First, go to the Chesed Altar. {nl}He is also going for the Gedulah Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001886
text: Good. As it should be. {nl}First, destroy the Royal Mausoleum Defense Device at Sesija Entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001887
text: I caused you trouble.. I'm really sorry. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001888
text: We shouldn't be hanging around like this.{nl}We need to go after Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001889
text: The seals that haven't been destroyed yet at the King's Plateau will block Rexipher.{nl}That means you will have enough time to chase after Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001890
text: Please head to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We must find out what Rexipher has in mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001891
text: As Laulas' injuries are severe, I'm here in his stead.{nl}The seal is released, what exactly happened here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001892
text: Dense Mist Plateau. I never even thought of it.{nl}What are they trying to do by releasing the seal?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001893
text: Rexipher will go after the remaining altar.{nl}Go to the Tzedej Altar nearby. It is on the way to Keturka Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001894
text: Ruklys committed treason, so his monument saw prejudice and neglect.{nl}It was broken into five pieces, which all disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001895
text: For now, one thing you could do is to try and find a Stumpy Tree in Balkonas Wilderness.{nl}With a wooden piece from that monster, we can make a divining rod.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001896
text: I believe there is a piece of the monument below Seklus Bridge.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001897
text: The Tree Ambulo that live at Gaisra Hall Site like to collect pieces of stone.{nl}Perhaps the pieces from the monument could be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001898
text: Hmm.. Let's see.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001899
text: {nl}Ah, here it is. I found it.{nl}Now I can string the pieces together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001900
text: We are the Believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001901
text: If it weren't for us, this entire forest would be covered with thorny vines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001902
text: A human controlling monsters... That's the first time I've seen such a thing.{nl}Also, I don't understand why he even broke the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001903
text: The only thing that is known is that it's a seal that's associated to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do by breaking it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001904
text: Please get rid of those Tamas. They've been disturbing me.{nl}Before I even know it, they cluster around and stare at me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001905
text: The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there.{nl}I think probably Tama has swallowed it.{nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001906
text: I argue that a Tama swallowed it. Or do you want to bet?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001907
text: It really exists!{nl}Is it worth a lot? I wonder how much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001908
text: Can you see the good source of money? I mean the fluids from the Stumpy Trees.{nl}How about we make money together?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001909
text: I don't care what's it's used for.{nl}If I can sell it, then I'll be happy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001910
text: You brought a lot.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001911
text: I saw some fragments buried in the ground as I ran away from the Tamas towards the {nl}Crossroads Vacant Lot. I am trying to negotiate a deal with Raymond on those fragments,{nl}could you bring them to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001912
text: It's okay if you quit.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment due to those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001913
text: This is great.{nl}I wonder if I can bring these back?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001914
text: Thanks.{nl}They even appeared in my dreams.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001915
text: I will pray for the goddess to bless you.{nl}You should stop him no matter what.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001916
text: I came here after hearing that her epitaph is here, but it will be difficult to find it all alone.{nl}I hope you can be an ally. Are you interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001917
text: He is the traitor of the Kadumel Era and the owner of Earth Tower.{nl}He was branded as the best swordsman, even when he was young, and many people followed him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001918
text: He lusted for more power, so he started a coup d'etat.{nl}If the great Premier Eminent wasn't around, then history could have turned out much differently.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001919
text: Ruklys and I were taught by the same teacher.{nl}That's why I know what he was trying to achieve.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001920
text: We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001921
text: This is almost like she's praising him. I need to get rid of it.{nl}Carrying something that praises the traitor may get me sent to prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001922
text: The fourth epitaph is at the Shiluma Altar Site and the last epitaph is beyond Griuve Highway. {nl}Let's say farewell here, since I should also check them myself from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001923
text: (You cannot read the rest because the gravestone is damaged.){nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001924
text: As I walked this land as a bystander, I read the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish a revolution,{nl}Lydia Schaffen also formed her forces, and they still remain to this day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001925
text: If you are talking about that epitaph, it was broken a long time ago when monsters attacked it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001926
text: But, I have a rubbing of it.{nl}If you could find my bag for me, then I may tell you about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001927
text: Thanks. As promised, I will tell you what it said.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001928
text: But I was ignorant then.{nl}I too might have believed in furthering only my own, personal goals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001929
text: When you use this collection device on those Stumpy Trees, their sap will be collected inside.{nl}Bring me their sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001930
text: I'll be counting on you. The first and the second epitaphs are located near Virdului Mountain {nl}Cabin. I will give you the necessary tools, so please bring their rubbings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001931
text: May my tower soar towards Goddess Gabija and pass the answers to her.{nl}For that, I will not be like my predecessors and let my personal feelings get in the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001932
text: When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees, they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001933
text: The third epitaph is at Kriakul Brook.{nl}Let's continue the rubbings with that epitaph.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001934
text: I got my bag back with your help so I will help you again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001935
text: Go to Pelena Site. {nl}On the way there, there is the next epitaph you are looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001936
text: Let's see, it may take some time to put them together.{nl}Can you take care of the monsters nearby while I focus on this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001937
text: Well done.{nl}It took a while because there was this small piece...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001938
text: It must be terrible to be remembered as a traitor.{nl}Even though he was a respected swordsman, the monument mourning him was shoddily built.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001939
text: They even casted magic on the monument after it was broken into pieces.{nl}It's hard to find those pieces because of the monsters that were affected by that magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001940
text: Ah, That's the thing I ordered.{nl}It finally came.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001941
text: Don't you want to know what to do with it?{nl}I will call the powerful spirit from Dumbliu Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001942
text: Thanks.{nl}It will take some time to dry the waterweed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001943
text: It should be quite the experience. Look forward to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001944
text: I need a live creature to sacrifice to complete this spell.{nl}The Lizardmen on the way to Dumbliu Pond will work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001945
text: The spirits are mischievous and primitive.{nl}The Lizardmen will work wonders for the experiment since they are very fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001946
text: The Lizardmen that you sent to me were really lively.{nl}We are almost done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001947
text: Infroburks play an important role in this spell too.{nl}I will give you a stone that controls their minds, please bring me some Infroburk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001948
text: The Infroburk you brought me are not enough.{nl}Please try harder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001949
text: Well done.{nl}This will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001950
text: Thank you for making your way here. {nl} I am Knight Commander Uska and I am in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001951
text: The Bishop told me to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine as soon as they arrive. {nl} The goddess told him in his dreams that the evidence of salvation would be found there. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001952
text: The monsters there are unspeakably dangerous so please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001953
text: All right. {nl} Oh, do not forget to offer worship to the Goddess Statue before you leave. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001954
text: Also, drop by the Item Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001955
text: Seems like you're really curious.{nl}Okay. Bring me some waterweed that grows at Kriakul Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001956
text: Please use this stone on the Lizardmen.{nl}Once you gain control of one, it will run to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001957
text: The Kadumel Era was a period of turbulence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001958
text: Kadumel the Tyrant, Premier Eminent the Chancellor, and Maven's disciples...{nl}They all lived extraordinary lives.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001959
text: There are many artifacts here that praise the heroes of that time.{nl}And there are countless side stories about them as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001960
text: When you use the stone on Infroburks and defeat them, they will automatically come to me.{nl}I will look forward to getting them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001961
text: She is the most impressive archer in history.{nl}She defeated Ruklys, who was a traitor and a great swordsman, with a single arrow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001962
text: That's why there are archers who are willing to put large sums of silver into purchasing items {nl}that are related to her. She is like a goddess to us archers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001963
text: There was a priest named Maven in the past.{nl}He is the person who built the Great Cathedral.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001964
text: Maven lived for a long time and had three disciples.{nl}The first one was Ruklys and the second one was Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001965
text: And when Lydia Schaffen grew old, Agailla Flurry became the last disciple.{nl}As the other two disciples were, Agailla Flurry was a great person.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001966
text: She learned all the magic that existed then.{nl}She also built the Mage Tower. What an amazing woman she must've been.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001967
text: Our old man always complains.{nl}Even when I give him the best things, he complains.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001968
text: He always complains, so I don't want to help him.{nl}Sorry, but can you tell that old man there how I feel?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001969
text: When he first came here, he had a hard time adapting to the new environment.{nl}I used to cook him food and make him clothes...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001970
text: Why didn't Cahill come here, and why are you saying that?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Are you finished?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001971
text: Hey. Since you came, please do some errands for me.{nl}You see that pile of lumber over there? Bring me the good ones among them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001972
text: Cahill is helpful. {nl}Except for his complaints..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001973
text: What?! Can't you find more decent ones?{nl}Well... that's still okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001974
text: Please give these crutches I made to Cahill.{nl}Well, where oh where did Cahill hurt his ankle...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001975
text: Get outta here before I change my mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001976
text: Crutches from Old Man Moses...{nl}I really don't know what he is thinking.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001977
text: I didn't say it's over.{nl}Please get me the leather of Flying Frogs near this camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001978
text: Why would an old man like me be trying to figure out what this does?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001979
text: Darn, it's worse than the lumber that you brought me just a while ago{nl}Wait, I haven't told you to leave yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001980
text: Believer Domas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001981
text: I am going to burn the thorny vines that are blocking the road.{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001982
text: Please get me some Thornball Remains first. {nl}There are many of them at Geisma Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001983
text: There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous and it is at Thorny Pillar Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001984
text: Now is the time to defeat it.{nl}We spent a long time finding it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001985
text: Fire will never catch on the thorny vines here.{nl}And I don't want to touch them due to their evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001986
text: Good job.{nl}I was worried that you would get hurt, but I guess I underestimated you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001987
text: Four years ago, this forest was normal.{nl}But it has became like this ever since Bramble went deep into the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001988
text: Who'd have thought that they would be using the power of our own altar?{nl}I don't know how I can face the goddess now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001989
text: Believer Bronius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001990
text: I only survived because of you.{nl}I should warn the other Believers to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001991
text: Believer Jurga

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001992
text: I can feel Bramble is suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001993
text: You're the Savior the goddess sent. What an honor. {nl}Are you ready to fight Bramble?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001994
text: You'll need to be prepared if you want to defeat Bramble. {nl}First, take this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001995
text: It will be hard for Bramble to recover now.{nl}We can save the dying trees as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001996
text: Try to hold it in even if it's dirty. {nl}This is the best I can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001997
text: You found the revelation. {nl}Are you hurt? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001998
text: Bramble. {nl}The poor thing was trying to go against its foreseen fate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_001999
text: Old Man of Andale Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002000
text: So you're the one who wants to meet Goddess Saule. {nl} If you're here about the pond, don't worry. Our priest is working on it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002001
text: The priest is at Cerpe Crossroads. {nl}I heard he needed Black Maize Venom, so try getting that to him as a gift.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002002
text: We would have never been able to see the portal even in our dreams if it wasn't for you. {nl}You truly are God's grace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002003
text: Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002004
text: Aren't these Black Maize Venom? {nl}Oh, thank you very much! {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002005
text: You can count on me on helping you meet Goddess Saule. {nl}Now that the Holy Pond has been purified, we just need to solve the problem with the Obelisk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002006
text: Magic letters are carved on the Obelisk. {nl}But some letters were erased since the Holy Pond became corrupted. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002007
text: If the letters are gone, then we will need to write them back on. {nl}Now that you've collected the Black Maize Venom, we will need White Oak Sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002008
text: I think we'll be able to meet Goddess Saule. We just need to restore the Obelisk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002009
text: Bring that venom to the Village Priest at Cerpe Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002010
text: I see you've completed making the dye. {nl}Now go and draw in new letters according to the faint patterns left on the Obelisk. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002011
text: The Obelisk is located at Slepingas Stream.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002012
text: I'm sure the goddesses will be very pleased with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002013
text: You're almost done. {nl}After completing the rituals to cleanse your body, you will be able to meet the goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002014
text: Let us head on the road to the right to Indigo Trees Plateau.{nl}The village priest is awaiting your arrival.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002015
text: Use this tranquilizer on the Black Maize and extract its venom. {nl}The Maizes need to be weakened for the tranquilizer to work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002016
text: Thank you! {nl}By the way, what was that vibration?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002017
text: Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002018
text: You're the Revelator, right? {nl}Upents are preying on the village so we can't hold the ritual right now. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002019
text: I'm thinking about making bombs from Languid Herbs. {nl}Please bring me Languid Herbs from Narvas Curved Path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002020
text: It is safe where the Languid Herb blooms so do not worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002021
text: Glad you're back safely. {nl}Did any monsters attack?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002022
text: Please get the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers in Dvyni Wetland too. {nl}Languid Herbs alone will not be effective enough. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002023
text: I hope we'll be successful this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002024
text: I'll do the ritual right away if we can get rid of the Upents.{nl}So hurry and get me the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002025
text: That'll do. {nl}I'll send the materials to the elderly, please go and get the explosives.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002026
text: Andale Village Headman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002027
text: Explosives? Ah. {nl}Go to the warehouse lot at the upper side of the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002028
text: It's probably in one of the bigger barrels. {nl}Don't worry, they won't explode.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002029
text: Don't worry, it's safe. They will not explode.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002030
text: It was in a small barrel? {nl}I must be getting old and mixed up. {nl}Normal people would have been incinerated, but for a Revelator, it's different.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002031
text: Combine the ingredients at the Thorn Tree Altar once you have gathered them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002032
text: God or goddess, their title isn't really important. {nl}Eventually, aren't we all just one being? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002033
text: Is this hard to comprehend? {nl}You will understand it one day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002034
text: Here, this is a Languid Herb Bomb. {nl}Take it to Melaginags Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002035
text: Hurry now.{nl}We can finally end it this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002036
text: This time, it can finally come to an end.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002037
text: Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002038
text: It's too complicated so I'll explain it later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002039
text: Now gather me some Sap from Coliflowers near Rajuma Curved Path.{nl}The parts covered in sap are highly flammable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002040
text: Is it alright to walk over the Goddess Statue?'{nl}I wouldn't mind it. Why do you ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002041
text: It will be hard without Coliflower Sap because of the rain.{nl}Who knows how long it will keep raining?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002042
text: Well done.{nl}This will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002043
text: Using this, we can burn the thorny vines blocking the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}You should be able to ignite them even in the rain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002044
text: Go up a bit more to get to the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}It was a real honor to meet you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002045
text: You're the Revelator right? {nl}A very ominous voice is looking for you, so please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002046
text: Have you seen my ring?{nl}If you see my ring, please bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002047
text: My ring is full of divine energy so it will be hard for monsters to swallow it.{nl}Unless the monster is big.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002048
text: You found my ring! {nl}Thanks. Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002049
text: The priests are having hard time due to thorny vines.{nl}Can you help them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002050
text: I will write down the process for you.{nl}How about you start by recharging the mana of the magic crystal?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002051
text: Okay, show me that you can overcome anything with your faith, such as facing those thorny vines.{nl}You can't call yourself a Believer if you are faint-hearted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002052
text: The first place I felt the evil energy is Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}It is such a strong aura that it will probably continue to be like this even if Bramble is defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002053
text: I don't know if it's the thorny vines or the evil energy, but... {nl}this forest makes people very depressed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002054
text: I personally believe that one day this forest will be okay again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002055
text: Are you okay?{nl}I almost lost my consciousness due to that voice.{nl}Who is he anyways...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002056
text: The evil energy is growing in Fallen Worry Forest, and our believers are growing wary.{nl}I would be very grateful if you will be able to help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002057
text: The evil energy is becoming stronger and the Believers are getting tired. The situation is bad

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002058
text: Thanks.{nl}I wonder what would have happened if you weren't here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002059
text: While the Merog Shamans are performing their rituals, you might have a chance to try something.{nl}Can you take care of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002060
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}Now the demons won't be able to act so freely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002061
text: I did not know those demons could use summoning crystals.{nl}They may overwhelm us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002062
text: I want to study the Demon Summoning Circle that has been emanating evil energy and {nl}summoning demons over there. It's a precious sample, so please go gentle so you don't {nl}break much of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002063
text: We should be able to find a way to use it.{nl}Those demons used our altars, so we can use theirs too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002064
text: Believer Onute

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002065
text: The shamans are trying to summon Archon.{nl}It should frighten them if you can defeat Archon and destroy their summoning circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002066
text: Thanks.{nl}They will not be able to attack us easily now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002067
text: Thanks.{nl}The Believers are distributed to their areas so find them and help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002068
text: If you don't have anything to do here, then it would be best to leave this place as soon as possible.{nl}It's no good for a person who doesn't know how to purify to stay here for too long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002069
text: Maybe this entire forest has become the origin of the evil energy of the Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}I hope that I am just being overly anxious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002070
text: Goddess Saule would not want the evil energy spreading to other forests. {nl}Therefore, we're here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002071
text: It angers me to see those filthy demons freely roaming around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002072
text: I gave up a long time ago since I can't see an end to that evil energy.{nl}I just think of it as my destiny.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002073
text: Now we just need to find out the Merogs' plan.{nl}Until then, please defeat those shamans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002074
text: Goddess Saule said to absolutely not speak of our presence. {nl}She said it would only bring further chaos to the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002075
text: This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002076
text: This will only end once the origin of the evil energy {nl}located in the depths of Fallen Worry Forest is removed.{nl}It is vexing to see that everyone seems to be so short-sighted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002077
text: I am okay about the sample so just break it so that it won't activate.{nl}I am gonna take a look at it myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002078
text: I get angry every time I enter that Thorn Forest.{nl}How could such dirty things happen to the goddess' sacred forest?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002079
text: Help me. Merogs are after me.{nl}When they are grouped up like that, I can't face them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002080
text: Great. {nl}Now we're going to destroy the roots of Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002081
text: Believer Samantha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002082
text: Whenever I try to purify the Thornbush Rest Place, those monsters attack.{nl}Is there some way to avoid them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002083
text: Monsters are becoming more violent as they enter deeper into the forest of thorns.{nl}Maybe that is because of the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002084
text: Now I can relax and purify Thornbush Rest Place.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002085
text: I think I can count on you.{nl}Please protect the altar until the fountain is purified.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002086
text: Put Merog saliva in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the muddy energy of Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002087
text: Bramble is trying to recover by ingraining his roots around the Thorn Forest. {nl}Cutting those roots will hurt him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002088
text: You mustn't let your guard down, even if Bramble is weakened. {nl}After all, it is a Demon Lord, no matter how injured it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002089
text: Now we can make a full-scale attack on Bramble. {nl}I'll go on ahead to Giliaii Courtyard to keep an eye on Bramble, please come along.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002090
text: The most important roots are at Sviesa Hill Areas and Tankinta Vacant Lot. {nl}Cut them both.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002091
text: Even after all of the vicious energy is removed, this forest will remain as it is.{nl}But someday, we will also end that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002092
text: Believer Kazis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002093
text: The Honeypin is hidden somewhere in Karadas Path, but I can't find it. {nl}My purification duties has been delayed because of that monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002094
text: You will need to activate the Altar of Purification.{nl}Do this without letting the Honeypin know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002095
text: Are you hurt?{nl}I heard the sound of Honeypin's webs, but I am relieved to see you are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002096
text: Bramble and the revelation are in the depths of Giliaii Courtyard. {nl}It must be agonizing since the roots for healing the scars have all been cut off.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002097
text: Don't forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in its evil energy. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002098
text: Don't forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in its evil energy. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002099
text: If you feel that you are close to danger, quickly run away.{nl}The place is more dangerous due to the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002100
text: This is the worst part of Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Not only because of the concentration of evil energy, {nl}but your safety cannot be guaranteed either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002101
text: I am not afraid of dying.{nl}The Goddess Saule will guide me well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002102
text: Achat is the faithful Guardian of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But, once it gets corrupted, it will never return to its original state.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002103
text: Broken Royal Mausoleum Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002104
text: Guardian Shnayim.{nl}Defeat the intruder who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002105
text: Royal Mausoleum Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002106
text: The Guardians will cause a disturbance when the magic that flows in the Royal Mausoleum gets disrupted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002107
text: Royal Mausoleum Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002108
text: Once a Guardian gets corrupted, it can never come back to its original status.{nl}Eternal slumber will be the only fate for that Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002109
text: Corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002110
text: Anyone who disturbs the King's rest will meet their end here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002111
text: Destruction by the Revelator is a preferable alternative to corruption by the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002112
text: The name of the Revelator has been erased and only the demon's name remains.{nl}You must protect yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002113
text: I have recieved orders from Goddess Saule to keep a close eye on Bramble.{nl}He is the source of all evil beings in this forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002114
text: It was a real honor to meet you.{nl}I will pray to Goddess Saule that your future be blessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002115
text: Do not disturb Zachariel's rest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002116
text: I told you that there's an way to block those demons at Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002117
text: I pray that the goddess can endure until then.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002118
text: Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002119
text: I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor.{nl}There is a Flame Vapor with magic possesed in it at the reading room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002120
text: You should search for it hard.{nl}The Flame Vapor is not clearly visible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002121
text: This is enough. Well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002122
text: Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002123
text: First, unleash the Flame Vapor from Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the Flame Vapor will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that in the jar. Okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002124
text: Don't worry. It won't explode or hurt you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002125
text: Hew.. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002126
text: I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002127
text: Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002128
text: Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002129
text: Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002130
text: We must succeed...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002131
text: So this is the Jewel of Prominence... I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabija. There's stairs to go up on the right side.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002132
text: To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002133
text: The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of demons' lord, Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002134
text: It's embarrassing, but I am also tricked and captured causing to lose my strength. {nl} Please destroy the magic circles imprisoning me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002135
text: The binding magic circles are located in Drugys Courtyard and in Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002136
text: Thank you for saving me. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002137
text: I am Saule, goddess of the sun. {nl}Everything is just like how Laima has foreseen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002138
text: Thank you. But this is not the only barrier imprisoning me in here. {nl}We've got to find the inspetor, Clymen, hiding in between the gap of dimensions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002139
text: Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Grand Corridor. {nl}I will try to use the divine power that dwell in the tool.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002140
text: Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002141
text: Now I'll focus my efforts on finding Clymen.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you could stifle the evil energy a little by dealing with the demons nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002142
text: Just a little bit more. Please suppress the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002143
text: I sense Clymen's presence at Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Hurry and go deal with him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002144
text: That is the key. {nl}Please free me from this cage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002145
text: Thank you in the name of Saule, goddess of the Sun. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002146
text: It's a shame but the revelation is in the hands of Bramble. {nl} The reason he imprisoned me instead of killing me is to use my divinity to interpret the revelation. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002147
text: But the Bramble is also not in its normal condition due to the previous battle. {nl} Please stop the Bramble in the gateway with my Believers and get the revelation back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002148
text: Please show me the revelation. And I will show you its meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002149
text: If there are any shrine offering tools around that still contains divine energy, then we can {nl}surely use them to find Clymen. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002150
text: Lyliana

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002151
text: I wish I could meet my family that lives on Indigo Tree Plateau. {nl}I... I also wish I could apologize to my brother about the big arguement we had.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002152
text: I really want to know how my family is doing, but I'm too scared of the monsters to go back. {nl}I just ran out of the house and now I regret it a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002153
text: I remember singing with my brother as we dipped our feet into a stream on Indigo Tree Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002154
text: I just feel sorry to my brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002155
text: Old Man of Andale Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002156
text: God looks after our village, so the water is clear. The air is fresh. And there are no disasters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002157
text: So the Revelator has finally come.{nl}Very healthy and reliable. This time, we can do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002158
text: Aren't you the Revelator? {nl}So, what brings you to our village? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002159
text: Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002160
text: The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002161
text: The Tanus in Zvelgian Vacant Lot carry Purifying Stones. {nl}They will be able to purify the Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002162
text: Just like there are many demons, the same goes for the goddesses. {nl}The five goddesses are the only ones who became well known.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002163
text: Our village serves the Goddess Saule, who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot through the portal, but one day that portal closed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002164
text: I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002165
text: When I gained my consciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002166
text: Carvers should be careful not to exaggerate their skills. They should be humble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002167
text: It is a good sign that you, the Revelator, came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002168
text: Please come to our village.{nl}The villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002169
text: It was through God's guidance that we were able to meet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002170
text: Please refrain from thinking about any suffering. We have all received a blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002171
text: Believe in God.{nl}We can become one with the tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002172
text: We will be saved by sticking together.{nl}Because God told us to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002173
text: Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002174
text: I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002175
text: That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002176
text: Demon Lord Bramble can never be forgiven.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002177
text: Bramble must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the Believers at Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002178
text: Please be careful of the Beholder's tricks at Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002179
text: I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002180
text: The Mausoleum you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002181
text: It seems that the rain just won't stop. In fact, it rarely stops.{nl}Do you think this is because of the evil energy?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002182
text: These thorny vines just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's still better to cut them than leave them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002183
text: Even if Bramble disappears, I think things are going to stay like this for a while.{nl}The entire forest is covered with thorny vines. They are gigantic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002184
text: You seem to live up to your reputation. {nl}The people in our village just cowardly hope that the goddess will take care of everything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002185
text: By the way, did you see a young man from our village? {nl}I told him to go check if the portal is working, but I have not heard from him since then.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002186
text: Thank you. {nl}The portal is at Nugria Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002187
text: Injured Villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002188
text: Thank you for saving me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002189
text: So you're the Revelator the headman spoke about. {nl}I'm fine, please check the portal up at the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002190
text: The portal can be opened from the altar at Nugria Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002191
text: It doesn't work? {nl}Well, that's going to be a big problem. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002192
text: Could you let the elder of Rhombuspaving Dale know instead of me?{nl}It's a short ways up to the left from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002193
text: That portal is... a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl}Opening the portal is very important.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002194
text: My injuries are not that severe, don't worry. Please go on ahead and check the portal at the {nl}sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002195
text: I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}But first, the portal...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002196
text: Ah, so you are the Revelator!{nl}It's a real honor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002197
text: Monsters are trying to attack us, but we can't just abandon our purification duties.{nl}Goddess Saule gave us our duties.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002198
text: The most important roots should be somewhere in Fallen Worry Forest, {nl}but we must have been poking around the forest too much.{nl}We could put a damper on the forest's growth if only we could cut it off.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002199
text: We want to live quietly serving Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002200
text: Royal Mausoleum Guardian Stone Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002201
text: The Order of the Royal Mausoleum is being disrupted by the evil presence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002202
text: Guardian Stone Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002203
text: It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002204
text: We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002205
text: It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002206
text: Wheelen! Oh, my faithful Guardians...{nl}If the chosen one comes here, do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002207
text: Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But if their loyalty is to our enemies, they are worthless.{nl}Dogs that are unable to protect the Royal Mausoleum shall lose their leash with the king's {nl}name on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002208
text: Demonstration of Might! Does it sound beautiful..? {nl}Creating the gigantic guardians was what most satisfied the Great King Zachariel. {nl}Only those who defeat the guardians can acquire the royal treasure he hid inside them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002209
text: Guardian Stone Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002210
text: Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002211
text: Broker between life and death for humans. {nl}That's what Bokor is, if you ask.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002212
text: You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002213
text: There's no Long-Branched Tree head in here. Should I tell them to get it themselves?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002214
text: Klaipeda is a small and quiet town. {nl}We haven't had this many people come to town before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002215
text: Did the goddess mention her whereabouts in a dream of revelation?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002216
text: Go on ahead to Klaipeda. {nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you at the Central Plaza.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002217
text: I heard the bishop also had a dream about a goddess, so it might have something to do with that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002218
text: Speaking of that girl. {nl}She simply appeared in our village some time ago. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002219
text: She didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl}She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food, but then the Vubbes came {nl}to the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002220
text: And you saw that the girl was imprisoned with us just a while ago. {nl}Do you think she has a family? She never said anything the entire time. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002221
text: If I was a parent, I probably would be bawling while searching for my daughter. {nl}Parents nowadays are really irresponsible, don't you think? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002222
text: The girl really did not speak at all. {nl}Furthermore, the fact that a young lady all grown up walked barefooted all the way to this remote {nl}village. Doesn't that seem strange to you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002223
text: Can we go home...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002224
text: I want to go home soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002225
text: I am curious about the girl said to have broken the seal as well.{nl}This is not a seal that can be easily broken.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002226
text: Husband of a Refugee Family

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002227
text: I ran away with my wife to avoid the monsters.{nl}Goddess Zemyna is protecting us, but I don't know how long she can hold out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002228
text: Oh, the Accessory Merchant said she has a gift for you. {nl}Would you mind visiting her?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002229
text: You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002230
text: Accessory Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002231
text: Nice to meet you! Are you the Revelator chasing the dream of the goddess? {nl}I'd like to give you this accessory as a present. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002232
text: If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}I hope this will be useful for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002233
text: You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you head straight to the left from here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002234
text: Ah, I was waiting for you.{nl}Are you the person chosen by the Eyes of the Great King Zachariel?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002235
text: Welcome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002236
text: Oh, it seems like you have some Jukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl}Can you share some with me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002237
text: Thank you very much. {nl}I want to treat the injured in our village but I don't have enough materials to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002238
text: I know you are doing your best but I will need more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002239
text: I still need more Jukopus Leaves and Kepa Stems. {nl}But I don't want to just take them from you. How about trading it with the potions I have?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002240
text: Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002241
text: Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002242
text: Jukopus and Kepas appear around the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002243
text: Hey, are you going to take on those Vubbes? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002244
text: Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, and Vubbe Thief.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002245
text: Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus, and Vubbe Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002246
text: I'll give you the recipe so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002247
text: I am looking for medicines to cure the injured.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002248
text: Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002249
text: Oh, here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002250
text: Ordinary Man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002251
text: This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002252
text: Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002253
text: (You see bone fragments in the well.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002254
text: I'm both furious and upset. {nl}If only we had gotten here sooner, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002255
text: Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you recover my comrades' mementos?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002256
text: It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. {nl}How awful...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002257
text: Thank you. {nl}My comrades may now be able to rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002258
text: Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all our food supplies. {nl}They even took our food for today... Please help us, we need your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002259
text: They stole the food meant for both the army and the residents. {nl}What will we do if we can't get our food back.. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002260
text: Thank you. {nl}This will at least get us through the next few days.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002261
text: Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more mementos that need to be retrieved. {nl}My comrades will be unable to rest in peace without them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002262
text: So please help us. {nl}If you can return the rest of the mementos to us, we will provide compensation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002263
text: Thank you, but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002264
text: We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002265
text: It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002266
text: Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002267
text: We survived the immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl}Could you help us out a bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002268
text: I'm enraged thinking about the Vubbes who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002269
text: Thank you. {nl}We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002270
text: Fedimian Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002271
text: I heard that Sir Maven, who built the Great Cathedral, left five necklaces.{nl}I also heard that the one who collects those five necklaces will possess a great power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002272
text: Hey, if you are planning to continue your journey, don't get close to the Cursed City.{nl}It didn't receive a blessing at all on Medzio Diena. You will turn into stone if you get too close to {nl}that city.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002273
text: It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002274
