text: The Great Cathedral, built by Maven, is beyond the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry are all his disciples.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002275
text: The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on Medzio Diena, so I wonder if people {nl}still go there. Back then, a great number of people would go there to do various rituals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002276
text: They call the trail to the Great Cathedral, the Pilgrim's Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002277
text: Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002278
text: Klaipeda Peddler

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002279
text: I came all the way from Klaipeda to pray.{nl}That another disaster never occurs, and that my son{nl}who joined the army will be able to come back and see me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002280
text: My husband and I come here to pray every time we come here from Klaipeda.{nl}I know the goddess protected us during Medzio Diena,{nl}but I hope she can hear out at least one of my wishes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002281
text: Don't you ever think about going to the Great Cathedral.{nl}Even if you prepare for the dangers due to its deterioration...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002282
text: Yes. If you want to go to the Great Cathedral, you have to go through the impassable Pilgrim's {nl}Way. You see... the spirits of fallen Pilgrims haunt the area. They probably prey on passing {nl}travelers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002283
text: Vubbe Tokens, Panto Horns, Merog Hearts, and Hogma Teeth. {nl}That is a lot of stuff!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002284
text: The reward that you'll obtained are not to be boasted about.{nl}On that note, let's continue with our bet?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002285
text: I'd say the monsters at Owl Burial Ground should prove to be a fairly equal wager for you.{nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002286
text: Haha, I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here, it's your reward as promised.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002287
text: I have buried a Revelator once in the past.{nl}He burdened the goddess and placed too much faith in his abilities.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002288
text: It's frightening to think that blunder happened at all.{nl}I don't even know if I will have to bury another Revelator in the future... {nl}We both may never know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002289
text: Are you proud of your skills as you talk to me at this moment while time passes?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002290
text: If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002291
text: Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002292
text: Without the blessing from the goddess, you would probably be with the goddess now too.{nl}Nonetheless, a lot of people are already like without such blessing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002293
text: The Chapparition of Remaining Tree Dale has claimed many lives.{nl}Dispose of that abomination in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002294
text: We can't revive the people who died by the Chapparitions.{nl}I feel sorry, but we can't just do nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002295
text: Innocent Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002296
text: Do not be surprised. {nl}For sure, there is something to given before returning to the goddesses. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002297
text: I want to apologize to my sister who left the house because of me but now I can't even do that. {nl}Can you find my sister for me and give her this necklace?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002298
text: My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl}Where is my brother?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002299
text: Innocent Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002300
text: You are new here. Defeat all monsters nearby on my behalf.{nl}I can't move somehow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002301
text: Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best, newcomer...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002302
text: Errand Man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002303
text: What. This isn't the Ripper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you'll soon be cursed to death. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002304
text: Wait a minute. No. No. {nl}Delivering this letter will just make it bounce back to you.{nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the {nl}letter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002305
text: A letter for me? I wonder what's in it... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002306
text: A curse? Oh I get it, I get it alright!{nl}I'll give you his money, so please tell him to not curse me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002307
text: huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002308
text: Oh, I really am thankful for your help the other time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002309
text: But, uh, I'm too hungry and I don't have the energy to go back to the captain. {nl}If you have anything to eat, can you share some, please?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002310
text: Oh, thank you so much! {nl}I'll take this to recover and return to the commander for sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002311
text: The young birds... they remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't want ever see him. Even in my dreams.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002312
text: Hmm, alright. I have accessories that will fit.{nl}I don't need them anymore so I want to give them to you if you could take care of the {nl}monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002313
text: Not done yet?{nl}They'll will fit on you nicely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002314
text: Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002315
text: Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002316
text: I'm sorry, but could you burn the funeral ode in front of an epitaph at Dense Mist Plateau?{nl}I'd say that you would be the most well suited to calm their {nl}spirits as you have explored the gorge regions from top to bottom.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002317
text: The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002318
text: Thank you. {nl}Our scholars will not forget him either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002319
text: Yes. The Revelator who said the same things lies at rest here.{nl}If you can survive after facing nearby monsters for 2 minutes, then I'll think better of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002320
text: From now on, be careful when using shared equipment. Nonetheless, an impressive show of strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002321
text: Well... just looking at it leaves me at loss for words. {nl}Was it really this fragile...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002322
text: This isn't good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002323
text: Deal with all the monsters that you can at Owl Burial Ground before you return.{nl}How about 40 of them? I'll bet that you can't do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002324
text: I will pray for that monster.{nl}If it even has a soul to listen to my prayer...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002325
text: Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl}He also probably won't know where I am too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002326
text: I cannot leave until I have completed the mission...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002327
text: He is so stupid. {nl}He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than get on my nerves. {nl}Hmm. Maybe I am belittling myself too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002328
text: Don't act like you know me! {nl}It's not my fault. Everything is because of him!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002329
text: Is it ready yet?{nl}I could eat anything to recover right now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002330
text: Frankly, I'm afraid of what the world will turn into.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002331
text: Cyrenia Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002332
text: Hmm.. where is this place?{nl}What about Rexipher? Where is he?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002333
text: Oh? The woman. I forgot.{nl}I will release her as promised. Do try to keep her alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002334
text: Sincerity is our strength. {nl}There will be no problems if you sincerely believe and follow the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002335
text: My throat hurts.. I think being confined in there damaged my throat. {nl}I wonder about the girl who was with us? Where did she go?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002336
text: Aren't you the Revelator who saved us last time? {nl}We were more than glad to see you back then.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002337
text: The goddess must have sent you.{nl}If you didn't come... we'd be already... It's too scary to think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002338
text: It was horrible in captivity. {nl}The Vubbes would come and smelled us.. {nl}and make us dig here and there using pickaxes..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002339
text: Rexipher... Was he really a demon?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002340
text: You saved us. Thank you so much. {nl}But I have a question for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002341
text: Healing magic. {nl}Can normal people easily do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002342
text: Okay but listen to my story a little. {nl}When I was taken to the mine, I injured my knee. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002343
text: But a girl touched my knee and the pain was gone. {nl}Even the wound disappeared. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002344
text: Strange huh? I made her a flower ring to give to her. {nl}But I don't know where she's went.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002345
text: Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002346
text: Strange Sack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002347
text: Found a letter in the sack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002348
text: The letter in the sack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002349
text: Receiver: Drasius{nl}Address: Virdului Mountain Cabin{nl}I am sending you the head of the Long-Branched Tree that you ordered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002350
text: 400 years would have passed by the time this revelation reaches you. {nl}Thank you in advance for your continued pursuit of finding this revelation. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002351
text: As I'm sure the demons will prey on the revelation, I will leave this revelation in the hands of {nl}Rimgaudas, the first Paladin. If you find this revelation, it would mean that he had done an {nl}excellent job in fulfilling his mission. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002352
text: The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl}Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002353
text: There are two Demon Kings and one Demon Queen with many Demon Lords to serve them.{nl}Giltine is the one that rules over them all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002354
text: All these catastrophes are her plans. {nl}The disasters will continue and at the end of it will be the end of the human race. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002355
text: My ability to see all of this have made my existence threatening to them. {nl}That's why Giltine is attempting to send me back to the world's waters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002356
text: Also, they will extend their evil powers to the goddesses who go against their will. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002357
text: Now disasters are happening just as I saw them to be. {nl}But it also means that hope, which I saw further away, will also definitely come. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002358
text: Dear Savior, our sister Saule is losing her light. {nl}Reach her light at the iridescent valley and you will be guided to the next revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002359
text: Revelation of Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002360
text: Dear Savior, {nl}in order for me to regain my whole appearance and stop the demons, {nl}you must find all the revelations hidden in the axis of all times. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_002361
text: But only you and I can save the world. {nl}I will wait for you in the high gardens.

text: Go to the Hanaming habitat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003883
text: Go to the Hanaming habitat and quickly complete the Battle Commander's assignment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003884
text: Collect Hanaming Petals to investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003885
text: Collect petals from Hanamings to complete the Battle Commander's assignment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003886
text: Give the Hanaming Petals to the Battle Commander

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003887
text: Return to the Battle Commander and give him the Hanaming Petals, so you can be relieved sooner to go to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003888
text: Collect %s to investigate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003889
text: Talk to the Battle Commander. Something dubious seems to have happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003890
text: Scout the dangerous looking area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003891
text: Go check on the Battle Commander's troop, and take care of anything unusual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003892
text: Report to the Battle Commander

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003893
text: It appears that the root of the chaos in the Western Woods was from the Golem that you just defeated. Tell the Battle Commander about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003894
text: Defeat Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003895
text: The Search Scout seems to be in trouble. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003896
text: Defeat the Large Kepa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003897
text: Defeat the Large Kepa in the area that the Search Scout mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003898
text: Return to the Search Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003899
text: Return to the Search Scout and tell him that the Large Kepa was defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003900
text: Talk to Knight Commander Uska

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003901
text: Knight Commander Uska is looking for people who came to Klaipeda after witnessing the dream of the goddess. Meet Sir Uska and tell him about the Dream of Revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003902
text: Knight Commander Uska is looking for people who came to Klaipeda after witnessing the dream of the goddess. Meet Sir Uska and tell him about the Dream of Revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003903
text: When ready, talk to Sir Uska about going to the Crystal Mine as told by the goddess in the bishop's dream.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003904
text: Go to the Eastern Woods Base Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003905
text: The Eastern Woods Base Camp seems to be in danger because of monster accumulation. Let's go and have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003906
text: Defeat the Poata in the Eastern Woods Base Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003907
text: Poata appeared to defend the Baby Poata. Defeat the Poata that suddenly appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003908
text: Talk to Knight Aras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003909
text: You defeated the Poata threatening Aras. Report back to him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003910
text: Defeat the Poata that raided the outpost

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003911
text: Get permission from Knight Aras to enter Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003912
text: Ask Knight Aras for permission to enter the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003913
text: Defeat the Pokubus at the farm

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003914
text: You have to accept Aras' proposal to help his troops in order to go to the Miners' Village. First, defeat the Pokubus that occupy the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003915
text: Report to Aras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003916
text: Report to Aras that you have defeated the Pokubus, one of the assignments for going to the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003917
text: Listen to the Sentinel's Chupacabra extermination plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003918
text: Let's help the Sentinel exterminate Chupacabras who threaten the troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003919
text: Hunt Chupacabras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003920
text: Walk around the woods and defeat the Chupacabras endangering the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003921
text: Return and report to the Sentinel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003922
text: Report to the Eastern Woods Sentinel that the Chupacabras have been exterminated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003923
text: Listen to the Sentinel about the Supplies Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003924
text: Listen to the Sentinel about the monster that attacked the Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003925
text: Reclaim the Supplies Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003926
text: Defeat the monsters occupying the Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003927
text: Report back to the Outpost Sentinel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003928
text: Report to Outpost Sentinel that you've taken back the Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003929
text: Defeat the Chupacabras in the Supplies Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003930
text: Obtain information about Chupacabras from the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003931
text: Listen to the information about Chupacabras from the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003932
text: Defeat the Large Gray Chupacabras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003933
text: Large Gray Chupacabras appeared after you defeated a Chupacabra. Defeat the Large Gray Chupacabras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003934
text: Report back to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003935
text: Report to the Supply Officer that you defeated the Large Gray Chupacabras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003936
text: Defeat the Large Gray Chupacabras that appears from defeating a Chupacabra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003937
text: Talk to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003938
text: Seems like the Supply Officer is in trouble. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003939
text: Move to the marked location

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003940
text: Track the trails of the Weaver in the marked area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003941
text: Defeat Weaver and report to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003942
text: Defeat Weaver

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003943
text: Talk to Aras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003944
text: Talk about what to do next in order to enter the Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003945
text: Collect a clue from Popolions

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003946
text: In order for Aras to permit you to enter the Crystal Mine, defeat Popolions and find some clues why the number of monsters has increased.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003947
text: Give the Piece of Vubbe Cloth to the Operations Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003948
text: Found a Piece of Vubbe Cloth. Can this be a clue? Give it to the Operations Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003949
text: Talk to the Operations Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003950
text: The Operations Officer seems to have realized something with the Vubbe Cloth. {nl}Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003951
text: Investigate the upper area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003952
text: The Operations Officer says there are used to be no Vubbes in the Eastern Woods. Check the upper area of the East Siauliai Woods while the Operations Officer asks Aras for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003953
text: Report to the Operations Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003954
text: Is the Vubbe Fighter controlling the Vubbes? Tell the Operations Officer about what you saw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003955
text: Defeat Vubbe Fighter's subordinates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003956
text: Talk to Aras about the Vubbe Fighter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003957
text: Search for the Vubbe Fighter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003958
text: Is this one of the promises for the Crystal Mine? Check how many Vubbe Fighters there are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003959
text: Return to Aras and talk to him

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003960
text: Seems like that's the only Vubbe Fighter. Return to Aras and tell him about the Vubbe Fighter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003961
text: Defeat the Vubbe Fighter's subordinates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003962
text: Talk to the Supply Soldier in the Eastern Woods

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003963
text: There seems to a problem with the supplies. Talk to the Supply Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003964
text: Collect Weaver Claws

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003965
text: Defeat and collect Weaver Claws for the Supply Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003966
text: Give the Weaver Claws to the Supply Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003967
text: Return and give the Weaver claws to the Supply Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003968
text: Defeat Weavers and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003969
text: Something is not resolved yet. Try talking to the Supply Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003970
text: Defeat Pokubus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003971
text: Defeat the Pokubus interfering with the Supply Officer's duties.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003972
text: Talk to the Supply Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003973
text: Tell the Supply Soldier that you defeated the Pokubus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003974
text: Defeat Pokubus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003975
text: Find the Search Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003976
text: The Operations Officer said that the Search Scout in the lower area found the Vubbe Fighter. Meet the Search Scout near the bridge in the lower area of Bulves Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003977
text: Search for the Vubbe Fighter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003978
text: The Search Scout says the Vubbe Fighter is in the Nudeges Felled Area but seems better to wait for additional troops. You need to get in the Crystal Mine as soon as possible, so let's just go ahead and defeat the Vubbe Fighter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003979
text: Notify the Search Scout that the Vubbe Fighter has been defeated

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003980
text: Return to the Search Scout and let him know that the Vubbe Fighter has been defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003981
text: Defeat the Red Vubbe Fighter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003982
text: Return and report to Aras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003983
text: Return to Aras and tell him that the Vubbe Fighter was defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003984
text: Discuss with Aras about Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003985
text: As soon as you thought you could finally get permission to enter the Miners' Village, the Vubbes attacked. Let's defeat them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003986
text: Talk to Aras again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003987
text: Defeated the attacking Vubbes in a close fight. Return to Aras and get permission to enter the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003988
text: Defeat the monsters that are chasing the refugees

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003989
text: Talk to Vaidotas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003990
text: You arrived at Crystal Mine 3F, where the villagers may be imprisoned. Talk to Vaidotas about finding the residents.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003991
text: Search for the villagers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003992
text: Vaidotas says the villagers are trapped somewhere on the 3rd floor. {nl}Try to look for them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003993
text: Talk to the Miner

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003994
text: Talk to the Miner the Vubbes kidnapped.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003995
text: Defeat the Crystal Spiders that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003996
text: Defeat Netherbovine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003997
text: Netherbovine suddenly appeared and it looks very dangerous. Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003998
text: Examine the suspicious seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_003999
text: Something is sealed in the Crystal Pillar. Examine the pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004000
text: Defeat Demon Mirtis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004001
text: There were demons in the Closed Area. Defeat Mirtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004002
text: Defeat Mirtis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004003
text: Talk to Stonemason Pipoti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004004
text: Stonemason Pipoti looks anxious. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004005
text: Find Pipoti's colleague

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004006
text: Stonemason Pipoti says his colleague suddenly disappeared. Find him his colleague around the Forest of Fireflies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004007
text: Unfortunately, Pipoti's colleague did not make it alive. Return to Stonemaston Pipoti.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004008
text: Defeat the attacking monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004009
text: Move to the area marked on Stonemason Pipoti's map

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004010
text: There is a mark on Stonemason Pipoti's map. Right-click on the map and move to the marked area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004011
text: Defeat the monsters and check the treasure chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004012
text: Something hidden is marked on Stonemason Pipoti's map. Defeat Yonazolem and open the treasure box.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004013
text: Obtain %s from Yonazolem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004014
text: Defeat Yonazolem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004015
text: Move to the marked area on Stonemason Pipoti's map

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004016
text: There are other marked areas on Stonemason Pipoti's map. Right-click on the map and move to the marked area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004017
text: Defeat the monsters and check the treasure chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004018
text: Something hidden is marked in Stonemason Pipoti's map. Defeat the monsters and open the treasure box.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004019
text: There are other marked areas on Stonemason Pipoti's map. Right-click on the map and move to the marked area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004020
text: There are other marked areas on Stonemason Pipoti's map. Right-click on the map and move to the marked area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004021
text: The map that Stonemason Pipoti gave me displayed where something was hidden. Open the box and defeat the interfering Werewolf.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004022
text: Talk to Adventurer Varkis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004023
text: Explorer Varkis seems like he's in trouble. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004024
text: Retrieve Varkis' lost journal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004025
text: Varkis says the monsters stole his bag. Better find him back his journal at least.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004026
text: Found Varkis' Research. Return to Varkis and give it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004027
text: Rescue Varkis who is under attack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004028
text: Varkis is under attack! Defeat the monsters and rescue him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004029
text: You defeated the monster but Varkis is seriously injured. Talk to Varkis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004030
text: Defeat Rajatoad

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004031
text: Burn the keepsakes of Varkis in his camp and comfort his soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004032
text: Varkis did not make it. Comfort Varkis' soul by burning his journal in the bonfire in his camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004033
text: Collect data of Adventurer Varkis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004034
text: Seems like Varkis is still attached to his research work. Collect his data around the Dykyne Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004035
text: Collect Varkis' data around Dykyne Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004036
text: Collect Varkis' data around Dykyne Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004037
text: Talk to Adventurer Varkis' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004038
text: Varkis is now relieved for his research. Gather the data and burn it to comfort his soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004039
text: Defeat Unknocker

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004040
text: Find Varkis' data around the Apatinis Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004041
text: Seems like Varkis is still attached to his research work. Collect his data around the Apatinis Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004042
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004043
text: Monsters are attacking. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004044
text: Defeat Hogma

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004045
text: Burn the journal in the bonfire

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004046
text: Talk to Varkis' soul

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004047
text: Stonemason hasn't gone home yet. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004048
text: Gather stone for the monument at High Winding Road

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004049
text: Stonemason Pipoti wishes to raise a monument for his dead friend and the many other explorers that perished here. First, bring him stone from High Winding Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004050
text: Defeat Achat and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004051
text: Buy stonemason tools from the blacksmith in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004052
text: You collected the materials and now you need the tools. Buy stonemason tools from the blacksmith in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004053
text: Give it to Stonemason Pipoti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004054
text: You got all the materials and tools needed. Return to Stonemason Pipoti and give it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004055
text: Stonemason Pipoti was planning the details of the memorial stone. Talk to him and get the completed memorial stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004056
text: Raise a monument at the entrance of the Overlooking Crossroad Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004057
text: The entrance of the Royal Mausoleum seems to be the most suitable location to raise a monument for the people that perished here. Raise a monument at the entrance of the Overlooking Crossroad Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004058
text: Talk to Morkus Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004059
text: You have to continue the journey to find the Great King Zachariel's legacy. Morkus is waiting for you in Overlong Valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004060
text: Use the scroll to find the hidden keys.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004061
text: You can obtain the key to Great King Zachariel's legacy in a certain place by using the scroll. Use the scroll to find the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004062
text: Talk to Morkus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004063
text: Found the keys! Return to Morkus and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004064
text: Collect %s from spatial chasms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004065
text: Talk to the Supply Officer in the farm. He seems to have a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004066
text: Retrieve the supply boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004067
text: The monsters took all the supplies to be sent to the village. Retrieve the supply boxes that the monsters stole around the Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004068
text: Give the supply boxes to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004069
text: Please bring the collected supply boxes to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004070
text: Examine the barrier stone in Closed Area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004071
text: Vubbes are disappearing near the enchanted stones in the Closed Area. Examine the enchanted stone of the closed area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004072
text: Defeat the Vubbes and collect Holystone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004073
text: Vubbe Magic Stones are needed to enter the Closed Area. Defeat the Vubbes and collect Vubbe Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004074
text: Use Vubbe Holystones on the barrier stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004075
text: Follow Vubbes and put the Holystone in the enchanted stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004076
text: Defeat Vubbes and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004077
text: Vubbe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004078
text: Talk to Soldier Blak

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004079
text: There is a soldier who looks very anxious. Approach him and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004080
text: Find the Supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004081
text: Soldier black says the monster raided the base camp. Bring the supplies from the 1st supplies warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004082
text: You were able to get the supplies left. Take it to soldier Blak.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004083
text: Defeat Siaulago eyeing the supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004084
text: Looks like Soldier Blak has something to say about the monsters that raided the warehous. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004085
text: Give Soldier Blak's Report to Officer Liudas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004086
text: Soldier Blak wants to give the report to Officer Liudas. Deliver the report to Officer Liudas in Central Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004087
text: Talk to Soldier York

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004088
text: Soldier York is breathing heavily. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004089
text: Defeat the Siaulamb Lagoon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004090
text: Soldier York is frustated at the monsters crossing the line. Go to the 2nd supplies warehouse and defeat the Siaulamb Lagoons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004091
text: Defeated the Siaulamb Lagoons. Tell Soldier York about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004092
text: Talk to Adjutant General Paulina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004093
text: Adjutant General Paulina seems angry. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004094
text: Retrieving the supplies stolen by the Siaulambs in each warehouse

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004095
text: Polyna states that the stolen supplies must be retrieved. Get back the supplies from the Siaulambs nearby each warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004096
text: Deliver to Adjutant General Paulina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004097
text: Acquired much of the stolen supplies. Give it to Adjutant General Volda in Central Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004098
text: Collect %s from Siaulamb Shaman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004099
text: Talk to Officer Luders

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004100
text: Ready to hunt Sparnas. Talk to Officer Luders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004101
text: Lure Sparnas in the last quarters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004102
text: Officer Luders told you to lure Sparnas with bait and defeat it. Place the bait in Malkos Felled Area and defeat Sparnas when it appears.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004103
text: Report to Officer Luders

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004104
text: Successfully defeated Sparnas. Report back to Officer Liudas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004105
text: Defeat the lured Sparnas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004106
text: Talk to Liaison Officer Niels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004107
text: Arrived safely at the Gateway of the Great King. Find the person in charge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004108
text: Find the missing archivist, Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004109
text: Liaison Officer Niels is looking for an old man named Jonas. Be sure to bring him back when you find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004110
text: Find Archivist Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004111
text: Talk to Archivist Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004112
text: You were proven to be the right person by the Eye of the Great King. Talk to Archivist Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004113
text: Light the signal fire

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004114
text: Archivist Jonas wants to light up a signal fire to let the families know that the chosen one has come. Light up the signal at the top of the valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004115
text: Return to Liaison Officer Niels at the Excavation Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004116
text: Seems like the signal fire was lit well. Return to Niels at the Excavation Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004117
text: Archivist Jonas wasn't the only problem troubling Niels. Help Niels again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004118
text: Find Mercenary Mirta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004119
text: Niels is worried as he hasn't heard back from Historian Kepeck. {nl}Mercenary Mirta went to look for Kepek and he is also missing. {nl}Try to look for Mercenary Mirta first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004120
text: Found Mercenary Mirta but he looks injured. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004121
text: Talk to Historian Viode

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004122
text: Historian Viode has a serious face. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004123
text: Defeat the monsters attacking the camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004124
text: Monsters are attacking the camp. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004125
text: That was close. Talk to Viode who is hiding in a safe place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004126
text: Defeat the monsters that threaten the historian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004127
text: Talk to Historian Kepeck

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004128
text: Looks like Historian Kepeck wants some help. Talk to Historian Kepeck again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004129
text: Record the artifact that Kepeck discovered

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004130
text: Kepeck is somehow in a hurry and needs your help. Go and take an Artifact Record of the Royal Mausoleum at the right side of Apvija Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004131
text: Successfully recorded the artifacts of Royal Mausoleum. Give it to Liaison Officer Niels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004132
text: Defeat Ginklas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004133
text: Talk to Soldier Alan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004134
text: Soldier Alan is staring at you. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004135
text: Scout the upper area of Valdyti Vancant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004136
text: Soldier Alan mistaken you as a new recruit. Anyhow, scout the northern area of the Valdyti Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004137
text: Report back to Soldier Alan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004138
text: Monsters appeared but you took care of them well. Return to Soldier Alan and report about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004139
text: Soldier Alan says he remembered something terrible. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004140
text: Deliver it to Commander Wallace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004141
text: Soldier Alan wants you to deliver the report to Commander Wallace. Talk to Commander Wallace at Bird Footprint Junction.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004142
text: Talk to Commander Wallace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004143
text: Commander Wallace also thinks you are a new recruit. {nl}Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004144
text: Get Kepa Raider Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004145
text: Commander Wallace asked you to gather materials needed for hunting Gaigalas. Collect Kepa Raider Sap from Kepa Raider at Bird Footstep Junction and Ianutis Waterfall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004146
text: Collected the Kepa Raider Sap needed. Give them to Commander Wallace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004147
text: Talk to Soldier Weiz

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004148
text: Soldier Weiz is getting ready for battle. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004149
text: Collect Ducky Fat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004150
text: Weiz says he needs Ducky Fat to battle against Gaigalas. Defeat Duckys in Lengvas Garden and collect Ducky Fat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004151
text: Deliver them to Soldier Weiz

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004152
text: Collected the Ducky Fat needed. Give them to Soldier Weiz.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004153
text: Defeat Ducky and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004154
text: Talk to Commander Wallace to gather the next materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004155
text: Collect Cronewt Leather

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004156
text: The next material needed in order to defeat Gaigalas is Cronewt Leather. Collect Cronewt Leather from the Cronewt in Lengvas Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004157
text: Collected the Cronewt Leather needed. Give them to Commander Wallace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004158
text: Defeat Cronewt and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004159
text: Soldier Weiz feels like hunting Gaigalas quickly. Talk to Weiz again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004160
text: Light fire in the marked area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004161
text: Weiz says Gaigalas will appear when it smells the Ducky Fat burning. Light fire to burn the Ducky Fat in an airy area in Lengvas Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004162
text: Report to Soldier Weiz

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004163
text: You burned the Ducky Fat and Gaigalas appeared. Quickly return to Weiz and let him know that Gaigalas appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004164
text: Talk to the Old Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004165
text: During the battle with Gaigalas, the Owl Sculpture was looking at you strangely. Talk to the Old Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004166
text: Collect Infro Holder's Horn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004167
text: The Old Owl Sculpture says you can't defeat Gaigalas fighting the way you did. Gather Infro Holder's horn to make a Memory Fragment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004168
text: Deliver it to the Old Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004169
text: Collected the Infro Holder's Horn needed. Give them to Old Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004170
text: Defeat Infro Holder and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004171
text: Defeat Infro Holder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004172
text: The Old Owl Sculpture seems to have sensed something and is tilting its head. Talk to the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004173
text: The Old Owl Sculpture showed you a scene from the past where soldiers who tried hunting Gaigalas were wiped out. Talk to the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004174
text: Talk to the Worrying Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004175
text: Heed the words of the Old Owl Sculpture and bring the Memory Fragment to the Worrying Owl Sculpture at Bandyma Crossroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004176
text: Awaken the Memories of the Sleeping Owl Sculptures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004177
text: In order to defeat Gaigalas, you need power of the Owl Sculptures that fell asleep without completing their magic. Awaken the memories of the Sleeping Owl Sculptures to complete the magic that will weaken Gaigalas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004178
text: Report to the Worrying Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004179
text: Completed the magic that will weaken Gaigalas. Return and tell it to the Worrying Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004180
text: Summon and Defeat Gaigalas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004181
text: Completed the magic that will weaken Gaigalas. Summon Gaigalas and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004182
text: Defeat Gaigalas at Ishimtini Access Way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004183
text: Completed the magic that will weaken Gaigalas. Defeat Gaigalas at Ishimtini Access Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004184
text: Talk to Archaeologist Dezic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004185
text: Archaeologist Dezic looks anxious. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004186
text: Defeat the nearby monsters for Archaeologist Dezic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004187
text: Dezic asked for your help in getting rid of the monsters nearby so that he can go look for his assistant Airine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004188
text: This will be safe enough for Dezic to go to the soldiers. Return to Dezic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004189
text: Talk to Technician Heinen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004190
text: You need to use the cable car to go over to the Radas Fork Road easily. Talk to Technician Heinen to use the cable car.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004191
text: Defeat the monsters around the cable car

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004192
text: Heinen says he'll let you use the cable car once if you defeat the monsters nearby. Defeat the monsters for Heinen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004193
text: Talk to Technician Heinen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004194
text: Looks like the monsters are cleared enough. Talk to Heinen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004195
text: Defeat the monsters threatening the cable car

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004196
text: You completed Heinen's favor and can now use the cable car. Talk to Heinen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004197
text: Destroy the West Region Barrier at Nutoles Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004198
text: Heinen seems impressed by your abilities. Heinen says that the source of monsters is the West Region Barrier at Nutoles Cliff and will allow you to use the cable car freely if you destroy the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004199
text: You destroyed the West Region Barrier as requested by Heinen. Talk to Heinen to use the cable car.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004200
text: Destroy the West Region Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004201
text: Archaeologist Dezic is desperately looking for someone. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004202
text: Talk to Archaeologist Dezic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004203
text: Archaeologist Dezic informed you that Airine is imprisoned with barriers in Rodoma 2nd Ruins. You must hurry and find her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004204
text: Talk to Assistant Airine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004205
text: You found Assistant Airine. Get to her cautiously to avoid the monsters harming her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004206
text: Talk to Airine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004207
text: Airine can't move since she is binded to three barriers. Talk to Airine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004208
text: Remove the barriers from Airine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004209
text: Remove all the barriers from Airine. The three barriers are at the west, east, and north side of the site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004210
text: Removed all the barriers. Check if Airine is okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004211
text: Talk to Mercenary Glen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004212
text: Glen needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004213
text: Defeat Sauga and find clues about the disappearances

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004214
text: Mercenary Glen seems troubled about the disappearances that have been occurring lately. Check if there are some clues in the items that you will obtain after defeating Sauga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004215
text: The items that came out from Sauga's pockets seem useless. Talk to Glen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004216
text: Fortunately, the items don't belong to Airine. Talk to Glen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004217
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to Rodoma Ruin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004218
text: Glen asked you to defeat the monsters that turned violent since no one knows what will happen in the future. Defeat the monsters that are on the way to Rodoma 1st Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004219
text: It should be safe now that you defeated all the violent monsters. Talk to Glen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004220
text: Defeat Ticens and Tucens

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004221
text: Assistant Airine seems alright. Talk to Airine again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004222
text: Protect Airine from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004223
text: Airine told you that she got into this mess while chasing a boy. As a thought, who would do something like this? Anyways, protect Airine since monsters are coming.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004224
text: Airine seems alright. Talk to Airine again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004225
text: Talk to Airine. She is trembling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004226
text: Report back to Dezic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004227
text: Airine returned to Dezic. Return to Dezic to check whether she returned safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004228
text: Dezic collapsed from Scorpio's attacks! Talk to Assistant Airine again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004229
text: Defeat Scorpio

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004230
text: Talk to the New Researcher in the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004231
text: The New Researcher seems to be in trouble. You better help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004232
text: Find the lost research documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004233
text: The New Researcher told you that he lost his research documents and reports at the Abandoned Old Workshop. Pino, Geppetto and Tontus may be hanging around there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004234
text: Return to the New Researcher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004235
text: It seems that you collected all the documents that the New Researcher mentioned. Return to the New Researcher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004236
text: Defeat Pino, Geppetto or Tontus and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004237
text: Retrieve the lost research documents after defeating Pino, Geppetto and Tontus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004238
text: Look for the old research reports

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004239
text: The New Researcher told you that he lost his research documents and reports at the Abandoned Old Workshop. Geppetto may be amusing itself with them by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004240
text: It seems that you collected all the documents that the New Researcher mentioned. Return to the New Researcher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004241
text: Obtain %s by defeating Geppetto at the Abandoned Old Workshop

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004242
text: Obtain the research report by defeating Geppetto

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004243
text: Torn Research Record

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004244
text: Records

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004245
text: The New Researcher told you that he lost his research documents and reports at the Abandoned Old Workshop. Tontus may be amusing itself with them by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004246
text: Obtain %s by defeating Tontus at Dulkiu Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004247
text: Obtain Ripped research Records by defeating Tontus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004248
text: Talk to the New Researcher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004249
text: Move to the Records Repository

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004250
text: Move to the Records Repository which the New Researcher told you about

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004251
text: It seems that Archivist Jonas went up to Dulkiu Hill. Persuade him to go back since it is dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004252
text: Protect Archivist Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004253
text: You were attacked by monsters while you were persuading Jonas. Protect Jonas from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004254
text: It seems that you defeated all the attacking monsters, and Archivist Jonas regained his conscious. Try persuading Jonas again to go back to camp with you and meet Niels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004255
text: Talk to Niels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004256
text: You should retrieve the records which Jonas gave to Niels. Talk to Niels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004257
text: Talk to Merchant Davio

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004258
text: Talk to Davio and ask for a medicine that can regain Jonas' conscious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004259
text: Bring the reports Jonas requested and find a way to feed the medicine to Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004260
text: Defeat the monster that is disturbing Jonas' guidance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004261
text: Archivist Jonas seem to have finally regained his consciousness. Jonas told you to follow him as there is a task that you are qualified to do. In order for Jonas to guide you safely to Beacon Hill Pass, defeat monsters along the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004262
text: It seems that you have successfully arrived at the destination with Archivist Jonas. Talk to Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004263
text: Talk to Gorath

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004264
text: You made Badat to return safely. Talk to Gorath about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004265
text: Defeat Molich

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004266
text: We don't know where Molich chased after us from, but let's defeat it first!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004267
text: You have defeated Molich. Talk to Gorath again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004268
text: Defeat Molich

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004269
text: It seems that Jonas' conscious is coming back to him. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004270
text: Observe the Eyes of the Great King besides the Archivist Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004271
text: Archivist Jonas is asking you to prove that you are qualified for his task by using the Eyes of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004272
text: The Eyes of the Great King have responded. Talk to Archivist Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004273
text: Talk to the Medicine Dealer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004274
text: Merchant Davio told you that he needs one more herb to complete the medicine, but he already sent off the Medicine Dealer to get the herb. Meet the Medicine Dealer at Kapas Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004275
text: Collect Canyon Metos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004276
text: The Medicine Dealer told you that all other ingredients is ready, except for Canyon Metos. Collect Canyon Metoses in Metos Field in order to complete the medicine that will bring back Jonas' conscious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004277
text: You have enough Canyon Metos. Return to the Medicine Dealer and complete the medicine that will bring back Jonas' conscious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004278
text: Niels asked Merchant Davio for a medicine that can bring back Jonas' conscious. Retrieve the medicine from Davio.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004279
text: Collect Golden Pieces from Lichenclops

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004280
text: Davio is asking for extra charges since it took him a long time to get the medicine for Jonas. Davio will be satisfied if you give him Golden Pieces from Lichenclops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004281
text: You have collected enough Golden Pieces. Return to the Medicine Dealer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004282
text: Obtain %s by defeating Lichenclops

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004283
text: Collect Golden Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004284
text: Return to Davio to complete the medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004285
text: Return to Jonas and give him the records. Make sure he takes the medicine that Davio gave to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004286
text: Return to Jonas and give him the records. Make sure he takes the medicine that Davio gave to you. Jonas is probably at the Abandoned Old Workshop.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004287
text: Talk to Mercenary Mirta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004288
text: Mirta seems to be severely injured. Ask him why he is injured and where the materials to be sent to Kepeck are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004289
text: Retrieve the materials to be sent to Kepeck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004290
text: Mercenary Mirta says that he lost the materials from monsters' attacks. Retrieve the materials and send them to Kepeck on behalf of Mirta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004291
text: Find Historian Kepeck at Apvija Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004292
text: It seems that you retrieved most of the materials. Give them to the Historian Kepeck at Apvija Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004293
text: Talk to Vaidotas in the Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004294
text: Enter the Crystal Mine and talk to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004295
text: Repair the Purifiers on 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004296
text: Repair all the Purifiers on the 1st floor. Some are easy to repair, while others that are more difficult to repair will need the use of the compass Vaidotas gave you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004297
text: Inspect the Entrance Purifier on the 1st Floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004298
text: The Purifiers in the Crystal Mine are not working and toxic fumes are present. Activate the Purifiers to clean the air.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004299
text: Search for Purifier Parts on the floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004300
text: Check the floor. You need to find missing parts for the Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004301
text: Assemble the Entrance Purifier on the 1st Floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004302
text: You found a part for the Entrance Purifier. Assemble it to the Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004303
text: Find %s on the floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004304
text: Retrieve Purifier Parts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004305
text: Retrieve Purifier Parts from the Vubbe with a question mark on its head.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004306
text: Repair the Entrance Purifier on 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004307
text: Found the missing parts of the Entrance Purifier. Try to assemble and activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004308
text: Search for Purifier parts on the floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004309
text: Repair the Purifiers on 2F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004310
text: Repair all the Purifiers on 2F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004311
text: Inspect the Central Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004312
text: The Mine Compass is pointing towards the Central Purifier on 1F. Inspect the purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004313
text: Use the Mine Compass

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004314
text: Use the Mine Compass to find the Spare Purifier located somewhere on 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004315
text: Search District 4 for the Spare Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004316
text: The Mine Compass is pointing towards District 4. Follow its lead and find the Spare Purifier that can be used to repair the Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004317
text: Get parts from the Spare Purifier in{nl}District 4

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004318
text: Get the replacement parts from the Spare Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004319
text: Obtained spare parts for the Central Purifier. Replace the parts of the Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004320
text: Defeat Cyclops in the Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004321
text: Cyclops is rampaging in the Crystal Mine. Defeat Cyclops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004322
text: Defeat Cyclops

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004323
text: Inspect the Passage Purifier on 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004324
text: There is a problem with the purifier on the path to Crystal Mine 2F. Go and inspect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004325
text: Use the Mine Compass to find the parts needed to repair the purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004326
text: Search District 6 for Purifier Parts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004327
text: The Mine Compass is pointing towards District 6. Follow it and find parts to repair the purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004328
text: Retrieve %s from Specter Monarch

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004329
text: Repair the Passage Purifier on 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004330
text: Found the parts needed to repair the Passage Purifier. Try to assemble and activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004331
text: Inspect the Circulation Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004332
text: The Circulation Purifier on the 2nd Floor is not working. Figure out what the problem is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004333
text: Repair the Purifier Pipe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004334
text: The Circulation Purifier is unable to absorb the toxic fumes. Examine the purifier in District 3 and fix it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004335
text: Inspect the Circulation Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004336
text: The Purifier in District 3 seems to be working properly now. Try activating the Circulation Purifier again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004337
text: Inspect the Purifier Pipe in District 2

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004338
text: Check if the Purifier Pipe in District 2 is functioning properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004339
text: Defeat Carapace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004340
text: Activate the Circulation Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004341
text: All Purifier Pipes seems to be working properly. Activate the Circulation Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004342
text: Inspect the Auxiliary Purifier on 2F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004343
text: The Auxiliary Purifier on the 2nd Floor is halted. Find out why it is halted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004344
text: Use the Mine Compass

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004345
text: Use the Mine Compass to check what you need to fix the Auxiliary Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004346
text: Inspect the Magic Supply Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004347
text: The Mine Compass is pointing towards the Magic Supply Device in District 4. Check what the problem is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004348
text: Use the Mine Compass to check what you need to fix the Auxiliary Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004349
text: Search for tools to remove rust

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004350
text: Follow the lead of the Mine Compass and find a way to remove the rust.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004351
text: Restore the Magic Supply Device in District 4

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004352
text: Seems like you can fix the Magic Supply Device in District 4 with lubricant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004353
text: Activate the Auxiliary Purifier on 2F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004354
text: The Magic Supply Device seems to be working well. Activate the Auxiliary Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004355
text: Check the Main Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004356
text: The Main Purifier is not working. Go and inspect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004357
text: Use the Mine Compass to locate the missing parts of the purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004358
text: Use the Mine compass to find the parts of that were purifier destroyed and scattered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004359
text: Retrieve the torn Purifier Pipes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004360
text: Find and retrieve the Purifier Pipe that is somewhere on the way to District 7.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004361
text: Retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004362
text: Use the Mine Compass to find the parts of the Main Purifier that were destroyed and scattered by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004363
text: Search District 6 for parts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004364
text: The compass is pointing towards District 6. Look for parts in District 6.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004365
text: Fix the Main Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004366
text: You defeated the Stone Whale and got the parts. Return to the Main Purifier and fix it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004367
text: Defeat Stone Whale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004368
text: You defeated the Stone Whale and got the parts. Return to the Main Purifier, repair it and then activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004369
text: Talk to Ahylas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004370
text: You should listen to Ahylas Jonas on how to use the Seal Release Crystal to access the Great King's inheritance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004371
text: Talk to the Disciple of Gustas to learn how to release the seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004372
text: Before you unleash the important seal at the Broken Pole, it will be better to talk with the Disciple of Gustas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004373
text: Talk to the Disciple of Gustas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004374
text: You have unleashed the seal of Pasagos Cliff. Return to the 2nd Disciple of Gustas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004375
text: Examine the rock.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004376
text: Something is hidden behind the rock. Go and examine it closely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004377
text: Defeat Iltiswort

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004378
text: Iltiswort appeared after you touched the rock. Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004379
text: There are still many seals left before you go to the sanctum that will lead you to the inheritance of Zachariel. Talk to the 2nd Disciple of Gustas about the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004380
text: Unleash the seal device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004381
text: You have to unleash all seals to enter into the sanctum that will lead you to the inheritance of Zachariel. Unleash the 2nd seal that is on the middle of the way to the Broken Sanctum. Be careful of monsters' attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004382
text: Talk to Gustas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004383
text: You have unleashed the 2nd seal. Meet Gustas Jonas to listen to the guides for the next seal to get to the inheritance of Zachariel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004384
text: Talk to Mercenary Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004385
text: Mercenary Toby is looking for someone who can help him. Talk to Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004386
text: Prove your skills

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004387
text: Toby is looking for someone who can help him with simple jobs. But, since he can't give the jobs to anyone, he needs to test your skills. Show him that you can defeat Desert Chupabra and Zinute.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004388
text: Talk to Mercenary Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004389
text: Toby seems to be very satisfied. Return to Toby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004390
text: Fortunately, Toby is very satisfied. Talk to Toby again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004391
text: Find and collect the equipment for graverobbing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004392
text: Tobi is looking for evidence that someone has been graverobbing. If you find any evidence, please give it to Toby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004393
text: You picked up equipment for graverobbing. Return to Toby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004394
text: Talk to the Owl Sculpture of Forecasts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004395
text: Talk to the Owl Sculpture of Forecasts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004396
text: Defeat Necroventer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004397
text: Talk to Archaeologist Laudi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004398
text: Archaeologist Laudi is looking for someone who is stronger than anyone. Talk to Archaeologist Laudi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004399
text: Obtain the Relic Fragment by defeating Denoptic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004400
text: Laudi said that he can not continue his research due to the charcoal-eating Denoptic. Bring him the Relic Fragment that haven't been digested inside Denoptic beyond Apynys Camp. When you survey the charcoal, Denoptic should appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004401
text: Give the Relic Fragment to Archaeologist Laudi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004402
text: There was a Relic Fragment inside Denoptic's stomach. Take it to Archaeologist Laudi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004403
text: Obtain %s after defeating Denoptic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004404
text: Defeat Denoptic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004405
text: Talk to Laudi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004406
text: It seems that Laudi has something to say to you. Talk to Archaeologist Laudi again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004407
text: Defeat the monsters that abide near the place where Archaeologist Laudi will do his research

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004408
text: Archaeologist Laudi is asking you to defeat the monsters. Defeat the monsters at Odega Uphill and return to Laudi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004409
text: Now, Archaeologist Laudi can do his research safely. Return to Laudi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004410
text: There is a stone pillar standing in the middle of the way to Alkune Stairs. What would happen when you examined it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004411
text: Collect the old inheritance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004412
text: Some other stone pillars appeared while you were examining the pillar! Break these pillars!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004413
text: Obtained %s by destroying the stone pillars

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004414
text: There is a stone pillar when you go up the Alkune stairs. Examine the pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004415
text: Defeat the monsters that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004416
text: As you examined the pillar, monsters suddenly appeared! Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004417
text: Examine the pillar again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004418
text: You have defeated all the monsters. Examine the pillar again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004419
text: Defeat Wendigo

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004420
text: Defeat Woodfung

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004421
text: Defeat Dumaro

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004422
text: There is an unknown pole on the upper side of Overlong Bridge Valley. Investigate the pole.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004423
text: As you touched the pole, Shnayim appeared! Take the artifacts away from Shnayim!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004424
text: Obtain %s by defeating Shnayim

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004425
text: Defeat Shnayim

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004426
text: Talk to Vio

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004427
text: Supply Commander Vio is looking for one of his men. Talk to Vio.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004428
text: Find Mercenary Lindt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004429
text: Vio wants you to find his men who ran away somewhere. Go to Apynys Habitat where Lindt is likely to be at.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004430
text: Talk to Mercenary Lindt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004431
text: The man who is leaning on the tree and taking a rest seems to be Lindt. Talk to him since he seems badly hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004432
text: Retrieve the supplies which Wendigo stole

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004433
text: Mercenary Lindt told you that he was chasing after a Wendigo for stolen supplies instead of running away from the monsters. Defeat the Wendigo and retrieve the stolen supplies for Lindt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004434
text: Give the supplies to Lindt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004435
text: Acquired all the supplies that were stolen from Wendigo. Give them to Lindt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004436
text: Obtained %s after defeating Wendigo

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004437
text: Obtained the supplies from Wendigo

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004438
text: Mercenary Lindt is badly hurt. Talk to Lindt again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004439
text: Collect Canyon Apynys

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004440
text: Mercenary Lindt's wounds are worse than you expected. You have to get him Canyon Apynys.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004441
text: You have enough Canyon Apynys. Return to Mercenary Lindt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004442
text: Mercenary Lindt's face doesn't look well. Ask him if he is okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004443
text: Mercenary Lindt can barely move due to the effects of the medicine. Defeat the monsters nearby for Lindt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004444
text: You defeated all the monsters nearby. Report to Mercenary Lindt again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004445
text: Talk to Mercenary Eta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004446
text: You found Mercenary Eta. Pass him Vio's orders for him to return to the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004447
text: Collect the poison of Woodfung and the stone with the vigor at Alkune Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004448
text: Eta is saying that he will not return to the camp unless he defeats Saugas. You better send him to the camp as quickly as possible. Get the poison of Woodfung and the stone with the vigor at Alkune stair way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004449
text: You obtained the stone with the vigor and the poison of Woodfung. Return to Eta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004450
text: Eta needs the poison of Woodfung and the stone with the vigor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004451
text: Get the poison of Woodfung

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004452
text: Eta is saying that he will not return to the camp unless he defeats Saugas. You better send him to the camp as quickly as possible. Get the poison of Woodfung at Alkune stair way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004453
text: You obtained the stone with the vigor and the poison of Woodfung. Return to Eta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004454
text: Obtained %s after defeating Woodfung

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004455
text: Obtained the poison of Woodfung

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004456
text: You are all ready to lure Saugas. Talk to Eta who is confident.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004457
text: Put to stone with the vigor on Alkune Stairway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004458
text: Mercenary Eta told you to put the stone on Alkune Stairway to lure Saugas. Is he trying to defeat Saugas by himself?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004459
text: The Sauga took the stone and ran away! Return to Eta and ask him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004460
text: Defeat Sauga

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004461
text: Eta can't believe that a group of Sauga ran away with the stone. Talk to Eta again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004462
text: Lure the Saugas from the right side of Alkune Stairway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004463
text: Mercenary Eta is saying that it can't be true that the Sauga just ran away with the stone. Let's put the stones on the deepest place of Long Bridge Valley where Saugas often shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004464
text: Saugas didn't show up, and another group of Sauga appeared instead. Suggest to Eta to give up and go back to the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004465
text: Defeat the monsters that are rushing in

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004466
text: Talk to Vio

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004467
text: Eta told you that he will return to the camp. Tell this to Vio.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004468
text: Eta promised you that he will return to the camp. Tell this to Vio.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004469
text: Finally, it seems that you can enter into the sanctum that will lead you to the inheritance of the Great King Zachariel. Talk to Gustas Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004470
text: Release the seal inside the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004471
text: The sanctum was the first seal to protect the inheritance of the Great King Zachariel. Go into the sanctum and unleash the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004472
text: You finally released the first seal. Talk to Gustas Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004473
text: Investigate the Miners' Village(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004474
text: Arrival at the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004475
text: You must enter the Crystal Mine in pursuit of the goddess' revelation, but it seems as if the Miners' Village has been attacked by the Vubbes. Rush to the Miners' Village!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004476
text: Go to the Miners' Village Mayor and find out about the village's situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004477
text: Talk to the Miners' Village Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004478
text: Talk to the Hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004479
text: You need to go to the Crystal Mine as told by the Goddess in the Bishop's dream but you can't just leave the refugees. Help the angry hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004480
text: The Hunter says that monsters stole all the relief supplies meant for the villagers. {nl}Try to pick up at least what's left on the road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004481
text: Gathered all the relief supplies. Talk to the Hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004482
text: Talk to Mine Manager Brinker

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004483
text: You need to go to the Crystal Mine as told by the goddess in the bishop's dream but you can't just leave the refugees. Mine Manager Brinker is standing by the wall with one hand on the wall. Ask what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004484
text: Collect Reinforcement Stones from the rubbles nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004485
text: The wall may collapse if Brinker releases his hands off the wall. Let's look for some rocks nearby to block the holes on the wall for Brinker.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004486
text: Give the Reinforcement Stones to Brinker

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004487
text: Give the stones you collected to Brinker.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004488
text: Repaired the wall but Brinker still looks anxious. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004489
text: Defeat the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004490
text: Defeat the monsters nearby so that Brinker can return safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004491
text: Tell Brinker that it is safe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004492
text: Tell Brinker that he can return safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004493
text: Talk to the Healer Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004494
text: You need to go to the Crystal Mines as told by the goddess in the bishop's dream but you can't just leave the refugees. Help the Healer Lady to treat the injured people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004495
text: Bring the refugees

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004496
text: Healer Lady is asking a favor for you to bring the other refugees. Bring the couple near the Statue of Goddess Zemyna to the Healer Lady.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004497
text: Turn over the refugees to the Healer Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004498
text: Brought back the refugees safely. Talk to the Healer Lady.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004499
text: Tell the Healer Lady to go back to the village again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004500
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004501
text: The lady says she can't go back with her patients because there are too many monsters. Defeat the monsters for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004502
text: Defeated the monsters. Tell the lady to go back to the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004503
text: Talk to the Miners' Village Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004504
text: Talk to the mayor again to enter the Crystal Mines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004505
text: Rescue Vaidotas who is kidnapped by the Vubbes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004506
text: The goddess' revelation is important but you can't leave the kidnapped villagers. To save the villagers trapped in the Crystal Mine, go to the Vubbe Outpost and save Vaidotas first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004507
