text: Intercept the Vubbe raid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004508
text: The Mayor seems to have a problem. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004509
text: Defeat the Vubbes who invaded the village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004510
text: Vubbes are taking over the village! Let's drive them out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004511
text: Seems like you drove out the Vubbes. Inform the Village Mayor about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004512
text: Defeat the Vubbes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004513
text: You found Vaidotas. Discuss with him on how you can get into the Mines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004514
text: Defeat the Vubbes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004515
text: There's a suspicious treasure box. Go and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004516
text: Red Vubbe Fighter that abruptly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004517
text: Red Vubbe Fighter appeared when you kicked the box! Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004518
text: There were no kidnapped people but only Vubbes. You better go back to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004519
text: You need to remove the wagons in order to enter the mines. Talk to Vaidotas about how to remove them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004520
text: Defeat any Vubbe that assembles after hearing the explosives

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004521
text: Vaidotas says the wagons can be destroyed with explosives. But the Vubbes could attack when they hear the explosives, so you must be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004522
text: Enter Crystal Mine 1st Gallery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004523
text: You removed the wagons and can finally enter the Crystal Mines. Meet Vaidotas at Crystal Mine 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004524
text: Talk to Kind Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004525
text: Talk to Kind Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004526
text: Investingate the upper side of the field

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004527
text: The Kind Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004528
text: has a problem due to a reason.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004529
text: A gigantic monster is blocking the road and sleeping on the road on the uppder side of the field. Return to the Kind Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004530
text: Talk to the Kind Owl again to solve the problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004531
text: Defeat Elloguas nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004532
text: He knows an owl that can solve the problem but, he can't remember clearly due to Forza of Black Grieva. Defeat the Elloguas nearby for the kind owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004533
text: For the Kind Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004534
text: remember the owl to solve the problem, you defeated Elloguas nearby. Return to the Kind Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004535
text: Defeat Elloguas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004536
text: Talk to the Unstable Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004537
text: Talk to the Unstable Owl Sculpture to ask for a way to move Sequoia from blocking the road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004538
text: Collect the divine wood fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004539
text: To move Sequoia from blocking the road, the unstable owl told you to face it with the divine power. Go get divine wood fragments from Broken Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004540
text: You have collected enough divine wood fragments to move Sequoia from blocking the road. Return to unstable owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004541
text: The unstable owl seems little confused, but it knows the way to move Sequoia from blocking the road. Talk to the unstable owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004542
text: Collect the Essence of Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004543
text: The unstable owl can't just tell you how to move Sequoia from blocking the road for nothing. It told you to get the Essence of Spirits back from the monsters. Go get the Essence back from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004544
text: Acquired the Essence of Spirits. Let's return to the unstable owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004545
text: The Essence of Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004546
text: You have enough divine wood fragments. Return to unstable Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004547
text: Move Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004548
text: To move Sequoia from blocking the road, use the sharp wood stick. Open Inventory near Sequoia and use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004549
text: Sequoia was surprised by the sharp stick and ran away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004550
text: Sequioa ran away, but the unstable owl seems to be nervous. Talk to Unstable Owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004551
text: Find the Guide Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004552
text: The Unstable Owl told you that when Sequoia ran away, something bad seemed to happen to the Guide Owl. You better go see the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004553
text: Talk to the Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004554
text: The Guide Owl seems to be very angry. Talk to the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004555
text: Find the Grave Protector Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004556
text: The Guide Owl told you that if Sequoia doesn't get defeated, all owls will be destroyed by Sequoia and they can't go meet the sculptor since they can't be guided. To defeat Sequoia, you should go meet the Grave Protector Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004557
text: Talk to the Grave Protector Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004558
text: Defeat the flame of Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004559
text: You saved the Grave Protector Owl that was being attacked by the flame of Sequoia. Ask the owl how to defeat Sequoia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004560
text: Obtain Essence of Spirits from the specters at the Entrance of Kateen Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004561
text: The Grave Protector Owl told you that in order to make a blow to Sequoia, you need the Essence of Spirits. Collect the Essences of Spirits from the specters that are hovering around the grave of the unknown warrior.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004562
text: You have enough Essences of Spirits to make a blow to Sequoia. Talk to the Grave Protector Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004563
text: Talk to the Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004564
text: Talk to the Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004565
text: Persuade the angy owl sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004566
text: Persuade the angry owl sculpture that is corrupted due to the influnce of vicious power like Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004567
text: You failed to persuade and there is no way, but to break the angry owl. Take the fragments of the angry owl sculpture and go back to the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004568
text: Defeat the angry owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004569
text: The Grave Protector Owl told you that if you use the power in the Essences of Spirits, you may defeat Sequoia. Return to the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004570
text: Use the stick with the vigor to Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004571
text: You put the power of sprits into the sharp stick to make the stick with the vigor. Use the stick with the vigor to Sequoia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004572
text: Sequoia ran away as you used the stick with the vigor to it. Let's go back to the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004573
text: Talk to the Desperate Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004574
text: Sequoia ran away to the direction where the Desperate Owl Sculpture is at. The Desperate Owl may be in danger. Hurry to the Desperate Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004575
text: Rescue Desperate Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004576
text: When Sequoia was about to break the Desperate Owl, you were able find it right before. Help the Desperate Owl to stand up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004577
text: You helped the Desperate Owl to stand up. Ask it whether it is okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004578
text: The owl in urgency is asking you to help it since it never saw Sequoia running around like that. Talk to the owl in urgency.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004579
text: Obtain the blackend wood stick

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004580
text: The owl in urgency told you that it will be better to use the blackend stick. Collect the sticks nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004581
text: You have enough blackened sticks. Return to the owl in urgency.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004582
text: Talk to the owl in urgency.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004583
text: The owl in urgency substitued the old stick for the blackend stick. Talk to the owl in urgency again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004584
text: Use the cursed stick to Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004585
text: Thrust the cursed stick to Sequoia so it can never run around again!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004586
text: Talk to the gatekeeper owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004587
text: Unfortunately, the cursed stick wasn't effective on Sequia. As the owl in urgency told you, talk to the gatekeeper owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004588
text: Sequoia is burning the whole forest, but the gatekeeper owl seems to be alright. Talk to the gatekeepr owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004589
text: Defeat Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004590
text: The gatekeeper owl told you that the stick isn't useless so if you directly attack Sequoia with it, you may defeat it. Defeat Sequoia at the Cradle of Sequoia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004591
text: You finally defeated Sequoia. Ask the gatekeeper about the way to the Sculptor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004592
text: Check the epitaph of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004593
text: Various writings on how to prepare when the demons attack are engraved on the epitaph. Read the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004594
text: Defeat Boowook near the Royal Mausoleum's cube so its power can be absorbed into the cubes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004595
text: The corrupted Boowook can't remember their mission. Defeat Boowook near the large cubes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004596
text: Read the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004597
text: Destroy the corrupted defense mechanism

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004598
text: Destroy the corrupted defense mechanism, so the Guardians stop appearing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004599
text: Destroy the corrupted defense mechanism

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004600
text: Check the epitaph of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004601
text: Get the power source from the Guardians and dedicate it to the containers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004602
text: When a Royal Mausoleum Guardian forgets its duty, its power source gets put into a container and returned to the Royal Mausoleum. Defeat the Guardians and obtain their power sources, then put them into the containers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004603
text: Defeat Achat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004604
text: Achat is already corrupted. Defeat Achat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004605
text: Guardian Achat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004606
text: Talk to the training soldier, Malt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004607
text: You can see Malt whose mind is suffering due to monsters. Talk to Malt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004608
text: Defeat the Flibos in the suppliess path

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004609
text: Malt is having a hard time due to Filibos. Defeat Filibos for Malt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004610
text: It seems that you defeated enough Filibos. Return to Malt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004611
text: Defeat Filibos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004612
text: Talk to Pakelas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004613
text: Pakelas seems very busy. Ask Pakelas about the wagon that Malt told you about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004614
text: Examine the abandoned wagon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004615
text: Pakelas seems to be angry about the work Malt has done. Examine the abandoned wagon on behalf of the busy Pakelas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004616
text: Report to Pakelas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004617
text: Lots of wagons look unusable. Report to Pakelas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004618
text: Pakelas is depressed to hear that a lot of wagons cannot be used. Talk to Pakelas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004619
text: Collect Hamming Stem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004620
text: To use the wagons after fixing them, you should get necessary materials. Defeat Hamming and acquire their Hamming Stem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004621
text: Give them to Pakelas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004622
text: You have enough Hamming Stems. Give them to Pakelas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004623
text: The Supply Officer seem to have a lot of work to do. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004624
text: Collect Plantain Grass

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004625
text: The Supply Officer is appealing that he has too much workload. Help the poor officer collect Plantain Grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004626
text: Give it to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004627
text: You finished collecting the required Plantain Grass. Give it to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004628
text: Talk to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004629
text: The Supply Officer's work does not end with this. Talk to the Supply Officer again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004630
text: Collect Tini Meat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004631
text: The next mission is to supply food from nearby locations. Defeat the Tinis nearby and obtain Tini Meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004632
text: Give them to Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004633
text: This will be enough. Give the Tini Meat to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004634
text: The face of the Supply Officer turns uneasy as he checks the items. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004635
text: Collect Empty Potion Bottles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004636
text: The Supply Officer is angry and saying that Zigris stole the Empty Potion Bottles. To calm him down, retrieve the Empty Potion Bottles that Zigris stole.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004637
text: Acquired all the stolen Empty Potion Bottles. Give them to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004638
text: Obtain %s by defeating Zigris

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004639
text: Obtained an Empty Potion Bottle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004640
text: The Supply Officer is still very angry. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004641
text: Burn the Vubbe Flag

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004642
text: The Supply Officer says the supplies were stolen. Destroy the Vubbe Flag in Vubbe Plunder Base to avenge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004643
text: Destroyed all Vubbe Flags. Report to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004644
text: Defeat the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004645
text: Defeat Black Zigri and Red Puragi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004646
text: Awake the Test Instructor Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004647
text: Awake the Test Instructor Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004648
text: Talk to the Test Instructor Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004649
text: Talk to the Test Instructor Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004650
text: Remnants of Necroventer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004651
text: Talk to the Test Instructor Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004652
text: Passed the first test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004653
text: Pass the first test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004654
text: Defeat the Deadborn of the test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004655
text: Passed the second test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004656
text: Pass the second test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004657
text: Defeat the Sequoia of the test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004658
text: Passed the third test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004659
text: Pass the third test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004660
text: Destroy the Goddess Statue of Test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004661
text: Use the key

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004662
text: Use the key to open the way to Thorn Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004663
text: Move to Thorn Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004664
text: Hanaming suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004665
text: Hanaming's appearance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004666
text: Defeat the herd of Hanamings that are rushing in

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004667
text: Defeat the Hanamings and go back to Knight Titas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004668
text: Listen to the Healer Lady's request

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004669
text: Seems like there is still work to be done. Talk to the Healer Lady again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004670
text: Defeat Chafer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004671
text: Chafer suddenly appeared on your way back to the village. Defeat it so that the villagers can return safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004672
text: Inform the results to the Healer Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004673
text: Inform the Healer Lady that you drove out Chafer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004674
text: Defeat Chafer that is blocking the way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004675
text: Mushcaria suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004676
text: Defeat Mushcaria

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004677
text: Defeat Mushcaria

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004678
text: Learn how to earn skills from the Search Scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004679
text: Learn how to earn skills from{nl} the Search Scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004680
text: key to open the Skill window and learn skills. Try learning a skill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004681
text: You have successfully learned a new skill. Talk to the Soldier again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004682
text: Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004683
text: Defeat the corrupted Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004684
text: A few Guardians have been already corrupted due to the vicious energy that pervaded due to the flow of the magic. Destroy the corrupted Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004685
text: Eliminated the corrupted Guardians. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004686
text: Defeat Corrupt Vikaras Mage

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004687
text: Collect Condensed Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004688
text: The Guardian Stone Statue told you that you should defeat sleeping Guardians using condensed magic before they wake up. Collect the condensed magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004689
text: You collected enough. Return to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004690
text: You have collected the condensed magic used to destroy the corrupted Guardians that are sleeping. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004691
text: Use the condensed magic source to the Guardians that are in sleep

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004692
text: Use the condensed magic source on the sleeping Guardians before they awaken to prevent the spread of corruption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004693
text: You destroyed all the sleeping Guardians. Return to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004694
text: Talk to Treasure Hunter Eden

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004695
text: Treasure Hunter Eden at High Winding Road is looking for someone to deliver monument fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004696
text: Talk to Epigraphist Raymond

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004697
text: You promised to Treasure Hunter Eden that you will deliver the Tombstone Fragments Package to Epigraphist Raymond. Deliver it to Epigraphist Raymond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004698
text: Talk to Epigraphist Schmid at Irody Square

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004699
text: You told him that you will deliver the restored tombstone fragments that you received from Epigraphist Raymond to his assistant Schmid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004700
text: Destroy Denoptic who is the source of the corruption

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004701
text: The Guardian Stone Statue told you that Denoptic is corrupting the Guardians. Find Denoptic and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004702
text: Read the design plan of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004703
text: Find the guardians that are trying to cause the collapse

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004704
text: The Guardians are trying to destroy the Mausoleum to stop the attacks of the demons. Stop the Guardians and prevent the collapse of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004705
text: This is not the only place where the Guardians are instigating the collapse. Find the other places where this is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004706
text: Defeat the Guardians that are trying to destroy the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004707
text: Prevent the Guardians from destroying the Stone Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004708
text: Read the epitaph of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004709
text: Prevent the Guardians from destroying the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004710
text: Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004711
text: Prevent the collapse of the Royal Mausoleum by defeating Bearkaras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004712
text: The determination of the king is trying to destroy the Royal Mausoleum to prevent Rexipher from reaching the will of the goddess. Defeat Bearkaras to prevent the collapse of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004713
text: Defeat Bearkaras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004714
text: Talk to the Secret Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004715
text: Continue to chase after Rexipher deeper into the Royal Mausoleum and prevent the demons from damaging the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004716
text: Collect the Royal Mausoleum's Magic Sources

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004717
text: The Secret Guardian is trying to stop Rexipher from obtaining the revelation. Collect the Royal Mausoleum's Magic Sources from the Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004718
text: You have collected all the magic sources. Return to the Secret Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004719
text: Obtain %s by defeating Medakia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004720
text: Obtain the Soul Pot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004721
text: The Secret Guardian told you that the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel was actually made to defeat Rexipher according to the forecast by the goddess. Talk to the Secret Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004722
text: Pour the magic sources into the jars

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004723
text: The Secret Guardian told you that the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel was actually made to defeat Rexipher according to the forecast by the goddess. Recharge the sources of the magic power of the Mausoleum to the prepared pots.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004724
text: You have poured all the sources of magic into all the jars. Talk to the Secret Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004725
text: You felt like you've heard the sound of demons' cries. Talk to the Secret Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004726
text: Lure and absorb Medakia into the pot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004727
text: You should deal a fatal blow to Rexipher with the will of the Guardians. Place the Soul Pot, and lure the Guardians to it in order to fill it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004728
text: You filled the wills of the Guardians into the pot. Talk to the Secret Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004729
text: Give the pot to the Secret Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004730
text: Now is the time to attack Rexipher and find the revelation of the goddess. Prepare the pot with the wills of the Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004731
text: Defeat Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004732
text: All the energies of the Royal Mausoleum are restraining Rexipher. Defeat Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004733
text: Go to the burial chamber of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004734
text: You have defeated Rexipher! Move to the burial chamber which is the deepest area of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004735
text: Listen to the advice of Zachariel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004736
text: Listen to the interpretations of the revelation from the will of the greatest king of humans, Zachariel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004737
text: Obtain the Burning Stone from the Guardians of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004738
text: To purify the corrupted magic power, you should light up the stone lantern with the Burning Stone. Defeat the Royal Mausoleum Guardians first to get the Burning Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004739
text: Light up the stone lantern with the Burning Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004740
text: You have collected enough Burning Stones. Find the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum and light it up with the Burning Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004741
text: Defeat the Royal Mausoleum Guardians and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004742
text: Obtained the power supply of the stone lantern

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004743
text: Protect the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum from the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004744
text: As the pollution of the magic power became difficult, the demons rushed in to prevent it. Protect the stone lantern by defeating Clymen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004745
text: Defeat Clymen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004746
text: The epitaph felt like it was foretelling something that you should do from now on. You better move as written on the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004747
text: Collect the activation stones to break the Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004748
text: The Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum is not needed anymore since the Revelator came into the tomb. Collect the activation stones from the Guardians nearby to destroy the Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004749
text: Read the manual of the Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004750
text: You collected all the stones and gained their power. Go read the manual for the Regulator again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004751
text: Obtain %s by defeating the Guardians

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004752
text: Collect the activation stones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004753
text: Read the manual for the Regulator again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004754
text: Destroy the Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004755
text: You can feel the power of the activation stones as you read the manual. Destroy the Regulator with this power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004756
text: Destroy the Regulator

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004757
text: You've destroyed the First Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum. Go read the manual again to gain the power of the activation stones again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004758
text: Read the Secret Location Manual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004759
text: You found the Secret Location Manual. Read it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004760
text: Obtained the Guardian Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004761
text: The method of obtaining the secret treasure of the Royal Family is written on the Secret Location Manual. Gain the Guardian Energy first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004762
text: Move to the secret location

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004763
text: You've gained the Guardian Energy. Move to the secret location to find the secret treasure of the Royal Family.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004764
text: Defeat Tomb Lord

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004765
text: A monster interfered as you were about to find the secret treasure of the Royal Family. Defeat Tomb Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004766
text: Find the secret treasure of the Royal Family

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004767
text: You defeated the Tomb Lord that interfered. Now, go find the secret treasure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004768
text: Defeat Tomb Lord

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004769
text: Collect the Blazing Magic Sources

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004770
text: The Guardian Stone Statue told you that the magic to suppress the Guardians was distorted due to demons' schemes. To fix this, get the Blazing Magic Sources that are inside the Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004771
text: You've collected enough amount of Blazing Magic Sources. Return to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004772
text: Obtain %s by defeating Vikaras and Vekarabe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004773
text: Obtained the magnet of the Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004774
text: To fix the flow of regulatory magic, you've collected the Blazing Magic Sources. Light up the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum and protect it to fix the flow of regulatory magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004775
text: Light up the stone lantern and protect it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004776
text: You should change the flow of the magic by using the Blazing Magic Sources. Light up the stone lantern and protect it from the monsters rushing in so it won't break.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004777
text: You were able to fix the flow of the magic, but there are still demons interfering with the flow of magic. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004778
text: Defeat the Guardians near the Magic Vessels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004779
text: The Guardian Stone Statue told you that the corrupted Guardians are trying to break the Magic Vessels. Defeat the Guardians near the Magic Vessels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004780
text: You were able to protect the vessels by defeating the Guardians. Return to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004781
text: Defeat the Guardian who threatens to break the Vessels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004782
text: Remove the corrupted cores

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004783
text: The Guardian Stone Statue told you that there are lots of corrupted cores caused by the evil energy. Find the lumps and remove them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004784
text: You completely removed all the cores. Return to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004785
text: Destroy the corrupted Stone Lantern

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004786
text: Evil energy has corrupted a lantern while spreading within the flow of regulatory magic. Destroy the corrupted lantern.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004787
text: Destroy the corrupted Stone Lantern

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004788
text: Evil energy has corrupted a lantern while spreading within the flow of regulatory magic. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004789
text: Destroy the Corrupt Royal Mausoleum Magic Control Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004790
text: Evil energy is spreading via a corrupted Magic Control Device. Destroy the corrupted Magic Control Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004791
text: You've destroyed the corrupted Magic Control Device and its sources. Return to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004792
text: Defeat Archon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004793
text: Examine the Royal Mausoleum Archives

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004794
text: Many things were prepared for the Revelator at the Royal Mausoleum. Find the reports and read them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004795
text: Collect Wheelen Marks

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004796
text: It is written that Wheelen Marks give power to the Royal Mausoleum Archives. Collect the Wheelen Marks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004797
text: You've collected all the Wheelen Marks. Check the Royal Mausoleum Archives again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004798
text: Obtain %s from Wheelen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004799
text: Obtain sandstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004800
text: Read the Royal Mausoleum Archive

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004801
text: Destroy the hostile Venucelos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004802
text: The Royal Mausoleum Archive records of what terror a defected Venucelos can be. Defeat Venucelos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004803
text: Defeat Venucelos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004804
text: Obtain the secret treasure after defeating Rocktortuga

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004805
text: The Royal Mausoleum Archive indicates that the secret treasure is hidden inside the gigantic Guardian. Defeat Rocktortuga and obtain the secret treasure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004806
text: Defeat Rocktortuga

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004807
text: Talk to Follower Donatas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004808
text: Follower Donatas is seeking for help from somone on the first floor of the Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004809
text: Collect demon souls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004810
text: Follower Donatas told you that you should know more about the demons in order to convert them. Collect their souls after defeating them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004811
text: You have collected enough demon souls. Return to Follower Donatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004812
text: Talk to Coben

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004813
text: You can see Coben pointing at you, hinting something. Talk to Coben.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004814
text: Find the diary Coben is looking for

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004815
text: Coben needs the diary of his relative. Find the diary at the Abandoned Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004816
text: Hand the diary over to Coben

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004817
text: You found the diary at the Abandoned Farm. Hand it over to Coben.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004818
text: Coben found something inside the diary. Talk to Coben again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004819
text: Check the monument at the Crumbled Chapel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004820
text: Coben wants to check the monument that is written about his relative who was a thief, but he can't go due to the monsters. Check what is written on the epitaph for Coben.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004821
text: Tell Coben what was written on the monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004822
text: It was the monument with the person's promise to himself written on it. Tell Coben about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004823
text: Coben is excited to hear that the person once challenged himself to enter the Mage Tower. Talk to Coben again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004824
text: Check the writings on the second monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004825
text: Coben told you to look for the next monument and he also told you that if the monument is unreadable due to its deterioration, you can read the writings again when you rub them with Cockatrice Fat. Get the Fat near the Crumbled Chapel and check what is written on the second monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004826
text: Tell Coben what was written on the monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004827
text: The second monument was written about the person's promise to himself to do something at the Mage Tower in order to become the greatest thief of all time. Tell Coben about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004828
text: Coben disappeared after telling you that he will follow his brother's footsteps. Find Coben and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004829
text: Check what is written on the third monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004830
text: Coben told you that the third monument is located at the left side of Negyvas field. Check what is written on the third monument on behalf of Coben.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004831
text: As a thief, Coben's brother seemed to have found a way to achieve complete victory at the Mage Tower. Tell Coben about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004832
text: Coben seems to be excited to hear that. Talk to Coben again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004833
text: Check what is written on the fourth monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004834
text: Coben told you that you can't use fat anymore to read what's on the next monument. Check what is written on the fourth monument at the right side of Negyvas Field by obtaining charcoals from Hallowventers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004835
text: A method of entering the Mage Tower was written on the monument. Tell Coben about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004836
text: It seems that there is a way for one to enter the Mage Tower. Talk to Coben again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004837
text: Recharge the Strong Magical Power Absorption Jar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004838
text: Coben showed you a device his brother left him. Could this device help one gain access to the Mage Tower? Charge the device first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004839
text: The device is now fully charged. Talk to Coben.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004840
text: You may meet Coben's brother soon. Talk to Coben.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004841
text: Check the writings on the Commanding Monument

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004842
text: The name of the monument is strange which should be the last monument. Check what is written on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004843
text: Sadly, the last monument reads that Coben's brother died after failing to invade the Mage Tower. Tell Coben about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004844
text: Defeat Devilglove

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004845
text: Talk to Caroline Canolyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004846
text: You met Caroline Canolyn who seems very anxious. Talk to Caroline Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004847
text: Defeat Cockatrice

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004848
text: Caroline Canolyn is worried about the Cockatrices that is blocking the way to Fedimian. Defeat Cockatrices that is blocking the way to Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004849
text: Report to Caroline Canolyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004850
text: You defeated enough Cockatrices. Report to Caroline Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004851
text: Caroline Canolyn told you that the monsters stole all the tools. Talk to Caroline Canolyn again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004852
text: Defeat Moa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004853
text: Caroline Canolyn told you that a monster called Moa stole the tool box. Defeat the Moa that ran away to the upper side of the Abandoned Farm and retrieve the tool box.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004854
text: Unfortunately, the toolbox wasn't there. Return and talk to Caroline Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004855
text: Talk to Tara Miles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004856
text: Tara Miles wants your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004857
text: Defeat the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004858
text: Tara Miles is looking for someone who can defeat the monsters that are spreading a dangerous disease. Defeat Cockatrices nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004859
text: You have defeated many of the monsters that are spreading disease. Return to Tara Miles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004860
text: Tara Miles told you that she will be waiting at Negyvas Field. Find Tara Miles and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004861
text: Collect dust samples from Hallowventers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004862
text: Tara Miles told you that there are many reasons for the spread of the disease. First, obtain the dust samples from Hallowventers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004863
text: Hand over the dust samples to Tara Miles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004864
text: You obtained many dust samples from Hallowventers. Hand them over to Tara Miles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004865
text: Obtain %s from Hallowventer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004866
text: Collect Dust Samples

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004867
text: It seems that Tara Miles' investigation is not done yet. Talk to Tara Miles again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004868
text: Obtain Big Cockatrice Tails

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004869
text: Tara Miles wants the tails from the Big Cockatrices that are already diseased. Get the tails from Big Cockatrice beyond the camp of beekeepers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004870
text: Hand over the Big Cockatrice Tails to Tara Miles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004871
text: You obtained enough Big Cockatrice Tails. Return to Tara Miles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004872
text: Obtain Big Cockatrice Tails

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004873
text: Someone is looking for you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004874
text: There is a person who is looking for you in Fedimian. Go to the gigantic Goddess Statue in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004875
text: Talk to Grita at Crystal Brook

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004876
text: Grita was waiting at the Karsta Hall Site near Crystal Brook. Go and talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004877
text: Once you arrived at Karsta Hall Site near Crystal Brook, it seems as if Grita was waiting there. Go and talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004878
text: Go to the Mage Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004879
text: Grita told you that the Goddess Gabija is resisting the attacks of the demons at the Mage Tower. Go to the Mage Tower to help the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004880
text: Talk to Grita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004881
text: You finally arrived inside the Mage Tower. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004882
text: Light up the signal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004883
text: Grita told you that Gabija was protecting the tower, but since the monsters are still around, something bad must have happened to the goddess. Light up the signal at the left hallway to let the goddess know that you are here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004884
text: You successfully lit up the signal. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004885
text: Defeat the Rubblems

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004886
text: You lit up a signal to let the goddess know that help is coming. Discuss what to do next with Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004887
text: Check the 1st Transport Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004888
text: Grita told you that using the Transport Magic Circle is the fastest way to go upstairs. Go to the 1st Transport Magic Circle to see whether it is working correctly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004889
text: You defeated the monsters that were rushing in and arrived at the place where the 1st Transport Magic Circle is located at. Talk to Grita.{nl}{nl}Grita finished checking the 1st Transport Magic Circle. Ask Grita if it works.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004890
text: Defeat interfering Phyracons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004891
text: Defeat interfering Drakes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004892
text: Grita's face turned grim as she was checking the Transport Magic Circle. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004893
text: Activate the 2nd Transport Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004894
text: Grita told you that the 1st Transport Magic Circle is badly broken and recommended to use the other, larger Transport Magic Circle. Look for the 2nd Transport Magic Circle and activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004895
text: You thought you could use the 2nd Transport Magic Circle, but there was a trap set by the demons. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004896
text: Destroy the 2nd Transport Magic Circle restraining Grita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004897
text: Grita told you that with the present danger, the plan to directly reach Goddess Gabija via the Transport Magic Circles should be abandoned, and you should focus on the monsters rushing into the tower. Talk to Grita for more details.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004898
text: Charge the Absorbing Gem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004899
text: Grita said in order to activate the Tower's Barrier Device again, it would need a great amount of energy. Set the gem Grita gave you on the ground and recharge the gem with the monsters' life force.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004900
text: You were able to charge the Absorbing Gem with monsters' life force. Return to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004901
text: You finished charging the Absorbing Gem with monsters' life force. Talk to Grita about the method of activating the Barrier Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004902
text: Activate the Barrier Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004903
text: The Barrier Device is at the end of the left hallway. Activate the Barrier Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004904
text: You were able to activate the Barrier Device. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004905
text: You arrived on the 2nd floor of the Mage Tower. Talk to Grita about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004906
text: Search for the Jewel of Prominence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004907
text: Find the Jewel of Prominence. Use the detector to look for the Jewel of Prominence on the 2nd floor of the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004908
text: You found the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004909
text: You got the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita about how you can input the power into the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004910
text: Collect Flame Vapor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004911
text: Grita told you that in order to complete the Jewel of Prominence, you should fill it with Flame Vapor. Fill it with the Flame Vapor that leaks in the Large Reading Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004912
text: You filled the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor. Return to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004913
text: You collected all the Flame Vapor. Ask Grita what to do next to complete the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004914
text: Charge the Jewel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004915
text: If you unleash the Flame Vapor, it will bring the Essences of Flame. Fill the Essences to the 2nd pot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004916
text: You filled the Jewel of Prominence with the Essence of Fire. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004917
text: You filled all the Essences of Fire. Ask Grita what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004918
text: Obtain Flame Sources by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004919
text: The energy is not enough yet, so Grita told you that you should enhance the energy with Flame Sources. Defeat the monsters nearby and collect Flame Sources.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004920
text: You collected enough Flame Sources. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004921
text: Obtain %s from the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004922
text: Obtain Flame Sources

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004923
text: Now, there is one more step to complete the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004924
text: Combine materials with the Jewel of Prominence in the Flame Fusion Machine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004925
text: Grita told you that since the Jewel of Prominence is not complete yet, you should combine materials with it in the Flame Fusion Machine. Combine the materials at the Flame Fusion Machine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004926
text: You successfully completed the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004927
text: Grita is waiting at the third floor of Mage Tower. Go to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004928
text: Defeat Krumadok

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004929
text: It seems that the mad magician Antares is loose. Defeat the Krumadok which Antares has summoned.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004930
text: You defeated Krumadoks which Antares summoned. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004931
text: It was the mad magician, Antares who summoned the Krumadoks. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004932
text: Destroy the first Magic Control Valve

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004933
text: Grita told you to break the Magic Control Valve to stop Antares. Destroy the valve at the Laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004934
text: As you destroyed the valve, it exploded. While it cleared away the monsters, it was really dangerous. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004935
text: Destroy the Magic Control Valve

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004936
text: The Magic Control Valve was way more powerful than you expected. You better discuss it with Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004937
text: Look for info on the Magic Control Valve

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004938
text: Grita told you that since Antares did research on the flow of magic, the research information must be left nearby. Search Antares' books and find information on the valves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004939
text: It seems that you found information on the flow of magic. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004940
text: You found the way to destroy the magic safely. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004941
text: Find the 2nd Valve in the Central Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004942
text: Most of the monsters would receive tremendous damages if you could destroy all the valves to explode the magic. Find the 2nd valve in the central control room which is the only one remaining.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004943
text: Antares left a trap. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004944
text: Check the Immobile Mineloader

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004945
text: There is a Mineloader at the Mage Tower that acts as a guard. Check the immobile Mineloader.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004946
text: Defeat the hostile Mineloader

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004947
text: Defeat the suddenly mobile Mineloader

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004948
text: Grita is waiting at the fourth floor of the Mage Tower. Go to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004949
text: Check the status of the Jewel of Prominence after defeating all nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004950
text: The Jewel of Prominence's status became abnormal since the Antares incident on the 3rd floor. Check its status as you defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004951
text: You felt the power of flames as you defeated the monsters. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004952
text: You defeated all the monsters nearby, but Grita's speaking tone is little abnormal. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004953
text: Activate the stabilizer of the magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004954
text: Grita told you that the energy of the Jewel is unstable, so you need to go through a process to stabilize it. Activate the stabilizer and defeat the monsters to stabilize the Jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004955
text: You successfully stabilized the energy of the Jewel. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004956
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in after hearing the sound of the explosion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004957
text: You stabilized the jewel using the stabilizer, but the jewel is still unstable. Ask Grita what to do about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004958
text: Collect Flame Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004959
text: Grita told you that in order to stabilize the Jewel fully, you need to get Flame Crystals. Collect the Crystals from the Center Large Brazier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004960
text: Hand over the Flame Crystals to Grita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004961
text: You collected enough Flame Crystals. Hand them over to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004962
text: Look for the Laboratory

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004963
text: You collected all the Essences of Flame to stabilize the Jewel of Prominence. Now, hand them over to Grita and return to the Laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004964
text: Protect Grita who is stabilizing the Jewel of Prominence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004965
text: Grita told you that she can stabilize the jewel fully at the Laboratory. Protect Grita while she is stabilizing the jewel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004966
text: Look for Grita, who just ran away

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004967
text: You should retrieve the jewel from Grita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004968
text: Defeat Minivern

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004969
text: Look for Grita, who just ran away

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004970
text: Grita suddenly ran away with the jewel! You are confused about this situation. Chase after Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004971
text: Defeat the monsters that were summoned by the demon, Grita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004972
text: Grita was in fact a demon. Were you deceived by Grita all along? Defeat the monsters that were summoned by Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004973
text: Defeat Grinende

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004974
text: Destroy Helgasercle's 1st Magic Suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004975
text: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 1st Suppressor located at the Hall of Fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004976
text: Destroy the Magic Suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004977
text: Destroy Helgasercle's 2nd Magic Suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004978
text: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 2nd Suppressor located at the Reception Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004979
text: Destroy Helgasercle's 3rd Magic Suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004980
text: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 3rd Suppressor located at the Small Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004981
text: Destroy Helgasercle's 4th Magic Suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004982
text: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 4th Suppressor at the Reading Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004983
text: Find Helgasercle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004984
text: You destroyed all four Magic Suppressors that Helgasercle prepared. It is now time to liberate the Mage Tower from the demon's powers. Find Helgasercle at the Great Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004985
text: Defeat Helgasercle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004986
text: Defeat Helgasercle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004987
text: Use the Jewel of Prominence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004988
text: You should help Gabija now with the Jewel of Prominence. Put the jewels in the center of Keturidu great hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004989
text: Talk to Goddess Gabija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004990
text: You received the revelation from the goddess.{nl}Ask the goddess what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004991
text: Now it's time to destroy the 2nd Valve. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004992
text: Grita told you that the 2nd Valve is in the Central Control Room. Go to the Central Control Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004993
text: Antares touched the wrong part of the valve, so the valve exploded. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004994
text: Check the Barrier Activation Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004995
text: The Barrier Activation Device is an important piece of equipment that protects the Mage Tower. Carefully inspect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004996
text: Defeat Salamander

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004997
text: The Salamander suddenly disappeared as you tried to inspect the Barrier Activation Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004998
text: Talk to Soldier Bran

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_004999
text: Soldier Bran is gazing at you with his bright eyes shining. Talk to Soldier Bran.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005000
text: Talk to Commander Raimondas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005001
text: Soldier Bran want you to persuade Commander Raimondas for him since he wants go out to battle fields with his friend, Pitt. Meet Commander Raimondas at Gyveni Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005002
text: Talk to the Herbalist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005003
text: Commander Raimondas told you that he will test you whether you possess abilities to train soldiers well by seeing how you help the herbalist. Talk to the herbalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005004
text: Before actual trainings, you should help the herbalist's tasks in order to fulfill Commander Raimondas' standards. Talk to the herbalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005005
text: Get Tini Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005006
text: The herbalist told you that you need the secreting fluid of Tinis to defeat the thorny bushes that interferes with the supply route. Defeat Tinis at Gyveni Garden and get the secreting fluid of Tinis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005007
text: Hand it over to the herbalist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005008
text: You obtained all the Tini Fluid. Hand them over to the herbalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005009
text: Obtain Tini Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005010
text: It seems that the herbicide is all completed. Talk to the herbalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005011
text: Use the herbicide on the thorny bushes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005012
text: The herbalist gave you the herbicide that he made. Use it on the place below where thorny bushes are located.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005013
text: A gigantic monster appeared as you used the herbicide, but you were able to defeat it. Talk to the soldier, Bran.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005014
text: Defeat Rytaswort

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005015
text: &Check the Flame Fusion Machine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005016
text: &The Flame Fusion Machine in Mage Tower 2F has a function to enhance the power of the flame. Check the Flame Fusion Machine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005017
text: &Archon appeared as you were checking the Flame Fusion Machine. Defeat Archon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005018
text: Talk to the trainining officer Alryus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005019
text: To become the official soldier of the Raimondas' military, you need the symbol of the training. Talk to Alryus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005020
text: Defeat Golem and obtain the symbol of the completion of the training

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005021
text: The training officer, Alryus told you to defeat Golem and obtain the symbol of the completion of the training. Defeat the grey golem at the highest place of the training camp and obtain the symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005022
text: You were successful obtaining the symbol by defeating the grey golem. Tell Alryus that you obtained the symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005023
text: Defeat Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005024
text: The commander, Raimondas was happy at first when he saw Peter and Bran, but soon his face turned grim. Ask him what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005025
text: Investigate the dead body that is presumed to be Spion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005026
text: Raimondas congratulated you for obtaining the symbol and he also gave you one more mission. Go to Morku Farm and investigate the dead body that is presumed to be Spion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005027
text: Talk to Soldier Pitt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005028
text: Soldier Pitt doesn't know what to say in front of the dead body that is presumed to be Spion. Talk to Soldier Pitt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005029
text: Check whether the dead body is Spion's

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005030
text: Pitt is not conscious enough to check the dead body. Check the dead body on behalf of Pitt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005031
text: As you were trying to check the body, the herbalist who turned into a demon, took the body and left. Talk to Pitt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005032
text: Pitt is crying due to the sadness of Spion's death. Talk to Pitt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005033
text: Chase after the herbalist to the Big Rock Face Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005034
text: Pitt wants avenge the herbalist for Spion's death. It seems that the herbalist went to the direction of Big Rock Face Hills. Chase after the herbalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005035
text: Report to Commander Raimondas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005036
text: Spion who was definitely dead became violent because of the herbalist so you had no other choice, but to defeat him. Return to Raimondas and tell him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005037
text: Defeat Bebraspion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005038
text: You should now return to meet Raimondas since you obtained the symbol. Talk to Alryus before you meet Raimondas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005039
text: It seems that you are qualified to become an official soldier since you obtained the symbol. Meet Raimondas and show him the symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005040
text: Talk to Follower Vaidutis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005041
text: Meet Follower Vaidutis in the Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005042
text: Collect the Power Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005043
text: Vaidutis told you that in order to remove the barrier at the church's entrance, you need to collect the Power Crystals from Corylus to make a Light Crystal. Defeat Corylus at the Worship Anteroom and obtain the Crystals of Power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005044
text: As Vaidutis had planned, you have collected enough Power Crystals. Return to Vaidutis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005045
text: Obtain %s by defeating Corylus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005046
text: The Essence of Light is ready. Talk to Follower Vaidutis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005047
text: Open the church entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005048
text: Vaidutis told you to use the Light Crystal to release the demonic barrier at the church's entrance. Powerful monsters will be attracted to the power of the Light Crystal and may attack you, so he told you to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005049
text: Defeat Mummyghast

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005050
text: Move to Entrance of Kateen Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005051
text: Goddess Gabija says that she must gather her strength a bit more at the Entrance of Kateen Forest. Go past Fallen Tree Garden to the Entrance of Kateen Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005052
text: Entrance of Kateen Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005053
text: Vaidutis is looking for help from somebody in the Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005054
text: Defeat Pawndel and Pawnd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005055
text: Vaidutis asked you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd that are roaming around at the Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005056
text: You have defeated enough of Pawndel and Pawnd as Vaidutis requested. Return to Vaidutis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005057
text: Defeat Pawndel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005058
text: Defeat Pawnd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005059
text: Follower Donatas is seeking for your help

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005060
text: Collect the clothes of Pawndel and Pawnd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005061
text: Follower Donatas is trying to disguise as a demon and create chaos. First, collect the clothes of Pawndel and Pawnd.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005062
text: You have collected all the clothes of Pawndel and Pawnd. Hand them over to Follower Donatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005063
text: Defeat demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005064
text: Follower Donatas is waiting for the Revelator at the 1st floor of the church to hand over the scroll that turns oneself into a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005065
text: Lure Pawndel and Pawnd to the Apsauga Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005066
text: Donatas told you to gain confidence by defeating Pawndels and Pawndus disguise yourself into a demon using the scroll. Disguise yourself into a demon and lure Pawndels and Pawndus to the Apsauga Altar and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005067
text: You defeated Pawndel and Pawnd after luring them to the altar. Talk to Follower Donatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005068
text: Grita seems to remembered something. Talk to Grita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005069
text: Extract the core of the spelled doll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005070
text: Grita suggests that you prepare a protection spell in case you get caught in the explosion from destroying the valve. Collect Fallenlem Cores that are ingredients for the protection spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005071
text: You've gathered Fallenlem Cores. Talk to Grita once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005072
text: You are now ready to transform those demons. Talk to Follower Donatas about the plan for the transformation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005073
text: Convert demons at the Globejas Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005074
text: Follower Donatas told you that you are able to convert the demons using the power of the Globejas Altar. Activate the power of the altar, and if you attack those demons in an area where the influence of the altar's power reaches, you can convert those demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005075
text: You have converted the demons. Return to Donatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005076
text: Check the Central Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005077
text: Follower Donatas told you to check the central barrier that had stopped working.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005078
text: You defeated the Mallet Wyvern at the central altar. Talk to Follower Donatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005079
text: Defeat Mallet Wyvern

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005080
text: Talk to Follower Tomas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005081
text: Follower Tomas wants help on the Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005082
text: Defeat Yognome

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005083
text: Follower Tomas told you to defeat the Yognomes around here, since they are trying to eat the altar and he can't concentrate his work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005084
text: As Follower Tomas requested of you, you defeated all the Yognomes. Return to Follower Tomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005085
text: Collect the Eyes of Madness

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005086
text: Follower Tomas told you to defeat Rodelins and retrieve their Eyes of Madness, which can be used to hide from demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005087
text: You collected enough Eyes of Madness. Return to Follower Tomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005088
text: Defeat Rodelins and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005089
text: Obtain the Eyes of Madness

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005090
text: Follower Tomas wants help on the 1st floor of the Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005091
text: Follower Tomas told you that it is necessary to defeat the Unknocker that is guarding the altar in order to disable the barrier. Attack the Unknocker when Follower Tomas lures it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005092
text: You defeated the Unknocker that was guarding the altar. Talk to Follower Tomas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005093
text: Talk to Follower Tiberius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005094
text: Tiberius is waiting for someone's help in the Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005095
text: Obtained the Purified Essences.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005096
text: Tiberius told you to obtain Vicious Essences by defeating demons, and then purify them into Purified Essences at the Altar of Purification, so he can complete his Holy Bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005097
text: You have collected enough Purified Essences as Tiberius requested of you. Return to Tiberius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005098
text: Defeat Glizardon using the Holy Bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005099
text: Tiberius wants to test the Holy Bombs on Glizardon. Drink the Romuva Holy Water to hide yourself, and then put the Holy Bomb onto a Glizardon's back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005100
text: Glizardon died right away after the Holy Bomb on it's back exploded. Return to Tiberius and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005101
text: Talk to Follower Vaidas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005102
text: Vaidas is waiting for help at the Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005103
text: Charge the Holy Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005104
text: Vaidas told you to charge the empty Holy Stone with the lives of the demons. He told you that when you place the stone and lure demons near it, the stone will automatically absorb the lives of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005105
text: You successfully charged the Holy Stone as Vaidas requested of you. Return to Vaidas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005106
text: Defeat Glizardon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005107
text: Vaidas asked you to defeat the Glizardons that roam around the Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005108
text: You defeated the Glizardons as Vaidas requested. Return to Vaidas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005109
text: Follower Tomas asked you to find Vaidutis at the Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005110
text: Deactivate the barrier that Gesti created

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005111
text: Vaidas told you that the demons have made a magic barrier at the basement's central altar. Destroy the barrier and continue looking for Follower Vaidutis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005112
text: Find Follower Vaidutis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005113
text: Removed the barrier that was blocking the way to the 1st floor and defeated the Cyclops. Look for Vaidutis, who ran away to the 1st floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005114
text: Defeat Cyclops

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005115
text: Talk to Follower Algis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005116
text: Follower Algis was waiting for you on the 2nd Floor. Talk to him and ask what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005117
text: Go to the Bell Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005118
text: Saw Gesti scolding her subordinates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005119
text: Almost got caught by Gesti, but you found out something good. Gesti hasn't found the revelation yet. Ask Follower Algis about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005120
text: Gesti disappeared to the Central Hall. Talk to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005121
text: Follower Algis says that in order to enter the hidden sanctuary, you need the Seal of Space, which is hidden in the Central Altar, but Gesti is roaming around the area and it is too dangerous. Occupy the Bell Tower, a good observation point.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005122
text: Captured the Bell Tower. Talk to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005123
text: Captured the Bell Tower. Ask Follower Algis what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005124
text: Gesti destroyed the Sventove Central Altar!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005125
text: Gesti destroyed the Sventove Central Altar and has stolen the Seal of Space. You can't get the revelation at this rate and you'll be killed if you run into Gesti. Work with Follower Algis on finding a way to solve the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005126
text: Make a trap at Sventove Central Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005127
text: Follower Algis suggested using the pieces of the Altar that Gesti destroyed to immobilize her. Collect the altar pieces and place them on the eight pillars of Sventove Central Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005128
text: Inserted the altar pieces on the eight pillars. Return to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005129
text: Follower Algis is waiting for the Revelator in the Tenet Church 2F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005130
text: Follower Algis says it'll be hard for him to secure the area alone so he asked you to activate the Malda Altar's powers to lure demons to their demise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005131
text: Got rid of the demons and activated the altar. Return to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005132
text: Charge the low level spirit crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005133
text: Follower Algis says you need to defeat any pursuing demons. Use the Auka Altar to defeat demons and keep them from chasing you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005134
text: Activated the altar and shifted the demons' interest to the altar. Return to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005135
text: Defeat Egnome

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005136
text: Follower Algis asked you to defeat the Egnome wandering inside the church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005137
text: Defeated enough Egnome. Return to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005138
text: Inserted the altar pieces on the eight pillars of Sventove Central Hall. Gesti hasn't realized yet. Proceed to the next plan with Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005139
text: Fight with Gesti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005140
text: Gesti was weakened with the power of the Central Altar and the eight pillars. Now you can fight equally against Gesti. Disable Gesti while Follower Algis prepares the Divine Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005141
text: Failed to defeat Gesti as she escaped seriously injured. Talk to Follower Algis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005142
text: Gesti escaped, but there are still more things left to do in the church. Talk to Follower Algis again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005143
text: Find the revelation in the hidden sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005144
text: Use the Seal of Space on the pillar to enter the sanctuary and find the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005145
text: Tell the Paladin Master about the story so far

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005146
text: The revelation has been successfully retrieved dispite losing Gesti again. Go to Emerald Bluffs to meet the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005147
text: Talk to Watcher Allen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005148
text: Watcher Allen at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for someone to help him

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005149
text: Collect Destroyed Barrier Piece

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005150
text: Watcher Allen asked you to collect the pieces of barrier the demons destroyed at Mazas Rest Place and take them to Follower Kayetonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005151
text: Talk to Follower Kayetonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005152
text: Collected the pieces of the barrier. Give the pieces to Follower Kayetonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005153
text: Charge the Tree Guard Post Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005154
text: Help Watcher Allen defeat the demons around the Tree Guard Post Barrier and charge the barrier with demon souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005155
text: The Tree Guard Post Barrier has been charged. Inform Follower Kayetonas about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005156
text: Talk to Watcher Kenneth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005157
text: Watcher Kenneth at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005158
text: Remove the Demon Summoning Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005159
text: Watcher Kenneth is worried about the Demon Summoning Circles in Mairunas Knoll. Defeat the demons nearby Mairunas Knoll and remove the summoning circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005160
text: Talk to Follower Kayetonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005161
text: Removed the Demon Summoning Circles as requested by Watcher Kenneth. Tell Follower Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill that there were Demon Summoning Circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005162
text: Defeat severed demons' souls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005163
text: Watcher Kenneth told you to weaken the demons to less than half HP, then use the holy powers of the barrier to sever their souls and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005164
text: Defeated enough severed souls in Pumpura Hill. Report to Follower Kayetonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005165
text: Defeat the demon monsters nearby Kenneth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005166
text: Kenneth asked you to defeat the nearby monsters while he takes a rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005167
text: Defeated the monsters while Kenneth rested. Tell Follower Kayetonas about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005168
text: Follower Kayetonas at Emerald Bluff is looking for someone that will fight with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005169
text: Minotaur appeared from the sky like Follower Kayetonas said. Defeat Minotaur so that it won't get to the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005170
text: Defeated Minotaur together with Follower Kayetonas. Talk to Follower Kayetonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005171
text: The Paladin Master at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for you at Uzbaiga Hillside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005172
text: Listen to Follower Algis' explanations

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005173
text: The Paladin Master ask you to listen to Follower Algis about the Tenet Church, the first Paladin, and the Seal of Space. Listen to Follower Algis before he leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005174
text: Listened to Follower Algis' explanations. Report to the Paladin Master and follow the next orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005175
text: The Paladin Master is looking for you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005176
text: Help the Paladin Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005177
text: Gesti appeared. Help the Paladin Master!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005178
text: The Paladin Master hit Gesti spot on, but stopped short of wounding her. Talk to the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005179
text: The Paladin Master at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for you to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005180
text: The Paladin Master asked you to clear the area while he focuses on the Divine Sphere. Defeat the Throneweaver coming to attack you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005181
text: Defeat Throneweaver

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005182
text: Defeat the corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardians

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005183
text: The Guardian Stone Statue said you can't change back corrupted Guardians. Defeat them instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005184
text: Defeat the Royal Mausoleum Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005185
text: Read the Royal Mausoleum gravestone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005186
text: There is a Guardian Stone Statue emitting strange energy. Check the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005187
text: Defeat the corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardians

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005188
text: The Stone Statue corrupted with evil energy is summoning Guardians. Defeat the corrupted Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005189
text: Find the hidden treasure

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005190
text: There is a hidden treasure. Find it and get the treasure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005191
text: It was a trap. Defeat the corrupted Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005192
text: It was a warning on the corrupted Guardians. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005193
text: Defeat Rusrat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005194
text: There is a Guardian Stone Statue emitting strange energy. Check the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005195
