text: The corrupted Guardians wish to be destroyed rather than stay corrupted. Defeat those Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005196
text: Talk to Rolandas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005197
text: Rolandas was waiting at the Stone Pole Platform just as Morcus Jonas told you. Talk to Rolandas in order to find the treasures of the Great King Zachariel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005198
text: Search for the map at Vienisa Highland

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005199
text: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. First, check the bottom area of Vienisa Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005200
text: Talk to Rolandas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005201
text: You were unsuccessful on your first try. Return to Rolandas and ask for the next area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005202
text: Check the area Rolandas Jonas told you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005203
text: Check the area Rolandas told you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005204
text: Search for the map at Ratas Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005205
text: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. {nl}Search for the map in Ratas Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005206
text: Search for the map at Rodoma 1st Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005207
text: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. Could it be found in Rodoma 1st Ruins?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005208
text: Search the area Rolandas told you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005209
text: Search for the map nearby Tomb Guard's Cabin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005210
text: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. Check around the cabin of the grave manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005211
text: Search for the map nearby Tomb Guard's Cabin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005212
text: Search for the map at Tomb Guard's Cabin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005213
text: Archaeologist Dezic appears to be poisoned by Scorpio's attacks. Talk to Assistant Airine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005214
text: Find an antidote for the archaeologist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005215
text: Archaeologist Dezic's condition seems to be worsening. The cable car operators might have an antidote. Ask around to see if anyone at Stone Pole Platform has an antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005216
text: Found the antidote. Give it to Airine quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005217
text: Disarm all Seal Devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005218
text: Disarm all Seal Devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge with the key from Overlong Bridge Valley and the map obtained at Stone Pole Platform.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005219
text: Enter the Overlooking Crossroad Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005220
text: You have broken all seals. Enter the Overlooking Crossroad Royal Mausoleum to look for the treasures of the Great King Zachariel which have been guarded by the Jonas family for hundreds of years.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005221
text: Go to Royal Mausoleum's secret location

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005222
text: Go to the Secret Royal Mausoleum Area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005223
text: Examine the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005224
text: You've been transported somewhere after releasing the seals. Looks like this is where the king's inheritance is hidden. Examine the chest for treasures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005225
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005226
text: Monsters are coming to snatch the map away from you. Although you don't know their motives for doing so, eliminate them for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005227
text: The map is safe. Bring the map to Rolandas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005228
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005229
text: Talk to Historian Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005230
text: Historian Rexipher was waiting for you on the way to the Royal Mausoleum. Talk to Historian Rexipher at Dense Mist Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005231
text: Read the epitaph of Isvalyta Historic Site

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005232
text: Historian Rexipher is asking for your cooperation for the common objective of getting to the Royal Mausoleum. Follow his guide and read the epitaph of Isvalyta Historic Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005233
text: Got the clues to the King's dilemma. Talk to Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005234
text: The epitaph mentions about the dilemma on proving the Revelator. Talk to Rexipher about the location of next epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005235
text: Read the epitaph at Serno Highland

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005236
text: Rexipher says the next epitaph is at Serno Highland. Go there and check the next epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005237
text: You were barely able to defeat the guardians protecting the epitaph and obtain the second clue about Zachariel. Find and talk to Rexipher who is sure to be watching from somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005238
text: You must solve all the dilemmas of the Great King Zachariel in order to approach the Royal Mausoleum. Talk to rexipher for clues to the next dilemma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005239
text: Read the third epitaph along the way to Dykyne Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005240
text: The next epitaph is at Dykyne Fork. Find the epitaph near the road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005241
text: The power of the guardian on the epitaph almost got Historian Rexipher in trouble. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005242
text: Talk to Historian Rexipher about the location of the fourth epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005243
text: Read the epitaph left of Dykyne Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005244
text: It is the fourth clue prepared by the Great King Zachariel. Read the epitaph left of Dykyne Fork and obtain the fourth clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005245
text: Got the fourth clue. Return to Rexipher who showed up from somewhere and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005246
text: There is only one epitaph left for the clue. Talk to Rexipher for the location of the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005247
text: Read the last epitaph at Apatinis Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005248
text: It is the last clue prepared by the Great King Zachariel. Read the epitaph in Apatinis Cliff and get the fifth clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005249
text: Got the fifth clue. Return and talk to Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005250
text: Protect the Royal Mausoleum Stone Lantern

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005251
text: The Guardian Stone Statue says the flow of magic in the Royal Mausoleum will be disrupted if the stone lanterns are destroyed. Protect the stone lanterns from demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005252
text: Follow Rexipher to Royal Mausoleum 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005253
text: Rexipher destroyed the stone lantern and disappeared to a deeper area. Follow him to the 3rd Floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005254
text: Defeat the corrupted Guardians

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005255
text: A twisted spell is causing the Guardians to attack both enemies and allies. Defeat the corrupted Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005256
text: Defeat the Echad that can't identify friend or foe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005257
text: Search the deeper part of the Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005258
text: Defeat the Shnayim that thinks you are a foe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005259
text: Much of the Royal Mausoleum is not functioning well because of the corrupt magic. Defeat the Shnayim that identifies you as an enemy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005260
text: Talk to Vincent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005261
text: Vincent seems to have found out. Talk to Vincent again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005262
text: Defeat the monster that followed Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005263
text: Toby is being chased by Yonazolem! Defeat Yonazolem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005264
text: Defeat Yonazolem that was chasing Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005265
text: Rexipher is thinking deeply, looking at the clues. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005266
text: Get Hogma Teeth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005267
text: Rexipher says the clues are covered with something and needs Hogma's teeth to use as an abrasive. Get him Hogma's teeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005268
text: Got Hogma's teeth. Talk to Historian Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005269
text: Get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005270
text: Get Hogma Teeth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005271
text: Find out Historian Rexipher's whereabouts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005272
text: Rexipher disappeared with Zachariel's clues. Go to Liason Officer Bale and ask about Historian Rexipher's whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005273
text: Liaison Officer Bale says he doesn't know Historian Rexipher. Ask the other historians for his whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005274
text: Historian Colin says he doesn't know Rexipher, either. Ask other historians for Rexipher's whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005275
text: Ask Cyrenia Odell for Rexipher's Whereabouts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005276
text: Rexipher took all of Zachariel's clues; you must find him, no matter what. Ask about him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005277
text: Trace Rexipher's whereabouts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005278
text: You were not able to find Rexipher's whereabouts, but you found out that Rexipher is a demon's name. Continue investigating Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005279
text: Go to the Chesed Altar where Rexipher is attacking

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005280
text: A man who looks like Rexipher is attacking historians at the Chesed and Gedula Altars to take control of the area. First, go to the Chesed Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005281
text: Defeat the Hogmas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005282
text: Break the Keturka Altar Seal before Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005283
text: Chesed's seal has been broken! The other altars are in danger. Go and break the seal on Keturka Altar before Rexipher does.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005284
text: Talk to Historian Cyrenia Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005285
text: Cyrenia Odell came to the altar. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005286
text: Talk to Historian Cyrenia Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005287
text: Break the Tzedej Altar seal before Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005288
text: I think we'd better forstall whatever Rexipher is trying to do before he causes any more trouble. First, go to Tzedej Altar which is nearby and break the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005289
text: The Tzedej Altar seal has been broken! Report this to Cyrenia Odell!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005290
text: Talk to Cyrenia Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005291
text: Talk to Cyrenia Odell to learn where the other seals are located.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005292
text: Break the Sevisa seal before Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005293
text: Foil Rexipher's plans by breaking the Sevisa Altar seal before Rexipher gets there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005294
text: Thankfully, it seems as if Sevisa Altar is safe. Return to Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005295
text: Break the Sevisa Altar seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005296
text: You've succeeded in breaking the Sevisa Altar seal despite Tzedej Altar being destroyed. Talk to Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005297
text: Go to Cyrenia Odell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005298
text: The Chesed Altar was destroyed, but you managed to release the seal of Sviesa Altar. Talk to Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005299
text: Defeat Rexipher's Subordinates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005300
text: Rexipher kidnapped Cyrenia Odell! Better defeat his subordinates and follow him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005301
text: Epigraphist Raymond at High Winding Road is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005302
text: Create Crude Divining Rod

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005303
text: Epigraphist Raymond wants to use Stumpy Tree Branches to make a Crude Divining Rod, useful for finding the tombstone fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005304
text: Find the first fragment of the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005305
text: Raymond asked you to gather Stumpy Tree Branches and make a Crude Divining Rod.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005306
text: Stumpy Tree Branch

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005307
text: Find the first fragment of the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005308
text: I created the Crude Divining Rod using the Stumpy Tree Branches. Use it to find the first fragment of the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005309
text: Found the first fragment of the tombstone. Return to Epigraphist Raymond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005310
text: Find the second fragment of the tombstone under Seklus Bridge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005311
text: Raymond told you where the second piece of the tombstone might be. First, make sure this unique slate is actually the second fragment of the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005312
text: The unique slate wasn't the real thing, but you defeated Achat and got the Second Piece of the tombstone. Return to Epigraphist Raymond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005313
text: Defeat Achat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005314
text: Collect the Dusty Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005315
text: Raymond asked you to collect pieces of the Dusty Fragments from Gaisra Hall Site. He told you to defeat the Tree Ambuloes and get the Dusty Fragments back if they happen to steal any from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005316
text: Gathered enough Dusty Fragments. Give them to Raymond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005317
text: Burn Tree Ambuloes and get Carbonized Tombstone Fragment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005318
text: Raymond told you to light the firewood at Gaisra Hall Site and defeat the Tree Ambuloes, then burn them to get Carbonized Tombstone Fragment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005319
text: Collected enough Carbonized Tombstone Fragment. Take them to Ryamond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005320
text: Collect Carbonized Tombstone Fragment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005321
text: Go and talk to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005322
text: Learn about Attributes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005323
text: Learn attributes and talk to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005324
text: Read the Royal Mausoleum Foundation Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005325
text: There is a foundation stone in the Royal Mausoleum. Read it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005326
text: Wake the sleeping Boowook

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005327
text: The Foundation Stone said to wake the sleeping Guardians and stop the demons when they intrude. Wake the sleeping Boowook and stop the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005328
text: Find another epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005329
text: Talk to Watcher Rikke

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005330
text: Watcher Rikke at Fallen Tree Garden is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005331
text: Remove the beehive

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005332
text: Follower Rikke is worried about the Biteregina from Kateen Forest. Remove the beehive for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005333
text: You barely defeated the angry Biteregina that appeared when you removed the beehive. Tell Rikke that there will no longer be threats to worry about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005334
text: Talk to Watcher Erra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005335
text: Watcher Erra at Fallen Tree Garden is waiting for someone to help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005336
text: Defeat Seedmia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005337
text: The Seedmias are causing trouble for Watcher Erra. Defeat the Seedmias and return to Erra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005338
text: Defeated the Seedmias as Erra requested. Inform Erra about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005339
text: Get Mallardu Fat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005340
text: Watcher Erra said you need to wake up the sleeping Nepenthes before being able to extract it's sap. Defeat the Mallardus and collect their fat, which can be used to burn Nepenthes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005341
text: Gathered enough fat as Watcher Erra requested. Return to Watcher Erra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005342
text: Obtain %s from Mallardu

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005343
text: Collect Mallardu's fat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005344
text: Extract Spiritually Enchanted Sap from Nepenthes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005345
text: Watcher Erra told you to wake up the sleeping Nepenthes in Piene Field by setting it on fire, and then to collect its sap while it's alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005346
text: Collected all the Spiritually Enchanted Sap. Return to Watcher Erra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005347
text: Brainwash the Pantos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005348
text: Follower Rikke suggested to use a charm to brainwash Pantos, like how the guards did long ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005349
text: Successfully brainwashed the Pantos but they will still attack the caster. Complain about it to Rikke.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005350
text: Control the Pantos and defeat the Large Panto Spearmen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005351
text: Follower Rikke gave you a stronger charm as a sign of apology. Burn the Panto Totem in Valyma Sanctum and try again. This time you must control the Pantos in order to defeat the Large Panto Spearman.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005352
text: The Pantos are following orders when you burned the Panto Totem. Pantos defeated the Large Panto Spearman and the old charm seems useful. Tell Rikke about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005353
text: Talk to Follower Alfonsas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005354
text: Follower Alfonsas at Fallen Tree Garden is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005355
text: Follower Alfonsas said there are too many demons for him to handle by himself, so he asked for your help. Defeat the demons along the way to the Temple Courtyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005356
text: Defeated enough demons as Follower Alfonsas asked. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005357
text: Write over the Demon Summoning Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005358
text: Follower Alfonsas said that scribbling on the Demon Summoning Circles alters them greatly. Avoid the monsters and scribble the circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005359
text: A little vandalism on the summoning circle absorbed back the summoned demons. It was small but a good try. Return and let Follower Alfonsas know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005360
text: Find Follower Algis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005361
text: Follower Algis at Fallen Tree Garden is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005362
text: Pursue Gesti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005363
text: You've arrived at the Temple Courtyard and saw Gesti entering the church. Defeat the Chapparition and follow Gesti.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005364
text: Defeated Chapparition but Gesti already blocked the entrance. Ask Follower Algis what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005365
text: Trace Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005366
text: Rexipher has kidnapped Cyrenia Odell. Go to Overlooking Crossroad and follow Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005367
text: Destroy the Royal Mausoleum Guardian Device at Sesija Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005368
text: Rexipher wants you to obey him in return for keeping Cyrenia Odell alive. Take the offer first and destroy the protective device at Sesija Entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005369
text: Talk to Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005370
text: Destroyed the device in Royal Mausoleum as Rexipher wanted. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005371
text: The Royal Mausoleum has had multiple devices to be protected from the demons. Humans can just pass by but guardians can be summoned if necessary. If there are reasons to summon, then activate the summoning device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005372
text: Defeat the Royal Mausoleum Guardian at Sesija Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005373
text: Bearkaras appeared when you activated the device. Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005374
text: When you defeat the guardians of Sesija Entrance, Rexipher disappeared through the Parvise. You have to pass the road and follow Rexipher to save Cyrenia Odell. He must be somewhere not too far.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005375
text: Defeat the Cactusvel summoned by Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005376
text: Rexipher says he will spare Cyrenia Odell's life but.. Rexipher's summon suddenly attacked!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005377
text: Check Cyrenia Odell's safety

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005378
text: Barely defeated Cactusvel. Check if Cyrenia Odell is safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005379
text: Defeat Rexipher's summon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005380
text: Tell Cyrenia Odell about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005381
text: Follow Rexipher and enter Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005382
text: Cyrenia Odell says Rexipher's objective is the thing hidden in the Royal Mausoleum by the Great King Zachariel for the goddess. Follow Rexipher into the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005383
text: Defeat Rexipher's servants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005384
text: Talk to Epigraphist Schmid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005385
text: Epigraphist Schmid at High Winding Road is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005386
text: Restore Ruklys Memorial Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005387
text: Restron Ruklys memorial stone and get Ruklys legacy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005388
text: Help Epigraphist Schmid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005389
text: Magburk emerged and killed Schmid as he was trying to get the rubbings of Ruklys memorial stone. Defeat Magburk to avenge Schmid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005390
text: Defeat Magburk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005391
text: Open the Gate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005392
text: Defeat Mummyghast. Open the church gates.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005393
text: Opened the church gates. Talk to Follower Donatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005394
text: Check the last gravestone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005395
text: Find the last gravestone of Lydia Schaffen in Goddess' Ancient Garden and be enlightened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005396
text: Talk to Hunter Talus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005397
text: Hunter Talus in Goddess' Ancient Garden is looking for someone's help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005398
text: Make Fire Hardened arrowheads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005399
text: Hunter Talus asked you to make Fire Hardened Arrowheads. Defeat the Infroburks at the Shiluma Altar Site, and use the leftover flame to heat the arrow that Tallus gave you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005400
text: Made the heated arrowheads. Give them to Talus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005401
text: Talk to Necromancer Drasius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005402
text: Drasius in Goddess' Ancient Garden is looking for someone to help his experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005403
text: Bring the sacrifices to the offering pot at Dumbliu Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005404
text: Drasius asked you to bring the sacrifices to the offering pot at Dumbliu Pond for a necromancy experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005405
text: Defeat the uncontrollable Necroventer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005406
text: Necroventer was summoned as a result of the necromancy experiment. But it is out of control. Defeat it before it causes too much damage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005407
text: The experiment failed but you managed to defeat the Necroventer. Tell Drasius about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005408
text: Defeat Necroventer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005409
text: Talk to the Wandering Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005410
text: You have carried out operation Tree Dale for the Wandering Spirit of Remaining Tree Dale. But the Spirit seems to have something more to tell you. Look for the Wandering Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005411
text: Return the trophy of war

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005412
text: The Wandering Spirit wants you to return the Unicorn Horn you obtained as a trophy of war to the Fedimian military official in Fedimian. Find the military official.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005413
text: Talk to the girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005414
text: Tell the Wandering Spirit's sister about her brother's death

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005415
text: Talk to Technician Orion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005416
text: Technician Orion needs help. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005417
text: Prepare the trap and hide behind a tree

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005418
text: Technician Orion wants to lure the monsters by using bait. What is this bait made of? Place the bait along the road to Geltonas Highland and hide behind a tree to watch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005419
text: Hide and watch

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005420
text: Placed the bait. Hide behind the tree and watch which monster shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005421
text: Hide behind a tree

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005422
text: Defeat the lured Ravinepede

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005423
text: It is the monster that the memo mentioned. Defeat Ravinepede and collect the treasure!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005424
text: Talk to Technician Orion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005425
text: Defeated Ravinepede. Return to Technician Orion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005426
text: Defeat Ravinepede

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005427
text: Place Hogma's Amulet

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005428
text: Collected all amulets of Hogma. Place the amulet in the stone pillar on the south of Geltonas Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005429
text: Place the amulet of Hogma on the stone pillar in Geltonas Highland

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005430
text: Place the amulet on the stone pillar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005431
text: Collected all amulets. Place the amulet in the stone pillar on the south of Geltonas Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005432
text: Monsters suddenly attacked. Defeat them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005433
text: Talk to Archaeologist Friedka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005434
text: Got a very old map from the stone pillars. Give it to Friedka.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005435
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005436
text: Looks like you broke the wooden seal for practice. Talk to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005437
text: Gather materials for repairing the wooden seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005438
text: The Highlander Master requests that you repair the Practice Post since you destroyed it. First, gather the required wood from Firent at Emerald Bluffs, and rope from Red Panto Spearman.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005439
text: Emerald Bluffs/Fallen Tree Garden

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005440
text: The Highlander Master demands that you repay for the destruction of the Practice Pole by repairing it. First, gather the required wood from Firent at Emerald Bluffs, and rope from Red Panto Spearman.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005441
text: Obtain %s from Firent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005442
text: Get %s from Red Panto Spearman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005443
text: Talk to Watcher James

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005444
text: James is looking at your bag. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005445
text: Defeat monsters wandering around Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005446
text: James has proposed a bet. Deal with all of the monsters at Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005447
text: Talk to James

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005448
text: You've completed the amount you bet with James. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005449
text: Defeat monsters at Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005450
text: Talk to Grave Keeper Romas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005451
text: Grave Keeper Romas is looking at you with pity. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005452
text: Pass Grave Keeper Romas' Test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005453
text: Grave Keeper Romas says he had to bury a Revelator once so do not be over confident. Defeat 15 monsters nearby within 2 minutes and prove that you are not weak.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005454
text: Defeated 15 monsters in 2 minutes. Talk to Grave Keeper Romas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005455
text: Defeat monsters within 2 minutes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005456
text: The Paladin Master has something to say. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005457
text: Defeat Field Boss Chapparition

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005458
text: The Paladin Master says there is a monster slaying people. Find and defeat the spooky Chapparition in the Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005459
text: Tenet Church

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005460
text: Defeated the Chapparition. Report to the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005461
text: Defeat spooky Chaparition

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005462
text: Talk to the resentful soul

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005463
text: There is a person you see for the first time, but if blurry. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005464
text: Find the sister of resentful soul and give the necklace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005465
text: The resentful feels sorry to the sister who fought with him and left the house. Find the sister and give her the necklace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005466
text: Talk to the resentful soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005467
text: There is an antsy soldier. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005468
text: Defeat the monster in Sunset Flag Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005469
text: Resentful soldier says he remembered his mission but he just can't go. Take his mission and defeat the monsters for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005470
text: Completed the resentful soldier's mission. Return and report to thim.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005471
text: Defeat the monsters in Sunset Flag Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005472
text: Talk to the messenger

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005473
text: A messenger suddenly appeared. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005474
text: Deliver the letter to Ripper in Fedimian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005475
text: You can't just call on the messenger anytime. As a sign of apology, deliver the letter to Officer Ripper in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005476
text: Delivered the letter to Officer Ripper in Fedimian and received money. Give money to the messenger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005477
text: Mercenary Lindt is staring at the food and looks pitiful. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005478
text: Share some food with Mercenary Lindt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005479
text: Mercenary Lindt seems interested in the food you are preparing. Share some food with Lindt. Doesn't matter if you cook it yourself or buy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005480
text: Share food with Lindt

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005481
text: Mercenary Lindt seems very pleased. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005482
text: Get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005483
text: Officer Liudas is looking carefully at your chick accessory. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005484
text: Defeat monsters at Rainbow Pond

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005485
text: Officer Liudas says that he will give you a fitting accessory if you defeat all of the monsters nearby. Deal with the monsters at Rainbow Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005486
text: You have defeated many monsters at Rainbow Pond. Report back to Officer Liudas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005487
text: Talk to Historian Colin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005488
text: Colin looks lonely. Talk to Colin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005489
text: Burn the oration

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005490
text: Historian Colin wishes to commemorate the many people that perished while exploring this region. Burn the oration that pays respect to their souls in front of the epitaph at Dense Mist Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005491
text: Report to Colin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005492
text: You have burned the oration in front of the epitaph at Dense Mist Plateau. Report back to Historian Colin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005493
text: Repair the wooden seal for practice

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005494
text: Gathered all materials needed for the repair. Return to the Highlander Master's practice area and repair the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005495
text: Gathered all materials needed for the repair. Return to the Highlander Master's Room and repair the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005496
text: Fixed the seal. Report to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005497
text: Go and talk to the Swordsman Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005498
text: Listen to the explanation about attributes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005499
text: Learn the attributes and talk to the Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005500
text: Talk to the Wizard Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005501
text: Talk to the Archer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005502
text: Talk to Young Magician Owyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005503
text: There is a young magician standing at the marked area of the map. He seems to need some help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005504
text: Defeat the Phyracon occupying Mage Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005505
text: Owyn is trying to save the Mage Tower from the demons. Defeat the monsters nearby to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005506
text: Report to Owyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005507
text: Done what Owyn requested. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005508
text: Defeat the Phyracon occupying Mage Tower 1st Floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005509
text: Owyn's Request

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005510
text: Owyn looks like he has another request. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005511
text: Owyn is having a hard time getting rid of Drakes. Defeat the Drakes nearby for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005512
text: Report to Owyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005513
text: You completed all of Owyn's requests. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005514
text: Talk to Cordelier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005515
text: Cordelier is busy in the middle of the Mage Tower. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005516
text: Defeat the monsters nearby and get black coal powder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005517
text: Cordelier wants black coal powder. Defeat the monsters nearby and get her the powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005518
text: Give Black Coal Powder to Cordelier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005519
text: Gathered enough Black Coal Powder. Talk to Cordelier again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005520
text: Defeat the monsters nearby and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005521
text: Cordelier is looking at the manual. Talk to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005522
text: Collect the Eternal Embers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005523
text: After looking at the manual, Cordelier is asking you to get Eternal Embers. Get it from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005524
text: Give the Eternal Ember to Cordelier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005525
text: Collected the Eternal Embers. Give it to Cordelier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005526
text: Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005527
text: Ask Cordelier about the unpleasant vibration that you felt a while ago

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005528
text: Check the bookshelf in the Reading Room

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005529
text: Check the bookshelf in the Reading Room to find out about the vibration felt in the Reading Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005530
text: Report to Cordelier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005531
text: Defeated the Ginklas that suddenly appeared. Report to Cordelier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005532
text: Talk to the Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005533
text: There's a strange sound coming from the Large Reading Room. Talk to the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005534
text: Defeat Belegg and Blindlem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005535
text: A stone emitting strange sounds said its soul was trapped. It's hard to believe, but defeat the Blindlem and Beleggs as the stone requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005536
text: Talk to the Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005537
text: Defeated the Blindlem and Beleggs. Return to the Sealed Stone and release its trapped soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005538
text: Defeat Blindlem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005539
text: Defeat Belegg

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005540
text: The Sealed Stone is in the forum. It seems like it needs help so talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005541
text: Defeat the observer Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005542
text: The Sealed Stone asked you to defeat the monitors and free its spirit. Do the Sealed Stone a favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005543
text: Defeated the Golem. Talk to the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005544
text: Defeat the observer Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005545
text: The Sealed Stone seems to have another favor. Talk to the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005546
text: Defeat the observer Phyracon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005547
text: There seems to be a few more sealed stones apart from this one. Defeat the Large Slime and talk to another sealed stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005548
text: Talk to another seal stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005549
text: Defeat the observer Large Slime

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005550
text: The Sealed Stone needs help. Talk to the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005551
text: Defeat the monsters nearby and get piece of Holy Ark.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005552
text: Seal stone says it need a Holy Ark to hold the soul. Get the pieces of Holy Ark from monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005553
text: Return to the Sealed Stone and release the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005554
text: There is a Sealed Stone in the office. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005555
text: Defeat the monsters nearby to release

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005556
text: The soul restraint on the seal stone wants to be free. Defeat the Blindlem and Shaman dolls to free it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005557
text: Defeated the Blindlem and Shaman doll. Return to the seal stone and free its soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005558
text: Observer Blindlem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005559
text: Observer Shaman doll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005560
text: There is a Sealed Stone in the 1st Library. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005561
text: Defeat the observer Infrorocktor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005562
text: Seal stone says it will do no harm and asks you to defeat the observer. Defeat the Infrorocktor for the seal stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005563
text: Report to the Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005564
text: Defeated the Observer Infrorocktor as the seal stone wanted. Return to the stone and talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005565
text: The Sealed Stone has more favors to ask. Talk to the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005566
text: Defeat Fallenlem and get the voice of seal stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005567
text: The Seal Stone wants you to get back its stolen voice. Gather the voices of seal stone held by Fallenlem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005568
text: Return and talk to the Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005569
text: Gathered all the voices. Return and give it to the Sealed Stone..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005570
text: Defeat Fallenlem and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005571
text: There is a Sealed Stone in the Central Control Room. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005572
text: Defeat the monster that mocked the seal stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005573
text: The seal stone asked you to defeat the evil spirits that mocked it. Defeat the evil spirits foir the stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005574
text: Got rid of the spirits that mocked the stone. Report to the stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005575
text: Defeat Fallenlem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005576
text: The spirit of the Sealed Stone wants to be freed. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005577
text: Defeat the monsters nearby and get Trap Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005578
text: The soul of seal stone wants to be freed. Gather Trap Crystal from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005579
text: Collected all the crystals. Return and report to the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005580
text: Find the suspicious table

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005581
text: There is a suspicious table in the office. Can you talk to it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005582
text: Defeat the Golems

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005583
text: Golem is aiming your back like the table said. Defeat the Golem first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005584
text: Talk to the suspicous table

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005585
text: It seems like you got out of danger. Talk to the weird and polite table.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005586
text: Defeat Gray Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005587
text: Talk to Transmuter Furry Odd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005588
text: There is a lady magician in the resting area. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005589
text: Defeat the monsters nearby and get Variation Mediators

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005590
text: Furry Odd needs more Variation Mediators to defeat the monsters effectively. Get Variation Mediators from monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005591
text: Give the Variation Mediators to Furry Odd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005592
text: Collected all the Variation Mediators needed. Give it to Furry Odd.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005593
text: Furry Odd seems to have more favors to ask. Talk to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005594
text: Defeat monsters and get Hardened Black Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005595
text: Furry Odd says let's meet in Machinery room 1 and tells you to bring the hardened crystal when you meet her. Get the crystals from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005596
text: Meet Furry Odd in front of Machine Room 1

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005597
text: Got the hardened crystals. Join Furry Odd in Machine Room 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005598
text: Met Furry Odd near the Machinery room. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005599
text: Defeat Yonazolem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005600
text: Furry Odd says she saw a Yonazolem inside the machine room. Defeat the Yonazolem while Furry Odd stops the monsters at the entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005601
text: Defeated Yonazolem. Return to Furry Odd.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005602
text: There is a Sealed Stone near the Magic Stabilizing Device. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005603
text: The Sealed Stone asked you to defeat the monsters nearby so that it can be freed. What will happen when all of them are freed? First, defeat the monsters as the seal requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005604
text: Finished the request of the Sealed Stone. Release the soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005605
text: Find the Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005606
text: There is a Sealed Stone in the 2nd Machinery Room. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005607
text: Defeated the monsters around. Go to the Stone and release the possessed soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005608
text: Talk to Simon Shaw

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005609
text: There is a well-dressed, gentlemanly wizard resisting the monsters. Talk to Simon Shaw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005610
text: Defeat Black Drake and retrieve the Flame Charms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005611
text: Simon Shaw is doing his best to resist the monsters. Help him retrieve the Flame Charms that he planted on monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005612
text: Give Flame Charms to Simon Shaw

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005613
text: Acquired all Flame Charms. Give them to Simon Shaw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005614
text: Defeat Black Drake and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005615
text: Simon Shaw saw something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005616
text: Defeat the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005617
text: Simon Shaw says he saw Bearkaras and will chase him. Stop the monsters marching in while Simon chases after Bearkaras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005618
text: Find Simon Shaw

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005619
text: Simon Shaw is not back. Go to the Small Hall where he went chasing Bearkaras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005620
text: Simon looks very tired. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005621
text: Simon says he can't defeat Bearkaras on his own. Defeat the Bearkaras for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005622
text: Defeated Bearkaras. Tell Simon Shaw about it so that he can be relieved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005623
text: If you have released all the trapped souls in the seal stone along your way from the Mage Tower, you can get the last mission from the suspicious lamp on the way to Keturidu Grand Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005624
text: If you do the seal stone's favors, then you will be able to find out the identity of those trapped inside the seal stones. Defeat the monsters guarding around the seal stone as requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005625
text: Defeated all the monsters around. Return to the seal stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005626
text: If you have released all the trapped souls in the seal stone along your way from the Mage Tower, you can get the last mission from the suspicious lamp on the way to Keturidu Grand Hall. Talk to the Seal Stone again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005627
text: Defeat the seal monitor Stone Whale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005628
text: Stone Whale that was guarding Hauberk woke up. Defeat Stone Whale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005629
text: Release the Seal Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005630
text: Return to Hauberk and release his last soul and wish for the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005631
text: Defeat Stone Whale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005632
text: Find the goddess in Mage Tower 5F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005633
text: Look for the goddess in Mage Tower 5F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005634
text: Destroy the Magic Suppressor prepared by Helgasercle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005635
text: Destroy all the Magic Suppressors that Helgasercle prepared on the 5th floor of the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005636
text: Find and defeat Helgasercle who invaded the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005637
text: Talk to Watcher Gilbert

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005638
text: The Watchers at Silverstream Gorge are waiting for someone to help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005639
text: Defeat Grummers and Zignuts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005640
text: Gilbert wants you to defeat the monsters that damaged the cable car. Defeat them in Cholras Winding Road and tell Gilbert about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005641
text: Punished the Grummers and Zignuts. Tell Gilbert you taught them a lesson.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005642
text: Defeat Zignuts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005643
text: Defeat Grummer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005644
text: Defeat the Pantos and retrieve the gears

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005645
text: Gilbert says that the Pantos at Mieguista Hill stole the cable car's gears. Defeat them to get back the gears and return them to Gilbert.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005646
text: Got the gears by defeating the Pantos. Return them to Gilbert.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005647
text: Defeat Pantos and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005648
text: Defeat the Pantos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005649
text: Find the lever handle latches

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005650
text: The Pantos at Mieguista Hill stole cable car parts and hid them in the grass. Find the lever handle latches in the grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005651
text: Found the lever handle latches in the grass. Return them to Gilbert.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005652
text: Talk to Watcher Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005653
text: Give sugar beets to Baby Pantos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005654
text: Watcher Molly says you can use the sugar beets to lure the Baby Pantos. Approach the Baby Pantos and use the sugar beets!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005655
text: Lured the Baby Pantos with sugar beets. Listen to Molly's next plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005656
text: Talk to Watcher Matthew

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005657
text: Retrieve Cable Car Parts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005658
text: Watcher Matthew asked for your help to find cable car parts that the Zignuts at Nepavy Grassland swallowed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005659
text: Found all the cable car parts as Matthew asked. Give it to Matthew.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005660
text: Retrieve the %s from Zignuts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005661
text: Defeat Poata who is a threat to the cable car

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005662
text: Watcher Matthew asked you to defeat the Poata, so it can't destroy the cable car again. Soil Poata's nest at Margas Hills to lure it out, and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005663
text: Defeated the Poata as Watcher Matthew requested. Tell the good news to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005664
text: Defeat Poata

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005665
text: Talk to Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005666
text: Watcher Molly is looking for someone brave to help her great plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005667
text: Take the Baby Pantos and find Capria

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005668
text: Watcher Molly said to try persuading Capria with the Baby Pantos. But you're not sure it'll work. You can find Capria on the way to Gele Plateau after Spalva Junction.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005669
text: Capria seems to be even more angry to see the baby Pantos unlike Watcher Molly's expectations. You've also defeated Capria. Let's confess to Watcher Molly that you don't think peace will come easily to Silverstream Gorge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005670
text: Defeat Capria

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005671
text: Meet the Paladin Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005672
text: Knight Commander Uska says that you should go to the Paladin Master at Leaf Veil Plateau since he thinks the high gardens mentioned in the revelation is reffering to that region.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005673
text: Talk to Watcher Basil

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005674
text: Watcher Basil at Leaf Veil Plateau is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005675
text: Collect Mali Seeds

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005676
text: Basil asked for you to help by collecting Mali Seeds, which are needed to make the shaman dolls move. You can find Malis around Labure Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005677
text: Gathered enough Mali Seeds. Return to Watcher Basil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005678
text: Defeat Mali and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005679
text: Talk to Watcher Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005680
text: Watcher Molly at Leaf Veil Plateau is waiting for someone to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005681
text: Destroy Panto Totems with Shaman Dolls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005682
text: Use the Summon Scroll to summon a Shaman Doll and guide them to the Panto Totems. The doll will destroy the totems.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005683
text: Defeat Simorph

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005684
text: Defeat Simorph with the shaman dolls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005685
text: Defeat Simorph at Valio Mountain Cabin Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005686
text: Destroyed all the Totems as requested. Search for Simorph, and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005687
text: Defeated Simorph with the Shaman Dolls as Molly requested. Tell Molly about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005688
text: Purify the demon corrupted land

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005689
text: Use the summon scroll to summon a shaman doll and bring it to Labure Highway. The shaman doll will find the demon corrupted land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005690
text: Defeat Wild Carnivore

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005691
text: Defeat Wild Carnivore tainted by demon corruption

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005692
text: Defeat Wild Carnivore in Pasiulyma Field

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005693
text: Purified the polluted area and defeated Carnivore are Molly requested. Tell Molly about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005694
text: Collect ritual rope

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005695
text: Basil says the Pantos in Forest Keeper Cabin have the rope needed to restore the shaman dolls. He says you can use force if words won't do and looks like you will have to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005696
text: Used some force to gather enough ropes. Give them to Watcher Basil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005697
text: Defeat Panto Shamans and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005698
text: Get rope for ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005699
text: Collect Mushcaria's Enchanted Mane

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005700
text: Watcher Basil asked you go hunt the Mushcaria in Tustinti Plateau and collect it's Enchanted Mane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005701
text: Defeated Mushcaria and retrieved it's Enchanted Mane. Give it to Watcher Basil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005702
text: Defeat Mushcaria and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005703
text: Get Mushcaria's Enchanted Mane

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005704
text: Talk to Goddess Saule

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005705
text: The lady trapped was Goddess Saule. Talk to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005706
text: Destroy the restraining magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005707
text: Goddess Saule has been trapped by the demons and can't use her powers. Destroy the binding magic circle that is restraining the goddess in Drugys Courtyard and Vapsva Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005708
text: Destroyed all the restraining magic circles. Talk to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005709
text: Check the barrier at Saule Grand Shrine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005710
text: You are blocked by the barrier. Check the barrier at Saule Grand Shrine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005711
text: Defeat the demon restraining the goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005712
text: The barrier disappeared and you can see someone trapped by the demon. First, defeat the demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005713
text: Talk to the lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005714
text: Defeated the demons that were trapping the lady. She seens to have a strong and holy power. Talk to the lady.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005715
text: Defeat Harpeia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005716
text: Check the binding magic circle in Drugys Courtyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005717
text: There is a binding magic circle imbued with dark energy in Drugys Courtyard. Demons have prepared it. Go check it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005718
text: Check the binding magic circle in Vapsva Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005719
text: There is a binding magic circle imbued with dark energy in Vapsva Vacant Lot. Demons have prepared it. Go check it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005720
text: Defeat Merge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005721
text: Removed the magic circle that was trapping Goddess Saule, but it is not enough. Talk to Goddess Saule again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005722
text: Collect the offering tools at Altar Grand Gallery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005723
text: Goddess Saule says the observer Clymen hid into the dimensional crack, but her strength isn't recovered yet so she cannot find him. Find the offering tools at Altar Grand Gallery to help the goddess regain her powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005724
text: {memo This line is used when both giving multiple items and a single item}Give it to Goddess Saule

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005725
text: Found the materials to help the goddess. Give them to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005726
text: Done preparing to help the goddess regain her strength. Talk to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005727
text: Defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005728
text: Goddess Saule says defeating the monsters nearby will help in finding Clymen. Defeat the monsters and suppress the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005729
text: Seems like Goddess Saule found the demons. Return to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005730
text: Defeat monsters nearby the Grand Shrine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005731
text: Release the Demon Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005732
text: Goddess Saule got her strength back with the help of the offering tools. She found the barrier with the demon who has the key. Go defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005733
text: Defeat the demon that held the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005734
text: Goddess Saule successfully regained her strength from the offering tools and found the barrier where the demon with the key is located. Defeat the demon that appears from the barrier and get the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005735
text: You found the key to finally release Goddess Saule from the restraining sphere Bring the key to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005736
text: Remove restraining sphere that is trapping Goddess Saule

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005737
text: Use the key to release Goddess Saule from the restraining sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005738
text: Goddess Saule is freed. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005739
text: Defeated Bramble and got the revelation. Return to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005740
text: The revelation tells you to go to Great King Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum. Talk to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005741
text: Search for portals near Grassy Brookside

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005742
text: According to the Paladin Master, the Iridescent Valley spoken of in the revelation is most likely the Grassy Brookside region. Follow the revelation to Grassy Brookside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005743
text: Collect Purifying Stones from Tanu

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005744
text: You need to use the portal to go to Goddess Saule but it is not working. The Old Man said you need to collect Purifying Stone of Tanu to activate the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005745
text: Collected all the purifying stones needed. Use it to purify the Holy Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005746
text: Purify the Holy Pond, which should restore the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005747
text: Report to the Old Man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005748
text: Purified the Holy Pond. Return to the Old Man and ask about the portal mentioned in the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005749
text: Talk to the Old Man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005750
text: Find the villager sent by the Old Man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005751
text: The Old Man says he sent a villager to Nugria Sanctum to see of the portal is working but he has not heard since. Find the villager who was sent to Nugria Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005752
text: Talk to the Injured Villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005753
text: Defeated the monsters that attacked the villager. Talk to the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005754
text: Defeat the monsters that attacked the villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005755
text: Found the villager, but he seems hurt. Ask what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005756
text: Check the altar at Nugria Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005757
text: The villager says he was attacked while on his way to check on the portal. Go and check if the portal at Nugria Sanctum is open for the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005758
text: Purified the Holy Pond, but the portal at Nugria Sanctum did not open. Return to the Injured Villager and ask what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005759
text: Check the Portal at Nugria Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005760
text: Check the Portal at Nugria Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005761
text: Defeat Moyabruka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005762
text: Check the source of corruption in Veidma Uphill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005763
text: Something is corrupting the surroundings of Veidma Uphill. Defeat the source.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005764
text: The source of corruption is becoming stronger with the monsters. Defeat the monsters nearby and remove the source when it is weakened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005765
text: Check out Holy Pond

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005766
text: The corruption in the Holy Pond seems serious. Check out Holy Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005767
text: Defeat Merregina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005768
text: Go to the altar of Nugria Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005769
text: The villagers suddenly became demons and attacked. Run to Nugria Sanctum at Grassy Brookside in order to follow the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005770
text: Use the Seal of Space

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005771
text: Use the Seal of Space near the Nugria Sanctum Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005772
text: Hidden Royal Mausoleum Book appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005773
text: A book hidden somewhere in Royal Mausoleum 5F appeared. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005774
text: Get the mission item

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005775
text: The Royal Mausoleum Book wants blood stone. Better get it before the book disappears. Lizardmen in Goddess' Ancient Garden could have them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005776
text: Talk to the Royal Mausoleum Book

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005777
text: Talk to the book again. If the book disappeared, you have to wait until it appears again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005778
text: Bring %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005779
text: Talk to Koven

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005780
text: Find the Treasure Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005781
text: Find the Treasure chest hidden somewhere in the Crystal Stream. It can be opened it with the key Koven gave you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005782
text: Talk to Furry Odd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005783
text: Furry Odd is surprised with the bag full of Drake's Horn. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005784
text: Make badge of Drake

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005785
text: Received recipe from Furry Odd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005786
text: key can be used to create the badge of Drake

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005787
text: Crafted the badge of Drake. Talk to Furry Odd.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005788
text: Make %s and give it to Furry Odd

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005789
text: Talk to all the masters. Talk to the Thaumaturge Master in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005790
text: Find the Wizards in Mage Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005791
text: The Thaumaturge Master offered a bet. You have to meet all the wizards in Mage Tower and solve the quiz questions they give.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005792
text: Solve the quiz of Simon Shaw in Mage Tower 5th Floor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005793
text: Solved quizzes of three wizards. Talk to Simon Shaw in Mage Tower 5th Floor for the last quiz question.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005794
text: Talk to Simon Shaw for the last quiz question.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005795
text: Find the page of book in Mage Tower 3rd Floor Laboratory

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005796
text: Simon Shaw offered bringing him a page of book instead of the quiz. Find the book in Mage Tower 3rd Flood Laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005797
text: Give it to Simon Shaw

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005798
text: Found all the pages. Talk to Simon Shaw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005799
text: The Sadhu Master is looking at you with a grin. Talk to him,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005800
text: Collect amber with lizard in it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005801
text: The Sadhu Master wants you to bring him something dearly. Get him the amber with lizard in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005802
text: Got the amber with lizard. Give it to the Sadhu Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005803
text: Get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005804
text: Talk to unknown being

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005805
text: You can hear a strange voice somewhere. Talk to the unknown being.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005806
text: Enter the clue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005807
text: The unknown being says you need to bring more clues for him to talk. Find and enter the five clues from Crustal Mines 1st Floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005808
text: Found the glues about the unknown being. Talk to the unknown being again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005809
text: Hunting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005810
text: The unknown being gave you a riddle stating,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005811
text: the thing to do, thing that has been done, and will keep doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005812
text: Show your answer through action.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005813
text: Solved the riddle. Talk to the unknown being.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005814
text: Answer to the riddle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005815
text: Release the seal at Pasagos Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005816
text: The Sanctum seals are in various locations in Broken Pillar Canyon. Find and break the Pasagos Cliff seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005817
text: Monsters suddenly appeared as you tried to release the seal. Defeat them and protect yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005818
text: Defeated all the monsters that were interfering. Try to release the seal again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005819
text: The Sanctum seals are in various locations in Broken Pillar Canyon. Find and break the seal on the way to the Collapsed Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005820
text: Your attempt to release the seal summoned sentinels. Destroy all the sentinels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005821
text: Destroy the sentinels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005822
text: The Sanctum seals are in various locations in Broken Pillar Canyon. Find and break the seal on the left of the Collapsed Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005823
text: Biteregina appeared when you removed the seal! Defeat it!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005824
text: Actual works become serious from now. Talk to Raudi again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005825
text: Check the stone pillars of Alkune Stairway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005826
text: Now that you have taken care of the monsters, check the stone pillars around Alkune Stairway. You will be able to find traces of relics in the pillars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005827
text: Acquired all the relics of Raudi. Return and give the relics to Raune.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005828
text: Check the Epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005829
text: There are epitaphs about the Royal Mausoleum in Shirnas Plateau. Check the epitaph of Serno Highland which is one of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005830
text: Defeat the monsters nearby the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005831
text: Monsters appeared as if to protect the epitaph when you touched it! Defeat the monsters first then check the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005832
text: Check the epitaph again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005833
text: Got rid of the monsters. Now, check the epitaph again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005834
text: Defeat the monsters near the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005835
text: There are many epitaphs that hold secrets in the Dense Mist Plateau Royal Mausoleum. Examine the one on the left of Dykyne Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005836
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005837
text: Monsters sprouted out before you even got to check the epitaph! Defeat them first then check the epitaph again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005838
text: Barely got rid of the monsters. Now check the epitaph thoroughly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005839
text: Defeat Zinutekas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005840
text: Body of the collapsed mercenary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005841
text: There are many dead people around due to the monsters' raid. Approach and comfort them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005842
text: Ambush of Hogmas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005843
text: Hogmas hiding appeared when you touched the dead body. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005844
text: Confort the body to rest in peace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005845
text: Defeated all the monsters nearby. Comfor the bodies to rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005846
text: Defeat the Hogmas ambushing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005847
text: Tzedej Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005848
text: There is a something sealed at the Tzedej Altar at King's Plateau. Approach and attempt to break it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005849
text: Monster Appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005850
text: The altar suddenly broke and monster statues showed up! Defeat the Hogmas from the statues!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005851
text: Defeat the Hogmas shown as stone statues

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005852
text: Treasure Chest of Overlooking Crossroad

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005853
text: Open the Treasure Chest of Overlooking Crossroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005854
text: Hogmas appeared when opening the Treasure Chest! Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005855
text: Defeat the Hogmas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005856
text: Talk to the Security Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005857
text: The Security Guard seems to be in trouble. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005858
text: Finding the treasure chest in the Traceless Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005859
text: The Security Guard seems to have been chased by the monsters until here. Find the treasure chest that the Security Guard was protecting in the Traceless Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005860
text: Found the Treasure Chest but it is empty and you just met a lot of Hogmas. Tell about it to the Security Guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005861
text: Look for the Security Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005862
text: Told her that the treasure chest was empty. But the Security Guard still seems like she needs more help. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005863
text: Find the necklace from the Hogmas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005864
text: When you press the V key, the body of the Hogma Captain with the necklace will shine. Find the necklace and give it to the Security Guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005865
text: Bring the necklace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005866
text: Found the necklace the Security Guard was looking for. Bring it to the Security Guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005867
text: Examine the Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005868
text: There is a mutated Tree Root Crystal north of the Posukis Path plaza. You may be able to find what to do if you go and examine it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005869
text: Separating monster souls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005870
text: The curse cast on the Tree Root Crystal will transfer to the monsters if you lure them near and strike the Tree Root Crystal after wearing the monsters down. Defeat the monsters after the curse has been transfered to slowly destroy the Tree Root Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005871
text: Talk to Pilgrim Witas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005872
text: Witas might regain sanity if one for the objects you have gathered is his. Let's show him the objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005873
text: Stop Witas, who turned into a monster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005874
text: Witas turned into a monster after seeing the objects instead of calming down. Defeat him first before attempting to talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005875
text: You have thankfully defeated the boss. Talk to Witas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005876
text: Defeat Witas who has turned into Velorchard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005877
text: Witas has fallen. Try to talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005878
text: Make a grave for Witas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005879
text: Witas has passed away. Make him a grave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005880
text: Pilgrim Theophilus is suddenly looking for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005881
text: Necklace of Greed

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005882
text: It seems as Theophilus is making something for you.{nl}Talk to him to recieve it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005883
text: Check the Crystal Pillar in the Closed Area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005884
text: There is a huge Crystal Pillar in the closed area. Check out the Crystal Pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005885
text: Get the Slate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005886
text: The girl who was with the villagers appeared, took the slate in the seal and disappeared. Can't tell what that is but let's bring the slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005887
text: Talk to Knight Commander Uska

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005888
text: You went to Crystal Mines to find the evidence of salvation but all you found was a mysterious slate. Talk to Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska about the slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005889
text: You followed the revelation of the goddess that the bishop saw in this dreams and obtained the Mysterious Slate. Talk to Knight Commander Uska about the Mysterious Slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005890
text: Ask the Bokor Master for interpretation of the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005891
text: Ask Bokor Mama about this slate. She lives in the left end of Klaipeda residential area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005892
text: The slate found in the Crystal Mines is both the revelation and Goddess Laima herself. It contains a message about finding the next revelation in a holy church. Return to Sir Uska as the Bokor Master says.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005893
text: The Slate discovered at Crystal Mine was a revelation from the goddesses warning about a threat in the Leav Veil Plateau region. Report back to Knight Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005894
text: Knight Commander Uska thinks the high gardens in the revelation refers to an area in Leaf Veil Plateau and told you to go the Paladin Master. Drop by the Mayor of Miner's Village and ask for directions to Leaf Veil Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005895
text: Interferance of Lepus blocking the way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005896
text: Defeat Lepus that is blocking the way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005897
text: Talk to Soldier Moody

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005898
text: Officer Liudas is asking Moody to bring the report on Sparnas. Find Soldier Moody at the Amzina Curved Path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005899
text: Retrieve the report that Siaulambs took away

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005900
text: Moody says he lost the report while fighting against the Siaulambs. Find the report for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005901
text: Give it to Officer Liudas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005902
text: Moody found the lost report. Give the report to Officer Liudas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005903
text: Defeat Siaulago and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005904
text: Siaulago

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005905
text: Talk to Adjudant Volda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005906
text: Volda got back the stolen supplies and is enraged for revenge. Talk to Volda again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005907
text: Stealing the Trophy box

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005908
text: Volda says revenge must be made by stealing the Siaulamb's trophy box. Steal the pile of Siaulamb's trphy boxes in Ziedo pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005909
text: Stole all of Siaulamb's trophies. Give it to Volda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005910
text: Defeat the monster guarding the box

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005911
text: Volda know a sure way to defeat the Siaulambs. Talk to Volda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005912
text: Check inside the shabby box

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005913
text: Volda says we should defeat the brush trap balls that the Siaulambs eat. Find the brush trap balls inside the shabby box in the 4th Supplies Warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005914
text: Burn the brush trap balls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005915
text: Found the brush trap balls in the shabby box. Burn all of it in the fire beside it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005916
text: Report to Volda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005917
text: Burned all the brush trap balls in the box. Return to volda and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005918
text: Defeat the Siaulambs that ambushed

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005919
text: Examine the shabby box

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005920
text: Volda says we should defeat the brush trap balls that the Siaulambs eat. Find the brush trap balls inside the shabby box in the 2nd Supplies Warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005921
text: Defeat the remnants of Siaulambs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005922
text: Found the pouch full of brush trap balls and the Siaulambs went mad and start to attack. Defeat all the Siaulambs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005923
text: Defeated all remnanats of Siaulambds but there is no place to burn the brash trap balls. Give it to Volda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005924
text: You must give Moody's report to Officer Liudas. Return to Liudas in Central Supplies Camp and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005925
text: Check the monster in Amzina Curved Path

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005926
text: Liudas says he got a report about a large monster showing up. Check the monster in Amzina Curved Path.
