name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005927
text: The large monster in A,zina rooked Road was Tutu, not Sparnas. Report about it to Liudas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005928
text: Lure and defeat Tutu

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005929
text: Officer Liudas is frustated at the current situation. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005930
text: Talk to Liudas in Malkos Felled Area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005931
text: Liudas says he has to take care of things himself. Follow Liudas to Malkos Felled Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005932
text: Defeat the monsters attacking Liudas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005933
text: Talk to the Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005934
text: Talk to the Scout to learn about Status Points.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005935
text: - use this key to open your Character Information then use Status Points

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005936
text: Listen to the Scout and try using a Status.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005937
text: Talk to the Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005938
text: Talk to the Scout again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005939
text: On the road back

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005940
text: You feel something suspicious when worshiping the Goddess Statue. Talk to the Statue again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005941
text: Mushcaria has appeared! Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005942
text: Defeated Mushcaria!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005943
text: You have completed retrieving the supplies. Talk to the Supply Officer again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005944
text: Defeat Tutu

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005945
text: Tutu made a surprise ambush. Defeat Tutu.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005946
text: You defeated Tutu. Talk to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005947
text: Gustas Jonas seems to welcome you. Ask him about the location of Great King Zachariel's legacy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005948
text: Release the seal located on the left of the Collapsed Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005949
text: Gustas says there is one seal left but he sensed a dangerous energy. Release the on the left of the crumbled sanctuary. You also need to be careful of the monsters' attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005950
text: Released the last seal. Return to Gustas Jonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005951
text: Talk to Liaison Officer Nian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005952
text: Nian is informing you about the mysterious stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005953
text: Defeat the monsters attacking Liaison Officer Nian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005954
text: Touched the mysterious stone to take a closer look but then monsters appeared! Better defeat the monsters first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005955
text: Defeated the monsters. Talk to Nian about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005956
text: Talk to Historian Adelle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005957
text: Historian Adelle know it was someone Nian sent. Ask why she is not withdrawing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005958
text: Collect stones with mysterious patterns

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005959
text: Historian Adelle is also curious about the mysterious stones. She says something is going on and wants to study more stones. Collect the stones with mysterious patterns from the Hogmas for Adelle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005960
text: Give it to Adelle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005961
text: Gathered enough stones with patterns. Give it to Adelle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005962
text: Defeat Hogma Archers and gather %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005963
text: Defeat Hogma Archers and gather Stones with a strange engraving

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005964
text: Talk to Archaeologist Friedka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005965
text: Archaeologist Friedka is looking for someone to do a great mission with him. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005966
text: Get the monster's amulet

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005967
text: Archaeologist Friedka is looking for someone who can help him. First, get the amulets from the Hogmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005968
text: Archaeologist Friedka is carefully looking at the map from the stone pillars. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005969
text: Gather the rubbings from Stone Pillar Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005970
text: Seems like Friedka found something from the map. Get him the rubbings from Stone Pillar Hill as he requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005971
text: Got the rubbings that Archaeologist Friedka wanted. Return to Archaeologist Friedka.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005972
text: Defeat the Bebraspion that is interfering the rubbing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005973
text: You got Adelle the stones she want so try to persuade her to withdraw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005974
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005975
text: Could it be because of the stones? Monsters are attacking. Protect yourself from the attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005976
text: Defeated all the monsters that attacked. Persuade Adelle quickly to withdraw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005977
text: Kolin says he doesn't know Rexipher. Ask another historian about Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005978
text: Gorath seems to be in trouble. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005979
text: Talk to Historian Badat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005980
text: Gorath is asking you to find his lost friends. His friend's name is Badat so look around for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005981
text: Found Badat. Talk to him so that he can return safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005982
text: Historian Badat seems to be looking for something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005983
text: Finding Historian Badat's research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005984
text: Historian Badat says he'll return to the Excavation Camp when he finds his research materials. Hunt Tontus and get back the research materials for Badat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005985
text: Give the research materials quickly so that Badat can return to camp/

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005986
text: Obtain %s by defeating Tontus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005987
text: Defeat Tontus and retrieve the research material

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005988
text: Talk to Kevin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005989
text: There's a suspicious person looking like a forger. Talk to Kevin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005990
text: Collect firewood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005991
text: Kevin says he is going to make counterfeits and asks you to gather firewood. First, bring him what he wants for definite evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005992
text: Gathered all the firewood needed. Talk to Kevin again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005993
text: Looks like the preparations are complete. Wonder how Kevin makes counterfeits. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005994
text: Collect Hard Lime from monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005995
text: Kevin says he can never show you how he works and asks you to get hard lime from monsters nearby. Get him the lime first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005996
text: Gathered enough lime. Return to Kevin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005997
text: Defeat nearby monsters and acquire %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005998
text: Desert Chupacabra/Zinute

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_005999
text: Vincent looks somewhat tiresome. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006000
text: Making Counterfeits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006001
text: Vincent is lazy and asked you to do his work for him. Finish the forgeries as he told you to. Blue smoke will appear when the forgery is complete in the mold.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006002
text: Give the forgeries to Vincent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006003
text: Took out the conterfeit. Give it to Vincent to finish.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006004
text: Talk to Sculptor Hilda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006005
text: Sculptor Hilda seems to be looking around. Talk to her and find out what is going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006006
text: Find the cool pillar Hilda talked about

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006007
text: Hilda wants to see a unique and cool pillar. If you find a cool pillar among the ancient pillars, pick up its debris and show it to Hilda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006008
text: You found some pillars that Hilda would like. Show Hilda the debris that you picked up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006009
text: Seems like Hilda needs help. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006010
text: Protect Sculptor Hilda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006011
text: Hilda asked you to guard her while she observes the pillars. Please respond to her passion for pillars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006012
text: Hilda is done observing the pillars. Talk to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006013
text: Talk to Hilda who has sparkling eyes looking at the pillars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006014
text: Protect Sculptor Hilda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006015
text: Hilda want to observe the pillar longer. Protect her from the monsters while she observes the pillars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006016
text: Seem like Hilda is done checking the pillars. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006017
text: You have to stop the demons attacking the Royal Mausoleum, while chasing Rexipher. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006018
text: Get the pieces of the Royal Slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006019
text: Mausoleum Guardians are hoarding the pieces of the Royal Slate that Rexipher destroyed. Collect the pieces of the slate from the Royal Mausoleum Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006020
text: Collected all pieces of the slate. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006021
text: Defeat Guardian and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006022
text: Retrieve Pieces of Royal Slate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006023
text: Liaison Officer Niels say Jonas' family is looking for you. Talk to Ahylas in the Excavation Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006024
text: Collect Shiny Tree Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006025
text: Ahylas needs to prepare the legacy of Great King Zachariel for the chosen one. He needs the Shiny Tree Sap which is called the tears of Goddess Zemyna. Go to Zeme Highland to obtain the sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006026
text: Talk to Ahylas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006027
text: Got enough tree sap. Bring it to Ahylas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006028
text: Seems like Ahylas is matching a crystal to release the seal so that you can approach Great King Zachariel's legacy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006029
text: Collect Canyon Amalas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006030
text: Ahylas says he needs Amalas to make the crystal for unsealing. Get Amalas from Pamirstas Highland. Amalas is difficult to collect so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006031
text: Give it to Ahylas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006032
text: Got enough Amalas. Give it to Ahylas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006033
text: Treasure Hunter Eden at High Winding Road is waiting for someone's help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006034
text: Defeat Tama

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006035
text: Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to defeat Tamas in the northern area if you want to help his search for treasure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006036
text: Defeated enough Tamas as Treasure Hunter Eden requested. Return to Treasure Hunter Eden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006037
text: Find the Fourth Tombstone Fragment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006038
text: Treasure Hunter says he's sure that Tama swallowed the relics. Defeat Tama and get the relics.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006039
text: Tama has the Fourth Tombstone Fragment as the treasure hunter said. Give it to Treasure Hunter Eden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006040
text: Defeat Tama and get the %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006041
text: Collect Stumpy Tree Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006042
text: Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to collect the sap of Stumpy Tree for its worth. Attach sap collectors to Stumpy Trees and defeat them afterwards to get their sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006043
text: Collected enough Stumpy Tree Sap. Return to Treasure Hunter Eden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006044
text: Finding fragments of ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006045
text: Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to get the fragments of ruins buried in the Crossroad Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006046
text: Found the fragments of ruins asked by Treasure Hunter Eden. Return and give it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006047
text: Get the first rubbing at Virdului Mountain Cabin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006048
text: Hunter Talus asked you to get a rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's Gravestone at Virdului Mountain Cabin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006049
text: The Second Rubbing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006050
text: You need to find the gravestone of Lydia Schaffen that is left here as Hunter Talus says. Find the second gravestone and get its rubbings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006051
text: Made the rubbings of Lydia Schaffens' first and second gravestones. Return to Talus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006052
text: Get charcoal and work on the third rubbings in Kriakul Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006053
text: Hunter Talus used up all his charcoal. Use bombs on Long-Branched Trees to defeat it for more charcoal. Then get the third gravestone rubbings in Kriakul Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006054
text: Made the rubbings of the gravestone like Hunter Talus said. Return to Hunter Talus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006055
text: Check the fourth gravestone at the Shiluma Altar Site

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006056
text: Hunter Talus said let's part ways here and told you the last gravestone's location. Check the gravestone at the Shiluma Altar Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006057
text: Finding the Last Gravestone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006058
text: Find the last gravestone of Lydia Schaffen over the Griuve Highway and be enlightened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006059
text: Find the Last Gravestone at Griuve Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006060
text: Find Agailla Flurry's gravestones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006061
text: I found a gravestone dedicated to Agailla Flurry, the wizard who built the Mage Tower. To learn more of Agailla Flurry's secrets, find all of her gravestones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006062
text: Read the inscription on Agailla Flurry's gravestone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006063
text: Restore the damaged gravestone of Agailla Flurry

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006064
text: I couldn't read the rest of the writings due to the damage from Old Hooks. Find the gravestone pieces broken by the Old Hooks and restore it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006065
text: Gravestone restored and legible. Read the rest of Agailla Flurry's epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006066
text: Defeat Old Hooks

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006067
text: Do Villager's Favor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006068
text: Epitaph of Agailla Flurry is destroyed but someone knows what was written there. A Villager said he'll tell you if you get him his stolen bag from the Zolem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006069
text: Give the Bag to the Villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006070
text: Got the Villager's bag from the Zolem. Give it to him and ask for the writings on the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006071
text: Obtain %s from Zolem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006072
text: Find the Villager's Bag

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006073
text: Talk to the Villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006074
text: The Villager said he'll also teach you where the next gravestone is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006075
text: Found the last epitaph but a Reaverpede is guarding it. Defeat Reaverpede and read the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006076
text: Read the last epitaph of Agailla Flurry and get her Divination.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006077
text: Defeat the monsters nearby Ruklys Memorial Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006078
text: Epigraphist Schmid asked you to defeat the monsters near the memorial stone while he prepares to restore the stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006079
text: Defeated the monsters as Schmid asked you. Go to him and help him restore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006080
text: Check the strange sack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006081
text: There is a strange sack in front. Looks like it's empty.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006082
text: Collect experiment materials

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006083
text: Found the belongings of Necromancer Drasius near Virdului Mountain Cabin. There is a memo in the bag listing out what it contains, but they aren't in the bag. Let's defeat the Long-Branched Trees and retrieve Experimental Materials for Drasius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006084
text: Collected all the lost experiment materials. Give it to Drasius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006085
text: Defeat Long-Branched Trees and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006086
text: Defeat Long-Branched Trees

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006087
text: Necromancer Drasius in Goddess' Ancient Garden is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006088
text: Collect Waterweed

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006089
text: Necromancer Drasius asked you to collect Waterweed needed for the experiment. Get the Waterweed at Kriakul Brook.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006090
text: Collected enough Waterweed. Return to Drasius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006091
text: Lizardman Mind-Control

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006092
text: Mind-controlled Lizardmen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006093
text: Drasius needs Lizardmen for necromancy. Use the mind-control stone on Lizardmen near the Dumbliu Pond and attack to brainwash it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006094
text: Gathered enough Lizardman. Return to Drasius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006095
text: Mind-controlled Infroburk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006096
text: Drasius needs Infroburk for necromancy. Use the mind-control stone on Infroburks near the Nardyma Twin Waterfall and attack to brainwash it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006097
text: Gathered enough from Infroburk. Return to Drasius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006098
text: Worship the statue and talk to Tools merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006099
text: Prepare to leave for the East Forest by worshiping the Goddess Statue in Central Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006100
text: Talk to the Item Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006101
text: Knight Commander Uska has left warp scrolls for you to use. Talk to the Item Merchant and receive the warp scrolls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006102
text: Talk to the wandering soldier at Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006103
text: Check the Military Backpack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006104
text: The Ghost disappeared when you approached it and only the pouch is left. Check what's inside the pouch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006105
text: You've found orders underneath the soldiers diary while checking the military backpack of the Wandering Spirit at Remaining Tree Dale. Check the orders in the backpack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006106
text: Commence Operation Wooden Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006107
text: Found the plan for Operation Wooden Village in the backpack. The plan was to defeat the Zolems around Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins, then using Zolem Magic Stones to summon Unicorn, and then defeating it. The Wandering Spirit seems to have been in an accident while carrying out the plan. Continue the plan to comfort the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006108
text: Prepare to lure Unicorn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006109
text: Collected enough Zolem Stones. Put the stone in the abandoned bag written in the command and lure the unicorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006110
text: Defeat Zolems and acquire %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006111
text: Defeat Zolems

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006112
text: Carry out Operation Tree Dale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006113
text: Carry out Operation Tree Dale for the Wandering Spirit at Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006114
text: Defeat Unicorn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006115
text: Unicorn appeared when the Zolem Magic Stones were put in the bag. Defeat Unicorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006116
text: Report to the Wandering Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006117
text: Completed Operation Wooden Village. Let the Wandering Spirit know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006118
text: Defeat Unicorn and acquire %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006119
text: Talk to Villager Cahill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006120
text: Villager Cahill is grumbling about something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006121
text: Talk to Old Man Moses

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006122
text: Villager Cahill is complaining about Moses who is bugging him. Tell Old Man Moses how Villager Cahill feels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006123
text: Give lumber to Old Man Moses

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006124
text: Old Man Moses is not interested in Villager Cahill and tells you to just do him a favor. Help him fetch some good lumber beside his house.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006125
text: Looks like you've chosen good lumber. Give them to Old Man Moses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006126
text: Talk to Moses Diesel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006127
text: You thought you chose pretty good lumber, but Moses is not satisfied. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006128
text: Get Strong Flying Frog Leather

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006129
text: Moses is still looking to use you some more. Get Strong Flying Frog Leather from Flying Frogs near the campsite.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006130
text: Give them to Old Man Moses

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006131
text: Collected enough Strong Flying Frog Leather. Moses better be pleased. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006132
text: Moses is dissatisfied even with the leather. Control your anger and talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006133
text: Give crutches to Villager Cahill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006134
text: Old Man Moses was actually making crutches for Villager Cahill. Give Old Man Moses' wooden crutches to Villager Cahill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006135
text: Talk to Believer Domas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006136
text: Goddess Saule's Believer Domas needs help in Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006137
text: Defeat Thornball and get its remains.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006138
text: Domas who is a believer of Goddess Saule is planning on burning the thorny vines. Get Thornball Remains from Geisma Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006139
text: Give them to Believer Domas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006140
text: Got the Thornball Remains to use for burning the forest. But won't the whole forest burn like this? Anyway, give them to Believer Domas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006141
text: Defeat Thornball and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006142
text: Defeat Coliflowers and get their sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006143
text: Believer Domas says that he requires Coliflower sap because of the rain. Obtain sap from Coliflowers by defeating them at Rajuma Curved Path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006144
text: I collected all the Coliflower Sap. I should give them to Believer Domas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006145
text: Defeat Coliflower and fill the Thornball Pouch with Coliflower Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006146
text: Burn the thorny vines covering the gate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006147
text: Everything is finally ready. Burn the thorny vines covering the gate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006148
text: Burning the thorny vines covering the gate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006149
text: Talk to Goddess Saule Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006150
text: Goddess Saule's Believer Adele needs your help in Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006151
text: Collect the Velwriggler Claws.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006152
text: Believer Adele wants to melt the thorny vines with an acid solution. First, gather Velwriggler's Claws at Rajuma Curved Path in order to make the acid solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006153
text: Give the claws to Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006154
text: Collected all the Velwriggler claws needed. Give them to Believer Adele.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006155
text: Talk to Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006156
text: Goddess Saule Believer Adele needs help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006157
text: Find Believer Adele's ring

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006158
text: Believer Adele lost her precious ring along with her leather pouch. Find the ring for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006159
text: Give the ring to Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006160
text: The ring's holiness prevented it from being swallowed by the monster. Return the ring to Believer Adele.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006161
text: Defeat Chafer and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006162
text: Goddess Saule's Believer Adele needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006163
text: Collect Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006164
text: Believer Adele says she needs poisonous mushrooms of Truffles for the acid solution. Defeat the Truffles in Isdidu Fork and gather the mushrooms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006165
text: Give Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms to Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006166
text: Gathered enough of Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms. Give them to Believer Adele so that she can make the acid solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006167
text: Combine the mixed solution at the Altar of Harmony

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006168
text: Gathered all the materials. Approach the Altar of Harmony in Isdidu Fork, then combine Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms and the Velwriggler's Claws to make a mixed solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006169
text: Give the mixed solution to Believer Adele

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006170
text: You have successfully made the mixed solution at the Altar of Harmony. Give it to Believer Adele.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006171
text: Melt the thorny vines using the Acid Solution

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006172
text: Believer Adele made acid solution with the mix solution you brought. Bring the solution to Gate Route and melt the thorny vines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006173
text: Talk to Believer Virgis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006174
text: Virgis wants your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006175
text: Charge the Magic Crystal in the condensed magic spots

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006176
text: Virgis' Memo: To start, charge the magic crystals I gave you. Look for the condensed magic spots in Pavydo Woodland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006177
text: Collect Operor stingers to refine the magic crystal with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006178
text: Virgis' Memo: Great. But we can't use the crystal right away because it accumulated foul energy. So collect stingers from Operors for their purifying capabilities.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006179
text: Defeat Operor and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006180
text: Refine the magic in the Magic Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006181
text: Virgis' Memo: Did you collect all the stingers? The Altar of Purification is in Lenistwo Wasteland. Go there and use the Operor's Stingers to refine the Magic Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006182
text: Get the refined Magic Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006183
text: Use the refined Magic Crystal to remove the thorny vines

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006184
text: Virgis' Memo: Very good. Now use the refined Magic Crystal and show those thorny vines the power of Goddess Saule's Believers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006185
text: Virgis' Memo: Very good. Now use the refined Magic Crystal and show those thorny vines the power of Goddess Saule's Believers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006186
text: Talk to Believer Nojus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006187
text: Goddess Saule Believer Nojus is anxiously waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006188
text: Find the 'ominous voice'

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006189
text: Believer Nojus told you where the ominous voice is coming from. Go and find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006190
text: Go to Fallen Worry Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006191
text: Defeated the Poata summoned by the Beholder. Go deep into the Thorn Forest to find Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006192
text: Defeat the summoned Poata

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006193
text: Talk to Believer Alvydas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006194
text: Goddess Saule Believer Alvydas is watching you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006195
text: Look for Goddess Saule Believers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006196
text: Find and help Goddess Saule Believers at Spineheart Dale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006197
text: Helped every Believer of Goddess Saule. Talk to Believer Alvydas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006198
text: Talk to Believer Raminta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006199
text: Goddess Saule Believer Raminta needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006200
text: Defeat the source of the evil energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006201
text: Believer Raminta says she found the demon spreading an evil energy. Defeat Rikaus for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006202
text: Report to Believer Raminta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006203
text: Defeated Rikaus that was spreading evil energy. Report to Believer Raminta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006204
text: Defeat Rikaus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006205
text: Talk to Believer Evaldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006206
text: Goddess Saule Believer Evaldas needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006207
text: Defeat the Merog Shamans

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006208
text: Believer Evaldas asked you to defeat the Shamans. Stop their rituals and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006209
text: Report to Evaldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006210
text: Defeat the Merog Shamans. Tell Believer Evaldas about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006211
text: Defeat the Merog Shaman performing a ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006212
text: Talk to Believer Zaneta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006213
text: Goddess Saule Believer Zaneta needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006214
text: Destroy the Demon Summoning Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006215
text: Those Merogs prepared a Demon Summoning Circle{nl}that summons demons in Goddess Saule's Altar. {nl}Destroy the summoning crystal in the center and stop the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006216
text: Report to Believer Zaneta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006217
text: Destroyed all the summoning crystals. Go and comfort Zaneta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006218
text: Talk to Believer Simas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006219
text: Goddess Saule Believer Simas needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006220
text: Destroy the Demon Summoning Circle that is exuding evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006221
text: Believer Simas says the Demon Summoning Circle is exuding evil energy along with demons and it is worth researching. Destroy the summoning circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006222
text: Report to Believer Simas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006223
text: The summoning circle does not seem to work anymore. Tell Simas that he can study it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006224
text: Destroy the Demon Summoning Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006225
text: Talk to Believer Onute

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006226
text: Goddess Saule Believer Onute needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006227
text: Defeat Archon and the Demon Summoning Circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006228
text: Believer Onute is angry that the altar turned into a Demon Summoning Circle. Defeat Archon and destroy the Demon Summoning Circle to teach them a lesson about the goddess' powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006229
text: Report to Believer Onute

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006230
text: Got rid of all the ominous things Onute mentioned. Report to Believer Onute.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006231
text: Talk to Believer Bronius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006232
text: Goddess Saule Believer Bronius is hiding and waiting anxiously for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006233
text: Defeat the Merogs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006234
text: Believer Bronius says the monsters are after him. Defeat the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006235
text: Defeated the monsters. Talk to Believer Bronius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006236
text: Defeat the monsters trying to kill the Believer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006237
text: Talk to Believer Samantha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006238
text: Goddess Saule Believer Samantha at Fallen Worry Forest is waiting for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006239
text: Protect the altar from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006240
text: Believer Samantha is troubled because the monsters attack whenever she tries to purify Thornbush Rest Place. Protect the Altar of Purification at Thornbush Rest Place from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006241
text: Protected the altar from the monsters. Return to Believer Samantha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006242
text: Check Sviesa Hill Areas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006243
text: Believer Jurga says one of Bramble's roots is in Sviesa Hill Areas. Check Sviesa Hill Areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006244
text: Cut Bramble's Root.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006245
text: Approached the Bramble's roots but Gaigalas appeared. You must defeat Gaigalas before destroying Bramble's roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006246
text: Talk to Believer Jurga

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006247
text: You cut off Bramble's roots. Return and talk to Believer Jurga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006248
text: Defeat Gaigalas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006249
text: Destroy Bramble's Root

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006250
text: Believer Jurga is following the goddess in watching over Bramble and is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006251
text: Get Merog's stinger and make Thorn Flower stimulant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006252
text: Bramble says he needs to make medication for withstanding the evil energy before getting into the battle. Go to Kruva swell and get Merog's stingers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006253
text: Collect all of Merog's stingers needed. Return to Jurga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006254
text: Check Tankinta Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006255
text: Believer Jurga says one of Bramble's roots is in Tankinta Vacant Lot. Check out Tankinta Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006256
text: Defeat Molich guarding the roots of Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006257
text: Defeat Molich

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006258
text: Talk to Believer Kazis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006259
text: Goddess Saule Believer Kazis needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006260
text: Purify Karadas Path

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006261
text: Believer Kazis says the Honeypin is making it difficult to do purifying work. Activate the altar for Believer Kazis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006262
text: Defeated the Honeypin. Return to Believer Kazis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006263
text: You agreed to meet Believer Jurga in Giliaii Courtyard to plan a fight against Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006264
text: Defeat Bramble and retrieve the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006265
text: You arrived at Giliaii Courtyard where Bramble is. Defeat Bramble and retrieve the revelation!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006266
text: Retrieve the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006267
text: Successfully defeated Bramble! Get the goddess' revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006268
text: Defeat Bramble

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006269
text: Ask Goddess Saule about the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006270
text: You need to go back to Goddess Saule to ask for the meanings

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006271
text: Talk to the Old Man of Andale Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006272
text: The villager told you to go to the Andale Village Elder. Go to the Andale Village Elder at Rhombuspaving Dale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006273
text: Collect Black Maize Venom.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006274
text: Collect some Black Maize Venom as a gift to the Village Priest. You can only obtain Black Maize Venom by using Paralysis Powder on a Black Maize while its HP is below half.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006275
text: Go to the Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006276
text: Collected enough Black Maize Venom. Go to the Andale Village Priest at Cerpe Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006277
text: Defeat Black Maize to obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006278
text: Talk to the Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006279
text: The Village Priest says you can activate the Obelisk if you follow his instructions. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006280
text: Collect tree sap from White Oak Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006281
text: Tree sap is needed to make the dye for restoring the Obelisk. Collect tree sap at White Oak Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006282
text: Obtain %s from the tree sap collection containers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006283
text: Go to the Thorn Tree Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006284
text: You've gathered all the materials required to restore the Obelisk. Go to the Thorn Tree Altar to compose the gathered materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006285
text: Retrieve Dye from Thorn Tree Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006286
text: Made the dye for restoring the Obelisk. Get the dye from the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006287
text: Got the dye for restoring the Obelisk. Return and talk to the Priest again for what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006288
text: Restore the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006289
text: Seems like the Obelisk can now be restored. Write back the erased letters on the Obelisk at Slepingas Stream.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006290
text: Go to the village at Indigo Tree Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006291
text: Successfully restored the Obelisk. Return to Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006292
text: Go to Nefrito Valley

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006293
text: A strong energy is felt in the swift currents of Nefrito Valley. Find out what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006294
text: Defeat Moldyhorn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006295
text: Check the Thorn Tree Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006296
text: You sense an ominous aura from the Thorn Tree Altar. Check what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006297
text: Defeat the monsters that reacted to the ominous energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006298
text: The surrounding monsters turned aggressive when an ominous energy fumed from the Ershike Altar. Defeat those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006299
text: Check the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006300
text: Check the Obelisk in Slepingas Stream..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006301
text: Defeat Blue Woodspirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006302
text: Find the Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006303
text: The Rhombuspaving Dale Priest told you to go to the Andale Village Priest. Go to Andale Village at Indigo Tree Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006304
text: Collect the Languid Herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006305
text: Let's create a Languid Bomb to defeat monsters threatening Andale Village. Collect Languid Herbs needed to make the bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006306
text: Talk to the Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006307
text: Gathered enough Languid Herbs. Talk to the Andale Village Priest in Andale Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006308
text: Ask the Andale Village Priest what else is needed to make the Languid Bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006309
text: Collect the Strongly Scented Soul Flower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006310
text: Strongly scented soul flowers are needed to make strong bombs. Look for the flowers with a strong scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006311
text: Collected the flowers. Ask the Andale Village Priest what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006312
text: Talk to Andale Village Headman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006313
text: He says the bomb used before must be somewhere. Talk to the Headman who knows where the bomb is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006314
text: Find a Useful Bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006315
text: The Headman says that the bombs are in the northern warehouse. Look for a Useful Bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006316
text: Unlike what the Headman said, the bombs were in a small container. Ask the Headman what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006317
text: Made the Languid Bomb. Now ask the Headman what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006318
text: Use the Languid Bomb on the sleeping Upents

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006319
text: The Headman says to use the bomb on the Upents in Melagingas Hill. Take it to Melagingas Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006320
text: Check the portal at Grassy Brookside

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006321
text: The residents were demons in disguise. Run to the portal at Grassy Brookside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006322
text: Defeat Demon Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006323
text: Go to the old well

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006324
text: Check the old well at Indigo Tree Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006325
text: Look for something to put in the old well

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006326
text: There is something in the old well but you can't see it clearly. Look for something that you can use to get the thing out of the well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006327
text: Use the long rope and bucket to get the thing out of the well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006328
text: Go to Dvyni Wetland

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006329
text: Look for the Strongly Scented Soul Flower in Dvyni Wetland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006330
text: Go to Saknele Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006331
text: Examine the Suspicious Greenery at Saknele Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006332
text: Defeat the Iltiswort that was disguised as Greenery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006333
text: Beholder's Careful Trick

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006334
text: The mysterious Beholder appeared to try and shake your belief in the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006335
text: Believer Jurga says there are more things to do other than making the stimulant. Talk to Believer Jurga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006336
text: Destroy Bramble's roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006337
text: Jurga says we must destroy the roots placed to heal Bramble's wound. The roots are in Sviesa Hill Areas and Tankinta Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006338
text: Removed all of Bramble's roots. Talk to Believer Jurga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006339
text: Seems like the Item Merchant has something left to say. Talk to the Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006340
text: Talk to the Accessory Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006341
text: The Accessory Merchant has given the Revelator an accessory gift. Please accept it graciously.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006342
text: Listen to Gustas Jonas for the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006343
text: Meet Morkus Jonas in Overlong Bridge Valley

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006344
text: You'll know what to do next when you meet Morkus Jonas in Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006345
text: Goddess Saule says that Bramble stole the revelation in the Thorn Forest. Move to the Thorn Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006346
text: Goddess Saule says that the revelation has been stolen by Bramble in Fallen Worry Forest. Go find the revelation at the Fallen Worry Forest past Gate Route and Spineheart Dale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006347
text: Fallen Worry Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006348
text: Talk to Soldier Jace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006349
text: Talk to Soldier Jace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006350
text: Retrieving Soldiers' Mementos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006351
text: The Vubbes stole the deceased soldiers' mementos. Get them back from the Vubbes so that the soldiers can rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006352
text: Collected all the mementos. Bring them to Soldier Jace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006353
text: Defeat Vubbe and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006354
text: Defeat Vubbe Thief

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006355
text: Talk to Soldier Edgar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006356
text: Edgar seems to be in trouble. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006357
text: Retrieve the stolen food supplies from the Vubbes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006358
text: Edgar says the Vubbes stole all the food supplies. Go and get it back from the Vubbes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006359
text: This much food seems enough. Bring it back to Soldier Edgar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006360
text: Defeat Vubbes and retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006361
text: Talk to the Miners' Village mayor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006362
text: Go do Leaf Veil Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006363
text: Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006364
text: is found at the further right of the

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006365
text: Silverstream Gorge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006366
text: which is located below the twin bridge of

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006367
text: Leaf Veil Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006368
text: is able go to there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006369
text: Leaf Veil Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006370
text: Go to Fedimian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006371
text: Please go to the Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006372
text: Along the clearly, I think be prepared depending on the Fedimian before going to the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006373
text: Fedimian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006374
text: Go to Stone Pole Platform

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006375
text: Morcus Jonas says that you can hear what happens next from Rolandas Jonas at Stone Pole Platform.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006376
text: Meet Rolandas Jonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006377
text: Meet Rolandas Jonas as Morcus Jonas suggested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006378
text: Talk to the Pharmacist Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006379
text: Looks like healer lady has something to say. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006380
text: Give medicinal ingredients to Pharmacist Lady

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006381
text: The Pharmacist Lady needs Yukopus leaves and Kepa stem to use as treatment for injured people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006382
text: Pharmacist's Favor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006383
text: Give the Yukopus leaves and Kepa Stems that the Pharmacist Lady requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006384
text: Ask the Pharmacist Lady if she needs anything else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006385
text: Get medicinal ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006386
text: She needs more Yukopus leaves and Kepa Stem to make more medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006387
text: Give Yukopus leaves and Kepa stem to the Pharmacist Lady.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006388
text: Talk to Mr. Juan in Mine Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006389
text: Seems like Mr. Juan has something to say. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006390
text: Mr. Juan say he'll help you make armors. Gather the materials he asked for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006391
text: Receive gift from Mr. Juan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006392
text: Gathered the materials for Mr. Juna. Bring it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006393
text: Get armor parts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006394
text: Get materials

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006395
text: Mr. Juan asked you to bring Tough Toots of Large Red Kepa for the armor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006396
text: Bring the materials

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006397
text: Acquired Tough Roots of Large Red Kepa. Bring it to Mr. Juan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006398
text: Get %s from Large Red Kepa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006399
text: Mr. Juan asked you to bring him Kepa's Teeth to make the armor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006400
text: Acquired enough Kepa's Teeth! Bring it to Mr. Juan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006401
text: Get %s from Kepa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006402
text: Mr. Juan asked you to bring him Yukopus Leather to make the armor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006403
text: Acquired Yukopus Leather! Bring it to Mr. Juan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006404
text: Mr. Juan asked you to bring him Vubbe Thief's Leather to make the armor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150317_006405
text: Acquired Vubbe Thief's Leather! Bring it to Mr. Juan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006406
text: Now take the Seal Release Crystal and go to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will teach you how to release the seals there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006407
text: Still lost in direction?{nl}Go to the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.{nl}The crystal is made for the chosen one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006408
text: Ask the mayor of the Miners' Village for directions to Gele Plateau. {nl}I will send the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006409
text: The high gardens mentioned by the goddess may be a place in Gele Plateau. {nl}I heard the Paladin Master is there, upholding a long term promise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006410
text: Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get to Silverstream Gorge by going down at the middle of Twin Bridge.{nl}If you go further right at Silverstream Gorge, you'll reach Gele Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006411
text: You have to go further in from Silverstream Gorge in order to get to Gele Plateau.{nl}Go down from the middle of Twin Bridge and you'll be able to go to Silverstream Gorge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006412
text: If you ever fight against us Rodeleros, better be careful of your legs. {nl}Swords pop out from below the shield. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006413
text: The simplest forms are the strongest ways. {nl}If you want to study the roots of everything, take the path of Elementalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006414
text: Go straight down from the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.{nl}Go further right through Srautas Gorge and you'll be able to get to Gele Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006415
text: The Paladin Master is at Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get there by riding the cable car.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006416
text: This is one of the devices the first Paladin set in preparation for the demon invasion. {nl}Nefritas Cliff is covered with several of these devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006417
text: You must find Goddess Saule...{nl}The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation may refer to the upper region of Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of Goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006418
text: This Divine Sphere is a holy weapon that will be used to fight against Gesti in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}It has been handed down since the times of the first Paladin.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006419
text: Go. the Tenet Church is located in Tenet Garden.{nl}You must prevent the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006420
text: Find Gesti. {nl}The Tenet Church is located within the Tenet Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006421
text: There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006422
text: You need to use the cable car to go from Srautas Gorge to Gele Plateau. {nl}I heard people used to hang baskets on ropes in the past, and use those to traverse the gorge. {nl}Well the cable car is scary enough for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006423
text: I came to protect this divine land from the demons. {nl}I heard that the Paladin Master is also in Gele Plateau. It must surely be a big problem. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006424
text: I'm worried for my brother at Nefritas Cliff. {nl}I hope nothing happens to him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006425
text: We'll have to make do with the remaining dolls. {nl}Everyone's lives are at stake at Nefritas Cliff so we can't complain about this, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006426
text: And if you're talking about Rukas Plateau, it's been a while since we pulled out of that place as it {nl}wasn't worthy of research anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006427
text: Understanding the root of everything becomes the power of Elementalist. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest forms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006428
text: Bring the Seal Release Crystal and find Disciple of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge. {nl}He will teach you about the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006429
text: The Netherbovines are becoming violent again? {nl}As long as us Rodeleros are standing ground, no monsters shall pass.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006430
text: I used to live in the woods, but I came out here to do what I can. {nl}I will do anything that I can help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006431
text: Physical enhancing magic is a profound and mysterious field. {nl}If you make good use of it, you can easily distinguish friends from foes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006432
text: When a seal is released, you must advance to the next seal in Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006433
text: Death may be the price that I pay for the sin I committed. {nl}Even if it is the curse of the demons, it is still for a sin I made.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006434
text: I don't want to... die like this... {nl}Mother...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006435
text: Wait. Aren't those Succubus Eyes? {nl}Wow. How did you get them... Can I take a look?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006436
text: I've heard about those eyes. {nl}A greedy Succubus tried to take one of the Great Cathedral's blessed necklaces, but ended up{nl}putting her own eyes into this one. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006437
text: Did you know I used to be an aspiring alchemist? {nl}I can turn that back into a normal necklace. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006438
text: Done. {nl}I suppose you know about Maven's five necklaces?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006439
text: They were created to remind people of the five sins. {nl}Naktis caused them to look like curses on the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006440
text: Looks like the necklace belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, the teachings of Maven would have been left as a curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006441
text: To be honest, I'd like go to Kvailas Forest rather than staying here. {nl}I want to see the source of evil with my own two eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006442
text: Thank you. The tools are sold by the blacksmith in Klaipeda. {nl}But before that, there are stones in Stele Road that are known for their quality. Please retrieve {nl}some for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006443
text: Here you are. Please place this at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Zachariel Crossroads. {nl}This should bring comfort to their souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006444
text: Hmm. You're really as good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006445
text: Please be careful. {nl}A dark energy similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorn Forest. {nl}Especially the Kvailas Forest.. I have sharp ears for things like this..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006446
text: The Necroventer that occupied Kule Peak is gone. {nl}Kule Peak should become peaceful again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006447
text: This was prepared for releasing the seals in Tiltas Valley. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries. {nl}So please handle it with care.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006448
text: This is it. {nl}Bring the Seal Release Crystal to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will welcome you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006449
text: The day of discovering the true owner of the Great King's inheritance has finally come. {nl}Hurry, meet the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006450
text: My teacher is poisoned and cannot breathe. {nl}Please hurry and borrow an antidote from someone in Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006451
text: I had no idea it came from Rukas Plateau. {nl}What is he trying to do by releasing the seal? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006452
text: Follow the road on the right to go to Cobalt Forest. {nl}Our village priest there is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006453
text: When you have all materials ready, combine them at the Ershike Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006454
text: The evil energy was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006455
text: The evil energy of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I hope you can help us. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006456
text: Perhaps the source of evil in Kvailas Forest has become the forest itself? {nl}I only hope this is just an ill-founded worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006457
text: Everything will be resolved when the evil energy deep inside Kvailas Forest is dealt with. {nl}It's a pity that everyone is only after what's right in front of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006458
text: Kvailas Forest is the worst. {nl}The evil energy is unquestionably concentrated that even your lives are at stake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006459
text: I miss my family in Cobalt Forest. {nl}And... I want to apologize to my brother for the fight we had.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006460
text: I remember singing and soaking my feet in the stream waters with my older brother in {nl}Cobalt Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006461
text: Can you inform the elderly in Vieta Gorge about this for me? {nl}If you veer left and move up from here, you'll quickly arrive there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006462
text: The most important root must be somewhere in Kvailas Forest. {nl}Cutting off the head root should reduce the evil energy in this forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006463
text: I knew it was Ebonypawn's poison. {nl}No one else would use a poison this strong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006464
text: Don't worry. I'll give you the recipe. {nl}Ridimed leaves from there will be enough to make it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006465
text: Is the antidote ready yet? {nl}The situation's grave. He's gradually getting worse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006466
text: Ebonypawn sure employed a vicious poison. {nl}We need to hunt him down before he causes more damage...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006467
text: Oh, is this the antidote? {nl}Thank you very much. I will let them take it right away. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006468
text: If it wasn't for you, many workers would have lost their lives for nothing. {nl}I will report about this to Sir Uska. {nl}No doubt about it... you were sent by the goddess!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006469
text: The monsters in the Owl Burial Ground should be a fair bet for you. Right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006470
text: The Chaparition in Escanciu Village took a lot of lives. {nl}Please defeat that monster in the name of the Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006471
text: I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006472
text: Try and perform a killing spree of the monsters in the Owl Burial Ground. {nl}Around 40 of them? I bet you can't do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006473
text: I'll go to Ramstis Ridge and release the seals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150323_006474
text: Let's go help Grita at Fedimian Suburbs

text: Make %s

text: Releasing barrier/SITGROPE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150401_006616
text: Notice/!/Did not find anything!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150401_006617
text: NPCChat/SIAULIAI_50_1_SQ_MAN03/I feel better now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150401_006618
text: Take the key from Overlong Bridge Valley and use the map from Akmens Ridge to release all seals of Tiltas Valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150406_006619
text: If you are talking about the Rukas Plateau, that place isn't worthy of research.{nl}It's been a while since we pulled out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150406_006620
text: Looking for information on Varkis/SITGROPE_LOOP/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150406_006621
text: Notice/!/Can't find research data and Unknocker suddenly appreared!{nl}Unknocker might have the research data! Defeat Unknocker!#7

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150406_006622
text: Defeat Lithorex

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150406_006623
text: Defeat Unknocker and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006624
text: They are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger towards Gaigalas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006625
text: This cable car works. {nl}But the monsters around make it such a hassle to maintain it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006626
text: Could you take care of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006627
text: It's better to use the cable car rather than fight your way past the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006628
text: I think there are monsters crawling out of the mysterious barrier at Nutoles Cliff.{nl}Is it possible for you to get rid of that barrier?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006629
text: With that barrier gone, maintenance will be a lot easier now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006630
text: Go down from the middle of the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge. {nl}Go further right through the Gorge and you'll reach to Gele Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006631
text: Go on ahead and defeat the Hanamings around here. {nl}Then gather Hanaming Petals while you're at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006632
text: Miners' Village is a problem but we also haven't gotten any rest from this endless skirmish. {nl}Defeating those Chupacabras would make it a lot better.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006633
text: Defeat the Vubbe Fighter. {nl}Search Scouts are on stand by in Nudeges Felled Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006634
text: You'll need to cross Srautas Gorge to get to Gele Plateau. {nl}Go down from the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006635
text: You've come all the way here, just for a mere meddlesome woman? {nl}Do you honestly want to save this woman that much?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006636
text: We're looking for a stone with strange engraving like this. {nl}If you see a stone like this, please don't touch it and just let us know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006637
text: The Magic Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum can be destroyed with the power of the{nl}Activation Stones. Details can be found in the Regulatory Magic Manual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006638
text: As you can see, Fedimian is right under our noses but we can't get to it with the Cockatrices {nl}around. Can you teach them a lesson on how scary humans are?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006639
text: Denoptic is trying to control the corrupted Guardians. {nl}Annihilate it so that the Guardians will not fall into its hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006640
text: Thank you in the name of the goddess! {nl}Please defeat the filthy Cockatrice first that are spreading diseases.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006641
text: First, cripple the demons by fighting them, then use the power of the barrier to sever their souls. {nl}After that, defeat their severed souls. Can you give it a try?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006642
text: Our squad was given the order of hunting down the Unicorn. {nl}The details should be in the operation order...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006643
text: My plan is to let you disguise as a demon. {nl}Please collect Pawndel and Pawnd's clothing first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006644
text: Activate Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}You must defeat those demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006645
text: I'm exhausted and would like to rest for a bit.{nl}I just need some time, so do you mind taking care of the demons around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006646
text: Defeat whatever demons you see.{nl}Only then can our brothers can feel safe while protecting the church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006647
text: I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006648
text: My sould is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006649
text: I am here and all over the world. {nl}I am collecting fragments of my soul which was torn into pieces long ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006650
text: Where are my other pieces..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006651
text: I am Hauberk, a Demon Lord. {nl}Helgasercle tore up my soul. A part of me is within the barrier of this tower, {nl}and the rest of me were scattered throughout the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006652
text: You still have business here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006653
text: The altars here are one of the Royal Mausoleum's various defenses built to ward off intruders.{nl}They should've been reactivated, but since they were built from such a long time ago,{nl}no one knows how.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006654
text: However, the seal at Rukas Plateau is the answer.{nl}The altar won't function if it gets destroyed, but if we can activate it before that...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006655
text: I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do, but it sure can prevent him from doing it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006656
text: It's either Rexipher destroying the seal, or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006657
text: Aren't you hurt? {nl}Oh, that is the seconds hint of the King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006658
text: The next epitaph is at the left side of Dykyne Fork. {nl}It'll be the third epitaph, right? I am looking forward to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006659
text: Finally, we've gathered all clues. {nl}Now we must interpret it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006660
text: Then destroy the Royal Mausoleum Guarding device of Sesija Parvise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006661
text: This time I'll need you to get Coliflower Sap from Coliflowers at Rustybe Dead Tree Area. {nl}The sap should burn easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006662
text: I will now focus on finding Clymen. {nl}Please remove any nearby demons in order to moderate their evil energies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006663
text: I can feel Clymen in Ishpirki Entrance. {nl}Hurry and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006664
text: Please read the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006665
text: This is it, we've come to the last epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006666
text: Allow me to introduce. This here is my buddy Rith.{nl}Do you like birds? If not, you can never become a Falconer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006667
text: Recording/ABSORB/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006668
text: Notice/!/Ginklas appeared after you recorded!{nl}Defeat Ginklas!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006669
text: Collecting stones from the pillar/#SITGROPESET2/0/TRACK_AFTER/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006670
text: Installing stone/BURY/2/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006671
text: Luring/BURY/3/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006672
text: Explain about the Rexipher and the clues

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006673
text: About the Altar here

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006674
text: Activate the Tzedej Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006675
text: Grita wants to prepare defensive magic that protects against explosions that will come from destroying the valves. Bring the cores of Red Infrorocktor that is used for this defensive magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006676
text: Collected the cores of Red Infrorocktor. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006677
text: Barely got rid of the guardians of the epitaph, but Rexipher did not show up. {nl}Read the epitaph again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006678
text: Talk to Rexipher about the location of third epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006679
text: It's the third clue prepared by King Zachariel. {nl}Read the epitaph on the left of Dikyne Crossroad and find the fourth clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006680
text: Find Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006681
text: Rexipher is trying to destroy all the altars at King's Plateau. Follow him and stop him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006682
text: Activate the Gedulah Altar{nl} before Rexipher does

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006683
text: The Chesed Altar has been destroyed! The remaining altars are in danger. Get to the Gedulah Altar before Rexipher and activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006684
text: Activate the Tzedej Altar{nl} before Rexipher does

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006685
text: Better do something before Rexipher does. First, go to the Tzedej Altar nearby and activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006686
text: Tzedej's seal has been activated. Tell Cyrenia Odell about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006687
text: Talk to Cyrenia Odell and ask about the location of other altars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006688
text: Activate Sevisa altar before Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006689
text: Go to Sviesa altar before Rexipher to stop Rexipher's plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006690
text: Fortunately, saved the Sevisa altar. Return to Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006691
text: Activate the Sviesa Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006692
text: Cetek altar was destroyed but Sevia altar was successfully activate. Talk to Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006693
text: Defeat Experimental Slime

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006694
text: There are more seal stones. Defeat the Experimental Slime that is guarding it to find other seal stones by talking to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006695
text: The Tzedej Altar in King's Plateau is not yet activated. Activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006696
text: Domas, a Believer of Goddess Saule, is planning to burn the thorny vines. Get the Thornball Remains at Geisma Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006697
text: Believer Domas says he needs Coliflower Sap because of the rain. Get the sap from Coliflowers at Rustybe Dead Tree Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150414_006698
text: Combine Ridimed leaf and detox solvent to make antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006699
text: I heard the sound of fighting so I came here in a hurry... So you really defeated  it?{nl}I only spotted Siaulambs at my location.{nl}Well done. You have done a meritorious deed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006700
text: I feel queasy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006701
text: If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble. {nl}If you're not interested, then I'll leave you on your way to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006702
text: Thank you so much for your support.{nl}Turn left at the crossroads ahead and follow the road. {-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006703
text: Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudeges Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006704
text: For the next one, we will need to apply Hallowventer Charcoal in order to read it.{nl}The next monument is at the right side of Negyvas Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006705
text: We can suppress the evil presence if the magic of the Royal Mausoleum is released.{nl}This requires a number of activation stones located inside active Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006706
text: It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my consciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabija?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006707
text: It may be a good idea to let Gabija know that we are coming to help her.{nl}There's a place where we can ignite a signal light. Let's hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006708
text: Splendid. Since she knows that we have come, she can probably start recovering her health.{nl}Let's go up and see Gabija.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006709
text: I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would probably come trembling on their knees when bringing the parts back.{nl}But what if more thieves come while I'm carrying them back?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006710
text: Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are a few things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006711
text: That's why I am thinking about setting it on fire.{nl}Please hunt some Mallardu and collect their fat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006712
text: I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there is someone who wishes to continue his will, I will leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will lay out my long story here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006713
text: Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006714
text: If you are truly the Revelator, then you must be able to attain the divine secrets at the end of {nl}this revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006715
text: The Transport Magic Circle will take you to a floor of your choosing in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the magic circle anymore. Let's go and find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006716
text: Darn.{nl}They broke it. It is beyond repair.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006717
text: When you activate the Tower's Barrier Device, monsters won't be able to enter anymore.{nl}The magic power supply is currently broken, but we can input power to it through other means.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006718
text: We have to be careful here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should hurry up to the next floor as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006719
text: He was a great magician before.{nl}But his ideology was too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006720
text: He was locked up because he was obsessed with studying condensed magic on the 3rd floor.{nl}What would happen to the tower if hundreds of years of condensed magic exploded all at once?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006721
text: Goddess Gabija is important, but the tower is in more trouble now.{nl}Antares may already be up to something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006722
text: There are two valves here that control the Magic Power Device.{nl}The first valve is at the Laboratory, so let's go and destroy it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006723
text: Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006724
text: Antares came here to do extensive research on the flow of magic.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they may help us with destroying those valves.{nl}They should be here somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006725
text: This is it. I think I know how to break those valves now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006726
text: Please set this gem and defeat the monsters around it.{nl}We can collect their energy to use it to recharge the Barrier Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006727
text: A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006728
text: Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006729
text: Oh, I thought of something. Just a hunch I have, but let's also prepare some defensive magic. {nl}There is a spell we can use to protect ourselves against explosions from any of Anteres' {nl}experiments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006730
text: I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006731
text: Alright. We will be able to use the magic once without problems.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006732
text: Let's go find the second valve in the Central Control Room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006733
text: The Jewel of Prominence is acting a bit strange.{nl}Something must have went wrong during the explosion that killed Antares.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006734
text: Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006735
text: What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very unstable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006736
text: Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. it seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006737
text: And me.. I feel dizzy..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006738
text: If it stays like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006739
text: Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006740
text: The Jewel of Prominence has stopped behaving erratically.{nl}Still, we will need Flame Crystals from the tower's Large Central Brazier in order to {nl}completely stabilize it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006741
text: You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to stabilize it fully so let's go to Laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006742
text: Good! Now we can activate the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006743
