text: You..are the Revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006744
text: Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006745
text: You may be the only one who can stop all of this. {nl}Please, come to the Karsta Hall Site at the Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006746
text: This is then entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all the power somehow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006747
text: I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006748
text: The other magicians have either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006749
text: Gabija had not disappeared herself.{nl}To protect the tower from demons, she just could not appear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006750
text: Agailla Flurry's is not found is successor, I heard and was borne away instead. To refer it's in order to ensure that a {nl} something important .. I don't know exactly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006751
text: I was sealed when my spirit was ripped away by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat the Red Infrorocktors for me. I promise you that I will not be a burden to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006752
text: The Monitors' Eyes are on the Red Infrorocktors.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006753
text: Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006754
text: Let's meet at the 1st Machinery Room. {nl}Ah, it would be great if you could get the Hardened Black Crystal from monsters on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006755
text: We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006756
text: Please go to the Sviesa Altar. I will follow you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006757
text: It's either Rexipher destroying the altar, or us activating the altar. {nl}We mustn't trail behind, hurry to the Sviesa Altar!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006758
text: Looks like this necklace and collection belongs to you now.{nl}If it wasn't for you, Maven's teachings would have been left as a curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006759
text: Let's give up on this and move to the Large Transport Magic Circle at the center of this floor {nl}instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006760
text: This isn't the first time that the demons have attacked the tower, but the attacks never lasted this {nl}long. Because of this, they say that Gabija has disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006761
text: That was a trap.{nl}It seems they read our every move.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006762
text: There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it would be little late, let's give up on the magic corc;e and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006763
text: The Defensive Barrier Device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs as soon as we activate the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006764
text: The Defensive Barrier Device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It still seems okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006765
text: That'll do!{nl}Let's hope there won't be as many monsters now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006766
text: Let's move to the next floor as soon as we can.{nl}Goddess Gabija is waiting for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006767
text: The acid will be complete once I have some Poisonous Mushrooms from Truffles, which can be {nl}found at Isdidu Fork. I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006768
text: We are the Believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent the Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006769
text: We have no choice. We need to get more charcoal.{nl}Those Long-Branched Trees at Kriakul Brook will do the trick.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006770
text: This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006771
text: Did I tell you back in Fedimian that there's a way to defeat the demons?{nl}We can help Goddess Gabija by completing the Jewel of Prominence here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006772
text: Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006773
text: For now, let's fill the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor.{nl}There is a Flame Vapor which possesses magic in it at the reading room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006774
text: You should search for it hard.{nl}The Flame Vapor is not clearly visible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006775
text: We can work with this. Good job!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006776
text: Next, we will need to fill the Jewel with the Essence of Fire, which is slightly complicated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006777
text: Start by expelling some Flame Vapors from the Jewel of Prominence.{nl}The Flame Vapor will collect the Essences of Fire that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill the Jewel with it. Got it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006778
text: Don't worry. It won't hurt you or explode.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006779
text: Phew...{nl}We've almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006780
text: I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006781
text: If we can complete the Jewel of Prominence, we can use it to help Gabija recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006782
text: Alright!{nl}We will combine the Flame Sources into the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006783
text: Let's head to the Fusion Machine.{nl}Once we put every material in and work the machine, the Jewel should be complete.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006784
text: This is the Jewel of Prominence... I can feel its great energy.{nl}Let's hurry and give it to Gabija. There's a stairway up on the right side.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006785
text: This detection rod should able to find the Jewel of Prominence.{nl}The Jewel will appear when you use this detector rod near the Jewel's location.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006786
text: The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of Demons' lord, Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006787
text: I am Saule, the Goddess of the sun.{nl}Everything is just like how Lamia has foreseen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006788
text: It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006789
text: Welcome. {nl}Only hard-to-find stuff here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006790
text: I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006791
text: This place is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl}We are studying solid historical truths on top of their graves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006792
text: Thank you for your hard work.{nl}Let me carry the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006793
text: We came here to get away from the Vubbes' incursion.{nl}Though it seems this place is not safe as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006794
text: The demons have continued to chase after my revelations long before I made this revelation. {nl}Gesti, the Demon Queen whom you have met is one of them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006795
text: Alright, I will tell the troops to assemble

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006796
text: Notice/!/Jonna Jolem appeared with the treasure box from the marked place.{nl}Defeat Jonna Jolem and find a clue to open the box!#7

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006797
text: Notice/!Unknocker suddenly appeared!{nl}Unknocker might have the research data! Defeat Unknocker!#7

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006798
text: Gorath's Concern (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006799
text: Deliver the activated stone/MAKING/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006800
text: Check Monument/READ/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006801
text: Notice/!/Grita is looking at the magical circle.{nl}Defeat the monster that were interfering.!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006802
text: Notice/!/This device is suppressing the spell of the tower.{nl}Better destroy it quickly.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006803
text: Working on the copy/MAKING/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None/F_lineup001/1/MID

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006804
text: Checking/MAKING/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None/F_lineup001/1/MID

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006805
text: To Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006806
text: To Pioneering area of Gytise

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006807
text: Talk to Knight Titas again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006808
text: You dreamed about the goddess telling you to go to Klaipeda, but Knight Titas is asking you whether you could tell the order of gathering to them. Talk to Sir Titas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006809
text: Extinguished the research diary on the fire place

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006810
text: You burned all diaries to calm his soul. Talk to the spirit of the adventurer, Varkis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006811
text: Meet the Blacksmith of Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006812
text: Meet the Blacksmith of Klaipeda as Pipoti has told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006813
text: Before you release the important seal at Ramstis Ridge, you should first talk to the Disciple of Gustas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006814
text: As the goddess told you in the dream of the bishop, you should first go to Crystal Mine, but you can't just see and ignore the villagers who are evacuating. Let's help the angry hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006815
text: Talk to Vaidotas in Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006816
text: Grita said in order to activate the Tower's Barrier Device again, it would need a great amount of energy. Set the gem Grita gave you on the ground and recharge the gem with the monsters' life force.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006817
text: You recharged the gem with the monsters' life force. Talk to Grita about how to activate the Barrier Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006818
text: Activate the Barrier Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006819
text: The Barrier Device is located at the end of this left hallway. Activate the Barrier Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006820
text: You successfully activated the Barrier Device. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006821
text: Follower Donatas told you to gain some confidence by defeating Pawndel and Pawnd, so that you can transform into a demon using the demon transform scroll. After transforming yourself into a demon, talk to Pawndel and Pawnd, lure them to Apsauga Altar and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006822
text: Ask Historian Cyrenia Odell about Rexipher's whereabouts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006823
text: Activate the Sviesa Altar before Rexipher does

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006824
text: Go to the Sviesa Altar to activate it, preventing Rexipher's plan before he does it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006825
text: Fortunately, it seems that you protected the altar. Return to Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006826
text: The Tzedej Altar has been destroyed, but you successfully activated the Sviesa Altar. Talk to Historian Cyrenia Odell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006827
text: Obtain Mallardu Fat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006828
text: Rexipher kidnapped the historian, Cyrenia Odell. Go follow Rexipher to the Zachariel Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006829
text: After you defeated the guardian of the Royal Mausoleum at Sesija Entrance as Rexipher ordered, Rexipher disappeared through the parvise. To find Cyrenia Odell, you should go through the parvise after Rexipher. He must be not far away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006830
text: Restore the monument of Ruklys

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006831
text: The Highlander Master is telling you that since you broke the practice wooden seal, you should pay for it by repairing it. First, obtain the woods from Firents at Nefritas Cliff, the rope from the Panto Archers that are the materials for the repair.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006832
text: Obtain %s from Panto Archer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006833
text: Defeat Red Infrorocktors

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006834
text: The Sealed Stone told you to defeat the monitors for it and that it won't bother you afterwards. Defeat Red Infrorocktors for the Sealed Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006835
text: You defeated the Red Infrorocktors as the Stone wanted. Return to the Stone and talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006836
text: Obtained the Sealed Stone's Voices by defeating Armas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006837
text: The Sealed Stone told you that its other spirit lost its voice and wants you to retrieve the voice. Collect the Sealed Stone's Voices from Armas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006838
text: Defeat Gray Golem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006839
text: As a suspicious desk has told you, the Gray Golem is chasing after you. It will be better to defeat the Gray Golem first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006840
text: Furry Odd told you to meet at the 1st Machinery Room and asked you to bring Hardened Black Crystals. Obtain the Hardened Black Crystals from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006841
text: Meet Furry Odd in front of the 1st Machinery Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006842
text: You have obtained the Black Crystals. Meet Furry Odd at the 1st Machinery Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006843
text: The Stone Whale that was protecting Hauberk woke up. Defeat the Stone Whale that is holding the soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006844
text: Watcher Basil told you that the Panto Wizards at Valio Mountain Cabin Hill are looking for the rope that is needed to restore the shaman doll. He told you that if words are not enough, use force.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006845
text: Obtain %s by defeating Panto Wizards

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006846
text: Talk to Goddess Saule

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006847
text: It was Goddess Saule who was restrained by the demons. Talk to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006848
text: As written on the revelation, go through Naslaite Cliff Path and arrive at Veja Ravine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006849
text: Reduce the monster's HP below 50% and lure it near the Tree Root Crystal, so that it will start to react.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006850
text: The assistant commander Volda asked you to defeat the dumble ball which Siaulambs consume. Find the dumble ball at the old wooden box in the 4th supplies' warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006851
text: Find the person who knows about the epitaph of Agailla Flurry and listen to his request.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006852
text: You found the Villager's Bag. Return the Villager's Bag and ask him about the contents in the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006853
text: Defeat the Blue Woodspirit that appeared near the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006854
text: Goddess Saule lost the revelation from Bramble at the Thorn Forest within Kvailas Forest. Help the believers at Gate Route and Sirdgela Forest and look for the revelation at Kvailas Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006855
text: Go down from Twin Bridge at Miners' Village to get to Srautas Gorge, and then take the cable car from Srautas Gorge and go up a bit to get to Gele Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006856
text: Move to Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006857
text: Move to Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006858
text: Move to Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006859
text: You should go past Starving Demon's Way in order to get to the Great Cathedral by following the revelation. Help the people having troubles at Starving Demon's Way after going past Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006860
text: After going past Fedimian, in order to go to the Great Cathedral, you need to past Starving Demon's Way. Help the people having troubles at Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006861
text: To Demon Prison District 1

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006862
text: Move to Demon Prison District 1

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006863
text: Move to Demon Prison District 1

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150428_006864
text: You must pass Gytis Settlement Area in order to reach the Demon Prison. As you pass through {nl}the area from Klaipeda, assist the people there with their troubles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006865
text: Anyway, my guess is that the demon has reawoken and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The bishop's dream and the legend of Cunningham... I feel they may be a sign that something {nl}huge is about to happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006866
text: Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006867
text: The Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudeges Felled Area. {nl}We got the kill order but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006868
text: If you ever face us Rodeleros as enemies, you should be careful not to lose your legs.{nl}Our swords will still able to lash out from under our shields.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006869
text: I heard the monsters are moving in herds outside Klaipeda.{nl}Instead of defeating them all at once, it will be better to learn my skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006870
text: Just a thought, these words speak of a very dangerous monster.{nl}Do you think we should eliminate it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006871
text: Ah, if you lack self confidence, the possibility of getting caught is high.{nl}Before you use this scroll, it is important to gain some confidence by fighting against demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006872
text: I'm thrilled to see that it went with a bang.{nl}But I think further research is needed still.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006873
text: You should get ready before you take the Light Crystal to the entrance.{nl}It could attract a powerful monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006874
text: I feel relieved to have you here.{nl}It is propitious that Laima chose you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006875
text: That explosion was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy these valves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006876
text: There are too many things to cover here, {nl}so we have to defeat the demons quietly without causing alarm.{nl}It's reassuring to have you here, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006877
text: There are rumors about Golems appearing so don't go far too deep. {nl} It will be safer to take the bigger roads where there are less monsters or just head straight to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006878
text: Firing a bow leaves you exposed to enemy attacks.{nl}Our strategy is to use anything be it a shield or stones to protect ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006879
text: I have already memorized most of them, but the ones left are really important.{nl}They contain information on how to enter the Royal Mausoleum and such.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006880
text: This map marks every sealed devices' location within Tiltas Valley.{nl}When you release all the seals with the Great King's key, it'll become clear what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006881
text: The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there, so I don't understand why he keeps trying.{nl}I personally think the Tama swallowed them. {nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006882
text: Can't you see what they're worth? I mean the sap, from those Stumpy Trees.{nl}How about it, why don't you try getting some?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006883
text: Well done. This armor should prove to be useful when worn at the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006884
text: Varkis' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006885
text: That is my adventure journal... lots of my diaries are hidden at Rukas Plateau besides that...{nl}I want you to retrieve those...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006886
text: That object is not useful to me anymore now...{nl}If you could find those diaries, I will make you the completed version.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006887
text: Here it is...{nl}The completed version... I will leave now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006888
text: The one who fell while researching...{nl}Return to the goddess by becoming a part of the canyon.{nl}The saddened mind breaks the gold stones of the canyon and the poured alcohol soaks into the ground on behalf of the tears..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006889
text: Notice/Unfortunately, Varkis passed away. {nl}But, if you go to Camp of Varkis, you will meet his spirit#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006890
text: The Eternal Adventure (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006891
text: Notice/It's written that the next material is hidden on the way to Neck Cliff of Snake!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006892
text: The Eternal Adventure (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006893
text: The Eternal Adventure (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006894
text: Notice/Varkis' Spirit has disappeared after leaving the completed research material!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006895
text: The Eternal Adventure (4) - Deleted

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006896
text: Tell her that it would be better to take some rest here

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006897
text: It would be better to stop the attacks destroying the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006898
text: Notice/The portal has opened after activating the device!{nl}Check the location of the portal from the map!#7

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006899
text: The search team told you that Vubbe Warriors are at Nudeges Felled Area, but it would be better to wait for the reinforcement. Since you should go to the Crystal Mine as quickly as possible, let's first defeat those Vubbe Warriors.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006900
text: Retrieve the Research Materials from Varkis' lost bag

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006901
text: Adventurer Varkis told you that monsters stole the bag and ran away. Retrieve his diary by finding the bag at way below the Serno Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006902
text: Go to the camp of adventurer, Varkis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006903
text: The gigantic monster was defeated, but Varkis passed away. Returnto his camp with the diary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006904
text: Go to Camp of Varkis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006905
text: Varkis passed away. Return to the camp where Varkis used to reside and meet his spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006906
text: Collect Varkis' Research Materials at Dykyne Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006907
text: It seems that Varkis still has some regrets concerning the research that he used to do when he was alive. Collect his materials at Dykyne Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006908
text: Collect Varkis' Research Materials at Neck Cliff of Snake

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006909
text: It seems that Varkis still has some regrets concerning the research that he used to do when he was alive. Collect his materials at Neck Cliff of Snake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006910
text: Look for Varkis' Research Materials near Apatinis Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006911
text: Monsters are attacking. You better defeat them quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006912
text: It seems that Varkis doesn't have regrets concerning his research anymore. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006913
text: It seems that the newcomer seems to be in a trouble. You better help him out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006914
text: The unstable owl told you that it would be better to face Sequoia with divine power. Let's collect the wooden pieces with the divine power of the Broken Owl Sculpture in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006915
text: At the end of Stone Pillar Hill, the portal that leads to the secret location of the Royal Mausoleum was opened after releasing all the seals! Use the portal to go to the secret place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150511_006916
text: Treasure Hunter Eden is saying confidently that he is sure that the Tama swallowed all the artifacts. Defeat Tamas and look for the artifacts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006917
text: I believe that you are competent.{nl}May the goddess guide us all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006918
text: The gold pieces that the monsters carry around in this area will do.{nl}Bring them to the herb merchant at Kapas Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006919
text: My head hurts.{nl}What am I doing here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006920
text: I wish the goddesses were here.{nl}I don't want to see anything sad anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006921
text: Is this slate the evidence of salvation?{nl}It just looks like an old slate to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006922
text: Please use your time wisely. As no one sees your future better than yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006923
text: Of course, please prove your skills to me.{nl}Defeat Desert Chupabras and Zinutes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006924
text: If you are going to help me, please also take care of the Large Gray Chupacabras.{nl}They have been the ones stealing our supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006925
text: When you defeat Chupacabras, a Large Gray Chupacabra will appear.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006926
text: I can charge more to get everything else back in order, but that toolbox... {nl}That Moa took the heart and soul of a stonemason...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006927
text: I thank you in the name of the goddess!{nl}We should start by eliminating the filthy Cockatrices that are spreading disease around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006928
text: You better eliminate the severed souls as fast as possible.{nl}Wouldn't it be scary if they resurrected again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006929
text: The attacks from the demons are quite aggressive.{nl}I think they would be discouraged if we could somehow defeat the Glizardons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006930
text: I would like to ask you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they are quite a nuisance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006931
text: Activate the Malda Altar and it will mark the demons around its vicinity. {nl}When you defeat those demons, the altar should absorb their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006932
text: Let's keep an eye on the Jewel of Prominence while we defeat monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006933
text: I cannot say my name. {nl}Please defeat the observers and release the seal on me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006934
text: My soul is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006935
text: The Holy Ark that I am a part of is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Ark.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006936
text: We Watchers love to fight.{nl}The Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}Surely it's because the demons are starting to march in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006937
text: If possible, I want you to defeat the Wild Carnivore as well.{nl}It has become corrupted with demonic energy and I let it be any longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006938
text: Tools for stonemasons? {nl}That'll be 10,000 silver.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006939
text: Welcome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006940
text: It was made a long time ago, but it can cut through any type of stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006941
text: You'll need to find the keys capable of releasing the last seal.{nl}This scroll will open up spatial chasms. Be careful because it's unpredictable what can come out {nl}of the chasms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006942
text: Hmm. You're really as good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006943
text: Our preparations will be complete once the monster poison is dabbed onto the Spiritual Stones.{nl}Put the bait at the upper hill of Alkune Stairway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006944
text: Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monsters at Odega Uphill.{nl}They're disturbing my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006945
text: A monster in disguise as a Goddess Statue. I pity the souls who were deceived. {nl}Now those souls may rest in peace. This is all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006946
text: We didn't just stay put when we were held down by the monsters. {nl}We sent out Scouts to look for ways out of here but no one came back. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006947
text: If you are okay with it, I want you to search for them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006948
text: It's going to be hard.{nl}The Thorn Forest keeps growing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006949
text: A dark energy similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorn Forest. {nl}Especially Kvailas Forest... Please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006950
text: Good. {nl}First, defeat the Big Blue Griba up in the hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006951
text: When you throw this bomb at the Long-Branched Trees, they will light up.{nl}When you feel that they have burnt enough, destroy them to obtain charcoals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006952
text: Be careful. This place is full of evil energy from Bramble.{nl}You better go back to be safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006953
text: Ah, it's you, Revelator! Could you help me?{nl}I am trying to burn down the thorny vines that are overflowing with evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006954
text: There is a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}This monster is called Rikaus and it's at Thorny Pillar Garden. It has been spreading evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006955
text: I heard a very ominous voice. It was a voice searching for you.{nl}Please be careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006956
text: I never thought I would meet someone other than a Believer in a place crawling with thorny {nl}vines and monsters. It's difficult without the protection of the goddess. {nl}Don't you think so, Revelator?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006957
text: Just as I thought. We Believers are also having a hard time due to the thorny vines.{nl}Can you please help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006958
text: The evil energy was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006959
text: The evil energy of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our Believers are becoming weak. {nl}I am worried that we may lose to the forces of evil. If only the Revelator was with us...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006960
text: Really?{nl}I will let the other Believers know that you are helping them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006961
text: Help me, please. Infro Holders are chasing after me.{nl}I don't stand a chance the way they're ganging up on me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006962
text: Put the Matsum's Flower Stamens in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand Bramble's evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006963
text: This place is too dangerous. {nl}Please go to a safe area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006964
text: Clymen... I can feel its presence at the Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Please defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006965
text: Bramble...{nl}It is a pity that it went against its foreseen fate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006966
text: When I regained consciousness, a few hundred years had passed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006967
text: Jane's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006968
text: I couldn't save the things I care for.{nl}My master, the Mage Tower, and my peace...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006969
text: I have nothing for you to help me with, but it's been such a long time that I saw a living person.{nl}If it's okay, can you listen to my story?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006970
text: Thank you. It's a long story.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006971
text: It's too selfish to seek salvation now.{nl}I'm exhausted. It may actually be better to be eliminated with Archon altogether.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006972
text: Salvation... I may still have a sliver of hope for it.{nl}I will count on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006973
text: You must find a way to stop the magic flowing into the Magic Stone of {nl}Sympathy. If we could find the documents that Valius left at Veikini Prayer Room, {nl}it may not be a meaningless dream...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006974
text: Salvation. I have forgotten that word. I had longing hope for it.{nl}Despair was all I could do for such a long time...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006975
text: Okay. Was the document present?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006976
text: The Magic Generating Stones.{nl}They are at the Room of Consciousness and the Room of Ancestral Rituals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006977
text: I know the basic composition. I've researched it when I was alive.{nl}But it won't react without Valius' magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006978
text: You can find Valius' keepsakes in Vebaiki Burial Chamber.{nl}There should still be magical power within it since Valius was a great wizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006979
text: I am sure there is magical power left.{nl}I have nothing else but to hope it still exists.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006980
text: I'm relieved that there is still magical power remaining.{nl}First, let's stop the magic generating stone near the Room of Consciousness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006981
text: I hid the magic generating stones amongst fakes in the Room of Consciousness.{nl}But, with the brooch you found, you should be able to distinguish the real ones from the fakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006982
text: Keep this in mind. Pick out the real magic generating stones and stop the magical power.{nl}If you touch on the fakes, all magic generating stones will be activated again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006983
text: It has been hundreds of years since I felt earnesty.{nl}I pray to the goddesses that this isn't just a delusionary dream.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006984
text: The magical power that came from the Room of Consciousness has completely disappeared.{nl}Now, we just have to block the Room of Ancestral Rituals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006985
text: The Room of Ancestral Rituals is somewhat different from the Room of Consciousness.{nl}Nonetheless, you must shut down the magical power of all magic generating stones {nl}in both rooms{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006986
text: You will know how to handle it when you control it yourself.{nl}But if you feel something went wrong, use Valius' magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006987
text: With the warp magic circle under me, you could quickly go to the Room of Ancestral Rituals.{nl}I wish for your success...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006988
text: The magic generating stones in the Room of Ancestral Rituals affect the other magic generating {nl}stones nearby. We could start over with Valius' magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006989
text: The magical power supplied to the Magic Stone of Mutuality has been completely {nl}shut off... Is it alright to wish for the salvation now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006990
text: We are all ready. But that Archon is different from the Archon from your era. {nl}It may be better to leave it as is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006991
text: There's is another way. The sealed keepsakes amongst Valius' collection of keepsakes...{nl}I heard some of them were created in Uzdaromo Stone Chamber to suppress the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006992
text: I had already given up the hope that I would become free a few hundreds years ago.{nl}Even now, I have little hope for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006993
text: The seal that is suppressing the demonic energy... that's it.{nl}Now everything is ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006994
text: Now when the Magic Stone of Mutuality stops, I will be free from Archon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006995
text: I will tell you one more time. Don't consider this Archon as similar to the one in your era.{nl}It will be hard fight without using the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006996
text: Honestly, I'll be fine even if I disappear like this.{nl}I'm very grateful that you cared for me, but I don't want you to get hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006997
text: I can see the glimpse of freedom from the shackles that was on me for hundreds of years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006998
text: I can be saved. I... finally...{nl}I can't thank you enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_006999
text: I will now leave to the goddesses.{nl}Thank you. Thank you so much...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007000
text: How did it go?{nl}We can alleviate the strange energy in this region if we strengthen the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007001
text: If I only had little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007002
text: The objects are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents at Dykyne Fork...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007003
text: I don't have regrets anymore... but, be careful about that man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007004
text: Let's see, while I am cleaning this...{nl}Sorry, but can you take care of the tablet at Gruitis Hall with the brush and rubbing tools I brought?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007005
text: Will be wandering when the string of the destiny disconnects...{nl}It must mean Goddess Laima... But there's a rumor that she appeared... It's complicated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007006
text: When someone is born with a silver spoon in his mouth, life will be good for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007007
text: {nl}What, what the hell...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007008
text: It's too soon to give up now.{nl}When I went to Vseio Cliffs, I saw one more tablet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007009
text: However, it seems that normal ink won't catch well on it due to the mosses.{nl}Craute Grass juice should solve that problem. But I forgot to bring some as I came back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007010
text: Don't assume all forecasts by oracles are predictions of the future.{nl}Sometimes, they could help us determine what's right and wrong in our lives.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007011
text: Is it complex? Yes, but you will soon know.{nl}You will soon find clues about the very fabric that weaves together this interwined world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007012
text: When you get enough Craute Grass Juice, use it to rub off the mosses on the tablet at Vseio Cliffs.{nl}It is famous for having a smell that lures monsters...but my assistant here is strong, right?.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007013
text: When you rub the grass juice on it, you should see the effects right away,{nl}but you should still let it sit for a while. The mosses will go away eventually.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007014
text: It wasn't effective? I guess the moss isn't normal moss.{nl}Hmm. Then I guess I should go ask Vaidotas. There must be some way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007015
text: Alright then I'll be going now. {nl}Oh, can I ask you to get bone powder from the monsters here?{nl}I need something that helps ink adhere well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007016
text: Fortunately, Vaidotas gave me something nice.{nl}He said to use this special ink with the bone-powder adhesive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007017
text: Okay. I want you to get the last rubbing with this.{nl}My legs ache since I traveled so far...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007018
text: I have a good feeling about this one.{nl}Do you think we may be able to find a decent forecast this time?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007019
text: The world for the dead of the dead should also exist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007020
text: {nl}Dead of the dead? This... This may be just the forecast I was looking for.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007021
text: I should do more research on this forecast. {nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007022
text: While I am interpreting this, I will give you the rope with a magnet so please go to the well with that.{nl}I saw a Metal Plate on the floor. If that's the plate, it will come up after being attached.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007023
text: There's no strange reason.{nl}The people used to live here even before the empire was built here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007024
text: A small village becomes a big village and then a city...{nl}And then it will be forgotten.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007025
text: I told you a while ago, but if possible, I would have pulled it out.{nl}Please beware of the surroundings near you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007026
text: Difficult, difficult...{nl}The words are hard to understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007027
text: I guess it was the Metal Plate.{nl}It was lucky that the well was dried... If not, it could have been horrible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007028
text: I will organize them and show you later.{nl}You are the Revelator. They will help your journey to find the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007029
text: It seems that the Metal Plates that you've brought can't be worked due to the rusts.{nl}Why did they record on the Metal Plate...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007030
text: In fact, I didn't know what this Metal Plate was.{nl}Since this place is the hometown of Demetrius, I came here expecting something may be present.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007031
text: Nothing was engraved on it, rather it was full of rusts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007032
text: At then, my eyes were ignited with flame.{nl}Demetrius has something to tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007033
text: Yes. Now is not the time to just complain. First, I should make the rust remover.{nl}I want you to obtain the inner core of Hallowventor Magician.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007034
text: Defeat the rusts with the rust remover and maintain it with the anticorrosive agent. {nl}If it weren't you, I wouldn't have done it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007035
text: Fast indeed.{nl}Okay. I will make the acidic solution with this. It will become the basis of the rust remover.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007036
text: Secondly, when we sprinkle the rust powders, some monsters react.{nl}Collect some bubbling liquid from that monster. A lot of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007037
text: Ah. If you sprinkle it too much, it may endure all the monsters nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007038
text: I went to meet Alchemist in Mine Village because of Rust Remover and Acidic Solution.{nl}He was being so arrogant...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007039
text: Well done. {nl}This place is almost completed so go help Alruida near Apsva Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007040
text: Ah, I forgot to tell you. {nl}She is my ally. She is probably looking for the Metal Plate at the great hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007041
text: Alruida

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007042
text: You came here since Justas told you to help?{nl}I was tired as hell so I really welcome you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007043
text: First, we should look for the Metal Plate at the great hall.{nl}Shall we start?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007044
text: Someone should research at the camp and the other person should look for the Metal Plate.{nl}That's why I am here. I am not a coward like Justas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007045
text: Now, I know all the locations of the Metal Plates, but I can't do anything about the monsters.{nl}It is so fortunate that you would help me. really.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007046
text: This reaction reagent only reacts to the Metal Plates from the specific era.{nl}The Metal Plate that shows boiling response is the one that we are looking for. You understand right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007047
text: We gotta distinguish the real ones by finding out when the Metal Plate was created.{nl}We should look for the Metal Plate that was built before the establishment of the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007048
text: The next one is at Apsva Hall.{nl}The Metal Plate is under the bushes in the corner, but I can't do anything about it myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007049
text: Originally, it was forgotten and was deep in the ground.{nl}But, Medzio Diena was in fact beneficial.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007050
text: As the land caved over, they were carried away to the various places in Istora Ruins...{nl}That's our prediction.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007051
text: Be careful all the time. The monsters here rush in scarelessly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007052
text: It is a disaster to someone and it is a blessing for the other.{nl}I can remember the words from the old literature.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007053
text: Oh! That's it. Give it to me. Let's see... I should first make it corrode.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007054
text: The Metal Plate that you found for me a while ago... I think the next part is remaining.{nl}The Metal Plate that I know is that one so I don't know what to do from now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007055
text: Ah, there is one place that I haven't searched yet. Folsas Highway.{nl}Could you go there for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007056
text: Bring this detector.{nl}From the place where you can feel the reaction, the Metal Plate must be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007057
text: That's it! Now we found all the records.{nl}You've done it well. Now, I should sprinkle this rust remover so give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007058
text: As I expected, this Metal Plate was the last one.{nl}Now we've collected all Metal Plates... I think I know what's written on them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007059
text: Can you give this to Justas?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007060
text: So Alruida did it and the Metal Plate that we didn't know...{nl}Okay. We solved all the puzzles. Please wait a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007061
text: Justas must be waiting.{nl}Please give it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007062
text: I never thought that the Metal Plate would explode. I am sorry.{nl}I will gather the contents all at once later and show you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007063
text: These are the contents that I never thought about.{nl}The goddesses and the humans once used to live together. And the demons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007064
text: If Demetrius is sane, this record... okay.{nl}I promised you that I will show you the record so read the copy yourself.{nl}Well done indeed!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007065
text: They were gentle monsters but suddenly became vicious. {nl}Have you also heard anything like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007066
text: Revelator, we are in trouble. Please help us!{nl}As you can see, the workers are dying due to the monsters' poison.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007067
text: It's so fortunate that you were here.{nl}I wonder why we haven't heard anything from the soldiers that went to defeat the Gorgon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007068
text: Mirtis is dead, but the Vubbes are still following its order.{nl}And there's also a rumor that stronger Vubbes were spotted at the 2nd lot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007069
text: The village will be in mess if those Vubbes come out from the mine.{nl}Could you check the 2nd lot in Crystal Mine if you are okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007070
text: You can go down to 2nd lot from the isolated district in the 3rd floor in Crystal Mine.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007071
text: They are more dangerous Vubbes.{nl}We can't guarantee the safety of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007072
text: The Vubbes climbed up to the 1st lot? {nl}It's worse than I expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007073
text: This is the scent I mixed exclusively for Vubbes. {nl}This will cause lethargy and fear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007074
text: It is a problem that it is still in the test stage, but you can't do anything about it at the moment.{nl}I will put it into the incense burner so please place it at 2nd lot in Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007075
text: I am researching with respect to various aspects so that it would never occur again.{nl}I can't think of a better way besides the scent at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007076
text: Well done indeed.{nl}This is for testing so I don't know how long it would last, but I guess it would be safe for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007077
text: I am dizzy since the Pantos are keep trying to get out from Gele Plateau.{nl}If they go into the region where people live, that will be a big problem.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007078
text: So I am thinking about sprinkling the scent of Moas onto the way to Gele Plateau.{nl}Moas are the biggest enemies of Pantos. I will think about a way to prevent it from going out somehow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007079
text: Are you going to help me? Then It will be grateful.{nl}Moas are spotted near Piene Fields. I want you to get their lumps.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007080
text: Just get the lumps of Moas.{nl}I will do the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007081
text: Well done.{nl}I will do the rest. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007082
text: I am blocking Pantos from getting out of Gele Plateau with Watcher Erra.{nl}I will put something on the way which Pantos will be scared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007083
text: They are the things that can't be done by me...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007084
text: Really? First, I need Fishermen's eyes and the essences of Ellums. {nl}I heard they live at the Entrance of Kateen Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007085
text: I never went up to the Entrance of Kateen Forest so I am scared.{nl}I heard that is the road where spirits lost their ways.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007086
text: Gee. Disgusting.{nl}I will make the strings which Pantos will be scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007087
text: Okay. I made the strings.{nl}Now, could you put them on the Srautas Gorge and Nefritas Cliff?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007088
text: To tell you exactly.{nl}Hm... I will just mark it on the map.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007089
text: Thanks for helping me.{nl}This must be effective so you can feel you did something worthwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007090
text: Do you know about Tilenis Prince who went missing while he was fleeing to Klaipeda?{nl}The mayor went out to welcome him, but they all went missing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007091
text: But recently, the brooch of the mayor was discovered.{nl}But, we can't investigate it publicly... Can you investigate for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007092
text: The place where the brooch was discovered is called Sidabras Rest Place in Veja Ravine.{nl}And please accept this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007093
text: These are the eyes of the spirits that were created by the Bokor Master at my request.{nl}They make things that cannot be seen visible. This will be of use for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007094
text: Klaipeda Mayor's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007095
text: I am... Okay.{nl}He was fighting again. Prince...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007096
text: Most of them died while returning with the colleagues of the prince.{nl}But, they weren't guided even after their deaths. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007097
text: When they realized that, they continuously fought with them.{nl}The people who are serving the tree... they kidnapped the prince.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007098
text: I can't stop this fight.{nl}Please save the prince...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007099
text: The mayor... he already passed away.{nl}But, the prince may be still alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007100
text: The people who are serving the trees. I guess I should investigate little more.{nl}Thanks for helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007101
text: I am okay even if I don't get guided.{nl}Please guide the prince...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007102
text: The villagers of Andale Village who were slaughtered by the demons...{nl}I am sure they were scared. They must have had regrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007103
text: We want to mourn for the ones who died.{nl}Don't you want to be with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007104
text: The resentment of the villagers in Andale Village is floating around as a negative energy.{nl}Fill the beads I will give to you with the essences of Tini, absorb their resentment and bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007105
text: They had so much pains and felt unfair.{nl}This should never occur again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007106
text: With your help, the fight with Bramble has ended.{nl}But, his thorny vines are spreading with vicious energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007107
text: If we leave it like that, the whole forest will be covered with thorny vines.{nl}But, since my power is not complete yet... I want to ask help from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007108
text: You should eliminate the thorny vines that are on the way to Gate Route.{nl}If we don't block here, Siauliai Forest will also be covered with the thorny vines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007109
text: The vicious energy that spurts out from the thorny vines is very bad for humans.{nl}I hope you will be okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007110
text: This is just only the slightest part.{nl}If we don't defeat the thorn Forest completely, the thorny vines will keep spreading.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007111
text: The source of all thorny vines is Bramble... and Sirdgela Forest where he used to stay.{nl}To purify the forest, please locate my crystal that has my power in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007112
text: I am sorry that I put heavy burden on your shoulders. {nl}But, you will be able to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007113
text: Thanks for your efforts.{nl}I will be keep staying here until Thorn Forest recovers it's original status.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007114
text: Invisible substance... I mean spirits.{nl}I am researching about the relationship between the spirits and the magical power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007115
text: I just don't have time to get the essences that are needed for the experiment. {nl}I think you will be able to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007116
text: Bring this essence of chill.{nl}When you use this to the monsters in Poslinkis Forest, the spirits will be frozen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007117
text: When you defeat that monster, you will be able to obtain frozen spirit fragments.{nl}Put that into the magical power condenser. I've used them long time ago, but some of them should be still remaining.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007118
text: I've used it long time ago so it may show some strange results.{nl}That's why I needed your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007119
text: This innocent essence of chill... It is as I thought.{nl}Ah, you were almost on the blink of the death. That's why I called you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007120
text: As I was tiding up the objects of my older brother, strange beads came out.{nl}It was written on the memo that the beads are there to find the hidden objects of him easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007121
text: But the manual... It will be hard for me.{nl}So how about you have it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007122
text: I mean. They told me to defeat the monsters near this bead.{nl}Then the monsters' magical power will recharge the bead. It's too hard for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007123
text: I know it's sad, but we should live on. {nl}I can't just stay sad when I think about my brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007124
text: Is recharging enough?{nl}I feel sad again as I look at that bead again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007125
text: The bead will tell us where the hidden objects of my brother are located.{nl}I don't know what's gonna come out, but please use them well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007126
text: If I can't have it, I hope it gets used for a better objective.{nl}I am sure my brother also thinks like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007127
text: My disciple created the magic summon field, but something is wrong.{nl}Maybe... it is connected to the different world. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007128
text: If it goes wrong, the demons would come out to this world.{nl}Please. I will stop the summon ritual here so please break the magic circle at Aqueduct region.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007129
text: We can't do anything if the portal completely opens.{nl}What the hell is happening at Aqueduct region?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007130
text: Succeeded?{nl}I think there's something that connects to the other world at Aqueduct region.{nl}What the hell is that...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007131
text: Priest Ramelie

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007132
text: The sealed tower that was protected by the Revelator is being attacked again.{nl}But, it can't be protected by us and the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007133
text: The first seal of the sealed tower is already destroyed by the attacks from the demons.{nl}The second seal still remains, but I don't know how long we can hold up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007134
text: The goddess asked us to protect the seal. {nl}Now, only one we can trust is you, the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007135
text: Is the seal okay?{nl}I don't know how many times I've prayed to wish that you are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007136
text: Now is the time to restore the first seal.{nl}I know it's going to be hard, but I can't seek help for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007137
text: Are you really going to help? How grateful...{nl}First fill the crest of Goddess Austeja with the sacred energy near the altar.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007138
text: When you dedicate the completed crest of the goddess to the sealed tower, the seal will be filled again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007139
text: Even if you've done the dedication, you can't seal the vicious energy completely. {nl}This attack will not be the last. I hope the goddess return fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007140
text: We can't just rely everything on the goddess.{nl}But, I don't know if we could hold up anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007141
text: I am so grateful since you are helping us with the restoration of the seal.{nl}But, I don't know how long this seal would hold up... I hope Austeja comes back soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007142
text: I will comfort this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007143
text: Their pain, resentment, wrath and sadness...{nl}I hope they all forget in the arms of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007144
text: The Chapparition in Escanciu Village took away many lives.{nl}Defeat it in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007145
text: I'm sorry... but,{nl}Can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph at Nepatogus Field in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007146
text: key to check the map #7

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007147
text: Notice/!/The box appeared!{nl}Check the box inside while avoiding monsters' attacks!#7

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007148
text: Notice/You failed to get the treasure of the stonemason's family!{nl}Pipoti has disappeared, but you will meet him again in the future!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007149
text: Notice/Obtained the diary of Varkis{nl}Let's bring it back to Varkis!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007150
text: Notice/Rescue Varkis under attacks! Defeat Lithorex and save him!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007151
text: Notice/Unfortunately, Varkis passed away. {nl}But, if you go to Varkis' camp, leave his diary#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007152
text: Leave

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007153
text: Looking for the documents of Varkis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007154
text: Looking for the document which Varkis hid/#SITGROPESET2/3/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007155
text: Notice/It is written that the next document is hidden at Apatinis Cliff#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007156
text: Recording

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007157
text: Preparing the firewood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007158
text: Notice/!/Some parts of the Entrance Purifier are missing!{nl}It appears that the missing parts were taken by Vubbes labeled with a question mark!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007159
text: Notice/Repair complete!{nl}Entrance Purifier has been activated again!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007160
text: Notice/Repair complete!{nl}Entrance Purifier has been activated again!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007161
text: Notice/The Central Purifier is also broken.{nl}Use the Compass to find replacement parts #5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007162
text: Notice/The mine compass is pointing at District 4.{nl}Go to District 4 and find the spare parts #5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007163
text: Notice/Fixed the Central Purifier!{nl}It's working now!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007164
text: Notice/A crucial part is missing{nl}Use the Mine Compass to look for the part#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007165
text: Notice/The compass is pointing to District 6.{nl}Find the part at District 6#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007166
text: Notice/The compass is pointing to District 6.{nl}Go to District 6 and look for the part#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007167
text: Notice/!/The compass is pointed at the Specter Monarch!{nl}Defeat Specter Monarch and retrieve the parts!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007168
text: Notice/!/You've found the parts!{nl}Returnto the purifier at the hall and repair it!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007169
text: Repairing the Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007170
text: Notice/You've repaired the purifier at the hall!{nl}The purifier is activating!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007171
text: Notice/It seems that there is a problem with the purifier pipe{nl}Check the pipes at in District 3#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007172
