name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007417
text: You defeated Bramble and obtained the revelation. Return to Goddess Saule to interpret the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007418
text: Obtained the Mysterious Slate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007419
text: Acquired the Mysterious Slate that was inside the Crystal Pillar. When you bring it to Sir Uska in Klaipeda, you may find out the identity of the slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007420
text: Defeat the Infro Holders that rushed in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007421
text: Get Matsum's Flower Stamen to create a Thorn Flower Stimulant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007422
text: Believer Jurga told you that before you fight against Bramble, you should prepare a medicine that will help you endure its evil energy. Obtain Matsum's Flower Stamen at Rankena Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007423
text: Collect all of Matsum's Flower Stamen. Return to Believer Jurga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007424
text: Defeat Matsums

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007425
text: Talk to Jane's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007426
text: Jane's Spirit is not parting from the dangerous Archon. Ask her why.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007427
text: Listen to Jane's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007428
text: It seems that something complicated is going on with Jane. Listen from Jane's Spirit what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007429
text: The Void that Arose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007430
text: It seems that Jane's spirit is trying to take some extreme measures. Talk to her slowly to help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007431
text: Look for the records of Valius at Veikini Prayer Room

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007432
text: Jane's Spirit told you that if you look at the records which Valius left, you may obtain more information about the Magic Stone of Mutuality. Read the records which Valius left at Veikini Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007433
text: You've found a way to block the magical energy of the Magic Stone of Mutuality from the records of Valius. Return to Jane's spirit and let her know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007434
text: According to the information on the Magic Stone of Mutuality which Valius left, there's a way to save Jane. Talk to Jane about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007435
text: Search the keepsakes which possess Valius' magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007436
text: Jane's spirit told you that in order to stop magic generating stones that is supplying the magical power to the Magic Stone of Mutuality, Valius' magical power is needed. Look for the objects that are likely to possess Valius' magic at Vebaiki Burial Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007437
text: You found the brooch that you could feel the great magical power. Return to Jane's spirit to determine whether it is real.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007438
text: You've found the brooch that possesses Valius' magical power. Use this to talk with Jane's spirit how to stop the magic generating stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007439
text: Stop the magic generating stones in the Room of Consciousness

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007440
text: Use the brooch with Valius' magical power at the Room of Consciousness to find the real magic generating stones and stop them. If you stop fake stones, all magic generating stones will start to generate magical power again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007441
text: You've stopped all magic generating stones in the Room of Consciousness. Return to Jane's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007442
text: You stopped magic generating stones in the Room of Consciousness and now is the time to stop the stones in the Room of Ancestral Rituals. Listen to Jane's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007443
text: Stop the magic generating stones in the Room of Ancestral Rituals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007444
text: The magic generating stones in the Room of Consciousness influence the other magic generating stones nearby. If you accidentally touch on them, you could reset them using the brooch with Valius' magical power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007445
text: You've stopped all magic generating stones in the Room of Consciousness. Return to Jane's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007446
text: What's Bad About Being Careful

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007447
text: You've blocked the magical power that is going into the Magic Stone of Mutuality by stopping all magic generating stones. Talk to Jane's spirit again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007448
text: Search for the keepsakes of sealed Valius in Uzdromo Stone Chamber

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007449
text: Jane told you that when the Magic Stone of Mutuality completely stop, Archon will be released with you. To defeat the released Archon easily, look for usable objects that Valius created when he was alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007450
text: You've unleashed the seal and obtained the stamp that suppresses the demonic energy. Return to Jane's spirit with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007451
text: You are ready to fight against Archon. Talk to Jane's spirit if this will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007452
text: Stop the Magic Stone of Mutuality

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007453
text: When you stop the Magic Stone of Mutuality, Archon will be released along with Jane's spirit. Stop the Magic Stone of Mutuality and defeat Archon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007454
text: You've defeated Archon. Talk to Jane what's she going to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007455
text: Born with a Silver Spoon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007456
text: Ask Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007457
text: Ask Adrijus if he found any other tablets at the other regions

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007458
text: Obtain Stiff Hair using the paralysis needle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007459
text: You need a hard brush to defeat the soil of the tombstone. Use the paralysis needle to Wendigo Archer to obtain the stiff hair.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007460
text: Return to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007461
text: Acquired stiff hairs. It seems that Adrijus has returned from his travel so ask him to make the brush.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007462
text: Collect %s of Wendigo Archer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007463
text: You've brought the stiff hairs to Adrijus, ask him to make a rough brush for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007464
text: Make a rubbing of the tablet at Gruitis Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007465
text: Bring the rough brush and the rubbing tools Adrijus gave you and go to the tablet of Gruitis Hall to brush off the soil and make a rubbing of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007466
text: Hand over the rubbing to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007467
text: You've made a good rubbing. Give the rubbing to Adrijus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007468
text: Dead of the Dead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007469
text: It seems that Adrijus is back from scouting the other regions for tablets. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007470
text: Collect Craute Grass Juice

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007471
text: The tablet at Vseio Cliffs is very mossy, so you should eliminate the moss with Craute Grass Juice. Obtain the juice from Craute Grass that grow around Mirti Training Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007472
text: To read the inscription of the tablet at Vseio Cliffs, you need Craute Grass Juice. Collect the juice from Craute Grass that grow around Mirti Training Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007473
text: Try making the rubbing of the tablet at Vseio Cliffs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007474
text: As Adrijus told you, rub the grass juice on the tablet at Vseio cliffs and smear ink to make the rubbing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007475
text: Defeat the monsters that gathered around the tablet

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007476
text: As Adrijus had warned, monsters smelled the grass juice and are attacking from various directions! First, defeat the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007477
text: Make the rubbing of the tablet

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007478
text: It seems that you've defeated all the monsters. Now, make the rubbing of the tablet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007479
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in after smelling the grass juice

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007480
text: Report to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007481
text: You've rubbed in a lot of grass juice, but still can't make a good rubbing. Report this to Adrijus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007482
text: Obtain bone powder from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007483
text: Adrijus told you that he would ask the Alchemist Master for information. Before Adrijus comes back, obtain some bone powder from the monsters that will be the adhesive for the ink.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007484
text: Acquired a good amount of bone powder. Adrijus is back so ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007485
text: Ask him what he heard from Alchemist Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007486
text: Make the rubbing of the tablet in Vseio Cliffs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007487
text: Adrijus received a special ink from Vaidotas. Use the special ink and the gluing agent for the ink to make the rubbing of the tablet in Vseio Cliffs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007488
text: Hand over the rubbing to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007489
text: Fortunately, you've made a good rubbing this time. Give the rubbing to Adrijus and listen to what he tells you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007490
text: Location of the Metal Plate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007491
text: Talk to Justas more about the Metal Plate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007492
text: Look for the Metal Plate at Ramybe Hills

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007493
text: Justas told you that there are many Metal Plates that you couldn't bring due to the monsters. First, go to Ramybe Hills and find the Metal Plate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007494
text: Hand over the Metal Plate to Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007495
text: You found the Metal Plate at Ramybe Hills. Take this to Justas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007496
text: You've found the Metal Plate at Ramybe Hills without any problem. Talk to Justas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007497
text: Pull out the Metal Plate from the well

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007498
text: Justas asked you to bring the Metal Plate that is on the ground of the dried well. Use the rope with a magnet attached to pull out the Metal Plate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007499
text: Pull out the Metal Plate from the well

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007500
text: You've defeated all the monsters, now pull the rope from the well to obtain the Metal Plate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007501
text: You've pulled out the Metal Plate from the well. Hand it over to Justas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007502
text: Rust Remover

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007503
text: Justas is having a trouble due to the rusts on the Metal Plate. Ask Justas if there's anything you could help more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007504
text: Obtain the inner cores of Hallowventor Magician

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007505
text: Justas told you that you should defeat the rusts from the Metal Plate of Demetrius. To make the rust remover, obtain the inner cores of Hallowventor Magician at Etsukra Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007506
text: Acquired all the inner cores of Hallowventor Magician. Bring them to Justas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007507
text: Obtain %s by defeating Hallowventor Magician

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007508
text: Justas created the acidic solution using the inner cores of Hallowventor Magician. Talk to Justas what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007509
text: Obtain Bubbling Liquid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007510
text: Defeat Hallowventer Shaman by sprinkling the rust powders that Justas gave to you and collect the bubbling liquid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007511
text: Acquired enough bubbling liquid. Hand it over to Justas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007512
text: Talk to Alruida

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007513
text: Meet with Alruida, the assistant of Justas. He is on the way to Apsva Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007514
text: Use the reagent to find the real Metal Plates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007515
text: Alruida told you find the real ones among the Metal Plates that are scattered across the great hall. Use the reagent that Alruida gave to you to find the real Metal Plates.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007516
text: Hand over the Metal Plates to Alruida

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007517
text: You've found the real Metal Plates. Meet Alruida to hand them over.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007518
text: Talk to Alruida if there are other Metal Plates.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007519
text: Retrieve the Metal Plates that are under the vines

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007520
text: At the corner of Apsva Hall, the Metal Plates are under the vines. Pull the plates out from the vines.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007521
text: Hand them over to Alruida

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007522
text: You've pulled out the Metal Plates. Hand them over to Alruida.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007523
text: Get rid of the vines

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007524
text: Talk to Alruida about other Metal Plates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007525
text: Use the detection stick to find Metal Plates at Folsas Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007526
text: Alruida told you that there is one place that he hasn't explored. Use the detection stick that Alruida gave to you to explore Folsas Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007527
text: Search for the Metal Plates using the detection stick at Folsas Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007528
text: Alruida told you that there is one place that he hasn't explored. Use the detection stick that Alruida gave to you to explore Folsas Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007529
text: Alruida found the Metal Plate that he hasn't found before. Take the Metal Plate to Alruida.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007530
text: Alruida is happy since all the plates are gathered. Talk to Alruida again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007531
text: Meet Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007532
text: Alruida told you to hand over all Metal Plates that were discovered to Justas. Hand over all the plates to Justas and receive the research records of Demetrius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007533
text: Remaining Danger

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007534
text: Vaidotas in Miners' Village is looking for you. Talk to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007535
text: Survey Vubbe Activity in the Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007536
text: Vaidotas is worried that highly dangerous Vubbes may descend towards the village again. Go to District 2 in the Crystal Mine and observe Vubbe activities.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007537
text: Before reaching District 2, you were ambushed by Vubbes. Report to Vaidotas about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007538
text: Discuss with Vaidotas on what to do with the highly dangerous Vubbes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007539
text: Set Vaidotas' Special Incense Burner

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007540
text: Vaidotas told you that he created a scent that makes the Vubbes lethargic and feel fear. Set the Incense Burner containing this scent at District 2 in Crystal Mine 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007541
text: You've set the Incense Burner well. Report back to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007542
text: Watcher Erra seems to be worried about the Pantos. Talk to Watcher Erra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007543
text: Collect Moa Lumps

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007544
text: Watcher Erra is trying to prevent Pantos from straying out of Gele Plateau by using the scent of Moas, the predators of the Pantos. Collect Moa Lumps near Piene Fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007545
text: Hand them over to Watcher Erra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007546
text: Acquired enough Moa Lumps. Hand them over to Watcher Erra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007547
text: Obtain %s by defeating Moas, the predators of the Pantos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007548
text: Territorial Assignment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007549
text: Watcher Molly, who cares for the Pantos, is looking for you. Talk to Watcher Molly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007550
text: Collect Odd Fish Stringers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007551
text: Watcher Molly wants to make Stringers which could scare Pantos. Obtain Fisherman Eyes and Ellom Essence in Entrance of Kateen Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007552
text: The whole territory of Kateen Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007553
text: Hand them over to Watcher Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007554
text: Acquired all the materials that are needed to make Stringers. Hand them over to Watcher Molly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007555
text: Acquired all the materials that are needed to make Stringers. Ask Watcher Molly about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007556
text: Set the Stringers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007557
text: To prevent Pantos from straying to other regions, please set the Stringers at Srautas Gorge and Nefritas Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007558
text: Srautas Canyon/Nefritas Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007559
text: You've set all the Stringers. Report back to Watcher Molly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007560
text: Disappearances

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007561
text: Knight Commander Uska is looking for you. Talk to Knight Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007562
text: Search the spot where the disappearances took place

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007563
text: Knight Commander Uska requested you to investigate the disappearances of Prince Tilenis and the mayor. Search for the traces using the Spirit Eye at Sidabras Rest Place at Veja Ravine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007564
text: Protect the Spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007565
text: Unknown beings are attacking the spirit of the mayor. Protect the spirit of the mayor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007566
text: Talk to the spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007567
text: You've saved the spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor. Ask the spirit of the mayor what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007568
text: You are curious of what happened. Talk to the spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007569
text: The spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor told you that everyone died from the attacks from the beings who serve the trees and they kidnapped Prince Tilenis. Report this to Knight Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007570
text: The Bokor Master is looking for someone who can help in the memorial ceremony. Talk to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007571
text: Fill the Orb of Comfort with Tini Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007572
text: Bokor Master wants to comfort the villagers of Andale Village who died unfairly. First, defeat Tinis in Cobalt Forest then fill the Orb of Comfort with Tini Essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007573
text: Cobalt Forest, Septyni Glen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007574
text: The whole territory of Cobalt Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007575
text: Absorb the resentment into the Orb of Comfort

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007576
text: The resentment of the villagers of Andale Village is floating around as an impure aura. Gather the aura and fill it into the Orb of Comfort.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007577
text: The resentment of the villagers of Andale Village is floating around as an impure aura. Fill the Orb of Comfort with the aura.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007578
text: You've filled the resentment of the villagers in Andale Village into the Orb. Hand it over to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007579
text: Goddess Saule's Request

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007580
text: Goddess Saule needs your help. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007581
text: Remove the thorny vines obstructing the way to the Gate Route

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007582
text: Goddess Saule is worried that Bramble's thorny vines may spread to Septyni Glen. Remove the thorny vines obstructing the way to Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007583
text: You've cut down the threatening thorny vines. Report back to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007584
text: Remove the thorny vines

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007585
text: Goddess Saule wants purify the rest of Thorn Forest. Talk to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007586
text: Set the crystal of the authority at Sirdgela Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007587
text: Goddess Saule wants to purify the Thorn Forest with the crystal that contains her authority. Put the crystal of the authority at Sirdgela Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007588
text: You've set the crystal that possesses the authority of Goddess Saule. Return to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007589
text: The Cryomancer Master wants your help. Talk to the Cryomancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007590
text: Collect the Crystal of Pure Frost

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007591
text: Use the Frost Crystal on monsters of Poslinkis Forest, defeat those monsters to obtain their Frozen Soul Fragments. Finally, place them into the magical power condenser, and you will obtain a Pure Frost Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007592
text: Deliver to the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007593
text: Crystal of Pure Frost acquired. Go see the Cryomancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007594
text: Hidden Treasures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007595
text: Coben is bothered about something. Speak to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007596
text: Charging Zubeck's Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007597
text: Get Zubeck's secret stash for Coben. Place Zubeck's Orb near the monsters, and charge the crystal ball.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007598
text: Zubeck's Orb is being charged. Talk to Coben about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007599
text: Zubeck's Orb has been charged. Talk to Coben about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007600
text: Look for the stash that Zubeck hid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007601
text: Use Zubeck's Orb and locate his secret stash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007602
text: It seems an urgent matter has arisen with the Sorcerer Master. Talk to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007603
text: Destroy the demon summon field

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007604
text: The Sorcerer Master told you that he was going to summon the demons, but he connected them to the other world. Destroy the demon summon field in the Aqueduct Bridge Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007605
text: You've destroyed the demon summon field. Report it to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007606
text: Sealed Tower of the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007607
text: Talk to Priest Ramelie

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007608
text: Priest Ramelie is urgently looking for you. Talk to Priest Ramelie about what the problem is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007609
text: Protect the Sealed Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007610
text: The demons are going after the Sealed Tower of the Goddess. Protect the Sealed Tower from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007611
text: You have protected the Sealed Tower. Tell Priest Ramelie about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007612
text: Talk to Priest Ramelie

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007613
text: You've protected the Sealed Tower. Talk to Priest Ramelie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007614
text: Charge the Goddess Austeja's Scripture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007615
text: Please help us restore the first seal. First, fill the Goddess Austeja's Scripture with sacred energy near the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007616
text: Offer the Goddess Austeja's Scripture to the Sealed Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007617
text: You've filled the Goddess Austeja's Scripture with sacred energy. Offer it to the Sealed Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007618
text: You've filled the Goddess Austeja's Scripture with sacred energy. Offer it to the Sealed Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007619
text: You've filled the Goddess Austeja's Scripture with sacred energy. Offer it to the Sealed Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150714_007620
text: You've restored the seal. Tell Ramelia about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007621
text: Also, drop by the Tools Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007622
text: Talk to Knight Titas (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007623
text: Talk to Knight Titas (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007624
text: Collect %s from the Spare Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007625
text: Defeat the Red Vubbe Fighter that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007626
text: A Red Vubbe Fighter appeared when you opened the box! Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007627
text: Worship the Goddess and talk to the Tools Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007628
text: Talk to the Item Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007629
text: Knight Titas said he left Warp Scrolls for Revelators with the Item Merchant. Talk to the Item Merchant to receive the Warp Scrolls.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007630
text: The Item Merchant seems like she has something to say. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007631
text: Help Soldier Alan guard the Farm Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007632
text: Looks like things just got more difficult.{nl}Who knew Kepas could grow so big...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007633
text: We have to stay strong.{nl}Even Aras is holding on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150717_007634
text: Go back. {nl}You don't have what it takes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007635
text: Be careful next time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007636
text: You must find the hidden sanctum before the demons do.{nl}But you should be careful. The enemy we face can only be defeated with the Divine Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007637
text: Gesti... should not be underestimated.{nl}We need to find the hidden sanctum fast, but let's be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007638
text: Look at this busted cable car.{nl}It's still working, but the damage is pretty serious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007639
text: Capria was the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl} And then the Pantos.. now only the baby monsters are left.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007640
text: We can't go in due to the barrier.{nl}I will protect the Divine Sphere so go to the basement to lift the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007641
text: A fair battle face-to-face is better than hiding.{nl}And it's much better if our opponents are the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007642
text: So humans can also defeat the Demon King.{nl}I can't believe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007643
text: Please save me!{nl}I don't know how to get out from the barrier!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007644
text: Hurry and run away!{nl}Monsters may be closing in!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007645
text: All right.{nl} Oh, don't forget to offer worship to the Statue of Ausrine before you leave.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007646
text: Thank you for bringing these back, though this still isn't enough... {nl} Sorry... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007647
text: Almost all the mementos have been collected.{nl}I'm counting on you to bring back the last ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007648
text: Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.

text: I will search for it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007663
text: Ask him to tell you directly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007664
text: Rest In Peace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007665
text: I will pray for the repose of their souls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007666
text: Tell him to do his duties as a grave keeper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007667
text: Suspicious Sanctum (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007668
text: Tell him you will go there

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007669
text: Tell him he should handle that himself

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007671
text: I will take a look around

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007672
text: Tell him to do it himself

text: The Wrong Faith

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007674
text: I will go there first

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007675
text: Tell him to that you'll check it alone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007676
text: Tell him to do it himself

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007677
text: Open the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007678
text: It seems that you've recovered all the supplies that the Wendigo took. Go see Lindt and hand them over.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007679
text: Collect %s by defeating Wendigo

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007680
text: Obtain the supplies from Wendigo

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007681
text: Eta said that he won't return to camp until he defeats Saugas. You better help him so he can return sooner. Get the Monster Poison and the Spiritual Stone in Alkune Stairway for Eta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007682
text: You obtained the Spiritual Stone and the Monster Poison. Return to Eta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007683
text: Ask the Bokor Master about the Mysterious Slate. She lives at the residential area in Klaipeda's left end.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007684
text: Worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007685
text: Worship to the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in Central Square of Klaipeda as preparation to leave for the Eastern Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007686
text: Defeat the Vubbes and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007687
text: Entire region of Entrance of Kateen Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007688
text: Knight Commander Uska requested you to investigate the disappearances of Prince Tilenis and the mayor. Search for the traces using the Spirit Eye in Sidabras Rest Place in Veja Ravine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007689
text: You placed the Spirit Eye at the spot where you think the disappearances occurred. Check the Spirit Eye.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007690
text: Defeat the beings trying to attack the spirit of Klaipeda's Mayor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007691
text: The Bokor Master wants to comfort the villagers of Andale Village who died unfairly. First, defeat Tinis from Cobalt Forest and fill the essences of Tini into the beads of comfort.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007692
text: Talk to Priest Juta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007693
text: Priest Juta seems to be in a trouble. Talk to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007694
text: Defeat the resurrected corpses

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007695
text: Priest Juta asked you to defeat the corpses that are disturbing the ritual. Defeat the corpses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007696
text: Report to Priest Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007697
text: You've defeated the corpses that Juta requested. Return to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007698
text: Resurrected Corpse

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007699
text: You've defeated the corpses as Priest Juta requested. Talk to Juta if there are more things to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007700
text: Destroy the soaring coffin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007701
text: According to what Priest Juta said, the corpses woke up from the coffins that soared from the ground.{nl}Destroy the corpses that soared from the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007702
text: Return to Priest Juta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007703
text: You've destroyed all the coffins that Priest Juta requested to you.{nl}Return to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007704
text: Priest Juta told you that he never went near the sanctum due to the barrier around the sanctum.{nl}You've requested the grave keeper Sigis to find the way to destroy the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007705
text: Talk to Grave Keeper Sigis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007706
text: You've found Grave Keeper Sigis. Talk to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007707
text: It seems that Sigis has some matter that he can't tell. Talk to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007708
text: Cremate the resurrected corpses

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007709
text: Grave Keeper Sigis gave you his torch and requested you to purify the dead ones with the torch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007710
text: Return to the Grave Keeper Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007711
text: You've cremated the resurrected corpses. Return to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007712
text: Suspicious Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007713
text: As Grave Keeper Sigis requested to you, you've cremated the resurrected ones. {nl}Ask Sigis if there's any thing that you could help more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007714
text: Pull out the object from the box of the grave keeper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007715
text: Grave Keeper Sigis asked you to pull out some object from the box of the grave keeper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007716
text: Hand over the spell doll of the grave keeper to Sigis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007717
text: The object inside the box was the spell doll of the grave keeper. Hand it over to Grave Keeper Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007718
text: You've brought the spell doll of the grave keeper that Sigis requested to you. Ask Sigis about how to use the spell doll of the grave keeper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007719
text: Look around the sanctum of the Order

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007720
text: Look around the sanctum of the Order with the spell doll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007721
text: Report to Grave Keeper Sigis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007722
text: The spell doll has been destroyed as you get near to the sanctum. Return to Grave Keeper Sigis and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007723
text: Grave Keeper Sigis asked you to tell Priest Juta that the spell doll has been destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007724
text: Investigate the holy relic of the Order

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007725
text: As Juta heard that the barrier was unlocked, she wants to go there and check it herself. Go there first and wait for Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007726
text: The holy relic destroyed the Abominations that appeared.{nl}Talk to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007727
text: Juta regrets his wrongful faith. Help her so that she could apologize to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150729_007728
text: Tell Sigis Juta's apology to Grave Keeper Sigis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007729
text: As I look around, I can see the holy relic of Goddess Zemyna. I am going there to examine it.{nl}Since it belongs to Zemyna, she will give me some answers!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007730
text: I am worried that the corpses may wake up again and interrupt the ritual.{nl}When you go to the burial chamber over there, you will see coffins where the corpses are in.{nl}Please destroy those coffins before the corpses wake up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007731
text: I can see the holy relic with the shape of a tree over there.{nl}I think that is the holy relic which the Order of the Tree of Truth received from Goddess Zemyna.{nl}The trees symbolizes Goddess Zemyna so I am sure the goddess gave them the holy relic!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007732
text: While you are destroying the coffins, be careful that the lids of the coffins do not open.{nl}I destroyed a few coffins myself, and I found out that the corpses out{nl}from the coffins and attack when the lids are open.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007733
text: The corpses didn't attack since you've destroyed the coffins.{nl}But, I couldn't check on the holy relic. I could not get near to the holy relic.{nl}It was like as if something was pushing me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007734
text: The grave keeper who manages the Catacombs may know a little about that holy relic {nl}and the barrier, but I couldn't speak up.{nl}Because he kept shouting at me while I was preparing for the ritual after entering here.{nl}Could you find out about the holy relic of the goddess from the grave keeper on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007735
text: When I entered the Catacombs to look for the traces of the goddess, what I encountered were the corpses that were interrupting the ritual.{nl}After seeing the corpses walk out from the coffins, I destroyed the coffins before they wake up.{nl}The grave keeper who saw that shouted at me madly because I didn't show respect to the dead ones.{nl}I did that because I thought that was better than seeing the corpses wake up again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007736
text: The holy relic of the goddess? What the hell? Are you on the same side with that rude Bokor?{nl}If that's so, then get out of here. Thinking about that Bokor makes makes me so angry.{nl}She destroyed all the coffins the corpses were in.{nl}I don't understand how she could do such thing!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007737
text: Please, send my words to the grave keeper. I have to find Goddess Zemyna.{nl}The underground is also the territory of Goddess Zemyna, so the reason why the corpses here are resurrecting is because the goddess is not here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007738
text: This is absurd. The dead ones are waking up again...{nl}If someone did this purposely, nothing will be more insulting than this!{nl}Who would you suspect the most when the corpses are waking up from the grave?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007739
text: If this was really done by Bokor, then I should help the corpses to rest again.{nl}They may resurrect again if I bury them under the ground so please purify their bodies with your respect using this torch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007740
text: Why are you hesitating! Move fast! I can't see it anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007741
text: Thank you for helping their rest on behalf of me...{nl}It was hard for me as a grave keeper to point the sword at those people who I should take care for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007742
text: I saw the holy relic of the goddess which Bokor said before. That's the holy relic created by the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}They said they are the official disciples of Goddess Zemyna and since this grave belongs to the goddess, they will ask her to bless this place.{nl}I think the corpses started to wake up after the guys set the holy relic here.{nl}But, I can't get near to that holy relic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007743
text: ...Ah! That's right!{nl}When you go deep inside, you will see the box that contains the objects which my father used to use.{nl}Please pull out the spell doll from there. I should go, but I am scared to walk through the corpses...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007744
text: A long time ago, that lunatic Bokor or Necromancer used to come to the Catacombs in secret sometimes.{nl}The did some insane experiments on the corpses here.{nl}My father created the spell doll to protect the Catacombs from the ones who try to mess up this sacred grave.{nl}When you put magical power into the spell doll, it will find the energy that is messing up the grave and destroy that energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007745
text: Our family is guarding the grave for generations. On Medzio Diena, my father got into the incident and passed away so I am guarding the grave after that. I didn't learn anything from him, but now I am the guardian here...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007746
text: Yes! This spell doll is it! I haven't used it for a long time, so I gotta check whether it's working properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007747
text: Now bring this doll to the place where the holy relic is.{nl}If the cause of the awakening of the corpses here is that holy relic, the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the holy relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007748
text: This is the spell doll that my father used to use. We won't have any problem if we just follows how my father used to do... Just like how my father used to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007749
text: What...? What did you just say?{nl}The spell doll broke the barrier and attacked the holy relic, but the doll was destroyed instead?{nl}That's impossible... Maybe it was really the holy relic of the goddess so that's why the doll was destroyed...{nl}But the fact that the doll broke the barrier means its power is a vicious energy...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007750
text: If this is related to the Goddess, I can't handle it myself.{nl}Since the barrier was destroyed, ask the Bokor to check the holy relic as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007751
text: Wow... You broke the barrier. That's splendid.{nl}Hmm... About the doll... Maybe the doll was impaired. It is the holy relic of Goddess Zemyna, but what do you mean by vicious energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007752
text: Anyways, since the barrier was destroyed, let's go with me. I will check it myself.{nl}Can you go there first? I will go right away when I am done preparing for the ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007753
text: The spell doll... Vicious energy... Ahhaha... The grave keeper is so funny...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007754
text: I saw it... That monster... It was the grave keeper... The holy relic a while ago is not Zemyna's! I am sorry for being selfish...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007755
text: Due to my wrong faith, I didn't suspect the vicious holy relic and broke the coffins... I am disappointed myself...{nl}Now, since the vicious holy relic is gone, my abilities would help calm down the mess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007756
text: To express my apology, I want to help the grave keeper.{nl}Can you pass my apology to him?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007757
text: Those gentiles! They used the name of the goddess and did this...{nl}They should not insult the dead ones like this. I want chase them right away and make them pay for it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007758
text: But, as a grave keeper, I think we should first stabilize the Catacombs.{nl}Thanks. I realized that I also have to take care of the resurrected ones' rest as a grave keeper.{nl}Since the Bokor said she would help me, I will protect the ones that have remained.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007759
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth crossed here

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007760
text: Carlyle's Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007761
text: .{nl}They are going to looking for something that will be used to spread their doctrines...{nl}If you get a chance to go to Carlyle's Mausoleum, please investigate about them.{nl}I think they are insane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007762
text: You are not here... Where have you disappeared to... Goddess Zemyna...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007763
text: About the holy relic of the goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007764
text: The reason why the grave keeper was mad

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007765
text: Juta told you that she came here to look for the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007766
text: I am not interested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007767
text: Grave Keeper's Spell Doll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007768
text: Talking/TALK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007769
text: Suspicious Believers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007770
text: Accroding to Juta, the corpses came out from the coffins that soared.{nl}Destroy the coffins that came out from the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007771
text: Pull out the spell doll from the box of the grave keeper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007772
text: Grave Keeper Sigis asked you to pull out the spell doll from the box of the grave keeper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150730_007773
text: Hand over the spell doll of the grave keeper obtained from the box to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007774
text: To retrieve the revelation, please go to Sirdgela Forest.{nl}Now is the chance when the Demon Lord Bramble is recovering its power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007775
text: The voice had a powerful dark energy.{nl}You better not go any deeper...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007776
text: Old Manager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007777
text: Resentful Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007778
text: Don't worry. I'll give you the recipe for the antidote.{nl}Ridimed leaves from there will be enough to make it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007779
text: The grave keeper who manages here may know a little about that holy relic and the barrier.{nl}But, I can't talk to the grave keeper.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007780
text: The grave keeper shouted at me while I was preparing for the ritual here.{nl}Can you ask about the holy relic of the goddess from the grave keeper on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007781
text: When I entered Catacombs to look for the traces of the goddess, what I encountered were the corpses that were interrupting the ritual.{nl}After seeing the corpses walk out from the coffins, I destroyed the coffins before they woke up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007782
text: The grave keeper shouted at me after seeing that.{nl}I thought that was better than seeing those corpses wake up again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007783
text: The holy relic of the goddess? What the hell. Are you on the same side with that rude Bokor?{nl}If that's so, get out from this place. I get mad whenever I think about that Bokor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007784
text: She destroyed the coffins after hearing that the corpses resurrect!{nl}I don't know how she could do that!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007785
text: I saw the holy relic of the goddess which the Bokor said before. That's the holy relic created by the guys in the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}They said they are the official disciples of Goddess Zemyna and since this grave belongs to the goddess, they will ask her to bless this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007786
text: I think the corpses started to resurrect when the guys of the Order of the Tree of Truth set the holy relic here.{nl}But, I can't get near the holy relic. It seems that there is some barrier that prevents people from getting near...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007787
text: A long time ago, that lunatic Bokor or Necromancer used to come to Catacombs in secret sometimes.{nl}The did some insane experiments on the corpses here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007788
text: My father created the spell doll to protect Catacombs from the ones who are trying to mess up the sacred grave.{nl}When you put in the magical power into the spell doll, it is created to find the power and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007789
text: What...? What did you just say?{nl}The spell doll broke the barrier and attacked the holy relic, but the doll was destroyed instead?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007790
text: {nl}That's impossible... Maybe it was really the holy relic of the goddess so that's why the doll was destroyed...{nl}But the fact that the doll broke the barrier means its power is a vicious energy...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007791
text: To express my apology, I want to help the grave keeper.{nl}But, I am shy to say directly to him myself.{nl}Can you pass my apology to him?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007792
text: Crystal Wall of the Closed Area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007793
text: Notice/The barrier blocking the Closed Area is falling!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007794
text: Notice/Arrived at the Sirdgela Forest where Bramble is hiding!#3

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007795
text: Special Powers Discovered by the Monocle (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007796
text: Wait until you use Monocle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007797
text: I can't wait anymore

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007798
text: Special Powers Discovered by the Monocle (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150803_007869

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007870
text: You are better than I expected.{nl}I have another request for you... How about it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007871
text: I can't move at all because of the barrier.{nl}Please do something about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007872
text: Shoot. I think the monsters are rushing back here.{nl}They probably found out that I have been freed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007873
text: Where is the master. I am so scared because I am worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007874
text: As I expected, this ordeal can be only passed to the Revelator.{nl} So that's it... it was prepared by the owner of the Royal Mausoleum after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007875
text: Are you hurt?{nl}Oh, that's the second symbol of ordeal of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007876
text: Soon, all of the symbols of the ordeals will be collected.{nl}I look forward to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007877
text: Finally, you have collected all the symbols of the ordeals.{nl}Give me the symbols, please. I will start the interpretations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007878
text: Wispy Floating Words

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007879
text: Four ordeals were prepared so that our enemies cannot reach the message.{nl}However, if you are unprepared, even you won't be able to overcome those ordeals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007880
text: You must search. {nl}Prove yourself as a true savior and the way will open.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007881
text: Oh my, so that was the case...{nl}The symbols are covered with something, so it is difficult for me to examine them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007882
text: I will be waiting patiently.{nl}Why would we have to be in a hurry when we already have the symbols?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007883
text: (You explained the carvings engraved on the epitaph.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007895
text: It is the third ordeal that was prepared by the Great King Zachariel. Read the epitaph on the left side of Dykyne Fork to obtain the third symbol of the ordeal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007896
text: You have obtained the third symbol of the ordeal. Return to Historian Rexipher and talk to him.

text: Obtain %s

text: There is only one epitaph remaining until you pass all the ordeals. Talk to Historian Rexipher about the location of the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007899
text: This is the last ordeal prepared by the Great King Zachariel. Read the epitaph at Apatinis Cliff and obtain the fourth symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007900
text: You have obtained the fourth symbol of the ordeal. Return to Historian Rexipher and talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007901
text: Historian Rexipher is thinking deeply about something as he sees the symbols. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007902
text: Historian Rexipher says that the symbols are covered with something so he asked you to get the teeth of Hogma that will be used as abrasives. Obtain Hogma's Tooth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007903
text: Historian Rexipher disappeared with the symbols of the ordeal. Talk to Liaison Officer Bale at King's Plateau to ask about his whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150804_007904
text: You must somehow find Rexipher since he has all the symbols of the ordeal. Ask him again.

text: Gaigalas stops you as soon as you touched the root!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008028
text: Molech stops you as soon as you touched the root!

text: Combining the Ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008032
text: The dye has been completed!{nl}Go to the altar to obtain the dye

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008033
text: Return to the Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008034
text: Find the Andale Village Priest at Cobalt Forest!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008035
text: Moldyhorn has appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008036
text: Combining the ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008037
text: Defeat the monsters that reacted to the ominous energy!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008038
text: Blue Woodspirit has appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008039
text: Obtain Languid Herb from Narvas Curved Path

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008040
text: Look for a Strongly Scented Soul Flower in Dvyni Wetland

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008041
text: Acquired the Strongly Scented Soul Flower!{nl}Return to the Andale Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008042
text: Find the Village Headman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008043
text: Bring the explosives from the barrels located at the upper side of the village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008044
text: Look for something you can use to pull out the object in the well!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008045
text: Pulling out the object

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008046
text: You found someone's keepsake in the well!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008047
text: Colimencia has appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008048
text: Defeat the Honeypin that suddenly appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008049
text: Move to Giliaii Courtyard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008050
text: Untying

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008051
text: Inspecting the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008052
text: Strange crystals appeared from the magic circle{nl}Eliminate the strange crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008053
text: You can enhance the magic circle by breaking the crystals that appeared nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008054
text: The magic circle has been enhanced when you removed the 4 crystals!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008055
text: Put the magical energy of the monsters into the pot Rimas gave you and bury it in front of the magic circle!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008056
text: You should collect the magical energy of the monsters into the pot and bury it in front of the magic circle!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008057
text: Monsters began attacking!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008058
text: Inspecting the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008059
text: The magic circle strangely vibrates

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008060
text: Return to the Wizard Rimas and report to him about the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008061
text: Spraying the Opaque Purification Liquid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008062
text: The magic circle is working properly now

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008063
text: The magic circle is thirsty for monster energy!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008064
text: It seems that the magic circle is working properly without a problem!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008065
text: Something looks like the head part of a sculpture{nl}Dig it out of the ground

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008066
text: Investigating the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008067
text: Suddenly, monsters are rushing in!{nl}Defeat the monsters and break the chest!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008068
text: Looking at the wine cask

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008069
text: If you open it thoughtlessly, it seems that what's inside may be ruined{nl}You should make a wooden hammer that would open the wine cask

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008070
text: If you open it thoughtlessly, it seems that what's inside may be ruined{nl}You should make a wooden hammer that would open the wine cask!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008071
text: Dismantling the cask

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008072
text: As the cask opened, the lower part of the small sculpture has appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008073
text: Looking at the wing-shaped piece

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008074
text: As you touched the wing shaped piece, a Corrupted suddenly emerged!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008075
text: Putting the Goddess Statue on the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008076
text: Go to the field beside and check the crops!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008077
text: You've arrived at Kvailas Forest where Bramble is hiding!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008078
text: I think I feel better now

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008079
text: Checking the eyes of the spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008080
text: The bead of the comfort has been completed!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008081
text: You've found the treasure!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008082
text: Restoring the seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008083
text: You've restored the first seal of the seal tower!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008084
text: Persuade

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008085
text: Leave the message that is written with the method to make the certificate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008086
text: The contents are about Ruklys

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008087
text: Talking

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008088
text: Collecting wood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008089
text: Obtained wood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008090
text: You've found some hardtack!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008091
text: Looking for some usable Wooden Rods

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008092
text: Extracting Nioles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008093
text: Pulled out a root of Niole!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008094
text: Pulled out a root of Niole!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008095
text: Making Dried Jerky

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150908_008096
text: Got Dried Jerky!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008097
text: This place has become dangerous ever since Medzio Diena, when the monsters emerged.{nl}Go back quickly while you still can, Kepas will overrun this position soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008098
text: Ah, you said you came to tell me about the order to assemble, right?{nl}If you help me find my belongings, I will be able to do so more quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008099
text: Have you ever tried offering worship to a Goddess Statue?{nl}The Goddesses might have vanished, but I believe they are still out there somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008100
text: I was worried that the monsters would cause harm to the Goddess Statue.{nl}As much as the world is messed up.. That would be terrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008101
text: This has really gotten out of hand.{nl}Who knew that Kepas could grow so big...{nl}I wonder if it's because of Medzio Diena?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008102
text: Don't forget to worship a Goddess Statue when you see one.{nl}I'm sure doing so will bestow a blessing upon you.{nl}I firmly believe that the goddesses have not forsaken us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008103
text: This is not the type of monster that can be encountered here so it is rather strange.{nl}This world is such a mess now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008104
text: We need to assemble already?{nl}The world may be on the brink of destruction, but I can't accept this kind of insane order. {nl}I have enough missions on my hands as it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008105
text: Alright. This should be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that instantly restores your stamina...{nl}I'll give you one as a gift since I have plenty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008106
text: You can recover stamina through Tree Root Crystals or by taking a rest.{nl}But, you won't have time for that when you are being chased by monsters. {nl}This potion will come in handy in situations like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008107
text: I heard the news from my men and I was starting to become worried.{nl}With how messed up the world is, if that ended well, all is well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008108
text: It's not like there weren't any monsters at all four years ago, but they weren't so ferocious. {nl}Plant-type monsters seem to have been affected the most, as they weren't like this before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008109
text: That's it, that's how you do it. Easy, right?{nl}There is no way to tell what is going to become of this world now that the goddesses have left,{nl}so we have to steadily put effort into things ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008110
text: A shield that is advanced to level 4 will be enough.{nl}The determination should be checked.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008111
text: You are so determined unlike other guys nowadays.{nl}You can come to learn from me anytime you want.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008112
text: During your travels you might discover Goddess Statues scattered all over the kingdom.{nl}Worship these statues and you will certainly receive their blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008113
text: Press {img F10 40 40} to open the Help menu for more information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008114
text: Writings on the Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008115
text: Which factors are decisive for determining the outcome of battle?{nl}If you just continue to attack thoughtlessly, then you may get attacked instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008116
text: Golems in this situation...{nl}You remember what I taught you right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008117
text: You are doing great.{nl}As a Paladin Master, I must pay respect to your achievements.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008118
text: Thank you for completing Laimonas' favor.{nl}You may enter Klaipeda. Sir Uska is waiting for the Revelators.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008119
text: There might be more of these Large Kepas roaming in the area nearby.{nl}Could you take a look for me, please?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008120
text: It was just as I thought, right? It was this instinct that kept me alive during Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008121
text: It's been too long, my men should've come back, but I haven't heard anything from them yet.{nl}I know it's been four years since Medzio Diena, but my men have become too relaxed as of recent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008122
text: To get to the Vubbe's base, go far right from here.{nl}It is miserable that I can't do anything as a mayor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008123
text: With the goddesses disappearing, and monsters like the Golem appearing... {nl}Is there really any hope?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008124
text: How was it? Were there many skills that seemed useful?{nl}If you use skills effectively, they will be very useful in combat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008125
text: If that's the case, become my bait and take care of the Royal Mausoleum Guardian Device at Sesija Entrance.{nl}I will only say this once, so you better heed carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008126
text: No one can disturb the eternal sleep of the great king.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008127
text: Persuade the spirit that is heading towards Amolallul Hill{nl}and guide it to the Sad Owl Sculpture!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008128
text: You've defeated Grey Golem!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008129
text: Acquired 1 Status Point from the artifacts of Ruklys!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008130
text: You came back with the Hogma Teeth, but Rexipher is not around!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008131
text: You've examined the fourth tombstone of Lydia Schaffen{nl}Check what is written on the last tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008132
text: Gaigalas interrupted you as you touched the root

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008133
text: Molich interrupted you as you touched the root

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008134
text: The story about Ruklys is written on it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008135
text: Defeat the interfering Hogmas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008136
text: Search for a clue of the disappearances from Sauga's bags

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008137
text: Soldier Glen is concerned over the recent disappearances. Please look for clues to the whereabouts of the disappeared by defeating Sauga and searching them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008138
text: Rescue the restrained souls

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008139
text: The restrained spirit is not the only one that is wandering. Listen for more details from the Sad Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008140
text: The Sad Owl Sculpture told you that something is wrong since the souls that went to see a Goddess Statue are suffering. Persuade the souls that are trying to go that Goddess Statue and take them to the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008141
text: It seems that the Sad Owl Sculpture heard about what is happening to the souls. Return to the Sad Owl Sculpture and ask what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008142
text: Use the Condensed Magic Source on sleeping Guardians

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008143
text: Place the Soul Pot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008144
text: Stonemason Canolyn can't complete his trip to Fedimian due to the Cockatrices around. Defeat the Cockatrices along the road to Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008145
text: Stonemason Canolyn told you that a monster called Moa stole his toolbox. Defeat the Moa that fled to the Leipsna Chapel Site and look for the toolbox for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008146
text: Find Historian Rexipher

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008147
text: Collect Hogma Teeth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20150918_008148
text: Pursue Rexipher at the Royal Mausoleum Entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008149
text: Do you know the legend of Cunningham? {nl}It's a legend about how a great demon was trapped in the Crystal Mine in the past. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008150
text: I assume that the trapped demon has finally woken up to control the Vubbes. {nl}The dream of the bishop and the legend of Cunningham... {nl}I wonder if it is a forewarning of a great event that's about to happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008151
text: Only the goddess knows if it will be hope or despair. {nl}You can read the details about it in a book found at Mine Worker's Resting Place on 2F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008152
text: Anyway, it seems like the Vubbes surely destroyed the purifiers. {nl}We have to fix it first before the hostages run out of air.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008153
text: I will protect this village for my dead comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008154
text: If the Bokor Master told you that I would know it..{nl}There's one place that comes to mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008155
text: You're saying something that's really hard to believe. {nl}You mean this revelation is Goddess Laima's and we have to collect all these for the goddesses to return?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008156
text: Goddess Laima is often called the recording goddess. {nl}When the Great King Zachariel formed this kingdom, the only record of it was bestowed by Goddess Laima.  {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008157
text: I'd like to ask you a favor. {nl}I have sinned because I was not able to fulfill my duties of guarding the kingdom on Medzio Diena. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008158
text: But I am not a Revelator. {nl}Even if I want to make up for my sins, my duty at the moment is to protect the many citizens of Klaipeda. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008159
text: So please find all the revelations. {nl}I will put my position as the Knight Commander of Klaipeda on the line and help you deal with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008160
text: If you're on your way to Klaipeda, let me ask you a favor. {nl}It's not easy to go to Klaipeda because of the Infrorocktors.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008161
text: I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than to be stationed at.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008162
text: Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poata but what were you thinking?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008163
text: You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mines to find the evidence of Salvation? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008164
text: But that's tough at the moment. {nl}For some reason, the Vubbes are rushing out of the Crystal Mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008165
text: Moreover, there has also been an upsurge of monsters here in the Eastern Woods, which now even Klaipeda is threatened. {nl}The Miners' Village, caught in-between here and the Mines, has turned into a battlefield. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008166
text: We have divided the platoon into two. {nl}Half of the platoon is guarding Miners' Village {nl}and the other half is investigating why the number of monsters have increased here in the Eastern Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008167
text: So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they check the evidence of salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the bishop and Knight Commander either. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008168
text: Hmm, how about this? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008169
text: To test whether you can safely reach Miners' Village even without the aid of guards... {nl}Why don't you help us in our investigation?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008170
text: Good job. {nl}Now, let's get to the main task.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008171
text: Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008172
text: It wasn't so long ago. {nl}I felt a strange energy while experimenting near the Closed Area. {nl}It was quite different from magic I know of. It was very warm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008173
text: The Miners' Village is under siege and is dangerous.{nl}Please wait in Klaipeda until the siege is over.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008174
text: I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me, {nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at Crystal Mine 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008175
text: Have you met Jonas at the Gateway of the Great King? {nl}He definitely wasn't sick. {nl}But he also wasn't affected by present-day magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008176
text: If this note is true, we might die any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008177
text: Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, it's strange. It seems that it never happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008178
text: Well done.{nl}Now, is this going to be the last lesson...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008179
text: Bring me hard shell of Varvs and rigid horns of Zinutekas from the Royal Mausoleum 1F.{nl}It shouldn't be hard since you are my disciple.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008180
text: It's time for you to enhance the qualities of Manas that you possess as a Linker.{nl}Any magic is okay. I will test you by dueling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008181
text: It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother will rather choose to die than look back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008182
text: I'm sure my brother stood firm and accepted his final moments. {nl}However, I still think he could've lived more meaningfully {nl}if he had just turned away from his ambition...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008183
text: I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl} The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008184
text: So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Honestly, I did not believe it when my friend, the Paladin Master, said a Savior would come. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008185
text: That's how bad the situation was. {nl}My family and friends all went to the goddess... {nl}It seemed like there was no hope anymore in this world. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008186
text: Here, use the Seal of Space on the pillar beside me and go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared only for the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008187
text: I was there when the Divine Tree was destroying the capital. {nl}But I was not able to stop it. I was not able to save everyone.{nl}This will remain in my heart like a needle and it hurts me forever.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008188
text: But you were different. You have the power to save everyone. {nl}All the followers, the Watchers, even the wishes that me and the first Paladin longed for... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008189
text: Right. {nl}Did you mention that you need to find Goddess Saule? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008190
text: The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation starts at above the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008191
text: When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}He must be the one most anxious about it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008192
text: I will gather all the prayers for my family and friends and offer it to you. {nl}May the blessings of goddess be with you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008193
text: But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008194
text: Go. The Tenet Church is in Tenet Garden.{nl}My lifelong wish.. Be sure to stop the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008195
text: Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure Highway. {nl} They would be a good source of magic for the shaman doll. {nl} {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008196
text: Won't you help me purify Labure Highway? {nl} The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008197
text: We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008198
text: I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}A doll for spells. Doesn't that sound exciting?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008199
text: I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil energy. {nl} I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008200
text: I heard the first Paladin promised three things in return for saving our family. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008201
text: Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008202
text: You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008203
text: The power of an Elementalist comes from understanding the root of everything. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest entities.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008204
text: This forest is also growing dark. {nl}Many people should realize that Medzio Diena was only the start of the disaster. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008205
text: Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008206
text: Without Airine, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008207
text: It's all my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead.. what can I do alone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008208
text: Prayers and ceremonies are not the only ways of serving the goddess. {nl}Serving the world through physical training is also an important mission of the cleric.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008209
text: There are two ways to connect with the goddess. {nl}An ardent belief for her, and the sound of silver dropping into her offering box. Just those two.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008210
text: The magic to control time is the essence of all magics.{nl}These are Agailla Flurry's words.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008211
text: I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord ransacking the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I couldn't go out and fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008212
text: The bishop is praying in closure. {nl}When you are ready, please go to Aras in the Eastern Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008213
text: I'll give you more than what the knight asked me to give so please help us find the goddesses. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008214
text: Klaipeda is full of hope and expectations for the Revelators who dreamed of the goddess. {nl}I am also one of them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008215
text: I'll give you more than what the knight asked me to give. {nl}Since we have many Revelators, things will get better, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008216
text: You mean you actually drove away the Demon Lord from the Crystal Mine... {nl}Thank you for restoring in me something that I had lost for a while. Hope.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008217
text: The first Paladin and the Tenet Church fulfilled their duties. {nl}Right.. The time has finally come. Together with the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008218
text: I heard the monsters in Kateen Forest are eating up the Owl Sculptures I've made. {nl}I'm sure they are trying to use the souls for something else. Like for nourishment...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008219
text: Did you know? A Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in the Crystal Mine. {nl}Do you think that with disaster also comes hope?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008220
text: When I first saw the Revelators, I wondered if they were worthy of that name. {nl}But they saved the Crystal Mine and the Tenet Church. {nl}There is definitely a Savior whom the goddess sent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008221
text: I heard some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in Crystal Mine. {nl}That's incredible. Aren't Demon Lords the greatest among the demons?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008222
text: Did you hear about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Queen at the Tenet Church? {nl}It would have been better if she was killed for good, {nl}but she is the Demon Queen after all, someone that even the Paladin Master wasn't able to defeat. {nl}That is awesome enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008223
text: As a Hunter, my instinct says the monsters in this forest are showing unusual movement. {nl}As if they are controlled by something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008224
text: I feel ashamed that I wasn't able to join the squad in the Tenet Church. {nl}But isn't it amazing? the Tenet Church was saved from that Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008225
text: Just as I thought. The monsters in this forest were chased in by the Vubbes. {nl}And the Revelator actually defeated the Demon Lord that planned all this.{nl}I really wonder who it was.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008226
text: If it was my hometown, if a demon occupied the Mines, everyone would have attacked it and celebrated. {nl}Anyway, I don't know who that Revelator is but this weak kingdom finally found someone useful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008227
text: A sacred church had to go through such bad things. The clerics of this kingdom are planning something unusual.{nl}But it's a good thing to have protected the Tenet Church. It means they have the guts, don't you think? {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008228
text: The Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Mines. {nl}I have no idea what's going on. Do you have anything that comes to mind?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008229
