text: We won't know if the Revelators really dreamed of the goddess. It could even be a trick of the demons. {nl}But didn't someone among them save the Tenet Church. {nl}From the Demon Lord even.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008230
text: It's a relief a Revelator drove away the Demon Lord from the mines. I was scared another Medzio Diena would happen. {nl}But I felt something warm... Was it just my delusion? {nl}It was a pure and good energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008231
text: It's such good news that a Revelator helped drive away the Demon Lord of the Crystal Mine.{nl}But I felt a strange and sacred energy... Could it have been just a delusion? {nl}It is hard to describe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008232
text: Do you think Medzio Diena and the demons are related? {nl}I mean look at the Tenet Church. It was as if the demons were waiting for that moment...{nl}Come to think of it, the Revelators could have been ones who set the stage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008233
text: I made it through the wild monsters and you made through the Thorn Forest. {nl}I'm sure you're not looking for the goddess... So what's the matter?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008234
text: I heard the historians were attacked by the Demon Lord at King's Plateau. {nl}So it means the disaster was forewarned a thousand years ago? {nl}Anyway, it's a relief the Revelator was able to stop it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008235
text: In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but..{nl}You making it through the forest... Does it mean the forest is now purified?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008236
text: There is still so much left undiscovered about the Great King Zachariel.{nl}But since the demons live longer than us... This must have been what they were preying at. {nl}I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. We might even have had another Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008237
text: I heard the source of the evil energy deep in the Thorn Forest recently disappeared. {nl}But we will need a long time for the forest to return to its previous state...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008238
text: Did you hear that a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord's plan in the Royal Mausoleum? {nl}I heard that a Demon Lord was going around destroying the ruins in King's Plateau.{nl}I'm glad it got its punishment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008239
text: How did you come here? Did you make it through the Thorn Forest? {nl}Hmm. Are you saying you can't tell me about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008240
text: The Demon Lord that was messing with King's Plateau seems to have been the reason behind all the cases of missing people. {nl}It serves him right that a Revelator stopped all his plans from succeeding.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008241
text: Since Goddess Saule disappeared, the area around Kvailas Forest was filled with evil energy and thorns. {nl}But you made it through the Thorn Forest? Can we say that's a good sign? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008242
text: A Revelator saved the Royal Mausoleum of King Zachariel. {nl}But why would the demons go after ruins that's over a thousand years old? {nl}There is so much that we don't know about. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008243
text: I heard the monsters keep attacking the ruins and the historians keep disappearing. {nl}Yet, nobody remembers anything after the fact. How funny.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008244
text: I heard a Revelator drove out the Demon Lord that was trying to take over the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That's funny. Doesn't that mean that everything was foreseen a thousand years ago?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008245
text: If the Demon Lord invaded the Royal Mausoleum, then the symptoms of Jonas in Gate Route also becomes clear. {nl}If King Zachariel erased the memory of the workers in the Mausoleum, then it must be a side effect of the old magic. {nl}What do you think he was planning to do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008246
text: Now the demons even bear the face of a human. {nl}I heard some Revelator stopped the Demon Lord in the Royal Mausoleum,{nl} but I wonder how many demons are now hiding amongst humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008247
text: This place holds records of the hidden side of history. {nl}Time is an absolute thing. It just depends on how you look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008248
text: I heard a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord that was eyeing the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}It may be a bit overboard to make a connection between Medzio Diena and a king from a thousand years ago... {nl}But I'm sure that was something that we were all made to forget.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008249
text: The demons have been continuously attacking the Mage Tower even before Medzio Diena.{nl}Thanks to the goddess sending us the Revelator, we finally make an end to the long battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008250
text: The weight of history feels astoundingly heavy when you stand in this place. {nl}Maybe you can find a clue about Medzio Diena here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008251
text: I keep thinking that Medzio Diena might have just been a process.{nl}If not, then why would the demons go after a mausoleum that is over a thousand years old? {nl}It's a good thing some Revelator stopped it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008252
text: Everyone knew that Helgasercle showed an obsession towards the Mage Tower since centuries ago. {nl}Whatever is in that tower, we can finally see the end of it. {nl}That's a great thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008253
text: First the Tenet Church and now the Great Cathedral...{nl}But they say it was all resolved by the Revelator, so I am hopeful that things will get better.{nl}Not minding the gossip of the world and doing what you must is what's good for the goddess and the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008254
text: The rumor that a Revelator saved the Mage Tower is something that even someone like me, {nl}who is not interested in the gossips of the world, will take in. {nl}I'm surprised that there was a even one person who was good enough from anybody there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008255
text: Hergasercle was an incarnation of obsession. {nl}The chain of obsession was broken thanks to the Revelator but its souls is not something that can be saved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008256
text: I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord who sullied the wise teachings of Maven. {nl}Now it is time for us priests to come forward. {nl}We should put away our regrets about failing to protect the Great Cathedral and atone for our sins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008257
text: My colleague is dead?{nl}That can't be. If only I had not tempted him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008258
text: This map is useless to me now, without my colleague.{nl}Please pray that my colleague goes to the goddess safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008259
text: I can't leave everything behind...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008260
text: What do we do? {nl}The Vubbes rushed in and kidnapped the villagers!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008261
text: You are the Revelator, right? {nl}The goddess must have helped. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008262
text: This is all because of the dream of the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl}What is he talking about evidence of salvation in the Crystal Mine. I have never seen such thing. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008263
text: I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine. {nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they see into the mines. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008264
text: Please... Save the villagers. {nl}I beg of you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008265
text: Let's go to the Crystal Mine. {nl}I will tell you the rest of the story at the Crystal Mine entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008266
text: Hold on! There is something you should know. {nl}We went into the mines to save the kidnapped villagers too.{nl}But the purifiers were broken and the mine was filled with toxic fumes, so we failed every time. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008267
text: Ye..Yes..{nl}Find a young man named Vaidotas!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008268
text: That fellow knows well about the purifiers in the Crystal Mine. {nl}It hasn't been long since he was taken away by the Vubbes so he must be in the Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008269
text: You want to learn my skills?{nl}It's not hard for me to teach you, but would you be able to handle it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008270
text: The goddess always told us to help those around us.{nl}By helping others near you, you will help your spirit as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008271
text: Great King Zachariel's ordeal is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have acknowledged you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008272
text: The kingdom has lost all hope. {nl}It does not have any will to stand firm anymore and is just crying out for the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008273
text: In recent times however, people have come forward saying they dreamed of the goddess. {nl}You are one such person, Revelator. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008274
text: Anyway, the bishop himself also had a dream while praying in closure. {nl}In his dream, the goddess told him the evidence of salvation will be found in the Crystal Mine. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008275
text: Knight Aras at the Eastern Woods is in charge of that so go and meet him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008276
text: Four years has passed since that incident, why is the goddess sending us Revelators now... {nl}I guess someone like me may not be able to understand the deeper meaning of the goddess' will.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008277
text: But, at least I know that the Revelators are our only hope.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008278
text: Well then, go on to the Eastern Woods. {nl}Don't forget to worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza before you leave. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008279
text: Also, be sure to drop by the Item Merchant.{nl}I have left some warp scrolls for Revelators like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008280
text: I can feel Bramble suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008281
text: I am not afraid of dying.{nl}Goddess Saule will guide me well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008282
text: The portal that you tried to open was a false gateway.{nl}That portal leads to where all of the world's knowledge is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008283
text: I have been fighting the Demon Lord Bramble, who tried to take over the revelation. {nl}I have fought with it night and day to be able to hand the revelation to you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008284
text: But, Medzio Diena broke the balance of strength. {nl}The goddesses lost most of their strength since that day. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008285
text: Bramble took that chance to steal the revelation and seal me in this place. {nl}Because only I know how to interpret the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008286
text: But I did not give into Bramble's order to interpret the revelation.{nl}That is why he made a plot to open a portal to where all the knowledge of the world is. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008287
text: The residents of this area are victims of the plot to open that portal. {nl}To find a way to get the revelation using your power as the savior... Something brutal was done. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008288
text: I lost most of my strength and couldn't stop that horror from happening. {nl}All I could do was... to despair. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008289
text: But the revelation led you to me. {nl}I am certain that you are the ray of light who will save all of this world. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008290
text: Savior. {nl}Please destroy the magic that is trapping me. {nl}In order to deliver and follow the revelation, I must first be freed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008291
text: The Binding Magic Circles are located in Drugys Courtyard and Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry before I lose my consciousness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008292
text: Thank you for saving me. {nl}You are... the only true savior who will save this world. {nl}The one who Goddess Laima talked about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008293
text: I am Saule, the goddess of the sun.{nl}I was the guardian of the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008294
text: This cage is still confining me. {nl} We've got to find Clymen who has the key and is hiding in between the dimensional crack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008295
text: Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Altar Grand Corridor. {nl} I will try to use the divine power that dwells in the tool.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008296
text: I am finally free. {nl}I will prepare to interpret the revelation from this point on. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008297
text: As I have told you before, the revelation is in the hands of the Demon Lord Bramble. {nl}I feel sorry that I have to burden you, but your strength is the only thing I can rely on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008298
text: But Bramble is also not in its usual condition due to the previous battle. {nl}It is recovering by turning the forest into a thorn forest and extracting nourishment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008299
text: My Believers are waiting for you in Gate Route. {nl}Please take back the revelation from Bramble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008300
text: I have carved many owls for a long time to help Goddess Ausrine.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008301
text: Medzio Diena was just the beginning.{nl}A forest far away from the capital such as this one has also recently come under{nl}the influence of the evil forces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008302
text: I will be able to guide you to the revelation if I use all the strength left in me. {nl}That is why you should release me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008303
text: But please don't reveal my existence for now. {nl}It is the nature of humans to want to depend on something. {nl}If they find out about the helplessness of the goddesses, this world will be full of chaos and sighs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008304
text: That portal is... a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008305
text: If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope this will be useful for you.{nl}Nice to meet you!{nl}Are you the Revelator who dreamed of the goddess? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008306
text: Everyone in Klaipeda is talking about it. {nl}I wonder if the Revelators really saw the missing goddesses in their dreams... and where is that dream... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008307
text: I am curious to know more about the dream but I'm sure they can't tell me about it.{nl}But that's fine since I believe that the Revelators are people who will find the goddesses. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008308
text: Please take this accessory. {nl}If the armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008309
text: I hope it will be useful for you. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008310
text: It's a little strange that it had to be the venom of Scorpio.{nl}Well... it's already done so what can I do?{nl}It doesn't bother me as long as it doesn't threaten my life.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008311
text: I must be causing you some trouble... Thanks for helping.{nl}Now you just have to make a magic circle with the firewood I gave you, and burn the voodoo doll on top of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008312
text: The crops died when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's okay. I was told that the bad energy within the crops will go away like that. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008313
text: This is tough. {nl}Many might be killed..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008314
text: Huh? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. well then, never mind. I will report it to the baron myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008315
text: This is the last one. {nl}The magic circle at Darbas Entrance will have a lot of monsters that will interfere. {nl}With the divine power suppressed, the monsters are naturally drawn to that area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008316
text: The baron is doing something to purify this farm. {nl}But recently the crops are dying and people are starting to fall sick. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008317
text: If the magic circles are really a lie, then you should be able to remove the magic circles at Tylila Path with the goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008318
text: If only I had a little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008319
text: These things are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents are at Dykyne Fork...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008320
text: Gerda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008321
text: I am a new member of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}I am setting up warning and notice Boards related to the Kedorlaomers here and there. {nl}It is very tiring though.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008322
text: {nl}If it is alright with you, can you set up some boards on the lower area over there? {nl}That's where Jurate is trying to excavate sacred objects so we need to put up a warning for pedestrians. {nl}But I need to go somewhere else...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008323
text: Thank you. {nl}That would be good enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008324
text: Serapinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008325
text: I am Serapinas, one of the new members of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}I am in charge of promoting the merchants. {nl}If you have time, can you help me in one of my promotion agenda?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008326
text: {nl}It's nothing difficult. You just have to go near Orsha or Klaipeda and help the Revelators who just began their adventures. {nl}I will give you a scroll. If you use it on them, it will help them and promote the merchants as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008327
text: You must use it near the fields of Orsha or Klaipeda. {nl}And it must be someone who just began their adventure. {nl}I will not work on people who have seen the promotion material already.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008328
text: Thank you for stepping up to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008329
text: Oh, you're back already. {nl}Revelators sure are different.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008330
text: Jurate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008331
text: I am Jurate, the leader of sacred object excavation team. {nl}Are you here to help? {nl}We need some.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008332
text: {nl}Let's take time to talk later but first, please help excavate the area I tell you .

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008333
text: It would also be nice to take care of the monsters on your way there too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008334
text: It won't be that dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008335
text: Oh, you brought it. {nl}This is a sacred object known as the Incense of Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008336
text: Did I tell you? {nl}Oh, it was a long day... {nl}We faced Medzio Diena right here while we were transporting the sacred objects to Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008337
text: {nl}The wagon flipped and the sacred objects scattered around. {nl}That's why we are going through this excavation to find it. {nl}But people are hesitating to excavate that area because of the monsters... Please help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008338
text: I wonder if it was eaten by the monster...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008339
text: Looks like the monsters ripped it to shreds but here. {nl}Let me try to have it back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008340
text: {nl}Since it is the record of the merchants, only if I could stick it back together...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008341
text: This record is about the materials of the arrow that the merchants supplied to Lydia Schaffen and her arrow maker, the first Fletcher MAster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008342
text: I think there should be some sacred objects up here too though. {nl}I can't tell where exactly. {nl}Can you look for it? I'll give you a detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008343
text: Locate the area and then carefully dig that area. {nl}You will probably find the sacred object.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008344
text: Carefully use the detector as you go north.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008345
text: Oh, you found it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008346
text: {nl}Let's see...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008347
text: {nl}This sacred object is an ink bottle. {nl}It contains the secret ink that was used for important records and documents. {nl}I assume this ink was used when they needed to hide the record.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008348
text: {nl}Ah, I think that's about all the work we need to do for the day. {nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008349
text: Margellius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008350
text: Hello. {nl}I am Margellius, the one in charge of the records.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008351
text: {nl}If you want to help me... {nl}Please find the records of the merchant that the monsters stole from us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008352
text: As Leopoldas says, we, the merchants, have been doing a lot of things. {nl}The records hold the history of our works.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008353
text: If we get back the records that the monsters stole from us, then we must rewrite them again so that it will stand the times.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008354
text: Thank you for coming forward to help us. {nl}We are in really tight hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008355
text: Now we have to rewrite the damaged records... {nl}The ink made from monster fluids are good and lasts long. {nl}I will give you a trap to use so please get me the monster fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008356
text: If you place the trap near the monster, the monster will be lured to it and faint. {nl}You need to extract its fluid while it is still alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008357
text: You can get it from all the monsters around the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008358
text: This is good enough! {nl}Thank you very much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008359
text: Now it's time to make the sanctuary. {nl}Try to make it here. {nl}I will give you the materials and tools you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008360
text: You can make it here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008361
text: Good work. {nl}I have a feeling that Giedra, in the northern area, also needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008362
text: Giedra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008363
text: You're the Revelator. {nl}I am Giedra of the Rhud Order. {nl}If you're here to meet Antanas, I'm sure you've already heard about our order so I won't talk so much about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008364
text: {nl}I am collecting the materials needed to make the Scriptures of Goddess. {nl}Normal paper turns yellow and decays quickly... So I'm looking for materials that won't get wet nor be discolored easily. {nl}The transparent shell of the monsters are great for it. If you polish it well before writing on it, it will last a long time. {nl}Can you get me those? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008365
text: It's a pretty common material so it will be easily to collect.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008366
text: Bring it to me when you collect them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008367
text: You brought them earlier than I expected. {nl}These shells will now be polished and used as pages of the scripture. {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008368
text: We also need to do some bookbinding. {nl}Making sure the book does not break lose is the most important thing. {nl}The leather string made from monster leather is the best but the problem is that it is too short. {nl}I will give you an anvil. Can you make me some bookbinding strings using the leather strings?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008369
text: Listen carefully. First, get leather string from the monsters, then use this anvil to turn the leather strings into a strings for bookbinding. {nl}You need to connect the short strings and make it into a single string. {nl}It also becomes more durable this way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008370
text: Return to me when you are done making the string.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008371
text: Awesome! {nl}You can say that you made a book yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008372
text: {nl}Kestas over there also needs your help. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008373
text: Kestas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008374
text: I had the records of my seniors...{nl}But it was all stolen... {nl}I'm done...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008375
text: Oh oh oh!{nl}Please help me!{nl}My seniors' records are all gone!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008376
text: {nl}That's my job but it's all gone! All of it! {nl}Please find it! {nl}I'm sure the monsters took it!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008377
text: What to do... What do I do... {nl}I'm done... All the hardworks put in to make those records...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008378
text: {nl}That's it! Wow, you got them all! {nl}Thank you!{nl}How can I thank you enough...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008379
text: Aah it's all good now! Now go back to Orsha and complete the records!{nl}Hahaha!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008380
text: Ah really... {nl}Actually, these records are made out of the polished shells of the monsters. {nl}You need to write it there to make it last long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008381
text: {nl}Yes, yes, right. That is also why Giedra is trying to make the scripture using the monster shells. {nl}That's why we are always attacked like this. {nl}Because they can smell their fellows...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008382
text: {nl}Anyway, now I'll really go to Orsha now. {nl}Thank you very much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008383
text: Chisel?{nl}The tools merchant should have it. {nl}Go on over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008384
text: It's a long way back with the tool... {nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008385
text: A Chisel? {nl}You will use it to repair the sanctuary?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008386
text: {nl}Well, I just bought some old chisels from other Revelators... {nl}If you need, you can take one of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008387
text: Did you get the chisel?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008388
text: Oh, you got them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008389
text: It's a long way to Genar Field... {nl}Go on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008390
text: Albinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008391
text: Thank you for what just happened. {nl}Ah, this sanctuary...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008392
text: {nl}I expected it to be polluted but... I mean who would have thought it would be this bad? {nl}Making a sanctuary like this here is bad enough but those Nestos. {nl}What are they thinking leaving it corrupted like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008393
text: {nl}Can you help me out for a while?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008394
text: I belong to the Anastos. {nl}The Nestos still pursue unconditional belief even at this point when the goddesses are all gone. {nl}That's why they are building sanctuaries here and there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008395
text: {nl}What's the use of sanctuaries when the goddesses are all gone? {nl}When you know it will just be corrupted like this even if you build it. {nl}On the other hand, the Anastospa pursue practicality.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008396
text: People come first, mopping up the demons come first, and what's the use of faith when the goddess themselves abandoned us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008397
text: There is another sanctuary over there. {nl}I will finish burning this sanctuary so please destroy the one over there. {nl}We need to teach those Nestos as lesson.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008398
text: {nl}I'm sure the sanctuary over there is also fuming red enegy. {nl}A sign of corruption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008399
text: Damijonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008400
text: What the... {nl}Who are you? What are you doing to our sanctuary...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008401
text: This is the sacred sanctuary of the Nestos. Did you do this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008402
text: I have never heard about someone like that. {nl}I may not know every singe person in Anastopas but I at least know those who set up this camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008403
text: I'm at loss for any word.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008404
text: {nl}Albinas? He is one of Anastopas? That can't be. {nl}Bring that person here. I need to check for myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008405
text: Are you saying that Albinas guy is missing? {nl}It's getting out of hand. {nl}I'm sure Anastos won't do such a thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008406
text: {nl}Anyway, our priority then is to restore this sanctuary. {nl}You did this so you should be responsible for it. {nl}There are rocks over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008407
text: {nl}This sanctuary was also made of the rocks here so collect some rocks. {nl}And the Nestos Camp is over there. {nl}You'll find someone named Eduinas . {nl}Ask him to polish the rocks to use as materials for restoring the sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008408
text: If he finds out you did this to the sanctuary, he won't polish the rocks easily. {nl}But that's a price you have to pay and you should be responsbile for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008409
text: Still not done yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008410
text: Eduinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008411
text: Who are you..? {nl}And what are these rocks?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008412
text: What? Destoryed the sanctuary? {nl}The sanctuary that was built with everyone's efforts here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008413
text: I don't need your apologies. {nl}I'll polish the rocks to use as materials since Damijonas said so but don't ever do that again. {nl}And while I polish these, I don't want to see your face so go away and take care of some monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008414
text: You should wait longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008415
text: Done. Now, don't ever do that again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008416
text: You brought it. {nl}Now let's begin the restoration.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008417
text: Done. It's a good thing it wasn't totally destroyed. {nl}I apologize for being angry at you a while ago. Seeing the sanctuary destroyed was upsetting. {nl}But it's not total nonsense. {nl}Anastos and Nestos may be in conflict of interests but we do not invade each other's territory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008418
text: {nl}But you mentioned someone from Anastos that I don't even know as the reason behind destroying the sanctuary so I couldn't hold my anger. {nl}Anyway, at least you restored it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008419
text: {nl}But it strange. I have never heard of that name...{nl}Anastos Camp is in the northern side so why don't you go there and ask. {nl}It really is strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008420
text: Gedas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008421
text: Don't bother me if you don't have any business. {nl}Ah... I really need that...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008422
text: {nl}Hey, can you find it for me? {nl}My research materials. {nl}The monsters took them all from me...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008423
text: More than other things, we need to find it first! {nl}My research! My research! {nl}The monsters took it! {nl}Find me that first!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008424
text: Are you not done yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008425
text: Let me see... {nl}Yes, right! You got them all! {nl}Thank you very much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008426
text: {nl}Oh, did you have something to ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008427
text: Albi...nas...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008428
text: {nl}Uh...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008429
text: {nl}Nope. I can't think of anyone on Anastos with that name. {nl}Moreover, he told you go burn and destroy the Nestos sanctuary? {nl}Oh my god...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008430
text: {nl}Nonsense. We don't do such a thing. {nl}I think we need to investigate on that matter. {nl}We give danger signal fires when we send out people for investigation {nl}and we ran out of it just now. {nl}Can you find some firepowder that are used to make the danger signal fires?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008431
text: We all serve the goddess. That is why we're on the pilgrimages. {nl}It's just a small difference in how we see the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008432
text: {nl}Nestospa's people say that we should believe in the goddesses unconditionally even if they disappeared, {nl}while we, the Anastospa, pursue something more practical.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008433
text: {nl}Defeating demons, improving the qualities of human lives... we have to aim for those things.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008434
text: Monsters are all around so it will be difficult to obtain the materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008435
text: But, Albinas... We don't feel good about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008436
text: Okay, good. That's enough.{nl}Now, we will make flame bombs. Please wait a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008437
text: We've completed the flame bomb... Now I will call my colleague.{nl}He is called Fabijus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008438
text: Fabijus is a moderatist among Anastos, so he won't have problem even if he meets one of Nestos on his way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008439
text: Since Fabijus left... we would somehow get some answer.{nl}But, I don't feel good about it. Is there any information...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008440
text: {nl}Ah! Barte over ther must know something.{nl}He arrived here while traveling various locations.{nl}How about we ask about Albinas there?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008441
text: It's just a different perspective of looking at the world. {nl}The topic they cover the most...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008442
text: {nl}The disappearances of the goddesses were done spontaneously so are we going to still follow then after they abandoned us...{nl}Another problem is whether we, humans should continue to manage the world where the goddesses have disappeared...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008443
text: {nl}Are we going to aim for the truth or trust the goddessses and pray... that will be the difference.{nl}But, they are just conflicting each other and they don't deny each others' existences.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008444
text: She is rather progressive.{nl}So since she is not close to me... I want you to go to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008445
text: Barte

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008446
text: {nl}Ah, yes. I am called Barte.{nl}I was on a journey until recently. I am thinking about leaving again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008447
text: Albinas... Is that him?{nl}When we arrived at the camp recently, one man was wearing the same outfit like us so I was going to say hello, but then I felt something was not right so I decided not to.{nl}He was giggling as he was looking at the leathers that were engraved with writings and he ripped off those leathers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008448
text: {nl}I was scared since that wasn't the power of a human, but he threw all those leathers on the ground and disappeared down there. The monsters thought that was the time and ate all the leathers. Was the smell of blood on those leathers?...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008449
text: {nl}It was scary. {nl}Ah, I think the monsters there could've not digested the leathers as yet... {nl}Can you bring them? I am curious too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008450
text: The people who are progressive are a minority among Anastos.{nl}They are asserting to stop conflicting with Nestos, but instead try to change Nestos.{nl}So that Albinas probably told them he is also progressive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008451
text: {nl}So he could make you participate into destroying the sanctums of Nestos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008452
text: I can connect the burnt leathers together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008453
text: The monsters have those.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008454
text: Let's see...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008455
text: {nl}Uh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008456
text: {nl}Ah... This doesn't make sense... He...is a subordinate of Baiga.{nl}Bring a conflict to Nestos and Anastos...{nl}You can use the Revelator...{nl}Baiga.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008457
text: Please tell this to Gedas!{nl}Oh my god, what is happening to Fabijus?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008458
text: We don't have time. Hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008459
text: What?{nl}Damn it...{nl}The demons came here...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008460
text: Fabijus... what is happening to him?{nl}What should I do...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008461
text: The flame bomb has exploded!{nl}Please hurry to Fabijus!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008462
text: {nl}And one more thing I should tell you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008463
text: {nl}To defeat the demons, Nestos may be better, when you stop by their camp and explain about the circumstances, they would tell you how to defeat Albinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008464
text: Damn...{nl}That was his plot.{nl}I thought it was suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008465
text: {nl}Please take this sacred object.{nl}You would be able to defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008466
text: You are safe.{nl}I've heard from Fabijus.{nl}Everything was Baiga's plot...{nl}We should be cautious all the time.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008467
text: It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008468
text: Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008469
text: It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008470
text: Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008471
text: Damn. {nl}It's too wide, so let's move separately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008472
text: First, you go deep into that place.{nl}Who knows? The demons with the special power may possess something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008473
text: I am so mad.{nl}There isn't anything special and the demons didn't have anything.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008474
text: Did we search an empty area?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008475
text: I will search the area up here.{nl}Let's meet later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008476
text: How about you?{nl}Have you obtained anything?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008477
text: Wait!{nl}I can sense something big from Monocle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008478
text: It looks to be very big. Go there and check yourself.{nl}I will hide here since the battles are not my type.{nl}I don't know what to do if a strong demon comes out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008479
text: Monocle is looking for the hidden object that is hidden inside the special power. It is a big object.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008480
text: Go there and check.{nl}Like a while ago, the demons may appear and there may be really strong demons there... I will hide myself here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008481
text: An outsider comes here... Who are you?{nl}How did you come here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008482
text: It is really big so you will recognize it when you see it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008483
text: I will introduce myself first.{nl}I am the manager of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Who are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008484
text: Okay. You don't have to explain anymore.{nl}I can feel you are full of sacred power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008485
text: I know the special power which Ruklys hid here exists.{nl}If it is your task to find it, then I will help for sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008486
text: You can't say no nor ask for reasons to the kingdom orders.{nl}But as I lived here for my life, I have many things to think.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008487
text: The kingdom order told us to ban anyone's entrance here, but I think the goddess made us to meet each other here.{nl}The goddess is not under the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008488
text: If it is about the Goddess, then I will do the guide.{nl}At least, there aren't anything here so let's go to the next area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008489
text: Ah, I totally forgot.{nl}I've prepared many things to block the intruders, but I totally forgot about them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008490
text: I need a certificate.{nl}It was created to attack the ones who are not permitted ferociously.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008491
text: To make a certificate, we first need a mushroom.{nl}There are many mushrooms at the lower area so please get me one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008492
text: I will help anything that is related to the goddesses.{nl}Finally, an opportunity has come in my boring life.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008493
text: They are enough to make the certificate.{nl}Please wait a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008494
text: What I can do for you is to put my sign on the certificate.{nl}But, I am too old to use magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008495
text: But, I am sure the energy that is flowing around the Fortress of the Land could substitute my weak power.{nl}Please gather all of those.{nl}The monsters who've lived here for a long time must have the crystal of the great earth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008496
text: I am not like the old days.{nl}When I made that certificate, I thought I would never make anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008497
text: I never knew that I would be making this again... Please wait.{nl}I will make it quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008498
text: Let's go more deep inside. {nl}I hope you can find the one that you are looking for. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008499
text: I will go there first so please follow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008500
text: Don't come late.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008501
text: Welcome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008502
text: Please receive it.{nl}My devices won't attack you anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008503
text: I've protected this place for my entire life, but I don't know anything about the revelation which you are looking for.{nl}But, the spirit that lived in the era of Ruklys may know something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008504
text: But, those spirits are dangerous.{nl}Since they only have the thoughts of that time. Their hatred towards the kingdom soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008505
text: The Soul Stones that read the memories of the spirits are beside me.{nl}I've created them. I've tried to read their memories in the past many times.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008506
text: But, what we received in return were only hatred.{nl}For them, we are just kingdom soldiers that are trying to occupy the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008507
text: It is unfortunate, but to make them not to go crazy, you would need the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008508
text: It is very complex to make the Restraint Token.{nl}We've failed that time, but since we have you this time, it will be much easier this time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008509
text: I will tell you in steps, so please first bring the eggs of Rajatad.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008510
text: The spirits only have the feeling of anger left.{nl}I guess we can't do anything about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008511
text: This egg is the power to restrain.{nl}Now, we need something to execute the power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008512
text: To execute the power, the bones of the demons are the best.{nl}When you get the bones, I will move the power of restraint that is in the eggs to the bones of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008513
text: Even I failed to pull out the memories of the spirits.{nl}I feel reliable since you are with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008514
text: Well done.{nl}We only have to do the last step in order to complete the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008515
text: As I told you before, I've tried to look at the memories of the spirits.{nl}The resistances from the spirits were too aggressive at then, so I failed that time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008516
text: But, now I have you and the token of restraint.{nl}If we could bring the spirits, we may able to read the memories with the soul stones that are beside me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008517
text: Please bring the spirits here with the Restraint Token.{nl}I will get prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008518
text: Please bring the spirits fast.{nl}I am also curious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008519
text: They are breaking something after receiving an order from Ruklys.{nl}I think that may be related to the revelation of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008520
text: I should find out about the device which Ruklys destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008521
text: We can look at the detailed memories of the spirits by enhancing the Restraint Token.{nl}Due to enhanced Restraint Token, the spirits would resist. If the spirits resist, suppress them with your power and use the token of the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008522
text: I have no choice even if the spirits suffer. {nl}That's the best way I can help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008523
text: Finally...{nl}I've been looking for it for 600 years and finally... I found the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008524
text: Please put the vitality of the monsters into this bone.{nl}Then, the power to restrain, the power to release, and the power to execute, all steps will be put into those.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008525
text: That's an old method.{nl}If we complete this, you may able to see the memories of the spirits that were with Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008526
text: Even we if we know the method, it is useless if we can't execute it.{nl}I wasn't able to obtain the vitalities of the monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008527
text: Good. {nl}That's the Restraint Token.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008528
text: Don't care that much even if we use the demons.{nl}What's important is that we should look for the revelation of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008529
text: Are there spirits that are wandering around the Fortress of the Land without going to the goddesses?{nl}I can't see them suffering anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008530
text: I can only help you to make the owl sculptures.{nl}Those owls would guide the spirits that lost their ways.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008531
text: Can you put the owl sculptures at the Fortress of the Land?{nl}If you guide the spirits to the owl sculptures, then you would be able to go beside the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008532
text: I can't quit carving the owl sculptures.{nl}When I stop carving, then that means the peaceful days have come.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008533
text: Thanks.{nl}The goddesses must have given use long lives to fulfill these.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008534
text: I don't have time to think about those treasures.{nl}I also care for the kingdom. I know that the revelation should not fall into the hands of the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008535
text: I should meet Eminent around here.{nl}Let's check with Monocle without being noticed by Eminent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008536
text: This is as I thought... He is not like the guardian of the revelation.{nl}Otherwise, are the demons the guardians of the revelation?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008537
text: They are going after the revelation.{nl}What should we do about it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008538
text: That's right!{nl}We have that document.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008539
text: Do you remember?{nl}It's the document that was in the treasure when we went to the hidden place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008540
text: The methods of the activation and the repair of the magic circle is written there to face against the demons at the battle field.{nl}If we somehow use them effectively, we may able to block Eminent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008541
text: First, you do what Eminent tells you to do.{nl}And let's secretly activate the magic circle with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008542
text: Did it go well?{nl}The last thing is near the Ikbeta Platform.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008543
text: But, the power of the magic circle is getting suppressed due to the flags of the demons.{nl}I've tried to get near it somehow, but I can't due to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008544
text: Let's pull out the demon flags that are near the magic circle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008545
text: Ah, if you go late, Eminent may suspect you.{nl}Go meet Eminent as the magic circle gets activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008546
text: I believe that Ruklys has not colluded with the demons.{nl}If not, what I saw are all lies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008547
text: Have you collected all the parts?{nl}Give it to me. I can restore it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008548
text: I want you to meet the revelation of the goddess fast.{nl}To fulfill my lifelong wish...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008549
text: I will not hide it anymore.{nl}I am Premier Eminent and I used to serve King Kadumel.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008550
text: It's up to you to believe, but I want you to give me an opportunity to at least explain this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008551
text: I am sure that you know this place is the last battlefield where Ruklys resisted until his death.{nl}And Ruklys was also the guardian of the revelation like his master, Maven.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008552
text: But, as the defeat came, he crossed the line which he should not have crossed.{nl}He made an alliance with the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008553
text: The Fortress of the Land is full of vicious demons and monsters. {nl}That's why I brought my army here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008554
text: It was a long battle. But the battle ended with my victory.{nl}And then the voices of the goddess was heard. To protect the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008555
text: But, I don't know how Ruklys hid the revelation.{nl}He is just a half guardian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008556
text: It's up to you to believe this story, but look at me in front of you.{nl}I've been living with the blessing from the goddesses for the last 600 years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008557
text: And I've met you at the end.{nl}And you pulled me to the place where the revelation is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008558
text: It is my honor since I can be helpful to you. {nl}I was suffering from the sense of shame since I don't know what the half guardian could do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008559
text: Let's finish the explanation here and go look for the revelation of the goddesses.{nl}I have things to prepare so I will go there first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008560
text: Ah, you still haven't left?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008561
text: I've thought about it a lot. {nl}I am sure that the person who've been to this deep is just me among the grave thieves!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008562
text: We should record this historic moment.{nl}Can you bring some stones where I could record my achievements?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008563
text: What should I write on the stones? {nl}If you have any thoughts, please let me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008564
text: I know that it is hard to bring something that is that big.{nl}Thank you. I will think what to write on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008565
text: Isn't this the diary of Ruklys? {nl}I am sure that more than this. Can you look for more?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008566
text: When you bring this to Wilhelmina Carriot, she will pay you accordingly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008567
text: Okay. This is enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008568
text: The history which we know are all lies. He was killed by the hands of the one he used to love.{nl}Ruklys, he is an unfortunate man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008569
text: It's good to see that you are still alive.{nl}Do you remember? When I first looked through this Monocle.{nl}I thought the object is hidden by the special force, but when I went there there were only demons there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008570
text: And when you entered the habitants' area, you've checked it with Monocle right?{nl}The strong force was detected so I remember that I told you to check.{nl}You told me that there is only an old manager there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008571
text: Since then, I've been looking for that force with this monocle... {nl}But, when I went to the places, only demons were there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008572
text: Maybe...{nl}The true nature of the force that can be seen by Monocle is maybe... demons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008573
text: That old manager... I have no idea...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008574
text: I hope my assumptions are wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008575
text: The demons did not attack Premier Eminent? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008576
text: I need to check it. {nl}Let's go together and meet that Eminent guy. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008577
text: We will know for sure if you check that guy with the Monocle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008578
text: Mirtis is gone, but the Vubbes are still following Mirtis' commands. {nl}And there is also a rumor that even stronger and more dangerous Vubbes were seen. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008579
text: Most of them died while returning with the prince's men.{nl}But they were not guided by the goddess even after their death. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008580
text: I want to mourn for those who died unfairly. {nl}Would you like to join me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008581
text: Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008582
text: What? You're not a reaper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you will be cursed. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008583
text: Huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon. {nl}Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008584
text: The Legwyn family was a renowned family. {nl}But since the disappearance of Justina's father, Gailus Legwyn, other members of the family and their deities all fell sick and died. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008585
text: The mansion where Justina used to live... is now full of monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008586
text: I went through great lengths to get a chance to meet Erikas,{nl}a longtime friend of the Legwyn family.{nl}He also possesses the Legwyn family's heirloom but...{nl}I didn't expect him to behave like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008587
text: The guy doesn't even know where the graves of the Legwyn family are...{nl}I strongly suspect he's an impostor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008588
text: Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the Scroll of the Dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas won't escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008589
text: So he didn't really tell us the location of Legwyn grave because he doesn't know...?{nl}Didn't he say he would tell you if you give him some money?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008590
text: To wake me up as I was about to go beside the goddesses... {nl}What do you need of me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008591
text: There's a long story behind it, but what Erikas said is largely correct.{nl}I was chasing after the Kartas Hunter with my vassals.{nl}Initially, our strength was lacking.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008592
text: Thus, I told Erikas to lend us his power to defeat the Kartas Hunter since he lived nearby.{nl}Erikas asked for our heirloom as collateral in return for lending me the Blessing Crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008593
text: He told me that we would be able to defeat the demon with the Crystal.{nl}Attempting to defeat it proved difficult, so we ended up just sealing the demon.{nl}Many lives were sacrificed to seal it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008594
text: The Kartas Hunter is locked inside the seal in front of you.{nl}The power that is restraining the demon is from the Blessing Crystal lent by Erikas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008595
text: The Kartas Hunter will not be able to get out from here in its current state.{nl}But, my daughter... I have to take back our heirloom for Justina's sake.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008596
text: I can release the Kartas Hunter from the Crystal's seal by myself, but{nl}in order to preserve the power of the Crystal, we will need help from the vassals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008597
text: I don't want to ask Erikas for help again...{nl}If you could gather the Spirit Incenses growing on Mochia Fields, we will be able to wake up my vassals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008598
text: When we fought the Kartas Hunter, someone had to stay focused on the Crystal.{nl}My team fell one by one, the battle situation worsened as fewer people could focus on the Crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008599
text: In the end, everyone dedicated their lives to seal the Kartas Hunter.{nl}Still, as me and my vassals don't have real bodies now, we won't be disturbed by it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008600
text: I can sense some sacred power within you.{nl}If you could eliminate that demon, we will help.{nl}Please complete the task that we couldn't complete...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008601
text: There was a pitiful girl that I was taking care of.{nl}She didn't have a family and was very quiet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008602
text: As she started to stay in my mansion, demons started to appear near the mansion...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008603
text: One day, an incident occurred where one of my vassals was killed by poison. {nl}Of course, everyone suspected that the girl did it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008604
text: Soon the girl ran away. {nl}I don't know why, but there was a voice deep inside my heart, echoing to protect her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008605
text: Since we were able to sealed the Kartas Hunter here, she was able to run away safely.{nl}Even if it turned out like this, I don't have any regrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008606
text: It's not that I allowed it because of good faith or that I was aware of how people saw her.{nl}But, I feel sorry for my family... that they couldn't see Justina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008607
text: The Spirit Incenses have the power to pull out the memories of the dead.{nl}I will put the power of the Scroll of the Dead here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008608
text: As you were able to pull me out, you will be able to pull out my vassals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008609
text: My vassals are sleeping at Kruva Stream Bank.{nl}I regret that I couldn't prepare a good spot for their graves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008610
text: You will be able to wake up my vassals when you rub the Spirit Incenses onto their gravestones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008611
text: I am to blame for this.{nl}They're like family, yet they are resting on grounds without calm winds...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008612
text: I am happy to meet my vassals again because of you.{nl}Their spirits continue to have great determination.{nl}They will fulfill our mission even after their deaths.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008613
text: Next, we'll be releasing the Kartas Hunter.{nl}But the power of the Blessing Crystal is too powerful. I see no easy way to release the demon...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008614
text: We have no choice but to try a dirty method.{nl}We will need to use some corrupt energy sources to weaken the powerful divine power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008615
text: Defeat some monsters and bring their Corrupt Fangs.{nl}If we can weaken the power of the crystal with them, the demon will attempt to come out unaware that it's a trap.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008616
text: And that will be our last chance to eliminate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008617
text: Thank you for helping us thus far.{nl} Thank you for listening to the final wishes of the dead...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008618
text: I can feel the fangs' corrupt energy.{nl}Since I don't want you to get corrupted by them, let's finish this quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008619
text: Place the Corrupt Fangs near the seal. {nl}Then, our last mission will start.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008620
text: Everything is over...{nl}It is so fortunate that it ended even after our deaths

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008621
text: Thank you again. Please pass this crystal to my daughter's friend.{nl}Now, I will return to the goddesses together with my vassals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008622
text: If you meet my daughter, please tell her that I'm really sorry and that I love her...{nl}I hope you can pass my words to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008623
text: I wonder who's the girl who Legwyn tried to protect until his death?{nl}Nevertheless, I'm sure he'll rest in peace since his last mission has been fulfilled.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008624
text: I will return this to Erikas now.{nl}I really appreciate your help on behalf of my friend, Justina Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008625
text: I can tell you this at least.{nl}The keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen...{nl}I came out from the Astral Tower to protect them with my colleagues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008626
text: The preceding leader suspiciously died and Ignas became the next leader of the Astral Tower.{nl}Then, his tyranny started.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008627
text: He told everyone that the old rules of Lydia Schaffen were to be abandoned and that we should start over...{nl}He said to eliminate everything that was related to Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008628
text: But Lydia Schaffen was everything to the Astral Tower, she was the symbolic figure of all archers.{nl}After we regained consciousness, we ran away with our colleagues and the keepsakes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008629
text: Right now... I can hardly move due to my injury...{nl}But if I stay like this, the pursuers will find out about me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008630
text: I think we should move.{nl}Can you lure the pursuers so I can go to the Guoda Empty Lot?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008631
text: When we fire this disposable signal flare, they'll follow you.{nl}I'm counting on you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008632
text: As you lure them, I will move secretly.{nl}Let's meet at Guoda Empty Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008633
text: We were able to move safely due to your help.{nl}You seem like a good person so please receive this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008634
text: This is the book recorded about the Roxona Conflict.{nl}I am not sure whether you are interested, but please receive it as a token of my gratitude.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008635
text: Ah, I came up with a good idea when the pursuers ran towards the signal flare you fired.{nl}I'm going to make a trap by attaching a signal flare onto a bomb.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008636
text: That way, my colleagues will know that I'm here...{nl}Maybe it will also lure the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008637
text: To do so, we need something to make smoke with...{nl}I've used everything I had already so...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008638
text: Good. I saw Red Leaves as I ran away to Ruda Path. {nl}Can you collect them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008639
text: Many people left the Astral Tower as the tyranny of the leader Ignas continued.{nl}I tried my best to endure, but...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008640
text: I could not endure when he was trying to eliminate the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008641
text: How come I haven't thought about this. {nl}I should have set the traps already...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008642
text: Lastly, can you put this trap over there on Ruda Path?{nl}I'll hide here until I recover.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008643
text: My colleagues who were on the same side with me would also be chased by now.{nl}We were to meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008644
text: How did you get a hold of Irmantas' signal flares?{nl}You must be either brave or stupid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008645
text: Our brothers who were on my side are also being chased at the moment.{nl}We were gonna meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008646
text: So you're the one who helped Irmantas.{nl}Hmm. Are you hurt at all?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008647
text: I want to get together with Irmantas, but I'm in bad shape.{nl}One mistake, and we might interfere with each other...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008648
text: I'm going to go to Orsha from here.{nl}I'm sorry, but can you hand this over to him?{nl}Just tell him that it's taken from the Astral Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008649
text: I'll leave first.{nl}I also heard that Alina is also wandering around here...{nl}I hope you can find her if possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008650
text: Who are you?{nl}You don't seem to be Ignas' pursuer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008651
text: Ah... You've already met Irmantas and Grazina.{nl}That's good. I have to meet Irmantas right away since I have information to pass to him!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008652
text: I've seen it for sure.{nl}The demons were among the chasers of Ignas.{nl}They seemed to be close to each other.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008653
text: I am sure Ignas has colluded with the demons.{nl}I think eliminating the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen is a part of that collusion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008654
text: But, I was badly hurt as well...{nl}I am not sure if I can meet Irmantas again in my life.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008655
text: Can you defeat the monsters around here so I can get to him?{nl}If you reduce the number of monsters, then the possibility of getting detected by monsters will be lowered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008656
text: At first, I thought the pursuers that were following from the Astral Tower were subordinates of Ignas.{nl}But, they weren't. There's something we don't know yet!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008657
text: It's noisy around here so I guess the pursuers are near.{nl}We should move quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008658
text: If we just stay here, we'll get attacked without having notified anyone...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008659
text: Please take me to Irmantas.{nl}We have to tell Lydia Schaffen's followers that they're colluding with the demons!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008660
text: They'd be easy to defeat if I didn't have this injury...{nl}Where is Irmantas now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008661
text: No... I feel like I am going to lose consciousness if I walk little more.{nl}I feel like I am hearing the voice... of the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008662
text: After I ran away from the Astral Tower, I've never seen a person who is so kind and reliable like you.{nl}If something happens to me... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008663
text: Please tell Irmantas about the plot of Iganas with this letter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008664
text: Let's go. {nl}I will cheer myself up a bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008665
text: What happened?{nl}I think I've heard a some noise from down there...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008666
text: Illina... was attacked?{nl}How can Ignas do something without going crazy!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008667
text: I will follow the words of Lydia Schaffen on behalf of Illina.{nl}I will arrive at Orsha no matter what it takes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008668
text: To you... I want to give you some rewards since you've protected me until the end.{nl}I am sure Illina and Lydia Schaffen also want me to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008669
text: Please feed the Dark Blue Herbs to Agatas.{nl}As it gets detoxified, the weak body of a human will suffer severe pains, but that will be better than dying.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008670
text: You may leave after saving Agatas' life.{nl}You've saved my contractor, so in the name of the Demon Lord Hauberk, I will never forget you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008671
text: You are one with a strong spirit.{nl}When they rushed in, I thought my pursuit of revenge towards Giltine was at an end.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008672
text: They followed me here to obtain the power of my spirit.{nl}You and Agatas will be in danger...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008673
text: I don't think Agatas will regain consciousness for a while...{nl}I want you to do something for yourself and this innocent human.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008674
text: I have an idea on how to eliminate the head of the demons.{nl}Agatas has a piece of my spirit, please take care it for a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008675
text: In order to move my spirit piece, I need the crystal that possesses the demonic energy.{nl}Please get the shadow essence from the demons at Fiskavi Plains.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008676
text: With that power, I will be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008677
text: I can't quit this journey.{nl}Only I can eliminate Giltine and her servants from this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008678
text: As you ripped me off, I will get revenge on them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008679
text: This is good enough.{nl}If you help me, I promise you I will fight the demons for the sake of the goddesses and the humans.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008680
text: If you hate the demons, then you can trust me.{nl}The ones who've been betrayed will never forget it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008681
text: I decided this myself when my spirit was ripped into pieces.{nl}Even if I had to search for my spirit for thousands of years, I would never forget them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008682
text: The power of the spirit is gradually recovering with demonic power.{nl}The knowledge I've forgotten is gradually coming back.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008683
text: The leader of my pursuers should be searching for me now.{nl}For a fresh start on this new journey, I'll make them feel what it's like to be chased...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008684
text: Defeat the demons using the power of my soul stone.{nl}If you defeat them, I will use them as the source to call out my subordinates.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008685
text: Please find my hidden spirit from the unoccupied grave at Vadova Road.{nl}I couldn't be with Agatas, but it will be possible if I am with you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008686
text: For my revenge, I'll have to put my pursuers in danger.{nl}They must be hiding and watching me from somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008687
text: Do they still have their confidence?...{nl}Or are they afraid because I'm with a competent person like you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008688
text: Enough.{nl}Now is the time to find my shattered spirit again!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008689
text: Let's go to the Silaisvin Wilderness.{nl}If only I could combine my spirit's pieces together now, I'd be able to fight my pursuers directly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008690
text: If you're afraid I'll betray you when my spirit is back, then hold on to my soul stone.{nl}If I try to hurt you, destroy it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008691
text: But, I promise. {nl}That would never happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008692
text: 1st Page of the Roxona Conflict

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008693
text: Lydia Schaffen was a master of archery.{nl}She could even hit the feelers of a small insect.{nl}She stood in front of the great knight Ruklys.{nl}She held her breath and slowly drew her bow.{nl}It wasn't that long ago when Lydia Schaffen stood against Ruklys who used to be her lover.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008694
text: It was a day in the winter time.{nl}The tyranny of Kadumel King started getting extreme.{nl}Never-ending labor, starving people, corrupted landlords and a violent king...{nl}Ruklys could not stand what he was seeing in the kingdom.{nl}Revolt.{nl}Everyone in Roxona believed that Ruklys would win.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008695
text: The spring had come and Ruklys was still in high spirits.{nl}Ruklys obtained the information that there was a village where the thieves who'd collided with the kingdom soldiers were living.{nl}The soldiers were so corrupted...{nl}Ruklys decided to attack the village with his subordinates.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008696
text: He was just fighting against the thieves, but some unknown tension made Ruklys to hold his sword more firmly.{nl}A few of his colleagues fell down with the blood bursting out from their chests.{nl}At the same time, Ruklys and his subordinates ran towards the village.{nl}They didn't need to horn the pipe to let everyone know the battle has started.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008697
text: They possessed a decent level of archery and martial arts.{nl}The doubts which Ruklys had in his mind also disappeared.{nl}It was certain that they were not normal thieves...{nl}Ruklys held his sword on his other hand.{nl}He noticed something strange as the time passed by, but that was after many people died.{nl}In the darkness, the battle continued.{nl}Ruklys managed to win the battle at the end, but he felt somewhat uncomfortable.{nl}Long after the battle, he found out that the village was the hometown of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008698
text: The betrayed never forget.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008699
text: The things I've forgotten have returned to me, but don't worry.{nl}In my journey, you are a companion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008700
text: Please return my soul stone to me.{nl}I'll prepare to summon my subordinates.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008701
text: Let's defeat the leader together.{nl}The shadow essences you've collected revealed that he's hidden in Fiskavi Plains.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008702
text: Pull him out!{nl}I will be with you soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008703
text: If you are afraid, you can give up. I will complete my revenge alone.{nl}I just hope my contractor won't be hurt again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008704
text: Thanks for fighting with me, companion.{nl}I will be with you whenever you and your colleagues fall to despair and peril.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008705
text: Agatas carried out the contract diligently.{nl}I'll leave him and start my journey for revenge.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008706
text: The pieces of my spirit have been spread all over this world...{nl}I will reunite with them someday.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008707
text: If you meet them on your journey, please help them.{nl}My spirits will rely on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008708
text: This is the reward for the contract I've made with Agatas.{nl}Please put this in his pocket.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008709
text: Farewell, companion.{nl}I will never forget you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008710
text: I'll look for the whereabouts of my other spirits here.{nl}Companion, we will meet again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008711
text: I've put the spirit separation potion{nl}into my pocket.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008712
text: Oh, you're here. {nl}Let's trace back what was seen in the soul's memory. {nl}If we could revive the Ruklys' device, then it will guide us to the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008713
text: I know where the device of Ruklys is but we need its parts to fix it. {nl}I will check on the left side so you check on the right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008714
text: We'll need the parts to repair the device. {nl}Look for it on the right side.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008715
text: You're here? {nl}What did Eminent say? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008716
text: Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008717
text: I figured the location of the magic circle as written in the document. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008718
text: First, the magic circle under Slepti Watchtower. {nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008719
text: It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008720
text: Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008721
text: I saw the magic circles activate. Are you alright? {nl}What about Eminent? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008722
text: You defeated Eminent and obtained the revelation? {nl}Wow, you're way better than I thought... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008723
text: Anyway, I also feel like I've helped bring peace to the world and it beats my heart. {nl}But I still have some work to do. You know, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008724
text: I feel lucky to have met you among the many Revelators. {nl}You saved the world, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008725
text: I hope you stay safe, more than anything. {nl}May the goddess bless you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008726
text: Uh... Is that an army note? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008727
text: Right. Those belong to my colleagues. {nl}I don't know when it would be, but I want to send their keepsakes back to their hometown someday.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008728
text: Speaking of which, could you give me that army note?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008729
