text: Hopefully, I will be able to return to hometown together with the keepsakes of my colleagues. {nl}And my colleagues would surely want that too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008730
text: I will surely bring it back to hometown. {nl}My fellows will want that too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008731
text: Come to think of it, there is a holy relic of the goddess in Sielvar Prayer Room. {nl}I think offering a prayer to that holy relic will give us some answers. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008732
text: The dead that wakes up again are the problem. {nl}Why don't we purify them and keep them from waking up. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008733
text: We break their coffin before they wake up. {nl}Even for the dead ones, it will be better than forcibly waking up. {nl}What do you think? Will you help?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008734
text: You must be careful not to open the coffin lid when you break the coffin. {nl}When the coffin opens, the dead will jump out and attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008735
text: Good work. {nl}I'm sure they will also thank you for making them rest in peace. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008736
text: The problem is that holy relic. {nl}I can't approach anywhere near it because of the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008737
text: Maybe the grave keeper would know something about the holy relic and the barrier...{nl}But the grave keeper doesn't like me. We had a thing in the past. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008738
text: I met the grave keeper while working on purifying in the name of the goddess. {nl}I was actually helping the grave keeper but he was really mad about it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008739
text: The grave keeper stands at the end of Vepavi Corridor. {nl}Can you ask him about the holy relic of the goddess for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008740
text: A holy relic of the goddess? {nl}What? Are you teaming up with that rude Bokor? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008741
text: Get out of this grave site. {nl}Just thinking about that Bokor brings back my anger. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008742
text: That Bokor went around breaking the coffins of the dead saying they rise back! {nl}I don't understand how she can do such a thing with a sane mind!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008743
text: A holy relic that you can't even approach... {nl}I understand if they block the monsters or demons from getting close to it but even humans, that I don't understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008744
text: These people from the Order of the Tree of Truth or whatever were here first before Bokor Utara.{nl}They claimed that they were officially acknowledged by Goddess Zemyna or something?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008745
text: They said they'd carry out the will of Goddess Zemyna since this land was blessed by her. {nl}How could I have stopped that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008746
text: But since their arrival, the dead started to rise again. {nl}If that was on purpose, there couldn't have been an insult worse than that! {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008747
text: That was giving me a headache already, and then some Bokor comes along breaking the coffins. {nl}Breaking the coffins to purify the dead does not show any respect for the dead!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008748
text: That is not important. {nl}I want to calm all this fuss as soon as possible. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008749
text: If you help me, then I will believe that the Bokor didn't come here with bad intentions. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008750
text: Burying it back in the ground is not all. {nl}Pay respect to the dead using this match and cremate their bodies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008751
text: What are you waiting for! Move quickly! {nl}I cannot... handle it anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008752
text: Sorry for being sharp a while ago. I was a bit sensitive. {nl}Actually, having to point the blades to people whom I should {nl}take care of as a grave keeper is not something I am comfortable with. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008753
text: Thank you for giving them peace for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008754
text: Anyway, I know of the holy relic of the goddess that the Bokor mentioned.{nl}Those people from the Order of the Tree of Truth made it one day. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008755
text: Maybe that is why the dead rose... {nl}I had my suspicions but I couldn't approach it either. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008756
text: Ah! That's right. {nl}A long time ago, a Bokor and a Necromancer not in their sane minds used to come here secretly. {nl}They used to do insane experiments on the dead who are rested in here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008757
text: So my father learned how to make spell dolls from the guards nearby Klaipeda. {nl}He said if you put spells on the spell dolls, it finds the power {nl}that messes with the grave and destroys it or something? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008758
text: There is a chest in Kansias Stone Chamber with my father's belongings. {nl}There should be a spell doll in it. I don't think I can... make it through the bodies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008759
text: Our family has been grave keepers for generations. {nl}My father passed away during the disaster on Medzio Diena, so I have taken his place since then. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008760
text: I only learned over his shoulders... {nl}But I am the grave keeper of this place now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008761
text: Right! This is it.{nl}It wasn't used for a long time, but it should work well since father made it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008762
text: Done. Now go to the holy relic. {nl}If that holy relic is the reason behind the dead rising here, {nl}the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the holy relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008763
text: It's the spell doll that father used. {nl}If we do as my father used to do, then nothing will go wrong. Just as my father used to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008764
text: If the spell doll attacked the holy relic, then it means it detected the evil energy. {nl}But the spell doll was the one destroyed... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008765
text: Anyway, if the barrier broke, then your Bokor friend must be able to identify it. {nl}What about going back to that Bokor and asking her?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008766
text: Huh? You really broke the barrier? {nl}See, I knew the grave keeper would help. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008767
text: Actually, I was a bit suspicious myself. {nl}I felt a bad energy from the barrier considering that it {nl}was something that covered the goddess' holy relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008768
text: Anyway, since the barrier is now broken, let's go together. {nl}If it really is a holy relic of the goddess, then it will react to the prayer for the goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008769
text: Will you go ahead first? {nl}I will follow as soon as I'm ready for the prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008770
text: A spell doll... Evil energy... It really is suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008771
text: Thank you for saving me. I almost went to the goddess. {nl}I guess it is a lie that it was a holy relic of the goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008772
text: The relic of the goddess would not summon such a monster. {nl}I smell something fishy with that Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008773
text: Since the relic here wasn't real, we must find Goddess Zemyna's traces from somewhere else. {nl}It's alright. If something like this makes me frustrated, {nl}then I would not have kept my journey until here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008774
text: But before I leave, I must help the grave keeper and keep the fuss down. {nl}Now that the evil object is gone, my abilities will help keep this place calm. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008775
text: I want to show my sincerity to the grave keeper, but{nl}the image of him being angry at me holds me back. {nl}If you're on the way to the grave keeper, can you send him my sincerity as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008776
text: No wonder. That object wasn't that of the goddess. {nl}Using the name of the goddess into tricks like this. They have really crossed the line. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008777
text: I want to go and make them pay for it right away. {nl}However, as a grave keeper, keeping this place secure comes first. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008778
text: Was that Bokor's name Juta? {nl}Her ability powers will be of much help. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008779
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth went into Carlyle's Mausoleum. {nl}They said they will find something to carry out their order or something...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008780
text: If you ever go to Carlyle's Mausoleum, be careful about them. {nl}No matter how much I think about it, they are not in their right minds. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008781
text: If this is not it either, I can't help but be exhausted. {nl}Where do you think Goddess Zemyna has gone?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008782
text: Oh my god, the Divine Tree! {nl}The Divine Tree answered my prayers and sent someone to save me!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008783
text: Thank you. I thought death was the only option for me. {nl}I am Gintas, a follower of the Order of the Tree of Truth. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008784
text: We from the Order of the Tree of Truth, believe in the Divine Tree that stands tall in the kingdom. {nl}The Divine Tree is punishing the foolish people whose greed are soaring up high. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008785
text: Our order will be the appointed ones of the Divine Tree and guide the world in opening a new age. {nl}Right. Are you interested in joining our order? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008786
text: You are really strong, just as someone sent by the Divine Tree should be. {nl}Such strength should be used for something bigger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008787
text: I am collecting the spirit of the dead that rose back, as the order told me to. {nl}Margiris can read the memories of the dead when they were alive from the spirit stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008788
text: She finds the sins of the dead from their memories and forgives them to purify the sins in this world. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008789
text: I seem to have sprained my ankle while running away from the dead. I can't walk. {nl}Can you help me by any chance?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008790
text: I'm sure my prayers reached the Divine Tree to send you here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008791
text: Brother. {nl}By this, your sins have become lighter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008792
text: There is something you need to help us with. {nl}Think of it as a test and do your best. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008793
text: Carrying out sacred missions can get you to some trouble like just a while ago. {nl}You can also lose your life. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008794
text: Bodies of followers are brought to Seima Stone Chamber and their sins are purified. {nl}But because of Margiris' sacred abilities, some actually get their life back. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008795
text: The followers who rise back can't throw away their regrets in life and keep roaming around this place. {nl}Please use this flint to cremate the regrets and soulless bodies of the dead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008796
text: Margiris told us salvation is not something we can get so easily. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008797
text: This work purifies the sins of the foolish as well as ours. {nl}Those who die during the process is because their belief is not enough. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008798
text: Only those who stand it will earn salvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008799
text: Poor Gintas... {nl}You've dealt with the despair of death alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008800
text: Hey. If you are thinking of joining the order, don't bother. {nl}I, myself, used to be a follower of Margiris. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008801
text: I used to focus on purifying the sins of the dead like Gintas. {nl}I thought I would earn salvation. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008802
text: But one day, I saw the record books of Margiris. {nl}As far as I knew, those books keep a record of the process of purifying the sins of the dead. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008803
text: But it was actually a record of land ownership. {nl}And I also found out that he was looking for the record of Carlyle in here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008804
text: When I read until that part of the books, Margiris killed me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008805
text: Amazing. Did righteousness bring you here?{nl}Look. Defeating Margiris does not mean anything. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008806
text: If Margiris' mission fails, the Order will send someone else in here... {nl}And innnocent disciples will turn like this again. {nl}Nothing will change.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008807
text: If you really want to stop the Order, then you need to find out their true objective. {nl}Find the record of Carlyle first. {nl}You need to stop the order from getting their hands on Carlyle's records.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008808
text: What? {nl}You met a spirit of a believer in there? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008809
text: Ah. I think it's the believer that I know of. {nl}It's embodied with regrets, keeping it from leaving and just roams around. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008810
text: But don't worry. {nl}The souls that are forgiven will soon be with the Divine Tree. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008811
text: Thank you for helping until here. {nl}Here, let me give you a seal of Truth. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008812
text: Margiris is along the way to Carlyle's Mausoleum. {nl}If you bring this to him, he will acknowledge your contributions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008813
text: Don't tell Gintas about the story of Carlyle. {nl}He won't believe it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008814
text: I want to save you, but I don't know how...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008815
text: Who are you? {nl}Ah, it's Gintas' Seal of Truth. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008816
text: There are too many people who want to join the Order for Salvation. {nl}Anyway, welcome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008817
text: I think my ankle is getting better so a little more rest will do. {nl}Please be careful and may we meet again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008818
text: Sorry to ask you when you've just joined the Order, but there is something we need you to do. {nl}We are cleansing the sins of those who have died here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008819
text: I woke Carlyle's Spirit. {nl}He used to own some land of the kingdom when he was alive. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008820
text: He was not able to let go of that even after his death. {nl}He hid a document of sins somewhere in this gravesite. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008821
text: To save his spirit, we must find the hidden document and make him let go of his regrets from the time he was alive. {nl}But there seems to be greed left in him and he won't speak up about the whereabouts of the document. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008822
text: Can you try to persuade Carlyle? {nl}Since he doesn't know your face, try to act as if you're not part of the Order. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008823
text: If you find out the whereabouts of the document, I will bless you with the grace of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008824
text: You just won't give up, do you. {nl}I don't know who you are or what you want. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008825
text: Why are you pestering me when you won't even tell me what it is for?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008826
text: I will understand if you play rough with him in case he doesn't listen to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008827
text: What are you? {nl}Why are you disturbing other people's gravesites? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008828
text: I have lived my life honestly.{nl}And you think I have hidden some document with the record of my sins?{nl}Stop speaking nonsense and go away!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008829
text: If you are really on the goddess' side, then you have no reason to stand seeing something that disgraces her name. {nl}What are you waiting for? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008830
text: Such awful people. {nl}Setting that up as a holy relic... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008831
text: I think that seal has weakened the energy of that thing. {nl}It must have thought that we're on the same side. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008832
text: Anyway, since you've taken care of that horrible thing, I will believe what you say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008833
text: No wonder it was suspicious. That leader wasn't human! {nl}Right, that thing wasn't human... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008834
text: Why are they making such a fuss in this grave. What are they after?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008835
text: After hearing your story, it seems that they are after {nl}the ownership of a manor in the Kaliss province. {nl}There is a copy of the list of manor owners that I used to handle when I was alive. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008836
text: They must have wanted to get their hands on that copy and use it to make {nl}false testimony claiming that the lands in Kaliss belong to them. {nl}Fortunately, it seems like they were not able to find it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008837
text: I expected something like this to happen and hid the list in Seima Stone Chamber. {nl}Can you gather the scattered list of manor owners?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008838
text: The manor ownership is supposed to be managed by the next generation of deputies... {nl}But he was not someone to be trusted so I requested that the manuscript {nl}of records be buried with me when I die in my will. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008839
text: He may look like a good guy but even as a public official, {nl}he had private meetings with unknown people... {nl}And I caught him forging records at one point.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008840
text: It gives me the chills thinking that they could have found the records. {nl}If they are preying on each province records like this, then not only Kaliss {nl}but the whole kingdom will fall under the hands of the demons soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008841
text: Good. {nl}Those are the records of the manor owners in the Kaliss province.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008842
text: Now, we have to engrave the spell doll with the energy that messes the grave. {nl}I saw the site where they cremated the dead a while ago {nl}and there was a black crystal that I've never seen before. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008843
text: I'm sure the black crystals are the traces of evil magic that woke up the dead. {nl}Can you get more of it from the dead that rose?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008844
text: Ah, I will take care of the fallen dead bodies. {nl}For now there is something more important to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008845
text: Yeah, this will be enough. {nl}I will prepare the spell doll right away. Hold on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008846
text: What? You are not a follower of that Order? {nl}Are you telling me to believe you? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008847
text: Alright. {nl}Then destroy that holy relic that they claim to have received the blessings of the goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008848
text: I have never seen a blessed holy relic fume evil energy. {nl}I think that relic is messing this gravesite.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008849
text: I brought the Kaliss manor owners list to my grave to stop the corruption of the next generation. {nl}But come to think of it, this record has now become useless. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008850
text: Since they will search for this document again. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008851
text: I will give this record to you. If you make sure destroy it, I will be able to lay in peace again. {nl}Please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008852
text: It doesn't make sense no matter how much I think of it. {nl}How did they find this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008853
text: Manor ownership is actually a very sensitive matter so the records are not really known to public. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008854
text: Only the current deputy knows that I have handled the records. {nl}How did they know about this place...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008855
text: It's strange. {nl}To have a barrier blocking people from approaching the holy relic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008856
text: Even if it is sacred, if that is how it is, no one can approach it. {nl}I mean, it's as if it doesn't want anybody to come near it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008857
text: Place this Evil Thoughts Stone then defeat the dead nearby.{nl}The souls of the dead will be absorbed into this stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008858
text: This cleanses the sins of the dead and yours too. {nl}Also, Margiris will be very happy about it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_008859
text: Good luck then.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009118
text: As the sanctum destroyed, someone appeared. Who is this person? Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009119
text: Go to Albinas and check.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009120
text: Damijonas is angry and is telling that their sanctum is not polluted and the red aura started to appear even before the pollution. When a person with an ill will touches on it, it would lure the monsters neaby so he is angry who said such thing. You better tell this to Albinas and bring him over here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009121
text: Restore the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009122
text: Albinas wasn't there. Please first go back to Damijonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009123
text: Obtain the materials for the repair

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009124
text: Damijonas is saying there's no one who has told about us like that so he can't trust. He has suggested to restore the sanctum first. If you obtain some stones that can be used to restore the sanctum, bring them to Nestos Camp. They will turn them into the materials for the restoration.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009125
text: Ask Eduinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009126
text: Acquired all the stones that could be used for materials. As Damijonas told you, ask Eduinas to polish them to be used for the restoration of the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009127
text: Talk to Eduinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009128
text: You would have to explain what has happened until now to Eduinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009129
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009130
text: It seems that Eduinas is not feeling well after hearing that the sanctum has been destroyed. He would polish the materials since Damijonas requested so, but he told you to defeat the monsters that are wandering around the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009131
text: Return to Eduinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009132
text: It seems that you've defeated enough monsters. Now, go back to Eduinas and ask him whether the materials are all ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009133
text: Defeat the monsters around the camp

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009134
text: Return to Damijonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009135
text: Since you've obtained the materials, return to Damijonas and restore the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009136
text: Restore the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009137
text: Now, restore the sanctum with Damijonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009138
text: Fortunately, you were able to restore the sanctum. Since Damijonas seems okay now, talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009139
text: Go to the camp of Anastopa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009140
text: As Damijonas has told you, let's go to the camp of Anastos if there is someone called Albinas in Anastos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009141
text: Retrieve the research materials

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009142
text: It seems that you will have to bring important materials to Gedas to obtain some information regarding Albinas. Please find the research materials from the monsters nearby. You would be able to obtain them by defeating them, but it will be helpful to press the space bar key to check which monsters has many research documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009143
text: Bring research documents

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009144
text: You've found all research materials which Gedas was looking for. Now, bring them to Gedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009145
text: Talk to Gedas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009146
text: Talk to Gedas who seems to be relaxed after finding all the materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009147
text: Find the materials for the danger signal bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009148
text: Gedas told you that in order to find the identity of Albinas, he would investigate the true nature behind him. When you send your colleagues to investigate the true nature, signal bombs are needed in case they fall in danger so you were asked to obtain the materials for the signal bombs. Obtain Flame Bomb powder which is a material to make signal bombs from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009149
text: Return to Gedas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009150
text: Acquired Flame Powders. Now, return to Gedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009151
text: Obtain Flame Powders

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009152
text: Ask Gedas about signal bombs and the investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009153
text: Talk to Gedas about more about Anastos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009154
text: The Final Conclusion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009155
text: While hoping for the investigation of Fabijus goes smooth, talk with Gedas about various matters. You may obtain some clues about Albinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009156
text: Meet Barte

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009157
text: Gedas wants you to meet Barte who has arrived here recently since he can't eliminate the feeling of discomfort. Ask her if there's anything she has seen while coming here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009158
text: Talk to Barte

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009159
text: Talk to Barte if she has the information regarding Albinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009160
text: Obtain some clues from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009161
text: Barte told you that she saw someone looking at the leather engraved with full of letters and then throw it onto the ground after ripping it off. Go to the place where Barte told you and defeat monsters to obtain the pieces of the leather.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009162
text: Bring the pieces of the leather to Barte

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009163
text: It seems that you obtained enough pieces of the leather. Bring them to Barte.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009164
text: Obtain %s by defeating the monster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009165
text: Defeat the monster and obtain the pieces of the leather

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009166
text: Ask what you should do now

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009167
text: Let Gedas know

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009168
text: According to what Barte has told you, that mysterious man is a demon and he came here to execute the plan of Baiga which is to create a division among humans. Tell this to Gedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009169
text: Talk to Gedas and discuss with him what you should do from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009170
text: Ask for help to Eduinas of Nestos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009171
text: Gedas told you that you would need the help of Nestos in order to face against demons like Albinas. While going to save Fabijus, ask for the help of Eduinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009172
text: Go save Fabijus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009173
text: Let's go to the place where you met Albinas for the first time to save Fabijus and defeat Albinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009174
text: Defeat Albinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009175
text: As you poured the divine water, Albinas has turned into Fire Lord! Due to the effect of the divine water, HP of Fire Lord has been reduced! Do not miss this chance and defeat Fire Lord!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009176
text: You've defeated Albinas who has shown the true nature. Tell this to Gedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009177
text: Defeat Fire Lord

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009178
text: Talk to Leopoldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009179
text: Meet Leopoldas at the upper side of Kedorlaomer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009180
text: Talk to Leopoldas more

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009181
text: Talk to Leopoldas who is introducing himself as the new leader of Kedorlaomer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009182
text: Talk to Gerda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009183
text: The newcomers who Leopoldas talked about are over there. Talk to Gerda among them. He may have some matters that need your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009184
text: Put the warning sign

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009185
text: Gerda told you that you would have to put warning signs or notice boards on various locations. Help her to put the notice board for the excavation of the sacred objects at the lower side.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009186
text: Return to Gerda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009187
text: As Gerda told you, you've put in the notice board at the lower side. Now, return to Gerda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009188
text: Talk to Serapinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009189
text: It seems that Serapinas needs some help. Talk to him what he needs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009190
text: Promote the merchants to the beginners.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009191
text: Serapinas says that she's in charge of promotion for the Merchant Alliance. Now go and use the Kedorlaomer Merchant Alliance Scroll on a new Revelator and promote the Alliance 1 time. The new Revelator will recieve Kedorlaomer benefits. Only Revelators between Lv. 1 and Lv. 10 can receive the benefits once. Ask the Revelator if they've received the buff before since the reuse time is quite long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009192
text: Return to Serapinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009193
text: You've completed promoting for Kedorlaomer. Go back to Serapinas and let her know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009194
text: Collect the sacred objects

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009195
text: Go meet Jurate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009196
text: Go meet Jurate who is responsible for collecting the sacred objects

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009197
text: Obtain sacred objects

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009198
text: Let's get some sacred objects from the place where Jurate pointed. It will be really appreciated if you could get rid of some monsters on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009199
text: Talk to Jurate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009200
text: Acquired the sacred objects Jurate was talking about. Bring this to Jurate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009201
text: Defeat the monsters on your way to collect the sacred objects

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009202
text: Ask Jurate if there's anything you could help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009203
text: Defeat the monsters and gather the sacred objects

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009204
text: The places where the sacred objects should be are full of monsters. Defeat them and get the sacred objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009205
text: Return to Jurate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009206
text: Acquired the pieces that look like sacred objects, but in order to find out what they are, you must return to Jurate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009207
text: Obtain %s by defeating the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009208
text: Defeat the monsters and obtain damp pieces of papers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009209
text: Let's listen more about collecting sacred objects

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009210
text: Investigate the area where the sacred objects are likely to be

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009211
text: Investigate the area using the detector which Jurate gave to you. You will know the direction when you use the detector at the marked place on the map.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009212
text: Go meet Jurate to report

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009213
text: You've succeeded excavating the sacred object using the detector. Bring the sacred object to Jurate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009214
text: Restore the records of the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009215
text: Talk to Margellius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009216
text: Meet Margellius of Kedorlaomer. He seems that he needs some help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009217
text: Bring the records of the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009218
text: Please bring back the records which the monsters took away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009219
text: You've found all of the records. Bring them to Margellius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009220
text: Defeat the monsters and obtain the pieces of the records of the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009221
text: Ask Margellius if there are any other things you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009222
text: Obtain the body fluid from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009223
text: In order to restore the records of the merchants, you would need a special dye. To make that dye, you need some fresh body fluid from the monsters. When you put the traps near the monsters, the monsters will get caught allowing you to obtain the body fluid. Remember the monsters will die quickly when they get caught by the traps so you should pull them out fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009224
text: Bring them to Margellius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009225
text: Acquired all of the body fluids from the monsters. Bring them to Margellius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009226
text: Construct the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009227
text: Talk to Antanas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009228
text: Talk to Antanas at Genar Field

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009229
text: Obtain the materials to construct the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009230
text: The Rhud Order is concentrating on their work while waiting for the goddesses to appear again at Genar Field. Among them, what Antanas is doing is constructing for the sanctum. To help him, obtain the materials to make the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009231
text: Return to Antanas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009232
text: Acquired all materials to make the sanctum. Return to Antanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009233
text: Since you've obtained all materials, ask him if he can make the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009234
text: Go meet the blacksmith at Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009235
text: Antanas told you that she needs many tools besides the materials. Borrow the tools from the blacksmith and the Equipment Merchant at Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009236
text: Talk to the blacksmith at Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009237
text: Ask where you should go to obtain a chisel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009238
text: Go meet the equipment merchant at Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009239
text: Go meet the blacksmith at Orsha to obtain the chisel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009240
text: Since you've borrowed all the things you need, return to Antanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009241
text: Ask Antanas what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009242
text: Make the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009243
text: Make the sanctum according to Antanas' instructions with the materials you've obtained.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009244
text: It seems that you've made the sanctum well. Now is the time to say goodbye and leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009245
text: The list of goods that are needed for the compilation of the scriptures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009246
text: Talk to Giedra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009247
text: Let's talk with Giedra, who is another member of the Rhud Order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009248
text: Obtain a trasparent shell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009249
text: Giedra is collecting various goods to make the scriptures, but he now needs the transparent shell of the monsters. Defeat the monsters and collect the tranparent shells.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009250
text: Return to Giedra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009251
text: Since you've obtained all of the transparent shells, bring them to Giedra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009252
text: Ask Giedra if there are any more things he needs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009253
text: Obtain the leather string

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009254
text: Let's obtain the leather string that is needed to make the scriptures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009255
text: Acquired all the leather strings. Bring them to Giedra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009256
text: The records of the ancient sages

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009257
text: Talk to Kestas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009258
text: Go meet Kestas who is a member of the Rhud Merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009259
text: Retrieve the records from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009260
text: Help Kestas who feels uneasy by retrieving the records of Rhud merchants from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009261
text: Hand over the records of the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009262
text: It seems that you've collected enough records which the monsters took away. Hand them over to Kestas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009263
text: Ask Kestas if there are more things you could help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009264
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in to retrieve the records

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009265
text: Talk to Kestas more about the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009266
text: Defeat the monsters that are trying to attack Kestas and steal the records

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009267
text: Talk to Amanda at the habitant area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009268
text: Defeat demon monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009269
text: Amanda told you that there's some special force being detected from the Monocle. Defeat the demons and find the special force.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009270
text: Look for mushrooms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009271
text: The Old Manager said in order to pass the magical crystal safely, you need to make a certificate. Obtain Mushroom which is one of the materials to make the certificate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009272
text: Leave the note so Amanda can make the certificate alone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009273
text: The Past of the Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009274
text: Obtain the eggs of Rajatad

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009275
text: Obtain the eggs of Rajatad

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009276
text: Defeat the demons and obtain the head bones of the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009277
text: Defeat the demons and obtain the head bones of the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009278
text: Absorb the vitalities using the bones that have magical power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009279
text: Absorb the vitalities by setting the bones with magical power near the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009280
text: Bring the spirits after restraining them

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009281
text: After restraining the spirits, please take them to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009282
text: Bring the spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009283
text: Use the Restraint Token to restrain the spirit and take it to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009284
text: Talk to the Dievdirbys Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009285
text: Set the owl sculpture and guide the spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009286
text: Set the owl sculpture at the location where the stray spirit is at. After setting up the owl sculpture, please take the stray spirit to the sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009287
text: Look at Eminent using the Monocle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009288
text: Use the Monocle to look at Eminent and check the identity of Eminent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009289
text: Talk to Eminent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009290
text: Talk to Eminent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009291
text: You need parts to fix the device that Ruklys destroyed. Find the parts from battlefield defense device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009292
text: Prepare

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009293
text: Talk to Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009294
text: Collect demon's blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009295
text: You need to rewrite the erased writings with the demon's blood. Collect the demon's blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009296
text: Write on the pole

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009297
text: Write on the pole with the demon's blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009298
text: Get %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009299
text: Find the parts of weakening device from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009300
text: Pull out the Demon's Flag

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009301
text: The magic circle is not able to activate properly because of the demon's flag near it. Pull out the flag to activate the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009302
text: Activate the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009303
text: Activate the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009304
text: Talk to Premier Eminent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009305
text: Talk to Premier Eminent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009306
text: Fix the device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009307
text: Fix the device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009308
text: Defeat Mandara

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009309
text: Check the device and find the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009310
text: Check the device and find the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009311
text: You have obtained the revelation. Talk to Amanda at the hidden room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009312
text: Obtain the stone which you can write the whereabouts of Amanda on

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009313
text: Obtain the stone which you can write the whereabouts of Amanda on

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009314
text: Talk to the grave thief, Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009315
text: Look for the diary of the soldiers of Ruklys

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009316
text: Look for the diary of the soldiers of Ruklys

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009317
text: What you heard from the Old Manager are suspicious. Talk to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009318
text: Move to the battlefield of the fortress of the great earth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009319
text: Talk to Premier Eminent after moving to the fortress of the great earth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009320
text: Irmantas who is a member of Peretory Hills needs someone's help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009321
text: Defeat the one who chased Irmantas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009322
text: As Irmantas shot the signal flare, the chasers appeared. Defeat the chasers and protect Irmantas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009323
text: You've defeated all the chasers. Talk to Irmantas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009324
text: Cutting the Tail

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009325
text: Irmantas wants you to give the chasers the slip. Talk to Irmantas again. Talk to Irmantas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009326
text: Lure the chasers using the signal flare and defeat them

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009327
text: To help Irmantas to move to Guota Empty Lot safely, use the signal flare to defeat the lured monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009328
text: As the chasers were paying attention to another matter, Irmantas hid himself in Guota Empty Lot. Meet Irmantas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009329
text: Irmantas came up with a good idea after seeing the signal flare. Talk to Irmantas again to ask what's on his mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009330
text: Irmantas asked you to collect Red Leaves from Ruda Path that can be used for materials to make the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009331
text: Hand them over to Irmantas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009332
text: Acquired enough Red Leaves which Irmantas requested to you. Hand them over to Irmantas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009333
text: Irmantas created the signal flare trap using the materials you've obtained. Now, talk with Irmantas on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009334
text: Defeat the chasers that were lured to the signal flare trap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009335
text: Irmantas asked you to lure the chasers by putting the signal flare trap across Ruda Path and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009336
text: A Dead End

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009337
text: You can hear some voice calling out for you somewhere

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009338
text: Hand over the goods to Irmantas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009339
text: Hand over the goods to Irmantas which Grazina requested to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009340
text: Grazina asked you to look for Illina. Irmantas saw her from down there so go meet Illina at the region below.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009341
text: Alina told you that there is some important facts which she should tell Irmantas. Talk to Alina again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009342
text: Alina asked you to defeat the monsters nearby so she can run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009343
text: You have defeated the monsters nearby so Alina can run away. Return to Alina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009344
text: Alina is ready to go to Irmantas. Talk to Alina again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009345
text: Escort Alina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009346
text: Escort Alina so she can go to Irmantas safely

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009347
text: It seems that Alina's injury worsened and she collapsed on the spot. Talk to Alina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009348
text: Alina's injury worsened and she collapsed. Talk to Alina again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009349
text: Defeat the chasers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009350
text: As you were heading towards the last destination with Alina, the chasers appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009351
text: Tell Irmantas about her death and hand over her goods

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009352
text: Defeat Werewolf

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009353
text: Talk to Pilgrim Agatas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009354
text: Pilgrim Agatas is waiting for someone's help at Sutatis Trade Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009355
text: Collect Black Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009356
text: The one who introduced himself as Demon Lord Hauberk is doing his best to save Pilgrim Agatas. Collect black herbs to release the paralysis poison from Agatas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009357
text: Hand it over to Demon Lord Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009358
text: As Demon Lord Hauberk requested, you've collected enough Dark Blue Herbs. Return to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009359
text: The journey to find myself

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009360
text: Demon Lord Hauberk wants to save his contractor Agatas. Ask Demon Lord Hauberk how you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009361
text: Detoxify the Pilgrim Agatas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009362
text: The status of Pilgrim Agatas is getting worse. Feed him the Dark Blue Herbs you've collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009363
text: You have protected Pilgrim Agatas and Demon Lord Hauberk from the demons. Talk to Hauberk again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009364
text: Demon Lord Hauberk told you that the demons will be threats to you and Agatas. Talk to Demon Lord Hauberk again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009365
text: Collect the Shadow Essences

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009366
text: Demon Lord Hauberk told you that in order to defeat the head of the demons, you should pass the soul stones which Pilgrim Agatas has to other people. Collect the Shadow Essences that can move the soul stones from Fiskavi Plains from the demons and hand them over to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009367
text: As Demon Lord Hauberk requested, you collected enough Shadow Essences. Hand them over to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009368
text: Obtain Shadow Essences

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009369
text: Demon Lord Hauberk wants to defeat you, Agatas and the head of the demons that are chasing after Hauberk. Talk to the Demon Lord Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009370
text: Help Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009371
text: Demon Lord Hauberk told you that in order to defeat the demons that are chasing after him, he needs the help of his subordinates. To help Hauberk to call out his subordinates, neutralize the monsters at Badova Highway and help Hauberk to absorb them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009372
text: As Demon Lord Hauberk requested to you, you've used his damaged soul stone to call out his subordinates. Talk to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009373
text: Demon Lord Hauberk is trying to combine the spirits again to defeat the demons that are chasing him. Ask Hauberk how you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009374
text: Help the reunion of Hauberk at Silaisvin Wilderness

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009375
text: Demon Lord Hauberk asked you to protect him while he combines with other spirits. Help Hauberk so he can successfully combine the spirits at the Ownerless Grave at Salaisvin Wilderness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009376
text: The reunion ritual of Hauberk has succeeded. Ask him about the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009377
text: Demon Lord Hauberk is ready to defeat the head of the demons that are chasing him. Talk to Hauberk what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009378
text: Defeat the boss of the chasers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009379
text: Demon Lord Hauberk told you that he is now ready to defeat the boss of the chasers. Pull out the boss of the chaser from the suspicious device at Fiskavi Plains and ask him to defeat it together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009380
text: You've defeated the boss of the chasers. Talk to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009381
text: Defeat the boss monster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009382
text: Hauberk is getting ready to say goodbye.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009383
text: Hauberk told you that he needs to keep the promise he made with Agatas so he asked you to hand over the spirit separating potion to him. If Agatas is still unconscious, put it inside his pocket.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009384
text: Endless Deals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009385
text: Talk to Squire Williya

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009386
text: Squire Williya and Pardoner Erikas are having disputes at Mochia Forest. Talk to Squire Williya what's going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009387
text: Collect Blue Paint

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009388
text: Squire Williya told you that as a return for handing over the Scroll of the Dead, Pardoner Erikas wants Blue Paint. Defeat the monsters at Apgaudin Three Ways and collect Blue Paint.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009389
text: Hand them over to Pardoner Erikas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009390
text: Acquired enough Blue Paint which Pardoner Erikas has requested. Hand over the Blue Paint to Erikas and receive the scroll for the deads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009391
text: Squire Williya wants to wake up Gailus Legwyn with the Scroll of the Dead and listen to the truth. Talk to Squire Williya.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009392
text: Look for the spirit of Gailus Legwyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009393
text: Squire Williya told you that she can't trust Pardoner Erikas. Use the scroll for the dead which you've gotten from Erikas in front of the unknown tombstone at Mires Grave to look for the spirit of Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009394
text: Talk to the spirit of Gailus Legwyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009395
text: You've found the spirit of Gailus Legwyn. Talk to his spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009396
text: Gailus Legwyn wants to know why you woke him up. Talk to Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009397
text: Collect the Spirit Incenses from Mochia Fields

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009398
text: Since the Blessing Crystal is sealing the Kartas Hunter, Gailus Legwyn told you that you can't find the crystal again unless you defeat that demon. To wake up the vassals of Legwyn family who would face against the Kartas Hunter, please collect the Spirit Incenses from Mochia fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009399
text: Hand them over to Gailus Legwyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009400
text: You've collected enough Spirit Incense. Hand them over to Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009401
text: You are ready to wake up the vassals of the Legwyn Family. Talk to the spirit of Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009402
text: Look for the vassals of the Legwyn Family

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009403
text: Gailus Legwyn told you that in order to fight the Kartas Hunter, you need help from his vassals. Use the Spirit Incenses at the gravestones in Kruva Stream Bank to look for the spirits of the vassals of Legwyn Family.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009404
text: You've found three vassals of the Legwyn family. Go back to the spirit of Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009405
text: Tragedy of the Legwyn Family

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009406
text: The spirit of Gailus Legwyn told you to prepared yourself before you face the Kartas Hunter. Talk to the spirit of Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009407
text: Collect Corrupt Fangs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009408
text: The spirit of Gailus Legwyn told you that the sacred powers of the Blessing Crystal is too strong so it will be hard to pull out the Kartas Hunter from the seal. To weaken the sacred power, hunt the monsters nearby and collect Corrupt Fangs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009409
text: You've collected enough Corrupt Fangs. Ask the spirit of Gailus Lewgyn about the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009410
text: Obtained Corrupt Fangs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009411
text: You are ready to defeat the Kartas Hunter. Talk to the spirit of Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009412
text: Defeat Kartas Hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009413
text: You are ready to defeat the Kartas Hunter. Help the spirit of Gairyus Legwyn and his vassals to defeat the Kartas Hunter and retrieve the Blessing crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009414
text: You've defeated the Kartas Hunter. Talk to the spirit of Gailus Legwyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009415
text: It seems that the spirit of Gailus Legwyn resolved all his regrets. Talk to the spirit of Gailus again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009416
text: Hand it over to Squire Williya

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009417
text: The spirit of Gailus Legwyn asked you to hand over the Blessing crystal and the stories you've heard so far. Pass Gailus Legwyn's message to Squire Williya.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009418
text: Mortimer is looking at the military scrip you are holding. Talk to Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009419
text: Collect the old military scrip

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009420
text: Mortimer wants to send the keepsakes of his colleagues to the hometown. When you find military scrips while defeating the monsters around here, pass them to Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009421
text: You better give the old military scrip to Mortimer. Hand it over to Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009422
text: Talk to Bokor Juta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009423
text: Bokor Juta seems to be in a trouble. Talk to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009424
text: Defeat the undead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009425
text: Bokor Juta came here to look for Goddess Zemyna, but the place is full of the dead. Defeat the dead who are disturbing the praying of Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009426
text: Report to Juta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009427
text: You've defeated all the dead as requested by Bokor Juta. Go back to Juta and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009428
text: You've defeated all the dead as requested by Juta. Talk to Juta to ask if there's anything more you can help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009429
text: Destroy the coffins of the dead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009430
text: Bokor Juta wants you to get rid of the dead. Destroy the coffins at the Room of Eternal Sleep and Kaulu Corridor so they can't wake up again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009431
text: You've destroyed all the coffins as requested by Juta. Return to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009432
text: It seems that Bokor Juta has something to say about the holy relic of the goddess. Talk to Bokor Juta again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009433
text: Bokor Juta can't get near the sanctum because of the barrier near there. She asked Grave Keeper Sigis, on how to break the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009434
text: Grave Keeper Sigis doesn't like Bokor Juta. Talk to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009435
text: Cremate the resurrected dead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009436
text: Sigis told you that he will believe your words if you can find eternal sleep for the dead. Defeat the dead and cremate them using the matches Sigis gave to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009437
text: You've cremated the resurrected dead. Return to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009438
text: The holy relic Bokor Juta is talking about was made by the Order of the Tree of Truth and she suspects that might be the reason why the dead woke up. To confirm this, Sigis asked you to pull out the spell dolls from the box of the grave keeper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009439
text: Hand over the Grave Keeper's Spell Doll to Sigis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009440
text: You've found the Grave Keeper's Spell Doll. Hand it over to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009441
text: You've engraved the trace of the evil magic onto the Grave Keeper's Spell Doll. Ask Sigis how to use the spell doll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009442
text: Investigate the goddess' holy relic which was created by the Order of the Tree of Truth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009443
text: You are ready to look at the holy relic of the goddess which was created by the Believers of the Order of the Tree of Truth. Bring the spell doll and check the holy relic of the goddess at Sielvar Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009444
text: You've destroyed the barrier, but when you got near the holy relic, the spell doll was destroyed. Return to Sigis and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009445
text: Sigis asked you to tell Bokor Juta that the spell doll was destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009446
text: Investigate the holy relic which was created by the Order of the Tree of Truth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009447
text: Juta told you that she will take a look at it herself as she heard the barrier was unlocked. Go there first and wait for Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009448
text: You've defeated the Abomination that appeared from the holy relic of the goddess. Talk to Juta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009449
text: Juta wants to make this place stable by helping Sigis. Tell Sigis about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009450
text: Investigate Carlyle's Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009451
text: Grave Keeper Sigis told you that the members of the Order of the Tree of Truth went to Carlyle's Mausoleum. Investigate Carlyle's Mausoleum to find out what they are planning.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009452
text: One man is running away from the resurrected deads. You better rescue them fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009453
text: The man who you saved from the danger was the member of the Order. Talk to Gintas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009454
text: After setting up the stone with evil thoughts, defeat the dead to fill the stone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009455
text: Gintas asked you to join and fill the stone. It seems like a good opportunity to infiltrate into the Order. After setting up the stone, defeat the deads to collect the thoughts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009456
text: Hand over the stone to Gintas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009457
text: You've filled the stone fully. Hand over the stone to Gintas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009458
text: It seems that Gintas has one more thing to request to you. Talk to Gintas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009459
text: Cremate the believers who has resurrected

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009460
text: Gintas told you that the Believers who once were brothers can't forget their lives before deathes and sometimes resurrect. Defeat the resurrected Believers at Seima Stone Chamber and use a flint to cremate the bodies of the resurrected Believers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009461
text: Talk to the Believer's Spirit that appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009462
text: As you were burning the resurrected Believer, the spirit of the Believer appeared. It seems that the spirit has something to say to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009463
text: Talk to the spirit of the Believer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009464
text: As you cremated the dead bodies of the Believer, the spirit of the Believer appeared again. Talk to the spirit of the Believer that appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009465
text: You've taken care of the corpses of Believers as requested by Gintas. Return to Gintas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009466
text: Talk to Margiris

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009467
text: Acquired the token of truth from Gintas. When you take it to Margiris, you will be able to enter the Order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009468
text: Meet with Margiris after you are acknowledged as a member of the Order by Gintas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009469
text: You've met Margiris who is the leader of the Order. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009470
text: Interrogate Carlyle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009471
text: Carlyle refuses to talk with the Order

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009472
text: Margiris told you that Carlyle is not saying anything so he asked you to pretend that you are not a Believer and interrogate Carlyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009473
text: Carlyle's Test

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009474
text: Talk to Carlyle's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009475
text: Margiris asked you pretend that you are not a member of the Order and talk with Carlyle's Spirit. Talk to Carlyle's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009476
text: Destroy the Holy Relic of the Order

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009477
text: Carlyle doesn't believe that you are not a member of the Order. Carlyle asked you to prove that you are not the member by destroying the holy relic of the Order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009478
text: You've destroyed the holy relic of the Order. Talk to Carlyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009479
text: As Carlyle requested to you, you destroyed the holy relic of the Order. Talk to Carlyle's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009480
text: Defeat Margiris that has shown its true nature

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009481
text: Margiris has shown his true nature as he saw the holy relic of the Order being destroyed. Defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009482
text: You've defeated Margiris that has shown its true nature. Talk to Carlyle's Spirit that appeared again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009483
text: You've defeated Margiris that has shown its true nature. To find out the plot of the Order, talk to Carlyle with the information you've collected so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009484
text: Collect the list of the owners who own a hidden manor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009485
text: Carlyle's Spirit told you that what the Order wants is the list of the ones who have manors which he hid. Carlyle asked you to find the list of the ones who have manors which he hid at Seima Stone Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009486
text: Hand over the lists of the manor owners to Carlyle's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009487
text: You've collected all the lists of the ones who have manors that were scattered across the burial chamber of Carlyle. Hand them over to Carlyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009488
text: Sigis brought the spell doll. Talk to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009489
text: Collect the traces of the evil magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009490
text: Sigis told you that you should make the spell doll to realize the evil magic. Defeat the dead one and collect the traces of the evil magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009491
text: You've collected all the traces of the evil magic which Sigis requested from you. Talk to Sigis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009492
text: Obtain %s from the resurrected dead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009493
text: You've collected all the documents that were scattered at the burial chamber of Carlyle. Talk to Carlyle's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009494
text: Burn the Manor Owner List

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009495
text: Carlyle's Spirit asked you to burn the list of the ones who own manors. You will need a bonfire to burn the list. Light up the bonfire and burn the list.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009496
text: Talk to Druid Leja

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009497
text: You see someone injured in the forest. Talk to her and obtain some information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009498
text: Collect the herbs which Druid Leja asked you to collect

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009499
text: Druid Leja told you that she was injured while chasing after the ferrets that ran away after stealing the food. To help Leja's recovery, please obtain some herbs from the location where she told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009500
text: Hand over the herbs to Druid Leja

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009501
text: Acquired all the herbs as requested by Druid Leja. Return to Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009502
text: Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009503
text: Mysterious Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009504
text: Meeting with the mysterious girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009505
text: You are being lured to a mysterious power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009506
text: You've met a mysterious girl who's been chased by the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009507
text: As you were returning with the herbs which Druid Leja asked you to collect, you've met the mysterious girl who's been chased by the demons. Tell Leja about the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009508
text: As you were returning with the herbs which Druid Leja asked you to collect, you've met the mysterious girl who's been chased by the demons. Tell Leja about the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009509
text: Obtain the food stolen by the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009510
text: For the villagers, please retrieve the food which the ferrets stole. When the HP of a ferret falls below 50%, you can use the paralysis powders to retrieve the food which the ferrets stole.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009511
text: Obtain %s from the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009512
text: Talk to the Village Headman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009513
text: As you were returning with the food, you encountered the mysterious girl again. The girl ran away as she noticed some movements of villagers. Go meet the Village Headman with the food.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009514
text: Destroy the demonic totem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009515
text: You need to obtain information regarding the mysterious girl and the folklore that has been passed down for generations in the village. Talk to the Village Headman.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009516
text: Destroy the demonic totem which brainwashed the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009517
text: The Village Headman told you that it was after the demons attacked the village. The Village Headman told you that the demonic totem which was set by the demons brainwashed the ferrets and asked you to destroy the demonic totem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009518
text: You've defeated the demons that were protecting the demonic totem and destroyed the totem. Return to the Village Headman and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009519
text: The Village Headman thanked you for destroying the demonic totem. Listen to the Village Headman on what you will do from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009520
text: Look for traces of the mysterious girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009521
text: The Village Headman of the village told you that while you've gone to destroy the demonic totem, the girl appeared at the village. He said the girl disappeared to the gigantic statue of the goddess without a word. The Village Headman said if you are the outsider from the folklore, you would be able to find traces of the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009522
text: The mysterious girl disappeared to the gigantic statue of the goddess. Follow the mysterious girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009523
text: Talk to the villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009524
text: Ask the villager if there's anything you can help with

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009525
text: Obtain Gigantic Fruit Juice from the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009526
text: The villager is worried about the drinking water because of the polluted river and the fruits that grew from the river water. The ferrets use the juice they obtained from the gigantic fruits for their drinking water and it seems that they know the way to eliminate the poison from the fruits. The villager asked you to obtain the fruit juice from the ferrets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009527
text: Pass the gigantic fruit juice to the villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009528
text: Acquired enough fruit juice from the ferrets. Pass it to the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009529
text: Obtain %s from ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009530
text: Put the spices

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009531
text: The villager told you that while you've gone to obtain the fruit juice, a herd of ferrets attacked the village and stole the food. Talk to the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009532
text: Obtain the polluted red water from the old well

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009533
text: The villager said the ferrets would never come back to steal the food if they suffer from a stomach ache so he said he's going to pollute the stolen food with the polluted red water. Bring him the polluted red water from the old well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009534
text: Pass the polluted red water to the villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009535
text: Acquired enough polluted red water from the old well. Pass the polluted red water to the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009536
text: Obtain %s from the old well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009537
text: The villager told you that you've obtained enough red water to pollute the food and he wants to tell you the location where the ferrets hide the food. Talk to the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009538
text: Pollute the fresh food with red water

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009539
text: The villager told you that ferrets hide the stolen food among the fruit baskets. He told you that there are some food that had been stolen long ago so only the fresh food should be polluted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009540
text: Return to the villager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009541
text: You've found the fresh food within the suspicious baskets and then proceeded to pollute it with red water. Return to the villager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009542
text: The Sculpture of Peace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009543
text: Talk to the Elder's grandchild

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009544
text: The elder's grandchild seems to have some words to tell you after he went out to check whether the ferrets have become more gentle since the collapse of demonic totem. Talk to the grandchild of the elder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009545
text: Talk to Dievdirbys Widas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009546
text: The grandchild of the elder told you that although the demonic totem has been destroyed, the ferrets were still very violent. Talk to Dievdirbys Widas if there's any way to make them calm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009547
text: Dievdirbys Widas was actually engaged in research to create a sculpture which would oppose the effects of the demonic totem. Talk to Widas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009548
text: Set the sculpture of peace

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009549
text: Dievdirbys Widas created the sculpture of peace after a long period of his research. He told you the ferrets will be kind again when you set the sculpture of peace near ferrets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009550
text: As you set the sculpture of peace, the ferrets became more violent. Tell this to Widas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009551
text: The Guiding Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009552
text: Look for the traces of the mysterious girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009553
text: Chase the mysterious girl to the direction where she has disappeared to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009554
text: You can see the traces of the girl as you chased her to the direction where she has gone to. It seems that you would be able to meet her when you follow the traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009555
text: You met Druid Leja while chasing after the girl. Ask Leja about the direction where the girl has gone to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009556
text: Druid Leja told you that she came here to look at the gigantic sculpture, but she is tied here due to the ferrets that were brainwashed by the demon. And then the mysterious girl appeared and the ferrets chased after the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009557
text: Search for the traces of the girl by defeating ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009558
text: Druid Leja told you the direction where the mysterious girl has gone to. She told you to search for the girl by defeating ferrets since they are chasing after the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009559
text: Defeat ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009560
text: The Missing Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009561
text: Search for the mysterious girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009562
text: You can feel the mysterious energy again as you are defeating ferrets. You should find the girl by following the mysterious energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009563
text: The mysterious girl was caught by the Demon Lord. Report to Druid Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009564
text: The Demon Lord captured the girl and disappeared. Report to Druid Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009565
text: Collect the herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009566
text: Druid Leja told you that she saw the ferrets disappearing while holding a strange sack. She told you where the base camp of the ferrets is located. Leja told you that she will create a scent that would make the ferrets unconscious before you go to their camp and asked you to obtain the herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009567
text: Hand over the herbs to Druid Leja

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009568
text: Acquired all of the herbs Druid Leja requested from you. Pass them to Druid Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009569
text: Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009570
text: Druid Leja told you that she will tell you several locations where the ferrets are likely to hide the girl and she will also give you the scent. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009571
text: Let the scent spread and search the base camp of the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009572
text: You have to find the girl while the ferrets are unconscious. But, in order to spread the scent, you would need a bonfire and you have to be aware that the usage time is short.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009573
text: Rescue the mysterious girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009574
text: You have to save the mysterious girl while the ferrets are unconscious due to the scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009575
text: Acquired the stone!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151001_009576
text: You couldn't obtain anything!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009577
text: This stone slate is the Light of Salvation?{nl}It looks like just an old slate to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009578
text: You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mine to find the Light of Salvation? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009579
text: So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they search for the Light of Salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the bishop and the Knight Commander either. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009580
text: Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your helping the villagers.{nl}The Light of Salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009581
text: But some force prevented me from approaching it, as if it was destined for ownership by a certain being.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the Light of Salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009582
text: Perhaps that force I felt was the Light of Salvation...{nl}That's what I think.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009583
text: This is all because of the dream of the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl}What's all this about a 'Light of Salvation' in the Crystal Mine? I have never seen such thing. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009584
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}You must also be a Revelator who has come in search of the Light of Salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009585
text: Anyway, the bishop himself also had a dream while praying in closure. {nl}In his dream, the goddess told him the evidence of salvation will be found in the Crystal Mine. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009586
text: I'm in a bit of trouble.{nl}I have to put up notice boards, but I wouldn't be able to do so even with two of myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009587
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance is really rough on newcomers you see.{nl}Leopoldas is especially brutal... He made me do all of this by myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009588
text: Really?{nl}Is this really okay..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009589
text: If so, could you set these notice boards up down there?{nl}Jurate is excavating holy artifacts down there you see. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009590
text: I'm sure that you'll be discrete in helping out.{nl}I have to be somewhere else as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009591
text: Thank you.{nl}You didn't get caught by Leopoldas, did you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009592
