text: My name is Serapinas, a newcomer of the Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}I'm promoting the Merchant Alliance at the moment.{nl}Umm... If you have the time, would you mind helping me do some promotion?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009593
text: Edita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009594
text: I am Edita. I am in charge of the Retrieval team for the Merchant Alliance.{nl}I'm sure you're curious as to why we're retrieving items here.{nl}You may have heard from Leopoldas, but we are providing much needed items and materials to people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009595
text: {nl}I was carting items for the Merchant Alliance like any other day past here towards Fedimian.{nl}But I could have never known. That it would be later known as Medzio Diena...{nl}All of our carts were upturned... The items in those carts buried all over.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009596
text: {nl}That's why retrieval teams were created, and why I am here.{nl}Some are locating them with detectors for more efficient retrieval.{nl}Some are going to those locations for excavation.{nl}If you wish to help, there's a spot there that we've marked so bring the item after carefully digging it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009597
text: There are many monsters nearby that are threatening the members of the Merchant Alliance.{nl}Could you clear them out for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009598
text: Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009599
text: Thank you for bringing it back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009600
text: The excavation team has just reported that there is something buried there.{nl}Could you take a look?{nl}It'll take a while for the retrieval team to get there...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009601
text: Theses are records from the Merchant Alliance.{nl}They're ripped to pieces.{nl}Most likely done by monsters.{nl}Give them here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009602
text: These are records of the arrow materials the Merchant Alliance had previously provided to Lydia Schaffen and the first Fletcher Master.{nl}It is too difficult for me to restore, so we'll have to try in the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009603
text: There should be something north of here as well.{nl}I can't seem to find exactly where though.{nl}I'll give you the detector so why don't you give it a try.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009604
text: Try carefully digging there after you've located it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009605
text: Try using the detector as you go slowly upwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009606
text: {nl}This is a mysterious Ink. {nl}It's a secret Ink used to write important documents.{nl}We suspect that it was used to hide records.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009607
text: {nl}Ah, we'll take care of the rest by ourselves.{nl}You've been a great help!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009608
text: Hello.{nl}I am Margellius the record keeper for the Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009609
text: {nl}You've come on the request of Leopoldas.{nl}Then could you retrieve the educational materials taken by the monsters?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009610
text: You saw the newcomers that are under Leopoldas right?{nl}It's neccessary material for their education.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009611
text: If we retrieve the information that the monsters have taken, I'm planning on creating more copies to give to the newcomers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009612
text: Now I'll record more information.{nl}Ink crafted from the fluids of monsters lasts a long time and is durable.{nl}I'll give you some traps, so could you get some for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009613
text: Plant the trap near monsters.{nl}The monsters will faint when they step on the trap...{nl}You'll then be able to extract their fluids when they're still alive.{nl}But, only the monsters over there have the neccessary fluids.{nl}So use the trap over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009614
text: It can only be obtained from the monsters at the plaza over there.{nl}Use the trap near them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009615
text: Now I can craft tombstones.{nl}Try making one yourself.{nl}I'll give you the materials and tools again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009616
text: Good job.{nl}I'm sure Giedra over there will also require your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009617
text: Bookbinding is also an important part of making a scripture.{nl}You have to bind them with sturdy string.{nl}String made from monster leather is ideal, but they are too short.{nl}I'll give you an anvil so would you mind creating Bookbinding String from the leather straps?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009618
text: Listen up. First gather leather straps from monsters, then use this anvil to craft Lump of Sturdy Strings for Bookbinding with them.{nl}Connect the short pieces into a longer string for bookbinding.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009619
text: You're amazing!{nl}Now all that's left is my part.{nl}Thank you for helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009620
text: Everything is in order now! Now I'll go to Fasika Plateau!{nl}Hahahahahahahahaha!!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009621
text: Oh come on...{nl}The Nestos sign was created after the falling out with the Anastos.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009622
text: {nl}Antanas and Giedra here seem to be holding it, but why do I keep losing it so often...{nl}Anyways, I want to go on a pilgrimage to Fasika Plateau where there are more Nestos now!{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009623
text: Pill?{nl}You should be able to get that from the equipment merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009624
text: Take care on the long road ahead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009625
text: Yes. I've prepared the pill you've requested.{nl}Farewell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009626
text: Have you retrieved the pill?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009627
text: Now go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009628
text: Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I am Albinas from the Anastospa.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009629
text: This is a tombstone erected by the people of Nestospa as an offering to the goddess.{nl}As you can see, it has become so defiled that it is attracting mobs of monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009630
text: What could Nestospa possibly be thinking...{nl}What good are sanctums and tombstones when the goddess is missing?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009631
text: They can keep making them, but they're all just going to get defiled like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009632
text: Unlike them, the people of Anastospa have a good grasp of reality.{nl}We know that our priority should be saving the people we can actually see before us and getting rid of the demons, rather than thinking about the goddess who is already gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009633
text: What do you think?{nl}How about helping us get rid of the demons even if our beliefs are slightly different.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009634
text: Even though the goddess is gone now, Nestospa continues to pursue its faith blindly.{nl}That is why they keep building these sanctuaries everywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009635
text: {nl}Human life comes first, and then our next priority is wiping out the demons we can see before us, and beyond that, as long as the goddess has abandoned us, is there even a need for faith anymore?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009636
text: Thank you so much for agreeing to help me.{nl}We really need to teach Nestospa a lesson.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009637
text: There are more than a few defiled tombstones.{nl}I shall destroy this one, so you go and destroy the tombstones over there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009638
text: That tombstone over there should also be glowing red.{nl}Just like the tombstone next to you. It's evidence that it has been defiled.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009639
text: What is this...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009640
text: Who're you? {nl}Who do you think you are, touching our tombstone?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009641
text: This is Nestospa's sacred tombstone.{nl}Are you the one that did this to our tombstone?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009642
text: I've never seen or heard of anyone like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009643
text: I don't know every member of the Anastos...{nl}But I know most of them since we are from the same church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009644
text: I am at a loss for words.{nl}Albinas? A member of the Anastos? It can't be!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009645
text: Bring him to me! {nl}I must see for myself!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009646
text: You'll take responsibility and restore the tombstone?{nl}I really don't like you, but if you're willing to do that, I guess I've got no choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009647
text: I'm only agreeing to this for the goddess' sake.{nl}Luckily there are lots of stones around here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009648
text: Obtain some suitable stone blocks and go find Eduinas at the Nestos Camp over there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009649
text: Eduinas will not be happy if he knows that you've done this to the tombstone.{nl}Get ready to take responsibility for that at the very least.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009650
text: Are you almost done yet? If you're going to take responsibility, you should get hustlin'.{nl}Don't just linger around here wasting time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009651
text: Who are you?{nl}And what is this rock you've got here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009652
text: What? You destroyed the tombstone?{nl}We worked so hard to erect that tombstone and you destroyed it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009653
text: I don't need your apology.{nl}Since Damijonas requested it, I'll start working on this, but please don't ever do that again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009654
text: I don't want to see you while I get the materials ready.{nl}Go and clear the area of monsters or something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009655
text: I need more time.{nl}I can't just magically make a tombstone appear out of thin air, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009656
text: All done. {nl}Now, don't do that ever again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009657
text: You've gathered the neccessary items. Let's see if we can repair it.{nl}It's lucky that it wasn't damaged too badly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009658
text: We've never had any trouble with Anastos, just some different opinions.{nl}We have to be suspicious since we've heard a name that we know nothing about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009659
text: Especially since they've destroyed the tombstone that we've barely managed to craft.{nl}We'll forgive them since they've taken responsibility.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009660
text: However, it's very strange.{nl}I have never heard of that name.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009661
text: Aren't you dejected to go like this?{nl}Anastos has their camp up there so why don't you go ask them.This is strange...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009662
text: Yes, of Anastos... that is correct.{nl}You've come here to ask about something?{nl}Oh dear, I am quite flustered at the moment so it's a bit difficult to answer anything..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009663
text: We might get a break if you can manage to retrieve the research materials that I'm looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009664
text: They're my research records, but the monsters took off with them for some reason.{nl} I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009665
text: I'll be able to talk to you once I get those documents back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009666
text: They're my research records, but the monsters took off with them for some reason.{nl} I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009667
text: These are the data with the differences between Anastos and Nestos.{nl}There should be an opportunity to explain after finding the data.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009668
text: Let's see...{nl} This one's here... That one's not here... Now where's that one...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009669
text: Oh, yes.{nl} You've found them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009670
text: {nl}What was it you wanted to ask me about?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009671
text: Albinas?{nl} I haven't heard that name before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009672
text: And you say he spoke of Anastospa and told you to destroy the tombstone?{nl} No way, we would never do anything like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009673
text: Both Nestospa and we are people who revere the goddess and are focused in our faith.{nl} Though we are a bit more realistic in our pursuits than the people of Nestos are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009674
text: Focusing on defeating demons and preparing for calamities.. {nl}More than simply devout faith in the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009675
text: This is definitely strange. {nl}We'll need to send someone to investigate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009676
text: Oh, we'll have to give him a flare in case of trouble.. But there seems to be a lack of useful materials.{nl}Could you gather some if you have the time?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009677
text: Get me some flamable powder.{nl}It won't be too difficult to find since there are always more than enough monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009678
text: By the way Alvydas... You are really awkward.{nl}For what reasons have you mentioned our faction?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009679
text: Now we'll have to wait for the results.{nl}He's a capable person, so it won't take too long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009680
text: How about doing some investigation ourselves in the meanwhile.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009681
text: Of course. Barte might know something.{nl}He hasn't been here too long and he's quite the knowledgeable chap.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009682
text: How about asking him about the person called Albinas?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009683
text: I will wait for Fabijus here.{nl}It'd be great to bring back a certain answer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009684
text: I am indeed Barte.{nl}What's the matter?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009685
text: Albinas?{nl}Umm.. I did see a person that looks similar to what you've described.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009686
text: She was strange.{nl}Since only the pilgrims visit this place, it was quite a strange sight.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009687
text: She was staring absently at something leather-like then suddenly teared it apart.{nl}To do such a feat with bare hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009688
text: It wasn't the strength of a human. I was trembling.{nl}They disappeared soon after throwing away the shredded leather.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009689
text: There might still be a bit of leather left if you head down there. I... I'm too afraid to go even if it was an order from a goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009690
text: I believe that lether is still there.{nl}As for me... I would not have courage to venture into the place even if it is the will of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009691
text: I have no idea what's hidden in the leather.{nl}I hope there's a bit of leather left.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009692
text: What if the monsters have eaten it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009693
text: Let me take a look.{nl}Hm..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009694
text: I have seen this crest before...{nl}Ah... Ah!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009695
text: I remember now. I've seen it in a book.{nl}It's the crest of the 'Lunatic Demon King', Baiga!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009696
text: What on earth could be happening.{nl}No one else uses such insignia unless they work for Baiga.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009697
text: We have to alert the others about this!{nl}You go tell Gedas!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009698
text: There's no time.{nl}Hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009699
text: What?{nl}No way... You think Baiga has sent his pawn?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009700
text: Fabijus.. What's going to happen to him?{nl}What should we do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009701
text: We must let everyone know!{nl}Please, notify Gedas!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009702
text: To get rid of demons, they are much more adequate than us.{nl}They'll surely help if you can explain the situation to them!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009703
text: Oh dear, you mean, we have been played by the demons all along?{nl}I knew something was fishy!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009704
text: It's dangerous to go alone, take this Holy Water.{nl}It can do one hell of damage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009705
text: Thank goodness, you are safe.{nl}Fabijus told me about who Albinas really was.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009706
text: Those demons threatened us after their covers have been blown and you saved us.{nl}It truly must be the will of the goddess that you came.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009707
text: Are you hearing yourself right now?{nl}You have a lot of nerve coming back after breaking the stele.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009708
text: Do you expect me to believe that you were just following what someone whom you don't even know very well nor be able to bring here said?{nl}Seriously?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009709
text: Words fail me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009710
text: Nevermind!{nl}Such irreverence...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009711
text: What do you want now?{nl}I am too busy figuring out how to restore the stele. Leave me alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009712
text: Have you told others about the identity of Albinas?{nl}My guess is that you rushed to get here...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009713
text: Could you forward the story to them as well?{nl}We will put aside our differences and actively find the solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009714
text: What happened to that demon?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009715
text: I'm glad to hear that Holy Water that I gave you was of some use.{nl}It's terrifying to think that demons walking among us and dividing us. They must be really desperate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009716
text: Could you inform Damijonas of this as well?{nl}He would be protecting the stele that got destroyed last time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009717
text: The demon's plan has been foiled all thanks to you.{nl}We might have crossed the point of no return forever.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009718
text: Oh, good. {nl}So, have you found something about Albinas?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009719
text: My word, all this was Baiga's trickery?{nl}Thank the goddesses we didn't fall for it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009720
text: There must be someone else who have fallen for a trick like this other than us.{nl}These demons are not just using brute force but also the cunning plans to divide us internally..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009721
text: Althought the first one was a lucky accident but thank you for all you have done.{nl}May goddesses be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009722
text: After you have destroyed the stele, Damijonas is guarding it even more attentively.{nl}I don't see any chance that it could ever get destroyed again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009723
text: It gives me chills every time I think about it.{nl}A demon living among us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009724
text: Albinas is gone! What has happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009725
text: We have no choice. {nl}It's far too wide and there are so many things here that look like a monocle. We should split up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009726
text: You check the Bingcoolers Path area.{nl}Who knows? {nl}Demons might have something special.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009727
text: It really angers me.{nl}Demons do not deserve any mercy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009728
text: Is that so? My side also had demons only, nothing else.{nl}That's strange. There must be something here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009729
text: Let's check the other side..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009730
text: Wait!{nl}I can see the great energy coming from Leima Small Square.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009731
text: Look at that.. It must be something gigantic. {nl}Come on, go and have a look.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009732
text: I'm not much of a combat-type person, so, I will just stay hidden here.{nl}What am I going to do when demons show up, ay?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009733
text: Huh? Outsiders.. Who are you?{nl}How did you get past all the guards?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009734
text: Are you, perhaps, seeking the secret behind Ruklys?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009735
text: Speak honestly otherwise face the consequences.{nl}This old body, you might not sense it yet, is full of holy energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009736
text: You can't miss it, really. The sheer size of it stands out.{nl}Promise me that you won't keep it to yourself when you find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009737
text: Yes! A revelation...{nl}Only the Revelators know the existence of the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009738
text: I am the keeper of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Perhaps, you are the one for whom I have been waiting.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009739
text: I am well aware of the fact that Ruklys has hidden the revelation in this place.{nl}If you too are looking for it, I will gladly help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009740
text: I, though an old man, will serve as a guide to your quest to retrieve the revelation.{nl}It is no where in sight here. 'Tis best to move on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009741
text: Oh my, how silly of me.{nl}I have forgotten about the devices I have laid around here to keep intruders away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009742
text: To make a certificate, we first need a mushroom.{nl}There are many mushrooms at the Sunken Path, so please get me one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009743
text: Let's inscribe the magic of the fortress into the mushroom you have brought.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009744
text: Unfortunately, my body is not what it used to be.{nl}Wielding magic might overwhelm my withered body.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009745
text: Do not despair! The monsters in the fortress possess energy that might serve as a substitute for my weak magic.{nl}Please, gather it for me. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009746
text: The monsters that have been residing in this area for some time are bound to have Earth Crystals on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009747
text: It's not like the olden days.{nl}Reckless usage of magic... will take its toll on my olden body.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009748
text: A certificate is just a fancy word. The principle behind it is quite simple.{nl}What matters the most is ingredients and how you mix them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009749
text: The process will not take long. {nl}Please, wait for a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009750
text: Now, Storage Quarter will be accessible.{nl}Clues to find the revelation must be there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009751
text: I will be waiting for you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009752
text: You came quick.{nl}Now, I have got some work for you to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009753
text: It's dangerous to go alone, take this.{nl}Now my devices will not attack you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009754
text: For all my life, I have been guarding this place but my struggle bore no fruit on where the revelation lies.{nl}However, if we could consult with the spirit who has lived the era when Ruklys walked, we might get some answer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009755
text: The thing on my side is devised to read the memory of the spirits.{nl}I made it myself. I have done this before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009756
text: No remorse for revolting.{nl}This Restraint Token will calm them down.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009757
text: The spirits are left with nothing but rage.{nl}Guilt is no where to be felt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009758
text: This Rajatad's Egg has the power to restrain the spirits.{nl}What we need to do is to actualize it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009759
text: Nothing works better than to use Demon Bone.{nl}Get me the bone and I will extract the power and inject it into the bone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009760
text: Good, good. I will make an orb.{nl}One final step remains before the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009761
text: They say they destroyed something on Ruklys' command.{nl}I suspect that something might be related to the revelation of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009762
text: We must find out what the device was that Ruklys destroyed.{nl}Thanks to you, I can now delve deeper into their memories.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009763
text: The deeper I go, the more they will attempt to resist.{nl}When that happens, subdue them with your strength and use the token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009764
text: Fill this orb with the life force of the monsters.{nl}That will complete the whole process of restraining and actualizing the energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009765
text: Knowing how to operate it is different from being able to actually operate it.{nl}Those spirits took the secret to their graves and beyond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009766
text: Treasures mean dirt to me at the moment.{nl}Even I care about the kingdom.  {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009767
text: The revelation you are looking for... {nl}It should not fall into the hands of the demons, should it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009768
text: You have promised Eminent to meet up here, right?{nl}Let's check the monocle before he comes.{nl}Talk to me again, if you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009769
text: AH!{nl}The scroll, now I remember.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009770
text: Remember this? {nl}It is the defense magic scroll that was hidden inside the treasure chest on the secret location.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009771
text: The scroll contains instructions on how to operate the defensive {nl}magic circle that can fend off demons and how to repair it.{nl}I hope this can foil Eminent's plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009772
text: Firstly, you need to follow Eminent's orders to distract him.{nl}At the same time, you and I will activate the magic circle secretly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009773
text: How did it go?{nl}The remaining foundation stone is located near the Ikveta Podium.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009774
text: However, demon totems are suppressing the power of foundation stone.{nl}I tried to get close to it but there are demons, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009775
text: Ah, keep in mind that Eminent might get suspicious if you take too much time.{nl}As soon as the foundation stone gets activated, you need to get back to Eminent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009776
text: No need to keep it secret anymore.{nl}Let me introduce myself properly. I am Premier Eminent who served King Kadumel 600 years ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009777
text: I thoroughly understand your disbelief.{nl}But please, do allow me to explain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009778
text: He along with the demons massacred the Royal Army mercilessly.{nl}My army and I came here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009779
text: It was a long and arduous battle. {nl}But the goddess favored me and victory we saw.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009780
text: The divine voice of the goddess laid upon me at the victorious moment. {nl}She appointed me to protect the revelation instead of that treacherous Ruklys.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009781
text: After a long wait, you finally came.{nl}The prophecy spoke no falsehood and you brought me here. The place where the revelation was hidden.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009782
text: Enough with the apology, let us resume our quest to find the revelation.{nl}The spirits told me that there is a device that bridges the battlegrounds to the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009783
text: I now know what the device was for, all thanks to you.{nl}I will meet you on the fortress battlegrounds, for I need to prepare something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009784
text: Ah, you're still here?{nl}What good news. Lend me your hand.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009785
text: This is a page from the journal written by the Ruklys' army! {nl}I am quite certain there are more pages.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009786
text: If you find them, please, do give them to me.{nl}Wilhelmina Carriot will be happy to see this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009787
text: If you find them, please, do give them to me.{nl}Wilhelmina Carriot will be happy to see this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009788
text: Thank heavens, you are still alive.{nl}Remember the time when i was looking around through the monocle?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009789
text: I thought the object contained some special power but only demons were there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009790
text: And when we arrived at the living quarter, I checked the area with the monocle again.{nl}I sensed some great energy. Remember that as well?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009791
text: At the time, you said only an old manager was there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009792
text: That old manager... I don't know what is going on.{nl}You heard him right? He said he is the Premier Eminent who should have died 600 years ago!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009793
text: The whole shenanigan of making the certificate.{nl}What did he say? "Overwhelm my withered body", my behind!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009794
text: There are many old mages and clerics. What about them, eh?{nl}He only said those things to cover something up!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009795
text: Something was not well with the spirits, also! {nl}Why would they be so enraged against him, if he was a good man?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009796
text: I do sense something foul is going on.{nl}There must be something we are not seeing straight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009797
text: I pray I am wrong.{nl}It is best if you return to the man called Eminent. It's no good if he suspects you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009798
text: Please, be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009799
text: Are you telling me that he was with the demons?{nl}And they were not attacking him at all?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009800
text: That truly is suspicious. {nl}What I said earlier was a mere conjecture but... we should see it for ourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009801
text: That man calling himself Eminent, I will meet him with you. {nl}His true identity will be revealed through this monocle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009802
text: Oh, you came.{nl}Let us trace back the memory of the spirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009803
text: They destroyed the device on Ruklys' command. {nl}So, that must mean if we repair it, it will lead us to the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009804
text: I know where the device is but in order to repair it, we need the parts. {nl}We could get the cogs from the traps he made.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009805
text: I will search the Paramiso Battle Field, you take the Ataka Side Road.{nl}Get everything you can lay your hands on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009806
text: Ah, please, do not, under no circumstance, disturb the defensive magic circle.{nl}One false move and we are dead. We are all dead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009807
text: The parts are needed to revive the device.{nl}Please, find them from the traps set up in the area near Ataka Side Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009808
text: The Savior who followed all the way here by having faith in the revelation.{nl}You're gradually getting closer to the truth.{nl}Savior, what does the Divine Tree mean to human beings?{nl}A symbol of calamity, the roots of everyone's sorrow in this land...{nl}No. That's the image created by the crooked hearts of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009809
text: In the beginning... there was God.{nl}A sky with dancing stars, land to support that sky...{nl}It was all created together with humans and other lives.{nl}And thus the world was created. {nl}The God who painted the world with radiance had fallen to an eternal dream.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009810
text: The Divine Tree. It is another form that God has taken for himself.{nl}The God had turned into a tree that will breathe life out to the world, making the world complete.{nl}We are beings that are born to groom the world and the Divine Tree.{nl}The God has asked us not to wake him up from his slumber.{nl}Thus, we lived side by side in the new peaceful age.{nl}However, there began a feeling of thirst within the hearts of some.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009811
text: The fact that God is not by us.{nl}The moment that people realized the abscence of God was the source of their thirst,{nl}we could no longer live together. {nl}In the end, the thirst that has craved for God had grown into obsession for awakening the God.{nl}They threw away the name that God had given them to call themselves demons.{nl}The obsessions... It has brought calamity upon this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009812
text: In order to be loved... They had decided they needed to disobey God's words and awaken him.{nl}Savior, you are the one that will take God's revelation and save this world from the demons,{nl}and truly make this world complete by completing his will. {nl}The time is nigh.{nl}I will be waiting for you in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009813
text: Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009814
text: I took a look at the location of the foundation stone on the scroll.{nl}The magic circle only gets properly activated with this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009815
text: First, the foundation stone under Slepti Watchtower.{nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009816
text: It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009817
text: Ah, I almost forgot.{nl}The scroll says that anything with magic would suffice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009818
text: I think demon blood would work.{nl}Let's try it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009819
text: Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009820
text: The harrowing place forged by a tyrant you speak of might mean... {nl}The prison made in the Kadumel dynasty. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009821
text: All I know is it's Kalejimas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009822
text: Thanks. But our townspeople usually stay away from the outsiders.{nl}It is a rare sight to see them asking an outsider for a favor.{nl}If you are thinking of going to my town, turn away now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009823
text: On your way here, you have met a girl and a demon that was chasing her?{nl}Never let a Revelator meet up with the girl...{nl}Not all that jolly.. but it seems it's none of your business, don't you think so?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009824
text: I beg your pardon? You are the Revelator?{nl}That must mean you also had that a horrible nightmare as well.{nl}...Perhaps you are the outsider the legend talks about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009825
text: In our town, we have this legend told by Goddess Goddess Laima.{nl}When the town is in danger, worry not, there will come a stranger with the light divine{nl}Evil shall fall by the might of the light. {nl}It is no time to be standing here. I must go to town and see what's going on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009826
text: Ah..about the food.. We do need to get back the food ferrets stole..{nl}The water in the forest turned red and the fruits have become unusually enlarged since Medzio Diena.{nl}The water and the fruits somehow are all poisoned.{nl}Food is scare around here. Those darn ferrets steal our food.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009827
text: Revelator. This town is having a food crisis.{nl}Please, use this anti-ferret paralysis powder to retrieve the food they stole.{nl}I will head back to town and ask more about the legend.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009828
text: Ah, is that you whom Leja talked about?{nl}The town cleric says you have brought light into this village.{nl}Ye finally came. After all these years. The stranger to rescue.{nl}O! Praise be unto Goddess Laima... Our hearts sing prayers in full to you. You have not forsakened us..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009829
text: What could that be? Ha! You actually managed to get the food back from the ferrets!{nl}You are truly the one to save our town. My deepest gratitude.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009830
text: Leja went to Laimadon. Saying that Goddess Laima must have left something for us in the giant statue of her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009831
text: According to the legend told. This town was formerly a town that worshiped Goddess Laima in Goddess Laimadon.{nl}Long ago, Goddess Laima went on a pilgrimage after foreseeing the terrible future. {nl}Goddess Laima cared deeply about the townspeople and asked Goddess Lada to look after us when she is gone.{nl}And if a great threat, even greater than the power of Goddess Lada, a stranger chasing a nightmore will arrive{nl}along with the light and save the town.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009832
text: Not long after her disappearance, Medzio Diena happened... It was the future Laima has predicted...{nl}The river turned red and poisonous and it tainted the fruits as well.{nl}While this was going on the demon started to invade.. They were after Goddess Lada and we failed to protect her.{nl}The demons responsible for kidnapping the goddess made the peaceful ferrets very ferocious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009833
text: The ferocious ferrets are constantly invading our town and taking our food.{nl}In the ferret hideout, you will find the totem planted by the demons. We suspect it is responsible for the ferret's recent change of behavior.{nl}Would you be willing to destroy the totem in the ferret's hideout for us?{nl}Without the ferret problem, our town would have no further trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009834
text: And one more thing, if that totem is as important as we think it is, the demons will not stand idly by.{nl}Be careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009835
text: You have destroyed the Demon Totem! Words cannot express how grateful, we are.{nl}As for my ferrets, I will send my grandson to check up on them.{nl}You have something else to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009836
text: A mysterious girl came into our town while you were busy destroying the totem.{nl}She silently passed through the town to Laimadon.{nl}Our forefathers told us that when Laima the Goddess pays her visit to the town, the soft warmth stays on the town.{nl}The soft warmth we all felt when the mysterious girl was passing through..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009837
text: She too must have been the one sent by Goddess Laima just like you are.{nl}Follow that girl, if you are the one foretold by the legend, you will be able to find her trace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009838
text: Please, save our town and Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009839
text: Oh drat! Bad new. While away to get the juice, the ferrets came again and took more food!{nl}We need a permanent solution.{nl}Perhaps, this time just giving them the food would be better. Of course, I don't mean that we should give up the fight.{nl}We give them the food and teach them a lesson of not taking something that is not yours.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009840
text: It's a simple plan. We'll find the food that the ferrets stole, and season them a bit.{nl}With Corrupted Red Water.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009841
text: We will not take this anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009842
text: That should be enough to poison the food. Good work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009843
text: Now, the ferrets tend to stick the stolen food inside fruit basket.{nl}Go to the ferret's hideout and season the stolen food with the crimson water.{nl}What matters the most is to poison the fresh ones.{nl}The ferrets are stupid and lazy and prone to let food rot because they forgot.{nl}It's no use if they think they just got sick from bad food. Only the fresh ones will do the trick.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009844
text: I mean, really, they let so much food go to waste because they forgot {nl}and eventually they let it rot and then they come back to steal again.{nl}I mean, we pay for their stupidity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009845
text: How does the phrase go? One step back, two steps forward?{nl}Bon appetit, ferrets!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009846
text: Ah Revelator. Thank you so much for destroying the demon totem.{nl}Unfortunately, grandfather told me to look whether the ferrets have become tame,{nl}but they are still as ferocious as ever. {nl}Could it be that the effect from the totem lingers?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009847
text: That got me thinking. Demons used a totem as a means of influence, right?{nl}How about we build something similar to counter-act the effect?{nl}Could you ask Widas whether my guess is feasible or not? {nl}Dievdirbys Widas is the best Dievdirbys in town.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009848
text: A statue to counter-act the demon influences, eh?{nl}Hmm let's see...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009849
text: The ferrets I grew up with were quite a friendly and kind bunch. {nl}When I got lost, they were kind enough to take me back to town.{nl}What could have made them like that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009850
text: I, too, got a similar idea when I heard that a totem is influencing the ferrets to be ferocious.{nl}So, I experimented on creating a statue that has a reverse effect...{nl}It's still in an experiemental stage but with the totem gone, it's a fine time to try it out...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009851
text: Here, this is the statue I made...{nl}After you place it, please, stick around a bit to see how they react...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009852
text: Back in the good ol' days, I used to make ferret statues while observing them...{nl}But now, even an eye contact with them provokes them to attack..{nl}I hope, this statue will bring peace to both humans and the ferrets...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009853
text: What? It only provoked the ferrets even more...?{nl}Oh dear, is that a failure...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009854
text: Ah... It is too early to despair... {nl}The lingering demon influence might be interfering with this positive effect...{nl}I cannot do this alone. {nl}I need to consult this with Druid Benes of Laimadon, an expert on ferrets...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009855
text: Ah, Revelator! You came earlier than I expected.{nl}I tried to go to the giant statue but the ferrets made it very difficult...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009856
text: Huh? The mysterious girl might be the chosen leader sent by Goddess Laima?{nl}The girl ran that way right before you came...{nl}The ferrets were chasing after her so I did find it quite odd...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009857
text: Revelator, there is no time! The girl went that way.{nl}The ferrets are on a hunt for her.{nl}Defeat the ferrets, if you have to. Just the girl. Please, hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009858
text: I pray for her safety...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009859
text: ...The girl has been kidnapped? That's terrible...{nl}Demon Lord Zaura must be behind this! {nl}He is responsible for kidnapping Goddess Lada as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009860
text: Be careful when gathering Drowsy Herb.{nl}One false move and the spore explodes and, believe me, it WILL make you drowsy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009861
text: Were the ferrets present when Zaura was kidnapping her?{nl}I saw ferrets carrying a huge bag.{nl}I suspect it was her inside. I mean, ferrets don't usually.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009862
text: If the ferrets did take her away, they are guarding her as well.{nl}If you go straight down, there is drowsy herb.{nl}Bring it to me and I will make an incense that will make them very drowsy.{nl}While they are passed out, the rescue would be very easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009863
text: One, two, three...{nl}Yep, that seems to be enough.{nl}Wait a moment, please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009864
text: Don't worry about getting drowsy yourself.{nl}It is specifically designed to affect only the ferrets.{nl}The paralysis powder is my invention also.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009865
text: The drowsy scent is complete! {nl}Set a campfire and put it in the fire and nearby ferrets {nl}will be drowsier than a night of heavey feast.{nl}I will mark the spots to which I suspect they might have taken her.{nl}If you find the girl, quickly burn the scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009866
text: There... Tree... Under... The goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009867
text: Goddess' Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009868
text: Revelator... I am Laima, the goddess of fate.{nl}You have done well following the girl who is a living embodiment of my will.{nl}In this forest, my sister Lada is imprisoned by the cruel Demon Lord Zaura.{nl}Zaura is constructing an abominable object called 'Kruvina'. {nl}It is made from the life force drained from Lada.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009869
text: Revelator... Please, save my sister, Goddess Lada. {nl}Goddess Lada is being held captive in the Seir Rainforest.{nl}And I beseech thee to take this orb with you. It will prove itself useful on your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009870
text: The Ferret Transformation Scroll is complete. {nl}When you use it, you can transform you into a ferret.{nl}Worry not, it is based on careful observation of ferrets. You will look very natural.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009871
text: You will most likely be able to converse naturally with the ferret tribe. {nl}Talk to the ferret tribe and ask about why they are aligning with the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009872
text: Be careful not to transform back to your original state. {nl}They will attack you all at once. The sheer number will overwhelm even you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009873
text: Is that so? Are you telling me the ferrets are helping the demons on their free will?{nl}No, that's impossible! I cannot believe it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009874
text: Did the ferrets really say that? Ah, of course, you have no reason to lie..{nl}Forgive me for my rudeness but this is very unbelieveable...{nl}Or could it be possible that they have been brainwashed so {nl}fundamentally that they don't even realize they are being brainwashed?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009875
text: A further experimentation is in order. {nl}This is a block of wood that I have changed its shape via my magic.{nl}This wooden block is in the shape of an injured man. Let's set it up it around the ferrets.{nl}I mean, even if the ferrets are attacking people on their own accord, they would not go as far as{nl}attacking an injured man, would they? Assuming they are in their right minds.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009876
text: If the ferrets attack it, that would be the ultimate proof {nl}that they are still under the control of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009877
text: They attacked it, you say? I knew it, they are indeed mind controlled!{nl}I guess, that's something...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009878
text: Let us not rejoice so soon yet...{nl}The fact that they are attacking even an injured man {nl}means that their brutal behaviour is still on.{nl}They are still very dangerous..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009879
text: We'll have to expel the ferrets since we can't do anything else about them at the moment.{nl}I have an incense that ferrets hate.{nl}The ferrets will most likely run away if you burn the awful incense at a campfire.{nl}It is a tad pungent for people as well... So I hope that you'll be able to cope...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009880
text: I will make more of these.{nl}There has to be enough for everyone in town.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009881
text: Thank you so much. Without you, you enlightened us about the ferrets.{nl}The mind control will one day wear off, won't it?{nl}Until then, we will be working on a way to make them calm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009882
text: Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009883
text: My heart is filled with gratitude.{nl}From you, I sense the power of my sister, Laima...{nl}I worry for her safety...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009884
text: The Demon Lord Zaura is trying to form a powerful {nl}crystal known as Kruvina by using my life force.{nl}The Kruvina is usually made with the life force of those human sacrifices. {nl}It has the power to enlarge plants.{nl}The demons have a plan to wipe out humanity through these enlarged plants.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009885
text: The water in the forest turned red and the unnatural growth of both trees {nl}and their fruits are all due to the Kruvina made from human life forces.{nl}The demons like the power of the Kruvina so much {nl}that they wanted to make even more powerful Kruvina.{nl}They attempted to drain the life force from a goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009886
text: The Kruvina is an entity that should not exist in this world. It must be destroyed.{nl}This very moment is the golden opportunity! {nl}While Demon Lord Zaura is away treating his fatal wound!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009887
text: The Kruvina here is unstable since it used my life force little by little.{nl}However, something made of a goddess' life force is not easy to destroy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009888
text: From you I can feel the power of Laima. Have you brought the orb of Laima? If so, {nl}the process is easy. Use the orb to neutralize the Kruvina. But the power is slightly lacking... {nl}That comes later. Right now, destroying the device that is restraining me and the machine {nl}that is creating Kruvina is the first thing you should do. After that, I will breathe my powers into {nl}the orb. I cannot promise you much for I have little power left in me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009889
text: Well done. The creation of the Kruvina has been halted. It will not grow anymore.{nl}Thank you for your service.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009890
text: This is not the end. No matter how imperfect the Kruvina is.{nl}Even in its imperfect state, the Kruvina is a far too dangerous thing to exist.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009891
text: Now, I will breathe most of the power I have left in me into this orb.{nl}The power of a goddess will grant even a human like you the strength to destroy the Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009892
text: Now, my power unto your orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009893
text: Demon Lord Zaura will not stand idly by while you are destroying it...{nl}Please, take care of yourself...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009894
text: An interference from the Beholder... That was quite unexpected..{nl}But, it matters not... Revelator... It's not your fault at all.{nl}If you have not foiled the demon's plan, the Kruvina would have been completed.{nl}Stopping its creation itself is worthy of great praise.{nl}My dear sister, Laima, would have seen the Beholder's interference well in advance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009895
text: Thank you for saving me, Revelator.{nl}You did a great job on putting an end to the demon's plan.{nl}As for I, stabilizing the forest along with the townspeople is my duty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009896
text: Right before the self-imposed wandering, she told me something.{nl}She said, there will be a disaster, even she could not prevent...{nl}When that time comes, lead a stranger with her orb to the hand of the giant Goddess Statue.{nl}Take the orb of Laima and go to the hand of the giant statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009897
text: I worry about my other sisters...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009898
text: Ah... No, it can't be...{nl}Laima is being held captive by Giltine...{nl}Savior... Please, stop Giltine and her evil plan and save Laima...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009899
text: I will call out to my sisters after the situation at this {nl}place gets stabilized and return to my full power...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009900
text: The legend was true!{nl}You actually manage to defeat the demon and save Goddess Lada. {nl}You truly are what Goddess Laima told us about. Thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009901
text: There used to be a temple for worshiping the goddess. It got tuppled off by the demons.{nl}I am waiting for Goddess Lada and Laima to return and {nl}trying to rebuild the temple with the help of the townspeople.{nl}However, there are still some demon remnants.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009902
text: So, here's what I want to ask you to do. Help us mop up the demon remnants.{nl}With your help, we could drive them off much quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009903
text: I don't understand why the demons still stick around even after their Demon Lord has fallen. {nl}What's the point?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009904
text: Thank you. The number of demons has significantly decreased!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009905
text: We must find a way to purify the corrupted land. But I do not know how.{nl}Even Dievdirbys Widas could not come up with any plan for purifying the land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009906
text: Say, wouldn't one of the masters in Orsha know a way to purify the land?{nl}I would ask them myself but I am tied up at the moment...{nl}Will you please visit the masters in Orsha and see if they have any ideas?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009907
text: Orsha Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009908
text: Ah... You are looking for a way to purify the land?{nl}How could I say no to that face.{nl}I will get you Purification Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009909
text: There must be a master in Orsha who knows a way to purify the land!{nl}There must be...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009910
text: Woah! A Purification Scroll?{nl}That's perfect! Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009911
text: While you, the Revelator, was away in Orsha, I looked around.{nl}The demon totems erected throughout the land are corrupting the land.{nl}The demons are guarding them, so couldn't approach them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009912
text: Could I ask you to destroy the totems and use the Purification Scroll on the corrupted spot?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009913
text: I wonder how strong the evil energy is... seeing even the ferrets have been affected by it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009914
text: Oh thank you so much! I really needed your help!{nl}When the temple is built, please do come and visit me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009915
text: We were just about to lose all hope for our town...{nl}You truly are a savior... I cannot thank you enough!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009916
text: It is time for us to rebuild the temple altogether.{nl}I searched for the right place and found a perfect spot up there. It's rich with life force.{nl}Demons approached me so I did not have much time to inspect it more carefully. It matters not,{nl}I do believe that Goddess Lada will recover her strength faster, if she rests in that place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009917
text: I shall give you Earth's Flower Seed.{nl}This flower takes the energy of the soil to grow. {nl}Inside the flower, the life force gathers. When the flower with rich life force blossoms!{nl}Please, take it to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009918
text: I have never felt such a great amount of life force... {nl}A temple with hot springs would be very prof...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009919
text: ...Hmm?{nl}Ah, nevermind what I just said, I was just talking to myself. {nl}It was nothing, really. Forget about it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009920
text: Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009921
text: Even if it happened in accordance with Laima's prophecy, {nl}I have fallen and left the townspeople helpless and worried...{nl}My gratitude cannot be expressed through mere words... {nl}And this flower is filled with great life force...{nl}My recovery won't take long with this. Again, I deeply thank you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009922
text: (The girl is looking at the strangely glowing sapling without a word.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_009923
text: (And she, with a flash of light, disappears.)

text: What happened to the monastery?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010047
text: Giant Bracken Spore

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010048
text: The Journey to Find Myself (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010049
text: I am that Revelator

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010050
text: Nice Seeing Ya, Bye~

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010051
text: Ferret-Controlling Totem

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010052
text: I will find it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010053
text: Explaining about the Kidnapped Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010054
text: The Goddess' Assignment (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010055
text: The Goddess' Assignment (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010056
text: Hmm... Let me examine the mysterious seedlings

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010057
text: The Goddess' Assignment (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010058
text: Recording the Behavior

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010059
text: I will record their behavior thoroughly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010060
text: The Blurred Barrier Between The Thing and I

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010061
text: Explaining all the info you have found

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010062
text: Unbelievable Reality (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010063
text: Reporting the results

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010064
text: Unbelievable Reality (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010065
text: I will chase them off

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010066
text: Divine Encounter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010067
text: Kidnapped Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010068
text: What should I do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010069
text: This is looking too complicated. I'm out

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010070
text: Release the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010071
text: Destroy Vitality Absorption Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010072
text: Sprinkling the filthy demon blood around

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010073
text: The Thing That Should Not Let It Be

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010074
text: I shall bring the complete and utter destruction upon it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010075
text: The Goddess' Hidden Message

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010076
text: Temple Rebuilding Preparation (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010077
text: Temple Rebuilding Preparation (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010078
text: I will come back with some answers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010079
text: Why don't you do it yourself?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010080
text: Explaining the situation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010081
text: Temple Rebuilding Preparation (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010082
text: I will be the one to purify

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010083
text: Don't feel like it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010084
text: The Flower Enriched With the Earth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010085
text: Allow me grow it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010086
text: Speak with Mardas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010087
text: Mardas seems to be chased by something. Listen to what Mardas has got to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010088
text: Inspect the Spot Infested With Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010089
text: Mardas explains that he was being chased by the demons. He asked you to check whether they are still on the hunt or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010090
text: You saw the monsters using the Owl Sculpture to send a light bead. Ask what Mardas knows about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010091
text: Ask Mardas whether he has seen the light bead sent from the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010092
text: Follow the light bead from the Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010093
text: Mardas says that the demons are gathering the light bead and getting them to somewhere else. Follow the light bead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010094
text: Move up the hill to follow the light bead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010095
text: The light bead was sent to another Owl Sculpture on the hill. Go up the hill and do not lose track...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010096
text: Saved the Owl Chief Sculture. It seems that it is capable of talking. Listen to what it says.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010097
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture, unlike the others, is in its right mind. Ask if it remembers what happened to Karolis Springs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010098
text: Search for the Karolis Springs Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010099
text: In order to save other Owl Sculptures from the demon's influence, the Karolis Forest needs to be revived. Restoring the Karolis Altar is the first step. Use the Guide Owl's Will to locate the Karolis Altar Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010100
text: Retrieve Karolis Altar Fragments from monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010101
text: The monsters have the fragments from the broken Karolis Altar. Defeat the monsters that have the fragments and collect them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010102
text: Teleport to the Spot where Karolis Altar Used to Be

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010103
text: Go to the spot where the Karolis Altar used to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010104
text: Restore the altar on the remains of the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010105
text: Report to the Owl Chief

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010106
text: Restored the altar. Report back to Owl Chief.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010107
text: It is not enough to revive the Karolis Springs back to life. Speak with Owl Chief further.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010108
text: Illuminate Karolis' light

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010109
text: Karolis' Lights around the altar must be lighted in order to restore the altar's power. There are four lights and they get extinguished in a short period of time. So, be haste.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010110
text: Restored the altar. Report back to the Owl Chief.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010111
text: The Altar is restored. Ask the Owl Chief if it worked.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010112
text: Collect the power of the Owl Sculptures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010113
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture says that to ensure the utter destruction of the Mind Control Tower, the collected power from the Owl Sculptures are needed. Find the owl sculptures and get their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010114
text: Collected all the power from the owl sculptures. Report back to the Owl Chief.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010115
text: Even collected the power from the owl chief sculpture. Speak with the Owl Chief Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010116
text: Destroy the Mind Control Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010117
text: Destroy the Mind Control Tower with the power of the Owl Sculptures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010118
text: The Mind Control Tower has been destroyed. Return to the Owl Chief Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010119
text: Mardas is standing beside the Owl Chief Sculpture. Ask him about what they are discussing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010120
text: Speak with the Owl Chief Sculpture again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010121
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture says that it will think of a plan after listening to what Mardas has to say. Meanwhile, ask what you should you do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010122
text: The Owl Sculpture is currently coming up with a plan to solve the problem caused by the demons based on the story from Mardas. Ask what you should do while they are discussing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010123
text: Collect the Energy of Karolis Springs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010124
text: Go to the spot where it is said to be the hot spot for the energy and collect the said energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010125
text: Destroy the Tombstones of Nestopa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010126
text: Destroy the Tombstone of Nestopa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010127
text: You see the tombstone of Nestopa, about which Albinas has talked, over there. Just like Albinas has told you, it looked very corrupted. Destroy it at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010128
text: The tombstone of Nestopa certainly is corrupted. Quickly, destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010129
text: Check the destroyed tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010130
text: Destroyed the tombstone like Albinas has told you to. Check it again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010131
text: Destroyed the tombstone just like Albinas told you to. Now, go back to Albinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010132
text: On your way back to Albinas, someone appears. Perhaps, the maker of the tombstone? Talk with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010133
text: A man appears as soon as the tombstone is destroyed. Who could it possibly be? Speak with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010134
text: Damijonas furiously explains that the tombstones are not corrupted. The reason for their red aura is that it is protection against those with ill will. When a person with malicious intents touches it, the aura attracts nearby monsters. The man demands to know who spread such false accusations. It is for the best to go to Albinas, explain the situation and bring him back to here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010135
text: Albinas is not in the place he was before. Return to Damijonas and explain the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010136
text: Explain yourself

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010137
text: Damijonas is still furious about the fact that the tombstones are destroyed. Perhaps, listening to what he has to say and let him release all his anger until he calms down a bit. Talk to Damijonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010138
text: The scolding from Damijonas was a long and harsh one. But it's finished now. Ask him what you can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010139
text: Restoring the Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010140
text: Tell Damijonas, you will restore the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010141
text: Obtain some stones that can be used to restore the tombstone, bring them to Nestos Camp. They will turn them into the materials for the restoration

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010142
text: Now, ask Gedas what would be the final step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010143
text: Deliver the News to Eduinas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010144
text: You need to tell Eduinas what happened so far. Go to Eduinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010145
text: Tell Damijonas what you know

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010146
text: Finally, go talk to Damijonas the tombkeeper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010147
text: Meet with Leopoldas of the Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010148
text: Speak with Leopoldas, the new recruit manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010149
text: Serapinas is in charge of Public Relation. Now, find a player on the field, use the Kedora Merchant Alliance Scroll on him or her. You and the audience will get Kedora Merchant Alliance Benefits. If you or the other party a) already had gotten the benefits previously or b) Over Level 10, the benefits will not apply. The scroll's cooldown is not precisely short so be sure to check their level and the fact whether they have been informed previously.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010150
text: You've completed promoting for Kedora Merchant Alliance. Go back to Serapinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010151
text: Lost and Found

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010152
text: Find Edita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010153
text: Go and find Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010154
text: Find stuff that the lost Merchant Alliance items

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010155
text: Go to the spot Edita has pointed to and retrieve the items that were lost during Medzio Diena by the Merchant Alliance. And if possible, slice up the monsters you meet along the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010156
text: Talk with Edita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010157
text: Secured the thing Edita was talking about. Give it back to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010158
text: Taking Out the Trash On Your Way There

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010159
text: Ask Edita if there is anything else she wants me to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010160
text: Defeat the monsters and retrieve the items

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010161
text: The monsters are already infesting the area where the items are supposed to be. Teach them a lesson and retrieve the goods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010162
text: You have got the goods but to know what they are, you should consult with Jurate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010163
text: Listen more details about the retrieval of the goods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010164
text: Inspect the areas where the goods may be

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010165
text: Use the detector Edita to search the area. Use it in the area marked on the map.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010166
text: Report to Edita

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010167
text: Successfully retrieved the goods all thanks to the goods. Deliver them to Eidta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010168
text: Educational Materials of the Kedora Merchant Alliance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010169
text: Go visit Margellius who is inj charge of records. He seems he needs some help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010170
text: Retrieve the Educational Materials

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010171
text: Get the Kedora Merchant Alliance Educational Materials back from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010172
text: Got all the educational materials. Bring them to Margellius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010173
text: Educational Guidelines of the Kedora Merchant Alliance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010174
text: Ask Margellius if there is anything else you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010175
text: To make educational materials, a special dye is needed. To make that dye, you need some fresh body fluid from the monsters. When you put the traps Margellius gave near the monsters, the monsters will get caught allowing you to obtain the body fluid. Remember the monsters will die quickly when they get caught by the traps so you should pull them out fast. Only the monsters far in the town square, better get there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010176
text: Erecting the Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010177
text: Finding Materials For the Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010178
text: Nestopa is silently doing their work in Fasika Plateau and in this place. One of them, Antanas, what she does is erecting tombstones. Help her by bringing the neccearry materials to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010179
text: Acquired all the necessary materials for erecting tombstones. Now, go back to Antanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010180
text: Ask her if, now with all the necessary materials, she could make tombstones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010181
text: Follow her instruction and build a tombstone with the materials you have.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010182
text: You erected well. Say farewell to Antanas and go on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010183
text: Now, talk to Giedra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010184
text: Lost Sign

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010185
text: Go to Kestas, another member of Nestopa.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010186
text: Retrieve Nesto's Sign

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010187
text: Retrieve the Nesto's Signs from the nearby monsters and give them back to troubled Kestas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010188
text: Giving the Sign Back

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010189
text: Got enough signs. Bring them back to Kestas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010190
text: Kill those monsters. They are after the signs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010191
text: Talk further with Kestas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010192
text: Defeat the monsters that are after getting the records

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010193
text: Speak with Grave Robber Amanda in the habitants' area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010194
text: What you found in the secret area is a strange scroll. Move back to the habitants' area and talk with Amanda again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010195
text: The chest, the one Amanda saw, with a special power hidden inside was actually containing demons inside. Defeat the incoming demons first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010196
text: The oncoming wave of demons have fallen. Talk with Amanda again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010197
text: Amanda becomes increasingly nervous after her monocle produces no useful result. Speak with Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010198
text: Amanda suggests to split out to look for the special power. Defeat the demons in the Bingcoolers Path area and look for the special power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010199
text: Nothing unusual here. Return to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010200
text: All work and no fruit. Speak with Amanda again

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010201
text: Search the Leima Small Square

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010202
text: Amanda says she saw something great in the Leima Small Square. Find out what she saw.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010203
text: Only an old manager was in the Leima Small Square. Ask the Old Manager about what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010204
text: The Old Manager is happy to help you on the quest to find the revelation. Speak with the Old Manager again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010205
text: Collect Mushrooms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010206
text: The Old Manager says that in order to get pass the traps he set up, one must a certification ticket. The ticket's main ingredient is mushrooms, while on your way there, speak with Amanda and report the situation to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010207
text: Deliver to the Old Manager

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010208
text: You've told Amanda about what happened and gathered enough mushrooms. Give the mushrooms to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010209
text: To the Storage Quarter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010210
text: You've collected enough mushrooms to make a certification ticket. Ask the Old Manager what's other gredients.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010211
text: Collect Earth Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010212
text: The Old Manager says injecting spells into mushrooms is the next step but his old and withered body cannot use spells. Defeat the monsters and gather Earth Crystals, the perfect replacements.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010213
text: You've gathered enough Earth Crystals. Give them to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010214
text: You finally have gotten the certification ticket that ensures safe access to the storage quarter. Speak to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010215
text: The Old Manager has left for the Storage Quarter and will be waiting for you there. This is the chance where you can leave a note for Amanda to make her own certification ticket.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010216
text: Speak with the Old Manager in the Storage Quarter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010217
text: Left the note safely. Go to the Old Manager in the Storage Quarter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010218
text: You've met with the Old Manager. Ask the Old Manager on what to do to get the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010219
text: Collect Rajatad's Egg

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010220
text: The spirits from the age of Ruklys contain the knowledge of where the revelation is, but they are too violent to speak. Collect Rajatad's Egg to create the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010221
text: You've gotten the Rajatad's Egg. Deliver it to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010222
text: The next ingredient is needed. Speak with the Old Manager again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010223
text: Collect Demon Bones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010224
text: The Restraint Token that will hold down the spirits and calm enough to talk. For that, you need to have demon bones. Defeat the demons and get their bones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010225
text: Acquired the demon bones. Take them to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010226
text: You've completed the first step of making the Restraint Token. Ask the Old Manager about the second step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010227
text: Absorb the vitalities of demons with the Absorption Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010228
text: The demon's vitality is needed to create the Restraint Token that will restrain the spirits. Place the Absorption Orb nearby demons to suck them dry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010229
text: Filled the orb with the life force of demons. Take it back to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010230
text: The Absorption Orb is complete. Talk to the Old Manager to read the memories of the spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010231
text: All the preparation for reading the memories of the spirits are done. Restrain the spirits with the Restraint Token and take them to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010232
text: The Old Manager has read their memories. Speak with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010233
text: You are slowly putting pieces of puzzle together and gained a broader understanding of the revelation. Speak with the Old Manager again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010234
text: Bring the restrained spirit with the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010235
text: The Old Manager can now access to the deepest part of their memories. Bring the spirit back again by using the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010236
text: There are spirits who have been robbed the well-deserved eternal rests in the arms of the goddesses and dwelling the Fortress of the Land. Perhaps, a Dievdirbys Master can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010237
text: The Dievdirbys Master seems to have a plan to lead the spirits. Speak with the Dievdirbys Master again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010238
text: Create an owl sculpture and lead the spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010239
text: Install the owl sculpture in the Storage Quarter of the Fortress of the Land. After that, lead the lost spirits to the owl sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010240
