text: You've lead the lost spirits well. Report to the Dievdirbys Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010241
text: Premier Eminent does not seem to be a human. To reveal his identity, speak with Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010242
text: Inspect Premier Eminent with the monocle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010243
text: Amanda asks you to see the real Premier Eminent for yourself. Use the monocle to find out the true identity of Premier Eminent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010244
text: Premier Eminent is a demon! Consult with Amanda on what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010245
text: Premier Eminent will be waiting for you. Speak with him to avoid any suspicion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010246
text: In order to repair the device destroyed by Ruklys, the parts are required. Search for the suitable parts from the defensive traps at the battle field on Ataka Side Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010247
text: You've got all the parts you can get. Speak with Amanda before returning to Premier Eminent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010248
text: Amanda has been working on the ways of the magic circle so far. Speak with Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010249
text: Collect Demon Blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010250
text: In order to activate the foundation stone, you must re-inscribe the letters with something that has spells in it. Firstly, collect the Demon Blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010251
text: Inscribe the letters with the demon blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010252
text: You've collected enough demon blood. Inscribe the letters on the pillars of the foundation stones at the Slepti Watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010253
text: You've activated the the foundation stones at the Slepti Watchtower. Ask Amanda what should we do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010254
text: Destroy the Demon Totems

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010255
text: The foundation stones at the Ikveta Podium is not working properly due to the demon totems around them. Destroy the totems first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010256
text: Activate the Foundation Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010257
text: You've destroyed the Demon Totem. Try to activate the foundation stones once again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010258
text: The defensive magic circle is active. Go back to Premier Eminent before he gets suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010259
text: Defeat Mandara

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010260
text: The light from the device and the magic circle burns Premier Eminent! For now, defeat Mandara summoned by Premier Eminent!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010261
text: Defeat Mandara summoned by Premier Eminent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010262
text: Activate the Ruklys device to find the revelation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010263
text: All you need to do now is to find the revelation. Activate the Ruklys' device and find the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010264
text: Found the revelation. Get out of the secret chamber and speak with Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010265
text: Amanda has some unfinished business in the Fortress of the Land. Speak with Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010266
text: Find stone that can be used to inscribe Amanda's achievements

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010267
text: Amanda is excited that she is the first grave robber ever to venture this far deep inside the Fortress of the Land. Find stone with which can inscribe her achievements.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010268
text: Found a perfectly sized stone, but it's too big to carry it. Tell Amanda the location of the stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010269
text: Grave Robber Amanda saw something from you. Speak with Grave Robber Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010270
text: Grave Robber Amanda asks you to bring the pages of Ruklys' Journal to her if you happen to find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010271
text: You've found all the pages of the journal. Bring them to Grave Robber Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010272
text: The identity of the Old Manager was Premier Eminent who lived 600 years ago. Is he telling the truth? But for now, return to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010273
text: Amanda is having doubts about Premier Eminent. But first, meet up with Premier Eminent in the final battleground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010274
text: You saw Premier Eminent talking so freely with the demons! Hurry, meet up with Amanda again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010275
text: First Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010276
text: Guide on the First Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010277
text: Second Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010278
text: Guide on the Second Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010279
text: Final Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010280
text: Guide on the Final Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010281
text: Talk to Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010282
text: Talk with Rose waiting for you in the town XX

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010283
text: Inspect the town XX and find what happened here

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010284
text: Inspect the town XX to find out what happened here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010285
text: Tell Rose about your theory on what might have happened here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010286
text: Rose found something. Talk with Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010287
text: Find the marble that fell to the ground

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010288
text: Rose says that the marble on the ground is trying to lead us the way. Follow the marble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010289
text: You cannot see the marble. Consult with Rose on what should we do now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010290
text: Consult with Rose on what should we do now

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010291
text: Inspect the nearby to find the marble

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010292
text: Rose thinks some traces of the townspeople can be found somewhere around here. Inspect the nearby area to find some clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010293
text: Talk with a resident of the town XX

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010294
text: There is someone whom you think is a resident of the town XX. Speak with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010295
text: Talk to the supposed resident of the town XX

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010296
text: Demons have appeared. Defeat them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010297
text: Defeated all the demons. Tell Rose and the resident that it is safe now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010298
text: Save Rose and the Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010299
text: Talk with a resident of the town XX

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010300
text: Listen to what the resident of the town xx has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010301
text: Listen to the resident's story

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010302
text: Talk to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010303
text: Talk to Herbalist Ash

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010304
text: Talk to Herbalist Ash who is seriously out of breath

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010305
text: Defeat the demons around Herbalist Ash

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010306
text: Herbalist Ash is extremely afraid of nearby demons. Calm him down by eliminating all the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010307
text: Talk to Herbalist Ash

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010308
text: Defeat the nearby demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010309
text: Herbalist Ash is thinking hard to figure out something. Ask him what he's thinking about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010310
text: Get the grass the demons are gathering

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010311
text: Bring the grass that demons were gathering to Herbalist Ash to see what it is. Go to the spot he informed you about and get the grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010312
text: Got the grass. Bring it back to Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010313
text: Herbalist Ash face froze up upon inspecting the grass. Ask him what's going on

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010314
text: Get the the body fluid of the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010315
text: Herbalist Ash wants to keep the grass from growing. Get the Monster Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010316
text: Sprinkle the Monster Fluid on the grass

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010317
text: Pouring the Monster Fluid on the grass will prevent it from ever growing back. Sprinkle the Monster Fluid on the grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010318
text: You've poured all the fluid. Talk with Herbalist Ash

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010319
text: Druid Leja got hurt while chasing after the ferrets who stole the food. To regain her health, find the appropriate herb from the spot she told you about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010320
text: Bring back the stolen food from the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010321
text: Retrieve the stolen food from the ferrets and give them back to the townspeople. You can only obtain Stolen Food by using Paralysis Powder on a ferret while its HP is 50% or below.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010322
text: Retrieve %s from the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010323
text: You've encountered the mysterious girl once again while on your way back to give the stolen food back to the townspeople. The mysterious girl ran away after sensing the townspeople approaching. Give the retrieved food to the town elder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010324
text: Destroy the demon totems controlling the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010325
text: The elder says the ferrets became ferocious after the demon invasion. He insists that the demon totems are to blame and asks you to destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010326
text: Gather Gigantic Fruit Juice from the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010327
text: One of the biggest concerns the townspeople has is lack of drinkable water ever since not only the water from the river but also the fruits from the plants nearby are poisoned. The ferrets, on the other hand, seems to know a way to purify the juice from the giant fruits and drink them. The townspeople ask you to bring the fruit juice the ferrets extracted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010328
text: Got enough Gigantic Fruit from the ferrets. Bring it to the Village Resident.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010329
text: Steal %s from the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010330
text: While you were away getting the Gigantic Fruit Juice, the ferrets raided the town again and stole foods from the town. Speak with the townfolk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010331
text: The townfolk says that if you contaminate the foods with the poinsoned water, the ferrets will no longer steal food from the town. But it will only work if the recently looted foods would do the trick. Bring the red water from the old well to the townspeople.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010332
text: The amount of red water you've got is enough to contaminate the food. The townfolk will tell you where the foods is. Speak with the townfolk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010333
text: The townfolk informs you that the ferrets hide the stolen foods inside the fruit baskets located throughout the place Some of the stolen food are not fresh. Inspect each carefully to find the fresh ones only and sprinkle the red water on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010334
text: The elder's grandson came back from checking up on the ferrets whether the ferrets turned back to normal after the demon totems have been destroyed but the expression on his face tells a bad news. Speak with the elder's gradnson.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010335
text: The elder's grandson explains that even though the demon totems are gone, the ferrets are still ferocious, Consult with Dievdirbys Widas about the way to revert the ferrets back to normal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010336
text: Dievdirbys Widas tells you that a sculpture of peace, a result of his long years of research, might do the trick. Set up the sculpture of peace and the ferrets will be tame again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010337
text: The sculpture of peace has been installed but it only provoked the ferrets and became even more violent. Tell Widas about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010338
text: Druid Leja was on her way to inspect the giant Goddess Statue, but the demon-controlled ferrets tied her feet up. But then, suddenly a the mysterious girl appears and the ferrets went after her instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010339
text: Defeat the ferrets and find a trace of the girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010340
text: Druid Leja points out the direction the girl went to. She says that the ferrets are chasing after her so kill them while on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010341
text: Defeat the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010342
text: While defeating ferrets, you got that strange sensation again. Follow that sensation, it will lead you to the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010343
text: Druid Leja tells you that the ferrets were carrying a strange-looking bag and scruffling off to somewhere. She informs you of the ferret's hideout. Leja says that it's too dangerous to go alone so she will make you a scent that will make the ferrets powerless. But first, get her some Drowsy Herb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010344
text: Druid Leja along with the Drowsy Scent she promised, will tell you the possible spots where the ferrets might have taken to the girl to. Speak with Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010345
text: Inspect the ferret's hideout after setting up the drowsy scent

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010346
text: You must save the girl while the ferrets are drowsy from the scent. Keep in mind that the scent requires a campfire to work and its duration is not that long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010347
text: Save the girl while the ferrets are drowsy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010348
text: The Goddess' Assignment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010349
text: The moment you set the girl free, she runs to somewhere. Follow the traces she left behind and go after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010350
text: Talk to the Mysterious Girl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010351
text: You found the girl standing in front of the foot of the giant Goddess Statue. Speak with the girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010352
text: The mysterious girl is vacantly looking at a mysterious seedlings. Speak with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010353
text: Dig up under the Seedling

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010354
text: The mysterious girl hesitantly speaks that there is something buried under the seedling. Examine the Seedling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010355
text: Examine the Goddess' Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010356
text: Found the Goddess' Orb under the mysterious seedling. Examine the Goddess' Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010357
text: Speak with Druid Benes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010358
text: Druid Benes is studying the ferrets and what made them ferocious. Ask him if there is any way to calm them down.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010359
text: Record the behaviors of the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010360
text: Druid Benes says that if you transform into a ferret, you can communicate with the ferrets. However, the ferrets all remembers the scent of Benes so they run away even in the ferret form. Benes will write you Ferret Transformation Scroll and what you need to do is record the behaviors of the ferrets on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010361
text: Deliver the Scroll to Druid Benes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010362
text: You've successfully recorded the behaviours of the ferrets. Hand it over to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010363
text: You've written the behaviors of the ferrets on the empty scroll. Speak with Benes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010364
text: Understanding the ferrets

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010365
text: The Ferret Transformation Scroll that Druid Benes gave will make you be able to transform into a ferret. Ask the ferrets around and find out why are they attacking the people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010366
text: The reason behind the ferrets attacking the pople was to drive the people off. Return to Druid Benes and report your findings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010367
text: Unbelievable Reality

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010368
text: You've transformed into a ferret and talked with them as one of them. Report their true reason to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010369
text: Set the modified block of wood and observe the ferrets' reactions

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010370
text: Druid Benes says it is very difficult to determine whether the ferrets are actually thinking that or it is merely due to the demon's mind control. Druid Benes asks you to set up a modified block of wood shaped like an injured townfolk near the ferrets. Even if what they say are true, they won't attack an injured man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010371
text: The ferrets attacked the wooden block shaped like an injured townfolk. Report back to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010372
text: Unbelieveable Reality

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010373
text: The ferrets attacked the wooden block shaped like an injured townfolk. Report back to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010374
text: Use the terrible scent to drive the ferrets off

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010375
text: Druid Benes believes that considering they are attacking even the injureds, they must be under the demon control.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010376
text: Return to Druid Benes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010377
text: Used the Terrible Scent to drive the ferrets off. Return to Druid Benes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010378
text: Search for Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010379
text: Goddess Laima asks you to find the imprisoned Goddess Lada and foil the demon's plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010380
text: Speak with Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010381
text: While battling Demon Lord Zaura, the force preventing you from approaching Goddess Lada has disappeared. Speak with Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010382
text: While battling Demon Lord Zaura, the force preventing you from approaching Goddess Lada has disappeared. Speak with Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010383
text: You must find a way to free Goddess Lada. Speak with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010384
text: Destroy the Restraining Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010385
text: You must destroy the Restraining Device holding Goddess Lada hostage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010386
text: Silent Whisper from the Goddess: The restraining device is keeping whatever the little power I have got left down and holding me its prisoner. The power of the orb is enough to destroy the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010387
text: All the restraining devices are destroyed. Speak with Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010388
text: The Vitality Absorption Device is made to absorb Goddess Lada's vitality and send it to the Kruvina Suppressor. Gather up the demon blood and pour it over the machine to deactivate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010389
text: Silent Whisper from the Goddess: The Vitality Absorption Device is draining my life force into the magic circle.{nl}The device is designed to absorb only the pure vitality of a goddess, any other form of life force will halt the device.{nl}Especially, the blood of filthy demons would have a severe effect on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010390
text: You've gathered enough demon blood. Pour it over the Vitality Absorption Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010391
text: Defeat demons to gather %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010392
text: Destroy the Kruvina Suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010393
text: The Kruvina Suppressor uses a portion of the vitality from Goddess Lada inject it into Kruvina to make one. The orb from Goddess Laima can cause the Kruvina Suppressor go into spell overload.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010394
text: Silent Whisper from the Goddess: The Kruvina Suppressor uses a portion of the vitality from Goddess Lada inject it into Kruvina to make one. The orb from Goddess Laima can cause the Kruvina Suppressor go into spell overload..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010395
text: Destroyed all three machines by following the instruction from Goddess Lada. Report back to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010396
text: You've destroyed the Kruvina Generators like Goddess Lada told you to. Speak with Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010397
text: Destroy Incomplete Kruvina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010398
text: Goddess Lada says even though the Kruvina Generator is destroyed, the Incomplete Kruvina exists. It is extremely dangerous even in its imperfect form and must be destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010399
text: The Watcher abruptly intervened and took Kruvina. However, you did defeat Demon Lord Zaura. Report back to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010400
text: Defeat Demon Lord Zaura

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010401
text: Tne Watcher took the Incomplete Kruvina away before you could do anything about it. Report this to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010402
text: Look closely at the goddess' orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010403
text: Goddess Laima told Goddess Laima, before she went on wanderings, that if a traveler comes with Laima's orb, guide him or her to the giant statue. She tells you to go to the hand of the giant statue with the goddess orb that has faint Lada's power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010404
text: At the hand of the giant Goddess Statue, you've realized that Demon Goddess Giltine is holding Goddess Laima hostage. Goddess Laima gave you the mission as a savior. Report this discovery to Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010405
text: Temple Rebuilding Preparation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010406
text: Speak with the Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010407
text: The Village Priest seems to want to ask you for a favor. Speak with the Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010408
text: Defeat the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010409
text: The Village Priest is trying to rebuild the Laima temple for the day when she comes back. But cleaning out the remaining demons and purifying the land would be first in order. The Village Priest asked you to help them on the mission to drive the demons off.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010410
text: You've defeated the remaining demons. Report back to the Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010411
text: The Remaining Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010412
text: You've defeated the remaining demons like the village priest asked you to. Speak with the Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010413
text: Find the master in Orsha who knows how to purify land

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010414
text: The village priest is looking for a way to purify the corrupted land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010415
text: Speak with the Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010416
text: The master ?? you've met in Orsha got you Purification Scroll. Go back to the Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010417
text: Obtain %s from the master in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010418
text: Acquired Purification Scroll from the master in Orsha. Speak with the Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010419
text: Purify the Evil Aura

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010420
text: While you were away acquiring the scroll, the priest located several demon totems planted throughout the area. The priest suspects the totems to be the cause of the corruption. The priest asked you to destroy the totems and purify the land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010421
text: Return to the Village Priest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010422
text: You've destroyed the demon totems and purified the land like the priest asked you to. Go back to the Village Priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010423
text: The village officer has a favor to ask. Speak with the officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010424
text: Blossom the Earth Flower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010425
text: The land rich with life force was found during a search for a temple build site. The officer asks you to plant a Earth Flower Seed. What the officer said was that the Earth Flower absorbing the fertile life force will help Goddess Lada recover much faster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010426
text: Speak with Goddess Lada

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151016_010427
text: The Earth Flower blossomed. Speak with Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010428
text: The light bead, I saw it too.{nl}The demons are collecting them all over the place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010429
text: The Owl Sculptures are sending them off to somewhere...{nl}Perhaps, you could find its trail from the Owl Sculpture you've just seen, can you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010430
text: If it were anyone else, I would have stopped you but to you, words of warning will only fall flat.{nl}Not sure if it is bravery or recklessness...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010431
text: I need to rest here a bit.{nl}I exhausted all my strength running away. {nl}Stay any longer with you, my dear life won't stay any longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010432
text: I don't know about the identity of the light bead.{nl}However, it does not have that same feeling the demon-produceds have.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010433
text: Owl Chief

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010434
text: Thank you. Really, thank you.{nl}If I got under the influence of the demons,{nl}I shudder to think what would have happened to the poor souls...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010435
text: The light bead you just saw is a human soul.{nl}Very pure souls. They were killed by the invading demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010436
text: The Owl Sculptures used to lead those souls to the right path.{nl}But the demons corrupted the forest and controlled us.{nl}At the moment, my comrades under the demon control {nl}are leading those poor souls accordance with the demon control.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010437
text: I know I do not deserve this but...{nl}I do not want to see the souls being lost. {nl}Please, destroy the Mind Control Tower that is controlling my comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010438
text: Oh, the goddess must be praised! She has sent you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010439
text: If the Mind Control Tower gets destroyed, the impact might affect my comrades as well.{nl}So, before destroying the tower, gather up the energy of the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010440
text: Restore the Karolis Altar and the energy of the forest will be restored as well.{nl}I will give you the Guide Owl's Will.{nl}It will direct you to the ruined Karolis Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010441
text: The Karolis Altar used to collect the energy of the forest.{nl}Ever since, it was destroyed, the energy of the forest got significantly weakened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010442
text: The Altar of the Forest is still strong and functional,{nl}but we need Karolis' Light to spread the power all over the forest.{nl}The weakened light is the cause of the energy not spreading far.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010443
text: The comrades will revert back to their right minds, {nl}if the Karolis' Altar and that of the forest is restored.{nl}We, Owl Sculptures, live alongside the rest of the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010444
text: I've been waiting for you.{nl}I knew you succeeded since the energy of the forest was increased.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010445
text: I had my hopes up but it seems the Karolis Altar is not enough {nl}to restore the energy of the forest fully.{nl}The energy from the altar of the forest needs to be spread as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010446
text: The altar of the forest is the pond across the pond.{nl}If you get there, Karolis' Light will be spreading the energy of the altar to the entire forest.{nl}The near-extinguished light needs to be re-ignited and {nl}then the energy will spread out to the every corner of the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010447
text: There are four places where Karolis' Light is.{nl}Each lasts for a short time, but if you manage to light all four of them, they sustain each other.{nl}Be quick and nimble when lighting all four of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010448
text: Back in the old days, there were several altars but now only one stands.{nl}The demons indeed ruined our forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010449
text: The energy from the altar is successfully spread.{nl}All the other owls are no long under control.{nl}The only thing left is to destroy the Mind Control Tower and the security of this area is ensured.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010450
text: The Mind Control Tower is charged with great evil energy. Touching it directly will put {nl}even you in danger. My Owl Sculpture comrades have regained their senses, {nl}although minute, we will lend you our strength. Not yet complete but together, {nl}it will be enough to fight against the evil energy from the Mind Control Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010451
text: Speak to the Owl Sculptures, you have met along the way here.{nl}They want to thank the one who saved them.{nl}They will lend you their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010452
text: Please, come back to me after gathering power from all the Owl Sculptures.{nl}I will combine their power into one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010453
text: I hope, none of my comrades said anything that might offend you.{nl}They are all very grateful for what you've done for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010454
text: Now, I have added my power to the pile of power. I will make them into one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010455
text: I had some doubt but fortunately, when combined the power is stronger than I expected.{nl}This will help you destroying the Mind Control Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010456
text: I am truly sorry that all we could repay you so little {nl}for the tremendous service you've done for us.{nl}But I do have the feeling that goddess will be leading you from somewhere.{nl}Somehow, I have that feeling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010457
text: There is an Owl Sculpture a bit far from here. It's not responding yet.{nl}I am a bit worried...{nl}But we have important business to finish first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010458
text: You've destroyed the Mind Control Tower as well?{nl}Now, peace will return to Karolis Springs after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010459
text: Mardas came to speak to with you.{nl}He has witnessed quite a lot of demon atrocities.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010460
text: It seems that Letas Stream is under the demon reign.{nl}Could you lend us your strength a little longer?{nl}You are our only hope.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010461
text: We could find the solution if Mardas and I combine what we know and have seen.{nl}We will come up with the way to fend off the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010462
text: Firstly, we need Romuva of Suppression which is infused with the divine power of the forest.{nl}Guide Owl Sculpture in Letas Stream will be able to make you one.{nl}But it is not responding to my will, that means it is still under the demon control.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010463
text: Please, find the Guide Owl Sculpture in Letas Stream.{nl}Save it and tell it I sent you and you need Romuva of Suppression.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010464
text: To the north of Karolis Springs, you will come across the spot high in the energy of the forest.{nl}There you will find the energy of Karolis Springs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010465
text: Approach the Energy of Karolist Springs, they will approach you back.{nl}When there are enough, they will create the crystalized essence of Karolis Springs. {nl}Take it to the Guide Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010466
text: Oh, the horror of horrors, Mardas have witnessed.{nl}We must not let it continue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010467
text: {nl}O those poor souls... Countless would be the number of souls we have given to the demons.{nl}It truly breaks my heart.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010468
text: Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010469
text: Ugh... What happened... Who are you?{nl}Did you save me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010470
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture sent you?{nl}The Romuva of Suppression... the crisis must be overwhelmingly big, if that is needed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010471
text: The Romuva of Suppression is not something one should make lightly,{nl}but the desperate situation calls for a desperate measure. {nl}For the good of all, I will make you one. In order to make one, Letas' Sacred Branch is needed.{nl}It's a branch from Letas' Sacred Tree. But for that, the energy of the forest is needed...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010472
text: Ah, that is the one left, is that so?{nl}Alright. Go to the northern empty place of Letas Stream, sprinkle the crystalised essence there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010473
text: The holy tree is not easy to find straightaway.{nl}Keep sprinkling the essence until the tree show itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010474
text: Letas' Sacred Tree is something like a manifested will of the forest.{nl}Before the demon invasion, the tree could be easily seen but now, completely gone.{nl}But it will show itself again when it senses the energy of the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010475
text: Have you found Letas' Sacred Tree?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010476
text: I feared if the holy tree would not appear even in the presence of the energy. {nl}I am glad I was wrong. I suspect you are the special one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010477
text: The demons weakened Letas' Sacred Branch.{nl}It needs to be revigorated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010478
text: Purify the evil energy monsters have and feed it to the branch.{nl}Use the branch on the monsters to follow the aforementioned procedure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010479
text: Weak monsters do not stand a chance against the sacred branch.{nl}The holy power burns through the darkness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010480
text: It highly trusts you for it is the Owl Chief Sculpture is the one who sent you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010481
text: Is the power stored in the branch enough?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010482
text: Now, I will get you Romuva of Suppression.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010483
text: Romuva of Suppression is ready but... I fear it will not be enough.{nl}I do not know what the Owl Chief Sculpture is think, really.{nl}I am powerless, myself. So, I cannot help you on that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010484
text: A person called Mardas would come up with the solution?{nl}What are you waiting for then? Go talk to him.{nl}Perhaps, he is already here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010485
text: We are grateful for Mardas helping us but what happened to him is a real tragedy.{nl}We, the Owl Sculptures, de facto carried out the demon's plan. We certainly feel great guilt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010486
text: You are just in time!{nl}So, did you get Romuva of Suppression?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010487
text: By talking with the Owl Chief Sculpture, I got the feeling we could work this out.{nl}The demons are using the evil energy to corrupt Letas Stream. {nl}And extracting that energy to trap souls.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010488
text: Soul Starvation must be destroyed but the evil energy is far too thick and it is protected by the magic circle.{nl}Firstly, eliminate the evil energy first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010489
text: The evil energy is being generated from the center of the forest. You can get to it by following the right path.{nl}Set up Romuva of Suppression near it, it will suppress to the holy energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010490
text: It breaks my heart to think about the folks back home but I am powerless at the moment. All I can do now is to help you. It is small consolation I can feel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010491
text: The evil energy is still coming up, you say?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010492
text: The corruption is much more severe than I thought.{nl}We must make haste and eliminate Black Smoke extracting the energy of the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010493
text: Without Black Smoke, the demon structures will be weakened.{nl}However, from what I have seen. There are Eyes of Surveillance installed. That might make it difficult to approach it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010494
text: It might be near-impossible but you need to infiltrate the place by avoiding{nl}the Surveillance Sphere set around the Eyes of Surveillance.{nl}At the end of the road filled with Eyes of Surveillance, there are magic circles.{nl}Destroy the magic circles to destroy the Eyes of Surveillance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010495
text: Take care of Eyes of Surveillance. Then, use the Romuva of Suppression to eliminate Black Smoke.{nl}It's very dangerous so please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010496
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture sure knew a lot.{nl}It must have spent its entire life in this forest but how did it get such deep and broad knowledge?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010497
text: Good work.{nl}Are you hurt?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010498
text: Now, Soul Starvation is destructible.{nl}There must be magic circles around it but they can be easily disabled.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010499
text: There is a specific order by which you need to disable the magic circles.{nl}Even if you fail, do not fear. You can try again and you will find that order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010500
text: The demons might be getting suspicious. After all, the evil energy and Black Smoke are gone.{nl}You must hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010501
text: If the souls are set free, perhaps, this sorrow and rage I feel might go away.{nl}I cannot be too sure about it at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010502
text: Is that so. All the souls are set free.{nl}The Owl Chief Sculpture says that those souls would be lead by the owls well again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010503
text: It would be better to give Romuva of Suppression to Guide Owl Sculpture.{nl}It will help other owl sculptures regain their powers.{nl}I will deliver the news to the Owl Chief Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010504
text: It is safe to say that Letas Stream is free from the threat of the demons.{nl}I cannot thank you enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010505
text: I do not believe it is no coincidence that you came to us.{nl}I sense the divine will of the goddess guiding you here.{nl}I pray she will continue to guide you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010506
text: Gratitude fills up my heart.{nl}I apologize for my initial rudeness. I was very confused.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010507
text: Jurus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010508
text: This letter is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010509
text: written by Eras.{nl}He's dead... This is the first news I have heard about him in years. It's far too saddening and cruel.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010510
text: Thank you for delivering the letter to me.{nl}At least, now I know what happened to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010511
text: My comrades with whom we share the same will must be being chased just like I was.{nl}We set the rendevous point at Orsha but my heart grows worrisome...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010512
text: My brethrens with whom we share the same will must be being chased just like I was.{nl}We set the rendevous point at Orsha... I wonder and worry where they might be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010513
text: Alina... too?{nl}How could Ignas ever do something like that! Was he out of his mind?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010514
text: Alina is dead and no more but I will carry on with Alina in my heart. I will carry on what Lydia Schaffen has started.{nl}I will survive and get to Orsha!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010515
text: When I first met you, you were weak and soft but now, look at you!{nl}Good, I will teach you the final skill of barbarians.{nl}I will be frank, I do have my doubts about you on whether you can handle the skill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010516
text: Talk is cheap. What matters the most is can you do it.{nl}This medicinal liquid is not actually medicinal. Rather it's a poison. Back home, we drink it as part of training.{nl}Drink it and kill the monsters down at the Apsimesti Crossroads while your body is under the influence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010517
text: It won't be easy, I tell you that. You are already strong so I won't think less of you if you don't want to go through this training.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010518
text: Even I cannot match your passion to become strong.{nl}So be it. I will give you all the skills a barbarian can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010519
text: Chicken out

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010520
text: Asking about the light bead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010521
text: I will follow it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010522
text: Looks dangerous. I'm out

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010523
text: The light bead went over the hill and disappeared!{nl}Keep following it by changing your route

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010524
text: Don't worry, I will do it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010525
text: You've got hands right? Why don't you do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010526
text: You found the Karolis Altar Crystal{nl}Now, it's time to find the fragments from the Karolis Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010527
text: Restoring the Karolis Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010528
text: I will spread the energy of the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010529
text: Lend me your power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010530
text: Don't bother me

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010531
text: I will blow it up

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010532
text: What would happen if I take the power and run

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010533
text: Another Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010534
text: I'm off to save the Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010535
text: Mardas will do the rest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010536
text: Saving the Guide Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010537
text: Restoring Karolis Springs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010538
text: Sacred Tree of the Forest (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010539
text: Show the crystal formed by the energy from Karolis Springs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010540
text: Meh, what can we do

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010541
text: Sacred Tree of the Forest (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010542
text: Take the branch and go

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010543
text: Are you absolutely sure?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010544
text: Talk about Mardas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010545
text: It worries me too

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010546
text: Where could I find that evil energy?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010547
text: Eh? Evil energy? I don't want to go near it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010548
text: Trust me

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010549
text: My life ain't cheap, pal. Why don't you do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010550
text: Ominous Black Smoke

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010551
text: Soul Starvation (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010552
text: Let's finish this once and for all

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010553
text: I need to lie down a bit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010554
text: Soul Starvation (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010555
text: Using Romuva of Suppression

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010556
text: A Chest Locked By A Spell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010557
text: An unknown force is keeping the chest shut!{nl}Destroy the monsters nearby to feed it magical power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010558
text: A Story Left Behind by Eras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010559
text: Picking up the letter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010560
text: You've found a letter left by someone{nl}Look for the recipient

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010561
text: Talking about the letter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010562
text: Letas Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010563
text: The energy of the Letas Altar is suppressed by the{nl}malicious force of the nearby monsters{nl}Purge them of their sins!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010564
text: Fight the Extreme [Barbarian Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010565
text: The skills I use now are good enough

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010566
text: Defeat %s who is after the Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010567
text: Use the Guide Owl's Will to find %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010568
text: Retrieve %s from the monsters by using the Guide Owl's Will

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010569
text: You've successfully restored Karolis Altar. Report back to the Owl Chief Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010570
text: In order to spread the energy of the Karolis Sanctuary, all four of Karolis' lights must be ignited. Any less than 4 lights will be extinguished quite fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010571
text: The energy from the Karolis Sanctuary is spreading out. Report back to the Owl Chief Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010572
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture asks you to gather enough energy of Karolis Springs and deliver it to the Guide Owl Sculpture. Find the Guide Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010573
text: Sacred Tree of the Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010574
text: The Guide Owl Sculpture regained its consciousness. Tell it what the Owl Chief Sculpture told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010575
text: Find Letas' Sacred Branch

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010576
text: The Guide Owl Sculpture says in order to combat the demons, Letas' Sacred Branch is needed. Use the Crystalized Essence of Karolis Springs to find Letas' Sacred Tree and get its branch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010577
text: Report to the Guide Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010578
text: Acquired Letas' Sacred Branch. Return to the Guide Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010579
text: Ask the Guide Owl Sculpture what the branch can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010580
text: Absorb the purified energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010581
text: The Guide Owl Sculpture tells you that the branch can purify the monsters and their energy. Absorb the purified energy and collect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010582
text: Letas' Sacred Branch purified and absorbed enough energy. Return to the Guide Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010583
text: The Romuva of Suppression is complete but the Guide Owl Sculpture seems to be unsure about it. Speak with the Guide Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010584
text: Speak to Mardas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010585
text: The Guide Owl Sculpture asks you to speak with Mardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010586
text: Mardas came up with a solution after a long discussion with the Owl Chief Sculpture. Listen to what Mardas has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010587
text: Eliminate the evil energy that is corrupting the forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010588
text: Mardas claims that the evil energy corrupting the forest needs to be taken out first. Place the Romuva of Suppression around it to stop the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010589
text: Report to Mardas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010590
text: You've eliminated all the evil energy. Report this back to Mardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010591
text: All the evil energy is gone. Speak with Mardas on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010592
text: Avoid the Surveillance and Infiltrate

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010593
text: Mardas explains that in order to approach Black Smoke that is draining the forest energy. You must avoid getting detected by Surveillance Eyes. Once you infiltrate the place, disable the magic circle that controls the eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010594
text: Remove the Black Smoke

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010595
text: Remove the Black Smoke that is draining the energy of the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010596
text: You've removed the Black Smoke. Report to Mardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010597
text: Soul Starvation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010598
text: The time has come to put an end to the demon's scheme. Speak with Mardas on the final mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010599
text: Disable the Protection Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010600
text: Mardas emphasizes that all the protection magic circles must be disabled to free souls from the Soul Starvation. There is a certain order in which one must disable the five magic circles. If you fail, you must start from the beginning. Try it out and find the correct order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010601
text: Destroy the Soul Starvation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010602
text: All the magic circles protecting the Soul Starvation are disabled. Destroy the Soul Starvation with the Romuva of Suppression.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010603
text: The alerted demons have been defeated. Now, use the Romuva of Suppression to destroy the Soul Starvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010604
text: Defeat %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010605
text: The Soul Starvation is now destroyed. Report back to Mardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010606
text: Mardas carefully inspected the situation and said he will report it to the Owl Chief.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010607
text: Look inside the locked chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010608
text: There is a mysterious chest. Open it and look inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010609
text: Inject the spell into the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010610
text: An unknown force is keeping the chest shut. Defeat the monsters nearby to inject spell into it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010611
text: Open the locked chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010612
text: It seems enough of the spell has been injected to the chest. Try opening the chest again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010613
text: Check the letter on the ground

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010614
text: A letter lies on the ground. Check if someone has lost it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010615
text: Find the recipient to the letter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010616
text: The sender of the letter is a person called Eras. It is supposed to go to a person called Jurus in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010617
text: Check the Letas Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010618
text: There is a trouble at the Letas Altar, it seems. Check the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010619
text: Defeat the nearby monsters disrupting the energy of the Letas Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010620
text: Letas Altar is weakened by the evil force from the nearby monsters. Defeat the nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010621
text: Drink the medicinal fluid and defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010622
text: Fight the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while in a weakened state.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151022_010623
text: You've overcame the extreme hardship. Report back to Barbarian Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010624
text: As a cleric, the best way to approach the goddesses is to serve others.{nl}If you help me heal the soldiers at Miners' Village, I will gladly help you back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010625
text: Good work.{nl}I may not be of much help but I will do my best to lead you closer to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010626
text: Brilliant.{nl}You've completed the assignment. When you are ready, let's begin the Elementalist lesson.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010627
text: The forces of evil will never reach the goddess' revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010628
text: If you're worried for your safety, I will also give you this Romuva Holy Water.{nl}When you drink this water, you will be invisible to the demons for a short time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010629
text: Welcome! {nl} Oh, so you're the Revelator. I really wanted to meet you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010630
text: I heard you successfully removed the seal at Pasagos Cliff.{nl}Now go get the next step from my brothers at the Pillars of the Courtyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010631
text: There's a piece below Seklus Bridge that is suspected to be a piece from the monument.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010632
text: The light bead, I saw it too.{nl}The demons are collecting them all over the place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010633
text: The Owl Sculptures are sending them off to somewhere...{nl}Perhaps, you could find its trail from the Owl Sculpture you've just seen, can you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010634
text: If it were anyone else, I would have stopped you but to you, words of warning will only fall flat.{nl}Not sure if it is bravery or recklessness...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010635
text: I should get some rest here for a little bit. I'm running out of breath.{nl}It's dangerous for me to stay with you, because I don't want to risk my life.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010636
text: I don't know about the identity of the light bead.{nl}However, it does not have that same feeling that the demons produce.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010637
text: Thank you. Really, thank you.{nl}If I got under the influence of the demons,{nl}I shudder to think what would have happened to the poor souls...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010638
text: The light bead you saw is actually... a human soul.{nl}No memory nor will of its own. Just a pure soul.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010639
text: They are from those who lived around here, lived until those demons...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010640
text: We, owls, lead the souls to the arms of the goddess.{nl}It's a divine duty that Goddess Ausrine gave us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010641
text: But suddenly the demons invaded the forest, corrupting it in the process. {nl}Then they controlled us.{nl}The controlled owls started to send the souls to wherever the demons told them to.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010642
text: I am fully aware of how shameless of me to ask you this.{nl}But, I cannot bear to see another soul getting sacrificed. {nl}Please, destroy the Mind Control Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010643
text: The goddess has not forsaken us after all..{nl}She sent you to us!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010644
text: The ripple damage from destroying the Mind Control Tower might harm the owls.{nl}Please, fill my comrades with the energy of the forest before you destroy the Mind Control Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010645
text: Please, gather the fragments of the Karolis Altar destroyed by the demons.{nl}Restoring the altar will help to recover some of the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010646
text: I will give the Guide Owl's Will to you.{nl}It will guide you to the place where the Karolis Altar used to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010647
text: The Karolis Altar used to pump energy to the forest.{nl}Ever since it was destroyed, the energy of the forest was reduced quite significantly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010648
text: The Forest Altar still stands but to spread the energy {nl}throughout the entire forest, it needs Karolis' lights.{nl}The lights went out so did the spreading of the energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010649
text: If both the Karolis Altar and the Forest Sanctuary are restored. {nl}My comrades will be back to normal. We, the owls, share lives with the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010650
text: I've been waiting for you.{nl}I knew you succeeded when I sensed that the energy of the forest had strengthened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010651
text: I should not have held my hopes too high up... {nl}The restored Karolis Altar was not enough to completely revive the forest.{nl}The Altar of the Forest needs to be revived as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010652
text: Ah, the Altar of the Forest is located near the pond across there.{nl}It spreads Karolis' lights throughout the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010653
text: The lights are almost all out...{nl}If you can illuminate them the power of the altar will spread out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010654
text: There are four Karolis' lights.{nl}By illuminating only one light, it will lose its light quickly,{nl}but illuminating all four will maintain the altar's power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010655
text: Be sure to illuminate them all before they give out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010656
text: Back in the yesteryears, there were numerous altars but now, there is only one.{nl}The demons did indeed ruin the forest and us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010657
text: You did it! You spread the energy around.{nl}It seems that all the other owls are now back to normal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010658
text: Now, the only thing left to do is to destroy that mind-altering abomination. {nl}Our safety is now guaranteed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010659
text: The tower is filled with very malicious energy.{nl}Even you cannot touch it without any precaution.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010660
text: The rest of the owls have regained themselves. And they are eager to lend you their power.{nl}Small individually but when collected, strong enough {nl}to fend off the malicious force the tower contains.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010661
text: Speak with the owls you have come across on the way here,{nl}they want to thank you personally.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010662
text: Explain the situation to them and they will surely lend their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010663
text: After getting the powers from all the owls, come back to me.{nl}I will combine them together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010664
text: Did any of the owls mention something rude?{nl}They all are deeply grateful for what you have done.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010665
text: Now, I will combine their powers along with mine and make them into one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010666
text: I was fearful of our combined power not being strong enough...{nl}I am glad to be wrong. It is certainly strong.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010667
text: Now, use this power to blow the tower to smithereens!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010668
text: I am sorry for not being able to repay you for all that you've done for us.{nl}However, what I can say for sure is that{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010669
text: You certainly are being led by the goddess...{nl}I have that feeling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010670
text: Actually, there is one owl a bit far from here...{nl}It's not responding.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010671
text: I am worried about that child but..{nl}The crisis on our hand requires our full attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010672
text: The wretched demon tower has fallen?{nl}Peace returns at last! {nl}My heart is content.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010673
text: Someone named Mardas came here to speak to you.{nl}Mardas has been talking about what he saw. The details on what the demons were doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010674
text: I believe that Letas Stream is under the demons' control.{nl}Could we ask you to help us a bit longer?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010675
text: To us, you are our only hope...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010676
text: Perhaps if Mardas and I can combine both of our knowledges {nl}on what we know about the demons, we can find a solution.{nl}We will be planning here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010677
text: First, we need the Namott of Suppression.{nl}It contains a high level of divine energy from the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010678
text: The Guide Owl near Letas Stream can make you one.{nl}But seeing how it is not responding to my call, it must still be under the demons' control.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010679
text: Please, find the Guide Owl quickly.{nl}When it regains itself, tell it that you need the Namott of Suppression.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010680
text: On the upper side of Karolis Stream, there is a spot rich with the energy of the forest.{nl}Stand there and the energy will come to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010681
text: As the energy concentration increases, it gets condensed and crystalized.{nl}Take the condensed energy to the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010682
text: Mardas has told me about the atrocities that the demons did. Even{nl}from just the descriptions, it puts a cold spear through my heart.{nl}We cannot allow it to continue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010683
text: O, the poor souls... they are the ones whom we handed over to the demons?{nl}I am made of wood but my wooden heart is aching.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010684
text: The Owl Chief sent you, eh?{nl}The Namott of Suppression... Now that's an extreme measure. The situation must be that dire.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010685
text: The Namott of Suppression is not something to be made lightly...{nl}But for all of us, I will try.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010686
text: The first ingredient we need is Letas' Sacred Branch. It's a branch from Letas' Sacred Tree.{nl}However, the energy of the forest is needed to find Letas' Sacred Tree...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010687
text: Wha..? You already had it on you?{nl}What good news. Bring it to the northern side of Letas Stream and sprinkle the energy around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010688
text: It might not be easy to spot at the first try.{nl}You need to keep spreading the energy around to make the tree appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010689
text: Letas' Sacred Tree is a physical manifestation of the forest's will.{nl}Before the demon invasion, it was not a rare sight to see but now it is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010690
text: However, if the energy of the forest is restored, they will reappear.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010691
text: How did it go? Did you find the tree?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010692
text: I wondered what should we do if the tree does not appear even with the energy of the forest.{nl}What a relief! Perhaps, it was no luck but rather you are the special one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010693
text: It seems that Letas' Sacred Branch is weakened by the demons.{nl}Its power is insufficient. We need to fill it up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010694
text: The branch can purify and absorb the malicious force from the monsters.{nl}Use it on monsters to purify their energies and absorb them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010695
text: The weak ones will not be able to stand the awesome might of the branch.{nl}They will burn like a piece of paper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010696
text: The Owl Chief must trust you very much, seeing that it sent you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010697
text: Is the branch all filled up?{nl}Let me make it into the Namott of Suppression.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010698
text: The Namott is complete but...{nl}I am not confident it will be enough to combat the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010699
text: I, myself, am not sure what the Owl Chief was thinking.{nl}I too have lost most of my power, I cannot help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010700
text: There is someone who can help you on your mission?{nl}What are you waiting for? Go and find out the plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010701
text: Perhaps, you don't have to go after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010702
text: It is a blessing that that Mardas person is helping us out. But the story Mardas told is a very{nl}depressing one.{nl}We are in some ways responsible for such an atrocity. I feel guilty.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010703
text: You are just in time.{nl}Did you get the Namott of Suppression?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010704
text: After talking with the Owl Chief, we might have a plan that can work.{nl}The demons are using the evil energy to corrupt Letas Stream and trap the stolen souls there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010705
text: A thing called Soul Starvation is keeping the souls locked up. It must be destroyed but..{nl}The evil energy is far too thick and it is protected by the magic circles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010706
text: Removing the evil energy corrupting the forest would be first in order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010707
text: Follow the right path and go straight to find the center of the forest, you will find the evil energy.{nl}Set up Namott of Suppression around it to remove the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010708
text: When I think about the folks back home, I cannot bear it any longer but..{nl}I am powerless. Helping you is my way of doing 'something at all'.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010709
text: The evil energy is continuously spawning?{nl}It's more serious than I thought.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010710
text: We need to fill up the spots where the energy of the forest is getting drained quickly. {nl}The Black Smoke spots.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010711
text: If we remove Black Smoke, the demon structures will be weakened as well.{nl}But the way to get there is guarded by Surveillance Eyes. So, approaching it will not be a cake walk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010712
text: It's rather risky but... I want you to infiltrate the place without getting detected by the{nl}Surveillance Spheres spinning around the Surveillance Eyes.{nl}At the end of the path, there is a magic circle managing those eyes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010713
text: Without the magic circle, the Surveillance Eyes might go away as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010714
text: Without those pesky eyes, Black Smoke can be easily dealt with by using Namott of Surveillance.{nl}Be careful, it is a near-suicide mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010715
text: The Owl Chief sure did know a lot.{nl}It is wise and knowledgeable even though it never left this place in its entire existence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010716
text: Are you hurt?{nl}It must have been a very dangerous journey, I can imagine... I was just standing here feeling powerless.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010717
text: Now, the Soul Starvation is vulnerable.{nl}The magic circles around it are protecting it but they can be easily disabled.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010718
text: There is a certain order in disabling the protection magic circles.{nl}One false step and you have to start all over again from the beginning.{nl}If you remain focused even in the face of failure, you will find the order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010719
text: The evil energy is weakened and Black Smoke is gone. The demons, if they are not completely stupid, will notice thses changes and come after us.{nl}Please, be haste.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010720
text: If we manage to set those souls free, will the guilt and sadness I feel can be set free as well?{nl}But what about my rage?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010721
text: I do not know at the moment...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010722
text: Is that so... The souls are free now.{nl}The Owl Chief promised to guide the souls to their rightful place, the arms of the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010723
text: The Namott of Suppression is best left to the Guide Owl.{nl}It will help the owls regain their power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010724
text: Then, I must go back to the Owl Chief.{nl}I will deliver this good news and want to hear more about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010725
text: Perhaps, this place is free of demons after all this time?{nl}My words cannot thank you enough!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010726
text: I do not believe it is no coincidence that you came to us.{nl}I sense the divine will of the goddess guiding you here.{nl}I pray she will continue to guide you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010727
text: On behalf of the forest and all the owls, {nl}I pray for the divine guidance and protection to be onto you.{nl}Farewell, my friend...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010728
text: Gratitude fills up my heart.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010729
text: I apologize for my initial rudeness. I was very confused.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010730
text: Greetings. So, you want to learn the high level magic of a wizard?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010731
text: I am yet to be convinced whether you are worthy enough.{nl}These high-leveled skills cannot be learnt that easily without a firm foundation.{nl}Do you have what it takes?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010732
text: Oh, your eagerness to learn is quite impressive.{nl}I have a mission for you. Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat monsters.{nl}That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010733
text: Here is your mission: Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat monsters.{nl}That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010734
text: Hmm, not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}You seem to have what it takes.{nl}Now, pay attention to what I am about to demonstrate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010735
text: You want to become a Pyromancer, eh?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010736
text: Kiddo, not everyone can become a Pyromancer.{nl}Let's just say, you gotta be able make friends with fire and its heat.{nl}I ain't all that convinced yet. But I will give you a chance to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010737
text: Good. Now, I want you to kill some monsters while under the magic I will put on you.{nl}The magic will determine whether the spell you use is compatible with fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010738
text: Your combat data will determine whether the spell you use is compatible with fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010739
text: Oh my, you do have a knack. I am a bit surprised?{nl}Well, a promise is a promise. I will teach ya.{nl}Whether you can follow it through or not is entirely up to ya. Got that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010740
text: Do you wish to become a Cryomancer?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010741
text: That's very nice to hear.{nl}More people becoming Cryomancers is always desirable in my book.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010742
text: However, accepting all participants will only prove itself detremental to all of us.{nl}It is for the best if we conduct a simple test to determine your aptitude {nl}in becoming a Cryomancer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010743
text: Here is a Unmelting Magical Piece of Ice.{nl}This piece of ice is injected with a spell that will sustain its frozen state.{nl}Defeat the monsters and use their energies to keep the piece cold.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010744
text: Defeat the monsters and use their energies to keep the piece cold.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010745
text: The spell is strong in this piece of ice.{nl}Impressive. You do have what it takes to handle the magic of coldness.{nl}Now, watch me carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010746
text: Do you want to learn new skills of the Archer?{nl}That's fine, but let's have some fun first. I'll give you a simple test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010747
text: An archer must be able to strike one's enemy precisely from a distance.{nl}Your test consists of keeping distance between you and the monster while attacking your target.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010748
text: Hmm, your spirit is high.{nl}Attacks that are too close to the target or a monster's dodge do not count.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010749
text: The attacks that are either shot from a too close distance or when a monster dodges your attacks,{nl}it doesn't count.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010750
text: Impressive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010751
text: Keep your eyes wide open! As I am about to show you new skills of the Archer!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010752
text: So you want to be a Ranger?{nl}A horde of enemies is no threat to a Ranger.{nl}A Ranger can use its specifically designed skills to take out multiple enemies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010753
text: If someone runs away from just a couple of enemies, that person doesn't have what it takes.{nl}And that means that person is not cut out to become a Ranger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010754
text: Good. Let's see what you got.{nl}Well, facing off multiple enemies at the moment would be asking too much. {nl}I have another similar test.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010755
text: Take one out and take the next one out right away.{nl}It's technically not taking them out simultaneously, but being able to pull off quick {nl}and consecutive kills is a good first step to become a Ranger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010756
text: So, you can walk the talk, heh?{nl}Quite impressive, I must say.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010757
text: Good. You have what it takes.{nl}I will teach you the path of the Ranger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010758
text: Did you come to me to become a Quarrel Shooter?{nl}I do not refuse the ones who are ambitious.{nl}Nevertheless, there is prerequisite you must have.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010759
text: Quarrel Shooters uses crossbows as their main weapon.{nl}First, you must get yourself an appropriate crossbow.{nl}We'll resume our little talk when you are equipped with a +5 crossbow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010760
text: If it is a +5 crossbow, it doesn't matter if it is a weapon you use or {nl}the one you have it on you just in case. {nl}After checking the weapon, I will give it back to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010761
text: That's some high quality crossbow you got there.{nl}This will do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010762
text: Now, I will train you to become a Quarrel Shooter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010763
text: You want learn high-leveled magic of a Wizard?{nl}Magic is not something you can learn by yourself.{nl}Seeking advice from other people sometimes can help you faster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010764
text: There are other Wizard Masters in Orsha.{nl}Seek advice from the Pyromancer, Cryomancer, Psychokino and Linker submasters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010765
text: Seek advice from the Pyromancer, Cryomancer, Psychokino and Linker submasters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010766
text: Did it help?{nl}Your eyes show signs of enlightenment.{nl}Now, use them to learn the way of what I am about to show you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010767
text: To strengthen your Pyromancy, you must strengthen your fire energy.{nl}It's a piece of cake for me but for you, you might need some help.{nl}Do you think you can handle it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010768
text: Alright. Here, take this Condensed Firestone.{nl}Set this firestone up somewhere and defeat nearby monsters,{nl}and your spell's fire energy will be increased.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010769
text: Set up a Condensed Firestone and defeat the nearby monsters to enhance the fire energy of your spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010770
text: Good work.{nl}Now, you can learn new magic.{nl}I will show them to you. Watch me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010771
text: Is it new magic that you seek?{nl}There is stronger magic in the realm of Cryomancy.{nl}But, you will need to be more experienced in handling the cold energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010772
text: I can sense your eagerness to learn more. Terrific!{nl}You still lack experience, so I will lend you this Frost Tome.{nl}Use this Frost Tome to weaken monsters and take them out afterwards.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010773
text: The tome will aid you in handling the cold energy better.{nl}Hey, make sure that you engage in combat after activating the tome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010774
text: Use the Frost Tome by engaging in combat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010775
text: How was it?{nl}Have you gotten better in handling the cold energy?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010776
text: Great to hear! Finally, you are ready to learn new skills of the Cryomancer.{nl}Do not forget your past experiences. Always keep this in mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010777
text: Hm, your desire lies in becoming a Psychokino?{nl}You know, a Psychokino does some quite amazing feats.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010778
text: It is, however, something that cannot be learnt that quickly.{nl}To control the with invisible force is not an easy act.{nl}Now that I have warned you... Do you still wish to proceed?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010779
text: Good, but you have not seen anything of this magic yet...{nl}Perhaps, a scroll with the spell of a Psychokino will allow you to wield such power.{nl}With this, it will teach you what it feels like when using skills of a Psychokino.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010780
text: Use the Telekinesis Scroll to experience first hand what it feels like.{nl}With this, learning the magic of the Psychokino will become easier for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010781
text: So, did you manage to get a little bit of taste of the power?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010782
text: If you did, follow my lead.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010783
text: Are you thinking of becoming a Linker?{nl}Linkers are not made but born.{nl}One must know the linkage point between the mind and thoughts of other beings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010784
text: If you really want to become a Linker, allow me to test your 'Linker aptitude'.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010785
text: To utilize the Linker's magic, one must be able to find the linkage point among other beings.{nl}If you are unable to do so, then I'm afraid you are not fit to learn the path of the Linker.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010786
text: I will confirm if you can sense the linkage point while battling monsters.{nl}You may instictively become aware of it or you may never. {nl}I will look at your progress very closely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010787
text: While in combat, make sure to concentrate to be able to see the linkage point.{nl}I do hope that you have the talent in you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010788
text: Wow, that was great!{nl}I see that you do have what it takes to be a Linker.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010789
text: The rest is quite easy.{nl}I will share the magic of the Linker with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010790
text: You are seeking the advanced skills of the Archer? You've come to the right person.{nl}Well then, let's see how familiar you are with our path, the path of the Archer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010791
text: Archers are always confident in battle against any enemy. {nl}However, we always seek for greater challenges to bring out the greater strength in us.{nl}One challenge is the flying-type enemy who wears cloth.{nl}I want you to defeat me some flying-type monsters with the Cloth armor-type.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010792
