text: Only the ones that are a flying-type with the Cloth armor-type.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010793
text: How do you feel? I noticed it took you shorter than before, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010794
text: The basics have been covered. Let's move onto the skills.{nl}Open your eyes wide and witness all the details of the Archer's advanced and complicated skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010795
text: Hey, there. Do you wish to learn new Ranger skills?{nl}If so, why don't you help with our efforts in restoring Orsha?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010796
text: I am participating in those efforts myself as well.{nl}A Ranger is there to help those who are in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010797
text: You keep impressing me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010798
text: First up, you might want to acquire some stone for restoring the collapsed wall.{nl}I believe you can find it somewhere in Braken Forest 63_1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010799
text: The stone is required for restoring the collapsed wall.{nl}I believe Braken Forest 63_1 is the place where you can find one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010800
text: Perfect. This will do.{nl}You've been a lot of help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010801
text: Even though I'm quite busy, a promise is a promise.{nl}Let me demonstrate you the new Ranger skills.{nl}Watch me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010802
text: You want to learn new skills?{nl}You might want to take good care of your crossbow since{nl}it needs to be in good shape in order to handle the new skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010803
text: To maintain your crossbow effectively, there is nothing more wonderful than Overgrown Fluid.{nl}You can acquire it from the plant monsters that have been overgrowing after Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010804
text: The stronger a plant monster is, the more likely the chance is you can get a Overgrown Fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010805
text: Weapon maintenance is not just an one-off deal. You need to keep doing it from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010806
text: You look ready for your lesson in learning the new Quarrel Shooter skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010807
text: Did you come here to become a Sapper?{nl}If you do, there is a task awaiting for you.{nl}Help me and I will help you in becoming a Sapper. Deal?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010808
text: Listen, I am currently conducting an experiment to {nl}strengthen the durability of a barricade that we Sappers use.{nl}Helping me on this experiment will actually help you in the long run.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010809
text: Can you please go to Braken Forest 63_1 and find if there is any material{nl}that can be used in strengtening barricades?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010810
text: Hmm. This does look sturdy. It's certainly worth a try.{nl}I will carry out my end of the deal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010811
text: Hunter? Is that what you want to become?{nl}I am pleased to hear that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010812
text: My heart welcomes all but I know for a fact that this might not be a good idea.{nl}So, let me test you on whether you have it to become a Hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010813
text: A true Hunter laughs at the 'face' of danger and enjoys the thrill it entails.{nl}Prove to me that you have such guts. Enter a dungeon and hunt some monsters.{nl}Prove me that you can remain calm in a dangerous situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010814
text: Enter a dungeon and hunt some monsters. Only then, I will acknowledge you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010815
text: Not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}You have guts and power to back it up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010816
text: Observe carefully and follow them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010817
text: You wanna learn more advanced Pyromancer skills?{nl}Having more powerful Pyromancers on our side is certainly a good thing. {nl}But a test is in order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010818
text: If you pass this trial of fire, I will let you advance in pyromancy.{nl}Don't think this will be easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010819
text: You might be wondering, what is the trial of fire? Quite simple, actually.{nl}You defeat a Fire property monster. Simple, right? Hahaha.{nl}A Fire property monster is in a way the most familar to us, but the most troublesome as well.{nl}I will root for you. Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010820
text: To battle against a Fire property monster, defeat it by becoming stronger or using your wits.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010821
text: I knew ya would pass it.{nl}You are ready to learn the advanced pyromancy.{nl}Watch and learn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010822
text: Learning advanced cryomancy requires you to take a test.{nl}It is designed to determine your aptitude in learning high-leveled cryomancy.{nl}Are you ready to go through the trial of frost?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010823
text: The trial of frost consists of battling an Ice property monster.{nl}It is crucial to understand the enemy and yourself.{nl}This test should not be too overwhelming if you desire in seeking advanced cryomancy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010824
text: Impressive.{nl}You've done more than I expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010825
text: The power you've demonstrated is enough.{nl}I will teach you the advanced cryomancy.{nl}Pay attention, do not miss the smallest detail!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010826
text: In order to be more proficient in handling a Psychokino's magic, delicate spell control is crucial.{nl}If you want to learn further in the Psychokino's magic, you should cultivate your abilities first.{nl}I can help you with this. Are you interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010827
text: Here, this is the Magic Control Detection Orb.{nl}It can detect spell being used around you but the range is quite narrow.{nl}Defeat a monster within the range of the Magic Control Detection Orb and return to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010828
text: Defeat a monster within the range of the Magic Control Detection Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010829
text: Not bad, not bad at all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010830
text: Stay focused and watch my demonstration just like you've practiced.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010831
text: I am continuously working on the magic of the Linker.{nl}All Linkers need to keep developing and progressing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010832
text: If you want to take a bold step forward on your Linker's path, help me on this.{nl}If this work is proven successful, all Linkers will benefit from it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010833
text: Take this Soul Flask.{nl}Fill it up with monster's souls by defeating monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010834
text: Fill the Soul Flask up with monster souls by defeating them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010835
text: This is plenty.{nl}Thank you. Now, about your reward.{nl}I will teach you some new Linker magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010836
text: You want to become a Thaumaturge?{nl}Our magic is all about transforming shapes and properties.{nl}Let me see what talent you have in you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010837
text: A way to utilize a Thaumaturge's magic is to be able handle enemies of different sizes.{nl}Try defeating monsters of all sizes. Small, medium and large to be specific.{nl}This will be a good experience for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010838
text: Face off with small, medium and large-sized monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010839
text: How was it? Did you learn something from it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010840
text: Ah, you seem worthy enough to become a Thaumaturge.{nl}I acknowledge your power and I allow you to tread the path of the Thaumaturge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010841
text: I can sense that you want to become an Elementalist.{nl}We study different ways on controlling elemental magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010842
text: The prerequisite for becoming an Elementalist is an understanding of different properties.{nl}In order to do that, try defeating monsters of all properties. {nl}To be more specific: Fire, Ice, Lightning and Earth properties.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010843
text: Battling monsters of various properties will help you understand the Elementalist magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010844
text: Well done. You seem ready. {nl}As promised, let me teach you the magic of the Elementalist.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010845
text: High-leveled skills of a Ranger are not easy to learn.{nl}Your confidence in your own power does not factor in much.{nl}Now, prove to me that your confidence is not unjustified.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010846
text: Your confidence in yourself did not even flinch, eh?{nl}I like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010847
text: You've probably heard of Carlyle's Mausoleum and how it is filled with powerful demons, right?{nl}We as Rangers cannot idly stand by.{nl}Defeat those demons and prove your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010848
text: Defeat the demons in Carlyle's Mausoleum and prove your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010849
text: Nicely done.{nl}When did you become this powerful?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010850
text: A Ranger's advanced skills might be complicated, but you will have no problem learning them.{nl}Watch closely and carefully at my demonstration.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010851
text: You want to learn the Quarrel Shooter's advanced skills?{nl}Since we use a crossbow as our main weapon, we are able to equip a shield.{nl}The shield ensures our safety in combat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010852
text: The place is dangerous but a good place to train yourself. {nl}Get yourself a fine shield and show me that you are prepared.{nl}Then, I will be able to share you info on the Quarrel Shooter's advanced skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010853
text: A shield enhanced to +5 or beyond will do just nicely.{nl}Don't worry, I will give it back to you as soon as I check it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010854
text: That's enough preparation.{nl}Always be mindful and always be prepared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010855
text: As I promised, the advanced skills of the Quarrel Shooter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010856
text: You want to learn more Sapper skills?{nl}Well, just like the last time, help me on an experiment to improve Sapper skills. {nl}As a compensation, I will teach you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010857
text: The task I am working on currently is on how to make the bombs stronger.{nl}The monsters in the Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3 have the necessary materials.{nl}Get me the necessary materials to make a stronger bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010858
text: Retrieve necessary materials from monsters in Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3 for the bomb experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010859
text: These would suffice. I hope it will work this time.{nl}Before I carry on with my experiment, I will teach you the advanced Sapper skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010860
text: You want to learn more Hunter skills?{nl}My, my. You are one eager fellow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010861
text: I have already set up a test for people like you.{nl}It's a simple quest that involves a fetch. Want to have go at it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010862
text: Get me a Hunter's Pass one each from Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3.{nl}I have placed a Hunter's Pass in a chest in each place. You just get me all three.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010863
text: Get three Hunter's Passes one each from the chests in Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010864
text: Let's see... you've got them all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010865
text: Good. Now, I will give you the lessons on high-leveled Hunter skills.{nl}Focus and observe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010866
text: Welcome! So you want to become a Wugushi?{nl}Having more allies is always a good thing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010867
text: Basically, Wugushis utilize poison. Where do we get the poison?{nl}You cannot make a poison by yourself yet so I will teach {nl}you the way of getting and using a pre-existing poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010868
text: A good question.{nl}At the moment, the poison you can get would be a poison from a thorn poison.{nl}You can get the poison from the monsters in Carlyle's Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010869
text: Defeat the monsters in Carlyle's Mausoleum to obtain the poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010870
text: Handle poisons with utmost caution.{nl}There's no telling if the next victim will be you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010871
text: You've got the poison, let's begin the lesson, shall we?{nl}Watch my movements carefully and follow them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010872
text: You are looking to become a Scout, aren't you?{nl}Scouts specializes in fields of spying on enemy bases and infiltrating them.{nl}Speed is crucial in the life of a Scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010873
text: If you really want to become a Scout, show me how quick you are, {nl}quick enough to use Scout's skills.{nl}Only then I will teach you the path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010874
text: Now then. The point of the test is to see how many times can you attack before getting hit.{nl}Hit them but don't get hit. If you get hit, the counter resets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010875
text: Attack a monster continuously without taking a hit.{nl}When you get hit once, the counter resets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010876
text: Nimble!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010877
text: You seem to be capable of handling the Scout's skills.{nl}Now, let me teach you some scouting skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010878
text: The baron said the strange aura is dangerous and told us not to go near it. {nl}But I don't think that's the case.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010879
text: There is an unstable magic circle on the way to Ramus Crossroads. {nl}They say to not go near it because a strange aura flows out from it. But it really doesn't seem so. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010880
text: The Apsimesti Crossroads always has been a final testing ground for Hoplites.{nl}Many of forerunners before you would fight monsters till their spears broke.{nl}Of course, there were those who got severely injured.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010881
text: Find and get those broken spears and armor. That will be your final test.{nl}Broken spear fragments can be obtained from defeating monsters.{nl}As for broken armor, check the road or reeds forest for corroded metal plates.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010882
text: Talk is cheap. What matters the most is can you do it.{nl}This medicinal liquid is not actually medicinal. Rather it's a poison. {nl}Back home, we drink it as part of training.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010883
text: Drink it and kill the monsters down at the Apsimesti Crossroads while your body is under the influence.{nl}You must do it alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010884
text: Mage Melchioras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010885
text: Eh

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010886
text: Gu

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010887
text: Revelator Mihail

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010888
text: Andrea

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010889
text: Nuodas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010890
text: Elder's Granddaughter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010891
text: Come now, grandpa... How many times have I told you, it's too dangerous to go outside alone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010892
text: Oh, you must be the traveler helping our grandfather.{nl}I welcome your arrival.{nl}I was getting worried because my grandfather has disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010893
text: We live by the lower lakeside.{nl}The lake has recently turned red and plants that feed off from it have overgrown. {nl}Anyone who either drinks it or eat the fruits become sick.{nl}Some villagers left town for Orsha, the rest has come up to investigate the lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010894
text: My grandfather and the villagers found a suspicious place. {nl}The investigation got cut short when the monsters came.{nl}Could you continue the investigation for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010895
text: You found something in the ashes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010896
text: Thank you in advance!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010897
text: I want to guide you myself but, my grandfather is inspecting the stuff he found around here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010898
text: You came! And you've found the half-burnt notes?{nl}I need to show these to my grandfather...{nl}He is off somewhere aftering sensing a tremor along with young villagers.{nl}I will inspect them myself. Could you go and get my grandfather for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010899
text: I hope my grandfather is okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010900
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}Without you, something very dangerous might have happened to me.{nl}I was inspecting a disc I've found in the suspicious place and {nl}suddenly monsters were chasing after me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010901
text: Have you found my grandfather?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010902
text: After an earthquake, the disc emitted a red bead of light pointing towards the water. {nl}I naturally followed it. I came this far, the light went out and {nl}I found myself surrounded with monsters.{nl}It seems this disc is a device to find something. Could you help me on what it is looking?{nl}I would like to go with you but this young man is injured while saving me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010903
text: Thanks a million.{nl}I will head back home and wait for good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010904
text: I have never seen this fragment before.{nl}It is from the monster that the disc was point at?{nl}I will take it and inspect thoroughly.{nl}There might be a connection between this and the cause of the water turning red.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010905
text: Hmm, the village hunter said that s/he has seen some people{nl}going to the place where the lakeside notes were found.{nl}I will go talk to him/her, as soon as my granddaughter finishes inspecting the notes, {nl}bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010906
text: They are mostly burnt, so quite a huge portion of notes were illegible,{nl}but I copied down the parts that were readable...{nl}I marked the parts that are unreadable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010907
text: This has really gotten out of hand.{nl}Who knew that Kepas could grow so big...{nl}I wonder if it's because of Medzio Diena?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010908
text: ------ ---- corrupting the water-

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010909
text: ------- --- --- the Seir Rainforest's results seem------.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010910
text: --- ------ ---- its security measures required---- ----.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010911
text: ---- --- --- a researchy on the security measures ------

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010912
text: ---- ----- confirm it in the lab --------

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010913
text: They have been conducting experiments to corrupt the lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010914
text: Go to my grandfather. He is at the Absenta Reservoir.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010915
text: You came.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010916
text: I will pray to this obelisk to accept our offerings.{nl}Could you go to the other obelisk and submit the offerings?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010917
text: I will pray to the goddess. {nl}I appreciate it if you could give the offerings to the goddess in the other place as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010918
text: Hmm? A monster appeared again?{nl}That's strange, the obelisk I was praying to did indeed turn blight red but nothing happened...{nl}We need to find another way.{nl}Thank you for your help. I will tell the others.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010919
text: Another earthquake!{nl}Could this also be linked to the experiment?{nl}Please, take care of my grandfather. I am very worried about him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010920
text: Have you checked what was on the notes?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010921
text: Hm...{nl}The experimented is the cause of the corruption. We must investigate further.{nl}The hunter saw some suspicious people in some place other than the spot s/he found the note.{nl}If they might be the ones responsible, could you investigate the place?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010922
text: Godspeed.{nl}The place is infested with monsters, please, take care of yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010923
text: Please, be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010924
text: Have you found the picture?{nl}Could you show it to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010925
text: The gemstone on the picture is the same as the fragment you've brought here.{nl}Not long after I brought the red fragment here, the water in the bottle turned red.{nl}The note, the picture and the water turning red. {nl}They all fit! The red gemstone corrupts the nearby water.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010926
text: The red gemstone is under the lake. How can we retrieve it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010927
text: A Hydra? Hurry and let's go!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010928
text: The Hydra we've just seen is

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010929
text: Tyronas Hydra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010930
text: That monster is from the time of my grandfather. It is known for its cruelty and cunning nature.{nl}But there is something strange... {nl}Because the last time I saw it, its scales were not red and that big.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010931
text: I wonder if that is because of the red gemstone that is stuck into its body.{nl}The experiment depicted or described in both the picture and the notes was Tyronas Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010932
text: When the people approached it, it went back in, I think its cunning nature hasn't changed a bit.{nl}Just a small number of people must lure that creature in and defeat it. {nl}We have no one to capable of doing that.{nl}Could you defeat the monster and destroy the gemstone inside of it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010933
text: Thank you so much!{nl}The hunter will fill you on the details.{nl}Go talk to the hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010934
text: You are the one whom the elder has talked about.{nl}Thank you for lending your hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010935
text: A bait and a trap should be used to lure and trap the Hydra.{nl}I will prepare the trap.{nl}I am really sorry about this but could you get a bait?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010936
text: Thank you for doing this.{nl}Could you get the meat from Chafperor?{nl}After that, we need a herb to put inside the bait and remove the trace of our scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010937
text: I will be preparing a trap.{nl}You get the bait, that would be lovely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010938
text: All done?{nl}Nice work.{nl}I will now process the bait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010939
text: Dear traveler, if possible, could you get me some medicinal herbs?{nl}One of the town youths has accidentally drank the corrupted water and got sick.{nl}Medicinal herbs would certainly ease his pain.{nl}How about that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010940
text: We have no proper cure yet. All we can do is ease the suffering...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010941
text: Thank you.{nl}That will certainly lessen the pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010942
text: Lanaldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010943
text: You are the one who have been helping us?{nl}I heard the lake corruption is due to an experiment!{nl}I plan on burning down the laboratory.{nl}That's why I am making the oil. It's still not enough.{nl}If I just have more Chafperor's Lard...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010944
text: Thanks for helping me on this. I will burn this place to ashes once and for all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010945
text: Thanks.{nl}This would make plenty of oil!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010946
text: Now, I have enough to burn it down.{nl}Go to the laboratory and the other one, pour the oil on them both and light them all.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010947
text: This must never happen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010948
text: Thank you. That's a relief.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010949
text: Go to the hunter.{nl}He will help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010950
text: All set and ready to go.{nl}Just place the bait on the trap and the Hydra will appear.{nl}May the goddesses be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010951
text: I certainly hope the lake would return to normal.{nl}We thank you for your courage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010952
text: You came back!{nl}How did it go?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010953
text: After defeating the Hydra, the crystal was destroyed?{nl}Thank you! All the villagers are very grateful for your valiant deeds.{nl}The lake at the moment is not clean but it will soon.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010954
text: My grandfather is too active. It worries me.{nl}No harm should fall on him...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010955
text: May the goddesses save us all...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010956
text: Town Youth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010957
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}I was surrounded by monsters while investigating the mysterious object with the elder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010958
text: Traveler, please, help me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010959
text: What happened to this beautiful lake...{nl}Such a loss.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010960
text: We must locate the pollutant and remove it quickly.{nl}It shall not continue. That spells doom for the town.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010961
text: I have written down all the parts that are readable.{nl}What a shame, if I finished it a bit quicker, you could have started with the grandfather. {nl}I'm sorry about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010962
text: I safely arrived thanks to you.{nl}I thank you again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010963
text: You sense an earthquake of an unknown origin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010964
text: Please, destroy the red crystal.{nl}I beseech you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010965
text: Oh, what am I glad to see you.{nl}Our investigation went bumpy with only just us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010966
text: Thank you for helping us out.{nl}May the blessing of the goddesses be upon you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010967
text: And to save you...{nl}You had to be hidden amongst all the Revelators. There was no other way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010968
text: Defeat the Infro Holder Shamans and Chafperor chasing Bronius!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010969
text: Using the Namott of Suppression

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010970
text: I will think about it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010971
text: Basic Magic [Wizard Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010972
text: The Energy of Fire [Pyromancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010973
text: Take a look at my compatibility with fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010974
text: Magical Piece of Ice [Cryomancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010975
text: How do I check it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010976
text: Afar but Precise [Archer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010977
text: One Man Army [Ranger Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010978
text: Don't worry about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010979
text: Strength Comes from a Strong Crossbow [Quarrel Shooter Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010980
text: Teaching from a Mentor [Wizard Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010981
text: Whom should I ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010982
text: Enhanced Energy of Fire [Pyromancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010983
text: Frost Tome [Cryomancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010984
text: How can I handle the cold energy more proficiently?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010985
text: Unknown Force [Psychokino Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010986
text: The Link [Linker Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010987
text: Natural Enemy [Archer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010988
text: Orsha Retoration Support [Ranger Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010989
text: Crossbow Maintenance [Quarrel Shooter Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010990
text: Sturdy Barricade [Sapper Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010991
text: Dungeon Crawl [Hunter Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010992
text: Tiral by Fire [Pyromancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010993
text: I will take the trial by fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010994
text: Trial by Frost [Cryomancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010995
text: I will take the trial by frost

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010996
text: Delicate Spell Control [Psychokino Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010997
text: I am ready to learn the delicate spell control.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010998
text: Spiritual Presence [Linker Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_010999
text: Size Does Not Matter [Thaumaturge Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011000
text: Elementary Understanding of Elements [Elementalist Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011001
text: I will take them all out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011002
text: Ranger On-Site Training [ Ranger Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011003
text: Trusty Shield [Quarrel Shooter Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011004
text: Sapper Master's Bomb Experiment [Sapper Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011005
text: Hunter's Test [Hunter Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011006
text: Corpse Poison [Wugushi Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011007
text: Where can I get it from?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011008
text: Featherlight [Scout Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011009
text: I will show you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011010
text: The Corrupted Lake (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011011
text: The Corrupted Lake (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011012
text: What is happening here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011013
text: I have no idea what you are talking about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011014
text: The Corrupted Lake (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011015
text: Wait a minute.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011016
text: The Corrupted Lake (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011017
text: I will investigate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011018
text: I will think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011019
text: The Corrupted Lake (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011020
text: Are you finished with inspecting the note?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011021
text: I will come back later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011022
text: Offerings to the Goddess (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011023
text: Offerings to the Goddess (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011024
text: My hands are tied at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011025
text: Clear the Corruption (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011026
text: I will investigate further into it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011027
text: I will think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011028
text: Clear the Corruption (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011029
text: Let me join your thinktank.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011030
text: Let me know if you get any idea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011031
text: Clear the Corruption (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011032
text: Clear the Corruption (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011033
text: I will think about it for a minute.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011034
text: Clear the Corruption (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011035
text: Clear the Corruption (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011036
text: I would need a minute to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011037
text: Placing a bait

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011038
text: Herb of the Lake

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011039
text: Recurrence Prevention (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011040
text: Recurrence Prevention (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011041
text: The Corrupted Lake (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011042
text: Tiberius wants to test the Holy Bombs on Glizardon. Drink the Namott Holy Water to hide yourself, and then put the Holy Bomb onto a Glizardon's back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011043
text: As you approaches the ghost, it disappears leaving only a pouch behind. Inspect the pouch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011044
text: Namott of Suppression is completed but the Guide Owl a lot in its mind. Talk with the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011045
text: The evil enery surrounding and corrupting the forest must be removed first, according to Mardas. Install Namott of Suppression near the evil energy to suppress it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011046
text: The magic circles protecting Soul Starvation are all disabled. Use the power of Namott of Suppression to destroy Soul Starvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011047
text: You've defeated the alerted demons. Destroy Soul Starvation with the power of Namott of Suppression.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011048
text: Mardas says he will deliver the message to the Guide Owl after inspecting the situation. Go to the Guide Owl and return the Namott of Suppression and report that everything is solved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011049
text: Find the right recipient

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011050
text: Talk to the Wizard Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011051
text: Talk to the Wizard Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011052
text: Defeat the monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011053
text: The Wizard Submaster wants to test your aptitude in learning advanced magic. Defeat the monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges to prove your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011054
text: Report to the Wizard Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011055
text: Return to the Wizard Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011056
text: Talk to the Pyromancer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011057
text: Talk to the Pyromancer Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011058
text: Defeat monsters while carrying the Energy of Fire

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011059
text: The Pyromancer Submaster wants to determine your compatibility with the energy of fire. Use the orb with the energy of fire inside that Pyromancer Submaster gave you and battle with monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011060
text: All Regions

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011061
text: Report to the Pyromancer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011062
text: Return to the Pyromancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011063
text: Talk to the Cryomancer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011064
text: Talk to the Cryomancer Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011065
text: Defeat monsters and recharge the spell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011066
text: The Cryomancer Submaster says that the training to handle the cold energy is required. As a training execise, fill up Unmelting Magical Piece of Ice with spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011067
text: Report to the Cryomancer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011068
text: Return to the Cryomancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011069
text: Talk to the Archer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011070
text: Talk to the Archer Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011071
text: Attack monsters from a distance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011072
text: The Archer Submaster says that the one who uses a bow and arrow must be able to hit an enemy from afar precisely. Strike a hit on a monster from a distance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011073
text: Report to the Archer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011074
text: Return to the Archer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011075
text: Talk to the Ranger Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011076
text: Talk to the Ranger Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011077
text: Defeat monsters all by yourself in 10 seconds

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011078
text: The Ranger Submaster says the crucial point of being a Ranger is battling against multiple enemies. Defeat a monster right after defeatin a monster within 10 second.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011079
text: Report to the Ranger Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011080
text: Return to the Ranger Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011081
text: Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011082
text: Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011083
text: Enhance a crossbow up to level five

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011084
text: The Quarrel Shooter Submaster emphasizes the importance of maintaining a crossbow that a Quarrel Shooter primarily uses. Get a crossbow enhanced up to level five.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011085
text: Report to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011086
text: Return to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011087
text: Listen to advice from the masters of other magic areas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011088
text: The Wizard Submaster says an individual's effort is a big part of improving one's magic but listening to others is also very important. Talk to Pyromancer Submaster, Cryomancer Submaster, Psychokino Master and Linker Master and seek their advice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011089
text: Use Condensed Firestone and defeat monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011090
text: The Pyromancer Submaster says to be more apt in handling fire magic, enhancing the energy of fire is necessary. Use the Condensed Firestone and defeat monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011091
text: Defeat monster after using Frost Tome

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011092
text: The Cryomancer Submaster says that you need to be more experienced in handling frost. Use Frost Tome and defeat monsters with decreased resistance against ice property.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011093
text: Talk to the Psychokino Master in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011094
text: Use the Telekinesis Scroll to blow enemies away

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011095
text: The Psychokino Master says to become a Psychokino is to become perceptible of the force invisible and control it. Use Telekinesis Scroll to blow enemies away and get used to Psychokino's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011096
text: Return to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011097
text: Talk to the Linker Master in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011098
text: Attack monsters until you find a linkage point

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011099
text: According to the Linker Master, the first step in linker's magic is to find the linkage point among the existences. Linkage points can be learned while attacking monsters. Try attacking monsters and linkage points.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011100
text: Return to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011101
text: Defeat Flying-type monsters with the Cloth armor-type

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011102
text: The Archer Submaster asks you to fight an enemy that can challenge an Archer to one's own extreme. Defeat flying-type monsters with the cloth armor-type.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011103
text: Gather Stone for Wall Restoration

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011104
text: The Ranger Submaster asks you to help other Rangers who are participating in an effort to rebuild Orsha. Go to the reefs forest 63_1 and find the right stone for Wall Restoration from Hard Building Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011105
text: Obtain overgrown fluid from plant monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011106
text: The Quarrel Shooter Submaster teaches you that maintaining one's own crossbow well is very important. Defeat plant monsters and obtain overgrown fluid that will be used to maintain your crossbow. Stronger the plant monster is more likely you will obtain overgrown fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011107
text: Defeat plant type monsters and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011108
text: Talk to the Sapper Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011109
text: Talk to the Sapper Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011110
text: Gather materials for a sturdier barricade

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011111
text: The Sapper Submaster is working on a way to strengthen barricades that Sappers use. Go to the reefs forest 63_1 and retrieve useful materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011112
text: Report to the Sapper Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011113
text: Return to the Sapper Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011114
text: Talk to the Hunter Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011115
text: Talk to the Hunter Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011116
text: Defeat monsters in a dungeon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011117
text: The Hunter Submaster says emphatically that a Hunter must have guts to enjoy danger. Go to a dungeon area and defeat monsters. Tougher the dungeon is, more you will be recognized.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011118
text: All dungeon areas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011119
text: Report to the Hunter Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011120
text: Return to the Hunter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011121
text: Defeat fire property monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011122
text: The Pyromancer Submaster warns you that in order learn advance Pyromancy, one must go through a trial by fire. Defeat a fire property monster as a trial by fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011123
text: Defeat ice property monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011124
text: The Cryomancer Submaster warns you that in order learn advance Cryomancy, one must go through a trial by frost. Defeat a ice property monster as a trial by frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011125
text: Defeat monsters with the range of Magic Control Detection Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011126
text: The Psychokino Master is planning on testing you on the delicate spell control. Use Magic Control Detection Orb and defeat monsters in its range.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011127
text: Defeat monsters and obtain spiritual energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011128
text: The Linker Master is currently working on advancing Linker's magic by finding a connection other than a spiritual one. Help with Linker Master's study and fill up Soul Flask with the monsters by defeating them so that Linkers may become stronger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011129
text: Talk to the Thaumaturge Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011130
text: Talk to the Thaumaturge Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011131
text: Defeat monsters of all sizes; small, medium and large

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011132
text: The Thaumaturge Submaster says an aspiring Thaumaturge must be able to handle monsters of all sizes. Defeat monsters of all sizes; small, medium and large.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011133
text: Report to the Thaumaturge Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011134
text: Return to the Thaumaturge Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011135
text: Talk to the Elementalist Master in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011136
text: Defeat monsters with properties of fire, ice, electricity and earth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011137
text: The Elementalist Master says to be able to proficiently use the magic of an Elementalist, one must capable of adapting to the enemy's property. Defeat monsters of all properties; fire, ice, electricity and earth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011138
text: Return to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011139
text: Defeat demons in the Carlyle's Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011140
text: The Ranger Submaster says that an on-site training is the best to determine one's aptitude. Defeat demons in the Carlyle's Mausoleum and prove your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011141
text: Enhance a shield up to level five

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011142
text: The Quarrel Shooter Submaster says a Quarrel Shooter ought to have a trusty shield at hand. Get a shield enhanced to level five like the Quarrel Shooter Master told you to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011143
text: Materials for the bomb experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011144
text: The Sapper Submaster is looking for a way to make bombs stronger. Defeat monsters in Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3 to obtain materials appropriate for the experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011145
text: Search for Hunter's Pass

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011146
text: The Hunter Submaster says the Hunter's test is already set up. Go to Castlefield 65_1, 2 and and find a chest in each are which contains Hunter's Pass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011147
text: Talk to the Wugushi Master in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011148
text: Gather corpse poison of Wugushi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011149
text: The Wugushi Master says you start with finding a poison if you want become a Wugushi. Defeat monsters in the Carlyle's Mausoleum and the corpse poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011150
text: Return to the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011151
text: Talk to the Scout Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011152
text: Talk to the Scout Submaster in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011153
text: Attack enemies without getting hit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011154
text: The Scout Submaster says that the main requirement for being a Scout is a quick movement. Do normal attacks to monsters without getting hit yourself. If you get hit, the counter resets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011155
text: Report to the Scout Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011156
text: Return to the Scout Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011157
text: Gather broken spears and broken armor pieces of Hoplites

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011158
text: Defeat monst at the Apsimesti Crossroads and gather broken pieces of other Hoplites' spears. Also, the broken pieces of armor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011159
text: You've found all the stuff you've been asked to. Return and report to Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011160
text: Obtain %s in the reeds forest at the Apsimesti Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011161
text: Defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while under the influence of the Barbarian's potion. You must do it alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011162
text: The Corrupted Lake

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011163
text: Talk to Elder Aloizard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011164
text: Elder Aloizard is in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011165
text: Defeat eight of the nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011166
text: Elder Aloizard says the road back to town is blocked by the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011167
text: Tell Elder Aloizard that all nearby monsters have been defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011168
text: Defeat nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011169
text: Talk to the Elder's Granddaughter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011170
text: The granddaughter needs your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011171
text: Investigate the suspicious place

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011172
text: The granddaughter asked you to investigate the suspicious place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011173
text: Talk to the Granddaughter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011174
text: The granddaughter is asking you for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011175
text: Find the disappeared old man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011176
text: You should find the old man who ran off to somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011177
text: Talk to the old man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011178
text: Check up on the states of the old man and the young man

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011179
text: Elder Aloizard is asking you to inspect the suspicious disc.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011180
text: Use the suspicious disc to inspect the nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011181
text: Use the suspicious disc to reveal the secret of the detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011182
text: Bring the red fragment obtained from the suspicious disc to Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011183
text: Ask the granddaughter about the notes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011184
text: Meet Elder Aloizard by the Absenta Reservoir

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011185
text: Speak with Elder Aloizard about the notes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011186
text: Offerings to the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011187
text: Talk to Samsonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011188
text: Samsonas is looking for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011189
text: Gather Chafperor's meat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011190
text: Samsonas asked you to bring the offerings to the obelisk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011191
text: You should give the gathered meat to Samsonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011192
text: %s obtained

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011193
text: Samsonas has one more favor to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011194
text: Give the Offerings to the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011195
text: Samsonas asks you to give the offerings to the obelisk instead of him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011196
text: Report back to Samsonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011197
text: You should return back to Samsonas and report the result.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011198
text: Clear the Corruption

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011199
text: You need to speak with Elder Aloizard about the content of the notes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011200
text: Investigate the suspicious place and find a clue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011201
text: Investigate the second suspicious place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011202
text: You need to bring the Partially burnt Painting you've found to Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011203
text: Talk to Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011204
text: Follow the villager to the spot where a Hydra appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011205
text: You should follow the villager to the spot where a Hydra appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011206
text: Ask Elder Aloizard about the Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011207
text: Elder Aloizard has a favor to ask.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011208
text: Elder Aloizard asks you to go to the hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011209
text: You need to speak with the hunter and figure out a way to lure the Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011210
text: Gather Chafperor's meat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011211
text: The hunter asked you to gather meat appropriate for a bait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011212
text: Gather the Blue Lake Herb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011213
text: You need to gather the Blue Lake Herb to use it in the bait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011214
text: You've gathered enough meat. Now, gather the blue lake herb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011215
text: Gather the Blue Lake Herb to use it in the bait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011216
text: Bring the ingredients back to the hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011217
text: Gather %s to put in the bait

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011218
text: You should get the bait from the hunter and use it to lure the Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011219
text: Lure Tyronas Hydra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011220
text: You should place the bait on the trap to lure the Tyronas Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011221
text: You should tell Elder Aloizard that the Hydra has fallen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011222
text: Defeat Tyronas Hydra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011223
text: The hunter seems to have a favor to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011224
text: Gather the Yellow Lake Herb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011225
text: The hunter asked you to gather some Yellow Lake Herb to ease the pain of the poisoned villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011226
text: You should bring the gathered herb back to the hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011227
text: %s obtained

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011228
text: Recurrence Prevention

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011229
text: Talk to Lanaldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011230
text: Lanaldas is seeking help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011231
text: Collect Chafperor's Lard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011232
text: Lanaldas has asked you to collect Chafperor's Lard in order to make oil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011233
text: Hand in the Chafperor's Lard you've collected to Lanaldas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011234
text: Lanaldas seems to have another request.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011235
text: Burn the worktable and magic circle in the laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011236
text: Lanaldas has asked you to burn the worktable and magic circle in the laboratory to prevent such an incident from re-occuring.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151102_011237
text: Report the results to Lanaldas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011238
text: Receptionist Donnes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011239
text: I might have a request for you.{nl}You might be the perfect one for the job. Interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011240
text: This job would be perfect for you.{nl}I do have a keen eye for people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011241
text: The client should be pleased by your performance.{nl}Well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011242
text: You didn't see him?{nl}His mind is not all that sound. Where could he be?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011243
text: Where are my manners, allow me to introduce myself.{nl}I am studying the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel along with the historians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011244
text: What study is worth doing in the midst of all these monsters after Medzio Diena, you might ask...{nl}Our latest study shows that the Royal Mausoleum contains the secret behind Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011245
text: No one can say for certain that a disaster like Medzio Diena will not recur.{nl}Also, we need to study the Royal Mausoleum to find the missing goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011246
text: Anyway, if you do find Jonas, please let me know.{nl}He is essential to our study.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011247
text: The next seal is on the road to the Collapsed Sanctum.{nl}It's dangerous out there, it's best to prepare yourself before you set off.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011248
text: Jonas wants the record he wrote.{nl}Hmm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011249
text: Jonas is the head of the family that has been protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}He is a very important person to our research team.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011250
text: He was once very healthy, but these days he is old and weak both in mind and body.{nl}It was after Jonas went out to a visit with his servant.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011251
text: He was later to be found with a case of dementia...{nl}His servant was no where to be found.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011252
text: Well, anyway, I see what must be done. {nl}Take this medicine with you and give it to him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011253
text: The Great King Zachariel has asked my forefather to keep the {nl}Eyes of the Great King and the Royal Mausoleum's treasure safe.{nl}Use the Eyes of the Great King to find the worthy one and pass down the treasure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011254
text: I am not sure of what he meant by 'the worthy one'...{nl}However, the goddess said unto Zachariel and gave him{nl}the divine task of helping the one who will save this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011255
text: It could very well be that all this is according to the goddess' guidance.{nl}So, test yourself and see if you are the worthy one {nl}to take the treasure through the Eyes of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011256
text: What you've said is hard to believe.{nl}This revelation is from Goddess Laima and only when we collect all of them, she will return. {nl}Is that what you mean?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011257
text: Goddess Laima is also referred as the 'goddess in a book'. {nl}There is no other story mentioning her name other than the record that states{nl}that she picked the spot for the kingdom to be built to the Great King Zachariel.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011258
text: We need to assemble already?{nl}The world may be on the brink of destruction, but I can't accept this kind of insane order. {nl}I have enough missions on my hands as it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011259
text: There is a divine nature behind a mere material object.{nl}Many call it a soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011260
text: According to the ancient texts, the king eased the memories of the stonecutters through magic.{nl}It was done to ensure the security of the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}A precise memory erasure, isn't that incredible?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011261
text: Being a Psychokino is something wonderful. I guarantee it!{nl}But first, I need your help on my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011262
text: Could you gather Desmodus' Tail Pins in the Tenet Chapel B1?{nl}They break easily so, it's very hard to secure one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011263
text: Perfect. The tail pins are all fully intact.{nl}Study under me and you will see why this is amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011264
text: The power to trust yourself. Everlasting self-confidence.{nl}That is the most important thing in projecting your will unto the reality.{nl}It is the essence of being a Psychokino and the force that runs the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011265
text: Sapper's skills, ay? Of course, the lesson fee is entailed.{nl}No, no, not to me. To the Cleric Master in Klaipeda. In the form of a donation.{nl}1,000 silver might be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011266
text: Have you forgotten about a proper amount of donation?{nl}Well... usually it's 1,000 silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011267
text: Are you talking about the book written by Lydia Schaffen?{nl}I am wiling to give it to you for 1,000 silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011268
text: I am deeply sorry to ask you to do this but...{nl}1,000 silver would it the bill.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011269
text: 1,000 silver... That's right.{nl}Here's the book as I promised.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011270
text: The second book of Lydia Schaffen, you seek?{nl}1,000 silver would be the price.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011271
text: I guess 1,000 silver would be enough.{nl}I heard it is the fair market price.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011272
text: The book in my possession? You want it?{nl}Well, okay. For 1,000 silver I am willing to part ways with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011273
text: Around 1,000 silver would be enough.{nl}You can pay it for me, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011274
text: The most important thing for a true Priest is to trust the goddesses and prove it to them.{nl}Please exorcise the evil spirit from a soldier in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011275
text: Well done. I think I have gathered enough material.{nl}Now that the urgent research has been concluded. {nl}Let's resume our training, shall we?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011276
text: The reality bending at my will. Actualizing it through thoughts alone...{nl}The intensity depends on how much you believe in yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011277
text: Such is the power.{nl}If you help me on this, I will help you bring out your true potential.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011278
text: Please bring me the essences of Minotaur and Chapparition from Gate Route.{nl}Okay... I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011279
text: That's what exactly I needed! {nl}Look at it, it's dripping with maliciousness.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011280
text: Now, fasten your seatbelt, you are about to witness the real Psychokino!{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011281
text: I said that it can be obtained from Sirdgela Forest.{nl}The place where even the ever-famous Rodelero Submaster's army ran away from.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011282
text: Often times, the cruel fate leads to the dark future.{nl}May the goddesses protect you on your journey as a Bokor...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011283
text: Cataphract. {nl}I'm not sure if that role fits you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011284
text: I like your guts.{nl}Do me a favor, and prove yourself by defeating Sparnasman in Vieta Gorge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011285
text: Impressive. {nl}What you have shown me proves that you will not have difficulties in learning my skills.{nl}Ah, I apologize about underestimating you earlier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011286
text: Concentrate your firepower into one spot and penetrate your foe. Then... Kaboom!{nl}You are not ready yet at this moment though, so I will take mere defeating the enemy as a hit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011287
text: We Wugushi's do not hesitate to use poison.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011288
text: We will first show you how to fight. We will use bows, blowguns, whatever is available.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011289
text: Rodelero Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011290
text: You are so determined unlike other people nowadays.{nl}You can come to learn from me anytime you want.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011291
text: It's a monster called Moa. {nl}It ran away to Leipsna Chapel Site.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011292
text: If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl}Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011293
text: The stream mentioned in the revelation starts at above the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddesses be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011294
text: Will this world be peaceful when we meet again? I hope it will.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011295
text: It's all my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead... what can I do alone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011296
text: There are two ways to connect with the goddesses. {nl}An ardent belief for her, and the sound of silver dropping into her offering box. {nl}Just those two.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011297
text: I am relieved to hear that my friend was able to go back safely.{nl}I was worried because of the stories that Molich is wandering around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011298
text: Did you hear about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Queen at the Tenet Church?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011299
text: It would have been better if she was killed for good, but she is the Demon Queen after all... {nl}Someone that even the Paladin Master wasn't able to defeat. {nl}That is awesome enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011300
text: The Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the mines. {nl}I have no idea what's going on. Do you have anything that comes to mind?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011301
text: We won't know if the Revelators really dreamed of the goddess. {nl}It could even be a trick of the demons. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011302
text: But didn't someone among them save the Tenet Church? Even from the Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011303
text: It's a relief a Revelator drove away the Demon Lord from the mines. {nl}I was scared that another Medzio Diena would happen again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011304
text: But I felt something warm... Was it just my delusion? {nl}It was a pure and good energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011305
text: I made it through the wild monsters and you made through the Thorn Forest. {nl}I'm sure you're not looking for the goddess... So what's the matter?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011306
text: I heard the historians were attacked by the Demon Lord at King's Plateau. {nl}So it means the disaster was forewarned a thousand years ago? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011307
text: Anyway, it's a relief the Revelator was able to stop it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011308
text: In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011309
text: You making it through the forest... Does it mean the forest is now purified?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011310
text: There is still so much left undiscovered about the Great King Zachariel.{nl}But since the demons live longer than us... This must have been what they were preying at. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011311
text: I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. {nl}We might even have had another Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011312
text: Now the demons even bear the face of a human. {nl}I heard some Revelator stopped the Demon Lord in the Royal Mausoleum,{nl}but I wonder how many demons are now hiding amongst humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011313
text: The weight of history feels astoundingly heavy when you stand in this place. {nl}Maybe you can find a clue about Medzio Diena here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011314
text: I keep thinking that Medzio Diena might have just been a process.{nl}If not, then why would the demons go after a mausoleum that is over a thousand years old? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011315
text: It's a good thing some Revelator stopped it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011316
text: Hergasercle was an incarnation of obsession. {nl}The chain of obsession was broken thanks to the Revelator,{nl}but its soul is not something that can be saved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011317
text: So the Tzedej Altar has been attacked too?{nl}Regardless, we will still have a chance if we protect the other altars.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011318
text: This map is useless to me now, without my colleague.{nl}Please pray that my colleague goes to the goddess safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011319
text: Tools for stonemasons? {nl}That'll be 3,000 silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011320
text: Our family has been waiting for your appearance for a long time.{nl}A very long time, indeed... {nl}Now, this is the moment of fulfilling our family's duty, destiny and desire.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011321
text: This old withered man has no regrets left on this earthly plane {nl}and is eager to return into the arms of the goddess.{nl}Please, hurry and light the signal at the top with this igniter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011322
text: Yep. That's Canyon Apynys, alright.{nl}I am worried about the side effects, but I hope they go away soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011323
text: The bleeding has stopped, but my body feels numb.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can return safely?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011324
text: In order for these people to safely return to the village,{nl}we have to defeat these monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011325
text: The last call stopped at the Crystal Mine.{nl}The brother should be safe... I am so worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011326
text: How can I say that this object is more important than a person.{nl}This is all due to the blessing of the goddess that our brother is safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011327
text: Eliminate the bats in Crystal Mine 1F and bring their wings as a proof.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011328
text: I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}I trust Jonas has told you the details.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011329
text: You also need to possess courage and wisdom to release the seal. {nl}Perhaps, the Great King sought the proof of one's worthiness.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011330
text: Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum contains the secrets of Medzio Diena. {nl}We already have most of the answers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011331
text: But the remaining questions were the hardest ones. {nl}Ordinary historians like us have no way to solve them.{nl}While we were in aporia, we discovered that the help of a Revelator is needed to progress.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011332
text: I am aware of your reputation as a Revelator.{nl}Especially, the secret of the Royal Mausoleum should not be revealed to the public..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011333
text: If the secret of the Royal Mausoleum will bring destruction on land, concealing it is a must.{nl}That is why we seek your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011334
text: As I expected, this ordeal can only be passed to the Revelator.{nl} So that's it... it was prepared by the owner of the Royal Mausoleum after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011335
text: Great King Zachariel built this mausoleum to hide the secret.{nl}Peculiar, isn't it? A huge construct like this is far from inconspicuous...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011336
text: Well, it's no big issue.{nl}Everything has a reason for it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011337
text: The Royal Mausoleum must contain a secret bigger than we could possibly imagine.{nl}The next epitaph is at Serno Highland. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011338
text: As Laulas' injuries are severe, I'm here in his stead.{nl}The seal is released, what exactly happened here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011339
text: Anyhow, the altars here are one of the{nl}Royal Mausoleum's various defenses built to ward off intruders.{nl} Despite being built a long time ago, they have never been reactivated as no one knew the way to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011340
text: The seal at Rukas Plateau could be the answer.{nl}The altar won't function if it gets destroyed, but if we can activate it before then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011341
text: Although I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do.{nl}It sure can prevent him from doing it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011342
text: He is the traitor of the Kadumel Era and the owner of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}He was branded as the best swordsman even when he was young, {nl}and he had many people following him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011343
text: Are you hurt?{nl}I heard the sound of Honeypin's webs, but I am relieved to see you are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011344
text: Trusting Laima's words, I have been fighting the Demon Lord Bramble, {nl}who tried to take over the revelation. {nl}I have fought with it night and day to be able to hand the revelation to you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011345
text: All of this was because of our pride...{nl}For we did not listen to what Laima said, unfortunately...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011346
text: But, ultimately, Medzio Diena, that the demons caused broke the balance of power.{nl}The goddesses lost most of their strength since that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011347
text: You better escape as well.{nl}The place is full of demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011348
text: Just moments ago, the demons were controlling the monsters in the Bastymosi Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011349
text: I don't know how strong you are, for you to do such a dangerous thing...{nl}I am not moving an inch from this very spot. If you wanna go, go alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011350
text: I have been chased from Delmore Castle by the demons.{nl}I refuse to be in the same situation ever again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011351
text: Thank you. Thank you so much.{nl}If I went under the demons' control, what could have happened to those poor souls...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011352
text: The light bead you saw is actually... a human soul.{nl}No memory and will of its own. A soul in its purest form. An essence of a soul.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011353
text: These must be those who have lived around here...{nl}Even if they all perished by the demons, it is very strange that they have become such pure souls.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011354
text: There must be a tomb of an unknown soldier here somewhere...{nl}The will of the Guide Owl will help you find the fragments of the ruined Karolis Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011355
text: I should not have held my hopes up too high...{nl}Restoring the Karolis Altar was not enough to fully revive the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011356
text: The Altar of the Forest needs to be revived as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011357
text: Ah, the Altar of the Forest is located near the pond across there.{nl}It spreads Karolis' lights throughout the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011358
text: The lights are almost all out...{nl}If you can reignite them, the power of the altar will spread out!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011359
text: The tower that has been controlling the owls is filled with very malicious energy.{nl}Even you should not touch it without any precaution.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011360
text: Now, use this power to blow the tower in Duokliu Hall to smithereens!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011361
text: You certainly are being led by the goddess...{nl}I have that feeling.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011362
text: You've destroyed the Mind Control Tower as well?{nl}Now, peace will finally return.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011363
text: That's... that's a great relief.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011364
text: Mardas is the one who escaped from Delmore Castle.{nl}The souls we have seen before must be from there as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011365
text: I have no idea why such an atrocity has occurred in Delmore Castle...{nl}These souls, as I have told you previously, do not possess any memories and will of their own.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011366
text: All that is left is the energy of a pure soul.{nl}This is definitely not an ordinary occurrence.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011367
text: It seems some magical power is draining the life force out of living humans to extract souls...{nl}I have lived in this forest for many years but this is unheard of.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011368
text: I have explained it to this man...{nl}The souls are being collected at Letas Stream and offered to the Divine Tree.{nl}The owls have sent the souls to that direction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011369
text: We have to at least stop them.{nl}But Letas Stream has fallen into the hands of the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011370
text: Could we ask you to help us a bit longer?{nl}You are our only hope....

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011371
text: Karolis Cradle is a spot enriched with the energy of the forest.{nl}Stand there and the energy will come to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011372
text: As the energy concentration increases, it gets condensed and crystalized.{nl}Take the crystalized energy to the Guide Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011373
text: Ugh... What happened... Who are you?{nl}Did you save me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011374
text: You have my utmost gratitude.{nl}Right before I lost consciousness, I saw the image of a goddess, it must have been you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011375
text: Wha...? You already had it on you?{nl}That is great news. Bring it to the upper side of Atmesti Uphill and sprinkle the energy around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011376
text: I believe that utilizing the malicious force of the monsters would be a good idea. {nl}Use it on monsters to purify their energies and absorb them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011377
text: By talking with the Chief Owl Sculpture, I got the feeling we could work this out.{nl}The demons are using the evil energy to corrupt Letas Stream and to trap souls.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011378
text: You will find the evil energy concentrated on Svaigulys Hill.{nl}Set up the Namott of Suppression around it to remove the evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011379
text: Our priority is stopping the spot where the energy of the forest is getting drained.{nl}The spot is at Senyvas Yard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011380
text: The Surveillance Spheres are guarding Senyvas Yard, {nl}but without the Black Spirit, the demons' installation will weaken. {nl}Approaching it won't be easy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011381
text: It's rather risky but... I want you to infiltrate the place without getting {nl}detected by the Surveillance Spheres spinning around the Surveillance Eyes.{nl}At the end of the path, there is a magic circle managing those eyes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011382
text: If the magic circle is disabled, the Surveilance Spheres might be disabled with it as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011383
text: The Black Spirit can be removed with the Namott of Suppression, {nl}if we can deal with the Surveilance Spheres. Be careful. {nl}This mission is very dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011384
text: The Soul Starvation is on the lower side of Apsvaiges Path.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011385
text: The evil energy has weakened and the Black Smoke is gone.{nl}The demons, if they are not completely stupid, will notice these changes and come after us.{nl}Please, hurry up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011386
text: Is that so... The souls are free now.{nl}The Owl Chief promised to guide the souls to their rightful place, into the arms of the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011387
text: How can we ever repay you...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011388
text: Accessory Merchant Jurus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011389
text: This letter is... left by Eras.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011390
text: This is the first time since ages ago that I have heard from him... {nl}But now he has gone into the arms of the goddess...{nl}Fate is so cruel and gruesome to bear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011391
text: Thank you for delivering this letter to me.{nl}At least, now I know what had happened to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011392
text: So, you want to learn new magic, eh?{nl}But I need to be certain that you are prepared for it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011393
text: Without a firm foundation, learning is, naturally, very difficult.{nl}So, there's going to be a test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011394
text: I like your attitude. I have a mission for you. {nl}Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat some monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011395
text: That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011396
text: Here is your mission: Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat some monsters.{nl}That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011397
text: Hmm, not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}You seem to have what it takes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011398
text: Now, pay attention to what I am about to demonstrate.{nl}How you use it alongside your current magic is up to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011399
text: You want to become a Pyromancer?{nl}Kid, let me tell you something. Not everyone can become a Pyromancer.{nl}
