name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011400
text: Let's just say, you need to make friends with fire and its heat.{nl}I ain't all that convinced yet. But I will give you a chance to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011401
text: Good. Now, I want you to kill some monsters while under the magic I will put on you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011402
text: This magic will determine whether the spell you use is compatible with fire.{nl}Understood?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011403
text: If you are not compatible with fire, considering other paths is a viable option.{nl}There is no such thing as lukewarm flame.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011404
text: Oh my, you do have a knack. I am a bit surprised...?{nl}Well, a promise is a promise. I will teach ya.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011405
text: Whether you can follow it through or not is entirely up to ya. Got that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011406
text: We, Cryomancers, always welcome newcomers. {nl}Like you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011407
text: However, accepting all participants will only prove itself detrimental to all of us.{nl}It is for the best if we conduct a simple test to determine your aptitude {nl}in becoming a Cryomancer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011408
text: Here, inject your spell into this Piece of Ice.{nl}If you do not possess the necessary talent you require, the ice will melt.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011409
text: As you defeat monsters, your spell will be injected into this Piece of Ice.{nl}The instruction has been completed. Return to me when the result is successful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011410
text: There was one testee who melted the Piece of Ice from the instant it touched.{nl}To be honest... that is a feat in itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011411
text: That is sufficient.{nl}I will grant you the teachings of Cryomancy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011412
text: You really must be enjoying your life as an Archer if you're here to see me.{nl}Now, let's begin the test, shall we? Without seeing your power, we cannot be sure of anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011413
text: You are trustworthy.{nl}Obviously, an Archer should be able to hit a target from a distance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011414
text: It doesn't matter what kind of a monster it is.{nl}As long as you hit your targets from as far away as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011415
text: If you are either too close to the target or the target dodges your attack, it doesn't count.{nl}Got that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011416
text: Do you see that bug over there? Can you hit one of its legs?{nl}The master in Klaipeda hit the bullseye blindfolded.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011417
text: You are better than I thought.{nl}I won't disappoint you in my training.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011418
text: I will be the first one to admit that I have no patience whatsoever. {nl}Defeating an enemy one by one is just not my style.{nl}I prefer attacking all of them at once.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011419
text: That's one of the reasons why I like being a Ranger. What about you?{nl}If you are a scaredy-cat, if the number is not in your favor, {nl}you better give up now and save both of our time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011420
text: Let me see if you can walk the talk.{nl}But perhaps, facing off multiple enemies might be difficult yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011421
text: The next best thing to simultaneous combat is consecutive combat...{nl}Defeat one enemy and quickly attack the other. {nl}I want to see how much you can shorten that interval.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011422
text: Hesitating just once... and the enemies get close enough to kiss you.{nl}You don't want to get surrounded by enemies, do you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011423
text: Impressive.{nl}I have seen so many malfunctioning nitwits who could not walk the talk...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011424
text: Having a student like you is always a pleasure.{nl}Now, let's see. What should I teach you first?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011425
text: I do not refuse the ones who are ambitious.{nl}Nevertheless, there is a prerequisite you must have.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011426
text: A well-loved piece of gear...{nl}That is the most important thing for all classes to be honest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011427
text: I'm glad you agree.{nl}Now, show me a Lv +1 enhanced crossbow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011428
text: A crossbow and a Quarrel Shooter go hand in hand.{nl}I will just take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011429
text: A charming crossbow, I must say. {nl}Alright, I must acknowledge your way of maintaining your weapon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011430
text: Learning itself is not too difficult so come to me any time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011431
text: The time has come for you to learn the advanced magic of Wizards.{nl}You cannot learn new magic all by yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011432
text: Sometimes, the answer comes much quicker, if you ask around for advice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011433
text: Some might say: "Too many cooks spoil the broth." {nl}You can't have too many advice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011434
text: Did it help?{nl}Hmm, your enlightened eyes tells me yes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011435
text: All good. {nl}I will help you as far as I can. Hope you could do the same.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011436
text: At this stage, what you need to do is to improve your fire energy.{nl}For me, it's nothing at all but for you, some help would be necessary.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011437
text: Can't say it will be easy. {nl}Are you able to do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011438
text: That go-getter attitude is the sign of a good Pyromancer.{nl}Alright, take this Condensed Firestone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011439
text: Set it up near monsters and defeat them. Your fire energy infused with spell will be improved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011440
text: Improving your magic is the most important thing, here, {nl}so it doesn't matter what monsters you slay.{nl}But this test would be more worthwhile if you fight the monsters your level, wouldn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011441
text: Well done. {nl}I can sense your fire energy is much stronger than before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011442
text: If you practice what I am about to teach ya...{nl}You can soon reach the top!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011443
text: If new magic is what you are looking for.{nl}Your current state indicates that you need to {nl}acquire more experiences handling the cold energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011444
text: Stronger magic awaits you but...{nl}Whether you can handle it is an entirely differnet matter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011445
text: I do find your attitude quite optimal.{nl}I conjecture that Frost Tome will serve you well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011446
text: The ice resistance of the monsters increases with the power of that tome, defeat them.{nl}Colder than coldness itself... {nl}Only those who overcome such trial would have no trouble learning new magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011447
text: This trial will only have a meaning when that tome is used to defeat monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011448
text: Your handling of the cold energy has improved.{nl}Optimal. Keep the previous combat in mind and observe my instruction carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011449
text: Hmm... so you want to become a Psychokino.{nl}A great idea, I must say. Truly a magnificent choice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011450
text: But not everyone can wield Psychokinesis.{nl}One must realize the innate power bestowed in you from the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011451
text: You probably have no idea what I am talking about, right?{nl}Well, that's because it needs to be felt rather than explained. {nl}Do you wish to take up on a challenge?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011452
text: Now, you seem prepared.{nl}Here's the scroll containing the spell of the Psychokino.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011453
text: At least, you will instantly obtain the taste of the magic we use.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011454
text: Use the scroll to feel the power inside you.{nl}Even just feeling it will make the learning much easier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011455
text: Good, now did you get the taste of what is it like?{nl}We call it the psychic power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011456
text: Enough with the theoretical learnings.{nl}Unto the practices of how to use psychic power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011457
text: Having strong spells is certainly important but for a Linker, {nl}one must be able to empathize with the others.{nl}Finding the line connecting my mind and that of the other and making it reality. {nl}That is the job of a Linker.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011458
text: Was that far too complicated of an explanation?{nl}If so, let me give you a tip on a way to understand that... Are you up for it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011459
text: A Linker must be able to find the connection point for each mana that each every one of us has.{nl}If you find this task to daunting, the way of a Linker is not for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011460
text: I believe that such epiphany will come to you naturally if you keep on fighting with monsters.{nl}Although you are not yet a Linker, you too might be able to sense the connection point.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011461
text: Concentrate while battling monsters, you will see.{nl}All that is left is to hope that you have the talent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011462
text: Did you feel it?{nl}Then, the rest is easy. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011463
text: Come back to me whenever you want to learn the Linker's magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011464
text: When you first came to Orsha, I had my doubts about you...{nl}But look at you now. Your tales of valour have spread out!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011465
text: This is a final test.{nl}Let me test on how much you understand the path of the Archer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011466
text: Although an Archer will not be defeated by anyone but, {nl}some enemies that can be tougher to beat. The flying cloth-type ones.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011467
text: Now, you know what to do, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011468
text: This is the Archer's Test Orb.{nl}It will record whether you have defeated ones properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011469
text: I hope you are not lost, even with all those hints I have given you.{nl}This is all part of the test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011470
text: How was it?{nl}Wasn't it easier than usual?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011471
text: No theory is left to teach you.{nl}The rest is practice! Even at the top, do not forget the basics.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011472
text: I am participating in those efforts myself as well.{nl}A Ranger is there to help those who are in danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011473
text: A part test, a part volunteer work. I want you to help the effort to restore Orsha, you up for it?{nl}A Ranger is there to help those who are in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011474
text: The most urgent matter at hand is that we need the stone materials for rebuilding the wall.{nl}In Koru Jungle, you might find the appropriate stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011475
text: The roots really did a number on the wall.{nl}Not to mention the time I had to stop the Pyromancer Submaster from burning them all down...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011476
text: Woah, now you did diligently. {nl}It would do a lot of good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011477
text: I am a bit busy but a promise is a promise. I will teach you the new skills.{nl}Learn well and practice as often as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011478
text: You seem to be ready to learn new skills.{nl}But at the moment, there is a lot on my plate... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011479
text: Help me on this and then I might be able to help you back.{nl}How about that? Help me rebuild Orsha. It will be worthwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011480
text: It seems there is a shortage of materials.{nl}Especially, the adhesive to hold the bricks tight.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011481
text: Defeat Plant-type monsters and obtain the sticky liquid from them.{nl}A stronger monster is the stronger fluid it yields.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011482
text: Everyone is on the effort to rebuild Orsha, our home.{nl}On that fateful Medzio Diena, we all thought the world would end... {nl}But there are some things that even such catastrophe cannot break.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011483
text: You came back earlier than I expected.{nl}All good. Everything seems to be getting into its rightful place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011484
text: Nice to meet you. {nl}You must be the new applicant for becoming a Sapper?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011485
text: The ideal Sapper is the one who is always cautious.{nl}The one who flawedly sets up traps can ruin the flow of the battlefield.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011486
text: I am a Sapper and a soldier. I detest jokey attitude.{nl}I will see how serious you work on the mission, {nl}and I will determine whether you can be in or out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011487
text: I am currently researching and developing a new kind of trap.{nl}It is going to be something completely different from all the previous traps.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011488
text: Go to Koru Jungle and find me some Sturdy Research Stones.{nl}If you take this mission seriously, you will not bring stone that crumble upon a mere touch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011489
text: It doesn't matter how strong you are, if you have an inappropriate attitude, {nl}You are out. Understood? {nl}One wrongfully set up trap can cause irreparable damage to the rest of the team.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011490
text: Hm. You've passed the test.{nl}I must warn you my training is harsh and strict. Only concentrating through is the only way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011491
text: A Hunter, eh? I take it that you're good with a bow and arrow?{nl}If it were all up to me, I would take everyone in but if I did that, think of all the shenanigans.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011492
text: So let me test you on your worthiness to become one of my students.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011493
text: A Hunter needs to be able to enjoy the danger and the thrill it entails.{nl}For example... Ah, yes, like inside a dungeon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011494
text: It doesn't matter which monster in a dungeon.{nl}What's important is to keep calm in a dangerous situation. {nl}If then, I will acknowledge you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011495
text: Hmm... I think the Ashaq Underground Prison or the Novaha Monastery would be too easy.{nl}The more danger there lurks, there higher your score will be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011496
text: Well, you got it.{nl}Good. I think, you've proven your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011497
text: Welcome back. {nl}I think, it is a high time you go through a trial by fire.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011498
text: If you can pass this trial, you can be recognized as a true Pyromancer.{nl}It won't be easy, but you wanna try it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011499
text: Right, for your trial, you must combat the ones that are {nl}most familiar to us and yet most pestersome to deal with...{nl}Of course, I am talking about fire property monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011500
text: It doesn't matter which type.{nl}Godspeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011501
text: In order to fend off fire property monsters, you must strike them down with greater force.{nl}Or you must utilize other properties of magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011502
text: I knew you could do it.{nl}Now, this would be our last training, so listening up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011503
text: I have taught numerous Cryomancers...{nl}But no one achieved your current state as fast as you did.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011504
text: Now, this is your final test.{nl}A trial by cold, the ultimate test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011505
text: Knowing thyself and the enemy is the most important.{nl}A trial by cold is to defeat a ice property monster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011506
text: That is what it takes to be on the top of all the other Cryomancers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011507
text: You didn't think it would be that easy to reach the top, did you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011508
text: Now, that is a slice of fried gold. {nl}You've exceeded my expectation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011509
text: I will guide you to...{nl}The top of Cryomancy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011510
text: Being a Psychokino requires you to evaluate situations precisely.{nl}Gaining the position of advantage will certainly help you in combat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011511
text: That is up to you to realize it. Only then will you be able to learn more advanced magic.{nl}Show me what you got, if you can take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011512
text: This is the Spell Detector Orb.{nl}The range is bit short, but it can detect spells around it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011513
text: Defeat monsters within the range of the Spell Detector Orb.{nl}It will probably take you some calculations to find the right spot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011514
text: Just like real estate, the most important thing is location, location and location, {nl}so the type, level or property of the monster don't matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011515
text: Hmm... better than I expected.{nl}Keep up the good work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011516
text: A Linker. A Linker is the one who connects one's mana with other's mana...{nl}That is what makes us so special.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011517
text: However, if you go beyond the mana and connect the soul itself. {nl}You could reach a new unknown territory.{nl}If you want to expand the Linker's horizon, please, help me on my research.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011518
text: Fill this Soul Flask with spiritual powers.{nl}Defeat the monsters and the spiritual powers will absorb into the flask.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011519
text: If this research is successful, all the Linkers will benefit from it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011520
text: Now, that's a full flask.{nl}Thank you very much, it's only fitting that I have to repay you for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011521
text: You will learn new magic from this point on.{nl}Please, follow my instructions attentively like always.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011522
text: Do you seek the way to become a Thaumaturge?{nl}Hm, we, Thaumaturges, wield the magic to transform the types and properties of entities.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011523
text: What is the most important is a keen eye to read the flow of combat.{nl}For you to know how to lead the situation in your favor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011524
text: Enough talking. Let's get to the practical lessons.{nl}Theoretical learning is quite boring for my taste.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011525
text: A Thaumaturge's magic has one that can change size of entities.{nl}Whether it's an ally or an enemy, it doesn't matter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011526
text: So, in order to learn how to curve the combat situation into your favor.{nl}Try facing off with monsters of varying sizes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011527
text: Defeat small, medium and large-sized monsters.{nl}It will be a valuable experience for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011528
text: If you cannot pull it through, you better find another way.{nl}I don't have to tell you the basics of combat from the start, do I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011529
text: How was it? {nl}Did you learn something from it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011530
text: Alright, now I have to acknowledge you. {nl}You do have what it takes to learn new magic from the Thaumaturge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011531
text: Looking at your stance, it exudes the way of a veteran.{nl}But is it just a stance or do you have the substance?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011532
text: Incidentally, there is an appropriate opponent right there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011533
text: I heard that there is a Necroventer in Carlyle's Mausoleum.{nl}As a Ranger, we cannot allow such danger to roam freely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011534
text: Defeat the Necroventer and prove your worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011535
text: Good attitude, good confidence.{nl}All you need is good skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011536
text: Impressive.{nl}When did you get this far?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011537
text: The skills I am about to teach you are quite complex but for you, {nl}learning them wouldn't be a problem.{nl}No matter what happens down the road, always remember your first step. {nl}Promise?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011538
text: If I had to point out one, among many, things that we, {nl}Quarrel Shooters are better than other archers is... The way we handle shields.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011539
text: No one can deny we engage in combat with more safety.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011540
text: Your future journey will lead you to very dangerous places.{nl}Show me a strong sturdy shield and I will help you become a powerful Quarrel Shooter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011541
text: A shield upgraded to level 5 would suffice.{nl}Don't worry, I will give it back to you after I am done checking.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011542
text: When you think of a Quarrel Shooter, you will immediately {nl}think of hiding behind a shield firing with a crossbow.{nl}Utilizing your surroundings is a plus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011543
text: You want to learn more Sapper skills? Now that's an attitude I like.{nl}Just like last time, help me on the research to improve the skills of the Sapper.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011544
text: As a reward, I will teach you the new skills of a Sapper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011545
text: I am currently devising a bomb with a better 'boom'! If you know what I mean...{nl}I heard that the Gun Powder on the Delmore Outskirts is the finest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011546
text: Here's a caveat. The rumor has it that the villagers on the Delmore Outskirts {nl}all have left and the place is now occupied by the monsters.{nl}Defeat the monsters and retrieve the gun powder for me, please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011547
text: But isn't that strange?{nl}If the villagers have left the place, where did they left for?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011548
text: This is enough.{nl}I hope it will work this time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011549
text: Let's see about that. We still got time... {nl}Before I conduct the experiment, shall we get to your training?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011550
text: I've prepared a test for hunters like you.{nl}It's a simple retrieval mission. What do you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011551
text: I've hidden a Hunter's Test Mark at Delmore Hamlet, Manor, and Outskirts respectively.{nl}I've put them in chests so try to find them before anyone else takes them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011552
text: The people of Delmore Castle are generous in their reception.{nl}It's been a while since I've been there, so I might want to go there again soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011553
text: You've found all of them.{nl}But it's only full of monsters... I guess they've finally decided to follow the migration orders?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011554
text: Well, let's think about that a bit later.{nl}Now. How much have you learned again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011555
text: I'm glad that you wish to become a Wugushi.{nl}It is a nice feeling to know that you have new colleagues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011556
text: Using poison is a given as a Wugushi.{nl}But since you don't yet know how to craft poisons yet, I'll teach you how to use existing poisons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011557
text: Good question. I think Wugushi Poison would be appropriate for you to try to obtain.{nl}Here, I'll give you a Wugushi Poison Bottle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011558
text: The monsters at Carlyle's Mausoleum should be soaked in Wugushi Poison.{nl}All you have to do is to gather some poison from the monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011559
text: What's Wugushi Poison?{nl}It's poison that gathers in dead bodies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011560
text: It's a bit unpleasant I know, but it's suitable for beginners.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011561
text: You must always be careful when handling poison.{nl}You can hurt yourself, you know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011562
text: Now how about I teach you a bit about Wugushi techniques {nl}since you've successfully gathered the Wugushi Poison?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011563
text: We Scouts use specialized skills that allow us to {nl}reconnoiter enemies without them knowing about it.{nl}That's why being extremely agile is important.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011564
text: Now let's see... How good is our volunteer?{nl}Tell me when you're prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011565
text: Good. {nl}Keep attacking without getting hit once by enemy attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011566
text: I'll start counting from the very beginning if you get hit even once.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011567
text: Is it too hard?{nl}One possible solution is to defeat them before they can reach you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011568
text: It looked as if there wasn't even enough time for a speck of dust to fall on your shoulders.{nl}You seem to be quite nimble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011569
text: I'm sure you'll be able to learn Scout skills with ease.{nl}I'm happy to be able to teach such a gifted pupil as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011570
text: Ah, I know about that as well.{nl}It's famous you know, the Owl Sculpture...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011571
text: When people die, their spirits are left behind you know.{nl}It's said that the Owl Sculpture leads them back to the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011572
text: My grandmother told me that a sculptor crafted it on the orders of Goddess Ausrine.{nl}She said that he received eternal life in return.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011573
text: I heard that he's still making those Owl Sculptures...{nl}I don't know why that sculpture is like that since{nl}it was most likely crafted by the same sculptor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011574
text: Oh, good morning. It seems you've finally woken up.{nl}I've heard that they're making preparations to process people to enter Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011575
text: I've received a lot of help from you on the way here.{nl}You've even saved me when I was surrounded by monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011576
text: In times like these with all the goddesses gone, the villagers are all grateful for your help.{nl}I guess today will be the last of that though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011577
text: Anyway, how are your dreams?{nl}You've been suffering from nightmares for a while...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011578
text: You've had them last night as well? Oh that's... not good.{nl}How about getting some consultation in Orsha since we'll be there soon?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011579
text: I'm a bit worried since there are so many people from other villages coming to Orsha.{nl}I don't know how many migration orders they have issued...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011580
text: If you're bored of just waiting around, try asking Mayor Romanas about whats going on.{nl}He said that he's going to meet the lord of Orsha soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011581
text: Greetings. I'm the Swordsman Submaster.{nl}Do you know how attribute training works?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011582
text: Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011583
text: You'll be able to fare better in combat if you learn attributes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011584
text: Welcome. I'm the Wizard Submaster.{nl}I've been waiting to teach you about attribute training.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011585
text: Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011586
text: Do you understand how attributes work?{nl}You'll now be able to deal with enemies more easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011587
text: Hello. I am the Archer Submaster.{nl}Do you happen to know anything about attribute training?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011588
text: Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011589
text: Did you get the hang of how attributes work?{nl}You can have combat go your way by using the right attributes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011590
text: I see that a follower of the goddesses has come to see me.{nl}Greetings, I am the Cleric Submaster.{nl}Do you know anything of attribute training?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011591
text: Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011592
text: Do you understand how attributes work?{nl}You will be able to handle enemies with ease if you learn attributes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011593
text: Oh yes, Accessory Merchant Ronesa said that she had a present that she really wants to give you.{nl}Why don't you stop by?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011594
text: You can get there by going straight left of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011595
text: Greetings! {nl}You're the Revelator that's been dreaming about the goddesses, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011596
text: You can meet Ronesa by going straight left from here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011597
text: You'll be able to collect poison by putting pots where the monsters are.{nl}Bring it back when you've gathered enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011598
text: That was the last of the magic circles in this farm.{nl}Now we'll have to pray that Horacius is successful as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011599
text: Goddesses, humans, and Demon Goddesses...{nl}What is your number?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011600
text: If you're heading south, you can help Merrisa or Margellius.{nl}Even for a veteran, the monsters in this neighborhood are something else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011601
text: Will you put up this bulletin board on Kluibe Road, then?{nl}Merrisa is looking for holy relics, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011602
text: Merrisa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011603
text: Ink made from Infroburk's body fluid is best because it lasts longer.{nl}I'm going to give you a trap; you collect the Infroburk body fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011604
text: Just place the trap in front of an Infroburk.{nl}When it steps on it and gets caught, you'll be able to collect its body fluid.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011605
text: Go to the Drose Empty Lot and set up the trap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011606
text: Alina... Grazina...{nl}Please let them be safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011607
text: They're my research records, but the Ticens took off with them.{nl}I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011608
text: Oh, by the way, I'll send out a flare in case there's danger.{nl}It's all I can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011609
text: It was a bit weird.{nl}They were just standing around, then they saw a type of leather and tore it to pieces.{nl}It was really thick and they tore it with their bare hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011610
text: So this is a person I don't know and they can't come here?{nl}You expect me to believe that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011611
text: Do the people of the Nestospa know about Albinas?{nl}I would have thought they would come here right away...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011612
text: Will you thank the people of the Nestospa for me?{nl}I hope we can put our differences aside and look for a solution together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011613
text: Will you tell Damijonas about it, too?{nl}They're likely still at Usas Hill looking after the new gravestone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011614
text: Hey!{nl}Stop wandering around and run!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011615
text: Oh no... There's no time to tell everyone in Orsha...{nl}If I don't do anything the demons are going to get my colleagues... What do I do...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011616
text: Even if I want to ask for help in Orsha, but it's too far!{nl}Please, save my colleagues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011617
text: Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I came back to the village and all I saw were demons, I was wondering what happened...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011618
text: What?{nl}You mean the demons came?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011619
text: I don't want to put someone I just met in such danger...{nl}But you're my only hope. Please, do this for me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011620
text: They're hiding in the Herb Gatherers' Cabin.{nl}I don't know when the demons will find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011621
text: Our hometown is in an inner area of Knidos Jungle.{nl}We're traveling merchants. We sell items all across the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011622
text: I was in a village to the north of Orsha when I heard about the migration order.{nl}I was worried about my hometown so I came back.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011623
text: But the village is completely empty.{nl}And there's no word about the migration order in brother's letters either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011624
text: I wondered if he had at least left a note out here...{nl}But when we were looking through the village the demons attacked and I ran all the way here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011625
text: I'm worried for the village, but also for my colleagues who had to split up earlier.{nl}We've never been in danger like this before...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011626
text: Will you really help me out?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011627
text: To be able to receive the help of someone as talented as you...{nl}It's clear the goddesses still haven't left us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011628
text: Laswi can easily find out where my people are.{nl}But right now Laswi looks too tired.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011629
text: If only we had a Stamina pill or...{nl}You wouldn't happen to have one, would you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011630
text: I started working as a merchant because I was curious about the world outside the village. {nl}My brother, of course, thought it was too dangerous and didn't want to let me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011631
text: In the end I was more stubborn than him and he accepted.{nl}As long as I kept writing letters to him, that is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011632
text: I always write down my next destination in my letters so my brother knows where to send his.{nl}He usually writes to me about the village and the workings of the world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011633
text: But he didn't write anything about going to Orsha in his last letter...{nl}I wonder what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011634
text: Oh, thank you.{nl}I'll give it to Laswi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011635
text: I was worried about giving Laswi the pill, but I think it'll be fine.{nl}Fortunately, Laswi seems to feel better now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011636
text: There are four colleagues out there.{nl}Have Laswi smell their clothes and lead you to where they are hiding.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011637
text: If Laswi loses the scent, have her smell the clothes again.{nl}Laswi is a smart dog, I'm sure you'll be able to find my colleagues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011638
text: I hope they're fine.{nl}Even small monsters are a worry, let alone demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011639
text: Traveling Merchant Cassius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011640
text: Laswi! You're alive!{nl}Phew... I thought it was a demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011641
text: How come Laswi is with you, though?{nl}Did you happen to meet Laswi's owner?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011642
text: Oh... Rose asked you to come find me...{nl}It seems she managed to stay safe, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011643
text: Laswi always protected me from the demons...{nl}And now she found me all the way here, she's really one of a kind.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011644
text: You said our people are at the Herb Gatherers' Cabin, right?{nl}I'm tired now. I'm going back to Orsha with them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011645
text: I'm worried about the people of Rose's village too, but what can we do?{nl}Migration order or not, they're probably heading to Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011646
text: My colleagues are safe!{nl}I'm so glad to see them again; it's all thanks to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011647
text: I wonder if I should go to Knidos Jungle by myself and look for my village's people now.{nl}I can't keep dragging my colleagues into something that concerns my hometown.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011648
text: Thank you for rescuing my colleagues. I should go now... {nl}Please pray for me so I can find the people of my hometown.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011649
text: Traveling Merchant Andres

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011650
text: How many times have I talked to her...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011651
text: I understand that Rose is worried about her people.{nl}But they probably just left for Orsha because of the migration order, isn't it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011652
text: Because of all of this we ran into the demons and I lost my luggage.{nl}And all my expensive items were there... They were my only assets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011653
text: But I can't ask our group to go out and get it...{nl}The demons will be all over us if we so much as try to move. It's a tough call...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011654
text: Are you serious? Wow, that's...{nl}As if saving my life wasn't enough, now you're saving my entire assets, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011655
text: They're at the Doholle Rest Place.{nl}I was planning on going there to get them later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011656
text: I never felt so disheartened, not even during Medzio Diena.{nl}But it's my assets that are at stake here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011657
text: Yes, this is it! Thank you!{nl}It seems like the missing goddesses are back after all!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011658
text: Traveling Merchant Gomez

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011659
text: Thank you for saving me earlier.{nl}It was the most terrorizing experience I'd had since Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011660
text: Now Rose wants to go and look for the people of her hometown.{nl}I wish I could help her too, but I freeze every time I see demons, {nl}so I don't think I can unfortunately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011661
text: For now I think I'll stay here with my colleagues and wait for Rose.{nl}I'm still worried about the demons and the monsters, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011662
text: I really thought a demon had found me earlier, then I saw your face and, phew...{nl}I felt as if my prayers to the goddesses had been answered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011663
text: Oh? You really took care of it?{nl}What a relief to hear that. Thanks a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011664
text: It was really unexpected...{nl}We barely saw any monsters before, and now all of a sudden we have to deal with demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011665
text: At least I survived, but the wounds feel strangely swollen and hot.{nl}Will you bring me some herbs? I'm hoping they'll ease the pain a little bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011666
text: It's called Ronjia Grass, it looks a little different from the grass around it.{nl}I think there's some on the Nevaginga Hillside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011667
text: It's so painful, even though I barely touched it.{nl}What kind of demon...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011668
text: You got it! Hand them over.{nl}They're probably a little bitter but I really need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011669
text: This is... It looks serious.{nl}I mean, it's a wound caused by a demon, so I don't think it'll ever really heal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011670
text: Tales...? Oh, the one who always found me rare herbs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011671
text: You said the wounds are swollen, hot and discolored?{nl}If the Ronjia Grass doesn't work, then he must be affected by evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011672
text: I think the Cleric Submaster in Orsha might be able to help.{nl}I once helped her get some herbs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011673
text: Tell her about my symptoms.{nl}My wounds are swollen, hot and now they're turning purple...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011674
text: His condition is only expected to get worse with time.{nl}I'm going to give you some medicine to purify the evil energy in his body; please give it to Tales.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011675
text: Give it him as soon as possible.{nl}The longer you wait, the more the evil energy will spread.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011676
text: The medicine you brought seems to be working. {nl}My temperature should start to lower, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011677
text: I thought I was about to return to the goddesses like this...{nl}You really saved my life.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011678
text: Hm? I thought you'd left earlier...{nl}What are you doing here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011679
text: Ah... You were worried about me?{nl}Thank you. I don't think the demons have noticed me yet.{nl}I'll look somewhere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011680
text: I'm going back to the village and look through our house.{nl}If they're gone because of the migration order, my brother should've left a note.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011681
text: Really?{nl}I can be trouble sometimes, but thank you for worrying about me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011682
text: Will you have a look around the village, then?{nl}I'm thinking there will be some clues left.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011683
text: I was actually worried about coming alone, so thank you.{nl}Now if only we can find the people of my village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011684
text: It looks like... something bad has happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011685
text: The inside of our house is a complete chaos and there's demon footprints everywhere.{nl}I couldn't find any notes either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011686
text: I wonder what could've happened.{nl}I've seen too many villages destroyed by demon attacks during my trips as a merchant, you know

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011687
text: What if... No. I'm worrying too much, aren't I?{nl}There would be at least some tombs left behind if that were the case, {nl}but there aren't any. Right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011688
text: Those beads, though... I saw them before, too...{nl}I wonder if they're from Anne's necklace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011689
text: That's odd. She would never drop her necklace...{nl}It's very precious to Anne, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011690
text: Still... The beads could be a clue to help us find where the villagers are.{nl}Anne is smart enough to have done something like that. She was always clever.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011691
text: I wouldn't think much of it otherwise, but all the mess and the demon footprints...{nl}It's just bothering me.{nl}The only strange thing we've found so far are the beads from Anne's necklace...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011692
text: Let's try and follow the trail of the beads.{nl}We need to try something, anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011693
text: Let's try and follow the trail of the beads.{nl}Hopefully we can find something...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011694
text: It looks like the beads end here.{nl}I don't see any more of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011695
text: We can't give up.{nl}Maybe we're just not seeing the rest of the beads.{nl}They could've been kicked out of the way by monsters or...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011696
text: Let's take a look around.{nl}I'm sure we're missing something here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011697
text: I feel so desperate I want to cry.{nl}Please let us find something, please...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011698
text: Tess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011699
text: Don't hurt me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011700
text: I'm saved! I'm finally saved...{nl}Oh... It was horrible...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011701
text: Everyone in the village was taken.{nl}The demons said they were going to use a type of bracken to feed us to the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011702
text: Yes, the Divine Tree from four years ago!{nl}The one that spurted from under the ground and destroyed our cities on Medzio Diena...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011703
text: I managed to escape, but everyone else was taken to the Novaha Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011704
text: When the demons were taking us they suddenly stopped and a wizard appeared.{nl}I could tell for sure he was human... Oh, but that's not important.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011705
text: The wizard approached us one by one and then he did some sort of strange ritual.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011706
text: At first no one showed much of a reaction... {nl}But when it was Edmundas' turn, there was a light.{nl}Yes, Rose, your brother Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011707
text: The wizard had Edmundas taken somewhere separately.{nl}Then he started to threaten us, asking if he had any family...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011708
text: I feel so sorry to Rose, but we were so afraid we had no choice.{nl}As soon as the wizard heard about Rose, he started saying some really scary things.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011709
text: Was it Kru... Kruvina? He said it was completed...{nl}He said the giant bracken was almost ready and soon he would spread the spores of death.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011710
text: He said all he needed was to find someone qualified to feed us to the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011711
text: I thought I needed to tell Orsha about this so I took the chance and ran away.{nl}I've been hiding from the demons here ever since.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011712
text: What do I do? Edmundas, my brother... {nl}My brother was taken by the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011713
text: Orsha is too far from here!{nl}Please, help us save our people...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011714
text: I saw something strange when I was picking herbs.{nl}There was a wizard... A human, no doubt. But he was giving orders to the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011715
text: Suddenly he saw me and I had to run as fast as I could.{nl}I'm scared and I want to go back to Orsha, {nl}but I can't bring myself to do it with all these demons around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011716
text: Fortunately it seems like Goss is fine.{nl}I hope he knows a way to open the door...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011717
text: A few months ago, demons started to appear in Knidos Jungle.{nl}Many good herbs used to grow around here... Not so much anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011718
text: Thank you.{nl}I wonder, where could all the people of the Croa Village have gone?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011719
text: Have you ever heard about demons picking herbs?{nl}I've been picking herbs for a long time but that was a first, even for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011720
text: I'm tired of running from demons, too, but...{nl}As a herb gatherer myself I can't help but be curious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011721
text: If that's fine with you, will you pick some those herbs so I can see what they are?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011722
text: I was hiding so I couldn't take a good look at them, but the leaves were small and thin.{nl}It's to right, at the Neneva Yard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011723
text: I saw a human-looking wizard give orders to the demons.{nl}Humans associating with demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011724
text: I didn't recognize it before but...{nl}These are Aconites.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011725
text: They're medicinal, but deadly when consumed in large doses.{nl}I wonder why they want this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011726
text: The demons may scare me, but as a herb gatherer I can't let this go.{nl}I think it's best to destroy all the Aconites.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011727
text: Go and collect some Loktanun fluid.{nl}It's very acidic; it wil dry out the Aconites if you spray them with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011728
text: The demons may be scary...{nl}But I won't let them get away with this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011729
text: Thank you.{nl}This should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011730
text: It's a shame to waste all the Aconites, but there's no way the demons will put it to good use.{nl}You can go back to the Neneva Yard and spray the demon fluid all around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011731
text: This is the most I can do.{nl}You only need to spray a little to dry out the flowers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011732
text: This is all that wizard's fault.{nl}I saw him talking to those demons with my very own eyes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011733
text: Thank you for helping me.{nl}Now that the Aconites are gone, I hope they can't carry out whatever plan they had.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011734
text: Have you ever seen such a big bracken?{nl}I know this area is known for it, but even for a local like me, it's a first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011735
text: Remember what Tess said earlier?{nl}About the giant bracken spreading out the spores of death...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011736
text: This looks like what Tess was talking about.{nl}We need to think of a way to stop that wizard's plans.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011737
text: The device set up next to the bracken... It could be an important key.{nl}I wonder if there's something like a lab around here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011738
text: I feel like I was too reckless coming out to rescue my brother and the villagers without a plan.{nl}I want to do something fast, but I'm afraid I'll end up making a mistake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011739
text: Did you find anything?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011740
text: So there really is a laboratory.{nl}There could be more information about the device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011741
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}It seems all I do is receive your help...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011742
text: I think that person is the wizard Tess was talking about.{nl}Someone qualified... Even if it's me they want, I can't just leave my people behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011743
text: We still don't know what the red liquid inside the device is, so destroying it could be dangerous.{nl}Let me have a look at the journal you found in the laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011744
text: Let's see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011745
text: It's not hard to turn off the device after all. {nl}Seems like all you need to do is remove the power sources, which are set up separately.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011746
text: But we have to be careful.{nl}The journal says the power supply devices are protected by powerful freezing magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011747
text: It doesn't say how to disable the magic circles.{nl}But we should be able to use monsters as bait, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011748
text: We can probably lure them into the circles and quickly remove the power sources.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011749
text: That red liquid inside the device, though... It makes me feel sick just looking at it.{nl}What could it be...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011750
text: Did you do it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011751
text: If the journal is correct, soon we won't have to worry about the giant bracken anymore.{nl}Let's go to the Novaha Monastery, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011752
text: Security is too strict.{nl}The demons are guarding the entrance to the Novaha Monastery.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011753
text: My brother and the villagers... They'll be safe, right?{nl}Please try not to make too much of a commotion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011754
text: You need to be as quiet as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011755
text: I'm sure my brother and the villagers are still safe since they have no use for them yet...{nl}But this could go very wrong if we're not careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011756
text: Are you alright?{nl}Your skills are really incredible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011757
text: Let's go inside the Novaha Monastery, then.{nl}Please, let everyone be safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011758
text: Herbalist Talas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011759
text: Help!{nl}I was caught in a trap running away from the demons!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011760
text: Please help me!{nl}I can't open the trap by myself...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011761
text: Thank you. Fortunately my ankle isn't completely gone yet.{nl}If it weren't for you I would be in the hands of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011762
text: I did see something odd before I escaped.{nl}The demons were adding herbs to a cauldron.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011763
text: I had never seen demons use any herbs, but I'm sure whatever it is they're doing, it's evil.{nl}I was on my way to stop them when this happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011764
text: Destroying the cauldrons won't be easy.{nl}They're protected by some sort of barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011765
text: Every time a barrier appeared I noticed a sort of glowing stone.{nl}I wonder if that's what we should target first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011766
text: Fearful people like me can tell that much. {nl}Those cauldrons are nothing but evil.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011767
text: Thank you. This should be enough to repay you for the trap.{nl}Helping stop the demons makes me feel like I achieved something great.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011768
text: Oh, I have one last favor to ask.{nl}We may have destroyed the cauldrons, but the materials remain. This could be a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011769
text: I believe it would be better to burn down the materials as well.{nl}They're at the Saloto Lowland. Make sure they're all gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011770
text: I hear the demons aren't going to stop at simply existing.{nl}Are the goddesses missing the work of demons too, I wonder?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011771
text: I'm relieved to hear that. Thank you.{nl}I ought to stop playing a hero and take care of myself now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011772
text: There are voices coming from the other side of this door.{nl}I think the villagers are locked inside here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011773
text: But the door isn't moving, even though there's no lock in sight.{nl}What do we do...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011774
text: If only we can get this door to open...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011775
text: If it weren't for you and Rose...{nl}I would have been just another victim to the bracken.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011776
text: Just when I thought we were over... you came and saved us.{nl}It seems the goddesses haven't abandoned me yet...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011777
text: Croa Village Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011778
text: Who are you?!{nl}Are you here to save us?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011779
text: The way to open the door?{nl}You need to get to Goss, quick!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011780
text: The demons took Goss to the Ankel Small Corridor!{nl}He knows how to open the door!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011781
text: I think Goss knows how to open the door.{nl}We should be able to rescue the villagers now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011782
text: When the guards aren't looking, we need to go and free the villagers as fast as we can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011783
text: The Ankel Small Corridor... It's to the left.{nl}The first thing to do is rescue Goss, like the villagers said.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011784
text: I'll head there first.{nl}Meet me at the Ankel Small Corridor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011785
text: The demons saw us.{nl}We should get out of here with the villagers now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011786
text: The demons are going to come for us.{nl}We need to get the villagers and run immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011787
text: I don't know but it looks complicated.{nl}Still, I think Goss will probably know a way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011788
text: If we can only open the door we can rescue the villagers...{nl}But the demons will notice us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011789
text: I noticed Rose was looking for her brother... Unfortunately I haven't seen him.{nl}I wonder if they didn't take him to the annex, where I was...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011790
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}Seeing you and Rose makes me feel like the missing goddesses are back among us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011791
text: A way to open the door... I will have to take a look at it myself.{nl}Meet me in front of the door.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011792
text: Help me...{nl}I have no strength left in my body...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011793
text: I... I don't want them to come for me anymore...{nl}I'm so afraid... Those things...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011794
text: Hm... I couldn't see it from inside the room, but it's clear looking at it from the outside.{nl}The door has been tampered with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011795
text: This faint magic circle... It's made to react only to demons.{nl}It looks like you would have to prove that you're a demon in order to open the door.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011796
text: Some Green Apparition Essences should suffice. {nl}Meanwhile I'll have a look at the circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011797
text: A few days ago...{nl}The monastery was ambushed by demons and, unable to resist, I ended up in their hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011798
text: After Medzio Diena, maintaining the monastery has been no easy task.{nl}Apart from me and few other brothers, there was no one left in the monastery, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011799
text: The demons kept every single one of us locked inside the annex.{nl}We didn't know the demons' demands or their reasoning; all we could do was pray.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011800
text: A few brothers were dragged outside one by one... they never came back.{nl}When only three of us were left, the demons came for me and locked me in this Reading Room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011801
text: Then... they brought in people of the Croa Village.{nl}Just like before, they started to come for and take them one by one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011802
text: Just as my turn was coming... that's when you saved me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011803
text: Hey, you!{nl}Stop wandering around and run, quick!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011804
text: There are demons here!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011805
text: I couldn't possibly rescue my people all by myself, I even thought of escaping to Orsha...{nl}You really are something, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011806
text: I feel worthless for failing to protect the people of my village.{nl}I can only beg for the goddesses to forgive me...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011807
text: We should have hired some soldiers. This is getting more and more difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011808
text: I think it'll be hard to move anywhere until our people recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011809
text: I see you gathered plenty of essences, I can feel it all the way here.{nl}Good... I'm ready now, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011810
text: I understand that Rose is worried, but...{nl}If things go wrong we can lose our lives before we even see the villagers, {nl}let alone our possessions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011811
text: I think the door should be easy to open.{nl}It could take quite some time, however...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011812
text: Not to mention all the demons walking around since you went and collected the essence. {nl}They'll surely notice what I'm doing. Just protect me while I try and open the door.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011813
text: I got it!{nl}This is... phew... a huge relief.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011814
text: I noticed Rose was looking for her brother... Unfortunately I haven't seen him.{nl}I wonder if he wasn't taken to the Annex, where I was...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011815
text: I wish I could go and help you... I'm sorry. {nl}Injured as I am I would be a burden to you, and there's people in need of care here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011816
text: I'll pray to the goddesses that Rose may find her brother.{nl}And may you receive their blessing...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011817
text: You're saying my brother could be at the Novaha Annex?{nl}Why would they take him alone...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011818
text: We need to make sure the villagers escape first.{nl}My brother will be fine... I'm sure...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011819
text: It looks like the demon barrier is a little loose now.{nl}It feels odd but we can't waste our chance. We should move quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011820
text: It looks like the demon barrier is a little loose now.{nl}It feels odd but we can't waste our chance. We should move quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011821
text: Are you okay?{nl}I thought the barrier had loosened up... We need to be careful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011822
text: Everyone has escaped from the Reading Room now.{nl}We should move to the Annex... and save my brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011823
text: Help...{nl}The demons... they experimented on me and left me here abandoned...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011824
text: I can't escape, I'm too exhausted to even move. {nl}There's nothing I can do but hide and wait for the day I return to the goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011825
text: I feel a lot better now.{nl}I swear, my vision was starting to get blurry, I really thought I was over.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011826
text: Just thinking about that experiment...{nl}It makes me want to leave this place immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011827
text: I won't ask you to come all the way with me!{nl}All I ask is that you clear out some demons so I can escape, will you do that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011828
text: They put me inside magic circles, they fed me things...{nl}It was horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011829
text: Thank you. Really, thank you so much!{nl}The others should be fine too... right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011830
text: I should escape from this place now.{nl}May the goddesses bless you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011831
text: Experiment Victim Fils

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011832
text: I may have survived, but what is it worth...{nl}I have no one now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011833
text: Run away while you can...{nl}They're doing horrible experiments here...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011834
text: How can someone call themselves human and do something so... atrocious?{nl}Not even demons are this evil...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011835
text: Thank you for bringing these to me.{nl}As soon as I escape this monastery I'm going to make a tomb with these objects...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011836
text: Experiment Victim Hilbeth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011837
text: How am I going to live now...?{nl}I have no will to be alive anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011838
text: I wish we'd escaped sooner.{nl}How can I live now without my family...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011839
text: You're... not from the Croa Village, are you?{nl}And you don't look like you're a Novaha monk, either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011840
text: I want to ask you something... All my friends, my family... my neighbors...{nl}They all returned to the goddesses because of the experiments.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011841
text: I do want to avenge them, but most of all I want to mourn those who are gone. {nl}Would you bring me some of their belongings?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011842
text: One thing I regret is not being able to return to the village.{nl}The merchants have no work there anymore, either. I miss our people already...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011843
text: We're here now, but I think the Annex is too big.{nl}It'll be faster if we split up and look for my brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011844
text: I'm not sure how I can cover such a wide area...{nl}Alright.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011845
text: It's me who the demons want...{nl}They could easily catch me if I'm not careful and then I'll be just another burden on you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011846
text: I'll wait here, where it's safe.{nl}Please tell me as soon as you find my brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011847
text: Anne

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011848
text: I really treasured that necklace...{nl}But if it helped Rose find us all the way here, it was for a good cause.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011849
text: By the way, where is Rose?{nl}And Edmundas?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011850
text: The thing about finding someone qualified is bothering me.{nl}He'll be all right... won't he?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011851
text: Allonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011852
text: The memories of being taken by the demons still hurt.{nl}Some of us haven't made it back yet, either...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011853
text: We're alive thanks to you and Rose...{nl}But I don't think the village will be the same again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011854
text: You found my brother in the Apega State Chamber?{nl}Then... why isn't he with you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011855
text: So he's strapped to some weird device?{nl}Let's go, then! We have to save him!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011856
text: What on earth could this be?{nl}It wouldn't be this red if you threw a whole bottle of ink in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011857
text: I... I don't trust what these youngsters are doing. No, sir.{nl}I know I can find a way if they would just let me, but they want to keep me out of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011858
text: If it weren't for me they wouldn't have found any clues at all.{nl}I was the one who figured the problem was in the ruins in the first place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011859
text: And all these kids tell me is to stay put, to behave.{nl}This really.... This really is frustrating, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011860
text: What do we do... My brother is suffering.{nl}The wizard must have put him in this device so he couldn't escape...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011861
text: He says the pain started when the wizard came inside the Apega State Chamber.{nl}I'll stay here and keep an eye on him. You go and find a way to stop this. Quick!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011862
text: My brother is looking worse.{nl}I can't even go near him because of this barrier...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011863
text: My brother... he's fine now.{nl}I was so worried about what might happen to him...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011864
text: You saved my life. Thank you, really.{nl}But didn't you find something useful because of me? We're even, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011865
text: I don't know what they did here, or who did it, but we can't let this go.{nl}Sigh, it's tough...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011866
text: Rose... she's...!{nl}That's why I told her to run... Why didn't she listen to me...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011867
text: So I was nothing but bait to get Rose to come here.{nl}And now this... What do we do...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011868
text: We came from a village downwards from here.{nl}We came to try and figure out what's causing the water contamination.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011869
text: I know grandpa is trying to do the right thing but... {nl}it's dangerous with all these monsters around.{nl}I wish he could understand this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011870
text: My grandfather could be getting in trouble, please go find him.{nl}He could've just waited for you to go with him.... Sigh.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011871
text: That wizard... He's going to do to Rose the same experiments he did on me...{nl}He's going to use her to spread the giant bracken spores.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011872
text: Release me first.{nl}Then help me bring Rose back, I beg you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011873
text: I'm glad everyone's safe, thanks to you.{nl}I have to confess this was quite reckless, even with you around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011874
text: Wow, so the Hydra was the so-called vessel...{nl}I wonder what kind of person would put a gem on the Hydra, and for what?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011875
text: There should be some device to shut this down around here somewhere.{nl}Please... before anything bad happens to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011876
text: Thank you for releasing me.{nl}I'm so exhausted... But I have to save Rose.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011877
text: Please. Help me save Rose.{nl}I know we've only just met and it's not right of me to ask so much of you right away, but please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011878
text: Rose... She's my little sister, my only one. I can't bear to lose her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011879
text: I know where they took Rose. The main monastery building... {nl}If you can lend me some of your strength, please come with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011880
text: You... You don't seem like you're with that wizard.{nl}Please, don't ignore me... Help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011881
text: I barely just escaped from the demons.{nl}But the experiments were hard on me... My body is too exhausted right now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011882
text: You'll find my bag of herbs in the Tebeti Small Corridor.{nl}Please... bring it to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011883
text: My family is waiting for me.{nl}I should go back...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011884
text: Thank you.{nl}Now if I can just gather enough strength to walk...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011885
text: I'm still injured, but I think I can move now.{nl}I should get up and go rescue my family.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011886
text: You say you're going to help me find my family? {nl}Really? Wow, I don't know what to say...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011887
text: My family was taken to the Collapsed Grand Corridor.{nl}I hope nothing happened to them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011888
text: I promised them I would be back.{nl}They'll be all right... I'm sure they will.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011889
text: That... That thing you're holding...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011890
text: That's Anne's bracelet... Her parents...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011891
text: I have one last favor to ask.{nl}I can't let these horrible experiments keep happening...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011892
text: Please destroy the demon experiment equipment in the Errzze Oratorium.{nl}Please... I don't want anyone else to fall victim to this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011893
text: We have to stop any more experiments like this from happening...{nl}I don't want anyone else to suffer...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011894
text: Thank you.{nl}How... How am I going to live now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011895
text: Monk Abels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011896
text: It's... too late for me now.{nl}Please, traveler, will you spare me some of your time? I don't have much left myself...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011897
text: All my life I have dedicated to my service here at the Novaha Monastery...{nl}I can't bear to see it tainted by demons as it is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011898
text: Please help me purify the monastery.{nl}Gather the holy relic fragments in the Gaile Chapel...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011899
text: Please help me complete this final mission.{nl}I can't return to the goddess with the monastery tainted by these demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011900
text: Are those the fragments...?{nl}My vision is becoming blurry but I can feel their energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011901
text: There's... not much left now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011902
text: I gathered all the strength I have left to restore the holy relic.{nl}Use this around the monastery...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011903
text: ...I'm terribly sorry to the people of the Croa Village.{nl}I failed to protect them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011904
text: How I wish to see the monastery fully purified again... I'm afraid I won't have the time.{nl}I should rest...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011905
text: Oh... You're here.{nl}I'm beyond grateful that you decided to do this favor for me...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011906
text: Rose will probably have to go through the same experiments I did.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011907
text: We could just go after the wizard right away to try and save Rose but...{nl}I don't think she would make it until then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011908
text: We need to stop the experiment.{nl}We need to find the wizard's devices and destroy them. {nl}That'll buy us time until we can get to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011909
text: I don't know what this device in front of me is...{nl}But I saw the wizard put something black in it to turn it on, {nl}then suddenly the air was filled with something nauseating.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011910
text: I felt something grow inside of my body, it was extremely painful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011911
text: Then the pain stopped, but the wizard became furious.{nl}He said something about finding someone who's qualified...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011912
text: If Rose is the one they want, she'll be going through the same pain right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011913
text: If only we can get whatever item the wizard used on the device...{nl}If we put too much of it in the device, I think there's a chance it might overload and shut down.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011914
text: I saw the wizard tell the demons to go hunt Brown Hummingbirds for it.{nl}Anything is fine, just gather what you can and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011915
text: Let's gather more Hummingbird Mucus and destroy the device.{nl}The more the better. I'll pour it in all at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011916
text: Those who are qualified will not return to the goddesses, despite the pain.{nl}That doesn't mean it's painless, however...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011917
text: Success!{nl}The device overloaded and stopped working.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011918
text: The next device is in the Main Hall Atrium.{nl}Let's meet up there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011919
text: That magic crystal...{nl}The wizard used it for a mind control ritual in the atrium at first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011920
text: The crystal was glowing and I felt my conscience leaving me.{nl}When I opened my eyes... I was lying inside the Kilnuma Oratorium.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011921
text: Rose is probably going through the same thing.{nl}But without the protective barrier device, we can't destroy the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011922
text: Something bad could happen to Rose if we destroy the magic crystal.{nl}Still... no matter what happens, {nl}I don't think Rose wouldn't want to be used to spread out the death spores.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011923
text: Are you done?{nl}The wizard did say the host would act like a switch...{nl}As long as Rose is safe again, I'll do whatever it takes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011924
text: There are too many monsters here.{nl}Take the elevator and let's meet upstairs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011925
text: Rose will be here at the Kilnuma Oratorium.{nl}I wish I could rescue her myself, but I'm afraid I lack the skills to do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011926
text: Please let it not be too late...{nl}Even if it is, your help will have been life-saving.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011927
text: You... you saved me again.{nl}And my brother, too... Are you okay?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011928
text: I was hoping my brother would have survived and escaped this place...{nl}But it's so good to see him again... I guess you can say I was lying to myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011929
text: I still can't believe I'm alive, that I haven't returned to the goddesses.{nl}And I... Yes. I know now. I know what I have to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011930
text: I... I'm already infected with the spore.{nl}But don't worry. I'm qualified so I won't return to the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011931
text: But you never know when the spore might become active...{nl}I don't think I can return to the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011932
text: It's okay.{nl}This life of mine that you saved... I'm going to live it to the absolute fullest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011933
text: By the way, I should tell you something.{nl}When the wizard was trying to control my mind, {nl}for a moment I was able to look into his memory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011934
text: This wizard... He's sided with the demons.{nl}Also, there are other leaders and followers of this plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011935
text: Everything was connected to the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011936
text: Humans can't coexist with the Divine Tree...{nl}So they created the giant bracken to spread out the death spores all the way to Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011937
