text: To control that, they needed someone who can survive being infected with the spores.{nl}That's why they were looking for someone who qualifies for that... And it was me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011938
text: Oh, that red liquid we saw on the giant bracken came from the Pelke Shrine Ruins.{nl}And I also saw a strange light concentrating at the Letas Stream.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011939
text: The demons and their human followers are doing something monumental.{nl}I can't even begin to understand what it is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011940
text: This is all I can tell you...{nl}There's other things here and there, but they're just fragments I can't properly explain to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011941
text: I haven't been able to rest ever since arriving at the Koru Jungle...{nl}I should rest now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011942
text: Yes, it was all thanks to you.{nl}Thank you so much... really.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011943
text: I may not qualify perfectly, but I'm close.{nl}And I think I'm already infected with the spores, too... {nl}I'm going to stay with Rose and look after her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011944
text: But right now I'm worried about the monsters. {nl}My body still hasn't recovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011945
text: Usually I wouldn't have any trouble clearing out this many monsters...{nl}But that's when I'm in better condition. I'm afraid you'll have to...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011946
text: You have been a lifesaver.{nl}With the goddesses gone, having you close has given me strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011947
text: I can handle the monsters once my body recovers but...{nl}I don't think I can take the demons left in the monastery yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011948
text: But it's not right for me to ask you to clear out all the demons here...{nl}It's a tricky situation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011949
text: That's right. There is someone in Orsha called Dejamis who owes me a favor.{nl}She is the Wizard Submaster; will you go there and let her know about my situation?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011950
text: Wizard Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011951
text: I know Edmundas very well.{nl}He would always find me rare herbs faster than anyone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011952
text: What a terrible thing to happen to someone like him...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011953
text: By the way, don't tell anyone but Dejamis about what happened to us.{nl}I don't want people to be afraid of us, and I don't want us to be treated like freaks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011954
text: Don't worry.{nl}I won't tell anyone about what happened to the siblings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011955
text: I don't know how to cure them right away...{nl}What I can do for now is make a protective barrier {nl}to keep the two of them safe from demon attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011956
text: They say if you want to hide a tree, you put it in a forest.{nl}I'm saying we trick the demons using the demons themselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011957
text: I'm going to give you the recipe and an empty barrier crystal.{nl}Collect demon stones from Deadborn Scaps to make the protection barrier crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011958
text: With all the demons and monsters, if it weren't for you and Laswi...{nl}I don't even want to know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011959
text: I ended up coming here because of Rose, the damage done is unimaginable...{nl}But I hope the people of Rose's village will be all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011960
text: I'll keep looking for a way to cure the siblings.{nl}Tell Edmundas I said hi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011961
text: Set it up around here.{nl}I feel safe now knowing Dejamis made it for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011962
text: A few months back demons started to appear in Knidos Jungle.{nl}A lot of good herbs used to grow around here... Not so much anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011963
text: The world really is going to ruins.{nl}It's the same thing I felt four years ago on Medzio Diena...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011964
text: A protective barrier crystal should keep the siblings safe from any threats.{nl}Of course the ideal would be to find a real solution...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011965
text: As long as we're not cured from the spores we can't return to the village.{nl}We might just have to live here forever.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011966
text: That's okay.{nl}I'm just grateful for the chance to be with Rose again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011967
text: Thank you for everything.{nl}I don't know if we'll ever meet again but I'm sure both of us will never forget you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011968
text: Experiments like the ones they did in the monastery must never happen again. {nl}We have to tell everyone about it and stop them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011969
text: I'm sure there will be traces of the experiments inside the monastery. {nl}Try and find any journals or anything the wizard might have left behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011970
text: It'll probably be hard to find evidence like experiment journals, {nl}but it's important that we tell people about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011971
text: Are these materials you found inside the Novaha Monastery?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011972
text: There might be more materials around that we still haven't found.{nl}But I won't keep asking you to go here; this time I'll try and find them myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011973
text: Can I ask you for one last favor?{nl}When I was inside the wizard's memories, I saw the device used for breeding the bracken spores.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011974
text: As long as the device for breeding the spores is there, it will keep happening.{nl}This... This experiment can never happen again... Never.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011975
text: If the power sources are removed, the spores will die off.{nl}The thing is, if you don't do it in the right order, it will activate again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011976
text: The bracken spore breeding device is inside the Sotras Chapel.{nl}Don't worry if you fail... Just keep trying to find the right sequence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011977
text: I guess the mind control wasn't all too bad.{nl}All we need to do now is remove the power sources and the spores will die.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011978
text: No one will be trying this type of horrible experiment anymore.{nl}If they do, my brother and I are here to stop them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011979
text: We need to disable this barrier so my brother and I can escape...{nl}But no matter how hard I try, it won't open.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011980
text: There has to be a way to free my brother around here.{nl}Will you look for it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011981
text: We came to the Croa Village for Rose; a little more and the demons would've caught us.{nl}You would think they'd all gone to Orsha because of that migration order... Isn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011982
text: Where are all the people of Rose's village?{nl}She's been so worried...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011983
text: The fear I felt being chased by the demons...{nl}It's not something I ever want to go through again. Not after Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011984
text: Traveling Merchant Ales

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011985
text: I was always so mean to Laswi.{nl}To think that Laswi is the one who found me... {nl}I guess I'll have to be good to Laswi now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011986
text: I thought I was going to die when I was separated from my people.{nl}Thanks to you and Laswi I can be with them again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011987
text: Traveling Merchant Krens

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011988
text: My waist hurts from being so nervous.{nl}You never know when a monster or a demon is going to attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011989
text: All these monsters and demons...{nl}I hate dangerous things. This just isn't for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011990
text: Laswi is smart, finding my colleagues won't be a problem.{nl}I hope they're hiding somewhere safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011991
text: We should go back with Rose now... But she's being so stubborn. {nl}Not even Goddess Gabija would make her change her mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011992
text: Everyone looks safe now.{nl}I was so scared earlier, you can say I almost returned to the goddess and back again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011993
text: Those demons just now... They were coming to take Tess, weren't they?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011994
text: I'm really glad Tess is safe, too.{nl}Does he know where the rest of the villagers are?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011995
text: Every single one of the village residents was taken.{nl}What... What do I do now...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011996
text: The other village residents were taken to the Novaha Monastery.{nl}I'm too scared... I was so afraid...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011997
text: It seems the bones are fine but...{nl}We should go somewhere safe after getting some rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011998
text: The demons simply cannot keep existing.{nl}Isn't it because of them that the goddesses are missing right now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_011999
text: My family... I should go back to them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012000
text: Please...{nl}I'll do anything to see my family again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012001
text: I am so bitter and resentful about myself...{nl}How I could only watch as the demons defiled the monastery...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012002
text: I am slowly losing consciousness...{nl}Why are the goddesses still not answering to me...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012003
text: It is all thanks to you.{nl}Being able to meet Rose who is safe... all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012004
text: I didn't even dare to hope... that I would be able to meet Rose again.{nl}I had merely hoped that she would be spared from being used in the wizard's plans... {nl}This all seems like a dream.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012005
text: It's alright. We found the townfolk and I am reunited with my brother...{nl}I am really happy even in this state.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012006
text: I owe the rest of my life to you... and will live the rest of my life to the fullest.{nl}My brother and I are qualifiers aren't we? Nothing will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012007
text: After losing my parents on Medzio Diena...{nl}The only family I have left is my brother, Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012008
text: Please. You're the only one I can count on.{nl}So please... Help save the townfolk and my brother...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012009
text: Thank you. I am a bit calmer thanks to your consolation.{nl}I need to keep my wits about me even more in times like this, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012010
text: The Novaha Monastery is just on the other side of the Dadan Jungle.{nl}But we are facing the demons... We can't just rush in without any preparation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012011
text: Spores and ferns...{nl}If there is anything I've learned as a traveling merchant, {nl}it's to take things slowly instead of rushing onwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012012
text: We don't even know what a 'Kruvina' is.{nl}I am sure that stopping the demons will lead to us saving the townfolk and my brother as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012013
text: I'll go to the Dadan Jungle first. {nl}We meet each other there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012014
text: Kornas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012015
text: Oh! You're the person who saved me and Rose.{nl}Where is she anyway?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012016
text: If it wasn't for you and Rose, we would have been subjected to horrific experiments.{nl}I want to thank Rose as well... She's coming soon I hope?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012017
text: Rona

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012018
text: My lord... I still get goosebumps even thinking about it.{nl}How did they think of using people as nourishment for the Divine Tree?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012019
text: There are still too many people that didn't make it back into town.{nl}I sincerely hope that... nothing has happened to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012020
text: Allow me to introduce. This friend here is Rith.{nl}Do you like birds? If not, you can never become a Falconer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012021
text: What happened to the seal?{nl}I don't know how many times I prayed for you to be safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012022
text: He made people lose their lives by giving them rubbish crystals in the first place. {nl}It gets even more ridiculous. Now he is telling us to ask the dead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012023
text: I dislike the idea of begging Erikas for help again...{nl}I will be able to find my sleeping vassals if only you {nl}will collect Mochia Stems from the Slopes of Mochia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012024
text: The child was able to escape relatively unharmed because we kept the Kartas Hunter busy here.{nl}I don't regret that, even if it resulted in this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012025
text: Mochia Stems have the power to guide the memories of the deceased.{nl}I will fill the power of the Scroll of the Dead into this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012026
text: That will be the last chance to get rid of him once and for all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012027
text: I was able to escape thanks to you.{nl}You seem to be a nice person... Will you accept this gift from me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012028
text: But there are too many monsters...{nl}I don't know if we can make it safely to Irmantas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012029
text: I think I will faint if I have to travel any further.{nl}I seem to be hearing... the voice of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012030
text: Still... We can't stop here.{nl}I will try to muster what strength I have left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012031
text: Deliver this letter and Ignas' plot to Irmantas.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012032
text: I will take on the burden of Alina's share of upholding Lydia Schaffen's will as well.{nl}I will find a way to survive and reach Orsha no matter what!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012033
text: I... wish to repay you for protecting us to the end.{nl}I am sure that Alina and Lydia Schaffen will want that as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012034
text: This should be enough...{nl}Now I will take back my shattered soul!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012035
text: Agatas honored his side of the contract.{nl}Now I will leave him and start on a journey of revenge.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012036
text: Placed the spirit separation potion in Agatas' pocket.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012037
text: I don't really know where he has gone either.{nl}I think Brophen followed the village elder to the Malkos Felled Area, maybe he might know?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012038
text: Anyways, I want to thank you in the meantime.{nl}I hope that the grace of the goddesses will bless you on your travels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012039
text: Thank you so much for protecting the townfolk on the journey here.{nl}They are all grateful for your kindness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012040
text: I wonder how many migration orders Orsha issued...{nl}I don't know how much longer we will have to just wait here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012041
text: I don't know how many times you've protected our townsfolk on the way here...{nl}Yet we receive your help again. Thank you so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012042
text: By the way, how are the nightmares now?{nl}How about consulting the bishop in Orsha when you get there?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012043
text: Orsha's lord should have issued the migration orders sooner.{nl}There were too many casualties. Way too many...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012044
text: It is in times like this when you need something to have faith in...{nl}Where have the goddesses gone to...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012045
text: They said that the lord would send soldiers and officials to help if we managed to get here...{nl}I don't see any sign of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012046
text: There were orders issued by the lord.{nl}Refugees from the west of Orsha are to wait here at Lemprasa Pond.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012047
text: Mayor Romanas?{nl}I'm not sure. I did see Layla accompanying him a while ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012048
text: Hmm? Do you hear something strange?{nl}I think something is coming this way...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012049
text: Some say that the goddesses simply abandoned us...{nl}I am sure that there must be a reason.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012050
text: I still have faith because the Goddess Statues shine as if they are acknowledging your prayers.{nl}That is what is upholding my faith.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012051
text: I would have stayed in my hometown if I knew that this is what was going happen, {nl}whether it be migration orders or not.{nl}It couldn't have been worse than the situation we're in now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012052
text: Officer Lutas is saying that there are too many refugees to let them all into Orsha.{nl}That's why they've made and are offering aid to several smaller refugee camps near Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012053
text: Aid... I don't know if you can call this proper aid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012054
text: Four years have passed since Medzio Diena, but the reconstruction of Orsha is still underway.{nl}There are some refugees that are disappointed when they see Orsha...{nl}But it should still be better than other places in the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012055
text: A person with your skills is welcome to enter Orsha at once.{nl}Go to the castle next to the Central Plaza if you wish to meet the lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012056
text: Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}Forget about Orsha, I almost... Whew...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012057
text: You helped us from the monsters on the way here as well.{nl}Even though the goddesses are nowhere to be seen, {nl}I can't help but think that they are still somewhere when I look at you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012058
text: I don't know what the lord is thinking, making us wait in such a dangerous place.{nl}I'm going to move somewhere else as soon as my family gets here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012059
text: By the way, didn't you just level up while fighting those Kepas?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012060
text: I've heard something from a friend that enlisted a while ago...{nl}He said that you can choose one Status Point and grow stronger when you level up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012061
text: Why don't you try it out?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012062
text: I caught a glimpse of Orsha as we were traveling up the slope a while ago...{nl}There is no sign of the enormous castle walls I remember from when I was young, {nl}and it is covered by trees the size of houses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012063
text: I thought it would be safe with the migration orders and all, but I don't know.{nl}Do you think it will be okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012064
text: You should give some serious thought on where you want to focus on from now on.{nl}It is no easy choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012065
text: That's strange.{nl}An abundance of evidence, but not one core piece.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012066
text: I've heard that Bishop Urbonas made it safely back to Orsha.{nl}But we still have something to deal with before we go. {nl}I am talking about the demons of course.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012067
text: I heard that you played a large role.{nl}Of course, the lord wouldn't have sent you if you weren't any good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012068
text: Of course the refugee situation in Orsha is important...{nl}There will be mass confusion if word of what we are doing now gets out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012069
text: Cleaning up the mess is part of our job as well.{nl}Besides, we are barely handling the influx of refugees into Orsha, {nl}we won't be able to handle demons at the same time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012070
text: That is a superb choice.{nl}You will be able to choose what Status you want to enhance{nl}by allocating points every time you level up from now on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012071
text: It is difficult to revert decisions after allocating a Status Point...{nl}So I imagine that choosing wisely is important.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012072
text: I've heard of your deeds. Talk about impressive.{nl}I'm not saying that I am not just a tiny bit jealous, {nl}but you can't work in Intelligence Command if you pay too much attention to contribution levels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012073
text: I may simply be working for the lord of Orsha for the money...{nl}But I am fully aware of how important the current situation is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012074
text: I don't know if I am willing to keep working as a Chaser after this.{nl}I mean, demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012075
text: I've heard that you found the person that we failed to find.{nl}I don't know if I have ever been more embarrassed as a Chaser before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012076
text: There are so many monsters even near Orsha...{nl}Can you imagine what it is like further away?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012077
text: Oh yes, you mentioned that you were looking for Mayor Romanas didn't you?{nl}The mayor headed towards the Temporary Settler Camp with Layla a while ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012078
text: Could you possibly give this Grass Leaf Ointment to Layla?{nl}My legs are still shaking after that ordeal...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012079
text: Tracking has never been this hard before.{nl}There are monsters near Orsha that I have never even seen before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012080
text: Impressive. You saved the bishop...{nl}Well, I at least get some satisfaction in knowing that I was right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012081
text: You know, I didn't nearly give you enough credit when I first saw you...{nl}I guess the lord has a better eye for talent than I do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012082
text: I can't believe I left Priest Pranas behind even if I was frightened by the demon...{nl}I don't deserve to be called a Chaser.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012083
text: I thought that it was impressive enough that you could take on that demon...{nl}The fact that you saved Bishop Urbonas as well is simply outstanding.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012084
text: These are just some rumors that I heard on the way here.{nl}They say that the towns on the far side of the river are also lying in ruins because of monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012085
text: We would have been in a lot of trouble as well if the lord hadn't issued the migration orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012086
text: I'd like to work with you again in the future.{nl}If I happen to get the chance to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012087
text: I am so glad that Priest Pranas is safe.{nl}Rewards aside, I didn't think that surviving an encounter {nl}with such a powerful demon would have been possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012088
text: You literally saved my live.{nl}I wouldn't have been able to go anywhere near Orsha if you hadn't saved Priest Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012089
text: Please don't tell anyone about the investigations that we are conducting here.{nl}There will be an uproar if the refugees coming to Orsha find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012090
text: This is... Did Brophen ask you to give this to me?{nl}Thank you very much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012091
text: Mayor Romanas went ahead towards the Temporary Settler Camp.{nl}I was here waiting for Brophen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012092
text: Oh, by the way, I've overheard Brophen going on about this.{nl}Have you heard about Skill Points?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012093
text: I've heard that you can use them to learn new skills or enhance skills you've already learned.{nl}I'm sure it will help you in combat if you carefully choose what to invest in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012094
text: You've begun to become quite a celebrity.{nl}Rumors about you that were whispered outside the city can now be heard everywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012095
text: Thanks to you, we have Bishop Urbonas back...{nl}Now all that is left is to take care of the remaining demons, {nl}but why are they suddenly appearing all over the place?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012096
text: I've heard that you were the person who found Bishop Urbonas.{nl}I'm glad that all ended well, but my job is far from over...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012097
text: I didn't pay too much attention to the tall tales from outside the walls...{nl}But you seem to be the real deal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012098
text: I was wondering who it was that saved Bishop Urbonas...{nl}It was you! Goodness...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012099
text: Medzio Diena, monsters, the influx of refugees, and the disappearance of Bishop Urbonas...{nl}I feel as if there is more to come. In a bad way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012100
text: Priest Pranas seems to have recovered quickly...{nl}But the air still seems to be heavy despite the cursed idol being destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012101
text: Rescuing Bishop Urbonas is only one of my missions.{nl}But the pressure that I am feeling... It's overwhelming.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012102
text: Oh good, you're here.{nl}We're thankful for the fair bit of trouble you've gone through to get us here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012103
text: So, are the nightmares still giving you trouble?{nl}That's a shame. I wish there was something I could do for the person I owe so much...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012104
text: Of course, how could I have forgotten. {nl}How about meeting Bishop Urbonas of Orsha?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012105
text: I've heard that he is the most respected cleric from around these parts.{nl}I'm sure he'll be able to resolve your nightmares.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012106
text: From what I've heard... {nl}They are letting skilled individuals like yourself get into Orsha faster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012107
text: As it so happens, Officer Lutas wants to meet you anyway,{nl}so why don't you meet him at the Orsha Migration Office?{nl}I've been singing your praise to him for a while now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012108
text: By the way, I would appreciate it if you could help a few refugees if it isn't too much of a bother.{nl}There are many who are just too kind-hearted to ask anyone for help. {nl}I'm sure they would all greatly appreciate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012109
text: Medzio Diena... It's already been four years.{nl}I did not see it in person, but they say that a giant tree {nl}suddenly rose out of the ground in the capital.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012110
text: The tree was so enormous that many cities in the kingdom, {nl}not to mention the capital, were destroyed by the tree's roots.{nl}Many people were injured or killed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012111
text: But that was far from the end...{nl}Docile monsters became violent, and some swelled in numbers at a ridiculous rate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012112
text: The scariest part is that the demons began to appear.{nl}Demons that have lain dormant thanks to the goddesses began to appear all over the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012113
text: The goddesses... They didn't answer either.{nl}Even before Medzio Diena, they had started to be unresponsive one by one... But still...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012114
text: Allow me to stop here as these are painful memories for me. {nl}Things are pretty grim these days as well, but I really do not wish to relive that fateful day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012115
text: What a gruesome sight.{nl}I've heard that there is not a place untouched by the roots and monsters after Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012116
text: Orsha and Klaipeda are the only cities around that you could say still stand.{nl}Times like these make people look around for things to depend on, {nl}but the goddesses are nowhere to be seen...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012117
text: Oh my, look at how time flies. It's about time I went off to see the soldiers.{nl}Why don't you go see Officer Lutas if you wish to meet the bishop of Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012118
text: The cursed idol or whatever it is is really unsettling.{nl}It's going to take a while for me to recuperate...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012119
text: Pranas seems to be heading straight down to the 2nd floor after suffering from the cursed idol.{nl}I guess not anyone can become a priest...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012120
text: Don't mind me, the orders...{nl}We must find it before Marnox gets his hands on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012121
text: I've heard that there is someone helping the refugees, it must have been you!{nl}I thank you on behalf of our lord.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012122
text: So... You're planning on stopping by at Orsha?{nl}As you can see, there are too many refugees... {nl}I have my hands completely full.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012123
text: I understand that the refugees have complaints about having to{nl}abandon their hometowns because of the migration orders...{nl}I'm sure the lord wouldn't have issued such orders unless she had no choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012124
text: It's not like the military and adminsitration of Orsha {nl}faired any better than the other cities on Medzio Diena. {nl}We've worked hard to get back to this state. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012125
text: It won't be easy to send officials or troops to other regions for at least a few years.{nl}Especially since the demons keep heading south...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012126
text: That's why the lord decided that the best course of action was to gather everyone at Orsha.{nl}Even if it means causing all this chaos.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012127
text: The reconstruction of Orsha is still ongoing.{nl}It's not possible to let all the refugees who arrive enter Orsha due to some complications.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012128
text: I'm sorry, but I will get to you once these people have been processed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012129
text: It's a relief knowing that Irma is safe.{nl}I think... I need to rest a little...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012130
text: I am thankful that we were able to recover the orders...{nl}But I sincerely doubt that this is the end.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012131
text: I assume that what is written in there signals the start of a new catastrophe to come.{nl}May the goddesses have mercy on Orsha...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012132
text: Rumors that the villages on the other side of mountains and {nl}rivers had been destroyed by monsters spread like wildfire.{nl}I tried calming the people thinking that the soldiers of Orsha would come to help but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012133
text: The neighboring village had been ransacked.{nl}I could not help but think that the even the goddesses had forsaken us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012134
text: Thankfully, migration orders were issued to the surviving villages, but it was too late for many. {nl}They should have been issued sooner...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012135
text: Not enough manpower, too many refugees...{nl}Sometimes I think it might be easier fighting monsters like the soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012136
text: I wish I could accommodate you sooner... But look at it from my perspective.{nl}If I let you in before the people that have been waiting over there, there'll be an uproar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012137
text: You can enter Orsha without being processed.{nl}But the reason they are all waiting over here is because of the refugee qualification.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012138
text: You can't recieve any support from Orsha without having a refugee status.{nl}They know that they will all starve without support so that's why they're all waiting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012139
text: That was a close call, since the soldiers were all in the middle of changing shifts.{nl}If it wasn't for you, that monster would have charged straight towards Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012140
text: I take back what I said earlier about fighting monsters like the soldiers.{nl}I wouldn't be able to survive fights with those monsters {nl}even if the goddesses blessed me with a few to spare.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012141
text: I guess it'll be slow around here for a while since everyone ran off...{nl}Besides, a person with your skills is always welcome in Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012142
text: By the way, the lord of Orsha is gathering talented people.{nl}I think she's offering jobs, so why don't you stop by if you aren't in a hurry?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012143
text: The lord is a strong willed and level-headed person.{nl}Go to the castle next to the Central Plaza if you wish to meet her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012144
text: Bishop Urbonas?{nl}Why are you looking for him?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012145
text: I don't know... I haven't seen him for a couple of days.{nl}Why don't you try meeting the lord first since they are close?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012146
text: Most refugees here haven't been to Orsha before in their life.{nl}That's why most of them would have thought that they would {nl}be protected by the massive castle they've heard rumors about...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012147
text: I'm sure you'll notice when you enter, but much has changed since Medzio Diena...{nl}It's a pity sight for all the refugees that make it here just on the basis of the migration orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012148
text: Greetings.{nl}I am the ruler of Orsha, Inesa Hamondale.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012149
text: I've heard some rumors about a traveler recently.{nl}Said traveler has been saving villagers not even the kingdom nor the lord could protect.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012150
text: There are even some that say that the traveler was sent by the goddesses.{nl}I have heard that the traveler... is you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012151
text: It was a mess four years ago on Medzio Diena.{nl}A gigantic tree sprouting up from beneath the capital... Monsters attacking villages...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012152
text: Even the king and his army did not help us with the world in such disarray.{nl}But I've heard that someone still had it in them to help us refugees, it's you isn't it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012153
text: I know it's not much... {nl}But I wanted to thank you somehow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012154
text: Please gather some Red Leaves by catching Leaf Bugs at Ziedo Pond. {nl}I'll make you some potions that work well on wounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012155
text: I'm not from Mayor Romanas' village.{nl}I lived in a nearby village that was destroyed not long ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012156
text: The hunters warned us that monsters were heading our way... {nl}But the lord never sent any soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012157
text: I barely made it away from my hometown when I heard {nl}that the lord finally issued the Orsha migration orders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012158
text: It would have made a lot of difference if the orders had been issued sooner...{nl}Not only are the goddesses missing, now I've lost my home and fields as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012159
text: How are we supposed to live now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012160
text: Here you go, take this potion.{nl}It works wonders on wounds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012161
text: Thank you so much for helping the refugees.{nl}I feel like we can depend on you more than the missing goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012162
text: It was okay back then because my town was far from the capital.{nl}Now... I don't think I will be able to go back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012163
text: To live holed up inside Orsha's castle walls that have been destroyed by roots...{nl}Or wait out here where there are swarms of monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012164
text: It's a hard life either way.{nl}I'd rather be back home...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012165
text: I'm getting nervous since nobody is in sight when they should be here by now.{nl}You don't think they've all entered Orsha without me, do you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012166
text: The discontent of the refugees is mounting due to the sudden nature of the migration orders.{nl}Due to lack of facilities, long processing times... Even I would be angry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012167
text: What can we do though. {nl}It may have been too late, but this is the best we can do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012168
text: Survivors from other villages are trickling towards this place.{nl}Everybody is worn out from fleeing day and night without a proper rest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012169
text: They are all friendly faces... {nl}Yet all I can do is to craft stamina pills for them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012170
text: Could you gather some Rampar Mucus from Chinency near Ziedo Pond?{nl}That's the main material for crafting the pills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012171
text: All I can see in the eyes of people coming here is wariness and fear.{nl}To make matters worse, the goddesses are not responding either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012172
text: What would you think if you were the mayor?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012173
text: Whew... Never mind. It was just the complaints of an old man.{nl}I am more worried about our young lord...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012174
text: Sometimes I wonder if it would have been better if {nl}the migration orders had been issued on Medzio Diena.{nl}It's being delayed because they're haphazardly trying to solve problems four years too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012175
text: I'm sure the lord had her reasons, but I wonder {nl}why she didn't issue the migration orders sooner.{nl}Maybe the messenger was being lazy?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012176
text: There is so much I want to ask if I ever get to meet the lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012177
text: This should be enough Rampar Mucus.{nl}Here, you should take some for yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012178
text: You can recover Stamina from Tree Root Crystals or by resting.{nl}But you won't have time for that when you are being chased by monsters, will you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012179
text: These Stamina pills will be worth their weight in gold at times like that.{nl}I'll pray for the goddesses' blessings upon you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012180
text: Did you by any chance see some people wondering nearby?{nl}The villagers from my town all got separated because we ran into some monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012181
text: They should still be on their way here since the only safe place is Orsha...{nl}I don't know why they're not here already. I'm worried that they are perhaps lost in the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012182
text: I'm sorry, but could you by any chance light a campfire on Adata Highway?{nl}It's for people to see the smoke and come towards it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012183
text: I've met only a few people here.{nl}I don't know where all the others may have gone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012184
text: Thank you so much for helping out.{nl}I just hope that they'll notice the smoke...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012185
text: I think the smoke is too faint...{nl}Those campfires may be too small to be noticed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012186
text: We need a larger fire. A very large fire.{nl}Maybe the firewood that Official Lutas prepared on Adata Highway may be good enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012187
text: I've already received permission to use it as well.{nl}Well, what are you waiting for?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012188
text: Official Lutas says that there are too many refugees to simply allow them entrance into Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012189
text: That's why they've created smaller refugee camps near Orsha and are supplying them there.{nl}The firewood on Adata Highway was also supposed to be used in that fashion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012190
text: I heard something loud... {nl}What do you think happened?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012191
text: Oh my, a big monster?{nl}I'm so sorry that I dragged you into something like this...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012192
text: The smoke is noticeable thanks to your efforts, but this is terrible.{nl}The fact that all we can do is wait here when such dangerous monsters are appearing...{nl}It makes no sense!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012193
text: I haven't seen you around before, are you another one of those useless officials from Orsha?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012194
text: You're not?{nl}Oh... My apologies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012195
text: I came from a place near the southern seashore.{nl}My house was unscathed, but I left because they said that they would protect us if we came to Orsha...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012196
text: But as you can see, all that's prepared for us are houses unfit for people and a few campfires.{nl}There aren't even enough troops or officials here to help us either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012197
text: We've started to use what the previous inhabitants left behind {nl}since there is a shortage of pretty much everything.{nl}There are monsters everywhere else you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012198
text: Don't you think it's miserable?{nl}There seem to be a lot of useful things in the Lumberjack Cabin, so it's a shame we can't go and get them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012199
text: It's not like the Southern Seashore is damage free.{nl}The massive fruits that came from upstream have totally ruined the fishing nets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012200
text: I gazed vacantly at the shore covered in the colorful juice from all those fruits..{nl}They all began rotting not too long afterwards. Ugh..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012201
text: It was still managable since there weren't any monsters though.{nl}I don't know if that's still the case.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012202
text: Wow, these will come in handy.{nl}You've earned my thanks in many more ways than those officials ever will.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012203
text: You must not be from around these parts.{nl}People from around here don't wear clothes like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012204
text: If you're a traveler... {nl}How about worshiping the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at Randoluma Rest Place?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012205
text: Goddess Zemyna administers the Earth.{nl}She also looks after travelers on their journeys.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012206
text: Of course, the goddesses haven't been answering our prayers for a while...{nl}But the statues still sparkle brightly when we pray to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012207
text: I can't recall the exact date but... {nl}Yes. It must have been shortly before Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012208
text: There used to always be an answer when we prayed to the goddesses,{nl}but the prayers began to be unanswered.{nl}There aren't any people that claim to have seen the goddesses after that either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012209
text: The first goddess to stop answering was Goddess Gabija.{nl}This was probably around the time of my grandfather's grandfather.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012210
text: Then Goddess Zemyna, Ausrine, and Vakarine fell silent...{nl}Now there's nobody left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012211
text: But I still believe that the goddesses have not forsaken us.{nl}There must be some reason they aren't answering.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012212
text: I don't know who sculpted all those goddess statues either.{nl}From what I've heard, they've been around for a long time...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012213
text: With the world in the state that it is there are some that are in ruin {nl}or have become habitats for monsters...{nl}In some cases, monsters are even indwelling in the statues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012214
text: Of course, it's up to you if you believe it or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012215
text: Have you been to Randoluma Rest Place by any chance?{nl}A soldier from Orsha said that he'd be back for us if we wait there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012216
text: I don't know what the Orsha soldiers are thinking.{nl}We can't get there because of the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012217
text: All we know is how to plough fields and cast nets, so what can we do?{nl}So would you mind clearing the monsters from Randoluma Rest Place for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012218
text: I've felt a lot of resentment while abandoning my hometown.{nl}But coming here and seeing the northern villages changed my mind about that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012219
text: I just hope that the village will be safe until the migration orders are lifted.{nl}You see, the elders are still there because they couldn't bear leaving their hometown.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012220
text: I can't believe that they told us to gather in a place like that with all those monsters...{nl}The lord clearly didn't think it through.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012221
text: They're saying that people from my village have arrived at Randoluma Rest Place.{nl}But they've scattered due to the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012222
text: I'm sure they're trembling in fear out there...{nl}Could you look for them and bring them here after you find them?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012223
text: Even if Mayor Romanas and the villagers run into trouble,{nl}at least it seems safer here than at Randoluma Rest Place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012224
text: I don't know if they have actually thought it through.{nl}It shouldn't be that dangerous if they prepared it for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012225
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll have to ask Mayor Romanas if our villagers can stay as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012226
text: The reason I was looking for skillful people like you...{nl}Well, before we get to the point, let me explain a little about the situation that Orsha is in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012227
text: The appearance of Orsha... You must have been shocked as well.{nl}As you can see, Orsha is still being rebuilt.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012228
text: The entire population of Orsha is being mobilized for the reconstruction,{nl}so we barely have enough soldiers to protect the city.{nl}In other words, we really can't dispatch troops or officials to other regions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012229
text: Of course, the monsters don't care about our woes.{nl}The collective damage to the settlers is growing, and there are already several villages that have been destroyed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012230
text: We are moving all of the surviving settlers to Orsha...{nl}But we don't have the hands, nor the resources, to work out the complaints that are piling up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012231
text: That's the short version of the situation... {nl}Now let's get back to the point at hand.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012232
text: In Orsha, there is a grave matter that can't be announced publicly.{nl}We're turning to you for help since, as I've told you, we are barely holding everything together.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012233
text: Someone with your skills should be able to take care of this problem.{nl}I know it's a bit sudden to ask of you to help like this, but we're grasping for straws at this point.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012234
text: You said you're looking for Bishop Urbonas?{nl}Well that makes things easy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012235
text: What I wish to ask of you is to find Bishop Urbonas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012236
text: There is a figure that the people of Orsha turn to more than the lord.{nl}That figure is Bishop Urbonas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012237
text: Bishop Urbonas is the pillar sustaining the people of Orsha at the moment.{nl}That pillar is now missing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012238
text: I've been asking around to try to figure out what happened, {nl}but it seems as if the priests have all disappeared as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012239
text: My men are all looking for the whereabouts of Bishop Urbonas...{nl}But it's pretty much a dead-end at this point.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012240
text: If you're as good as the rumors make you out to be, {nl}you'll have no trouble in finding where Bishop Urbonas is.{nl}Just make sure nobody knows about this... {nl}The lord doesn't want the people being any more agitated than they already are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012241
text: Could you ask that person how much longer he's going to make us stand here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012242
text: It's been days since we've arrived, and yet we still haven't set foot in Orsha.{nl}Why did they make us travel all the way here just to make us stand around like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012243
text: I'm tired and hungry...{nl}Missing a meal would've been unthinkable back home...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012244
text: They call us settlers, but we're basically refugees...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012245
text: The settlers will panic if they find out about this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012246
text: A few towns have already fallen to monsters because {nl}the migration orders went out later than expected...{nl}So the news of the disappearance of Bishop Urbonas{nl}will most likely spiral things out of control.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012247
text: One of the priests studying beneath him, Pranas, came back not too long ago.{nl}I've tried to ask him about what happened, but he doesn't seem to know either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012248
text: My immediate subordinates and hired trackers are searching the {nl}Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing from top to bottom.{nl}But there hasn't been any headway because of the monsters coming {nl}towards Orsha from all directions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012249
text: Even if Irma is still alive, she might suffer a gruesome fate at any moment.{nl}I hope nothing happens to her...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012250
text: I must find Bishop Urbonas.{nl}The only place the settlers and I can turn to in a world where{nl}even the goddesses aren't answering is Bishop Urbonas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012251
text: Four years ago during Medzio Diena...{nl}I rose to lordship as I was the only heir after my {nl}father and brother were lost on that fateful day.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012252
text: Back then, there were only the threats of people trying to manipulate or threaten me...{nl}Bishop Urbonas was the only person that protected me and helped Orsha endure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012253
text: First of all, there are reports of demons at the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing.{nl}Perhaps they have something to do with the disappearance of Bishop Urbonas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012254
text: An ominous feeling... is tightening around me.{nl}Please find Bishop Urbonas for Orsha and the settlers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012255
text: Before you leave, please stop by the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza.{nl}Goddess Statues will become inseparable guides for your travels in the future.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012256
text: I've also taken the liberty of preparing a few meager supplies, {nl}so stop by at the Item Merchant to pick them up.{nl}I'll contact you again once you've prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012257
text: Please keep this a secret.{nl}You must not speak of the disappearance of Bishop Urbonas until this case is solved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012258
text: Oh, hello there, welcome. {nl}I've heard that you've saved refugees from danger several times.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012259
text: The lord have been very pleased because she sent a person to bestow some supplies.{nl}There you go. I'm sure they'll come in handy!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012260
text: They say that there are barely any intact cities left in the kingdom.{nl}All because of Medzio Diena four years ago... It's a real shame.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012261
text: You'll need a lot of trivial tools on your travels like potions and such.{nl}Make sure to stop by often since I have the cheapest prices around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012262
text: Oh yes, the lord also requested something of Jurus the Accessory Merchant.{nl}Make sure you stop by.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012263
text: Grandfather says that he doesn't know how many more people Orsha can handle.{nl}There are more travelers flocking here as well since {nl}it's relatively safer than the rest of the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012264
text: It doesn't feel very good even if the store is doing better.{nl}Do you think everyone can be happy if the goddesses return?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012265
text: Greetings. I have heard of you from the lord.{nl}Things aren't going great but I'll give you this since the lord specially asked for something nice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012266
text: Everyone in Orsha is having it rough... {nl}But I feel as if we are getting by thanks to the people {nl}like you that go out of their way to help others.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012267
text: Oh, yes. The lord was looking for you again.{nl}You should go back to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012268
text: There has just been a report from an agent that was {nl}searching through the Woods of the Linked Bridges.{nl}It says that they've found a clue to the whereabouts of Bishop Urbonas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012269
text: Priest Pranas was the one who headed the search this time.{nl}He only returned recently after being away for a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012270
text: He has known Bishop Urbonas for a long time, {nl}so I'm sure that he'll be of great help in the search.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012271
text: Go to Agent Cherasia, one of my immediate subordinates, {nl}who is at the Woods of the Linked Bridges when you're ready.{nl}You'll be able to find out what happened since the report and what they're planning to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012272
text: I've heard about you from the lord.{nl}Glad to meet you. I'm Cherasia.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012273
text: I've been searching for clues about the bishop and the priests around here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012274
text: The other agents are currently disguised as being {nl}out on other assignments for the sake of secrecy.{nl}So I hope you don't do anything rash that will undo all of their efforts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012275
text: I'm sure you've heard of Priest Pranas from the lord.{nl}Pranas only recently returned from his asceticism from the north.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012276
text: He recently found the traces of Priest Irma, one of the bishop's disciples.{nl}There were pieces of what seemed to be Irma's diary ripped apart.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012277
text: From the way they've been ripped apart... It looks like the monsters did this.{nl}I was left here while Priest Pranas and the rest went to look for more clues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012278
text: I've been trying my best to gather the remaining pages from the diary, {nl}but it seems to be a bit too much to do by myself.{nl}You'll have to lend a hand if we want to cover more ground while searching.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012279
text: It's unnatural for monsters to tear apart something as unattractive as a diary.{nl}My guess is... that somebody did this on purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012280
text: It's hard to recognize thanks to all the monster saliva...{nl}But it seems as if they were being chased by something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012281
text: You should hurry.{nl}Take this and go find Agent Moren at Gyvenimo Crossroads.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012282
text: I'll stay here and try to find any more clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012283
text: I've received word from the lord.{nl}You're the person here to help us right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012284
text: The journal Cherasia found...{nl}The fact that Irma is being chased most likely means that the bishop is also being chased.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012285
text: Priest Pranas asked me to check the traces we've found here. {nl}Then he went up with the rest of the trackers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012286
text: This is where the bishop and the priests stayed for a while...{nl}The monsters are turning any investigation into a nightmare.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012287
text: I'd like to ask you to deal with the monsters so that I can get some investigation done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012288
text: I think just a bit more will do...{nl}I'm trying my best to get all the evidence I can, so don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012289
text: Paper burned by something... There's definitely something written on it.{nl}Why did they only burn some of it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012290
text: They've covered the campfire with leaves after dousing it.{nl}Not something that you would normally do. It has a great risk of catching fire.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012291
text: Maybe they did this to try to secretly notify us of something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012292
text: )}Cherasia said that Priest Irma was being chased by something?{nl}If so, then these half-burnt notes may have been burned to hide something from her pursuers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012293
text: Whatever that may have been, there is a need to check these more thoroughly.{nl}Let me give it a try since it is my expertise after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012294
text: Please look for more clues while I take a look at these.{nl}You may find some more burnt notes if you go through all of the smoking leaves around here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012295
text: )}There's no way people on the run could have had {nl}the time to make campfires all over the place like this.{nl}Do you think it's part of a charade?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012296
text: )}Good.{nl}Let's gather the notes and see what's written on them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012297
text: A revelation?{nl}The bishop of Orsha... Revelator..?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012298
text: I have no idea what they mean with the 'Revelator'...{nl}Do you know anything about this?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012299
text: I see you don't have a clue either. Maybe Pranas knows something about this...{nl}Ulysses has gone with Priest Pranas so look for him up north.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012300
text: By the way, there are also other hired trackers around here besides Pranas and the other agents.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you could help them out as much as you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012301
text: Priest Pranas?{nl}He's gone to Paupys Crossing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012302
text: He left me in charge of the investigation here with a very concerned look.{nl}He asked me to look for clues about the whereabouts of the priests near Greate Stone Face Hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012303
text: There are definitely traces of someone staying there for a while...{nl}But there are simply too many monsters for me to handle by myself. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012304
text: I've heard that you're quite good.{nl}Before you head off to Priest Pranas, could you reconnoiter Greate Stone Face Hill?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012305
text: Revelator? I don't know what you're talking about.{nl}Do you perhaps mean the people like the Bokors or Oracles?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012306
text: Four years ago, Medzio Diena...{nl}...but that was only the beginning.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012307
text: It was the beginning of a whole new calamity.{nl}We've been preparing ourselves for hundreds of years now, and we will finish our mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012308
text: I only hope that Orsha will be safe until my priests and I can finish our mission...{nl}...sent by the goddess...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012309
text: (You cannot recognize any more information.){nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012310
text: A Minotaur... Are you telling me that there are demons?{nl}By the goddesses, demons this close to Orsha?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012311
text: The bishop's diary? What are you talking about? {nl}It seems as if I am not the only person that thinks something dangerous is afoot...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012312
text: Forget about me, you should head to Paupys Crossing as quickly as you can.{nl}My friend Talbasi is searching that region with Priest Pranas, so you should look for Talbasi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012313
text: You're the person that the lord's messenger told us about.{nl}How is the search in the Woods of the Linked Bridges going?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012314
text: Demons appearing this close to Orsha is no small incident.{nl}There have never been any demons even if half of Orsha had been destroyed on Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012315
text: My mother will have a heart attack if she ever finds out that I'm tracking demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012316
text: The monsters are pouring in... There's not enough manpower...{nl}They don't want to give us a break do they?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012317
text: Oh, I'm helping behind the scenes to make it easier for the others.{nl}I'm dealing with monsters in Zbuka Inner Court, but they just keep coming and tired me out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012318
text: Eh, you're really going to help?{nl}For once I'm the one being helped instead and can't help out too.{nl}I think you really are sent by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012319
text: I'll let you deal with the monsters in Zbuka Inner Court while I rest a little.{nl}They are more vicious than they look, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012320
text: There's a limit to what one can do alone.{nl}At this rate, I wonder if an army might be more suited to dealing with this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012321
text: As you know...{nl}There are barely enough soldiers in Orsha to protect the settlers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012322
text: It's less of a hassle to deal with two monsters than three of them, {nl}and one monster is easier than two. Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012323
text: The soldiers took care of most of the monsters heading towards Orsha but...{nl}They've collected them and piled them together on those carts.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012324
text: It stinks, and even more monsters have come to run amok since they've been left like that.{nl}Sorry, but could you possibly burn those carts down while I rest a little?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012325
text: Forget the monsters going wild because of the stench, {nl}the fact that they're gathering near Orsha is definitely not natural.{nl}I don't know why they are acting like that. {nl}Do you think there may be demons somewhere?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012326
text: At least I won't be responsible for any more monsters in my area for a while.{nl}Thank you for helping out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012327
text: Hey there, how's it going? {nl}It appears that you've also received requests from that person over there...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012328
text: Do you want something really useful? It's a Monster Stimulant.{nl}Monsters sprayed with it will become hostile and attack other nearby monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012329
text: Why don't you give it a try?{nl}It will let you pass on some of the more irksome work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012330
text: Medzio Diena is a terrible memory for everyone.{nl}My hometown had been destroyed on that fateful day,{nl}and I'm living off these odd jobs in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012331
text: What do you think? Isn't it really effective?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012332
text: I dreamt of becoming an alchemist before all of this happened.{nl}I only learned it by watching over the shoulders of others so this is actually a failure,{nl}but I guess it's all good if you can find a use for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012333
text: What in the world... I've never seen anything like it.{nl}I went up Bonan Forest Road because it felt as if the monsters were pouring out from there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012334
text: There was a monster that I'd never seen before.{nl}It even made a nest for itself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012335
text: I was so startled that I ran away... Can't you do something about it?{nl}I'm sure that it'll threaten Orsha if we just leave it there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012336
text: If you really don't mind, please deal with the monster on Bonan Forest Road.{nl}There's nothing good that could come from leaving monsters there anyways.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012337
text: I would have tried to do something myself if it was just a few monsters, {nl}but something of that size...{nl}Just run if you think it's too much for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012338
text: You burned the nest to the ground? {nl}A wise decision!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012339
text: The reason monsters kept pouring out from Bonan Forest Road is probably because of that one.{nl}There are even monsters I'm seeing for the first time since the surrounding areas are all forests.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012340
text: You've found the journals of Priest Irma and the bishop?{nl}Hm... There are too many parts that I can't get my head around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012341
text: If they were merely being pursued, they could have just escaped to Orsha.{nl}Yet they went through the trouble of leaving behind pieces of their journals while disappearing somewhere else.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012342
text: It could be... That they were threatened...{nl}Or they had a mission that they had to complete even though they were being pursued?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012343
text: A mission... I've been looking for traces of Priest Gelija.{nl}I cannot make out exactly what is written in the notes left by Gelija either{nl}since they are only partially recognizable due to the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012344
text: Priest Pranas said that finding traces of Priest Gelija is {nl}very important because of the priest's thorough nature.{nl}I also think that we'll be able to narrow down our search {nl}if we can find all of the clues left by Gelija.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012345
text: I'll look over here. {nl}How about you look for clues that the monsters may have?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012346
text: I'm sure that there is some crucial evidence in those notes.{nl}It is common for people on the run to leave clues behind so that others will find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012347
text: I was trying to not care too much for Orsha as long as I got paid properly.{nl}But seeing the demons made me think about my{nl}hometown and how it was razed to the ground...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012348
text: Thank you.{nl}It's not all recognizable since they're all ripped apart, but I can sort of make sense of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012349
text: Demons are hiding in the forest waiting to attack us.{nl}A few of us were separated while running away. We... decided to group up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012350
text: Oh my, there should be a location of where they were going to group up...{nl}But that part is completely missing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012351
text: It seems certain that the priests decided to group up somewhere.{nl}Letting Priest Pranas know immediately is fine, {nl}but acquiring more definite information would be better.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012352
text: I'll keep looking for clues here, you go on to Paslaptis Hideout.{nl}It's only recently been found, and there are reports that the campfires are still warm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012353
text: Even a small clue will be a big help in the search.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012354
text: Report to Larena under the watchtower when you've finished your investigation.{nl}She's second to none when it comes to finding people, {nl}so I'm sure she will manage to find some definitive evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012355
text: It was the demons that destroyed my hometown, not monsters.{nl}Their brutality... Geez, I don't even want to think of it again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012356
text: If the whereabouts of the priests really has to do with demons...{nl}I'm sorry, but I don't think that we'll be able to see them ever again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012357
text: It must be you. {nl}The person the lord sent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012358
text: You said that there are only traces of hurried movements in Paslaptis Hideout, correct?{nl}That there was a note saying that they decided to group up somewhere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012359
text: I think that the reason they couldn't return to Orsha at once... Hm...{nl}I think it was because they had a mission more than merely being pursued or threatened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012360
text: Maybe that's why Jolly is so excited...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012361
text: Oh, this is Jolly by the way. {nl}He's Bishop Urbonas' dog.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012362
text: I thought that Jolly would be able to find the priests fast since he was adored by all of them.{nl}But it's hard for him to find a scent with all this rain pouring down.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012363
text: I have to go back Orsha to report to the lord after meeting with a messenger.{nl}Why don't you take Jolly out for a walk?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012364
text: I wish we had such a friend to work with.{nl}Cute, loving... and best of all, a great tracker.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012365
text: Did Jolly find something?{nl}It seems as if the bishop's group was near here after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012366
text: Wait a second.{nl}I thought I heard a faint scream from up there...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012367
text: This doesn't feel right.{nl}You see, Priest Pranas' group went towards Gatves Highway.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012368
text: They're all more than capable of looking after themselves, but still...{nl}Would you mind going to Gatves Highway just in case?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012369
text: We are saved! Are you our backup?{nl}About Priest Pranas... He hasn't been able to make it out of Groundsle Hill!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012370
text: I'm not a fighter, so I'll only be more of a burden if I tag along.{nl}Go after him quickly, please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012371
text: We should have increased the number of guards.{nl}I swear that this is the strongest demon I've seen since Medzio Diena!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012372
text: All we could do once we made eye contact was to run.{nl}Priest Pranas will be in a lot of danger at this rate!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012373
text: There was nothing we could do.{nl}Please save Priest Pranas before it is too late!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012374
text: Whoever you are... I thank you for saving me from the bottom of my heart.{nl}Could I perhaps know how you came here, or at least know your name?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012375
text: Oh, you've been sent by the lord.{nl}Then you must already know that the bishop is missing...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012376
text: I was trying to deal quickly with a few demons roaming about and investigate the campsite...{nl}But then, we suddenly found their leader...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012377
text: I... I can't keep holding on.{nl}Please... Search the campsite...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012378
text: I'm sure we'll clear things out...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012379
text: Come to Orsha if you find something.{nl}I'll leave the rest up to you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012380
text: There is just too much that I cannot comprehend.{nl}I'm just a hired hand trying not to care about Orsha... {nl}But it feels like my loss.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012381
text: I brought Jolly because I thought he may be able to find clues without trouble...{nl}But the rain doesn't seem like it's going to end any time soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012382
text: A demon that powerful... I've never seen anything like it.{nl}It almost makes me want to quit my job.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012383
text: Thank you for saving my life back there.{nl}My wounds seem to be a bit more bearable since I've rested a little.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012384
text: By the way, have you managed to find something?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012385
text: Must be filled

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012386
text: There are a lot of disgusting monsters around here.{nl}No wonder nothing can be achieved in this state.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012387
text: If you have some spare time, could you deal with some of the monsters around here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012388
text: It wasn't going great even before the monsters started interrupting my work.{nl}It was such a wonderful day until it began raining...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012389
text: You've taken care of that?{nl}I envy your skills. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012390
text: There, now I'll get to get back to my work.{nl}Thanks a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012391
text: I've never heard of demons being spotted anywhere near Orsha before...{nl}All of a sudden, demons appear and they're poking around this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012392
text: They've made a bunch of magic circles near Naudingas Felled Area.{nl}I don't know why they've done that but it can't be a good thing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012393
text: It's not my responsibility, but I do think that it is better to be safe than sorry.{nl}Could you take care of the magic circles at Naudingas Felled Area?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012394
text: I've been here to survey the land because of the refugee problem.{nl}I don't remember seeing any demons back then... What is going on?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012395
text: What purpose do the magic circles serve?{nl}I don't think there have been any incident reports yet...{nl}We'll have to wait and see.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012396
text: There is a lot of nonsense going on because all reports of the area are labeled as classified.{nl}I mean, they're planning on making a refugee camp near Deer Hooves Lot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012397
text: Even if the refugees coming here are supposed to be from a village famed for mercenaries.{nl}What are they thinking? Saying that they'll be able to fend for themselves{nl}if we give them houses... There are demons everywhere...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012398
text: They want a report on whether the monsters here {nl}are weak enough for the mercenaries to handle or not.{nl}I used to be a paper pusher, what am I supposed to do?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012399
text: I've heard that you're quite skilled.{nl}I can't fake a report, so how about checking Deer Hooves Lot for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012400
text: If they're going to keep the investigations a secret, they should at least write a line and keep to it.{nl}How much more unlucky can I get? I haven't held a sword since training camp...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012401
text: You're saying that there was an enormous monster at the camp?{nl}I haven't seen it myself, but we can't make people stay in places like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012402
text: Right?{nl}I'll take your word for it and put it in my report.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012403
text: This is just wrong.{nl}I came here as a surveyor, not to fight monsters like the trackers. {nl}That's too much for me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012404
text: The monsters may have become more violent because {nl}of the demons, so gather some monster blood.{nl}...Are you kidding me?{nl}Could you help me out? You'd literally be saving my life.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012405
text: By the goddesses, thank you so much.{nl}Just gather some blood from the monsters at Rohonsa Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012406
text: I'm not a coward.{nl}I just know what I can and can't do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012407
text: My skills aren't with a sword or spear, they're honed with a pen and stamps...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012408
text: What is this disgusting stench?{nl}I don't know how they could have ordered me to collect this stuff.{nl}They know very well that it would have been impossible...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012409
text: Thankfully, Priest Pranas is safe... Now we can afford to worry about ourselves.{nl}Having ten lives wouldn't be enough if we stay around here for too long.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012410
text: Sendal and I have hurt our legs and there's no telling {nl}when monsters or demons will come after us...{nl}There's nobody but you to ask for help around here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012411
text: Could you deal with the monsters around here until we gain our strength again?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012412
text: I should have known there was a reason to pay so much.{nl}I would have turned down the offer if I knew it was that dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012413
text: If you hadn't help out, I would have been limping along until they got me.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012414
text: Oh... Whoops.{nl}By any chance have you seen some bags or packages around here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012415
text: I had all of my potions and food in there...{nl}With my legs in my current state, you're the only person I can ask for help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012416
text: They shouldn't be far since they weight quite a bit.{nl}I know it may be a bit rude, but could you look for our luggage?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012417
