text: Maybe some monsters have gotten hold of it. This just keeps getting worse.{nl}They're quite heavy so they shouldn't be too far away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012418
text: Thank you so much! {nl}They're not in perfect shape, but I'm just glad to have at least some of them back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012419
text: This seems to be... a chest.{nl}There's a seal, but it's familiar to priests. Let's open it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012420
text: It contains a journal and a map of Ashaq Underground Prison 1F.{nl}I do hope that he's not at Ashaq Underground Prison...{nl}There's something marked on it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012421
text: The handwriting on this map is most definitely of the bishop.{nl}Even though it is written in a language that ordinary people can't read.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012422
text: I can only translate a part of it right away, would you like to hear it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012423
text: ...Once the waves of disaster wash across...{nl}The stranger arranged by the goddess shall seek Orsha dreaming of the catastrophe.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012424
text: Only one of the countless strangers...{nl}To find the one and lead them is our mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012425
text: I shall go to the Ashaq Underground Prison with my priests.{nl}There, I shall await the one and only stranger arranged by the goddess...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012426
text: We started being chased by demons even before we were ready.{nl}There is no time to contact the disciples that aren't nearby Inesa.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012427
text: If someone finds this diary, I beg of you to pass it on to Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012428
text: ...That's all it says...{nl}I expected them to be chased by demons, but I didn't know that there was so much more to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012429
text: As the journal says, report the contents of the journal to the lord.{nl}We'll also be preparing to go directly to the Ashaq Underground Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012430
text: There probably won't be a anything more important to Orsha than what we are doing now.{nl}This is worrying. No matter how hard I look, there is one piece of information that is missing...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012431
text: If only I had a bit more time... I think I can find it.{nl}I'm not in the intelligence business for nothing you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012432
text: It seems that...{nl}I am not the only one that feels something is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012433
text: You mean to say that Bishop Urbonas... is being chased by demons?{nl}The Ashaq Underground Prison has been closed off many years ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012434
text: I don't know what he's trying to achieve by hiding there.{nl}I... I don't know what to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012435
text: I'll get ready to go to the Ashaq Underground Prison.{nl}You should hurry and inform the lord of this information!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012436
text: It will take too long to gather troops to go there.{nl}They may not be of much help with demons since{nl}they only have experience against monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012437
text: I'm sorry, but could you go to the Ashaq Underground Prison with Priest Pranas?{nl}You're the only one left that I can rely on in this situation...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012438
text: Whatever it takes, please save Bishop Urbonas.{nl}I, Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha, plead for your assistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012439
text: Bishop Urbonas always preached about the importance of the ties brought by coincidence.{nl}He always said that Goddess Laima would send a Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012440
text: Yes. Maybe you...{nl}Maybe you are the Revelator that is mentioned in the {nl}legends passed down among the bishops of Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012441
text: The church... Bishop Urbonas has been waiting for a Revelator his whole life.{nl}I will tell you more in detail once you have saved the bishop.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012442
text: But you must prepare thoroughly no matter how much of a rush you are in, {nl}so please stop by at the Item Merchant.{nl}I have prepared some handy supplies for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012443
text: Please forgive me for the fact that I can only help you {nl}in such a fashion even though I am a lord of a terrority.{nl}I shall pray... that the goddesses bless you and Bishop Urbonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012444
text: I've quickly prepared a few things since the lord sent someone over.{nl}This anvil will allow you to enhance your equipment so that they become more effective.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012445
text: I'd like to give you something more, but this is all I can offer.{nl}I don't know what is happening, but I'm sure you'll pull through.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012446
text: It is so frustrating. {nl}The fact I'm restricted so much even though I am the lord of Orsha...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012447
text: Are you coming with us?{nl}Having you with us makes us feel as safe as having a whole army with us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012448
text: According to the bishop's journal, the demons must be {nl}after the bishop since he's searching for the Revelator.{nl}It would be easier for them to go after the bishop instead {nl}of trying to find the Revelator who might be anybody.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012449
text: Let's go to the Ashaq Underground Prison whenever you're ready.{nl}Bishop... I pray that the goddesses are giving their blessings...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012450
text: I'll be right behind you with the trackers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012451
text: Let's meet up at Gebene Cliff at Paupys Crossing.{nl}The Ashaq Underground Prison is just ahead of that point.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012452
text: You're here.{nl}I've gathered the best of the best, but this aura... {nl}It is sinister beyond my knowledge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012453
text: Torvana seems to be confident but... This strange aura... {nl}I feel goosebumps all over my body for some reason.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012454
text: You can place your trust in me, Chaser Torvana!{nl}I'll take care of the demons in one strike, don't you worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012455
text: I can sense the ominous aura streaming out from the direction of the Underground Prison.{nl}We may not be able to make it back out of there once we enter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012456
text: But we must save the bishop!{nl}Let's enter the Ashaq Underground Prison if you've finished your preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012457
text: It feels as if something I can't see is bound to me tightly...{nl}I'm finding it hard... to even breathe.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012458
text: How are you so unaffected by all this?{nl}Maybe the goddesses are looking after you seeing how indifferent you seem to be to all this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012459
text: I've come here a few times when I was an apprentice a very long time ago, {nl}but I've never felt so weighed down like this before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012460
text: Let's see... I sense a very strong evil presence towards the Torture Material Room.{nl}I haven't seen that ominous looking fog here before either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012461
text: You seem to be in a good condition... {nl}Could you go and check what's happening over at the Torture Material Room for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012462
text: This feels... exactly like a curse.{nl}I've never felt anything quite as vicious before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012463
text: What a strange idol.{nl}I've never seen anything like it even in any of the books before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012464
text: I am certain that the demons are behind all of this...{nl}But there does not seem to be a way for us to become free of this curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012465
text: Don't worry about me.{nl}I'm second to none when it comes to stamina in the church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012466
text: Only you can stand up to Demon Lord Marnox now.{nl}According to the goddesses, only you... the Revelator, can save this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012467
text: I never thought there would be a Cursed Idol here as well...{nl}This aura simply is... unadaptable.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012468
text: My body... seems to become heavier and heavier.{nl}It's the same with the Chasers as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012469
text: There's something I want you to do since you seem to be the most uneffected out of all of us.{nl}Do you remember the map of Ashaq Underground Prison 1F {nl}that was in the chest along with his journal?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012470
text: All we have to rely on now are the points marked on the map.{nl}I don't know what you'll find there, but this is the best we can do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012471
text: Take the map.{nl}The bishop has definitely left some clues... at the marked locations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012472
text: Oh yes, in order to reach those locations, you'll have to take {nl}the rail system meant to transport prisoners.{nl}There's one at the bottom of the stairs just right of here, {nl}but I don't know if it is still functioning.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012473
text: I shudder to think that I was almost captured by demons.{nl}You... Does the curse not affect you at all?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012474
text: I wonder what happened to the other priests that ran away from Marnox...{nl}It weighs heavily on my mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012475
text: I will become a more devout priest when we leave this place...{nl}I pray that we will make it out alive...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012476
text: You... Oh, thank the goddesses! {nl}Does this mean that I may finally accomplish my mission...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012477
text: Yes. I am the bishop of Orsha, Urbonas.{nl}Who are you... may I perhaps hear your name?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012478
text: Of course. Priest Pranas and the lord... {nl}This old man seems to have caused concern for a lot of people.{nl}Could I perhaps interest you into listening to me for a little bit?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012479
text: Not long ago, Irma discovered strange orders on a demon while up north.{nl}The orders contained terrible plans that would destroy the entire region of Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012480
text: But that was not all.{nl}It also contained orders from the Demon Goddess Giltine to get rid of all Revelators.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012481
text: A Revelator is...{nl}...someone chosen by the goddesses to save this world from the catastrophes to come.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012482
text: I wanted to give this information to the lord, {nl}but the demons had already started chasing me.{nl}I had no choice but to hide in this prison, {nl}a hideout that I had been preparing for a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012483
text: I could have ran to Orsha, but if I did that, the demons would have followed me there.{nl}Unfortunately, the demon that was after us was not an ordinary demon, but a Demon Lord.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012484
text: Demon Lord Marnox cursed the entire prison with his idols so that we could not escape.{nl}He also let loose his servants to search for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012485
text: We had to make a decision.{nl}First, I hid the Demon Orders in the Penitence Room on the 3rd floor,{nl}so that it would be safe even if I fall.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012486
text: Then I faced off against Marnox to the best of my abilities, but it was simply not enough.{nl}In the end, Irma was captured by Marnox...{nl}While the other priests were all scattered.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012487
text: This is the story of what happened up to now.{nl}Until you showed up, I was thinking that I would return to the{nl}arms of the goddess without being able to complete my mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012488
text: But my faith in hope has restored since you've arrived here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012489
text: Torvana was confident a few minutes ago...{nl}We were chosen because we were supposed to be the best, but look at us now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012490
text: Being so confident was a mistake.{nl}My body feels as if it is very heavy... What's happening?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012491
text: Dispatched officers used to irk us by poking around before the kingdom fell...{nl}I miss those days now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012492
text: I feel as if I am experiencing every type of pain I could ever experience in here.{nl}At least I'll have plenty of tales to tell my children when I return.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012493
text: I remember back home when they were first looking for Chaser volunteers.{nl}I joined up because I trusted Germeja, but the job is more demanding than I thought it would be.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012494
text: Not to mention extremely dangerous as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012495
text: You've kept dreaming of the Demon Goddess Giltine?{nl}Hmm... Perhaps...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012496
text: Goddess Laima is responsible for fate and foresight.{nl}You finding me may seem like a sequence of coincidences, {nl}but I am certain that the goddess has led you here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012497
text: There were orders from Giltine to get rid of 'the Revelator' as well.{nl}I wish to see if perhaps you... since you have been having those dreams... may be 'the Revelator'.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012498
text: I didn't hear anything about there being demons here.{nl}I didn't think too much of the job since I was told it was an escort mission...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012499
text: I can't handle things like this, but I'd become a deserter if I run off...{nl}I'm going to seriously consider resigning after this is over.{nl}I don't know what I'd do to make a living though.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012500
text: All I'm going to do after this is take a break and sleep all day while wrapped in my warm blanket.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012501
text: I'm certain that the goddess led you here.{nl}All these coincidences are pointing towards you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012502
text: My goddess, your Revelator is finally here...{nl}The efforts of our church are not in vain...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012503
text: Only you can stand up to the Demon Lord Marnox now.{nl}According to the goddesses, only you... the Revelator, can save this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012504
text: Please save the priests and Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012505
text: The most important part is the invasion plans for Orsha.{nl}I didn't have enough time to fully analyze the orders while on the run from Marnox...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012506
text: I hid the orders in the Penitence Room on the 3rd floor...{nl}I sealed it as well, but there is no guarantee that Marnox will not be able to break the seal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012507
text: Not only that, but even though you are free of the idol's curse, {nl}you will not be able to reach the room if the priests are unable to move.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012508
text: I wish I could show you the way myself but...{nl}I think that would be a strech due to the wounds I've suffered from Marnox...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012509
text: This Orb of Return may be able to help us.{nl}We can destroy the idols with it and free the priests from the curse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012510
text: Deal with nearby demons to collect evil energy in the orb and destroy the cursed idols!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012511
text: I will be of no help to you in my current state...{nl}If you destroy all of the idols, please pass on my story to Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012512
text: Don't worry about me and look for the Demon Orders first.{nl}We must interpret the rest and find out the exact plans for the invasion of Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012513
text: Has the curse been lifted?{nl}I suddenly feel a bit lighter now... How did you do that?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012514
text: What? The bishop... is alive?{nl}Let us not further delay ourselves and save him!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012515
text: I can barely move in this chilly aura...{nl}You, are you really okay?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012516
text: You seem to be the only person able to move, so I hope you don't mind me asking a favor.{nl}We'd be in trouble if the demons suddenly attack us, so I want to threaten them a bit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012517
text: Gather some red crystals from Blue Dumaro and Wendigo near the Torture Chamber.{nl}It's similar to war trophies so they will be hesitant to attack us if we have a lot of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012518
text: You seem to be fine unlike the rest of us...{nl}What did you do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012519
text: There was no curse when I came here before on other business.{nl}There were also only petty demons back then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012520
text: I'm only sticking around since I've been paid and bound to a contract.{nl}At least I'll be able to scare the few demons trying to get out with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012521
text: I'm having a hard time even talking.{nl}Priest Pranas seems better off, maybe it's the priest powers?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012522
text: They say that it's an eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth.{nl}Maybe we can destroy the cursed idols with the evil energy from demons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012523
text: Mind if I ask you to gather some Black Wooden Pieces from demons in the Punishment Room?{nl}I know it sounds strange, but it's better than doing nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012524
text: The petty demons are here just like they were last time.{nl}I would have been leading you if I felt okay but...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012525
text: What is this? Why did it suddenly turn into a normal piece of wood?{nl}Oh... Could it be the energy from the Goddess Statue?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012526
text: At least I got to know that I'll be returning to the goddesses {nl}the instant I step away from this Goddess Statue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012527
text: Torvana says that the Blue Dumaro and Wendigo are carrying around strange packages.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012528
text: The reason that they're able to move around in such an environment...{nl}Perhaps they have something in those packages?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012529
text: If you ever find a reason to go to the prison, why don't you try gathering a few and use them?{nl}Maybe they'll be useful to you as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012530
text: I came because they said they'll pay me ten times the normal rate, and I'm paying dearly for it.{nl}I should stop trusting those priests outside of the church.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012531
text: It's not the effect I was hoping for, but this is quite handy.{nl}I'll have to show it to my colleagues later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012532
text: I cannot believe that you are the Revelator who will save this world...{nl}I knew it was strange that you were the only one unaffected by the curse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012533
text: Unfortunately I don't have the time to revel in the fact that I'm in the presence of the Revelator.{nl}Like the bishop said: Time is of the utmost importance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012534
text: Fortunately, the bishop seems to be safe for now...{nl}We don't know what's happened to the rest of the priests {nl}and we might be caught by Marnox at any moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012535
text: Those Chasers are holding us back.{nl}I can move immediately since I am a priest, but they look like they could use a bit more time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012536
text: Oh well. I shall go first and see what's going on.{nl}Don't be too far behind!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012537
text: I'm sorry. I know we don't have time to waste...{nl}I think there's a cursed idol here as well...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012538
text: Fortunately, Draznie and Auranas seem to be fine.{nl}Let's just hope that the rest of the priests are okay as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012539
text: This curse... I really can't get used to it at all.{nl}I think we'll need more Orbs of Return.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012540
text: No matter how powerful the cursed idol is, the idol itself is merely a piece of wood.{nl}We'll have to aim for the instant it is full of evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012541
text: You saw the cursed idol on the way here right?{nl}How about filling it with evil energy by dealing with demons near it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012542
text: Use the orb when the idol is full to the limit with evil energy.{nl}It will be destroyed as the divine and evil energies collide.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012543
text: I thought it was all over when I was locked in the Solitary Confinement District.{nl}But seeing you... I feel as if the efforts of the church were not in vain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012544
text: The best part is...{nl}According to Auranas it seems that Irma, who was captured by Marnox, is still alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012545
text: I also heard that Irma has a Orb of Return as well.{nl}We should hurry and rescue her before something bad happens to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012546
text: Irma is currently being held in the Solitary Confinement District...{nl}Marnox is sure to be nearby, so make sure you're prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012547
text: I can't imagine what Irma is going through right now.{nl}I just hope that she'll be okay until you can get to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012548
text: I thought it was all over when I was captured by the Demon Lord...{nl}Thank you so much for rescuing me!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012549
text: But... I think I heard Marnox call you the Revelator...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012550
text: Ah... the bishop...{nl}So the bishop is safe as well. {nl}Oh... that's... a relief...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012551
text: The Orb of Return? Of course I have one.{nl}Here you... Huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012552
text: Oh dear... It seems as if I've used the orb too much.{nl}It seems like it will break at any moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012553
text: I've used it numerous times against that uncouth and arrogant Marnox.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012554
text: It's too early to give up. There's a way to restore it.{nl}This orb is an instrument that turns powerful evil energy and turns it into divine power...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012555
text: There's more than enough evil energy around. {nl}The Wendigo Escapees.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012556
text: You can find the Wendigo Escapees near the Central Passage.{nl}You'll be able to restore the orb by absorbing their life and evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012557
text: Please hurry.{nl}I think Marnox found out where we've hid the Demon Orders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012558
text: The seal that protects the orders can't be broken by a demon but...{nl}There is no telling what dirty tricks Marnox may play to break it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012559
text: I still don't believe I'm alive.{nl}I'm so glad that the bishop and all the other priests are okay too...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012560
text: You've done well.{nl}Just a little divine power and it will be almost as good as new.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012561
text: There's a crystal that Draznie prepared for such an occasion.{nl}I think... it should be in the Bird Room and the Supply Room. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012562
text: The power of light should transfer to the orb from the crystal if you take it there.{nl}Return to me after the orb has absorbed enough of the power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012563
text: I don't know how many more cursed idols are in this Underground Prison...{nl}But the only orb we have left is the one I just gave you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012564
text: I don't know whether to call the bishop meticulous...{nl}Or whether to call him worrisome...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012565
text: He ordered us priests to prepare things near Orsha.{nl}Of course we never knew why we were preparing things back then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012566
text: Then this all happened.{nl}If I could, I want to go back in time and kneel in front of the bishop in gratitude.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012567
text: During Medzio Diena, it was a nightmare because of the earthquake.{nl}It was still easier to get by back then than it is now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012568
text: The fact that there are suddenly so many monsters is a bigger catastrophe.{nl}Of course, it's still better than at the capital. {nl}I've heard that it was completely destroyed during Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012569
text: I think this will be enough to destroy the idol.{nl}I'm grateful that we could get enough energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012570
text: It's our only orb and it barely has enough power...{nl}We should try to think of a way to make sure we destroy the idol.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012571
text: You've succeeded!{nl}The force that was weighing down my body is gone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012572
text: Now let's go find the orders we've hidden away.{nl}I know the way there, of course. That's why Marnox captured me...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012573
text: I'll head down to the 3rd floor first.{nl}I think Gelija is there somewhere... I do hope that she is okay.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012574
text: Priest Gelija is safe!{nl}Now I should focus on finding the Demon Orders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012575
text: But...{nl}Oh, I forgot that you probably won't be able to sense it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012576
text: I think there's a cursed idol here as well.{nl}The problem is that we don't have any Orbs of Return left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012577
text: Feeling as if my body is becoming heavier is one thing...{nl}But we cannot open the portal to the Penitence Room {nl}where the Demon Orders is because of the cursed idol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012578
text: We've prepared to greet the Revelator on the bishop's orders...{nl}But it looks like we'll be done for if we don't use it now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012579
text: We've hidden a sack of Pearl Powder in the watchtower.{nl}Do you think you could gather it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012580
text: Are you talking about the legends?{nl}Oh, you may not know since you're not from Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012581
text: A long time ago...{nl}It is said that a young shepherd boy met a girl that {nl}he had never seen before while tending his sheep.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012582
text: The girl barely talked, but everything she said happened.{nl}The shepherd boy was fascinated and took the girl to his uncle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012583
text: The uncle is said to have shown his respect as soon as he saw the girl.{nl}The girl prophesied of numerous catastrophes to the uncle before disappearing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012584
text: Medzio Diena and the catastrophe involving Orsha have already occurred...{nl}There is one more prophecy that has only been passed on by the bishops of Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012585
text: You can hear the story in more detail from any of the residents of Orsha, {nl}so why don't you ask around?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012586
text: It's an honor to meet the Revelator that I've only heard of through the legends. {nl}You really do seem to be indifferent to the curse as Priest Pranas said...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012587
text: The bishop is meticulous... to the point of being overly cautious.{nl}He had prepared to meet the Revelator in a few more places other than here as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012588
text: Among those numerous places, Ashaq Underground Prison was prepared by myself and Draznie.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012589
text: I was planning on hiding here for a long time but...{nl}Since you're here, I think using the prepared items is a better idea.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012590
text: First of all, I've hidden a sack of Pearl Powder in the watchtower.{nl}We can use that against demons to great effect.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012591
text: I'll explain the details once you get back with the Pearl Powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012592
text: It seems that I still have much to learn...{nl}I can't do anything because of the curse...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012593
text: Thank the goddesses, Irma is safe!{nl}Now all we have to do is push the demons out of the Ashaq Underground Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012594
text: Once again, the bishop has impressed me with his wisdom.{nl}If such preparations hadn't been in place, {nl}we wouldn't have been able to deal with the demons at all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012595
text: I'd say that my brothers are also in similar hideouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012596
text: I feel so relieved that we've recovered the Demon Orders.{nl}But this is only the beginning. We don't know the contents about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012597
text: The pearl powder was scattered all over the floor?{nl}It seems as if the demons had torn into it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012598
text: Thankfully, this is more than enough to use.{nl}Good job on getting it here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012599
text: The demons also have a chain of command like we do,{nl}so I think that the other demons will fall if we take out their leaders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012600
text: I've crafted an orb from the pearl powder you brought me.{nl}Try using it when you find a demon far away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012601
text: I've empowered it with holy power so it will tell you which demons you need to deal with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012602
text: You mustn't... think of the demons as monsters.{nl}I've heard that some Demon Lords are as powerful as Goddess Gabija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012603
text: Good job.{nl}The demons will be less aggressive for a while since their chain of command is ruined.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012604
text: I feel awful because of the cursed idols.{nl}I think I need to rest a little at the safer Special Prison District for a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012605
text: We can also react to threats more easily thanks to its height.{nl}The only problem is that the demons are in control of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012606
text: I feel guilty for asking for more help...{nl}But could you clear out the Special Prison District for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012607
text: Priest Pranas, Auranas and myself...{nl}We are too weak from the cursed idols to be of any help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012608
text: I think we need to rest a bit more in the Special Prison District since it's safer than it is here.{nl}It's higher up so that reacting to threats will also be easier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012609
text: The problem is that the demons are in control of it.{nl}I know it's a lot to ask, but could you clear it out for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012610
text: Especially Priest Pranas is in a bad state.{nl}Even though he's pretending to be fine just to make us less worried...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012611
text: I ask of you to hurry since we can't be sure that this place will be safe despite the Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012612
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll have to lead the others to the Special Prison District when I see an opportunity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012613
text: I thought that I would be able to do anything once I got away from Marnox...{nl}But this curse is preventing me from doing anything.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012614
text: I can finally be at ease thanks to you.{nl}It seems as if the Revelator sent by the goddesses is different after all...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012615
text: You are an extraordinarily being to the priests of Orsha.{nl}We've prepared to meet you a long time only relying on legends.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012616
text: Auranas is in a really bad state.{nl}Pretending to be okay in order so we can worry less isn't doing any good...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012617
text: Since safety isn't guaranteed here despite the Goddess Statue, I must beg you to hurry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012618
text: Oh, thank you for helping out back then.{nl}You saved me from Marnox and even managed to retrieve the Demon Orders...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012619
text: I feel much better now.{nl}I'm thinking of staying at the Ashaq Underground Prison {nl}for a while and driving the demons out of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012620
text: I hope we get a chance to meet again.{nl}May the goddesses bless the path you choose...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012621
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll have to wait for a chance to take them to the Special Prison District.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012622
text: I'm so relieved that Irma is safe and sound.{nl}I'm sure she'll dust it off since she's so easygoing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012623
text: Oh, yes. {nl}We've made a bunch of traps in the Solitary Confinement District{nl}on the orders of the bishop quite some time ago.{nl}I learned this back when I was an apprentice... {nl}It's a trap to lure monsters to a apparition that looks like me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012624
text: I didn't say anything about them because I feared Irma {nl}might have gotten caught, but I think it's safe now.{nl}If you happen to go there, please be my guest and use the traps.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012625
text: There are other places where we've prepared hideouts out of the prison as well.{nl}To exaggerate a little, we made so many that we could evacuate the population of Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012626
text: Did the demons fall for the traps?{nl}I'd never used them on demons before, so I was a little worried.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012627
text: I'm so glad that they worked as intended.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012628
text: Do you... by any chance remember?{nl}I'm sure that the bishop would have mentioned it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012629
text: If you really are the Revelator, you will be able to stand against Demon Lords with your strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012630
text: The reason we chose this place to hide the Demon Orders is because of the Confession Altar.{nl}It's the altar that the goddess gave her final blessing to the inmates that made their confessions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012631
text: It's been a while since the prison was shut down, but the effects from the blessings are still there.{nl}Your powers as Revelator should be enough to liberate that energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012632
text: The cursed idols must be destroyed in order for me to open the portal to the Penitence Room.{nl}I can't do a thing because of this heavy and blasphemous energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012633
text: There are two Confession Altars...{nl}But let's try the one on the left since it is closer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012634
text: The demons seemed to have noticed something is happening.{nl}But the cursed idol still stands...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012635
text: I am grateful that everything seems to be going well ever since I've met you...{nl}But I am also nervous at the same time. {nl}Especially about the fact that Marnox is so quiet.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012636
text: I told you there were two altars.{nl}Now all we can do is hope that the one in the oratory will do it's job.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012637
text: I pray that the goddess look over us and grant us with success...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012638
text: Please be careful that Marnox doesn't notice you.{nl}That arrogant Demon Lord will not look on as he lost me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012639
text: You've succeeded!{nl}I feel the curse being lifted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012640
text: Now, the cursed idols should be nothing more than mere pieces of wood!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012641
text: You know what's strange?{nl}Marnox wouldn't leave us to interrupt his plans like this...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012642
text: I guess it's all for the best.{nl}Maybe he underestimated you and got caught off guard.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012643
text: Let's not let down the pace and go destroy the cursed idol in the 2nd Watchtower.{nl}I'll get the portal to the Penitence Room ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012644
text: I won't forget the arrogant gestures and expressions Marnox used when he caught me.{nl}He said that he could crush the Revelator or anything else that stands in his way...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012645
text: I thought it was strange that the demons weren't reacting...{nl}They've been preparing there all along.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012646
text: But Marnox still didn't come back.{nl}Demons will never be able to open the chest that holds the Demon Orders,{nl}so where else could he be?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012647
text: I guess he might be planning his next move while he sends his servants.{nl}I'll open the portal since we can't afford to tarry any longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012648
text: Please be right behind me when I open the portal.{nl}Let's head back to the bishop as soon as we have the Demon Orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012649
text: You've defeated Marnox...{nl}Euah...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012650
text: {nl}I think my wounds are quite deep...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012651
text: It was an honor that I could see the church achieve its mission.{nl}It's all thanks to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012652
text: Don't worry about me, take the Demon Orders to the bishop.{nl}I'm a priest, remember? I'll be fine if I get to rest a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012653
text: Is it true?{nl}You've... defeated Marnox?!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012654
text: All we could do was run even when all of us attacked him together...{nl}I see that a Revelator has remarkable powers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012655
text: To see all the priests alive and well... it's a relief.{nl}I assume that we shall meet in Orsha soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012656
text: I'm really okay. I'll recover my strength if I rest here a while, {nl}so please go and give the Demon Orders to the bishop.{nl}Don't forget to give him my regards.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012657
text: Now that we've recovered the Demon Orders... Let's head back to Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012658
text: The lord tends to attempt to act tough. She is strong, but gentle.{nl}I'm sure she's more worried than anyone else.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012659
text: I'll head back to Orsha and meet with the lord before continuing {nl}with the interpretation of the Demon Orders.{nl}Why don't you meet with her again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012660
text: I shall see you in Orsha then.{nl}I'll make my leave since the interpretation of the Demon Orders is a pressing matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012661
text: I have heard of what you've done from Bishop Urbonas.{nl}All that you've done for us... I don't know how to thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012662
text: I also knew of the legends passed down by the bishops of Orsha.{nl}I never thought that the Revelator of the same legends {nl}would be the one to save Bishop Urbonas...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012663
text: The person that will save not only Orsha, but also the goddesses and the world...{nl}It is an honor to meet that Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012664
text: It seems as if the goddesses have not forsaken Orsha even if they have all disappeared.{nl}I wish I could let everyone know of your deeds but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012665
text: I am sorry. I cannot announce that demons have come this close to the city.{nl}I hope that you will understand the fact that I {nl}cannot spread confusion and fear among my people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012666
text: I thank you once more as the lord of Orsha for what you have done.{nl}Bishop Urbonas will be waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012667
text: Greetings. Impeccable timing! {nl}I've just finished the final interpretation of the Demon Orders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012668
text: There may be a few parts where its inaccurate but...{nl}Allow me to explain with a bit of a liberal translation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012669
text: You may leave the human lord alone since we have obtained the holy power we were after.{nl}Miss Giltine wants more tangible results.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012670
text: Deploy the Kruvina in the predetermined reservoir and execute the spore plan.{nl}Death will engulf this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012671
text: P.S. Miss Giltine has ordered the annihilation of the Revelator.{nl}You must get rid of the Revelator before they meet the girl.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012672
text: This is all of it.{nl}Its contents are so intimidating that I wonder if I actually translated it properly...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012673
text: I will pass this information to the lord...{nl}It is frustrating since we can barely protect Orsha much less send out investigation parties.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012674
text: What could this 'Kruvina' possibly be...{nl}I couldn't find anything mentioned in any of the old texts either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012675
text: Now, Revelator... What is your next plan?{nl}It may be simply the worries of an old man, {nl}but the spore plan mentioned in the Demon Orders...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012676
text: Spores are merely the seeds of mushrooms or ferns and such.{nl}I can't help but wonder if the plan has anything to do with the Koru Jungle famed for its ferns...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012677
text: The choice is yours, of course.{nl}Although our meeting may have been a coincidence, you did save me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012678
text: I am sure that the goddess has arranged it so that all of your travels lead to the salvation of all...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012679
text: I bid thee well.{nl}I shall pray for the deliverance and blessings of the goddesses {nl}to lead and protect you on your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012680
text: I hope that you will keep a place in your heart for Orsha.{nl}The people of Orsha will always welcome you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012681
text: Until now, we thought of the demons below Demon Lords...{nl}Little more than larger and more vicious monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012682
text: We never thought that they would have such a detailed{nl}command structure and threaten us like this.{nl}We will have to research their command structure in more detail {nl}to respond to them more effectively.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012683
text: If you ever have the chance to face the demons at Felon Prison...{nl}Could you possibly collect Marnox's Insignias for me?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012684
text: The entire church was swayed by a single Demon Lord...{nl}How powerful do you think a Demon King or Demon Goddess might be?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012685
text: Thank you! {nl}I'll go straight to Orsha to research this subject as soon as things are settled here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012686
text: Ah... It is a pleasure to meet you.{nl}I've heard from Irma... that you're 'that Revelator'.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012687
text: But we didn't know that they'd threaten us with such an organized structure.{nl}We'll need to confirm their command structure once things are settled here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012688
text: Could you gather Marnox's Insignias when you deal with the demons in the Felon Prison?{nl}I think we'll be able to research the demon's command structure with those.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012689
text: It's a relief seeing Irma safe after being captured by Marnox.{nl}Now all we have to do is retrieve the Demon Orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012690
text: I'm nervous. Especially about the fact that Marnox is so quiet...{nl}I'm sure that he's planning something behind the scenes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012691
text: I'm wounded myself...{nl}But I'm more worried about the condition the other priests are in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012692
text: I brought some potions and bandages in case something like this happened...{nl}But I had to leave them behind since we were chased by the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012693
text: I know it's a lot to ask, but you're the only one that can help.{nl}Could you find my medicine bags so I can cure the other priests?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012694
text: The wounds of the other priests are severe, including Priest Irma.{nl}I brought potions and bandages just in case, but since we were chased by demons...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012695
text: I am reluctant to ask the Revelator who has done so much but...{nl}Could you find my medicine bags so I can cure the other priests?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012696
text: I know it is blasphemous, but I had always had my doubts about the Revelator.{nl}But you've defeated Marnox, who all of the priests together couldn't handle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012697
text: Now I know.{nl}Only you, who has been sent by the goddesses can really save the world...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012698
text: Thank you so much for saving my colleagues.{nl}You ran in even though you knew that there were demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012699
text: Hmm... Rose is really late.{nl}Should we wait a little bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012700
text: Not all priests can heal by miraculous powers.{nl}We have to put a stick next to the broken part and get medicine for the injury.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012701
text: I do feel uncomfortable for the words I have used.{nl}Rose is still out and I am a bit worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012702
text: What happened to the people of the Croa Village?{nl}And why are there demons here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012703
text: The last time I have visited here, there was no sight of a demon.. {nl}I am worried something awful has happened.{nl}Have you heard anything about this situation?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012704
text: Thank you for getting me my missing bag.{nl}Right after I heal myself I have to go to the other priests.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012705
text: Rose is late... far too late.{nl}They say no news is good news, but this is not the time.{nl}What should we do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012706
text: Has Tess been chased by the demons just like other people?{nl}I have no idea what happened here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012707
text: All the idols that can be destroyed have been destroyed but it was a rushed job...{nl}I am still hung up about the fragments left behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012708
text: The fragments could come back to bite us in the back, if not its energy remains.{nl}I am terribly sorry about this but could you take care of the remaining pieces?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012709
text: I am grateful for your kindness.{nl}Wait for a second for I will give you a piece of cloth soaked with Holy Water.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012710
text: Cover the Idol Fragments with this Holy Water Cloth and it will be purified.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012711
text: One less thing to worry about.{nl}Restoring this place will not be an easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012712
text: Along with the bishop, we destroyed all the idols we could get our hands on {nl}while on the run from Marnox's chase.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012713
text: If you don't deal with the fragments, its malicious energy will come back to haunt us again.{nl}I'm sure you must be tired and weary on this journey, {nl}but could we ask for an undeserved request?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012714
text: First, show me what you got.{nl}I guess, defeating Red Kepas and Woodins, 10 each at the Paupys Crossing would suffice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012715
text: It's heart-wrenching to see those who have fled their home to here.{nl}If only they learnt the ways of the Highlander's sword.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012716
text: I, as the Highlander Submaster, am helping the immigrants the best I can...{nl}I am worried if the migration orders aren't a big burden to the lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012717
text: Are you the one willing to walk the path of a Highlander?{nl}A test awaits you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012718
text: Those without the necessary talents should waste no breath.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012719
text: The main weapon of a Highlander is a two-handed sword.{nl}It's a powerful weapon but it does require great strength to wield one.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012720
text: Now try to attack the sword pell nearby.{nl}I will see how strong you are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012721
text: Now try to attack the sword pell nearby.{nl}And I will make the call.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012722
text: Hmm... You're a bit lacking.{nl}A further test is in order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012723
text: But your strength itself is quite impressive, to be honest.{nl}But mere brute force is not enough. The finesse is the key to handle it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012724
text: Defeating Woodins at Paupys Crossing, for you, would not be too much to ask, would it?{nl}Defeat them and I will let you in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012725
text: It's not that difficult as a test.{nl}If you can handle your own strength, that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012726
text: You look like someone who will not tarnish the name of Highlander.{nl}My father, also a Highlander, before me will say the same.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012727
text: I, on behalf of my master, will teach you the path of the Highlander.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012728
text: Do you desire to become a Peltasta?{nl}You made a wise choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012729
text: We, Peltastas, have to know the way to utilize our shields properly to fend off enemies.{nl}Therefore, the basic understanding of a shield is a prerequisite.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012730
text: I want you to get me some materials to make a shield.{nl}If you can do this, I will consider worthy enough to be a Peltasta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012731
text: Defeat Pokuborns in the Woods of the Linked Bridges and retrieve Pokuborn Tusks.{nl}Oh, and one more thing...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012732
text: Get me some dry wood from the abandoned workshop at the Paupys Crossing.{nl}It belonged to our trading partner but it went out of business. {nl}The owner did say we can take as much as we please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012733
text: Learn the structure of a shield to utilize it efficiently.{nl}I'll wait for your return.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012734
text: Ah, those who aim to become a Peltasta never disappoint me.{nl}You're done, congratulations on becoming one of us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012735
text: We always welcome a new brethren.{nl}Could we ask you to help the people here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012736
text: The monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges are causing terrors to the nearby village.{nl}I would have gone myself but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012737
text: The masters in Klaipeda insisted that I should not leave Orsha.{nl}So, if you want to prove your worth, this is your chance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012738
text: Don't think of it only as a mission...{nl}But think of it as punishment on those monsters terrorising the people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012739
text: The road to giving yourself up to the goddess is a noble one. {nl}I commend you for choosing this path.{nl}However, a test to see if you can become a Krivis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012740
text: Good. This test is quite simple.{nl}But first, take this Torch Gem.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012741
text: This gem will absorb the life force of a monster and store it as its energy.{nl}Fill this gem with the vitality of the monsters and come back to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012742
text: Once the gem is filled with energy. Use it on the flameholder besides me.{nl}What I am looking for is how well can you handle the energy of Torch's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012743
text: Let's recap. Defeat the monster and fill the gem up.{nl}Use the energy to light the flameholder beside me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012744
text: Your determined eyes do tell me that you are seeking the way of Priesthood.{nl}I can clearly see not only the will but the talent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012745
text: However... A bit of preparation is needed.{nl}To prepare for the journey to completely give yourself up to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012746
text: Take this Holy Water.{nl}Ask the other Cleric Masters for their blessings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012747
text: One each from the Cleric, Krivis and Bokor Submasters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012748
text: Please, do seek the blessings from the Cleric, Krivis and Bokor Submasters in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012749
text: Good. The blessings from the ensure your rightful path.{nl}Please, take the duty and responsibility of being a Priest earnestly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012750
text: Hmm, you look for a step forward into something higher?{nl}Seeking power is a rough journey.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012751
text: But does your pounding heart command you still?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012752
text: Very well. I take that as yes.{nl}Sweep the Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012753
text: Ten-odd Gosarus won't cut it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012754
text: You talk the talk and walk the walk.{nl}I, on behalf of my master, will hand you all the skills of a Swordsman.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012755
text: I want to see how much you have trained yourself as a Highlander.{nl}The Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle would serve quite nicely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012756
text: Training comes later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012757
text: The goal is simple.{nl}Sweep the Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012758
text: Impressive.{nl}I will keep my end of the bargain to teach you more advanced skills of a Highlander.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012759
text: Before we commence, testing whether you can go through the training or not would be in order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012760
text: Now, let me give you this counter. Use it while defeating monsters.{nl}As you defeat them, the number will go up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012761
text: Oh, it won't count if you do it without equipping a shield.{nl}I'll count it as double if you defeat a demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012762
text: Just remember... You'll have to start from the beginning if you become incapacitated.{nl}I will not accept any results that come from working with colleagues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012763
text: Do you understand?{nl}Well then, good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012764
text: It'll be worth testing only if you use a shield, don't you think?{nl}Don't forget that dealing with demons is more efficient.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012765
text: I think that you've proven that you are worthy of saying that you are a Peltasta.{nl}As promised, I'll teach you more advanced skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012766
text: Hoplites use shields and spears. {nl}There is a great difference from using a sword.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012767
text: I wish to test if being a Hoplite suits you.{nl}As it happens, there is a good place to test volunteers like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012768
text: Deal with the Raffly in Dadan Jungle.{nl}I'll acknowledge the fact that you are skilled enough to handle a spear if you pass the test.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012769
text: I think that you'll have no trouble in passing the test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012770
text: If you have trouble dealing with Raffly, you may want to consider an alternate career path.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012771
text: The spear is a weapon that is easy to use, but difficult to master.{nl}I hope that you will keep this in mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012772
text: The giant tree was a terrible catastrophe. {nl}The same goes to the monsters. I admit that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012773
text: But the excessive chaos that followed was on the hands of the leaders.{nl}If Medzio Diena had happened where I came from, it would not have come to this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012774
text: I see some people like you who wish to settle down this chaos.{nl}That's one of the few strengths of this kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012775
text: You want to become a Barbarian? {nl}As a weakling from these parts, do you think that you have what it takes?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012776
text: Good. I'll give you a simple task to see if you can at least imitate combat.{nl}Even children can do this where I came from. Do you want to try?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012777
text: Belligerence is the most important virtue of a warrior.{nl}Attack everything that is a threat to you and defend those that you wish to protect.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012778
text: Go and deal with the Gosaru in Dadan Jungle before you return.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012779
text: I thought you had some guts since you wanted to become a Barbarian... {nl}Are you giving up?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012780
text: Did you hear the news?{nl}Some refugees on the way to Orsha have been isolated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012781
text: They are also wounded as well. {nl}Lemprasa Pond won't have any proper relief facilities either...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012782
text: We must save them at once!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012783
text: I shall bless the Special Orsha Ointment.{nl}Please cure the refugees with it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012784
text: I shall acknowledge you as a proper Cleric once you've helped clear this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012785
text: I am grateful that they didn't have any further troubles.{nl}It's all thanks to your quick actions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012786
text: I think that your are well prepared to go forth to the last stage of becoming a Cleric.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012787
text: I think the time has come for you to prove your faith to the goddesses and receive their blessings.{nl}Worshiping the Goddess Statues is a rite of passage to reach out to the goddesses themselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012788
text: Please make offerings to all Goddess Statues near Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012789
text: Lemprasa Pond and Woods of the Linked Bridges... {nl}Not to mention the four statues at Paupys Crossing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012790
text: Don't forget to come back to me after you've made your offerings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012791
text: It is not simply a formality for votive offerings.{nl}I hope that it shall be a chance for you to repent for any past deeds in front of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012792
text: You've done well. {nl}Did the Goddess Statue seem to have any broken parts?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012793
text: I shall help you advance your skills even further.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012794
text: I've been looking after the refugees at Orsha with the other priests.{nl}But... We've run out of herbs to craft ointment with.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012795
text: I'll give you a small task since it is about time to test your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012796
text: The herbs that I need to craft the ointment are {nl}Wormwood, Hemostasis Herb, and Moonlight Flower.{nl}You can gather them at Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012797
text: Well then, I hope that you will able to help out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012798
text: I'll craft the ointment as soon as you gather the three herbs.{nl}I hope that you do not forget servitude even though it is a test of passage.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012799
text: Let's see... Hmm. There seems to be no problem.{nl}You will feel your faith become stronger if you continue performing kind deeds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012800
text: You've passed the test. {nl}Please don't forget that faithfulness shall become your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012801
text: The Bokor...{nl}It is not a difficult path in itself, but it does require a ritual.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012802
text: The initiation of becoming a Bokor starts with crafting your own doll.{nl}As the master in Klaipeda says, you cannot achieve anything without doing it yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012803
text: I can provide you with the recipe if you need.{nl}But you'll have to collect the neccessary ingredients by yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012804
text: Check your journal for details on how to craft a doll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012805
text: I've heard that not only myself, but the master also became a Bokor by crafting a doll.{nl}It is a historic and traditoinal ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012806
text: That is a magnificent doll.{nl}Now, you are a respectable Bokor yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012807
text: I pray that the goddesses shall lead you safely on the path of the Bokor...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012808
text: Do you know about the owls carved from wood at Karolis Springs?{nl}They are the work of Grandfather Tesla.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012809
text: The goddesses grant their blessings to statues that you put your heart into sculpting.{nl}I still have a long way to go before I catch up to Grandfather Tesla in Klaipeda...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012810
text: You wish to become a Dievdirbys? {nl}I welcome you, of course. It's not that difficult.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012811
text: The road to becoming a Dievdirbys is open to everyone.{nl}If... you can do me a small favor that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012812
text: My chisel is all worn out.{nl}I think I'll have to make a request to Ilanai, the blacksmith in Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012813
text: Ilanai will give you a new chisel if you say that it's a request from me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012814
text: I'm sorry. Could you make the trip to Orsha for me?{nl}I have something left to do here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012815
text: How can I help you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012816
text: Ah, I know Zenoa very well myself. {nl}You're talking about that cute Dievdirbys right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012817
text: I'm sorry, but...{nl}I don't have any chisels prepared, and I'm fresh out of materials to make new ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012818
text: I'm sorry, is it very urgent?{nl}Hmm.. I think I might be able to help out if you bring me the ingredients.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012819
text: You can obtain high quality metals from the Grummers at Dadan Jungle.{nl}I'll do it before anything else if you can get me some of those metals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012820
text: I don't know what the Grummers eat but... {nl}High quality metals form like pearls inside them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012821
text: Well, it's all good for me I suppose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012822
text: You've already brought it back?{nl}I've got the preparations ready, so it'll be done soon enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012823
text: This time it will remain sharp for a long time since I've made it as strong as possible.{nl}Here, take this to Zenoa please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012824
text: Tell Zenoa to come by Orsha some day.{nl}That I really miss the company.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012825
text: Oh dear... {nl}I thought it was taking longer than expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012826
text: I thank you all the same.{nl}Come back any time and I'll be glad to teach you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012827
text: You've really become much better in a short period of time!{nl}I would be proud to show your skills to anybody else.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012828
text: I just think that it may be a bit short to meet the standards of my father in Klaipeda.{nl}I'll help you get to a higher stage in achievements.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012829
text: Good. Shall we check what you've learned so far?{nl}Defeat a monster with Highlander skills. It doesn't matter what monster you choose.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012830
text: Defeating them yourself is extremely important.{nl}Without the aid of any Highlander colleagues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012831
text: Defeat monsters using Highlander skills. {nl}I think it's an easy task considering that it's the last test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012832
text: It seems as if you'll be able to learn more difficult skills with ease.{nl}I'd feel confident when telling anyone that I was the one that taught you those moves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012833
text: You'll be able to deal with most demons with your skills.{nl}But you must become a bit stronger to defeat truly powerful demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012834
text: I shall open the road to becoming a true Peltasta.{nl}I'm sure that you'll have no trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012835
text: They say that a Chaparition is threatening people at Karolis Springs.{nl}I think that it will be fitting for a test of your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012836
text: The Chaparition should be an easy opponent considering the courage you've shown so far.{nl}Don't be too worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012837
text: Excellent.{nl}With skills like that, I'd trust you with my back any day.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012838
text: I'll report it to the master soon.{nl}I'll first teach you of the true powers of the Peltasta on my initiative.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012839
text: Your growth is simply astonishing.{nl}I feel something different from the other Hoplites.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012840
text: But are you satisfied with that?{nl}I think you can go for the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012841
text: There's a monster that I've previously faced.{nl}Sparnasman, I thought that I had him... But I lost him at the last moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012842
text: I've heard rumors that the Sparnasman has returned.{nl}I'm sure that you'll be able to finish him in my place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012843
text: Oh, and bring the tip of my spear as evidence that you've defeated him.{nl}It should still be stuck in him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012844
text: Please defeat the Sparnasman at Novaha Annes and bring the tip of my spear back to me.{nl}{nl}It was a long time ago, but the fight... was extremely fierce.{nl}I was tired and he also had steam rising from him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012845
text: I adjusted my grip on my spear thinking that it would be the killing blow.{nl}He finally came at me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012846
text: I thought I'd properly stabbed him... But he suddenly passed me and flew away. {nl}With my spear still in him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012847
text: I've let him go.{nl}Currently, I'd be able to deal with it in a single strike but...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012848
text: That is most certainly the tip of the spear I drove into it.{nl}I'll be able to brag that one of our capable Hoplites has defeated that nightmare.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012849
text: Come back at any time since you've passed the test.{nl}I am also ready to teach you more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012850
text: Hmm... You seem as if you've grown stronger.{nl}You may be worthy to learn more of the way of the sword since you've trained so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012851
text: Of course I can't simply let you know. {nl}Prove your strength first!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012852
text: Dealing with monsters at Feretory Hills is your test.{nl}But it must be done without enhancements. What use would the test be it them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012853
text: Of course the help of colleagues is excluded as well.{nl}Do you get it? Prove your worth with the might of your sword alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012854
text: Without colleagues. Without enhancements.{nl}It is a very easy and simple test.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012855
text: You. You're more useful than you look.{nl}The Master will be pleased that such talent has chosen to become a Barbarian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012856
text: We Rodelero attack enemies by blocking their view with shields and going for their blind spots.{nl}I'd say that such strategies will work the better your shield is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012857
text: Since it is still the introductory stage, let's start with bringing a shield that has been enhanced 4 times.{nl}I think that's cutting you enough slack, what do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012858
text: You have to equip a shield that has been enhanced 4 times at the very least.{nl}How did you even think of becoming a Rodelero without that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012859
text: Good. That is enough.{nl}I now welcome you as a fellow Rodelero.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012860
text: Cataphract... Not a bad choice.{nl}We bombard the enemies with attacks riding atop our companions while we charge through enemy lines.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012861
text: But simply looking nice and what acutally happens is never the same.{nl}It shall be a completely different route from what you've done. Do you think you're up for it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012862
text: Then how about we test your resolve?{nl}I shall acknowledge you if you have enough determination to deal with the demons at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012863
text: It is disconcerting to give you a truly difficult task if you keep requesting it after I threatened you.{nl}I think that Feretory Hills should be a suitable test for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012864
text: Impressive. {nl}I apologize for treating you lightly on first impression.{nl}My lessons are not to be taken lightly. I hope you are determined.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012865
text: The time has finally come.{nl}The Master at Klaipeda said that faithfulness is the strength of a Krivis.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012866
text: The master would have asked you to prove yourself through sparring... {nl}But I wish to test your skills through servitude.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012867
text: Please be cautious as this is the last test.{nl}Tell me when you are prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012868
text: They say that the monsters are swelling in numbers at {nl}Feretory Hills and are now threatening the people.{nl}Please purify the monsters with this gemstone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012869
text: It is not easy to purify by normal means.{nl}You'll have to tire the monsters a bit for it to have an effect.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012870
text: Please bring the purified ashes to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012871
text: I am thinking of it as a service to everyone.{nl}That seems to be fitting of a Krivis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012872
text: I ponder if such servitude is the mercy of the goddesses.{nl}Well done. Such posture shall lead you to greater stages.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012873
text: You wish to continue to follow the path of the goddesses burdened as a priest.{nl}If so, you may rise to a greater stage by defeating evils in this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012874
text: It is said that monsters at Feretory Hills are full of evil energy.{nl}Deal with them in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012875
text: You've now become a respectable Bokor.{nl}I wish to forsee your future as a colleague, not as a beginner.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012876
text: Please bring me the card of a powerful monster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012877
text: The master said that the cards that people choose are pre-determined...{nl}But it is beyond my ability to see what card you shall bring.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012878
text: Eternal flames, a women with wounds on her back, an upturned jewel...{nl}These are about all the words that I can make out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012879
text: Its interpretation is up to you.{nl}But it seems to me as if you have a greater mission, at variance from the common person.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012880
text: I shall pray for you to be able to finish your mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012881
text: Grandfather Tesla had always emphasized the importance of materials.{nl}Not simply rare and expensive materials, but materials that you will be able to put your heart into.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012882
text: I've recently had a chance to get such materials...{nl}But I simply could not get the chance to get them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012883
text: I'll teach you how to craft new statues if you bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012884
text: Look for Sparnasman in Novaha Annex.{nl}Its horns are the materials that I've been looking for so be careful please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012885
text: Grandfather Tesla said that he found them at the Crystal Mine.{nl}Those blue crystals were wonderful... but I wish to find some that suit me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012886
text: These are indeed the materials that I requested.{nl}Someday, you shall find materials that are to your liking as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012887
text: Now, as promised, I shall teach you to craft new statues.{nl}Come back to me at any time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012888
text: The path of the Sadhu...{nl}So you seek to go down a difficult path.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012889
text: Very well. Though it is hard for me to properly test you as I am currently out of body.{nl}I shall do so in my own way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012890
text: I shall give you a materialized crystal of my energy.{nl}My task is for you to deal with monsters after injecting them with my energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012891
text: I shall purify the monster's souls that you bring me with pure energy.{nl}But, the monsters must be dealt by yourself without the help of others.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012892
text: My body? It is at Akmens Ridge.{nl}You shall be able to send your spirit as far as I can once you've trained as much as I have.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012893
text: But it is a stage that must be achieved... {nl}Slowly step by step through intense training.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012894
text: You've done admirably even if it was a simple test.{nl}I shall look forward to your growth.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012895
text: The strength to fight against the evil demons comes from one's devout faith in the goddesses.{nl}If you wish to become one of us, you must prove your strength to back up your faith.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012896
text: Good. Now shall we put you to the test?{nl}Report back after you've dealt with all of the monsters at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012897
text: We Paladins are always on front lines of the fight with demons.{nl}You won't be able to stay alive for long if you are not skilled even if you do have a rightous heart.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012898
text: You've done better than any of my expectations.{nl}Now vow to fight for the goddesses as a paladin for your faith and justice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012899
text: Are you planning on passing through Delmore Castle?{nl}If you do, I suggest turning around immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012900
text: This is a place that has become a den of demons because of the lord of the castle.{nl}We have gathered here... because he is once more attempting to do the same horrible deeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012901
text: Never... Never again shall we allow the same thing to happen.{nl}I am ashamed of myself... but if this can be any form of retribution...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012902
text: This is a place that has become a den of demons because of the lord of the castle.{nl}We should have discovered the true identity of the Kruvina earlier...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012903
text: Maybe if you were a Revelator...{nl}Anyway, I've warned you enough so you should return to where it's safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012904
text: You're a Revelator as well?{nl}Hmm... If that's true...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012905
text: We've gathered here to stop Delmore Rephaim, the lord of Delmore Castle.{nl}All because he's trying to create another Kruvina.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012906
text: Oh, do you know about the Kruvina?{nl}The demon's plan to use the spores of death to invade Orsha...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012907
text: The Kruvina crafted by Delmore Rephaim is the center piece of that plan...{nl}Which can also exhibit tremendous strength depending on how it is used.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012908
text: Delmore Rephaim was once a revered lord and established alchemist...{nl}But he touched upon forbidden alchemy by conspiring with the demons. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012909
text: That's how the pinnacle of demon magic and human technology was created.{nl}That creation is known as the Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012910
text: I was once a mage under Delmore Rephaim as well.{nl}But I ran after seeing him create the Kruvina, which simply made me feel sick.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012911
text: I should have stopped its creation... But I was a coward back then.{nl}Delmore Rephaim is trying to build that Kruvina once more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012912
text: Such terrible events... must not be allowed to happen again.{nl}That's why we've gathered the Revelators from Klaipeda and brought them here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012913
