text: I'd say the more the merrier.{nl}How about lending a hand in stopping him since you're a Revelator as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012914
text: It's a relief to have your cooperation.{nl}Oh, we were just about to destroy the Magic Power Supply Devices {nl}supplying the Kruvina Devices with power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012915
text: The device is protected by a powerful protection spell...{nl}They've cast it on ordinary items to obscure the spell.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012916
text: I'll mark the places where I predict they may be, so take this compass with you.{nl}It's a compass that reacts to magic, so I'm sure it'll react to the spells.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012917
text: Delmore Rephaim had great ambitions.{nl}It would have been much better if that was merely a lust for power...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012918
text: Above Amjene Sanctum and... Hmm. I see. Good job. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012919
text: To sustain such an enormous magic circle, Delmore Rephaim...{nl}He placed numerous Magic Power Supply Devices {nl}around the castle as well as at the Kruvina Device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012920
text: Creating a large magic circle by oneself is simply impossible, no matter how talented you are.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012921
text: Oh, I see some introductions are in order. {nl}The person next to me is Revelator Mihail.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012922
text: I'm a Revelator just like you.{nl}How about talking to Mihail while I interpret the protection spells?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012923
text: Impressive.{nl}I've searched for protection spell as well, but I wasn't that fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012924
text: I couldn't believe what Melchioras was saying at first.{nl}But just look at the castle. I realized the severity of the situation soon enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012925
text: I don't know too much about magic, but this is still the largest magic circle I've seen.{nl}You don't know what I'm talking about do you? I mean that the entire castle is a magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012926
text: Greetings. Have you come from Orsha?{nl}I thought there weren't any Revelators there... We've all come from Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012927
text: I've seen many places destroyed by the roots on Medzio Diena...{nl}But the scene here is a bit different.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012928
text: It seems as if they've all been ripped off the face of the world at the same time.{nl}Not just the residents, but even all the soldiers and vassals...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012929
text: Mage Melchioras seems to be taking a while to disarm the protective spell.{nl}How about we get prepared for the next move while he's at it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012930
text: It seems that we get along well.{nl}We've destroyed all the other Magic Power Supply Devices... {nl}The only one left is the one that Mage Melchioras is working on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012931
text: We have to destroy it with magic orbs when Mage Melchioras disarms the protection spell...{nl}But we don't have many left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012932
text: I'll get the detonator ready, so why don't you fill the empty orbs with magic?{nl}The orb will gather magic every time you attack Pags.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012933
text: When I first arrived at Klaipeda... {nl}There were an incredible amount of Revelators gathered there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012934
text: Those people, what do you think they're doing now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012935
text: It's taking a while to interpret the protection spell cast on the Magic Power Supply Devices.{nl}Could you wait a little more until I've finished?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012936
text: That was quick.{nl}It seems as if Melchioras has finished his preparations as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012937
text: Why don't you go to Mage Melchioras?{nl}I know what's going on, but you might want some explanation seeing as you've just arrived here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012938
text: One day, the goddess appeared in my dreams telling me {nl}that I am a Revelator and that I must go to Klaipeda.{nl}Saying that only Revelators can save the world...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012939
text: At first, I was at a loss of what to do, and I was here before I knew it.{nl} Then, it came to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012940
text: The fact that... Everything I did was linked to saving the goddesses and the world.{nl}Perhaps the goddesses sent so many Revelators for that same reason?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012941
text: I've finished interpreting the protection spell cast on the Magic Power Supply Devices.{nl}We'll need your help in order to get the job done in a hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012942
text: I'll give you this amulet.{nl}The protection spell will be disarmed when you put it on the enchanted object.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012943
text: You take care of the protection spell above Amjene Sanctum.{nl}Mihail and I will take care of the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012944
text: We won't have to come back here if we destroy the last Magic Power Supply Device.{nl}It won't take too long to stop the entire Kruvina Device either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012945
text: There were many mages under the command of Delmore Rephaim just like me.{nl}We were all in charge of separate specializations so interpreting this will take a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012946
text: I was in charge of the core of the Kruvina device.{nl} I thought that there was something wrong...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012947
text: I was in charge of the core of the Kruvina device.{nl}I thought that there was something wrong...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012948
text: You've done well. {nl}All we have to do is destroy the Magic Power Supply Device since the protective spells are gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012949
text: The rest of the protective spells have been taken care of.{nl}Now it's my turn.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012950
text: I'm sure you've heard of the orbs from Mihail.{nl}Please set them around the Magic Power Supply Device at Ishinti Crossroads.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012951
text: Please go to Mihail as soon as the orbs are in place.{nl}He'll detonate the orbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012952
text: It's strange how well everything seems to be going.{nl}I'm sure that Delmore Rephaim is creating the Kruvina somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012953
text: I've tuned it so that the device will be destroyed with the smallest explosion possible...{nl}But run away from the orbs just in case you don't get caught in the explosion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012954
text: Demolitions are my speciality.{nl}Destroying a device like that is nothing as long as I get to plant the explosives right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012955
text: Please let Mihail know that the orbs are ready.{nl}I hope everything goes as planned...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012956
text: It's a success!{nl}Both you and Mihail did a great job.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012957
text: The Kruvina device will soon stop since all of the {nl}Magic Power Supply Devices have been destroyed.{nl}The protective shield will disappear as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012958
text: We cannot simply relax because the device has stopped.{nl}We must destroy it so that they can never think of creating the Kruvina ever again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012959
text: Come to Delmore Manor where the device is.{nl}I'll be waiting there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012960
text: Follower Andrea

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012961
text: I hoped it would be migration suggestions... But somehow I don't think it is.{nl}Where are all the soldiers and vassals, not to mention the residents?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012962
text: We're helping the Revelators from behind the scenes.{nl}But we never knew there would be so many demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012963
text: This place... is terrible.{nl}I've seen many ruins but, this place seems to be on a league of its own.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012964
text: Ah, I may not be a Revelator... But I volunteered to help.{nl}I'm trying to collect information on demons, but it seems as if I took it too lightly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012965
text: Oh, would you be okay in doing so?{nl}If so, I won't say no.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012966
text: I've collected all the other information... but I need some about the Pag Ampler.{nl}Just tell me how you've dealt with them after defeating them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012967
text: You could tell us now if you already know enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012968
text: We're trying to lessen the burden when the Revelators are dealing with demons.{nl}Please do your best to collect information even if it is a bit tiresome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012969
text: You've been a big help.{nl}I'm going to have to tell the other Revelators about your deeds when I'm explaining to the others.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012970
text: Before I came here, I was asked a favor from a person {nl}who said that they had relatives in Delmore Castle.{nl}They asked me to give their regards since they'd lost contact for a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012971
text: But... As you can see...{nl}Who knew this would have happened...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012972
text: I was trying to give him the remaining pages of the diary...{nl}But I wasn't able to make the time because things kept coming up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012973
text: Thank you so much.{nl}He says his name is Ardel and he lived at the Old Bazaar Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012974
text: I've heard snippets of information on the Delmore Castle.{nl}But I don't know how it became like this. Melchioras keeps saving his breath...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012975
text: I don't know how to thank you.{nl}I'll remember to hand this back to you if we manage to get back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012976
text: Follower Nuodas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012977
text: What do you have to do to make that many people disappear?{nl}It is creepy how all the household belongings and other things are left as they are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012978
text: I've heard many stories of losing hometowns because of monsters or demons after Medzio Diena.{nl}But this is different. It seems as if something was ripped out of the castle whole...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012979
text: This was the next most thriving castle after Orsha.{nl}But the fact that such a place could become like this in an instant...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012980
text: It's unfortunate what happened to the missing people, but there is nothing we can do.{nl}All we can do is to keep getting rid of those accursed demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012981
text: How about helping out?{nl}I think that's one way of comforting the people that used to live here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012982
text: Thank you.{nl}Could you deal with the demons nearby please?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012983
text: I feel terrible.{nl}Only a year ago, it was still pretty intact despite Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012984
text: But now...{nl}Maybe where we live isn't safe anymore either.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012985
text: I hope that this will comfort them a little.{nl}There are still many demons, but we will be able to defeat all of them one day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012986
text: I felt as if the Revelator and the followers pulled their weight.{nl}Their archery skill was quite impressive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012987
text: But as a fletcher, I think that they waste too many arrows...{nl}They don't think of aiming for the weak spots and just pour arrows into a single demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012988
text: There are more than a few Charcoal Walkers wondering about with usable arrows.{nl}Could you gather those arrows after dealing with those demons?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012989
text: The more the world is in chaos, the more thrifty you should be.{nl}Please, I ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012990
text: There are many followers besides me that are helping you.{nl}Please help them if you see them and don't just pass by.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012991
text: There is now way I am wrong. I've designed it after all...{nl}If there is even a faint chance of that, I can only imagine that there is a new magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012992
text: Making a Magic Power Supply Device Kruvina is impossible.{nl}I am sure that there is another Supply Device hidden somewhere forming another magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012993
text: Oh... Did you see it all?{nl}It's all my fault.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012994
text: Delmore Rephaim is not a shabby person...{nl}Even Revelator Mihail received the same treatment because of me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012995
text: We can't just give up like this.{nl}Somehow we have to find a way to neutralize the Magic Power Supply Device!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012996
text: It's true that Melchioras made a mistake, but Yane was too rash this time.{nl}It would be fine if Yane has a good solution... but this doesn't feel good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012997
text: There are always followers of Yane gathering near her.{nl}Yane is determined and reliable... But is also hasty.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012998
text: Thinking that it would be the same situation as when I ran was a mistake.{nl}I'm sure that there's a hidden Magic Power Supply Device somewhere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_012999
text: You... There is something else I wish to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013000
text: If my calculations are correct, it should be somewhere in the Rampart Reconstruction District...{nl}Head over there with this crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013001
text: You'll be able to find the Magic Power Supply Device when you put this crystal on the floor.{nl}I'll be notified when one is discovered and send Revelator Mihail to take care of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013002
text: There will be no second mistake.{nl}I'm positive that my calculations are correct.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013003
text: There is a need to divide tasks in order to get things done in a hurry.{nl}I'll take care of the Magic Power Supply Device when you find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013004
text: Revelator Mihail has gone to take care of the Magic Power Supply Device.{nl}But... There seems to be a few new Supply Devices...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013005
text: Evil energy is continuing to flow in... near the Buried Central Plaza.{nl}I didn't sense it a while ago, but why...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013006
text: Take these jewels please.{nl}I am a bit suspicious but there is just no other way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013007
text: I know it may sound like an excuse... But it's just too strange.{nl}There's no way I am wrong...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013008
text: I think things are going in a bad direction.{nl}I... I'm sorry. I'll keep concentrating.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013009
text: So there was no Magic Power Supply Device, only a horde of monsters?{nl}That's odd... I'm sorry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013010
text: I must have been a little confused earlier.{nl}Next time I'll try to pay more attention so I don't give you any wrong information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013011
text: This time I'm sure.{nl}Please... Will you go to the Handicraft Workshop once again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013012
text: What?{nl}You say Yane found a new way to do it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013013
text: How does that even...{nl}Can you share any more details?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013014
text: She found it in Delmore Rephaim's document...?{nl}What kind of person writes down the way to destroy their own device?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013015
text: This has to be a trap.{nl}We need to stop Yane before it's too late!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013016
text: So everyone gathers around the device and attacks at the same time?{nl}Are you sure...? I really don't think that's the way to destroy it!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013017
text: Now I know. I realize what went wrong...{nl}Delmore Rephaim was watching us all the entire time!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013018
text: Whatever we do we can't gather by the device!{nl}We need to stop Yane, quick!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013019
text: This Kruvina... it's made using human lives!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013020
text: Melchioras, did you say... human lives?{nl}Oh no, we need to do something!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013021
text: I'll go first and try to talk to her.{nl}You and Melchioras, come with me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013022
text: If the device is activated, the Revelators will all turn into Kruvina!{nl}We need to go to Palma Central Plaza right now and stop Yane!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013023
text: You're... the one who helped Melchioras.{nl}I really don't know what to say to him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013024
text: I should have believed him right away...{nl}But I guess I was too greedy...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013025
text: I don't know if he'll ever accept my apologies...{nl}But rescuing him is the least I can do to try and redeem myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013026
text: I also thought at first that Melchioras was leading us into a trap...{nl}I really don't know how I'll ever be able to face him now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013027
text: We should set up a base camp to help Melchioras heal.{nl}That way he'll be safe when he comes back... Let's hope he does...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013028
text: Everything else is fine, but the barricade is going to be a problem.{nl}There aren't enough materials around to build one, {nl}and we can't tear down another barricade to make our own...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013029
text: And after the Kruvina device, my condition isn't the best either...{nl}If that's okay with you, will you help us set up the barricade?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013030
text: I think I saw some crates on the way to the Handicraft Workshop and on the Kalbos Vacant Lot.{nl}Try and find some wooden boards there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013031
text: It's hard to believe, honestly.{nl}We barely managed to destroy the Magic Power Supply Device, but if that was all in vain...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013032
text: But the fact is, this was our fault.{nl}How are we ever going to face Melchioras again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013033
text: Wow, that's... Thank you so much.{nl}I should go and pray to the goddesses for Melchioras to come back safe and sound.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013034
text: Thanks to Melchioras I'm alive...{nl}I feel so sorry to him, but all I can do now is prepare for{nl}his return so we can nurse him back to health in safety...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013035
text: There are way too many demons!{nl}And my condition isn't really... Will you please help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013036
text: If I knew what kind of place this was I would've thought twice about coming.{nl}But Melchioras... he came back here knowing what this was.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013037
text: Everyone feels so sorry for Melchioras.{nl}I don't even know how to apologize to him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013038
text: You're... close to Melchioras, right?{nl}It would be great if you could let him know we're sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013039
text: Follower Wedge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013040
text: When the magic circle was activated it felt as if a hand was pulling on my spirit.{nl}Not an experience I'd like to repeat.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013041
text: I knew this would happen.{nl}If Melchioras was really trying to trick us he would've taken us to the device right away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013042
text: I'm going to make some medicine for when Melchioras returns...{nl}Would you please give me a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013043
text: There's a type of mushroom called Thorn Mushroom.{nl}It helps people with serious injuries regain their health.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013044
text: They're the only type of mushroom that grows on the Kalbos Vacant Lot {nl}and the Buried Central Plaza...{nl}I'm sure they'll be easy to find.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013045
text: If Melchioras doesn't make it...{nl}I can hardly imagine how guilty we'll feel, not just Yane but all of us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013046
text: Everyone was really unfair to Melchioras.{nl}I have no excuse either. I should have listened to him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013047
text: Anyway, thanks for the mushrooms.{nl}I hope I get to give this medicine to Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013048
text: Melchioras is truly an honorable man.{nl}He did after all sacrifice himself for the people who vilified him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013049
text: We have many injured, and there's monsters and demons everywhere.{nl}If we can't wipe them all out, our best bet is to chase away the monsters as much as we can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013050
text: I'm sorry, but could you collect some Charog sap?{nl}I want to make a monster repellant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013051
text: The people who lived here... they must have all been turned into Kruvina.{nl}I wish Melchioras had told us everything from the beginning...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013052
text: It's time to roll up our sleeves now.{nl}There is something we used to do in my hometown, {nl}except we had demons there, not monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013053
text: I think Delmore Rephaim is planning to use Melchioras as a shield.{nl}We should hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013054
text: I'm mostly worried about Melchioras.{nl}Delmore Rephaim... if we leave him be he's just going to try and make another Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013055
text: Revelator Connor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013056
text: Delmore Rephaim...{nl}Seeing how he made the Kruvina, he's not someone we should underestimate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013057
text: Everyone is... in their worst condition...{nl}But we're willing to do anything to rescue Melchioras and stop Delmore Rephaim.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013058
text: The crossroads start here. I think it's best if we split into groups and surround him.{nl}He'll be more intimidated once he realizes he has nowhere to escape.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013059
text: Connor and I will head to Tagika Crossroads.{nl}You and Mihail take the Outskirts Central Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013060
text: He may be on the run, but don't forget Delmore Rephaim is a talented alchemist.{nl}Not to mention he can be very persuasive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013061
text: We don't know what kind of trap he has prepared, so be very careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013062
text: We're getting closer to him on both sides of the crossroads.{nl}He'll be more intimidated once he realizes he has nowhere to escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013063
text: Mihail is waiting.{nl}Are you ready yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013064
text: I pray for the chance to redeem myself...{nl}May the goddesses protect Melchioras...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013065
text: You take the bottom area.{nl}If one side fails, the other needs to step up and support right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013066
text: That was a really tough enchantment.{nl}I wonder how Yane did in Tagika Crossroads...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013067
text: I... I feel completely sick to my stomach.{nl}My whole body feels terrible after being around that Kruvina device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013068
text: And Yane... She's too proud to admit she was affected...{nl}But she was close to the device, she probably has it way worse than me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013069
text: I'm worried she may have already got to Delmore Rephaim.{nl}Let's go down and find her.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013070
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}I could've done more if only my condition was better...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013071
text: We saw a strange light on the way to a street near the ruins.{nl}We ran to it but we got caught up in the enchantment.{nl}Connor's injuries seem worse than mine, he should rest here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013072
text: I could've done more if only my condition was better... Clearly I need to train more.{nl}Let's go. I saw a strange light by a street near the ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013073
text: I'm already exhausted, but I can't stop.{nl}Rescuing Melchioras is more important than my condition right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013074
text: To think he set up all these enchantments in the short time he ran away...{nl}Do we even have a chance to catch up to Delmore Rephaim?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013075
text: A light in Government Ruins...{nl}It feels odd somehow. What if something happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013076
text: That lousy enchantment...{nl}We shouldn't be wasting time here...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013077
text: I... I think my injuries are too serious.{nl}You'll have to fight Delmore Rephaim on my behalf...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013078
text: Everyone else should move now.{nl}It's just over the obstacle. Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013079
text: This altar...{nl}It's just another one of Delmore Rephaim's dirty tricks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013080
text: The altar is absorbing Melchioras' spirit.{nl}He did this because he knew we weren't just going to let it happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013081
text: I can't be stubborn anymore.{nl}Everything that happened was because of me...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013082
text: I'll take care of Melchioras, you go and chase Delmore Rephaim.{nl}And please... come back safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013083
text: Fortunately Melchioras is still breathing.{nl}It could have been worse had we arrived later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013084
text: To think he resorted to something so low...{nl}It's getting late. We should hurry now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013085
text: I'm a Sadhu now, but I used to train with the Bokor Master.{nl}I made a shaman doll back then, if only I could put that in Melchioras' place right now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013086
text: It's not impossible, though.{nl}Let me give you my shaman doll; defeat some demons and collect their spirits here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013087
text: When you become a Bokor you start by making your own shaman doll.{nl}I just never thought I'd be using mine to save a life...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013088
text: Yane's suggestion sounds dangerous, but... I think we have no choice.{nl}I say we try that first while I try and think of other solutions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013089
text: Thank you for saving me but...{nl}Right now you need to focus on... Delmore Rephaim...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013090
text: Hurry and find him... He's at the Odaginkas Vacant Lot...{nl}You have to stop him...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013091
text: I'm... losing my senses now...{nl}I'm sorry... for keeping you behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013092
text: Yane, stop being stubborn and take care of Melchioras.{nl}You're in worse condition than all of us, you should stay.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013093
text: We're lagging behind.{nl}Let's hurry and head to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013094
text: It's over!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013095
text: What happened to Delmore Rephaim?{nl}What was all that light and the ground shaking...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013096
text: Is that so...? So he had the end he deserved.{nl}I just don't know if this can appease all the Delmore Castle {nl}residents that are now with the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013097
text: Delmore Rephaim is gone but... I'm still worried about Melchioras.{nl}Shall we go back now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013098
text: What... what happened to Delmore Rephaim?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013099
text: I see...{nl}I guess it went as expected from him then...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013100
text: Right before he escaped he seemed almost addicted to forbidden knowledge, you see.{nl}As if there was nothing that could stop him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013101
text: And I followed him, knowing full well he was an ally of the demons.{nl}But there was no match for his character, his thirst for knowledge.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013102
text: When I found out he was going to use the people of Delmore Castle to make the Kruvina...{nl}Yes, had I been able to stop him then, everyone would have been saved...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013103
text: The reason I gathered the Revelators and came back here...{nl}Wasn't just to clear my conscience for not saving all those people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013104
text: The Kruvina spore plan was going to happen at the Pelke Shrine Ruins...{nl}The rest of the spirits must have been sent to Letas Stream to be offered to the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013105
text: The Kruvina is capable of much more horrendous deeds...{nl}Now the demons are going to try and create an even stronger one.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013106
text: The new Kruvina won't use humans, but a source of sacred power...{nl}The goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013107
text: That's why they have to be stopped. I didn't realize it at first but...{nl}I feel in you a power that is different from other Revelators.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013108
text: The only hope I have left is on you.{nl}Please, go to Seir Rainforest... put a stop to the demons' plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013109
text: Melchioras has managed to regain his consciousness.{nl}Was it the work of the goddesses...? I'm so glad he's alive...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013110
text: Melchioras regained his consciousness while we were fighting, it seems.{nl}I'm glad everything is going to be alright now. I really am.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013111
text: Melchioras was asking for you the whole time.{nl}I don't even know what to say, I'm so glad everything ended well...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013112
text: I hoped I could be the one to catch Delmore Rephaim...{nl}But I'm glad it turned out well. If only I wasn't hurt...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013113
text: Chasing away the demons, rebuilding the walls...{nl}I wonder how long it will take to make Delmore Castle a place worth living again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013114
text: The demons are going to try and make an even stronger Kruvina.{nl}The new Kruvina won't run on humans, but on a source of divine power... the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013115
text: I... I feel in you a power that's different from other Revelators.{nl}It makes me wonder if meeting you wasn't in fact the destiny granted to me by the goddesses...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013116
text: I think I might stay here for a while and repent.{nl}I just don't think I'll be able to move around much...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013117
text: Something is worrying me...{nl}You see, I didn't just make one Kruvina device. There were more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013118
text: They may be unfinished, but those devices are still out there.{nl}I was wondering if you could help me destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013119
text: Defeat some demons and collect their demonic power in this crystal.{nl}Once the crystal is full, insert it in the device. {nl}Its magic will collide with that of the device and destroy it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013120
text: Using the crystal depletes its magic, however, so you will have to fill it up again...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013121
text: When we were designing the Kruvina device...{nl}I had no idea it would be consuming the lives of the residents of Delmore Castle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013122
text: This was all due to my negligence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013123
text: Kruvina...{nl}I can never forgive myself for what happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013124
text: What worries me, though...{nl}Do you remember?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013125
text: We didn't completely destroy the Magic Power Supply Device at Delmore Manor.{nl}I'm not trying to blame Yane, but we need to do something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013126
text: We'll do it the same way as before.{nl}Defeat the demons and collect their power in the crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013127
text: Use the crystal on the Magic Power Supply Device to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013128
text: I'm really not trying to blame Yane but...{nl}I just want to make sure we do things right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013129
text: Thank you... so much.{nl}It should be impossible to create another Kruvina now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013130
text: I can't rid myself of my sins, nor can I take them back.{nl}All I can do is stay here and continue to repent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013131
text: Nothing guarantees there won't be another person like Delmore Rephaim in the future.{nl}Still, it's a pity what happened to Delmore Castle...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013132
text: Thank you so much for rescuing Melchioras.{nl}I don't know what would be the consequence of this guilt if he hadn't made it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013133
text: Thank you so much for rescuing Melchioras.{nl}I would not be able to handle the guilt if he hadn't made it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013134
text: I know this was all the work of Delmore Rephaim but...{nl}Without help from the demons it would have been impossible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013135
text: The only way is to nip the evil in the bud and destroy them all...{nl}But how? I can barely stand up right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013136
text: Would you please help me and clear out a few Pags?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013137
text: Monsters are a threat too, but not as much as demons.{nl}Still, I believe the day will come when all demons are eradicated from this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013138
text: I, too, did Melchioras wrong.{nl}I want to stay and help him for a little longer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013139
text: I have nothing but gratitude for you.{nl}I will pray to the goddesses, that they may protect your every step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013140
text: I met quite a lot of Revelators in Klaipeda.{nl}I don't know how to explain this feeling but... you're different, that's for sure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013141
text: Say what you will, but it was thanks to you that this all came to an end.{nl}I wonder if you're not on a different, more important mission than the rest of us...{nl}It's just what I think.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013142
text: Yane may have commited a serious mistake, but she's still my ally.{nl}I'm going to stay here with her for a while and help Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013143
text: Melchioras is safe now...{nl}And thanks to you, Delmore Rephaim was defeated, too. I'm glad it's all over.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013144
text: The problem now are the demons... They never seem to go away.{nl}Black Maizes are even carrying around magic amplifiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013145
text: Those amplifiers have given us a lot of trouble, {nl}but as a Sapper I can't help but take an interest in them.{nl}Would you collect some for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013146
text: It's hard to tell which ones have amplifiers.{nl}Just try and fight any Black Maizes that stand out to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013147
text: The demons here seem more... should I say human?{nl}I think they might have shared some techniques with Delmore Rephaim.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013148
text: Oh, thank you.{nl}I should be able to tweak this and make a more powerful bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013149
text: I heard the Order of the Tree of Truth had been blessed by the goddesses...{nl}But there's nothing but ghosts and monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013150
text: If you're staying in this graveyard, would you help me with something?{nl}I can't fight these ghosts, and the monsters come running in{nl}whenever they hear the sound of a prayer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013151
text: Would you take care of the monsters at the entrance?{nl}Meanwhile I'm going to pray and ask that the goddesses be found.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013152
text: Oh, you're back.{nl}Thanks to you my prayer wasn't disturbed by the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013153
text: But the dead have started to come back to life after they've come here.{nl}There can be no greater insult if it was done on purpose!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013154
text: I got hurt earlier while running away from the ghosts and it's hard to move around.{nl}Would you help me with something?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013155
text: Maybe because of Margiris' divine power...{nl}Sometimes the followers in Seima Stone Chamber do come back from the dead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013156
text: The followers who come back can't forget the regrets they had in life and wander here.{nl}Use this flint and grant them eternal peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013157
text: Thank you for your help so far.{nl}By the way, the spirit rock you filled up earlier... please take this to Margiris.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013158
text: Margiris is on the way to Carlyle's Mausoleum.{nl}With the spirit rock you should have no problems in joining our Order.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013159
text: Who are you?{nl}Oh, that's the spirit rock I gave Gintas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013160
text: I'm getting better now, I should be able to move again if I just rest for a while.{nl}Take care and see you again some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013161
text: The spirit rock seems to have calmed down those hideous things.{nl}Clearly the spirits of those who rest here want them gone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013162
text: Now we must imprint the aura to defile the graveyard into the spell doll.{nl}There were some black crystals that I hadn't seen before where we burned the dead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013163
text: Are you the Revelator Leja talked about?{nl}And that's... our food that got stolen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013164
text: Like I said earlier, we can't trust you just yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013165
text: There is a totem that we don't even dare get close to because of its evil energy.{nl}If you really are a Revelator, then you should be able to destroy it with your divine power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013166
text: Show us.{nl}If you really are a Revelator, that is...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013167
text: You... you're a true Revelator, there's no doubt about it.{nl}I feel so sorry for how I treated you earlier... Please forgive this old man.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013168
text: Medzio Diena didn't cause much damage here, but that was only the beginning.{nl}You see, not long ago our river turned red.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013169
text: Hurry and follow the light.{nl}This can only be a sign sent by Goddess Laima to guide you in the right direction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013170
text: Ah... And we can't let them know in Fedimian...{nl}We're in a really tough spot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013171
text: The totem is at the Banaga Forest Trail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013172
text: If you really are a Revelator that came here with the light to save our town...{nl}Then you should be able to take back the ferrets' hideout.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013173
text: If you can prove that you are in fact a Revelator, I will tell you where to find Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013174
text: Just a moment.{nl}I'll give it to you right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013175
text: Zaura is making something evil called Kruvina using Goddess Lada's vital force.{nl}The same Kruvina the people of Delmore Castle were sacrificed to make.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013176
text: Would you spread this scent around the Bellai Forest Workshop?{nl}It smells a bit... foul, but please do me this favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013177
text: Not the lives of people... Hers. The goddess' life.{nl}That's why such a large amount of water contaminated by the Kruvina was needed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013178
text: The amount of scent I made is only enough for about three uses.{nl}Make sure you only use it when it's absolutely necessary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013179
text: Help...? It's not something I haven't thought about.{nl}The city closest to here is Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013180
text: I heard Fedimian was devastated after Medzio Diena, though.{nl}Even after four years, it's still being reconstructed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013181
text: And Goddess Lada, she said that no matter what happens to her...{nl}She would never make her presence known to anyone but the Revelators.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013182
text: As you know...{nl}People now think that the goddesses have all disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013183
text: But if they find out that the goddesses are still around...{nl}You can imagine what a shock that would be.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013184
text: That's why only you, a Revelator, can save Goddess Lada.{nl}The goddess said so herself, too...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013185
text: We want to ask for help, too. We want it more than anyone.{nl}Be it Orsha... or Fedimian, which is closer... But that's just something we can't do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013186
text: Orsha is too far away, and Fedimian is still recovering from Medzio Diena.{nl}Besides... that's not what Goddess Lada wants.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013187
text: She thinks that people will be too confused if they find out about her.{nl}I don't know why that would be so confusing, but if she says so, we must follow her will.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013188
text: Ow, ouch...{nl}Those darned ferrets have some sharp nails...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013189
text: Our village doesn't usually welcome outsiders...{nl}It's best if you don't expect much kindness from people here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013190
text: Your face doesn't look familiar...{nl}Please don't cause a commotion and just move along.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013191
text: The Story of Karolis Vol. 2

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013192
text: Karolis, on his way to find a place to set up Tesla's owl sculptures, came across a forest that seemed to gather evil energy.{nl}He began to wonder whether he could do something about it himself, when a girl came to him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013193
text: The girl merely spoke, but somehow Karolis seemed to understand her.{nl}And so, like the girl instructed him, Karolis built a number of altars throughout the forest and stopped the evil energy from spreading.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013194
text: The Demon Lord, as expected, could not let him get away with that.{nl}He called on his demons to destroy the altars and set out to look for Karolis.{nl}Karolis took Sequoia and try to resist to the best of his strength, but it was useless.{nl}The Demon Lord was that much more powerful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013195
text: Eventually even the Sequoia that he so dearly protected was contaminated with evil energy, as Karolis and the girl saw themselves surrounded more and more closely by the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013196
text: I'm sorry I doubted you.{nl}It's just that our town has been hurt by fake Revelators before...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013197
text: Goddess Lada being taken by the demons...{nl}None of that would have happened if we hadn't believed the fake Revelators.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013198
text: And with our water turning red we felt more and more powerless...{nl}We should have realized our mistake and gone to the real Revelators, but...{nl}I'm so sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013199
text: What are you still doing here?{nl}You're going to miss the girl. Hurry and go after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013200
text: Who are you? I've never seen you before...{nl}Our men are too tired. If you have no business here, would you mind not bothering us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013201
text: So you're a Revelator, like the ones in the legends?{nl}Wow... I really didn't know!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013202
text: Want to go see the ferrets? They love meat jerky.{nl}It must be dangerous, but I'm curious...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013203
text: Who are you? Is this your first time here?{nl}Did you get permission from my grandfather?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013204
text: A real Revelator... I heard about you from the village priest.{nl}He says he was in danger and you came to save him with a light?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013205
text: That light... I want to see it too!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013206
text: Oh... So the ferrets became more aggressive after the statue was set up?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013207
text: Maybe it's because the statue is not completed yet...{nl}I feel so sorry for bothering Widas now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013208
text: I'm sorry but... if you have no business here, you better leave now.{nl}The atmosphere in the village isn't good...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013209
text: I saw it. The bright glowing light that came with you.{nl}If it wasn't for that I would have been attacked by the ferrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013210
text: But who was that girl, I wonder...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013211
text: If you're done here I think you should go.{nl}This village is done anyways...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013212
text: I almost made another big mistake, didn't I?{nl}I'm sorry. All of these tragedies happening in our village have really ruined our mood.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013213
text: We were worried about the river turning red...{nl}Then a demon disguised as a Revelator... It was my fault for not realizing...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013214
text: Because of the demon Goddess Lada was taken away, {nl}and our people didn't have the power to do anything...{nl}I'm so sorry... I hope you will understand...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013215
text: If you ever meet that demon, be careful.{nl}It knows how to act and look like a person, you can't even tell it's not human.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013216
text: No... This isn't it...{nl}Hm? Stop interrupting and go away. You're distracting me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013217
text: Our village has had a really bad experience with a demon before.{nl}It came to us pretending to be a legendary Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013218
text: Of course believing it was our mistake but...{nl}We never thought we'd see an actual Revelator after that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013219
text: This thing about the ferrets... It feels like when we were tricked into making that demon totem...{nl}I'll try and start over again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013220
text: Hm? Revelator, did you speak with our village chief?{nl}Let me take a look here first, you go and help the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013221
text: If Zaura didn't want you and the girl to meet...{nl}Then she might just be the key to rescuing Goddess Lada.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013222
text: Do you remember?{nl}What happened when you first came to help me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013223
text: If you hadn't saved me then...{nl}We wouldn't be able to save Goddess Lada either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013224
text: As you know, Laima is the goddess of fate and foresight.{nl}I believe she's the one who put you in my path.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013225
text: Thank you very much.{nl}I expect this red water will have cleared out by the time you visit our village again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013226
text: Finding out Goddess Lada is safe is the best news I've heard since Medzio Diena.{nl}Seeing all the commotion with the ferrets, however, I better finish the statue soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013227
text: Thank you so much for rescuing Goddess Lada!{nl}And our village!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013228
text: I can't believe the Demon Lord was defeated! {nl}And thanks to you the ferrets aren't stealing out food anymore.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013229
text: Thank you. I'm so grateful to you and to Goddess Lada for having sent you.{nl}You are a blessing to our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013230
text: Huh, an outsider? You must be new here...{nl}Those ferrets may look cute, but they'll shred your face to pieces if you're not careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013231
text: I don't know what the demons did to those ferrets but...{nl}Seeing how they attack, avoiding a fight must be impossible, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013232
text: Finally that Demon Lord was defeated...{nl}And Goddess Lada was rescued... Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013233
text: Thanks to you now we can focus on the ferrets.{nl}I still don't know about the red water, but we'll find an answer eventually.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013234
text: I know it was Goddess Laima who sent us a Revelator, but...{nl}Still, I think everything worked out even better because of you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013235
text: I'm very thankful for everything.{nl}For saving me, and for rescuing Goddess Lada too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013236
text: Now that we know Goddess Lada is safe, I want to build a shrine with the villagers.{nl}I have faith that, with the power if the goddess, our river will become clear again. It will.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013237
text: I never thought everything Goddess Laima predicted would become true.{nl}The disaster happening... even the Revelator coming to save us from it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013238
text: And yet the disaster happened, and now you saved our village and Goddess Lada.{nl}I should have been the one to keep the faith when our village was down, but I didn't.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013239
text: So all of that work was in vain...{nl}Thank you for making me realize that before it was too late...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013240
text: Thanks to you Goddess Lada is safe.{nl}She's lost her power now but... I know she'll get it back someday.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013241
text: I know you'll do well no matter what path you chose.{nl}I've seen the miracles you're capable of with my own eyes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013242
text: Goddess Laima is leading you to be the savior of the world, I can tell.{nl}May your every step receive the blessing of the goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013243
text: Our savior... The future of this world depends on your journey...{nl}Now go... Follow Laima's revelations and walk the path of salvation...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013244
text: Hey, you.{nl}If you're going inside the shrine, can you give me a hand?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013245
text: I need to go to where the villagers are but...{nl}I don't know, there's just so many monsters here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013246
text: It was hard enough coming all the way up here.{nl}And those no-good youngsters won't even come out to help an old man.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013247
text: So you left me out, is it?{nl}You think you can sort out this red water problem all by yourselves?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013248
text: Who do you take the village chief for? You lousy youngsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013249
text: Anyway, since it came to this...{nl}If your skills are okay, will you take down some monsters?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013250
text: Youngsters these days don't respect their elders anymore.{nl}What can they do by themselves?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013251
text: Where's the respect for the village chief?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013252
text: Yes, yes.{nl}You're much better than the youngsters in our village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013253
text: Seems like you're no nobody, hey?{nl}The young ones in our village can't kill monsters that easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013254
text: Ugh, grandpa...{nl}How many times have I told you to stay at home? It's dangerous to go out on your own...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013255
text: Thank you for looking after my grandfather.{nl}I heard you're very talented, is it?{nl}Anyway, if it's you... Hm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013256
text: We live in a village down from here.{nl}The water here runs all the way down to our village, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013257
text: One day, our crops started to grow a lot bigger than usual.{nl}Of course the village thought it was a blessing from the goddesses but... that didn't last long.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013258
text: The crops were inedible. Every single one of them.{nl}The problem wasn't the taste, but everyone who ate them ended up bedridden, it was chaos.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013259
text: On top of that, all the water in the village turned red.{nl}And just like the crops... No one could drink it anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013260
text: Eventually some people left for Orsha, thinking the village had been cursed...{nl}Those who stayed decided to follow the river and ended up here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013261
text: But even among all of us, we have no idea what to do.{nl}People are starting to grow tired, too...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013262
text: My grandfather praised you to the skies, he's really impressed by your talent.{nl}That's why I'm asking you. Please help our village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013263
text: I'm sure you'll be able to find a solution if you just use some of your power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013264
text: Thank you for being so helpful.{nl}The first thing I want to ask of you is... to investigate the Wandering Sanctuary.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013265
text: Not that long ago my grandfather went out there by himself.{nl}He ended up surrounded by monsters and... It was a close call.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013266
text: There were a few objects strewn around that I'd never seen before.{nl}I think my grandfather was there to investigate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013267
text: Found something in the heap of ashes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013268
text: I know I should take you there myself, but I feel like I'll just be a burden.{nl}That day, too, all we did was get grandpa and run away from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013269
text: You're back.{nl}Did you see anything odd?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013270
text: This... looks like a diary.{nl}I'll try and save whatever parts I can make out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013271
text: Meanwhile, could you look for my grandfather? {nl}The ground trembled all of a sudden and he went with some people from the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013272
text: I asked them not to let him go anywhere...{nl}And now they take him with them, honestly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013273
text: Huh, what do you know.{nl}I owe you another one, eh? Thank you, thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013274
text: But this I know for sure.{nl}Something big is happening at the Wandering Sanctuary, I tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013275
text: You still can't find my grandfather?{nl}Sigh... If you do find him, make sure to bring him here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013276
text: This is it, this disc.{nl}You know how the ground trembled earlier?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013277
text: The disc suddenly started glowing red so I followed it all the way here.{nl}I was chased away by monsters, but I clearly saw that it was pointing to something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013278
text: I'm going to give the disc to you; will you check where it's pointing to?{nl}My friend here got hurt so we're going to head back together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013279
text: My friend got hurt trying to protect me so we should stick together.{nl}Please do me this favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013280
text: So the disc was pointing to this red statue? {nl}Hm... I've never seen this before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013281
text: Let me take a closer look at it, then.{nl}Who knows what else I'll be able to find.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013282
text: I should go to the Absenta Reservoir.{nl}I remember Modis once said that there was a group of people in black hoods headed there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013283
text: Go see my granddaughter before you come along.{nl}She said something about a diary...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013284
text: experiment succeeded...{nl}... ...{nl}... results... protecting vessel is alive...{nl}...vina's power... Reservoir... spread... contaminate...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013285
text: ... ...{nl}...Seir Rainforest... Novaha Mona...{nl}... ...{nl}... annihilate... ...proceed with the pla...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013286
text: Sigh, it wasn't easy. This is all I was able to recover.{nl}Almost all the pages are completely burnt.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013287
text: All I understand is that...{nl}Some sort of power spread throughout the reservoir.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013288
text: I wonder if that's why the water turned red, but I can't be sure...{nl}The vessel is alive... This part sounds strange, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013289
text: I have no idea about the rest.{nl}Any guesses?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013290
text: Anyway, enough with the diary...{nl}You should go and follow my grandfather to the Absenta Reservoir.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013291
text: You're back?{nl}Ah, my granddaughter, all she does is worry about me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013292
text: Oh, of course.{nl}Can you tell me about what was in the diary?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013293
text: I saw it.{nl}Before the water turned red, there were people praying here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013294
text: Those fools in the village think it was because of something else...{nl}But I'm convinced there are goddesses we don't know about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013295
text: The goddesses must have gotten angry because no one believes them.{nl}I'm sure offering them a tribute would appease them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013296
text: So I was thinking about offering them some monster meat.{nl}Would you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013297
text: The crops in our village were all contaminated by the red water so we can't eat them.{nl}I can't offer that to the goddesses, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013298
text: You got it!{nl}Thank you so much for helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013299
text: I'm going to make an offering and pray to this obelisk.{nl}Oh, there's another obelisk somewhere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013300
text: I'll tell you where it is so you can go and pray there, yes?{nl}If we solve this I'm sure you'll be generously rewarded by our people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013301
text: The other obelisk is on the left side of the Vishikas Great Hall.{nl}I'll stay here and pray, then. You go now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013302
text: Have I made the offering, you ask?{nl}No, I only prayed so far... Why?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013303
text: What? You mean the monsters suddenly ran to the offering?{nl}Huh?... That's impossible...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013304
text: I'm sure I saw those people praying.{nl}They were wearing black hoods... I really saw them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013305
text: Hm... I'm confused.{nl}That's what I told everyone, what am I going to say now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013306
text: You didn't see a young man called Napalis, did you?{nl}He went out a while ago and hasn't been back since. I'm worried about him now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013307
text: He said he was headed to the Drava Chapel Lot.{nl}If you're going that way, would you mind checking in on him?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013308
text: Why did he have to go out at a time like this.{nl}I sure hope nothing happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013309
text: Napalis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013310
text: You saved my life.{nl}I was being chased by that huge monster and had to hide in here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013311
text: I should go back to where the others are.{nl}Thank you so much for saving me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013312
text: Nothing... Nothing terrible happened, I hope?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013313
text: Looking at that red water makes me feel terrible.{nl}It's not even good to drink... not to mention it ruined our crops.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013314
text: The waste was monumental.{nl}Our vegetables grew huge, but they were all left to rot as we couldn't eat them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013315
text: Everyone in the village was ready to go out and find the reason why the water turned red, but...{nl}The only person who has actually fought any monsters is Modis, the hunter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013316
text: I saw you fight those monsters earlier and you were really good.{nl}If that's okay, will you clear out some monsters around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013317
text: We should be fine if we just stick together...{nl}I hope we don't run into trouble on our way to the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013318
text: So it was right, what I saw. I knew it.{nl}Thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013319
text: I still feel a little uneasy, though...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013320
text: The ground trembling... it seems odd.{nl}I wonder if it's related to the experiment...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013321
text: Oh, right, my grandfather! I forgot about him.{nl}Please go back to the Absenta Reservoir, I don't want him to get in trouble again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013322
text: A vessel? That's odd.{nl}Someone was doing an experiment here... is that what you mean?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013323
text: Hm... I never heard about any demons doing any sort of experiments...{nl}But it could be related to those black hoods that Modis saw.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013324
text: I told you I saw them walking in and out of the Nesuga Small Corridor.{nl}Would you look into it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013325
text: I hope we can find something this time, too.{nl}I don't think I can rest now that I know it was someone who did this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013326
text: So, did you find anything?{nl}A picture? What is it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013327
text: Let's see... This looks like that red statue you found earlier.{nl}By the way, while you were gone I saw something strange.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013328
text: I was taking a closer look at that statue you brought and...{nl}Suddenly, the water on the bucket next to it turned red.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013329
text: Oh... the smell.{nl}If something like this exists but much bigger, then that must be what's tainting the water.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013330
text: Let's see, then... Where can we find something like this but big...{nl}If only we got rid of that, I'm sure the water will be back to normal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013331
text: Also, the monster drawn on the bottom here got me thinking.{nl}I feel like I know this monster, but it looks different somehow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013332
text: A Hydra... Go now!{nl}I'll be with you soon!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013333
text: Did I... Did I see that right?{nl}It looked like it had some sort of gem on its body.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013334
text: Hydras aren't usually that big, and their scales aren't red either.{nl}This monster... It looks exactly like the one on that painting you found.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013335
text: People have called that monster a mystical creature since long ago, but this is different.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013336
text: So that beast has a gem stuck on it now, huh?{nl}I'd say you'd have to get the beast out and kill it to get rid of the gem...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013337
text: Talking is easy. Do you know why they call it mystical?{nl}You can't just go and grab it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013338
text: Hm... That's if we count only the folk from our village.{nl}If you help us catch it I think we might just have a chance. What do you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013339
text: Right. Thank you.{nl}You want to talk to Modis, then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013340
text: He's the best hunter in the village. I'm sure Modis can think of a way to lure to beast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013341
text: Hunter Modis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013342
text: So you're the one our village chief can't stop talking about.{nl}I'm really glad you decided to help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013343
text: Hunting is all the same, no matter the size of the beast.{nl}We just lure it into a trap with some bait and then tie its feet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013344
text: Considering the size of this one, though, making the trap is going to take some time.{nl}Can you find some bait meanwhile?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013345
text: For the bait you want to get some Black Sawpent meat.{nl}We need some herbs too, to disguise our scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013346
text: If it wasn't for you, we would have never been able to deal with the Hydra.{nl}As you know most of us work as farmers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013347
text: Did you get everything?{nl}I was able to make a nice, sturdy trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013348
text: We have a problem.{nl}One of the villagers went to see the chief and drank some water from the bucket.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013349
text: I told them to be careful, that the water was probably contaminated, but...{nl}I wish we had some sort of painkiller... Can you please get some herbs for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013350
text: This area is contaminated with the red water, you'll have to go to Svaigulys Hill in Letas Stream. {nl}Find some Markazi Flowers. They're yellow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013351
text: I wish we knew how to cure this.{nl}Right now all we can do is try and relieve the pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013352
text: Oh, that's it.{nl}Let's hope our friend has learned their lesson now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013353
text: It's revolting to think that this red water is all because of some experiment.{nl}Because of it our lives have been threatened.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013354
text: Why did the people in the black hoods do such a thing?{nl}I just want to burn down the whole laboratory so they can't even think of doing it again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013355
text: Thing is... I can't fight the monsters and burn down the lab on my own.{nl}Our people want to leave as fast as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013356
text: Why on earth would someone do an experiment like that?{nl}It's atrocious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013357
text: Thank you.{nl}This should be enough to make the oil we need!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013358
text: Now, pour the oil around the laboratory and set it on fire.{nl}I hope this teaches them not to do another experiment here...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013359
text: So one of the laboratories is here at the Nesuga Small Corridor.{nl}There's another one in the Wandering Sanctuary at the Pelke Shrine Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013360
text: Those filthy people...{nl}Next time I see the black hoods I need to have a word with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013361
text: Thank you.{nl}That makes me feel better.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013362
text: How can someone think of such a cruel experiment?{nl}How can they even... Am I right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013363
text: Go see Modis.{nl}He's an expert at setting straps, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013364
text: I set up the trap at the Heralve Vacant Lot. {nl}With the bait on it we should be able to catch the Hydra.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013365
text: Make sure you're ready for this, that beast is dangerous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013366
text: I sure hope we're right after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013367
text: You're the only one we can trust now.{nl}I pray that the goddesses give us strength...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013368
text: You're back! How did it go?{nl}Did you destroy the gem?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013369
text: Good, good! Very good.{nl}That red statue you brought earlier suddenly exploded, gave me quite the scare.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013370
text: I don't expect the water to turn back to normal right away.{nl}It's going to take a while for all this water to become clean again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013371
text: But things are getting better, I'm sure those who went to Orsha will come back.{nl}You really were a savior to our village!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013372
text: You're leaving already?{nl}Alright, just make sure you stay away from Delmore Castle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013373
text: I heard from one of our youngsters who went there...{nl}Apparently it's completely deserted and swarming with demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013374
text: Seems like they followed Orsha's immigration order, huh?{nl}No use in going to a place that's just full of demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013375
text: Anyway, thank you for everything.{nl}May the goddesses bless every step you take...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013376
text: The water's bright red, we can't drink it.{nl}And those darned youngsters don't even come out to help an old man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013377
text: Isn't it weird? All the red water around here.{nl}Don't drink it, though. It'll make you sick to your stomach.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013378
text: The others don't seem to understand.{nl}It's clear the goddesses are upset.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013379
text: I'm also worried about the red water, and there's all these monsters around.{nl}Should I have just gone to Orsha...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013380
text: We came here together to try and figure out this red water, but...{nl}It's too dangerous out here...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013381
text: Thank you so much for saving me.{nl}I should have stopped our chief... It was my mistake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013382
text: This is the reservoir where the river begins.{nl}I think the source of the contamination might be somewhere around here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013383
text: We need to find it and eliminate it as soon as possible.{nl}Otherwise our village is doomed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013384
text: You went out there without me again, did you?{nl}We could have gone together if you'd just waited a little while.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013385
text: I'm going to give you the diary, but first let me explain what it says.{nl}Just take note of this and go find my grandfather right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013386
text: Just a while ago here I was, thinking I'm done for, unable to escape...{nl}Thinking about it, our chief must be a really brave man...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013387
text: (The ground is suddenly trembling.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013388
text: Hm?{nl}What's this trembling?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013389
text: Something's going on, for sure.{nl}The stream in our village, all our water is bright red.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013390
text: Drinking the water makes people sick as a dog...{nl}Medzio Diena was hard enough on us, now this happens.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013391
text: You there.{nl}I could use a little help from you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013392
text: The young ones in our village do nothing but give excuses to keep me out of their plans. {nl}They wouldn't even know about the reservoir if it wasn't for me!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013393
text: But, see, if someone talented like you can take me there...{nl}I can teach them not to disrespect their village chief.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013394
text: What do you say? I'll make it up to you, eh? {nl}Come to the Collapsed Hall Lot if you agree.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013395
text: Hunter Modis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013396
text: You mean you defeated the Hydra?{nl}Wow, your skills are impressive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013397
text: Hurry and go see the village chief.{nl}This is the best news we've had since after Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013398
text: It's a shame for the people in our village...{nl}If the goddesses aren't upset, then what is it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013399
text: Ah, yes. You came.{nl}You're here to help me, yes?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013400
text: I knew they'd be like this.{nl}The ground shakes a little, they start to panic.{nl}Asking why I even bothered to come here and such. Eh...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013401
text: First, go see my granddaughter.{nl}I told her good things about you; I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013402
text: Hey!{nl}Stop wandering around and run, now!{nl}This place is full of demons!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013403
text: I was running away from the demons in the Delmore Castle and ended up here.{nl}If you don't want them to get you, you need to run, now!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013404
text: I don't want to stay here either.{nl}I'm just going to rest for a while and leave right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013405
text: I can't tell if you're brave or just reckless...{nl}I feel like I'm in danger just being around you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013406
text: I have nothing left to lose.{nl}I don't want to run away anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013407
text: Please, I beg you.{nl}I don't want to see the Divine Tree take the spirits of our people...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013408
text: I cannot let the demons get me but...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013409
text: I don't know how much longer I can hold on...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013410
text: With my knowledge of demons and the things Mardas saw, {nl}we might just be able to find a solution.{nl}I'm counting on you not to let our souls be taken by the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013411
text: Thank you for saving this forest.{nl}I'll take care of the spirits that escaped and make sure they find their way back to the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013412
text: And that red gem Mardas saw...{nl}It must be somehow connected to what happened to the spirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013413
text: From what I heard the water at the Pelke Shrine Ruins turned red...{nl}I wonder if that has something to do with that gem?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013414
text: (There is no reaction.)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013415
text: You should go see a man named Mardas.{nl}I'm sure he has the answer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013416
text: Please talk to our Owl Chief about it as well.{nl}I'm certain it will be a pleasure to meet you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013417
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}I hope my power will be of use to you, even if by only a little...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013418
text: That was unbearable...{nl}If it wasn't for you I would've stayed like that forever.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013419
text: I'll do anything, if only I can stand up to the demons.{nl}Thank you for saving me!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013420
text: I'm still a bit confused.{nl}I just can't believe what I was doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013421
text: To think I was helping the demons instead of guiding spirits to the goddess...{nl}I feel terrible, even if that wasn't my intention.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013422
text: How sad is the Dievdirbys who made us going to be when they find out...?{nl}I need to be more focused from now on...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013423
text: Thank you so much for saving me.{nl}I feel so sorry to our Owl Chief...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013424
text: It's close to the Anga Hall.{nl}I'm glad you're not going out there on your own, but I have a bad feeling about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013425
text: The water all turned red, you can't get any around here.{nl}You need to go all the way to Letas Stream.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013426
text: If you go to Svaigulys Hill, on the right side you'll see some yellow flowers.{nl}They're Markazi Flowers, it's what we use in times of need.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013427
text: Really?{nl}I knew we were on the same page.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013428
text: The oil I have is not enough, though.{nl}First, I want to ask you to collect some Rajapearlite lard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013429
text: I wish this would make the water go back to normal...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013430
text: If it goes well, tell the village chief immediately.{nl}May the goddesses bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013431
text: The waste was monumental.{nl}Our vegetables grew huge, but they were all left to rot as we couldn't eat them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013432
text: It's a huge relief.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013433
text: A food offering would probably appease the goddesses...{nl}But all our crops were ruined by the red water, how can we offer that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013434
text: The water should go back to normal now, right?{nl}That red water, the first time I saw it I was terrified...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013435
text: I think we need to keep an eye on this place to keep things like this from happening again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013436
text: At first when our crops grew because of that red water everyone was delighted.{nl}We thought it was a blessing from the goddesses... Yet they were completely inedible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013437
text: Napalis said you saved them from a really close call.{nl}I'm glad they're back to safety, but I can't guarantee things like this won't happen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013438
