text: We all live in a village down from here.{nl}We came all the way here to try and see what's making the water... like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013439
text: I'm telling you, I saw people praying.{nl}They wore black hoods... I really saw them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013440
text: Oh... So it was the gem on the Hydra that turned our water red.{nl}What could this gem be, to cause so much trouble...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013441
text: What do you know, there's a gem on the beast.{nl}Anyway, with you and Modis here... destroying it won't be impossible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013442
text: So the monster on the painting you brought in was a Hydra...{nl}And because of this one thing now we have this chaos from our village all the way to Zeraha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013443
text: It will be a while before the water turns back to normal.{nl}But when it does, the people who went to Orsha should come back...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013444
text: I know the water is going to be fine now...{nl}But it's a shame we still don't know who did this or why they did it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013445
text: I do remember seeing some people with black hoods here doing something a while ago.{nl}To think that they're responsible for all of this... It's horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013446
text: So the water turning red was because of that gem on the Hydra...{nl}It might have been mystical, but that was a long time ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013447
text: We're on the spot now, how and where do we even start...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013448
text: Well, the Hydra may be a mystical creature, but it's no different from other game.{nl}The only difference is the size, and that weird gem it has on its body.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013449
text: I'd heard about the Hydra before, but I never realized how scary it was until now.{nl}To think you actually went and fought it... How impressive is that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013450
text: That red water is no one's business but our village's.{nl}Outsiders would do well to leave us alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013451
text: I'm sorry I was rude to you earlier...{nl}Please forgive this old man's insolence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013452
text: May the Revelator who dreamt of chaos defeat the evil forces and bring light back into our world...{nl}If the legends are true, this red water will soon be no more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013453
text: I'm sorry. I can't really give you any details...{nl}Just go back and don't ask questions...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013454
text: Quick, save the girl!{nl}We can't let Zaura have his way with this!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013455
text: Those ferrets, they weren't like this...{nl}If we're being honest, this was all our fault though.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013782

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013783
text: Collect Monster Products

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013784
text: You have accepted Receptionist Donnes' request. Collect the items to complete it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013785
text: Mercenary Post Request Report

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013786
text: You have completed the request. Report back to Donnes at the Mercenary Post.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013787
text: The materials for the test are ready. Go talk to the Linker Submaster to find out how the test is going to be carried out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013788
text: The Linker Submaster says that if you're really talented you should have the eyes to find the World Behind at Tenet Church 1F. Go into this world, find a book there and bring it to the Linker Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013789
text: Give the book to the Linker Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013790
text: You found the book in the World Behind and successfully passed the test. As proof of this, take the book to the Linker Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013791
text: This amount is not enough to offer the Cleric Master. Please collect 1,000 silver in donations to deliver to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013792
text: You have collected 1,000 silver in donations for the Cleric Master. Deliver the donations to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013793
text: The book requested by the Quarrel Shooter Master belongs to the Hunter Master. Collect 1,000 silver to purchase the book from her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013794
text: You have enough silver to purchase the book. Obtain it from the Hunter Master for 1,000 silver and deliver it to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013795
text: The book requested by the Archer Master belongs to the Hunter Master. Collect 1,000 silver to purchase the book from her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013796
text: You have enough silver to purchase the book. Obtain it from the Hunter Master for 1,000 silver and deliver it to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013797
text: The book requested by the Ranger Master belongs to the Hunter Master. Collect 1,000 silver to purchase the book from her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013798
text: Go see the Hoplite Submaster at the West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013799
text: To the Hoplite Submaster, his most cherished spear is a source of pride. Enhance a piece of spear-type equipment up to level 6. Do this on any spear-type weapon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013800
text: Report the results to the Hoplite Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013801
text: You have enhanced a piece of spear-type equipment to level 6. Show it to the Hoplite Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013802
text: Go to Siauliai Miners' Village and talk to the Psychokino Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013803
text: The Psychokino Submaster is going to help you prove your skills, but she wants some demon essence in return. Defeat some Minotaurs Chapparitions at the Gate Route to obtain demon essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013804
text: Deliver the essence to the Psychokino Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013805
text: You have obtained the essence of both demons. Deliver it to the Psychokino Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013806
text: Talk to the Linker Submaster at Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013807
text: Duel the Linker Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013808
text: The Linker Master wants to test the quality of mana through dueling. Duel against the Linker Master and win.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013809
text: You can feel the quality of mana enhanced after dueling with the Linker Master. Talk to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013810
text: Talk to the Wugushi Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013811
text: Go to the Gateway of the Great King and talk to the Wugushi Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013812
text: Duel the Wugushi Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013813
text: The Wugushi Master says that even if cowardly, the last one standing is the true winner of the combat. Duel with the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013814
text: You have defeated the Wugushi Submaster in a duel. Go talk to the Wugushi Submaster again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013815
text: Talk to the Rodelero Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013816
text: Go to the Gateway of the Great King and talk to the Rodelero Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013817
text: The Rodelero Submaster asked for a shield enhanced to level 4. Enhance a shield-type piece of equipment and show it to the Rodelero Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013818
text: Report to the Rodelero Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013819
text: You sucessfully enhanced a shield-type piece of equipment to level 4. Report to the Rodelero Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013820
text: Talk to the Elementalist Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013821
text: Go to Akmens Ridge and talk to the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013822
text: Complete the Elementalist Submaster's task

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013823
text: Relay the task to the Elementalist Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013824
text: You have successfully completed the Elementalist Submaster's task. Deliver the collected materials to the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013825
text: Talk to the Cataphract Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013826
text: Go to the Gateway of the Great King and talk to the Cataphract Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013827
text: Defeat Sparnasman around the Vieta Gorge to prove your skills to the Cataphract Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013828
text: Report to the Cataphract Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013829
text: You successfully defeated Sparnasman. Report to the Cataphract Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013830
text: Defeat Sparnasman

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013831
text: Defeat Boowooks near a Royal Cube to absorb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013832
text: The Officer's Spirit is trying to make a human figure by tying the wooden legs. Let's collect rustling skins from Old Kepas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013833
text: Defeat the monster chasing Toby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013834
text: The Archer Master wants to see whether you have what it takes to keep learning. Go to Crystal Mine 1F and collect the wings of Bats.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013835
text: As Follower Rikke said, after setting fire to the Panto Totem, the Pantos started taking orders. They helped defeat the Big Panto Spearman and the Old Talisman seems like it could be of use. Tell this to Rikke.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013836
text: Vincent is lazy and asked you to do his work for him. Finish the forgeries as he told you to. Blue smoke will appear when the forgery is complete in the mold.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013837
text: Investigate the Red Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013838
text: Some areas in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F are glowing with an eery red energy. Go and have a look at them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013839
text: Defeat Cerberus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013840
text: Cerberus was called out by the red energy and broke free! Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013841
text: Investigate Bastymosi Field

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013842
text: Mardas told you to run because the surrounding areas are filled with demons. Go to Bastymosi Field and see what's really happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013843
text: The monsters seem to be using the Owl Sculptures to send the light beads to somewhere. Ask Mardas if he knows anything about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013844
text: Ask Mardas if he's ever seen the Owl Sculptures sending light beads anywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013845
text: Follow the light bead to Bonewide Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013846
text: The light beads were delivered to the Owl Sculptures on top of a slope. Turn around and follow them to Bonewide Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013847
text: Retrieve the Karolis Altar Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013848
text: To save the Owl Sculptures possessed by the demons you must restore the energy of Karolis Forest. To do that, you'll have to reconstruct the Karolis Altar destroyed by the demons. Follow the will of the leading owls and find the Karolis Altar Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013849
text: To spread out the forest's divine force, you need to find and light up all of Karolis' light rays. Hurry and light up all four of Karolis' rays before their light dies out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013850
text: Destroy the Mind Control Tower at Duoklu Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013851
text: Destroy the Mind Control Tower at Duoklu Hall with the power of the Owl Sculptures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013852
text: Mardas is with the Owl Chief Sculpture. Listen to what he was saying.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013853
text: To save the Guide Owl Sculptures at Letas Stream, go to the birthplace of Karolis, where the energy of Karolis Springs is stronger, and collect that energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013854
text: Find the Guide Owl Sculpture at Letas Stream

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013855
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture requested you gather the energy of Karolis Springs and deliver it to the Guide Owl Sculptures. Go find the Guide Owl Sculptures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013856
text: The Owl Chief Sculpture requested a divine branch of Letas in order to defeat the demons. Use the crystal containing the energy of Karolis Springs to find the holy tree of Letas and obtain a branch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013857
text: Mardas seems to have finally found a solution after discussing with the Owl Chief Sculpture. Listen to what Mardas has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013858
text: Clear out the evil energy contaminating the forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013859
text: The first thing to do is eliminate the evil energy contaminating the forest. Set up the Namott of Suppression around the evil energy to clear it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013860
text: You have cleared out all of the evil energy. Go back to Mardas and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013861
text: You have eliminated all of the evil energy. Talk to Mardas about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013862
text: Remove the Surveillance Sphere Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013863
text: Mardas says you need to remove the magic circle keeping the Surveillance Spheres in order to access the black energy that's absorbing the forest's own energy. Avoid the Surveillance Spheres and destroy its magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013864
text: Remove the Black Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013865
text: At the end of the forked roads at Senyvas Yard, destroy the black energy that's absorbing the forest's own energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013866
text: The black energy has been completely removed. Go and tell Mardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013867
text: Remove all magic circles protecting the Soul Starvation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013868
text: Mardas says the magic circles protecting Soul Starvation must be removed. The circles must be removed in the correct order, or they will become active again. Control each circle to figure out the order and remove them accordingly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013869
text: Remove the magic circles protecting the Soul Starvation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013870
text: Destroy the Soul Starvation with the Namott of Suppression

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013871
text: You have defeated all the demons around. Use the power of the Namott of Suppression to destroy Soul Starvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013872
text: Defeat monsters to supply magic to the Locked Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013873
text: The chest is locked with an unknown force. Defeat some monsters around it to fill the chest with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013874
text: You defeated the monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges. Go see the Wizard Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013875
text: Defeat monsters with the Fire Energy Bead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013876
text: The Pyromancer Submaster wants to test your affinity with fire energy. Defeat some monsters while under the magic of the Pyromancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013877
text: You have defeated the monsters. Go and ask the Pyromancer Submaster to evaluate your affinity with fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013878
text: Defeat monsters and replenish the Magical Piece of Ice

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013879
text: The Cryomancer Submaster believes that every Cryomaster needs a talent for frost magic. To prove yourself, fill the unmelting magical piece of ice with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013880
text: You have replenished the magical piece of ice without letting it melt. Go back to the Cryomancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013881
text: The Archer Submaster believes that being able to aim at an enemy from afar is important. Attack monsters by hitting them from a distance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013882
text: The Archer Submaster should be satisfied with your perfomance. Go back to the Archer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013883
text: The Ranger Submaster believes that the ability to fight multiple foes is what sets Rangers apart. Defeat a monster within 10 seconds after having defeated another.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013884
text: Your performance was good enough to impress the Ranger Submaster. Go back to the Ranger Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013885
text: Achieve Lv. 1 enhancement on a crossbow

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013886
text: The Quarrel Shooter Submaster mentioned the importance of your weapon. Bring her a crossbow-type equipment enhanced to level 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013887
text: You have obtained a crossbow enhanced to level 1 or higher. Go see the Quarrel Shooter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013888
text: You have listened to the advice of all the Wizard Masters in Orsha. Go back to the Wizard Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013889
text: Defeat monsters nearby the Condensed Firestone

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013890
text: The energy of fire feels a little stronger now. Go back to the Pyromancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013891
text: The Cyomancer Submaster believes you need to become more familiar with handling frost. Use the Frost Tome and defeat the monsters with increased ice property resistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013892
text: You have completed your training. Go back to the Cryomancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013893
text: Blow away monsters using the Psychokino Scroll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013894
text: The Psychokino Master believes that instead of a lecture you should see the power of the Psychokino with your own eyes. Use the Psychokino Scroll to blow away monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013895
text: You are now aware of how it feels to use Psychokino magic. Go back to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013896
text: According to the Linker Master, the magic of the Linkers starts with finding how to connect to your foe. She believes you can learn with practice, so attack monsters and try to find their point of connection.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013897
text: The point of connection was there, even if briefly. Go back to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013898
text: Your test ends here. Go back and see the Archer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013899
text: Collect Wall Restoration Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013900
text: The Ranger Submaster hopes that Rangers can help the people of Orsha by contributing to the city's reconstruction. Find some hard building stone in Koru Jungle and collect wall restoration stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013901
text: You seem to have enough stones now. Go back to the Ranger Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013902
text: Obtain Sticky Plant Sap from Plant-type monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013903
text: The Quarrel Master requested you collect some material to join the wall restoration stones. Defeat plant-type monsters to obtain their sticky sap. The stronger the plant-type monster, the higher the chances of obtaining sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013904
text: You have collected enough Sticky Plant Saps. Go back to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013905
text: Collect Sturdy Research Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013906
text: The Sapper Submaster is researching new Sapper techniques. Go to Koru Jungle and find some sturdy stones for research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013907
text: You have collected enough sturdy stones. Go back to the Sapper Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013908
text: The Hunter Submaster should be convinced by your performance. Go back to the Hunter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013909
text: You have defeated enough fire property monsters. Go back to the Pyromancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013910
text: You have completed the test. Go back to the Cryomancer Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013911
text: The Psychokino Master wants to test your ability to stay on top of the situation. Use the Spell Detector Orb and defeat monsters within its reach.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013912
text: The Psychokino Master will be happy with your performance. Go back to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013913
text: Defeat monsters to collect Spiritual Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013914
text: The Linker Master is researching ways to connect not only to mana, but also to the spirit. To help with her research, defeat monsters and fill the Soul Flask with spiritual energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013915
text: The Soul Flask is now full of spiritual energy. Go back to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013916
text: You have defeated monsters of all types. Go back to the Thaumaturge Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013917
text: Defeat Necroventer at Carlyle's Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013918
text: The Ranger Submaster wants to test your skills. Go to Carlyle's Mausoleum and defeat the Necroventer there to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013919
text: You have defeated the Necroventer. Go back to the Ranger Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013920
text: Achieve Lv. 5 enhancement on a shield

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013921
text: The Quarrel Shooter Submaster believes Quarrel Shooters, as shield users, should also invest in a proper shield. As instructed, obtain a shield enhanced to level 5.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013922
text: You have obtained a shield enhanced to level 5 or higher. Go back to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster and show her your shield.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013923
text: Collect Gun Powder from monsters at Delmore Outskirts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013924
text: The Sapper Submaster wants to create a more powerful bomb for Sapper techniques. Defeat the monsters in the outskirts of Delmore and obtain the gun powder needed for making a poweful bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013925
text: You have obtained enough gun powder. Go back to the Sapper Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013926
text: Defeat monsters to obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013927
text: The Hunter Submaster has prepared a Hunter test for you. Go to Delmore Hamlet, Delmore Manor and Delmore Outskirts and find a box containing a Hunter's Pass in each location.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013928
text: You have found all Hunter Passes. Return to the Hunter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013929
text: Collect poison from monsters in the Poison Bottle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013930
text: The Wugushi Master believes the first thing to learn is the proper way to collect poison. Use the Wugushi Poison Bottle to collect poison from monsters at Carlyle's Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013931
text: The poison bottle is full. Go back to the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013932
text: The Scout Submaster demands most of all speed and agility from any hopeful Scout. Try attacking some monsters without receiving any damage. If you receive damage from a monster, the test will start all over again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013933
text: You seem to have proved your skills now. Go back to the Scout Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013934
text: Talk to the Swordsman Submaster in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013935
text: Learn the attributes and talk to the Swordsman Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013936
text: Talk to the Wizard Submaster in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013937
text: Learn the attributes and talk to the Wizard Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013938
text: Talk to the Archer Submaster in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013939
text: Learn the attributes and talk to the Archer Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013940
text: Talk to the Cleric Submaster in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013941
text: Learn the attributes and talk to the Cleric Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013942
text: Defeat monsters to obtain the key

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013943
text: The box is locked and cannot be opened. Defeat nearby monsters to find the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013944
text: You have obtained the key from the monsters. Try and open the locked box again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013945
text: Defeat nearby monsters to obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013946
text: Put down Horacius' poison pot and collect some poison. The pot can only collect poison when there are monsters around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013947
text: The pillar collapsed without even having been touched. It needs to be repaired; collect some viscous liquid from nearby Desert Chupacabras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013948
text: Obtain %s from Desert Chupacabras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013949
text: Helping Gedas seems bound to get you some information on Albinas. Retrieve Gedas' research materials from nearby Ticens. If a Ticen can be checked using the Space Bar, it is probably carrying a lot more materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013950
text: Collect Flammable Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013951
text: Gedas says he will have his allies investigate Albinas. They want to make flares, in case any of the allies is in danger, and they asked you to gather the materials. Obtain some flammable powder from monsters in order to make the flares.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013952
text: You have collected enough flammable powder. Return to Gedas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013953
text: Obtain Flammable Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013954
text: Ask Gedas about the flares and his research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013955
text: Find Merrisa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013956
text: Go find Merrisa.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013957
text: Merrisa requested you recover the lost holy relics in Goanar Path. Clear out some monsters on your way there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013958
text: Deliver to Merrisa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013959
text: You have cleared out the monsters and recovered the holy relics. Take them to Merrisa.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013960
text: Talk to Merrisa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013961
text: Ask Merrisa if you can help with anything else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013962
text: You have recovered the Merchant Alliance's objects. Go and ask Merrisa what they are.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013963
text: Defeat Infroburks to retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013964
text: Defeat Infroburks and retrieve the Damp Pieces of Paper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013965
text: Use Merrisa's detector to investigate the Juikas Field area. Use the detector on the areas shown on the map to check your direction.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013966
text: Report to Merrisa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013967
text: You have found the Merchant Alliance's objects using the detector. Bring them to Merrisa.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013968
text: Obtain Infroburk Body Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013969
text: A special ink is needed to make the educational materials. Set up Margellius' trap at the Drose Empty Lot and collect the body fluid of trapped Infroburks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013970
text: Defeat those trying to attack the spirits of the Klaipeda Market

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013971
text: Go to the Herb Gatherers' Cabin to save the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013972
text: Varas says his colleagues are hidden somewhere around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Save Varas' friends before the demons get to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013973
text: Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013974
text: You have found Rose, one of Varas' colleagues. Ask her what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013975
text: Defeat the demons threatening the merchants

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013976
text: Rose's Colleagues

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013977
text: Traveling Merchant Rose thanks you for saving her. Keep talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013978
text: Give Laswi a Stamina Pill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013979
text: Rose wants to go find her friends who are still scattered around the area, but Laswi is too tired to help. Give Laswi a Stamina pill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013980
text: You gave the Stamina pill to Rose. Will Laswi be okay now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013981
text: Laswi took the Stamina pill and seems to be feeling energized. Talk to Rose again to start finding her colleagues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013982
text: Find the merchants with Laswi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013983
text: Have Laswi smell the merchants' clothes and follow their scent to find each one. When you find them, tell them of Rose's whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013984
text: Find the last Traveling Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013985
text: You have found 3 traveling merchants. Find the last missing merchant with Laswi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013986
text: Talk to Traveling Merchant Cassias

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013987
text: You have found all of Rose's merchant colleagues. Keep talking to Traveling Merchant Cassias.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013988
text: Defeat the attacking demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013989
text: Traveling Merchant Cassias was about to go back when the demons started attacking. Defeat all of the attacking demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013990
text: Report to Traveling Merchant Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013991
text: You have defeated all attacking demons and Cassias will be safe back at the Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Return to the Herb Gatherers' Cabin and talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013992
text: Talk to Traveling Merchant Andres

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013993
text: Traveling Merchant Andres looks extremely restless. Talk to Traveling Merchant Andres.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013994
text: Look for the Lost Package

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013995
text: Andres says he invested everything in his goods, but now they are lost. Look for Andres' goods at the Doholle Rest Place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013996
text: Deliver to Traveling Merchant Andres

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013997
text: You have found Traveling Merchant Andres' objects. Bring them back to Andres.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013998
text: Talk to Traveling Merchant Gomez

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_013999
text: Traveling Merchant Gomez seems anxious. Go and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014000
text: Defeat the monsters nearby Herb Gatherers' Cabin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014001
text: Traveling Merchant Gomez is frightened by all the demons and monsters running wild. Defeat some monsters around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin to ease Gomez' anxiety.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014002
text: Report to Traveling Merchant Gomez

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014003
text: The area around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin is safer now. Go and reassure Traveling Merchant Gomez.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014004
text: Defeat the monsters nearby Herb Gatherers' Cabin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014005
text: Injured Herbalist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014006
text: Herbalist Tales is injured and collapsed onto the ground. Ask him if he is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014007
text: Collect Ronjia Grass at Nevaginga Hillside

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014008
text: Herbalist Tales requested you get some Ronjia Grass to use as a painkiller. Go to Nevaginga Hillside and collect Ronjia Grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014009
text: Deliver to Herbalist Tales

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014010
text: You have collected enough Ronjia Grass. Deliver it to Herbalist Tales.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014011
text: Herbalist Tales' injury doesn't seem to have gotten any better with just the Ronjia Grass. Talk to Tales again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014012
text: Tell the Cleric Master in Orsha about Herbalist Tales' symptoms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014013
text: Herbalist Tales thinks the Cleric Submaster might know of a way to heal their injuries. Go see the Cleric Submaster in Orsha and tell them about Herbalist Tales' symptoms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014014
text: The Cleric Submaster believes Herbalist Tales might have been taken by evil energy. Ask the Cleric Submaster about what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014015
text: Deliver the medicine to Herbalist Tales

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014016
text: The Cleric Submaster gave you a medicine that can purify evil energy. Deliver the medicine to Herbalist Tales.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014017
text: Where Did Everybody Go?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014018
text: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to Knidos Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014019
text: Rose wants to find the people of her village even if she has to do it alone, so she ran to Knidos Jungle. It's dangerous for her to go alone; follow her into the jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014020
text: Search in Croa Village to find out what happened

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014021
text: Like Rose said, the residents of the Croa Village are nowhere to be seen. Search the village and find out what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014022
text: They can't have moved, or there wouldn't be any household items left behind, and it wasn't an attack as there aren't any sings of struggle, only traces of something being dragged. Tell Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014023
text: Rose looks discouraged, but she seems to have found something. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014024
text: Follow the beads on the ground

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014025
text: Rose says the beads belong to someone in the village called Anne, and that she would never leave them behind. It could be a lead; follow the trail beads on the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014026
text: The trail of beads ends here. Ask Traveling Merchant Rose what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014027
text: Look for more beads or other clues

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014028
text: Traveling Merchant Rose believes there might be other beads nearby. Look around and search for more beads or other clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014029
text: Talk to the person who is hiding

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014030
text: You have found someone hiding. They could be a village resident; try and talk to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014031
text: Talk to Tess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014032
text: Tess is terrified because of the demons. Try and talk to her first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014033
text: Tess was being chased by demons. Defeat the demons that chased her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014034
text: Return to to Tess and talk to her

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014035
text: You have defeated the demons that chased Tess. Go tell Rose and Tess that they are safe now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014036
text: Defeat the demons chasing Tess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014037
text: Tess seems to be a resident of the Croa Village. Talk to her to find out what happened back at the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014038
text: It seems the people of the Croa Village were taken by demons and dragged to the Novaha Monastery. Rose's brother was apparently taken to a different location. Talk to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014039
text: Herbalist Ash is panting hard, talk to him

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014040
text: Defeat nearby demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014041
text: Herbalist Ash wants to go back to Orsha but is scared of all the demons around. Defeat some demons nearby for Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014042
text: You have defeated some demons nearby. Return to Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014043
text: Demon Herbalist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014044
text: Herbalist Ash seems to be worried about something. Ask him what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014045
text: Collect the same herbs as the demon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014046
text: Herbalist Ash says they saw an unusual sight: a demon collecting herbs. They want to know what those herbs were. Go to Neneva Yard and collect a type of herb with small, thin leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014047
text: Deliver to Herbalist Ash

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014048
text: You have found the herbs collected by the demon. Show them to Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014049
text: Herbalist Ash's face froze after realizing the herbs collected by the demon were Aconite, a deadly poisonous type of herb. Talk to Herbalist Ash again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014050
text: Collect Loktanun Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014051
text: Herbalist Ash wants to dry out all the Aconite to prevent the demons from using it. First, catch some Loktanuns and collect their acidic fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014052
text: You have collected enough Loktanun Fluid. Return to Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014053
text: You have collected enough Loktanun Fluid to dry out the Aconite. Talk to Herbalist Ash again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014054
text: Spray the Loktanun Fluid on the Aconite

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014055
text: Spraying the Loktanun Fluid on the Aconite should dry it out. Go to Neneva Yard and spray the Aconite with the collected Loktanun fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014056
text: All the Aconite in sight seems to have been sprayed. Report to Herbalist Ash.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014057
text: Giant Bracken

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014058
text: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to Dadan Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014059
text: Rose ran off to save the people of the Croa Village. Follow her into Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014060
text: Find the demon laboratory and defeat the demons there

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014061
text: Traveling Merchant Rose saw a giant bracken attached to a device and thinks there might be a laboratory nearby. Find the demon laboratory and defeat the demons there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014062
text: Search for materials on the Giant Bracken

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014063
text: This laboratory seems to be related to the giant bracken. Look around and try to find any materials that might be related to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014064
text: Deliver the diary to Traveling Merchant Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014065
text: You have found a diary related to the giant bracken experiment. Give it to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014066
text: Return to Rose and deliver the diary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014067
text: Rescue Traveling Merchant Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014068
text: Rose was captured by demons and an unknown wizard. Rescue Traveling Merchant Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014069
text: You have rescued Rose. Talk to her and see if she is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014070
text: Defeat the demons that tried to kidnap Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014071
text: Traveling Merchant Rose seems to be alright now. Talk to her and figure out what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014072
text: Find the Power Supply Device and remove the power source

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014073
text: In order to turn off the giant bracken device it's power source needs to be removed. Use the monsters to stop the freezing magic circles and remove the power source.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014074
text: You have removed the power source of the experiment device. Tell Rose about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014075
text: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to the entrance of the Novaha Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014076
text: The device attached to the giant bracken seems to be out of the way now. Meet Rose at the Novaha Monastery Entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014077
text: Defeat the sentinel demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014078
text: Traveling Merchant Rose says there are demons guarding the entrance to the Novaha Monastery. Defeat the sentinel demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014079
text: You have defeated all the demons at the entrance to the monastery. Talk to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014080
text: Defeat the Gremlin guarding the monastery entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014081
text: Talk to Herbalist Talas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014082
text: Herbalist Talas is caught in a trap! Go talk to Herbalist Talas immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014083
text: Free Herbalist Talas from the trap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014084
text: Herbalist Talas seems to have gotten caught in the trap while running away from demons. Release Talas from the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014085
text: You have removed the trap. Ask Herbalist Talas if he is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014086
text: Demon Cauldron

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014087
text: Herbalist Talas seems to be fine, fortunately. Ask Talas exactly what happened to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014088
text: Remove the Protective Barrier around the Demon Cauldrons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014089
text: Herbalist Talas saw the demons add a type of a poisonous plant to the cauldrons and tried to destroy them. Go to Ruivara Field and remove the demon cauldrons' protective barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014090
text: Destroy the Demon Cauldrons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014091
text: You have turned off all the protection shield creation devices. Destroy the cauldrons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014092
text: You have destroyed all the cauldrons. Go back to Herbalist Talas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014093
text: It looks like Herbalist Talas still has something to say. Keep talking to Talas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014094
text: Set the boxes of Poisonous Herbs on fire

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014095
text: Herbalist Talas wants to burn the demons' materials to prevent them from restarting their operation. Go to the Saloto Lowland and burn down the demons' boxes of poisonous herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014096
text: Report to Herbalist Talas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014097
text: You have burned down all the boxes with poisonous herbs. Return to Talas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014098
text: The Rescue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014099
text: Follow Rose into the Novaha Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014100
text: The demons guarding the entrance to the monastery have been defeated. Follow Rose inside the Novaha Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014101
text: Talk to the people of the Croa Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014102
text: The residents of the Croa Village seem to be locked inside the Special Reading Room. Ask the residents if they know a solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014103
text: The village residents say the Novaha Monastery monks might know a way, but they saw one of them being dragged by demons earlier. Relay this information to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014104
text: Rescue Monk Goss at the Ankel Small Corridor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014105
text: Traveling Merchant Rose thinks it's best to rescue Monk Goss as the residents suggested. Head to the Ankel Small Corridor and rescue Monk Goss!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014106
text: You have rescued Monk Goss. Check whether he is alright and ask him if he knows of a way to open the door to the Special Reading Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014107
text: Monk Goss seems to have found a way to open the door. Talk to Monk Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014108
text: Obtain Green Apparition Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014109
text: Monk Goss says the demons have created a magic circle which can only be opened by proving that you are a demon. This should be possible with some Green Apparition Essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014110
text: Deliver to Monk Goss

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014111
text: You have collected enough Green Apparition Essences to use on the magic circle. Give it to Monk Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014112
text: Collect %s to prove that you are a demon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014113
text: You have collected some Green Apparition Essences to prove that you are a demon. Ask Monk Goss about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014114
text: Protect Monk Goss until the door to the Special Reading Room is open

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014115
text: Monk Goss says opening the door is easy, although it does take some time. Protect Monk Goss while he opens the door to the Special Reading Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014116
text: The door to the Special Reading Room is open! Talk to Monk Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014117
text: The door to the Special Reading Room is finally open. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014118
text: Traveling Merchant Rose thinks it's best for the village residents to run away immediately. Help the people escape to safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014119
text: Talk to Rose at the Novaha Monastery entrance

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014120
text: Traveling Merchant Rose successfully helped the people of the Croa Village escape to safety. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014121
text: Defeat the attacking Mummyghast

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014122
text: Exhausted

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014123
text: Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014124
text: Experiment Victim Tilis seems to be in terrible condition. Ask Tilis if there is anything you can help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014125
text: Give a Stamina Recovery Potion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014126
text: Tilis was a victim of terrible experiments and their body is in poor condition. Give a stamina recovery potion to Experiment Victim Tilis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014127
text: Experiment Victim Tilis seems to have recovered a little. Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014128
text: Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014129
text: Experiment Victim Tilis seems to feel a little better after taking the potion. Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014130
text: Experiment Victim Tilis wants you to help them escape the monastery. Defeat any demons nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014131
text: Report to Experiment Victim Tilis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014132
text: The surrounding areas seem safer now. Go and tell Experiment Victim Tilis about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014133
text: Defeat the demons nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014134
text: Talk to Experiment Victim Fils

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014135
text: Experiment Victim Fils has collapsed on the ground inside the monastery. Ask Fils if he is alright and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014136
text: Collect Experiment Victims' Relic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014137
text: Experiment Victim Fils wants you to find the relics that belonged to the experiment victims who died. Go to the Raundona Circle Hall and collect the people's relics.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014138
text: Deliver to Experiment Victim Fils

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014139
text: You seem to have found all of the people's relics. Bring them to Fils.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014140
text: Rescue Edmundas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014141
text: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to the Novaha Annex

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014142
text: Now that the people of the Croa Village are safe, go and rescue Rose's brother. Follow Rose into the Novaha Annex and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014143
text: Search for Rose's brother, Edmundas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014144
text: Traveling Merchant Rose went into hiding as the demons are after her. Search for the place where her brother Edmundas is being held captive in the Novaha Annex.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014145
text: Rose's brother Edmundas is being held captive in the Apega State Chamber. Go back to Traveling Merchant Rose and tell her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014146
text: Follow Rose into the Apega State Chamber

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014147
text: Traveling Merchant Rose ran into the Apega State Chamber where her brother is being held captive. Talk to her inside the chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014148
text: Eliminate the cause of Edmundas' pain

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014149
text: Edmundas says a wizard came into the room, causing him to feel pain all of a sudden. Go to the inner section of the Apega State Chamber and destroy the thing that's hurting Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014150
text: You have destroyed all crystal pillars. Go back to Traveling Merchant Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014151
text: Edmundas is going to be fine now. Go and talk to Traveling Merchant Rose again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014152
text: Destroy the Mysterious Wizard's Magic Stone of Pain

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014153
text: As you were about to destroy the protective barrier around Edmundas, a mysterious wizard appeared and kidnapped Rose! Hurry and destroy the wizard's Magic Stone of Pain!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014154
text: You have managed to rescue Edmundas, but Rose was taken away by the mysterious wizard. Talk to Edmundas to figure out what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014155
text: Losing Rose has Edmundas devastated. Talk to him and find out a way to rescue Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014156
text: Find a way to release Edmundas from the shackles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014157
text: Find a way to release Edmundas from the shackles in the State Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014158
text: Edmundas is free from the shackles now. Go back to Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014159
text: The Experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014160
text: Talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014161
text: Experiment Victim Hilbeth is asking for help. Ask him what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014162
text: Search for Hilbeth's Backpack

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014163
text: Experiment Victim Hilbeth wants you to find his backpack of herbs. Go to the Tebeti Small Corridor and look for Hilbeth's backpack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014164
text: Deliver to Experiment Victim Hilbeth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014165
text: You have found Hilbeth's Backpack. Give it back to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014166
text: Experiment Victim Hilbeth took the herbs in the backpack and seems to be feeling better now. Talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014167
text: Search the Collapsed Grand Corridor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014168
text: Hilbeth's family are being victims of demon experiments at the Collapsed Grand Corridor and need to be rescued. Go there and investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014169
text: All you could gather were some objects found in a strange pile of bracken. Relay this to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014170
text: The objects you found at the Collapsed Grand Corridor were Hilbeth's family's belongings. Offer Hilbeth some words of comfort.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014171
text: Destroy the remaining experiment facilities at the Errzze Oratorium

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014172
text: Experiment Victim Hilbeth wants to stop any kind of experiment from happening again. As requested, destroy the remaining demon experiment facilities at the Errzze Oratorium.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014173
text: You have destroyed all experiment facilities. Go and talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014174
text: A Monk's Last Mission

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014175
text: Talk to Monk Abels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014176
text: Monk Abels' condition is visibly deteriorated. Talk to Monk Abels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014177
text: Retrieve Holy Relic Fragments at Gaile Chapel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014178
text: Monk Abels cannot turn a blind eye to the damage the demons have done. Go to Gaile Chapel and retrieve the holy relic fragments needed to purify the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014179
text: Deliver to Monk Abels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014180
text: You have collected as many holy relic fragments as possible. Bring them to Monk Abels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014181
text: Monk Abels' condition is worsening. Listen to what Abels has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014182
text: Prepare the relic for purifying the monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014183
text: Monk Abels put his last efforts into restoring the holy relic. Use the relic to purify different locations in the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014184
text: Report to Monk Abels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014185
text: You have completed the purifying process. Go and look after Monk Abels in his last moments.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014186
text: Rescue Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014187
text: Follow Edmundas Into the Novaha Institute to rescue Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014188
text: Edmundas ran inside the Novaha Institute to save Rose, asking you to help rescue her. To help Edmundas save Rose, follow him inside the institute and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014189
text: Find Black Materials to overload the device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014190
text: Edmundas wants to try and overload the device, but he is not sure what to use for that. For now, try and defeat Brown Hummingbirds and collect any black objects you can obtain, then bring them to Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014191
text: The black substance the wizard used on the device was Brown Hummingbird mucus. Talk to Edmundas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014192
text: Collect Brown Hummingbird Mucus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014193
text: To bring Rose back to safety you need to overload the device and destroy it. Collect as much Brown Hummingbird mucus as you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014194
text: Deliver to Edmundas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014195
text: You have collected enough Brown Hummingbird Mucus. Bring it back to Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014196
text: Defeat Brown Hummingbirds to acquire mucus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014197
text: Talk to Edmundas in the Main Hall Atrium

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014198
text: Edmundas says the next device is in the Main Hall Atrium. Follow Edmundas into the Main Hall Atrium.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014199
text: Destroy the Mind Control Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014200
text: Rose could be under the influence of the Mind Control Crystals. Obtain the protective barrier from the device inside the Main Hall Atrium and destroy the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014201
text: You have destroyed all Mind Control Crystals. Talk to Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014202
text: Talk to Edmundas nearby the Medie State Apartments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014203
text: Edmundas took a lift to the Medie State Apartments. Follow Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014204
text: Rescue Rose at the Kilnuma Oratorium

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014205
text: The wizard wants to use Rose to spread out the giant bracken spores. Thwart the wizard's plans and rescue Rose at the Kilnuma Oratorium!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014206
text: You rescued Rose and brought her back to safety. Ask Rose if she is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014207
text: Edmundas' Worry

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014208
text: It looks like Edmundas wants to ask you a favor. Talk to Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014209
text: Defeat monsters at the Medie State Apartments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014210
text: Edmundas is not fully recovered yet, and the monsters are worrying him. Defeat the monsters at Medie State Apartments for Edmundas and Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014211
text: Report to Edmundas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014212
text: You have defeated the monsters at the Medie State Apartments. Tell Edmundas they will be safe for a while now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014213
text: The monsters might be gone, but Edmundas is still worried about the demons. Talk to Edmundas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014214
text: Relay the situation to Orsha's Wizard Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014215
text: According to Edmundas, the Wizard Submaster in Orsha owes him a favor and might be able to help them. Go see the Wizard Submaster in Orsha and explain what happened to Edmundas and Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014216
text: The Wizard Submaster feels sorry about what happened to the siblings. Ask the Wizard Submaster for a way to stop the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014217
text: Craft a Protection Barrier Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014218
text: The Wizard Submaster gave you a recipe for a Protection Barrier Crystal. Defeat Deadborn Scaps at the Novaha Institute to obtain their demon essences,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014219
text: then press the key to enter Rest Mode and craft a Protection Barrier Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014220
text: Place the Protection Barrier Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014221
text: The Protection Barrier Crystal is completed. Go back to Edmundas and place the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014222
text: Craft a %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014223
text: Edmundas and Rose will now be protected from demon attacks. Tell Edmundas about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014224
text: It looks like Traveling Merchant Rose has a final favor to ask of you. Talk to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014225
text: Remove the power sources of the Giant Bracken Spore Breeding Device in Sotras Chapel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014226
text: Remove the power sources of the giant bracken spore breeding device inside Sotras Chapel. To keep the power sources from reactivating, you will have to remove them in the correct order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014227
text: You have deactivated the spore breeding device. Tell Traveling Merchant Rose about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014228
text: Listen to Rose's detailed testimony

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014229
text: Traveling Merchant Rose believes she was able to read part of the wizard's mind when she was under mind contol. Listen to her testimony.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014230
text: Rose seems devastated after hearing from Tess that her brother was taken to a different location. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014231
text: Rose is back to her senses after hearing your words of comfort. Talk to Rose about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014232
text: Member Grazina feels at risk and wants you to deliver the objects hidden in the Astral Tower. Deliver Grazina's objects to Member Irmantas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014233
text: Member Grazina needs you to find Member Alina. She says she saw her running South past Member Irmantas; head downwards and find Member Alina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014234
text: Tell Member Irmantas about the death of Member Alina and her objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014235
text: Demon Lord Hauberk needs his servants to help him defeat the demons chasing after him. To help Hauberk call his servants, disable the monsters and let Hauberk absorb them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014236
text: Defeat Drapeliun

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014237
text: Demon Lord Hauberk thinks it's time to defeat Drapeliun. He hopes to drag Drapeliun out of the suspicious device in the Fiskavi Plains and defeat it with your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014238
text: You have defeated Drapeliun. Talk to Demon Lord Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014239
text: Collect %s by defeating monsters at Apgaudin Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014240
text: Collect Mochia Stems at Mochia Fields

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014241
text: Gailus Legwyn's spirit says the Kartas Hunter is encapsuled inside the Blessing Crystal, which means unless the demon is defeated, there is no way to get back the crystal. Collect some Mochia Stems at Mochia Fields in order to summon the vassals of the Legwyn family against the hunter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014242
text: You have collected enough Mochia Stems. Bring them to Gailus Legwyn's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014243
text: The Journey Begins

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014244
text: What a horrific dream. But it's time to head to Orsha. Talk to Settler Bowein by the Lemprasa Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014245
text: Press the M key to view the map to find Settler Brophen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014246
text: Press the M key to open the map. Confirm Settler Brophen's location, then go and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014247
text: Defeat the swarm of Kepas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014248
text: You have protected Settler Brophen from the Kepas' attack. Talk to Settler Brophen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014249
text: Use a Status Point

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014250
text: Brophen says you can use Status Points by leveling up to become even stronger. Press the F1 key and distribute your new Status Point.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014251
text: You feel stronger now after using the Status Point. Talk to Settler Brophen again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014252
text: Settler Brophen taught you how to use Status Points. Talk to Settler Brophen again and find out what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014253
text: Deliver Grass Leaf Ointment to Settler Layla

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014254
text: Settler Brophen says Settler Layla might know where the mayor is. He also asked you to deliver some grass leaf ointment to her. On your way to the Temporary Settler Camp, go see Layla and give her the grass leaf ointment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014255
text: Settler Layla says Mayor Romanas is headed to the Temporary Settler Camp. Go and talk to Mayor Romanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014256
text: Mayor Romanas believes in your talent and will make sure you're admitted into Orsha immediately. Officer Lutas is looking for you; go find him at the Orsha Migration Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014257
text: Officer Lutas is processing the settlers' entrance into Orsha but the task feels endless. Talk to Officer Lutas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014258
text: A Poata suddenly appeared at the entrance to Orsha and it's threatening the settlers! Defeat the Poata and make the entrance to Orsha safe again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014259
text: You have defeated the Poata. Talk to Officer Lutas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014260
text: Defeat the Poata attacking Orsha's Migration Office

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014261
text: You have defeated the Poata. Talk to Officer Lutas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014262
text: Your entrance formalities have been processed. You can visit Orsha now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014263
text: Talk to Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014264
text: Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha, is looking for someone with skills. To find Urbonas, the bishop of Orsha, talk to Inesa Hamondale at the Central Plaza first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014265
text: Settler Izna is looking fixedly at you. Talk to Settler Izna.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014266
text: Defeat Leaf Bugs to obtain Red Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014267
text: Settler Izna wants to make some medicine for you as a token of appreciation. Defeat some Leaf Bugs around Ziedo Pond to obtain Red Leaves for the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014268
text: Deliver the Red Leaves to Settler Izna

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014269
text: You have collected enough Red Leaves as requested by Settler Izna. Bring them to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014270
text: Defeat Leaf Bugs to obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014271
text: Settler Izna seems to have a request for you. Talk to Settler Izna.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014272
text: Defeat Chinencys to obtain Rampar Mucus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014273
text: Settler Izna wants to make Stamina Pills for the new settlers arriving to Orsha. Defeat Chinencys around Ziedo Pond and collect the Rampar Mucus used to make Stamina pills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014274
text: Deliver the Rampar Mucus to Settler Izna

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014275
text: You have collected enough Rampar Mucus as requested by Settler Izna. Bring it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014276
text: Defeat Chinencys to obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014277
text: Settler Izna seems to be deeply worried about something. Talk to Settler Izna.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014278
text: Make a bonfire on Adata Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014279
text: Settler Izna believes some village residents have gotten lost on their way to Orsha. Go to Adata Highway and make a bonfire so they can spot the smoke and find their way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014280
text: Report to Settler Izna

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014281
text: You successfully made a bonfire. Go and tell Settler Izna.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014282
text: The bonfire may be set, but Settler Izna is still worried about something. Talk to Settler Izna again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014283
text: Set fire to the firewood on Adata Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014284
text: Settler Izna thinks the bonfire may be hard to spot by the residents. Go to Adata Highway and set fire to the firewood there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014285
text: You successfully defeated the Woodspirit. Go back to Settler Izna.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014286
text: Settler Ivanayus seems to be struggling with something. Go and talk to Settler Ivanayus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014287
text: Collect Useful Object

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014288
text: Settler Ivanayus is in desperate need of supplies and willing to settle for used ones. Go to the Lumberjack Cabin and collect useful objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014289
text: Deliver the useful objects to Settler Ivanayus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014290
text: You have collected enough useful objects. Bring them to Settler Ivanayus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014291
text: Settler Dallanas is giving you a quizzical look. Talk to Settler Dallanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014292
text: Worship the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at the Randoluma Rest Place

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014293
text: Settler Dallanas says the goddesses bless those who worship their statues. Worship the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at the Randoluma Rest Place and receive Her blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014294
text: Settler Dallanas seems worried about something. Talk to Settler Dallanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014295
text: Defeat Monsters at the Randoluma Rest Place

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014296
text: Settler Dallanas was told to wait at the Randoluma Rest Place before coming to Orsha, but staying there proved impossible due to the amount of monsters. Go to the Randoluma Rest Place and defeat the monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014297
text: The Randoluma Rest Place is safer now. Go and tell Settler Dallanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014298
text: Settler Dallanas seems anxious about something. Ask them what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014299
text: Randoluma Rest Place

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014300
text: Settler Dallanas says her people arrived at the Randoluma Rest Place but had to scatter because of the monsters. Go to Randoluma Rest Place and find the villagers hiding there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014301
text: You have found the villagers and brought them back to safety. Tell Settler Dallanas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014302
text: The Lord of Orsha, Inesa Hamondale, wants you to hear about what is happening in Orsha before you start your journey. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about the situation in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014303
text: Inesa Hamondale has asked you to find the bishop of Orsha, Urbonas, who is missing. Talk to Inesa Hamondale again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014304
text: Inesa Hamondale seems to have something prepared for you before you set out to find Bishop Urbonas. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014305
text: Worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014306
text: Before you leave, Inesa Hamondale has asked you to worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014307
text: Visit the Item Merchant in the Shopping District

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014308
text: Inesa Hamondale has prepared a little gift for you. Go see the Item Merchant in the Shopping District.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014309
text: It seems the Item Merchant has something else to ask you. Talk to the Item Merchant again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014310
text: Visit the Accessory Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014311
text: It seeems Inesa Hamondale has asked the Accessory Merchant to prepare another gift for you. Go find the Accessory Merchant in the Shopping District.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014312
text: The Item Merchant says Inesa Hamondale is looking for you. Return to Inesa Hamondale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014313
text: Talk to Agent Cherasia at the Woods of the Linked Bridges

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014314
text: News just came in from Agent Cherasia, who is searching for the missing bishop. Go find the agent in the Woods of the Linked Bridges.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014315
text: Collect Priest Irma's Journal Pages

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014316
text: Agent Cherasia seems to have found part of Priest Irma's journal while looking for the missing bishop. Try and recover the rest of the journal from monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014317
text: Deliver to Agent Cherasia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014318
text: You have collected as much of the journal as possible. Deliver it to Agent Cherasia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014319
text: Collect %s from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014320
text: Agent Cherasia seems to have found some revealing contents in Priest Irma's journal. Take the journal to Moren.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014321
text: Help Agent Moren

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014322
text: Protect Agent Moren while he investigates. The more monsters you defeat in the area, the faster the agent will finish his investigation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014323
text: Agent Moren's investigation is now complete. Ask him whether he has found anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014324
text: Agent Moren seems to be pondering something. Keep talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014325
text: Collect clues from the Smoking Piles of Grass

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014326
text: Agent Moren is convinced there might be other clues around. Look for leads in piles of grass with smoke coming out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014327
text: Deliver to Agent Moren

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014328
text: You have collected a good amount of clues. Bring them to Agent Moren.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014329
text: Imminent Danger

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014330
text: Agent Moren thinks Priest Pranas might know something about the clues found here. Chaser Ulysses and Priest Pranas are traveling upwards; go and meet them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014331
text: Investigate the Greate Stone Face Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014332
text: Priest Pranas instructed Chaser Ulysses to investigate, but he finds it difficult because of the monsters. Go and investigate the Greate Stone Face Hill for them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014333
text: Read the Unknown Diary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014334
text: An unknown diary was found in the tent destroyed by the Minotaur. Read what it says.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014335
text: Deliver to Chaser Ulysses

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014336
text: The diary belongs to the missing Bishop Urbonas. Bring the diary to Chaser Ulysses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014337
text: Talk to Chaser Talbasi at Paupys Crossing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014338
text: Chaser Ulysses seems extremely worried about the demons. He wants you to go to Paupys Crossing immediately and find Chaser Talbasi, who is helping Priest Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014339
text: Chaser Ulysses is worried about the demons and thinks it's best for you to go and help Priest Pranas instead. Go to Paupys Crossing and talk to Chaser Talbasi, who is there investigating with Priest Pranas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014340
text: Agent Pierneef looks extremely worn out. Try and talk to Agent Pierneef.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014341
text: Defeat the monsters at the Zbuka Inner Court

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014342
text: Agent Pierneef is helping other agents investigate the area. Defeat some monsters at the Zbuka Inner Court.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014343
text: Report to Agent Pierneef

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014344
text: The area seems safer now. Report back to Agent Pierneef.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014345
text: A nauseating smell permeates the air all around. Ask Agent Pierneef about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014346
text: Agent Pierneef says the smell of defeated monsters is making other monsters go wild. Go to the Zbuka Inner Court and eliminate the smelly cart there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014347
text: You have burned down the smelly cart. Go and tell Agent Pierneef.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014348
text: Chaser Germeja is happy to see you. Talk to Chaser Germeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014349
text: Use the stimulant on the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014350
text: Chaser Germeja wants to give the monsters a stimulant drug that makes them fight each other. Use the stimulant on monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014351
text: The stimulant works perfectly. Go and talk to Chaser Germeja again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014352
text: Chaser Raitis looks worryingly livid. Ask Chaser Raitis if there is a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014353
text: Defeat the monsters at Bonan Forest Road

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014354
text: Chaser Raitis says they saw an unknown monster making a nest at Bonan Forest Road. Go destroy the nest and defeat some monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014355
text: Destroy the Monster Nest in Bonan Forest Road

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014356
text: You have defeated the monsters in Bonan Forest Road. Keep going and destroy the unknown monster nest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014357
text: Report to Chaser Raitis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014358
text: You have successfully destroyed the nest. Go and tell Chaser Raitis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014359
text: Chaser Ulysses is worried about the demons and thinks it's best for you to go and help Priest Pranas instead. Go to Paupys Crossing and talk to Chaser Talbasi, who is there investigating with Priest Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014360
text: Chaser Talbasi believes they can figure out what is going on once all of Priest Gelija's notes are collected. Defeat monsters at the Uninhabited Crossing and try to collect all of Priest Gelija's memos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014361
text: Deliver to Chaser Talbasi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014362
text: You have collected Priest Gelija's notes as much as possible. Return to Chaser Talbasi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014363
text: Collect Priest Gelija's Memos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014364
text: You now have Priest Gelija's notes, but an important part seems to have been torn off. Ask Chaser Talbasi about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014365
text: Search the Paslaptis Hideout

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014366
text: Chaser Talbasi believes it's best to obtain more concrete clues before finding Priest Pranas. They asked you to search the recently discovered Paslaptis Hideout before meeting up with Agent Larena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014367
text: There was nothing but traces of hurried movements at the Paslaptis Hideout. To continue investigating, go talk to Agent Larena under the Watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014368
text: Find the priests' traces with Jolly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014369
text: Agent Larena believes Bishop Urbonas and the priests are on the move not because of a simple threat, but with a specific purpose. Take Jolly, a dog raised by the priests, and try to find their traces nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014370
text: Thanks to Jolly you were able to find traces of the priests. Go and talk to Larena again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014371
text: Agent Larena seems to have hear something. Ask Agent Larena what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014372
text: Chaser Sendal looks gravely injured. Talk to Chaser Sendal and find out what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014373
text: Chaser Sendal was waiting for help. Talk to Chaser Sendal and find out what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014374
text: Rescue Priest Pranas from the demons at Groundsle Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014375
text: Chaser Sendal and Priest Pranas encountered some demons while investigating Groundsle Hill. Chaser Sendal now wants you to help rescue Priest Pranas from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014376
text: You finally rescued Priest Pranas. Ask Priest Pranas if he is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014377
text: Priest Pranas' condition seems to have worsened drastically. Keep talking to Priest Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014378
text: Priest Pranas has asked you to find traces of Bishop Urbonas and return to Orsha. Search Groundsle Hill for any leads on Bishop Urbonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014379
text: Talk to Priest Pranas in Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014380
text: You discovered a locked box. Go see Priest Pranas, who is receiving treatment in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014381
text: Agent Orwen seems to need your help. Talk to Agent Orwen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014382
text: Agent Orwen wants you to defeat the monsters disturbing the agents' operations at the Naudingas Felled Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014383
text: Report to Agent Orwen

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014384
text: You have cleared out the monsters nearby. Report to Agent Orwen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014385
text: Agent Orwen seems worried about the sudden horde of demons. Talk to Agent Orwen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014386
text: Remove the Ominous Magic Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014387
