text: Agent Orwen says the demons have created a series of unknown magic circles. Remove the magic circles created by the demons at the Naudingas Felled Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014388
text: You have eliminated all visible magic circles. Go back and tell Agent Orwen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014389
text: Agent Notres looks furious. Ask Agent Notres what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014390
text: Defeat the monsters at the Deer Hooves Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014391
text: Agent Notres thinks it doesn't make sense to move the people migrating to Orsha to the Deer Hooves Lot. First, they want you to check whether it would be possible to defeat the monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014392
text: Check out at the Deer Hooves Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014393
text: Agent Notres has asked you to check whether the Deer Hooves Lot can be used to make a temporary settler camp. Go there and see whether it is safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014394
text: The Deer Hooves Lot doesn't seem like a safe place for the settlers. Go and tell Agent Notres about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014395
text: Agent Notres seems to need your help. Talk to Agent Notres.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014396
text: Agent Notres was sent to collect blood from monsters in order to find out what is making them so ferocious, but it's not an easy task. Defeat some monsters at Rohonsa Cliff and help collect their contaminated blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014397
text: Deliver to Agent Notres

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014398
text: You have collected enough contaminated blood. Bring it to Agent Notres.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014399
text: Chaser Zegaus needs your help. Talk to Chaser Zegaus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014400
text: While Chaser Zegaus is glad Priest Pranas is safe, now they are injured and worried for their own safety. Defeat some monsters for Zegaus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014401
text: The monsters won't be a threat now. Return to Chaser Zegaus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014402
text: Chaser Zegaus looks troubled by something. Ask Chaser Zegaus what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014403
text: Collect Chaser Zegaus' Belongings

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014404
text: Chaser Zegaus seems to have lost a bag with medicine and bandages. Look around and search for the trackers' belongings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014405
text: Deliver to Chaser Zegaus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014406
text: You have found the trackers' belongings. Bring them to Chaser Zegaus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014407
text: The box you found at Groundsle Hill that seems to belong to Bishop Urbonas. Talk to Priest Pranas about the box's contents.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014408
text: Relay the journal's contents to Inesa Hamondale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014409
text: Most of the contents of Bishop Urbonas' journal remain unknown. For now, relay the journal as it is to Inesa Hamondale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014410
text: Inesa Hamondale is deeply worried after hearing about Bishop Urbonas being chased by demons. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014411
text: Inesa Hamondale prepared a quick gift that will be useful for your journey. Before departing for Ashaq Underground Prison, visit the Item Merchant to collect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014412
text: If you are ready, go join Priest Pranas before leaving for the Ashaq Underground Prison to rescue Bishop Urbonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014413
text: Join Priest Pranas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014414
text: Priest Pranas says he is going to gather a few talented Chasers and head to the entrance of Ashaq Underground Prison. Join him by the Gebene Cliff in Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014415
text: Bishop Urbonas' Whereabouts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014416
text: You have now met with Priest Pranas at the entrance to the Ashaq Underground Prison. Ask him whether he is ready to go inside the prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014417
text: Priest Pranas says he will enter Ashaq Underground Prison 1F first with the Chasers. Follow Priest Pranas to Ashaq Underground Prison 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014418
text: There seems to be something wrong with Priest Pranas and the Chasers. Ask Priest Pranas about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014419
text: Priest Pranas is having difficulties moving due to an odd energy felt in the area. Talk to Priest Pranas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014420
text: Check the Torture Material Room

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014421
text: Priest Pranas says he feels as if his body is being constricted. He did say the sensation felt stronger inside the Torture Material Room; go there and investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014422
text: Defeat the incoming demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014423
text: The idol inside the Torture Material Room is making the demons attack!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014424
text: Report to Priest Pranas on the Cursed Idol

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014425
text: You have successfully defeated the attacking demons. Talk to Priest Pranas about the cursed idol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014426
text: Defeat the attacking demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014427
text: With the cursed idol destroyed, the curse on Ashaq Underground Prison 1F seems to have been lifted. Return to Priest Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014428
text: Priest Pranas seems to be completely unaware of the cursed idol. Talk to Priest Pranas about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014429
text: Go to the location marked on the map left by Bishop Urbonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014430
text: Priest Pranas believes the map left behind by Bishop Urbonas is the only hope you have. Take the track under the stairs to the right side of Pranas to get to the location marked on the map.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014431
text: Talk to Bishop Urbonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014432
text: Unexpectedly, Bishop Urbonas is standing on the spot marked on the map! Ask Bishop Urbonas about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014433
text: Bishop Urbonas says he is hiding in the Ashaq Underground Prison to keep the Demon Orders from Marnox. Tell Bishop Urbonas about the nightmare.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014434
text: Bishop Urbonas wonders if you're not a Revelator as the ones told in the legends yourself. Step on the Revelator magic circle to prove your identity as a Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014435
text: A bright light twines around your body and you feel an inexplicable surge of divine force. Talk to Bishop Urbonas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014436
text: Bishop Urbonas has asked you to retrieve the hidden Demon Orders. Talk to him again and find out what you need to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014437
text: Defeat demons to recharge the Orb of Return

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014438
text: According to Urbonas, to destroyed the cursed idol you need to defeat demons in Ashaq Underground Prison 1F and recharge the Orb of Return, then use it on the cursed idol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014439
text: Destroy the Cursed Idol in the Torture Material Room

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014440
text: You have recharged the Orb of Return. Use it on the cursed idol to destroy it!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014441
text: Defeat Blue Dumaros and Blue Wendigos to recharge the Orb of Return

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014442
text: Chaser Torvana fears the demons might attack because of the cursed idol. Talk to Chaser Torvana.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014443
text: Chaser Torvana has asked you to collect red crystals from demons. Go to the Torture Chamber and defeat Blue Dumaros and Blue Wendigos to collect red crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014444
text: Deliver to Chaser Torvana

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014445
text: You have collected enough red crystals. Bring them to Chaser Torvana.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014446
text: Collect %s by defeating Blue Dumaros and Blue Wendigos

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014447
text: Something seems to be disturbing Chaser Torvana. Ask Chaser Torvana if everything is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014448
text: Chaser Torvana wants to beat the curse using the demons' evil energy. Obtain black wooden pieces from the demons in the Punishment Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014449
text: You have collected enough black wooden pieces. Will they help Chaser Torvana?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014450
text: Unidentified Package

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014451
text: Chaser Daramaus has a favor to ask of you. Talk to Chaser Daramaus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014452
text: Obtain Unidentified Packages

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014453
text: Chaser Daramaus believes the solution to lifting the curse might be in the unidentified packages carried around by the demons. Defeat Blue Dumaros and obtain their packages.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014454
text: Collect Unidentified Packages

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014455
text: Use the Unidentified Packages to see their effect

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014456
text: You have collected enough unidentified packages. Use them on monsters to see what effect they possess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014457
text: The packages possess not a curse, but a series of beneficial effects. Go and tell Chaser Daramaus about the packages' effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014458
text: Priest Pranas is still searching for Bishop Urbonas. Go immediately and tell him about Bishop Urbonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014459
text: Follow Priest Pranas into Ashaq Underground Prison 2F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014460
text: The Chasers have not yet recovered from the effects of the curse. Follow Priest Pranas into Ashaq Underground Prison 2F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014461
text: Priest Irma believes it's best to find a way to safely destroy the cursed idol, as the orb is not yet completed. Keep talking to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014462
text: Absorb demon magic into the Cursed Idol

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014463
text: For the cursed idol to be safely destroyed, its energy needs to clash with the orb's power. First, defeat demons around the idol in the Examination Room and have it absorb their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014464
text: Destroy the Cursed Idol with the Orb of Return

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014465
text: The cursed idol has fully absorbed the demons' power. Use the Orb of Return to destroy the idol!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014466
text: There seems to be another cursed idol in Ashaq Underground Prison 2F. Keep talking to Priest Pranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014467
text: Rescue Priest Irma from the Solitary Confinement District

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014468
text: Priest Pranas heard about what happened to Priest Irma from the other priests. Rescue Priest Irma from the Solitary Confinement District.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014469
text: You have defeated the Fire Lord summoned by Demon Lord Marnox. Ask Priest Irma if she is all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014470
text: Priest Irma was about to hand over the Orb of Return to destroy the cursed idol when she noticed something odd. Talk to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014471
text: Defeat Wendigo Escapees and charge the Orb of Return

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014472
text: Priest Irma says the Orb of Return is heavily damaged from having used it on Demon Lord Marnox. To fix the Orb of Return, defeat Wendigo Escapees nearby the Central Passage and use their magic energy to restore the Orb of Return.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014473
text: Deliver to Priest Irma

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014474
text: You have infused the orb with the Wendigo Escapees' magic power. Show the Orb of Return to Priest Irma again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014475
text: Priest Irma says the Orb of Return needs a charge of divine power to fully recover. Ask Priest Irma how to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014476
text: Strengthen the Orb with the Crystal's Power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014477
text: Priest Irma wants you to charge the orb with power from the crystals in the Bird Room and the Supply Room. Walk near the crystals to have it absorb their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014478
text: The orb seems to be somewhat restored. Show it to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014479
text: You have successfully destroyed the Cursed Idol. Go and tell Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014480
text: Talk to Priest Irma at Ashaq Underground Prison 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014481
text: Priest Irma believes it's time to take back the Demon Orders and has asked you to meet her at Ashaq Underground Prison 3F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014482
text: It looks like Priest Auranas needs your help. Talk to Priest Auranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014483
text: Collect Twinkling Pearl Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014484
text: Under the instruction of Bishop Urbonas, Priest Auranas has several emergency items prepared all around Ashaq Underground Prison. Go to the Watchtower and retrieve the shiny pearl powder left there by Auranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014485
text: Deliver to Priest Auranas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014486
text: Despite the bag being torn you managed to collect what is left of the pearl powder. Bring it to Priest Auranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014487
text: Priest Auranas has created a sort of orb with the pearl powder you have collected. Talk to Priest Auranas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014488
text: Defeat the demons marked by the Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014489
text: According to Priest Auranas, using this orb will point out high-rank demons. Use the orb and defeat the demons signaled by it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014490
text: The demon subordinates look confused without their superiors around. Report to Priest Auranas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014491
text: Defeat the demons marked by the Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014492
text: Priest Draznie looks deep in worry. Talk to Priest Draznie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014493
text: Defeat the monsters in the Special Prison District

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014494
text: Priest Draznie is looking for a safe place for the priests to take refuge. Defeat the monsters in the Special Prison District to make it a safe shelter for the priests.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014495
text: Report to Priest Draznie

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014496
text: You have defeated enough demons. Go and tell Priest Draznie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014497
text: Priest Draznie requires your help. Talk to Priest Draznie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014498
text: Priest Draznie thinks it's time to use the trap prepared by Priest Auranas. Your job is to lure the demons into the trap set up in the Solitary Cells area, where they should be easily defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014499
text: You have defeated the demons with ease thanks to the trap. Tell Priest Draznie about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014500
text: Priest Irma says there is another cursed idol here. Keep talking to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014501
text: Release the Altar Spirit on your way to the Second Watchtower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014502
text: Priest Irma wants to release the spirit of the closest altar to clear out the energy of the cursed idol. With the power of the Revelators, release the spirit on your way to the Second Watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014503
text: You have released the spirit of the altar. Return to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014504
text: The demons have noticed the altar spirit, but it is not enough to interfere with the energy of the cursed idol. Talk to Priest Irma again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014505
text: Release the Altar Spirit in the Prayer Room

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014506
text: Priest Irma believes your only hope lies on the blessing spirit of the last remaining altar. Release the spirit bestowed on the Confession Altar in the Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014507
text: You have released the altar spirit. Ask Priest Irma whether the curse of the idol was lifted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014508
text: Priest Irma can feel that the curse of the idol is being dispelled. Keep talking to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014509
text: Destroy the Cursed Idol in the Second Watchtower

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014510
text: Priest Irma believes the Idol will have become completely harmless now. Go to the Second Watchtower and destroy the cursed idol.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014511
text: The demons standing guard on the cursed idol attacked, but you managed to successfully destroy it. Return to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014512
text: With the cursed idol destroyed, you should be able to search for the hidden Demon Orders now. Talk to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014513
text: Demon Lord Marnox was hiding in the Penitence Room waiting to attack you! Defeat Demon Lord Marnox.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014514
text: You have defeated Demon Lord Marnox. Ask Priest Irma if she is all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014515
text: You have recovered the Demon Orders, but Priest Irma's condition has suffered. Talk to Priest Irma.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014516
text: Deliver to Priest Urbonas at Ashaq Underground Prison 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014517
text: Priest Irma wants you to go and deliver the Demon Orders to Bishop Urbonas. Bring the orders to the room in Ashaq Underground Prison 1F where Bishop Urbonas is hiding.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014518
text: Bishop Urbonas cannot hide his surprise at the fact that you defeated Marnox. Keep talking to Bishop Urbonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014519
text: Return to Orsha and talk to Inesa Hamondale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014520
text: Bishop Urbonas believes the Lord of Orsha, Inesa Hamondale, will be worried about him. Return to Orsha and talk to Inesa Hamondale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014521
text: Priest Gelija is looking for someone to help to help with their research. Talk to Priest Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014522
text: Collect Marnox's Insignia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014523
text: Priest Gelija is looking to do research on the demons' command hierarchy. Defeat demons to collect Marnox insignias.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014524
text: Deliver to Priest Gelija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014525
text: You have collected enough insignias for Priest Gelija's research. Bring them to Priest Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014526
text: Priest Gelija seems to have something to ask of you. Talk to Priest Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014527
text: Retrieve Priest Gelija's Medicine Pouch

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014528
text: Priest Gelija is trying to help the injured but it seems they lost a pouch with medicine while running away. Find Priest Gelija's medicine pouch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014529
text: You have found Priest Gelija's medicine pouch. Bring it to Priest Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014530
text: Priest Gelija is looking for a helping hand. Talk to Priest Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014531
text: Purify the Cursed Idol with the Holy Water Cloth

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014532
text: While the cursed idol has been destroyed, its future still worries Priest Gelija. Cover any idol fragments with the cloth soaked in holy water to clear out their evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014533
text: A lot of the evil energy has now been purified. Return to Priest Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014534
text: Inesa Hamondale, Lord of Orsha, is honored to meet a Revelator. Keep talking to Inesa Hamondale.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014535
text: Inesa Hamondale has asked you to return to Bishop Urbonas. Go see Bishop Urbonas and hear about the contents of the Demon Orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014536
text: Defeat monsters in Paupys Crossing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014537
text: The Swordsman Submaster has tasked you with defeating Red Kepas and Woodins in Paupys Crossing to prove your skills as a Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014538
text: Defeat Red Kepas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014539
text: Defeat Woodins

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014540
text: Hit the Sword Pell to prove your strength

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014541
text: The Highlander Submaster doubts you have the strength to handle a two-handed sword. Use the Sword Pell to prove your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014542
text: Defeat Woodins in Paupys Crossing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014543
text: To judge your practical skills and strength, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Woodins in Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014544
text: You have defeated the Woodins as instructed. Return to the Highlander Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014545
text: Collect Pokuborn Tusks and Dry Wood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014546
text: The Peltasta Submaster has tasked you with collecting materials for a shield. Go to the Woods of the Linked Bridges to collect Pokuborn tusks and to Paupys Crossing for dry wood.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014547
text: Investigate the piles of wood and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014548
text: Obtain %s from Pokuborns

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014549
text: The Cleric Submaster has requested you clear out the Pokubus and Pokuborns terrorizing people at the Woods of the Linked Bridges.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014550
text: You have sufficiently intimidated nearby monsters. Return to the Cleric Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014551
text: Defeat Pokubus and Pokuborns

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014552
text: Set fire to the Flameholder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014553
text: Recharge the Torch Gem's energy by defeating any type of monster. After it is full, set fire to the flameholder by the Krivis Submaster. This is a task you must complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014554
text: The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit the Cleric, Krivis and Bokor Submasters in Orsha to receive their blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014555
text: Defeat Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014556
text: The Swordsman Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle to achieve an even stronger level.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014557
text: You have defeated the Gosarus. Return to the Swordsman Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014558
text: Defeat Gosaru

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014559
text: To evaluate how much you have grown as a Revelator, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014560
text: Defeat monsters it the Dadan Jungle with a shield equipped

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014561
text: The Peltasta Submaster wants to test your shield using abilities. Equip a shield and hunt monsters at the Dadan Jungle. Defeating demons will earn you extra points. Alas, this is a task you will have to complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014562
text: You have cleared out enough monsters. Return to the Peltasta Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014563
text: Defeat Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014564
text: The Hoplite Submaster has tasked you with defeating Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014565
text: You have cleared out enough Rafflys. Return to the Hoplite Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014566
text: Defeat Raffly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014567
text: Defeat Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014568
text: The Barbarian Submaster wants to test your mind for combat. Defeat the Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle and submit proof of your hunt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014569
text: You have defeated the Gosarus. Return to the Barbarian Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014570
text: Use the ointment to heal refugees at Lemprasa Pond

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014571
text: Worship all Goddess Statues around Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014572
text: The Krivis Submaster has tasked you with visiting the Lemprasa Pond, Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing and worshiping the Goddess Statues in all those locations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014573
text: Collect herbs for the ointment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014574
text: The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle and collect Wormwood, Hemostasis Herb and Moonlight Flower respectively in each area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014575
text: Collect %s at Koru Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014576
text: Collect %s at Knidos Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014577
text: Collect %s at Dadan Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014578
text: Collect materials and craft a Bokor Doll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014579
text: Go to Dadan Jungle and collect Raffly Soul Crystals and Vubbe Warrior Mind Crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014580
text: Collect chunks of metal from Grummers at Dadan Jungle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014581
text: The blacksmith doesn't have a chisel ready for you, but she can make one if you collect the right materials. Defeat Grummers at the Dadan Jungle and collect chunks of metal from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014582
text: Deliver to the Orsha Blacksmith

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014583
text: You have collected enough chunks of metal, Bring them to the blacksmith in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014584
text: Collect %s from Grummers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014585
text: Defeat monsters using Highlander techniques

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014586
text: The Highlander Submaster wants to find out how polished your Highlander skills are. Use your Highlander techniques to defeat any type of monster. This is a task you must complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014587
text: The Peltasta Submaster is ready to set you up on the path of a true Peltasta if only you pass this test. Defeat the Chapparition at Karolis Springs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014588
text: Defeat Sparnasman at the Novaha Annex

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014589
text: The Sparnasman that Hoplites fought long ago has returned. Defeat the Sparnasman at the Novaha Annex and bring back the Hoplites' broken spearheads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014590
text: The Krivis Submaster wants you to defeat the monsters that are terrorizing people. Go to Feretory Hills and, after draining out some of their stamina, use the crystal gem to purify them and collect the ashes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014591
text: Collect %s by purifying monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014592
text: The Priest Submaster strongly believes in exterminating all evil forces of this earth. Go to Feretory Hills where evil energy is concentrated and defeat monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014593
text: The Priest Submaster will be satisfied with your performance. Return to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014594
text: Collect Sparnasman's Horn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014595
text: The Dievdirbys Submaster has asked you to collect a Sparnasman's Horn to use as carving material. Go to Braken Monastery 64_2 and defeat Sparnasman to collect its horn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014596
text: Deliver to the Dievdirbys Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014597
text: Collect monster souls imbued with the Sadhu Master's spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014598
text: The Sadhu Master has given you a task. Go to Feretory Hills and imbue monsters with the Sadhu Master's spirit, then defeat them and collect their souls. This task you must complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014599
text: You have completed the Sadhu Master's task. Return to the Sadhu Master's physical body in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014600
text: Talk to Mage Melchioras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014601
text: Mage Melchioras seems to have something to say to you. Talk to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014602
text: After hearing that you're a Revelator, Mage Melchioras seems to want to tell you something. Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014603
text: Mage Melchioras says he has returned to this place to gather the Revelators and stop another Kruvina from being created in Delmore Castle. Keep listening to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014604
text: Use the compass to search for hidden artifacts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014605
text: You have decided to help Melchioras. Visit the spots marked on the map and use the compass to find the objects under the protection spell. The compass is activated only near the cast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014606
text: Report to Mage Melchioras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014607
text: You have found the objects under the protection spell. Relay their location to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014608
text: Talk to Revelator Mihail

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014609
text: Melchioras is going to analyze the protection spell; meanwhile, talk to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014610
text: Defeat demons and charge the Magic Concentration Orbs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014611
text: According to Mihail, they need more magic concentration orbs to blast the Magic Power Supply Device. Defeat demons to charge the orbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014612
text: Deliver to Revelator Mihail

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014613
text: You have filled all orbs with magic. Bring them to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014614
text: Mage Melchioras' analysis of the protection spell seems to have come to an end. Talk to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014615
text: Release the objects' protection spell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014616
text: Mage Melchioras has asked you to dispel the protection spell placed north of the Amjene Sanctum. Use the amulet on the objects protected by the cast to release it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014617
text: You have dispelled the protection spell. Return to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014618
text: All preparations for blowing up the Magic Power Supply Device are now in place. Talk to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014619
text: Place the Magic Concentration Orbs on the Magic Power Supply Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014620
text: It's time to blow up the Magic Power Supply Device. Go to the Ishinti Crossroads and place the charged orbs around the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014621
text: Report to Revelator Mihail

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014622
text: All the charged orbs are now in place. Talk to Revelator Mihail and blow up the Magic Power Supply Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014623
text: You have destroyed the Magic Power Supply Device. Talk to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014624
text: Go to Delmore Manor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014625
text: Melchioras wants to meet up at Delmore Manor, where the Kruvina device is located. Join Mage Melchioras at Delmore Manor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014626
text: Talk to Follower Andrea

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014627
text: Follower Andrea is preparing to deal with the monsters in the area. Ask her if there is anything you can help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014628
text: Collect data from Pag Amplers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014629
text: Follower Andrea is looking to obtain information on Pag Amplers. Defeat Pag Amplers and collect any data you can from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014630
text: You have collected enough data. Bring it to Follower Andrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014631
text: It looks like Follower Andrea needs your help. Talk to Follower Andrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014632
text: Collect the diary of Delmore Castle resident Ardel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014633
text: Follower Andrea was asked to contact a resident of Delmore Castle named Ardel, but all Delmore Castle residents are missing. Try and recover Ardel's diary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014634
text: Deliver to Follower Andrea

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014635
text: You have collected all the pages of the diary. Bring them to Follower Andrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014636
text: Talk to Follower Nuodas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014637
text: Follower Nuodas is feeling sorry for the missing residents of Delmore Castle. Talk to Follower Nuodas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014638
text: Follower Nuodas believes that clearing out some demons will probably help the residents of Delmore Castle. Defeat nearby demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014639
text: You have defeated enough demons. Go and tell Follower Nuodas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014640
text: It seems Follower Nuodas has a favor to ask of you. Talk to Follower Nuodas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014641
text: Collect arrows from Charcoal Walkers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014642
text: Follower Nuodas thinks the Revelators waste too many arrows. Defeat Charcoal Walkers and collect any arrows that can still be used.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014643
text: Deliver to Follower Nuodas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014644
text: As Follower Nuodas said, there were plenty of useful arrows to be collected. Bring them to Follower Nuodas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014645
text: Collect %s by defeating Charcoal Walker

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014646
text: Mage Melchioras seems to have split up from the group of Revelators. Talk to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014647
text: Mage Melchioras seems to be looking for a new way to neutralize the Kruvina device. Keep talking to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014648
text: Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Rampart Reconstruction District

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014649
text: Mage Melchioras believes there is a Magic Power Supply Device in the Rampart Reconstruction District. Go there and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014650
text: You have found the hidden Magic Power Supply Device. Return to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014651
text: Mage Melchioras believes there are other Magic Power Supply Devices. Keep talking to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014652
text: Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Buried Central Plaza

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014653
text: Mage Melchioras says he felt a new Magic Power Supply Device. Go to the Buried Central Plaza and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014654
text: It seems this time his prediction was wrong. Return to Mage Melchioras and let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014655
text: Mage Melchioras feels sorry for his lack of judgement. Keep talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014656
text: Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Handicraft Workshop Road

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014657
text: This time, Mage Melchioras thinks there is a Magic Power Supply Device at the Handicraft Workshop Road. Go there and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014658
text: It looks like Yane is going to try and destroy the central device purely by force. Go back and tell Melchioras about this immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014659
text: Mage Melchioras looks livid after hearing about what Yane is planning to do. Keep talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014660
text: Stop Revelator Yane at the Palma Central Plaza

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014661
text: Mage Melchioras says the Kruvina runs on human lives and gathering around it would be a fatal mistake. Go to the Palma Central Plaza and stop Yane from carrying out her plans!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014662
text: Follow Yane into the Delmore Outskirts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014663
text: Delmore Rephaim has kidnapped an injured Melchioras and escaped, the other Revelators chasing after him immediately after. Go to the outskirts of Delmore and join Revelator Yane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014664
text: Talk to Follower Bigs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014665
text: It looks like Follower Bigs is in need of your help. Talk to Follower Bigs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014666
text: Obtain Useful Wooden Boards from Box Piles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014667
text: Bigs wants to create a barricade to protect Melchioras once he returns. Go to the Kalbos Vacant Lot and Handicraft Workshop Road and look in box piles for wood boards to use.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014668
text: You have collected a handful of useful wooden boards. Bring them to Follower Bigs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014669
text: Obtain %s from old chests and others

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014670
text: It looks like Follower Bigs needs your help. Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014671
text: Bigs hopes you will clear out the demons in the area for those who are now injured. As instructed, defeat any demons nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014672
text: You have defeated the demons as requested. Return to Follower Bigs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014673
text: Talk to Follower Wedge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014674
text: Follower Wedge seems to be worried about Mage Melchioras. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014675
text: Collect Thorn Mushrooms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014676
text: Follower Wedge wants to make some medicine to help Melchioras recover his health later. Go and collect some thorn mushrooms from the Kalbos Empty Lot and Buried Central Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014677
text: Deliver to Follower Wedge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014678
text: You have collected enough mushrooms now. Bring them to Follower Wedge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014679
text: More than demons, Follower Wedge is worried about the monsters roaming about. Talk to Follower Wedge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014680
text: Collect Charog Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014681
text: Follower Wedge wants to produce a monster repellent. Defeat Charogs and collect their sap to use as material for the repellent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014682
text: You have now collected enough Charog sap. Bring it to Follower Wedge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014683
text: Chasing Lord Delmore

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014684
text: Talk to Revelator Yane

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014685
text: Revelator Yane is in a hurry to chase after Lord Delmore accompanied by a party. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014686
text: Ask Revelator Mihail to accompany you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014687
text: Revelator Yane wants to split the group to chase after Delmore Rephaim. Ask Revelator Mihail to accompany you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014688
text: Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Outskirts Central Plaza

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014689
text: Follow Revelator Mihail and chase Delmore Rephaim up to the Outskirts Central Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014690
text: Escape from Delmore Rephaim's trap

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014691
text: You are caught in Delmore Rephaim's trap. Fight demons to find the hidden magic core or defeat all demons to escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014692
text: You have disabled the trap. Talk to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014693
text: Revelator Mihail is worried about Revelator Yane's party headed towards the Tagika Crossroads. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014694
text: Join Yane's group at the Tagika Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014695
text: Find Revelator Yane's group at the Tagika Crossroads and help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014696
text: Revelator Mihail has disabled the barrier that was trapping Yane and her group. Ask Revelator Yane if she is all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014697
text: Revelator Yane says she saw a suspicious light by the Government Ruins. Keep talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014698
text: Go to the Government Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014699
text: Go to the Government Ruins with Revelators Yane and Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014700
text: Mage Melchioras is trapped in the altar. Try and find a solution with Revelator Yane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014701
text: Revelator Yane seems to have figured out a solution. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014702
text: Collect Demons Souls in the Shaman Doll

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014703
text: Yane wants to impart demons souls onto a shaman doll and replace Melchioras with it. Hunt demons and collect their souls on the doll.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014704
text: Deliver to Revelator Yane

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014705
text: The shaman doll is now fully charged with souls. Bring it to Revelator Yane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014706
text: Lead to a Dead-end

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014707
text: Mage Melchioras is still struggling but he is trying to tell you something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014708
text: Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014709
text: Mage Melchioras says Delmore Rephaim has escaped to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot. Go and chase Delmore Rephaim with Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014710
text: Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014711
text: Go and chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot with Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014712
text: Protect Mihail while he sets up the bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014713
text: Revelator Mihail wants to blow up the obstacle that's blocking the way with a bomb. Protect him from the incoming demon attacks while he finished setting up the bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014714
text: Revelator Mihail has finished setting up the bomb. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014715
text: Revelator Mihail has finished setting up the bomb. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014716
text: Stop Delmore Rephaim

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014717
text: You've almost caught up with Delmore Rephaim now. Keep going and stop his plans!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014718
text: Delmore Rephaim tried to use the power of the Kruvina but was ultimately defeated. Return to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014719
text: It's time to go back to where Melchioras and the Revelators are. Talk to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014720
text: It's time to go back to where Melchioras and the Revelators are. Talk to Mage Melchioras at the Tagika Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014721
text: Mage Melchioras is apparently still having difficulties moving. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014722
text: Destroy all reserve Kruvina devices

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014723
text: Melchioras is worried about the backup Kruvina devices that are still around. Fill the crystal given to you by Melchioras with evil energy by defeating demons and place it on the devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014724
text: You have cleared out all the reserve devices. Go and tell Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014725
text: There still seems to be something concerning Mage Melchioras. Talk to Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014726
text: Inject demonic power into the Supply Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014727
text: Mage Melchioras has asked you to destroy the remaining Magic Power Supply Device in Delmore Manor. Go back there and defeat demons to charge the crystal with demonic power, then place it on the supply device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014728
text: The Delmore Manor is now free of the Magic Power Supply Device. Go back and tell Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014729
text: It seems Revelator Yane has not yet fully recovered. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014730
text: Revelator Yane wants you to help clear out some demons. Defeat demons nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014731
text: Report to Revelator Yane

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014732
text: You have cleared out some of the demons nearby. Go and tell Revelator Yane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014733
text: Revelator Mihail seems to have something on his mind. Talk to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014734
text: Collect Magic Amplifiers from Black Maizes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014735
text: Mage Melchioras seems interested in the magic amplifiers. Obtain some magic amplifiers from Black Maizes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014736
text: You have collected enough magic amplifiers. Bring them to Mage Melchioras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014737
text: Collect %s from Black Maizes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014738
text: Defeat nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014739
text: Believer Gintas supports you joining the Order and asks you to charge the Evil Thoughts Stone. It looks like a good opportunity to join the Order. Set up the Evil Thoughts Stone and defeat the dead to collect their evil thoughts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014740
text: Gintas says the once-believers of the Order have resurrected, possibly by the power of Margiris. Defeat the resurrected believers in the Seima Stone Chamber and then use the flint to burn the bodies.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014741
text: You have received a fully charged Evil Thoughts Stone from Gintas. Take it to Margiris And you should be able to join the Order.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014742
text: Benes has asked you to spread a ferret-repelling scent around the entrance to the Bellai Forest Workshop. Press the

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014743
text: Defeat Vikaras Mages and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014744
text: Defeat Zaura, Empowered by Giltine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014745
text: Elder Aloizard looks deeply concerned about something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014746
text: Elder Aloizard wants to return to where the village residents are but is worried about the monsters. Clear out some monsters nearby to help Elder Aloizard return.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014747
text: You have defeated a good number of monsters nearby. Go and tell Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014748
text: The village chief's granddaughter is looking for someone to help her. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014749
text: Investigate the Wandering Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014750
text: The elder's granddaughter says the village residents are suffering with the red water incident but have no way to solve it. Help them out by investigating the Wandering Sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014751
text: Deliver the diary to the Elder's Granddaughter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014752
text: You have found a burnt journal at the Wandering Sanctuary. Bring it to the elder's granddaughter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014753
text: Search for Elder Aloizard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014754
text: The elder's granddaughter says he took off with a group of village youth and disappeared. Search for Elder Aloizard around the Anga Hall area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014755
text: The episode with the monsters was a close call. Ask Elder Aloizard and the village youth if they are all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014756
text: Elder Aloizard believes there is something important happening at the Wandering Sanctuary. Talk to Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014757
text: Look for the spot signaled by the Old Disc

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014758
text: Elder Aloizard says that when the earth shook, he saw the old disc glow red and point towards somewhere. Find out where the old disc is pointing to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014759
text: Deliver to Elder Aloizard

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014760
text: The object the old disc was pointing to was a red gem fragment. Bring it to Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014761
text: Use the Old Disc on nearby monsters and acquire %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014762
text: Talk to the Elder's Granddaughter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014763
text: Elder Aloizard took the red fragment and went to the Absenta Reservoir. The elder's granddaughter is looking to speak to you about the journal. Go and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014764
text: Talk to Elder Aloizard at the Absenta Reservoir

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014765
text: The burnt journal seems to contain important information. Go and find Elder Aloizard right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014766
text: Collect Rajatadpole Meat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014767
text: Samsonas believes the wrath of the goddesses is what caused the water to turn red. He proposes you collect some Rajatadpole meat to use as an offering.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014768
text: Deliver to Samsonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014769
text: You have collected enough Rajatadpole meat to use as offering. Bring it to Samsonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014770
text: It's time to make the offering. Talk to Samsonas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014771
text: Make an offering to the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014772
text: Samsonas is going to use this obelisk and has asked you to use one in another location. Go to the left side of the Vishikas Great Hall and make an offering to the obelisk there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014773
text: Report the results to Samsonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014774
text: Oddly enough, the offering caused nearby monsters to attack. Go to Samsonas right away and warn him about it before he makes his offering.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014775
text: Nikodemas is looking around apprehensively. Talk to Nikodemas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014776
text: Find the Village Resident at the Drava Chapel Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014777
text: Nikodemas says someone from the village wandered off and hasn't been back since. It seems they were headed towards the Drava Chapel Lot; go and look for them there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014778
text: Talk to Napalis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014779
text: You successfully defeated the monster that attacked from underwater. Ask Napalis if they are all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014780
text: Defeat Rocksodon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014781
text: Scalvis is worried about the monsters roaming around. Talk to Scalvis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014782
text: Scalvis is worried about the large number of monsters around. Defeat nearby monsters to make the area safer for the village residents.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014783
text: The area seems safer now. Report back to Scalvis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014784
text: Talk to Elder Aloizard about the contents of the journal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014785
text: Investigate the Nesuga Small Corridor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014786
text: Elder Aloizard says Modis once saw people with black hoods doing something at the Nesuga Small Corridor. Go to the Nesuga Small Corridor and see if you can find any clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014787
text: You have found a burnt painting. Elder Aloizard could possibly know something about the images in the painting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014788
text: Elder Aloizard seems to have recognized the images in the painting. Ask Elder Aloizard about the painting,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014789
text: Go to the Jeneuam Corridor and find the Hydra

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014790
text: A resident of the village came running, saying the Hydra has appeared. Go and check the Jeneuam Corridor, where the Hydra is said to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014791
text: A colossal Hydra with a red gem on its body appeared but quickly fled. Return to Elder Aloizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014792
text: The monster depicted in the painting is the Hydra. Ask Elder Aloizard about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014793
text: Talk to Hunter Modis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014794
text: Elder Aloizard believes that, with your help, they might have a chance to destroy the red gem on the Hydra's body. Go see Hunter Modis and find a way to lure the Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014795
text: When it comes to bait and traps, no one knows better than Hunter Modis. Ask Hunter Modis about how to catch the Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014796
text: Collect Sawpent Meat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014797
text: While Hunter Modis is making a trap to catch the Hydra, he wants you to collect Sawpent meat to use as bait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014798
text: Defeat Sawpents and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014799
text: Collect Blue Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014800
text: You have collected enough bait. Now, collect blue herbs to disguise the scent of humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014801
text: Deliver to Hunter Modis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014802
text: You have collected meat to use as bait and herbs to disguise your human scent. Bring the items to Hunter Modis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014803
text: Talk to Hunter Modis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014804
text: Hunter Modis seems to have finished all preparations to lure the Hydra. Talk to Hunter Modis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014805
text: Hunter Modis has set up a trap at the Heralve Vacant Lot. Place the bait on the trap to lure the Tyronas Hydra and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014806
text: After defeating the Hydra, the red gem on its body shattered to pieces. Go and tell Elder Aloizard about the Tyronas Hydra.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014807
text: Hunter Modis seems to have a problem at hand. Talk to Hunter Modis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014808
text: Collect Markazi Flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014809
text: Someone from the village accidentally drank the contaminated red water. Go to the right side of Svaigulys Hill in Letas Stream and collect Markazi Flowers to ease their pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014810
text: You have collected enough Markazi Flowers now. Bring them to Hunter Modis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014811
text: Lanaldas is furious at the fact that the red water of the reservoir was the fault of someone's experiment. Talk to Lanaldas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014812
text: Collect lard from Black Rajapearlites

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014813
text: Lanaldas wants to burn down the laboratory as retaliation. Go and collect lard from Black Rajapearlites to make flammable oil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014814
text: Deliver to Lanaldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014815
text: You have collected enough lard from Black Rajapearlites. Bring it to Lanaldas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014816
text: The oil is ready now. Talk to Lanaldas before burning down the laboratory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014817
text: Set fire to the laboratory

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014818
text: Lanaldas wants you to burn down the laboratory to prevent future experiments. One is located in the Nesuga Small Corridor of the Absenta Reservoir, the other in the Wandering Sanctuary of the Pelke Shrine Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014819
text: You have burned down all the laboratories. Go and tell Lanaldas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20151224_014820
text: If you're really set on helping Elder Aloizard, he will be waiting for you at the Collapsed Hall Lot. Go and find him there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014821
text: Rune Casters can command powerful magic through the use of Rune Characters.{nl}Rune Stones are merely tools to make that process easier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014822
text: Rune characters are rarely used now.{nl}But they shall never be forgotten as long as there are Rune Casters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014823
text: Mercenary Post Receptionist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014824
text: Check for requests at the Mercenary Post

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014825
text: Check for requests at the Mercenary Post.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014826
text: Carry out the Mercenary Post Mission

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014827
text: You've accepted a mission from receptionist Donnes at the Mercenary Post. Complete the mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014828
text: Report to the Mercenary Post Receptionist

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014829
text: You've completed the mission. Report back to Donnes at the Mercenary Post.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160224_014830
text: Interrupt the Merog Shaman's Ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014831
text: Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}He is a very important person to our research team.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014832
text: I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014833
text: I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine.{nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they saw into the mines.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014834
text: That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014835
text: After Medzio Diena, maintaining the monastery has been no easy task.{nl}Apart from me and few other brothers, there was no one left in the monastery, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014836
text: The demons kept every single one of us locked inside the annex.{nl}We didn't know the demons' demands or their reasoning; all we could do was pray.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014837
text: They say that there are barely any intact cities left in the kingdom.{nl}All because of Medzio Diena four years ago... It's a real shame.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014838
text: On Medzio Diena, it was a nightmare because of the earthquake.{nl}It was still easier to get by back then than it is now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014839
text: And after the Kruvina device, my condition isn't the best either...{nl}If that's okay with you, will you help us set up the barricade?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014840
text: It doesn't make sense no matter how much I think of it.{nl}How did they find this place?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014841
text: Find the map at Ratas Fork

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160310_014842
text: Rolandas says that a map showing the location of Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden somewhere. As its exact coordinates are unknown, you will have to search the entire area.{nl}Go to Ratas Fork and look for the map.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014843
text: My old colleague who went to Sirdgela Forest told me that he saw a strange looking map.{nl}I am sure that it is the map we are looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014844
text: It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, {nl}but I am afraid of making mistakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014845
text: The crops withered when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's alright. I was told that the bad energy within the crops would go away like that. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014846
text: Dried food has a long shelf life.{nl}You'll feel full even when you consume only a small amount of beef jerky.{nl}That's why we're accumulating a lot of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014847
text: What?{nl}No way... You think Baiga has sent his pawn?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014848
text: I... I don't trust what these youngsters are doing. No, sir.{nl}I know I can find a way if they would just let me, but they want to keep me out of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014849
text: Next time, I'll fight at the front line. {nl}I'm positive I can take it down.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014850
text: Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the Scroll of the Dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas won't escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014851
text: Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possible in the event of a purifier failure.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014852
text: 1. Next to the purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014853
text: Emergency Power Source

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014854
text: check it{nl}2.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014855
text: : take it and find magic crystals on 3F that have yet to be collected.{nl}3.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014856
text: : collect the crystal's magic on it!{nl}4.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014857
text: : use it to restore the purifier{nl}5. After using,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014858
text: : put it back!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014859
text: Would you please help me?{nl}Something must have happened to make the Pantos like that.{nl}You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014860
text: {nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014861
text: I often hear from the watchers at the Gele Plateau that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014862
text: Did you destroy the roots, too?{nl}If someone comes to cover me I'll help you out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014863
text: If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014864
text: {nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014865
text: We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last place we found is probably the last two I talked about earlier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014866
text: Hm... I see. It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}I'll let Basil know. Thanks for helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014867
text: While I was running from the demons I found some traps {nl}around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014868
text: {nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}I installed most of them in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.{nl}You might be able to get some from the Blue Vubbe Archers over there, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014869
text: The traps built here weren't all made at the order.{nl}Some I bought at a high price from a Sapper in Klaipeda, but they aren't worth the money.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014870
text: I built a few good hundreds of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014871
text: Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014872
text: If I get out of here I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, {nl}or ever for that matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014873
text: I think I just heard them.{nl}Are you sure you got rid of all of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014874
text: {nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014875
text: I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, {nl}but I'm worried about spending the night here.{nl}Will you get me the blue coal I buried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?{nl}I buried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014876
text: I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing {nl}the city and cutting down the tree around it. In the end, no one was buying my items.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014877
text: {nl}I ended up burying it in nearby Koru Jungle.{nl}I didn't mean to leave it there for so long... {nl}I don't even know if it's good for fire, because of all the humidity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014878
text: I think this will do to keep me safe for a few hours...{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014879
text: For my father who is in Klaipeda, it may not be quite enough.{nl}I'll help you get to a slightly higher level.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014880
text: Your test is going to Feretory Hills and defeating monsters.{nl}Use only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014881
text: And no helpers. Only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques.{nl}Easy and simple.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014882
text: Uh... you say the statue only made the ferrets even more violent?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014883
text: Now, pour the oil around the laboratories and set fire to them.{nl}We can't let this type of experiment happen ever again...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014884
text: Dangerous Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014885
text: I'll find the power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014886
text: Justified Suspicion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014887
text: I'll help you

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014888
text: I don't think that'll be necessary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014889
text: Improvements

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014890
text: I'll find the other people

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014891
text: Conveying information

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014892
text: Collect the Faulty Goods

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014893
text: We should let that go

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014894
text: Days to Forget

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014895
text: I don't want to get my hands dirty

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014896
text: Camping Preparations

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014897
text: Check the Purifier in 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014898
text: Check the Purifier in Crystal Mine 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014899
text: Collect Crystal Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014900
text: The purifier on the 3rd floor is disabled for lack of energy. Find magic crystals and charge the emergency power source with their magic, then use it to provide energy to the 3F Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014901
text: Supply energy to the 3F Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014902
text: You have collected enough crystal magic. Supply their energy to the 3F Purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014903
text: Watcher Molly is waiting for your help at Srautas Gorge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014904
text: Remove the Plateau Sugar Beet Stems

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014905
text: Watcher Molly believes the reason the Pantos started acting strange from eating the Plateau Sugar Beets. She requested you get destroy all the Plateau Sugar Beets.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014906
text: You have removed enough Plateau Sugar Beets. Report to Watcher Molly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014907
text: Watcher Molly is waiting for help at the Gele Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014908
text: Hunt Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014909
text: Watcher Molly wants to gather information on the monsters in order to more effectively use a shaman doll at Gele Plateau. Defeat Spion Archers, Leaflies and Malis to learn how to handle these new monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014910
text: Report to Watcher Molly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014911
text: You have collected sufficient information for Watcher Molly. Go back and report to her about what you learned fighting the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014912
text: Priest Draznie is looking for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 2F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014913
text: Collect Faulty Traps

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014914
text: Priest Draznie has asked you to collect some traps she set up a long time ago. According to her, most traps are set up in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014915
text: Return the Faulty Traps to Priest Draznie

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014916
text: You have collected a large number of traps. Bring them to Priest Draznie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014917
text: Priest Gelija is waiting for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014918
text: Varv Extermination

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014919
text: Priest Gelija has asked you to clear out the Varvs that have been terrorizing the priests in Ashaq Underground Prison. They are often found at the Felon Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014920
text: Report to Priest Gelija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014921
text: You have clear out enough Varvs. Report to Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014922
text: Exterminate %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014923
text: A traveling merchant in Koru Jungle is waiting for help

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014924
text: Collect Blue Coal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014925
text: The merchant wants to retrieve some blue coal they buried in Koru Jungle to help them make it through until the group has recovered. Go to Goram Shores and Saunu Brook and find the pieces of blue coal in the piles of dirt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014926
text: Deliver the Blue Coal to the merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014927
text: You have collected enough blue coal. Deliver it to the merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160323_014928
text: The Barbarian Master wants you to defeat monsters in Feretory Hills using only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques. This is a task you must complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014929
text: You didn't see him?{nl}His mind is not all that sound. Where could he be?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014930
text: Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going.{nl}I have to research these wild flowers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014931
text: I am not sure of what he meant by 'the worthy one'...{nl}However, the goddess said unto Zachariel and gave him{nl}the divine task of helping the one who will save this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014932
text: There's a herb that only grows around Metos Field.{nl}Please bring me it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014933
text: Good job.{nl}You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014934
text: Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014935
text: This will be enough.{nl}Davio sent you, right?{nl}I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014936
text: To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014937
text: I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014938
text: It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have.{nl}Take it with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014939
text: We don't accept just anyone as a Peltasta.{nl}I will give you an assignment. First, defeat all Jukopus that are occupying Siauliai's Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014940
text: I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me,{nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014941
text: Your will to learn from me is good, but first I have a favor to ask.{nl}We can continue our talk if you are up for it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014942
text: I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is at the Miners' Village. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out and I'll teach you my techniques.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014943
text: I heard the Vubbes at the Miners' Village have a special type of venom. {nl}I'm sure it's the same venom used by the assassin Ebonypawn. Bring me that venom.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014944
text: {nl}The Archer Master is not a mean person, so he will give you the book if you ask nicely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014945
text: It's not hard to teach you high level magic... but, you should help me before I teach it to you.{nl}I need to collect fire energy for my research, but I just don't have the time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014946
text: This is the symbol that I engraved on my father's sleeve...{nl}This is so precious to me... Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014947
text: This is an opportunity for us. The Cockats are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014948
text: What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014949
text: I must protect them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014950
text: Gesti... should not be underestimated.{nl}We need to find the hidden sanctum fast, but let's be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014951
text: You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014952
text: We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014953
text: Uh...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014954
text: Is there nothing valuable here?{nl}I mean, I've been hired by Raymond, but...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014955
text: In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014956
text: I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. {nl}We might even have had another Medzio Diena otherwise.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014957
text: Overlong Bridge Valley is home to many places where one can open spatial chasms.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014958
text: Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I'm perfectly fine. {nl}You're the crazy ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014959
text: Just where did that old man go all by himself?{nl}His mind isn't even right...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014960
text: You should prove that you are suited to use a sword if you want to reach a higher level of swordsmanship. {nl}Go and collect Red Kepa Skins at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014961
text: While magic does not choose its wielder, I don't like a lazy disciple.{nl}Defeating Stone Orcas in Crystal Mine 1F will be a test of your guts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014962
text: If you can't bring me cores, you better give up now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014963
text: Defeat the Jukopus at the Miners' Village and bring me their cores as proof.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014964
text: We should ask for more in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they're looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014965
text: Ah, so you're the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014966
text: I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, {nl}but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014967
text: Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014968
text: Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014969
text: Clymen... I can feel its presence at the Ishpirki Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014970
text: Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen Her in a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014971
text: The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014972
text: Is it the sacred object?{nl}It's been such a long time, I can't think of anything else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014973
text: I also wonder why they used such magic on the old man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014974
text: I had never seen demons use any herbs, but I'm sure whatever it is they're doing, it's evil.{nl}I was on my way to stop them when this happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014975
text: The Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014976
text: What? You're not a reaper?{nl}But since you've seen my face now, I'm sorry but you will be cursed. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014977
text: Wait a minute. No. No.{nl}Deliver this letter for me and we can pretend this never happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014978
text: {nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian.{nl}Do not look at what's written in the letter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014979
text: I can release the Kartas Hunter from the seal by myself, but{nl}in order to preserve the power of the Crystal, we will need help from my vassals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014980
text: It could be... That they were threatened...{nl}Or they had a mission to complete even though they were being chased?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014981
text: Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014982
text: Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possible in the event of a purifier failure.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014983
text: : Take it and find the unmined magic crystals spread around 3F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014984
text: : Restore in the Purifier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014985
text: - Attention -{nl}After using:

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014986
text: Would you please help me?{nl}The Pantos must have eaten something wrong to be acting like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014987
