text: You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?{nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014988
text: Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014989
text: I often hear from other watchers that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014990
text: If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014991
text: Good.{nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014992
text: We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last places we found are the two I talked about earlier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014993
text: Hm... I see.{nl}It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014994
text: I'll let Basil know. {nl}Thanks for helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014995
text: Running from the demons I found some traps around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014996
text: Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.{nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014997
text: I bought them from a Sapper I met in Klaipeda, and they weren't cheap...{nl}Guess they aren't worth the money.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014998
text: I built a few dozens of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_014999
text: Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015000
text: If you see any Varvs, just get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015001
text: If I get out of here, I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, or ever, to be honest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015002
text: {nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015003
text: I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, but I'm worried about spending the{nl}night here. Will you get me the blue coal I buried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015004
text: I buried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015005
text: I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing the city and cutting down the tree around it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015006
text: In the end, no one was buying my items.{nl}So I ended up burying it nearby in Koru Jungle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015007
text: I didn't mean to leave it there for so long...{nl}Not sure if it'll still light up, because of the humidity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015008
text: I've lost all of my Holy Stones...{nl}I don't know how much longer I'll be able to stay here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015009
text: If you happen to find an Orb Crystal when fighting demons, will you bring it to me?{nl}I can use it to create a makeshift Holy Stone and protect myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015010
text: I'm still in pain from the beating.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015011
text: It's not much... But it will have to do.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015012
text: You weren't thinking of ditching me and doing everything yourself, were you?{nl}Don't you have to be around here for that, anyways?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015013
text: While you're at it, you could clear out some monsters for me, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015014
text: Guess I shouldn't just trust whoever Niels recommends.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015015
text: Thank you.{nl}If you finish the other job, would you work here with me for a few months?{nl}It's okay if you don't want to, though...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015016
text: Epigraphist Deltran

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015017
text: Please help me!{nl}There are important records here that I must find.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015018
text: But those monsters... If I move they'll come running right away.{nl}Please clear out the ones wandering over there!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015019
text: I got out of Stele Road without my master knowing.{nl}If I go back empty-handed, I'll be in big trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015020
text: I could even be expelled from the Association...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015021
text: Thank you for helping me.{nl}I wonder where all those monsters came from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015022
text: I know for sure there's something important in here!{nl} But please don't tell the other adventurers I'm here...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015023
text: With that many monsters, taking anything is almost impossible...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015024
text: Never have I seen such a dreadful place.{nl}The monsters corrupted by evil energy are interfering with our attempts of purification.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015025
text: If you follow the word of the goddess, you know what to do.{nl}Defeat them all!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015026
text: There's no time to wonder how this happened.{nl}We need to fix it before it's too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015027
text: I will make sure to tell the other believers about your generous help.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015028
text: Please don't leave me alone here!{nl}If you go, the Lapasape Mages will come and take me!{nl}Please!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015029
text: I don't want them to take me.{nl}I miss my mother...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015030
text: Did you really get all of them?{nl}I can still feel them glaring at me from between the trees...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015031
text: Herbalist Talas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015032
text: It's useless.{nl}The demons won't let me collect the herbs I need from Badoca Hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015033
text: Without those herbs I can't make medicine for the refugees.{nl}It would be great if you could help...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015034
text: There's not much I can do with my legs like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015035
text: Thank you!{nl}I should tend to my legs now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015036
text: The village priest asked me to collect some antidote from the Merog Stingers.{nl}I thought the villagers could help but, as you can see... it's hopeless...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015037
text: If you see any Merog Stingers, would you collect some antidote samples from them?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015038
text: For some time now the people coming to the shrine ruins are being chased away by Merog Stingers.{nl}They even stung and almost killed a few villagers...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015039
text: Thank you!{nl}We should collect as much as we can until everyone has recovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015040
text: Help!{nl}My spirits were taken away by monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015041
text: Please save them!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015042
text: You need to observe the monsters carefully to find them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015043
text: Thank you.{nl}I pray that they rest in peace with the goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015044
text: I'm sorry... I'm so sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015045
text: Frail Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015046
text: I wish I could do something for the spirits, like you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015047
text: The spirits I need to collect are all scattered, in fear of the monsters.{nl}Would you find these frightened spirits and bring them back to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015048
text: I miss the old, peaceful times...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015049
text: If I wasn't hidden among the trees like this, who knows if the monsters wouldn't have taken me too.{nl}But I will guide the spirits for as long as I can.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015050
text: Could you please... Help a bit more?{nl}The reason I am being chased by them is because I am getting rid of the defiling aura from the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015051
text: I think you'd be able to deal with them more effectively...{nl}Could you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015052
text: I want to finish them off as soon as possible and return.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015053
text: Thank you!{nl}We should finish the rest of them off as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015054
text: Historian Grenus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015055
text: Hey there. Could you help me out?{nl}There are a lot of relics in this area that are important to my research, but I can't gather them on my own.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015056
text: So here's my proposition... {nl}Why don't you go to the exploration sites that I've marked and dig the relics up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015057
text: I assure you that you will be mentioned in my papers if my research sees the light of day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015058
text: Well look at that, a kind traveler helping me more than any of my apprentices.{nl}Your name will be on my research papers when they're finished in a few years.{nl}Thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015059
text: Maybe I should look for another line of work before I get any older...{nl}I think I'll do some serious thinking once I finish this research..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015060
text: What to do..{nl}I was planning on waiting at the gravekeeper's hut until the professor was well, but there are just too many monsters here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015061
text: {nl}Could you please deal with some of the monsters in the surrounding area?{nl}I beg of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015062
text: I think I'll be leaving any strange things alone in the future...{nl}I never thought that something like this would happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015063
text: Thank you.{nl}I hope that the professor will get better soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015064
text: Settler Rodonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015065
text: I've heard that you've been helping people around here..{nl}I was wondering if you could help me as well?{nl}I have to reclaim some land that Gytis asked me, but I haven't been able to go anywhere near it because of the monsters...{nl}I'd be grateful if you could deal with some of them..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015066
text: It's so sad that we have to be developing the land around Klaipeda...{nl}I'm worried that some of the monsters will come running towards us since they've lost their habitats.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015067
text: Thank you!{nl}You've scared a lot of the monsters away..{nl}I think we'll be able to start working in just a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015068
text: What the settlement area needs is mercenaries to protect us... not more farmers...{nl}I can't see a single mercenary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015069
text: I'm sorry, but could you help me out a bit?{nl}I wasn't able to gather more than half of the materials required for my mission.{nl}Could you please deal with the monsters and get the dirty pouches that they are carrying?{nl}I'd really appreciate it...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015070
text: I'm pretty sure that anyone asking for these are mages or alchemists...{nl}I'd like to tell them to try gathering this stuff themselves...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015071
text: Thank you so much!{nl}I'll be able to make it back much more quickly thanks to you.{nl}Even if this is only the beginning...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015072
text: Clear the Royal Mausoleum of the Guardians that overlook sinister presences and are trying to destroy the defense systems.{nl}That is the only way that you will be able to safely achieve your goals here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015073
text: The defense system is being destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015074
text: The Guardians are being defiled at an increased rate.{nl}This has only delayed the destruction of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015075
text: You must retrieve the essence from the Tainted Guardians.{nl}You will be able to interrupt the destruction of the Royal Mausoleum by doing so.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015076
text: Deal with all of the Tainted Guardians.{nl}That is the fate of the Royal Mausoleum Guardians.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015077
text: Laterous

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015078
text: The people are scared because of all sorts of strange rumors...{nl}I need to find some people to raise a farm but people refuse to venture out because of the rumors and monsters.{nl}I'm getting more anxious by the day.{nl}You seem like a strong adventurer, so could you please deal with some of the monsters nearby?{nl}I'm sure that dealing with the monsters will help out with the rumors as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015079
text: I am not leaving here no matter what anyone says..{nl}I've come here after ignoring all my family and friends that told be that this was a bad idea, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015080
text: Thank you so much!{nl}I'm sure that many people will be more eager since the monsters are gone.{nl}We'll be able to get a foothold now!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015081
text: I thought that this was supposed to be a pleasant place to live instead of being infested with monsters...{nl}I still won't give up though...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015082
text: Wandering Believer's Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015083
text: One of the living all the way over here... The goddess must have sent you...{nl}Please help me... Strange figures and monsters are taking the spirits away...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015084
text: I'll be taken away as well if something isn't done about it...{nl}Please! Could you deal with some of the monsters in the area?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015085
text: I don't remember anything from when I was alive...{nl}Why did I even die?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015086
text: Thank you...{nl}With them gone, I can now leave whenever I wish.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015087
text: Why am I here... and why are they trying to catch me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015088
text: Pilgrim Seronia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015089
text: I'm relieved to meet a person here.{nl}Could you deal with some of the monsters in the surrounding area?{nl}They're more than a match for me on my own..{nl}I'd greatly appreciate your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015090
text: I don't know how I got all the way over here...{nl}I got separated from the people I came with since we were chased by monsters...{nl}I have no idea where any of them might be...{nl}I hope they are alright...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015091
text: Thank you so much..{nl}I think I'll start moving once the monsters have thinned out a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015092
text: This way leads to the cursed city...{nl}Where did we start going wrong?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015093
text: Follower Nedluss

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015094
text: I've decided to stay here and help out as repentance to my wrongs against Melchioras.{nl}I've just found several suspicious spell devices on the Garden Watchtower.{nl}However, they're a bit too much for me to deal by myself.{nl}So I was thinking... could you destroy them for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015095
text: I shudder to think of how many of those monsterous devices are still hidden...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015096
text: Well done.{nl}I'm sure that there will be a few more to destroy if we comb the area but...{nl}I think we can call it a day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015097
text: I hope Melchioras gets well soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015098
text: We'll need to know about the demons well in order to drive them out of this area.{nl}Defeat the demons and bring back their condensed magic.{nl}Melchioras may be able to do some research in order to find a fatal weakness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015099
text: I'm sure that they'll be easier to handle if we know their weaknesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015100
text: I think that this will be enough to find a weakness or two.{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015101
text: I am thinking of setting up traps around the Delmore Outskirts but...{nl}I wasn't able to do anything due to the Pag Emitters coming from all over.{nl}Could you deal with some of them if they come near?{nl}I'm sure that setting up any traps will be much easier if you help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015102
text: I'll be discussing where the best places would be to set up the traps with my colleagues here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015103
text: That's a lot of monsters!{nl}Now all that is left is to set up the traps without them noticing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015104
text: I'd like to stay and help Melchioras.{nl}I'm sure you feel the same, correct?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015105
text: {nl}We should hand out the Maroulu Herbs that we found while searching the area to the people.{nl}Please look for some more from the Fortress Walls since we need much more.{nl}I'm sure we'll be able to help people recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015106
text: An herb that helps people become enthusiastic...{nl}Isn't it incredible?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015107
text: I think that this will be enough for one person.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015108
text: I've been put between a rock and a hard place thanks to you dealing with the Manticen..{nl}So you have to help me out.{nl}Get rid of the monsters around here since they're hindering my work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015109
text: I'll make sure to raise one of those that survive the clean-up to avoid getting defeated by other adventurers..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015110
text: That was quite a sight... I get why the Manticen was defeated.{nl}Thanks for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015111
text: Farmer Deluma

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015112
text: The world has become a harsh place after Medzio Diena.{nl}There are more thefts of farming equipment...{nl}Monsters also break them often.{nl}That's why I've hidden them in the grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015113
text: I have to retrieve the equipment now that it's time to start working again but..{nl}Could you by any chance help me out and get the equipment for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015114
text: We used to be free from the fear of monsters and were able to trust people..{nl}The world has become so harsh.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015115
text: We need a bit more for there to be enough for all the people but...{nl}Thank you for helping out!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015116
text: I hope the people that agreed to help arrive soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015117
text: I've been preparing for this experiment for a long time, but have no idea where it could have gone wrong...{nl}Maybe I didn't have enough ingredients...{nl}Please help me a bit more with my experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015118
text: I've hid my bag full of ingredients near Dumbliu Pond.{nl}You can gather insects or small animals with that bag.{nl}How about we use that? Please get me some more test subjects!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015119
text: I'll go and prepare for the next experiment.{nl}It may take a while...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015120
text: Thank you!{nl}I can restart the experiments sooner if I have more test subjects.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015121
text: Lumberjack Luoval

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015122
text: I suppose you're a cut above the average since you've made it all the way here.{nl}I have to get some lumber from the Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins but there are so many monsters..{nl}I don't know if I'll even be able to make it back home...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015123
text: Could you be bothered to deal with some of the monsters if you go by Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins?{nl}Of course I won't blame you if you're too busy..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015124
text: Monsters have been showing up over here ever since all of the mercenaries and soldiers went off to Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015125
text: Thank you for helping out.{nl}There just seems to be no end of them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015126
text: Fedimian is one of the major stopping points for the traders heading inland.{nl}There will be many traders coming through here once this is all settled.{nl}That's why I want to create a trading post at Leipsna Chapel Site.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you'd clear the place up a bit from the monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015127
text: What if that never happens?{nl}The whole world will become infested with demons if Fedimian falls anyway..{nl}Do you think anyone will be able to trade?{nl}The only alternative to success is for mankind to fail so I am investing and hoping for the best...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015128
text: It seems like you've done quite a job even if it's only a small step towards clearing it all up..{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015129
text: Priest Rovli

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015130
text: They're all afraid of the ferrets...{nl}I'll defend this place by myself if I have to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015131
text: Believer Dreka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015132
text: We'll start surveying this region in earnest once Goddess Lada recovers..{nl}Of course that is a long way off...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015133
text: The villagers and other priests believe that the ferrets can be converted.{nl}It's all useless! What use is converting the ferrets after the shrine and village are destroyed.{nl}Please help me.{nl}Teach the ferrets a lesson by dealing with them to show that they can't come here!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015134
text: I'm begging passing adventurers since I'm a priest but..{nl}I don't know how it came to this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015135
text: Do you think that they've learned their lesson?{nl}Thank you so much for helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015136
text: I wish to present Godess Lada with Ceyral Saplings that are filled with the energy of life.{nl}That's why we've come all this way...{nl}But there are simply too many monsters in there for me to go anywhere near.{nl}Could you please go get some Ceyral Saplings for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015137
text: I've gone through so much to get here..{nl}I should have brought my brother along...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015138
text: I haven't been able to smell Ceyral for such a long time.{nl}Thank you so much for gathering this much!{nl}However, I do think that we need a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015139
text: If you've come here to deal with the monsters, how about going over there first?{nl}You see... A few of my colleagues aren't able to get here because of the monsters.{nl}Could you possibly deal with some of the monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015140
text: How am I supposed to get to Orsha with these cowards?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015141
text: Thank you!{nl}I don't know what's keeping them from coming though...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015142
text: We need to retrieve as much as the management wants but...{nl}We've still got a lot of time left until the newcomers arrive.{nl}How about finding me some Manaryll Tombstones from Augalu Garden if you've got the time?{nl}You can just pick them up anywhere but I don't have the people to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015143
text: I have to wait here for my group leader's orders.{nl}I'd really appreciate the help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015144
text: Wow, that's a lot!{nl}I do think that we'll need a bit more, but this should be enough to fill a page in my ledger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015145
text: Yes? What is it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015146
text: Ahh, of course I know Zenoa.{nl}You're talking about that cute Dievdirbys right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015147
text: I'm sorry, but...{nl}I don't have any chisels prepared, and I'm fresh out of materials to make new ones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015148
text: We've gathered here to stop Delmore Rephaim, the lord of Delmore Castle.{nl}All because he's trying to create another Kruvina.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015149
text: I should have stopped its creation... But I was a coward back then.{nl}Delmore Rephaim is trying to build that Kruvina once more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015150
text: I'm sorry, but could you collect some Charog sap?{nl}I want to make a monster repellant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015151
text: That was a really tough enchantment.{nl}I wonder how Yane did in Tagika Crossroads...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015152
text: Thank you... so much.{nl}It should be impossible to create another Kruvina now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015153
text: Are you the Revelator Leja talked about?{nl}And that's... our food that got stolen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015154
text: Thank you for taking back our food but...{nl}I don't think I can trust you just yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015155
text: Please understand.{nl}We were tricked by the demons once before, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015156
text: Leja said she had somewhere else to be and left.{nl}I can't tell you where she is going, though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015157
text: Like I said earlier, we can't trust you just yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015158
text: We once had someone come to our village calling himself a Revelator.{nl}He was a man with a pale face and long hair.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015159
text: We thought our Revelator had finally arrived and did as the man said.{nl}Truth is, in reality... he was a demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015160
text: We believed the demon and because of that Goddess Lada was taken away...{nl}Even the ferrets turned violent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015161
text: We think it was because of the totem the demon made us set up.{nl}We all want to join forces and rescue Goddess Lada, but we're worried about the ferret attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015162
text: There is a totem that we don't even dare get close to because of its evil energy.{nl}If you really are a Revelator, then you should be able to destroy it with your divine power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015163
text: Show us.{nl}If you really are a Revelator, that is...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015164
text: Please understand.{nl}I know Leja is glad the Revelator is finally here but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015165
text: We've been fooled before, we can't help but be suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015166
text: You... you're a true Revelator, there's no doubt about it.{nl}I feel so sorry for how I treated you earlier... Please forgive this old man.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015167
text: Leja went to Zeraha to try and find something to help you.{nl}She said Goddess Laima will have left something prepared for the Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015168
text: There is a big statue of Goddess Laima there. {nl}It was sculpted a long time ago when She was still at our village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015169
text: Oh... that girl came.{nl}Can I tell you about what happened in our village?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015170
text: Our village has always worshiped Goddess Laima.{nl}One day, she had a vision of a calamity that would strike the kingdom in a future far away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015171
text: So, to stop this calamity, She decided to leave the village.{nl}Maybe She was worried about leaving us behind, so she had Goddess Lada look after us instead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015172
text: But unlike what Goddess Laima predicted, our village remained peaceful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015173
text: Then, unexpectedly, Medzio Diena happened.{nl}It was the calamity in Goddess Laima's vision.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015174
text: Medzio Diena didn't cause much damage here, but that was only the beginning.{nl}You see, not long ago our river turned red.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015175
text: The river water caused terrible pain to everyone who drank it, and it made the fruit grow to an abnormal size.{nl}The fruit, just like the red water, was inedible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015176
text: As if that weren't enough, the demons then came and took Goddess Lada.{nl}Just as Laima predicted... chaos took over the village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015177
text: Leja probably told you... what Goddess Laima said to us.{nl}She said a Revelator would dream of the calamity and come with the light to chase away evil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015178
text: We aren't sure what She meant by the light, but...{nl}Our elders used to say that a warm energy filled the village when Goddess Laima was here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015179
text: It was all very quick.{nl}The moment that girl came to me, I felt the same warm energy our elders talked about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015180
text: The girl looked me straight in the eyes and, without a word, she nodded.{nl}Then she disappeared towards Zeraha.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015181
text: Hurry and follow the light.{nl}This can only be a sign sent by Goddess Laima to guide you in the right direction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015182
text: Please, for Goddess Lada... and our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015183
text: That warm energy...{nl}Until the day I return to the goddess I will never be able to forget it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015184
text: Go now.{nl}Follow the light and you will see the girl once again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015185
text: The totem is at the Banaga Forest Trail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015186
text: If you really are a Revelator that came here with the light to save our town...{nl}Then you should be able to take back the ferrets' hideout.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015187
text: If you can prove that you are in fact a Revelator, I will tell you where to find Leja.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015188
text: Here's the scent.{nl}Let's see now... About the ferrets...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015189
text: Help...? It's not something I haven't thought about.{nl}The city closest to here is Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015190
text: I heard Fedimian was devastated after Medzio Diena, though.{nl}Even after four years, it's still being reconstructed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015191
text: And Goddess Lada, She said that no matter what happens to Her...{nl}She would never make Her presence known to anyone but the Revelators.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015192
text: As you know...{nl}People now think that the goddesses have all disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015193
text: But if they find out that the goddesses are still around...{nl}You can imagine what a shock that would be.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015194
text: That's why only you, a Revelator, can save Goddess Lada.{nl}The goddess said so Herself, too...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015195
text: Your face doesn't look familiar...{nl}Please don't cause a commotion and just move along.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015196
text: I'm sorry I doubted you.{nl}It's just that our town has been hurt by fake Revelators before...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015197
text: Goddess Lada being taken by the demons...{nl}None of that would have happened if we hadn't believed the fake Revelators.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015198
text: And with our water turning red we felt more and more powerless...{nl}We should have realized our mistake and gone to the real Revelators, but...{nl}I'm so sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015199
text: What are you still doing here?{nl}You're going to miss the girl. Hurry and go after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015200
text: Thank you. I'm so grateful to you and to Goddess Lada for having sent you.{nl}You are a blessing to our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015201
text: I don't know what the demons did to those ferrets but...{nl}Seeing how they attack, avoiding a fight must be impossible, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015202
text: The disc suddenly started glowing red so I followed it all the way here.{nl}I was chased away by monsters, but I clearly saw that it was pointing to something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015203
text: I have no idea about the rest.{nl}Any guesses?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015204
text: So that beast has a gem stuck on it now, huh?{nl}I'd say you'd have to get the beast out and kill it to get rid of the gem...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015205
text: That red water is no one's business but our village's.{nl}Outsiders would do well to leave us alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015206
text: I'm sorry I was rude to you earlier...{nl}Please forgive this old man's insolence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015207
text: May the Revelator who dreamt of chaos defeat the evil forces and bring light back into our world...{nl}If the legends are true, this red water will soon be no more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015208
text: A dagger... The owner of the dagger...{nl}I don't think that fits anyone I know...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015209
text: I suppose we will have to go to the Masters for advice.{nl}Where did they get such a dagger and why did they do this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015210
text: You've remembered something?{nl}How could you have not remembered something so important... Well, spit it out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015211
text: Gytis Settlement...{nl}I think I do remember hearing something about someone doing strange things over there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015212
text: Here you go, I'll give you the dagger so you can find who the culprit is behind this.{nl}It'll help a great deal if you find who did this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015213
text: Are you curious about the dagger again?{nl}I'm not exactly an expert in that field but... Well, whatever. Give it here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015214
text: What is this...{nl}You've just come back to find me right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015215
text: Yes, this is Ebonypawn's dagger.{nl}I don't know too much about evil energies, but it shows all of his habits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015216
text: Followed a mysterious girl from Grynas Training Camp...{nl}Yes. I do seem to remember something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015217
text: Please let me know if anything like this happens again.{nl}I'll give you as much information as I can manage. Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015218
text: I've received nothing but help from you.{nl}I sincerely hope that you'll catch who ever did this...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015219
text: Ebonypawn... I've never heard that name before.{nl}You said something about the Ranger Master?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015220
text: I think I'll have to go visit sometime with something nice.{nl}Anyhow, thank you for the hard work. Farewell!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015221
text: I am collecting the ocean's energy here to create an altar for the goddess.{nl}But the monsters... are causing me trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015222
text: Brother Daroul is fighting the monsters off but...{nl}They're just coming in endless waves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015223
text: Would you really do that for me?{nl}I can't express my gratitude enough..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015224
text: I happen to have a good idea.{nl}I have something that might be usable as bait for the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015225
text: If you bury the powder in this bag, it'll spread its scent to the surrounding area in a cloud of green smoke.{nl}Then the monsters will gather towards you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015226
text: I'd appreciate it if you could deal with the monsters near the Old Bridge and Kranta Skerries!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015227
text: I can't offord to lose a chance like this.{nl}Monsters are petty distractions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015228
text: Oh no...{nl}I've managed to finish the altar thanks to your help, but a Crabil has appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015229
text: We've just run away from the Crabil ourselves.{nl}I'm sure that it is attracted by the ocean's energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015230
text: I can't even go anywhere near the altar, let alone preform the ceremony because of the monster.{nl}It also seems to be getting stronger by the minute thanks to the ocean's energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015231
text: We'll do our best to stop the altar...{nl}Could you possibly get rid of the Crabil?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015232
text: I'll stop the altar if you can buy me some time.{nl}Here goes nothing!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015233
text: Are you alright?{nl}I don't know how I can thank you enough...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015234
text: My goodness..{nl}The Crabil has ruined all of the offerings that were meant for the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015235
text: We won't be able to offer any of this to the goddess..{nl}This is quite troubling..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015236
text: Ah well, I suppose it can't be helped.{nl}Could I possibly ask you to order some coral handicrafts while we repair the altar?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015237
text: There are some precious corals growing near the Kranta Skerries.{nl}Please provide Joana, the Accessory Merchant of Fedimian with the blue coral for the goods.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015238
text: I would normally craft them myself but the situation is less than optimal as you may see...{nl}I know it's a long way to go but I beg of you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015239
text: Hello!{nl}Please feel free to take your time!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015240
text: Hmm? You've come here to request some coral accessories?{nl}Oh... It's been a long time since I've seen any coral.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015241
text: The quality seems to be impecable as well.{nl}All right. I'll do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015242
text: I would normally craft them myself but the situation is less than optimal as you may see...{nl}I know it's a long way to Fedimian, but I beg of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015243
text: However, I also have a request since this is a hard task.{nl}I would prefer to receive some Gapcrab Shell as compensation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015244
text: Of course, I won't receive any that are cracked or dented.{nl}Do you agree to the conditions?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015245
text: Well then, off you go.{nl}I'll start working assuming that you'll bring me some quality materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015246
text: Gapcrab Shell from the Kranta Skerries.{nl}I won't accept them if they've been damaged too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015247
text: Did you bring the Shell?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015248
text: The Shell seems to be in good condition.{nl}I haven't seen such quality Shell for a while now...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015249
text: I'll be able to use these to craft great accessories.{nl}Here you go, the coral accessories that you've requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015250
text: Finally... The goddesses have listened to our prayers!{nl}They have been silent for so long..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015251
text: This is all thanks to you.{nl}We would have taken so much longer without your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015252
text: This is only the beginning.{nl}We must gather our strength and prepare for further hardships.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015253
text: Thank you so much... for all the help!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015254
text: Those useless monsters have destroyed the coral that was Goddess Jurate's blessing.{nl}I'd like to make them pay, but I must protect the altar... There is no way that the two of us can...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015255
text: Please. The monsters found at the Kranta Skerries.{nl}Show them that they can't destroy the coral without getting punished.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015256
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I'm thinking of tidying the place up once the altar becomes safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015257
text: Hmm... Come to think of it... {nl}It's no use if the monsters come back after they've been driven off.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015258
text: So I think that it may be better to just scare them..{nl}Could you possibly be asked to help us once more?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015259
text: Please gather the monster's energy after dealing with them.{nl}They won't bother us again if we put it near the Cranto Coast.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015260
text: Thank you once again for agreeing to help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015261
text: Remember, monsters from other regions don't count.{nl}Please fill it with the energy from monsters from this region.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015262
text: You've already filled it with energy?{nl}It would have taken me ages... Well, I won't deny that you've got talent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015263
text: I'll go and bury the talisman since this will only take a moment.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015264
text: {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Jurate be upon you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015265
text: Thank you for helping us get back in touch with Goddess Jurate again.{nl}This was all possible thanks to your help...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015266
text: We're thinking of taking care of the altar for a while.{nl}So we want to gather some of the ocean's energy in advance... Could you help us do so?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015267
text: Go to Sniega Sentry and collect some special stones.{nl}You'll be able to spot which ones are special by spraying them with this divine water and collecting the ones that glow blue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015268
text: The stones that glow blue when sprayed by divine water.{nl}I just need those particular stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015269
text: You've returned. Thank you so much.{nl}Let me take a look at the stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015270
text: They all seem to be pristine.{nl}All we have to do is to place these stones where the ocean's energy is the strongest!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015271
text: Ah, will you do that?{nl}It's near Polybba Marshlands and Sahguma Lagoon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015272
text: If you take a look at where the water is flowing..{nl}You'll easily spot where the ocean's energy gathers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015273
text: We'll be fine as long as there is enough energy from the oceans.{nl}I'm sure Goddess Jurate will be pleased as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015274
text: I think we can finally relax a bit.{nl}The altar will be filled with the ocean's energy about the time when it stabilizes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015275
text: We are in your debt.{nl}I will pray for Goddess Jurate to bless your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015276
text: Come back anytime if you have any more clues about Ebonypawn.{nl}I will provide you with as much information as I can. Thanks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015277
text: I'll gather the Red Kepa peels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015278
text: For Safety

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015279
text: Monsters From the Settlement Clearing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015280
text: Too Much For One Person

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015281
text: Vanished Glory

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015282
text: I don't think that's needed,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015283
text: Nice Place to Live

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015284
text: That doesn't sound right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015285
text: Protect the Royal Masoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015286
text: Hidden Magic Devices

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015287
text: That doesn't really matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015288
text: Efforts Towards Redemption

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015289
text: Lost Pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015290
text: Stay here and rest for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015291
text: Dangerous Distraction

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015292
text: Good Day to Recover

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015293
text: For What

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015294
text: Hidden Farming Equipment

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015295
text: Can-do Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015296
text: Habitat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015297
text: Thinking Ahead

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015298
text: Violent Rampage

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015299
text: Hoping the Goddess Will Recover

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015300
text: Stuffy Colleagues

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015301
text: I can help you a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015302
text: Find the Hidden Artifacts

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015303
text: Observing the Owl (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015304
text: That's going to be difficult, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015305
text: Talking about what you heard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015306
text: Memories of the Sleeping Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015307
text: I'll hand you the sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015308
text: Goddess Jurate's Loremaster (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015309
text: Raising an Altar(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015310
text: I don't think I can help you, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015311
text: Raising an Altar (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015312
text: I'll go and help you a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015313
text: Raising an Altar (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015314
text: I'll lead them so they won't be able to approach.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015315
text: That sounds way too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015316
text: Retaking the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015317
text: I'll get rid of that Crabil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015318
text: I need some time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015319
text: Better Offerings

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015320
text: I'm sorry, I don't think I can help you any longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015321
text: What Interests You These Days

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015322
text: Okay, let's do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015323
text: That's too difficult for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015324
text: Ceremony for the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015325
text: Winning Favors (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015326
text: I'll drive the monsters away from Kranta Skerries.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015327
text: I'll do it, but I'm gonna rest for a while first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015328
text: Winning Favors (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015329
text: I'll fill the talisman with the energy from monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015330
text: I have to go do something else, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015331
text: Preparing for the Future (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015332
text: I'll think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015333
text: Preparing for the Future (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015334
text: I'll do it; I'll place the stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015335
text: Sorry, I need to get going now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015336
text: Dagger's Owner

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015337
text: I remember experiencing something similar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015338
text: I'm curious about it as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015339
text: The Operations Officer seems to have realized something about the Vubbe Cloth. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015340
text: The Hunter Master told you that he will acknowledge you as a Hunter if you help him find the books. Search for the books at Vubbe Outpost as the Hunter Master told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015341
text: The Hunter Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet Church B1 next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015342
text: The Archer Master, who is currently fixing the wall, has the next book. Collect boulders from the entrance of Crystal Mines next to the Miners' Village for the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015343
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master has requested that you help find some books. First, go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then look for the book at the Vubbe Outpost as the Quarrel Shooter Master mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015344
text: You have obtained the book from the Hunter Master. Return to the Quarrel Shooter Master for the next book.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015345
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master says that you can obtain the next book from the Archer Master who is currently repairing the wall. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods and collect boulders for the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015346
text: The Archer Master has requested help in order to find the book. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Next, go to the Vubbe Outpost and look for the book there as the Archer Master mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015347
text: The Archer Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015348
text: The Ranger Master has requested help in order to find the book. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Next, go to the Vubbe Outpost and look for the book there as the Archer Master mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015349
text: The Ranger Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015350
text: First, go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then look for boulders in the area mentioned by the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015351
text: Go to the basement of Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then obtain Coarse Bark from the Yognomes there in exchange for the Peltasta Master's cooperation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015352
text: The Peltasta Master has given you one mission. Go to the basement of Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then obtain Glizardon Black Claws from that area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015353
text: Go to Tenet Garden next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then, install the Pot of Fire next to the monsters that can be found there in order to collect the energy of fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015354
text: The Cyromancer wishes that you will help find a book. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then seek out the Mayor of the Miners' Village and ask about where the book might be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015355
text: The Swordman Master wishes to gain insight to advancing his skills. Go to the basement of Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then learn what the Swordman Master was trying to express by defeating the Glizardons there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015356
text: The Priest Master wishes to prove sincerity to the goddess. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods. Then find the possessed soldier in Miners' Village and perform an exorcism.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015357
text: Go to Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village in order to obtain the ingredients requested by the Wizard Master. You will be able to obtain Galok Fur from the ground floor, Egnome Fragments from the second floor and Glizardon Horns from the 1st basement floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015358
text: The Cleric Master has requested help curing the patients. Cure the patients after obtaining Divine Water from the Priest and Krivis Masters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015359
text: You have obtained Divine Water from the Priest and Krivis Masters. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Woods and cure the patients there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015360
text: Talk to Stonemason Canolyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015361
text: You have met a very perplexed looking Stonemason Canolyn. Talk to Stonemason Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015362
text: Report back to Stonemason Canolyn

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015363
text: It seems as if you have reduced a fair amount of Cockatrices. Report back to Stonemason Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015364
text: Stonemason Canolyn says that her equipment has been stolen by monsters. Talk to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015365
text: Unfortunately, there is no equipment box. Go back to Stonemason Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015366
text: Collecting Cockat Tails

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015367
text: Tara Miles says that the Cockat is already dying and wants to have it's tail. Obtain the Cockat tail from the other side of the Camp of Apiarists.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015368
text: Hand the Cockat tail to Tara Miles

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015369
text: You seem to have obtained enough Cockat tails. Go back to Tara Miles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015370
text: Obtain Cockat tails

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015371
text: As proof of your sincerety, the Priest Master wants you to collect

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015372
text: . Head to the Miners' Village after passing through East Siauliai Woods. Then, defeat the Vubbes near the Miners' Village and collect

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015374
text: The Krivis Master says that the Krivis brother that had been transporting the Holy Relic has disappeared. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Then try looking for the missing Krivis brother there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015375
text: Collect Red Keppa Peels from the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015376
text: The Swordman Master has asked you to prove that you are worthy of using a sword. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Then deal with the Red Kepas to obtain their peels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015377
text: You have collected all of the required Red Kepa peels. Give the peels to the Swordman Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015378
text: Obtain Red Kepa Peels

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015379
text: Defeat Red Kepa

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015380
text: The Wizard Master is emphasizing the importance of tenacity. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Then deal with the Red Kepa there before returning to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015381
text: You have dealed with all the Red Kepa. Go back and report to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015382
text: Defeat Jukopus to Obtain their Cores

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015383
text: The Archer Master wishes to test your skills to see if you are worthy. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Defeat the Jukopus there to obtain their cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015384
text: You have collected enough Jukopus cores. Give them to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015385
text: Obtain Jukopus Cores

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015386
text: The Cleric Master says that you will be able to advance your skills further through servitude. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest. Defeat the Vubbes near the Miners' Village and collect green ointment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015387
text: You can barely see someone. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015388
text: Go to Tenet Church next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Then, collect Pawndel Soul Crystals and Pawnd Mind Crystals from the ground floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015389
text: Defeat Jukopus near the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015390
text: You must pass a test to become a Peltasta. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest and defeat the Jukopus there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015391
text: You have dealed with all of the Jukopus. Go and report to the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015392
text: Defeat the Vubbe at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015393
text: You must pass a test to become a Highlander. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest and defeat the Vubbe there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015394
text: Defeat the Vubbe at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015395
text: The Pyromancer says that you will be allowed to learn if you help the research. Go and help the Bokor Master who is currently cooperating with the Pyromancer Master on a research project.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015396
text: You've found a villager, but they appear to be wounded. Ask the villager what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015397
text: Find a lens from the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015398
text: The Quarrel Shooter says that he is looking for the telescope that used to be at the Astral Tower and has learned something about the whereabouts of its lens. Try finding the lens at the Miners' Village past the East Siauliai Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015399
text: Collect Vubbe Poison Samples

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015400
text: The Ranger Master mentioned an assassin by the name of Ebonypawn and wants to have a sample of his poison. Go to the Miners' Village past East Siauliai Forest and collect poison samples from the Vubbe there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015401
text: Obtain %s by Defeating Vubbe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015402
text: Gustas says that only the final seal remains but is worried about a dangerous presence. Break the seal left of the Collapsed Sanctum. You should also be wary of monster attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015403
text: The Ranger Sub-master wishes that the Rangers will help the people by participating in the reconstruction of Orsha. Go to Koru Jungle past the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing. You will be able to find stones that can be used to reconstruct Orsha there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015404
text: The Sapper Sub-master is researching new Sapper techniques. Go to Koru Jungle past the Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing. You will be able to find some stones there that can be used for research purposes.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015405
text: Joana seems to know something about this sculpture. Talk to Joana about the sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015406
text: Agent Moren seems to know something. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015407
text: Go and check the purifier on the 3rd floor of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015408
text: It seems as if the purifier does not have sufficient power. Go to the Emergency Power Source with the magic crystal and charge it before giving power to the purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015409
text: You have charged the crystal with sufficient power. Go back to the purifier on the 3rd floor and provide it with power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015410
text: Watcher Molly at Srautas Gorge is waiting for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015411
text: Watcher Molly thinks that the reason behind the strange behavior of the Pantos is the Sugar Beets that they enjoy eating. Get rid of the Sugar Beets like Molly suggested.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015412
text: You have removed enough Plateau Sugar Beets. Report back to Watcher Molly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015413
text: Watcher Molly is waiting for someone's help at Gele Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015414
text: Dealing with Nearby Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015415
text: Watcher Molly requires monster information in order to effectively use Shaman Dolls on Gele Plateau. Defeat Spion Archers, Leaflies and Mali in order to deal with the new monsters to give Molly advice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015416
text: This should be enough information for Molly. Go back and tell Molly what you have learned about the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015417
text: Priest Draznie is looking for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 2F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015418
text: Priest Draznie has asked you to collect some traps she set up a long time ago. According to her, most traps are set up in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015419
text: You have collected a large number of malfunctioning traps. Take them to Priest Draznie.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015420
text: Priest Gelija is waiting for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015421
text: Priest Gelija has asked you to clear out the Varvs that have been terrorizing the priests in Ashaq Underground Prison. They are often found at the Felon Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015422
text: You have cleared out enough Varvs. Report to Gelija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015423
text: A traveling merchant in Koru Jungle is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015424
text: Deliver the Blue Coal to the Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015425
text: You have collected enough blue coal. Deliver it to the merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015426
text: Follower Vaidutis on the Ground Floor of Tenet Church is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015427
text: Collect Orb Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015428
text: Follower Vaidutis asked you to collect orb crystals in order to craft a Holy Stone to complete his mission. You can find orb crystals near the Worship Anteroom and Nuosirdum Chapel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015429
text: Report back to Follower Vaidutis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015430
text: You have collected sufficient amounts of orb crystals. Take them to Follower Vaidutis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015431
text: Historian Kepeck is waiting for help on Apvija Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015432
text: Historian Kepeck says that he has nothing to protect him. Defeat monsters from the surrounding area to keep him safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015433
text: Report back to Historian Kepeck

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015434
text: You have dealed with enough monsters. Go back to Kepeck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015435
text: Talk to Historian Grenus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015436
text: Historian Grenus is waiting for help at the Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015437
text: Find Worn Ancient Scriptures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015438
text: Historian Grenus wishes to produce some research results by excavating relics at the Gateway of the Great King. Look for Worn Ancient Scriptures from the excavation site while he takes a rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015439
text: Report back to Historian Grenus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015440
text: You have collected sufficient Worn Ancient Scriptures. Take them to Historian Grenus even if you don't think they are worth much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015441
text: Talk to Epigraphist Deltlan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015442
text: Epigraphist Deltlan is waiting for help at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015443
text: Epigraphist Deltlan has asked you to deal with the monsters from the surrounding area so that he can carry on with his research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015444
text: Report back to Epigraphist Deltlan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015445
text: You have dealed with enough monsters. Go back to Epigraphist Deltlan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015446
text: Believer Kazis is waiting for help at Kvailas Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015447
text: Defeat monsters at Kvailas Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015448
text: Believer Kazis desperately wishes for the defiled forest to be cleansed of demons. Deal with demons in the surrounding area to make his wish come true.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015449
text: Report back to Believer Kazis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015450
text: You have defeated enough monsters at Kvailas Forest. Report back to Believer Kazis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015451
text: Believer Bronius is waiting for help at Kvailas Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015452
text: Cleansing the Defiling Energies

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015453
text: Believer Bronius wishes to cleanse Kvailas Forest of the demon energy that is defiling it. Let's cleanse Kvailas Forest of the demon's energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015454
text: Report Back to Believer Bronius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015455
text: You have cleansed enough of the defiling energies. Report back to Believer Bronius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015456
text: Tess, who is alone in Knidos Jungle, is waiting for hlep.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015457
text: Collect Lapasape Wand Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015458
text: Collect Lapasape wand fragments to show that you have dealed with Lapasape Mages in order to calm Tess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015459
text: Take the Fragments to Tess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015460
text: You have collected enough Lapasape wand fragments. This should be enough to calm Tess a bit. Go back to Tess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015461
text: Herbalist Talas is waiting for help at Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015462
text: Collect Dry Dadania Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015463
text: Herbalist Talas has become injured by a trap after coming to collect dry Dadania leaves at Badoca Hill. Go find dry Dadania leaves from Dadania bushes at Badoca Hill for Talas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015464
text: Report back to Herbalist Talas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015465
text: You have collected sufficient dry Dadania leaves. Report back to Herbalist Talas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015466
text: The Gloomy Owl sculpture at Karolis Springs is waiting for someone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015467
text: Rescue Spirits Taken by the Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015468
text: The Gloomy Owl sculpture says that the monsters near Duokliu Hall have swallowed all of the spirits it is supposed to lead. Find and deal with the monsters that have swallowed the spirits to free them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015469
text: Report back to the Gloomy Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015470
text: You have freed a great deal of spirits. Go back and report to the Gloomy Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015471
text: Free the Swallowed Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015472
text: Talk to the Frail Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015473
text: The Frail Owl sculpture at Letas Stream is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015474
text: Retreiving Fading Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015475
text: The Frail Owl sculpture asked you to bring back the fading spirits that ran away because of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015476
text: Return to the Frail Owl sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015477
text: Acquired enough fading spirits. Go back to the Frail Owl sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015478
text: The Mayor's granddaughter of Pelke Shrine Ruins is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015479
text: The Mayor's granddaughter has asked you to collect antidote samples after defeating Merog Stingers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015480
text: Report Back to the Mayors' Granddaughter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015481
text: You have collected enough antidote samples. Return to the Mayor's granddaughter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015482
text: Assistant Airine at Akmens Ridge is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015483
text: Assistant Airine says that she will stay with Archeologist Dezic until he recovers. Help Airine nurse Dezic back to health safely by dealing with the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015484
text: Report back to Assistant Airine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015485
text: You have defeated enough monsters for Assistant Airine to be safe. Go back to Airine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015486
text: Talk to Settler Rodonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015487
text: Settler Rodonas from Gytis Settlement is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015488
text: Settler Rodonas says that he is unable to establish the settlement because there are too many monsters. Help Rodonas by defeating monsters near Bandrass Forkroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015489
text: Report back to Settler Rodonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015490
text: You have dealed with monsters near Bandrass Forkroad as Settler Rodonas requested. Report back to Settler Rodonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015491
text: Talk to the Tired Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015492
text: The Tired Soldier is waiting for help near Zachariel Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015493
text: Obtain Dirty Pouches

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015494
text: The Tired Soldier says that he has been ordered to obtain dirty pouches from the monsters. Defeat the monsters near Zachariel Crossroads and bring the Tired Soldier Filthy Parcels that may contain something of worth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015495
text: Report to the Tired Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015496
text: You have collected a sufficient amount of dirty pouches. Go back to the Tired Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015497
text: Talk with the Royal Mausoleum Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015498
text: The Royal Mausoleum Guardian is waiting for the Revelator on the ground floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015499
text: The Royal Mausoleum Guardian says that those who once protected the Royal Mausoleum are now corrupt and are destroying that which they once protected. The Royal Mausoleum Guardian asked you to deal with the corrupted ones and the monsters that breached the defenses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015500
text: You have dealt with enough monsters. Go back to the Royal Mausoleum Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015501
text: Talk to Laterous

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015502
text: Laterous from Baron Allerno is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015503
text: Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015504
text: Laterous is saying that the reason behind the disappearances and bad rumors is the monsters. Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area to see if that is true.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015505
text: Report back to Laterous

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015506
text: You have dealt with the monsters as Laterous had requested. Go back to Laterous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015507
text: The Royal Mausoleum Guardian is waiting for the Revelator on the second floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015508
text: Retrieve the Guardian's Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015509
text: The Royal Mausoleum Guardian has asked you to retrieve the essence from those that have forgotten their duties and are now destroying the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015510
text: Report back to the Royal Mausoleum Guardian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015511
text: Acquired enough of the essences. Go back to the Royal Mausoleum Guardian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015512
text: Talk to the Wandering Spirit of a Believer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015513
text: The Wandering Spirit of a Believer is waiting for help at Carlyle's Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015514
text: The Wandering Spirit of a Believer has asked you to defeat the monster that killed him. Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area to apease the Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015515
text: Report back to the Wandering Spirit of a Believer

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015516
text: You have defeated enough monsters at Carlyle's Mausoleum. Go back to the Wandering Spirit of a Believer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015517
text: Talk to Follower Nedluss

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015518
text: Follower Nedluss is waiting for help at Delmore Manor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015519
text: Destroy the magic devices at the Manor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015520
text: Follower Nedluss has asked you to destroy the magic devices that have been discovered within the Manor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015521
text: Report back to Follower Nedluss

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015522
text: You have destroyed enough magic devices. Go back and report to Follower Nedluss.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015523
text: Follower Bigs is waiting for a Revelator at the Delmore Manor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015524
text: Collect Condensed Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015525
text: Follower Bigs says that he requires Condensed Magic from demons to help Melchioras. Defeat the demons from the surrounding area to collect condensed magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015526
text: Report back to Follower Bigs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015527
text: You have collected sufficient Condensed Magic. Go back to Follower Bigs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015528
text: Talk to Pilgrim Seronia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015529
text: Pilgrim Seronia is waiting for help at Feretory Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015530
text: Pilgrim Seronia says that she has been chased by monsters all the way here. Deal with the monsters from the surrounding area so that she can rest a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015531
text: Report back to Pilgrim Seronia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015532
text: You have dealt with enough monsters from the surrounding area. Go back to Pilgrim Seronia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015533
text: Revelator Mihail is waiting for help at Delmore Outskirts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015534
text: Defeat the Pag Emitter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015535
text: Revelator Mihail has asked you to defeat the Pag Emitters that are attacking people at Delmore Outskirts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015536
text: You have defeated enough Pag Emitters. Report back to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015537
text: Talk to Revelator Connor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015538
text: Revelator Connor is waiting for help at Delmore Outskirts.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015539
text: Collect Maroulu Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015540
text: Revelator Connor asked you to collect Maroulu Herbs Grass from the Fortress walls in order for the people with Melchioras to recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015541
text: Report back to Revelator Connor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015542
text: You have gathered enough Maroulu Herbs. Go back and hand them to Revelator Connor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015543
text: Baron Secretary Benius is waiting for help at Myrkiti Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015544
text: Baron Secretary Benius has asked you to defeat the monsters in the surrounding area that are hindering the work process.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015545
text: You have dealt with enough monsters in the surrounding area. Go back to Baron Secretary Benius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015546
text: Talk to Farmer Deluma

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015547
text: Farmer Deluma is waiting for help at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015548
text: Collect the hidden farming tools

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015549
text: Farmer Deluma has asked you to retrieve the farming tools that were hidden to prevent them from being stolen by monsters and thieves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015550
text: Go back to Farmer Deluma

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015551
text: Acquired enough farming tools. Return to Famer Deluma and give them to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015552
text: Necromancer Drasius is waiting for help at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015553
text: Retrieve the Offering Pouches

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015554
text: Necromancer Drasius says that the reason behind the failed summoning was due to a lack of offerings. Drasius has asked you to retrieve the pouch containing offerings from the loosely strewn rocks near Dumbliu Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015555
text: Report back to Necromancer Drasius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015556
text: You have gathered enough offering pouches. Go back to Necromancer Drasius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015557
text: Talk to Lumberjack Luoval

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015558
text: Lumberjack Luoval is waiting for help at Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015559
text: Lumberjack Luoval says that there are too many monsters for him to gather lumber from Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins. Defeat the monsters there to allow Luoval to gather lumber.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015560
text: Report back to Lumberjack Luoval

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015561
text: You have dealt with enough monsters from the Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins. Report back to Lumberjack Luoval.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015562
text: Stonemason Canolyn is waiting for help at the Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015563
text: Deal with the monsters at Leipsna Chapel Site

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015564
text: Stonemason Canolyn wishes to establish a trade hub that leads to Fedimian at Leipsna Chapel Site. Deal with the monsters there and return to Canolyn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015565
text: You have dealt with enough monsters at Leipsna Chapel Site. Go back to Stonemason Canoyln.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015566
text: Talk to Priest Rovli

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015567
text: Priest Rovli is waiting for help at Bellai Rainforest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015568
text: Teach the Ferrets a lesson

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015569
text: Priest Rovli wishes to teach the Ferrets that are wrecking havoc on roads that lead to the major shrines a lesson. Teach the Ferrets in the surrounding area a lesson.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015570
