text: Report back to Priest Rovli

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015571
text: You have scared the Ferrets enough. Go back to Priest Rovli.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015572
text: Talk to Believer Dreka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015573
text: Believer Dreka is waiting for help at Seir Rainforest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015574
text: Collect Ceyral Saplings

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015575
text: Believer Dreka wishes to collect Ceyral Saplings for Goddess Rada to recover. Collect Ceyral Saplings from near Shulti Workshop and return to Dreka.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015576
text: Return to Believer Dreka

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015577
text: You have collected enough Ceyral Saplings. Hand them to Believer Dreka.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015578
text: Talk to Merchant Dolonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015579
text: Merchant Dolonas is waiting for help at Fasika Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015580
text: Merchant Dolonas has asked for help in order to pass Fasika Plateau safely. Deal with the monsters in the surrounding area to make it safer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015581
text: Report back to Merchant Dolonas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015582
text: You have cleared the area of enough monsters. Go back and give Merchant Dolonas the good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015583
text: Talk to the Collection Member

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015584
text: The Collection Member at Manahas is waiting for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015585
text: Excavate Manaryll Tombstones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015586
text: The Collection Member has asked you to help find ancient Manahas relics from the Augalu Garden. Dig through the soil to find Manaryll Tombstones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015587
text: Report back to the Collection Member.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015588
text: You have found enough Manaryll Tombstones. Hand them in to the Collection Member.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015589
text: The Swordsman Submaster wishes to prove your skills as a Revelator. Go past the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat Red Kepas and Woodins in Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015590
text: To judge your practical skills and strength, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Woodins in Paupys Crossing. Go past the Woods of the Linked Bridges to get to Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015591
text: The Swordsman Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle to achieve an even stronger level. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015592
text: To evaluate how much you have grown as a Revelator, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015593
text: The Peltasta Submaster wants to test your shield-using abilities. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Equip a shield and hunt monsters once you get there. Defeating demons will earn you extra points. Alas, this is a task you will have to complete on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015594
text: The Hoplite Submaster has tasked you with defeating Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015595
text: The Barbarian Submaster wants to test your mind for combat. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Defeat the Gosarus there and submit proof of your hunt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015596
text: The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle and collect Wormwood, Hemostasis Herb and Moonlight Flower respectively in each area. Go those areas by passing Paupys Crossing and Koru Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015597
text: Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Then collect Raffly Soul Crystals and Vubbe Warrior Mind Crystals from Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015598
text: Go meet Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha to pass the request of Dievdirbys Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015599
text: Talk with Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha and ask about the necessary materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015600
text: Blacksmith Ilanai doesn't have a chisel ready for you, but she can make one if you collect the right materials. Go to the Dadan Jungle by passing Paupys Crossing, Koru Jungle and Knidos Jungle. Defeat Grummers there and collect chunks of metal from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015601
text: You have collected enough chunks of metal. Bring them to Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015602
text: Talk with Blacksmith Ilanai in Orsha and receive the chisel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015603
text: You successfully defeated the monster after it suddenly attacking from beneath the water. Ask Napalis if they are all right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015604
text: Dievdirbys Asel is waiting for you at Grynas Hills. Go find Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015605
text: Talk to the Quiet Owl Sculpture at Susipyne Hill Areas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015606
text: Dievdirbys Asel suggests that you split up to investigate about the Owl Sculpture. Go and take a look at the Quiet Owl Sculpture at Susipyne Hill Areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015607
text: Talk to Dievdirbys Asel at the Siauras Valley

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015608
text: Unfortunately, the Quiet Owl Sculpture says that the information you seek is in the hands of the Sleeping Owl Sculpture. Go to Siauras Valley where Dievdirbys Asel is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015609
text: Dievdirbys Asel has crafted a Small Owl Sculpture. Take it to the Friendly Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015610
text: Go back to Dievdirbys Asel

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015611
text: The Friendly Owl Sculpture has given some of its powers to the Small Owl Sculpture. Go back to Dievdirbys Asel with the Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015612
text: The Broken Owl Sculpture has shown parts of the past. Talk about what you have seen with Dievdirbys Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015613
text: Check the situation of the Lemyra Sentry

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015614
text: It seems as if someone is fighting. Check if something is happening at Lemyra Sentry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015615
text: Talk to Loremaster Daroul

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015616
text: Loremaster Daroul is thanking you. Ask about what was happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015617
text: Help Loremaster Daroul deal with the attacking monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015618
text: Loremaster Daroul is trying to find a way to contact Goddess Jurate. Try talking to Daroul again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015619
text: Collect Blue Coral

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015620
text: Loremaster Daroul is trying to craft something to offer to Goddess Jurate. He has asked you to help collect more Blue Coral as there is not enough to finish the product.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015621
text: Hand the Blue Coral to Loremaster Daroul

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015622
text: You have collected sufficient amounts of Blue Coral. Go back and hand it to Loremaster Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015623
text: Loremaster Daroul is satisfied with the collected Blue Coral. Ask him what he requires next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015624
text: Go and talk to Loremaster Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015625
text: Loremaster Daroul says that his colleague has found a good place for an altar. Follow Loremaster Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015626
text: Talk to Loremaster Verta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015627
text: Loremaster Verta is waiting for you and Daroul. Talk to Loremaster Verta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015628
text: Lure and defeat monsters from the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015629
text: Loremaster Verta says that the monsters in the surrounding area are hindering his efforts at creating an altar. Lure the monsters from the Old Bridge and Kranta Skerries by using the Smelly Parcel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015630
text: You have driven off the monsters. Go to Loremaster Verta and tell him about the results.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015631
text: Loremaster Verta and Daroul have come from the Dellam Sandbank. Ask them what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015632
text: Retake the Altar to Goddess Jurate from the Crabil

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015633
text: They say that the Crabil was attracted to the ocean's energy. Defeat the Crabil that is near the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015634
text: You have driven off the Crabil. Go and talk to Loremaster Verta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015635
text: Protect the Loremaster and defeat the %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015636
text: Loremaster Daroul seems to be in trouble. Ask what the problem is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015637
text: Loremaster Daroul says that the offerings that were placed on the altar have all been destroyed because of the Crabil. He has asked you to collect more Blue Coral and take it to the Fedimian Accessory Merchant Joana.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015638
text: Talk to the Fedimian Accessory Merchant Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015639
text: Loremaster Daroul has asked you to request that the Blue Coral be worked on by the Fedimian Accessory Merchant Joana. Talk to Joana.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015640
text: Talk to Accessory Merchant Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015641
text: You have requested the processing of the Blue Coral to Accessory Merchant Joana. Joana seems to have a request of her own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015642
text: Collect whole Shell from the Gap Crabs at Kranta Skerries

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015643
text: Accessory Merchant Joana has asked for whole Gap Crab Shell in return for her services. Collect whole Gap Crab Shell from the Igti Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015644
text: Deliver the Shell to Accessory Merchant Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015645
text: You have collected the requested amount of Shell for Accessory Merchant Joana. Return to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015646
text: Acquired the crafted Coral from Accessory Merchant Joana. Take the Coral to Loremaster Verta so it can be offered to Goddess Jurate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015647
text: Goddess Jurate has answered the call of the Loremasters! Talk to Loremaster Verta once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015648
text: Loremaster Daroul is asking for a bit more help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015649
text: Dealing with the monsters at Kranta Skerries

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015650
text: Loremaster Daroul says that the monsters are wrecking the Coral at Kranta Skerries. He has asked you to deal with the monsters in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015651
text: You have dealt with enough monsters at Kranta Skerries. Report your actions to Loremaster Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015652
text: Deal with the monsters wrecking Kranta Skerries

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015653
text: Loremaster Daroul is looking for a way to prevent the monsters from wrecking the coral. Talk to Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015654
text: Fill Daroul's Pendant with the energy of monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015655
text: Loremaster Daroul wishes to scare the monsters by filling his pendant with the energy from monsters. Fill his pendant with their energy by defeating them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015656
text: You have filled Daroul's Pendant with the energy of monsters. Go back to Daroul.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015657
text: It seems as if Loremaster Verta is preparing something. Talk to Verta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015658
text: Collect the Blue Stones from Sniega Sentry

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015659
text: Loremaster Verta wishes to collect the ocean's energy ahead of time. Go to Sniega Sentry and collect the stones that shine blue in response to the Ocean's Divine Water.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015660
text: Return and hand the stones to Loremaster Verta

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015661
text: You have collected all the Stones required by Loremaster Verta. Return and hand them over to Verta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015662
text: Loremaster Verta seems to have checked the quality of Stones. Talk to Verta.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015663
text: Place the Blue Stones where the ocean's energy is gathering.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015664
text: Loremaster Verta aproves of the quality of Blue Stones. He has asked you to place them where the energy of the ocean is gathering.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015665
text: You have placed the Stones as Loremaster Verta requested. Go back and tell him that the deed is done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015666
text: Dievdirbys Asel is curious about the dagger's owner. Talk to Asel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015667
text: You have seen a similar case before. Ask the Ranger Master about the dagger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160718_015668
text: The dagger belonged to Ebonypawn after all. Tell Dievdirbys Asel about what you have heard from the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015669
text: [Event] Scavenge Challenge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015670
text: [Event] Daily Mystery Delivery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015671
text: Check the Event Notice Board

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015672
text: Please check the Event Notice Board

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015673
text: I can see someone who doesn't move at all. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015674
text: You can get from one hill to the other by crossing the bridge. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015675
text: I am near a statue that can bless you. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015676
text: I can see a pretty red light reflected off of that ore. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015677
text: To win this prize, you must find twins. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015678
text: Two bundles of hay keep me company. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015679
text: I like relaxing under a very big tree and count the ornaments on it. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015680
text: I am in front of the lonely house and can see a long stone bridge. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015681
text: I am under the spotlight looking at the bridge above the fall. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015682
text: I can hear people going up the stairs and smell old wood. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015683
text: The door behind me is not supposed to remain unlocked and open like it is now. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015684
text: You have to step on the stone stairway to see me near the tree. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015685
text: Who would pile something that is already burning? Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015686
text: From the stone stairway to the light on the street. Where am I?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015687
text: Talk to the resident looking for a box

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160723_015688
text: Give the Expensive-looking box to the resident that is looking for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015689
text: Bokors craft charms that will allow you to temporarily forget your pain.{nl}You can use it for allies in battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015690
text: {nl}But the pain will be felt at once when the charm loses it's powers.{nl}It's not just all good.. When is anything ever all good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015691
text: {nl}You seem to be quite interested.{nl}I will help you use such charms if you gather the monster blood required for it's creation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015692
text: {nl}Blood from monsters at King's Plateau will suffice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015693
text: Monsters from the King's Plateau will be fine ingredients for the charm.{nl}Take care since it is a long journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015694
text: You've brought the blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015695
text: Your allies will be able to temporarily forget pain.{nl}You can also order zombies to throw a festival as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015696
text: This means you will be able to learn and use a wider variety of Bokor skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015697
text: Either Rexipher is going to destroy the altar or we're going to activate it.{nl}Get to Viesa Altar and don't look back!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015698
text: I was just about to start crafting the charm.{nl}You can also use this charm on allies during battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015699
text: {nl}Your allies will be able to temporarily forget their pain.{nl}I'll need monster blood to craft the charm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015700
text: {nl}I'll help you learn other skills as well if you bring back monster blood for the charm.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015701
text: However, please know that you will feel all the pain that had been being held back when the charm loses it's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015702
text: {nl}Anyways, monster blood from the monster at Delmore Hamlet will suffice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015703
text: You have gathered enough materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015704
text: You are now a stronger Bokor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015705
text: Charm of a Bokor [Bokor Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015706
text: Go and gather monster's blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015707
text: Charm Requirements [Bokor Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015708
text: Gather monster blood to be used when crafting charms

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015709
text: The Bokor Master wishes to craft charms by using monster blood. Go and gather monster blood from the King's Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015710
text: Deliver the monster's blood to the Bokor Master

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015711
text: You have collected enought monster's blood. Deliver the blood to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015712
text: It seems as if helping Gedas with his work is the only way to hear more about Albinas. Retrieve Gedas's research material from the nearby Ticen. You can check which have more materials by pressing the spacebar.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015713
text: The Bokor Submaster wishes to craft charms by using monster blood. Go and gather monster blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015714
text: Deliver the monster's blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015715
text: You have collected enought monster's blood. Deliver the blood to the Bokor Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015716
text: This is an opportunity for us. The Cockats are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015717
text: I feel light headed. Please get me something to eat...{nl}I hid some food in the bushes a long time ago while I was working.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015718
text: The relic of the goddess would not summon such a monster. {nl}I smell something fishy with that Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015719
text: [Event] Hunting Season

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015720
text: Defeat Insect-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015721
text: You will have a chance of receiving a reward by defeating Insect-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015722
text: Check the Event Notice Board to receive your reward.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015723
text: Defeat Beast-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015724
text: You will have a chance of receiving a reward by defeating Beast-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015725
text: Defeat Plant-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015726
text: You will have a chance of receiving a reward by defeating Plant-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015727
text: Defeat Devil-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015728
text: You will have a chance of receiving a reward by defeating Devil-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015729
text: Defeat Mutant-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160811_015730
text: You will have a chance of receiving a reward by defeating Mutant-type Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015731
text: It wasn't so long ago. {nl}I felt a strange energy while experimenting near the Closed Area. {nl}It was quite different from magic I know of. It was very warm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015732
text: You came. Please get some dust samples from the Hallowventers.{nl}There are many reasons that a plague could spread.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015733
text: There was one testee who melted the Piece of Ice from the instant it touched.{nl}To be honest... that is a feat in itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015734
text: I am so bitter and resentful about myself...{nl}How I could only watch as the demons defiled the monastery...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015735
text: We have no choice but to try a dirty method.{nl}We will need to use some corrupt energy sources to weaken the powerful divine power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015736
text: The neighboring village had been ransacked.{nl}I could not help but think that the even the goddesses had forsaken us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015737
text: You can't recieve any support from Orsha without having a refugee status.{nl}They know that they will all starve without support so that's why they're all waiting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015738
text: It's so sad that we have to be developing the land around Klaipeda...{nl}I'm worried that some of the monsters will come running towards us since they've lost their habitats.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015739
text: And he wants to stop the girl from meeting the Revelator...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015740
text: We've been fooled before, we can't help but be suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20160925_015741
text: And to save you...{nl}You had to be hidden amongst all the Revelators. There was no other way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015742
text: The Saugas split their loot fairly among themselves.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015743
text: I guess what I saw was an illusion.{nl}I must reward you for protecting a mineralogist like me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015744
text: As a cleric, the best way to approach the goddesses is to serve others.{nl}If you help me heal the soldiers at Miners' Village, I will gladly help you back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015745
text: It's very sad to listen to the commands of demons as the Guardians of the tomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015746
text: I came here because the historians invited me to this place.{nl}They wanted my advice as a stonemason.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015747
text: I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord ransacking the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I couldn't go out and fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015748
text: I heard the monsters in Kateen Forest are eating up the Owl Sculptures I've made. {nl}I'm sure they are trying to use the souls for something else. Like for nourishment...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015749
text: As a Hunter, my instinct says the monsters in this forest are showing unusual movement. {nl}As if they are controlled by something.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015750
text: Don't just stand there. {nl}Move if you want to help or go away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015751
text: As the mayor, I cannot just leave the village like this. {nl}How could the goddesses be so indifferent?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015752
text: I have already memorized most of them, but the ones left are really important.{nl}They contain information on how to enter the Royal Mausoleum and such.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015753
text: This was prepared for releasing the seals in Tiltas Valley. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries, so please handle it with care.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015754
text: As I walked this land as a bystander, I read the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish a revolution,{nl}Lydia Schaffen also formed her forces, and they still remain to this day.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015755
text: I will be able to guide you to the revelation if I use all the strength left in me. {nl}That is why you should release me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015756
text: It seems some magical power is draining the life force out of living humans to extract souls...{nl}I have lived in this forest for many years but this is unheard of.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015757
text: Hmm... I think the  Ashaq Underground Prison or the Novaha Monastery would be too easy.{nl}The  more danger there lurks, there higher your score will be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015758
text: In order to fend off fire property monsters, you must strike them down with greater   force.{nl}Or you must utilize other properties of magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015759
text: If the magic circles are really a lie, then you should be able to remove the magic circles at Tylila Path with the goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015760
text: Hmm, have you ever seen the Great Cathedral or Mage Tower before?{nl}Or something like the gigantic Goddess Statue of Fedimian?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015761
text: While I am polishing up the materials, I don't want to see your face.{nl}How about defeating the monsters that make the place around here messy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015762
text: We and the Anastospa have different opinions, but we are not hostile to each other.{nl}Ever since the unknown name came out, it's apparent that we suspect it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015763
text: What is this? I see one Kupole, but I hear two personalities.{nl}I should try talking to them again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015764
text: I should follow Kupole Medena and go inside the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015765
text: Kupole Trija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015766
text: Oh, right.{nl}If you put together the pieces of the Magic Core we might just be able to use it.{nl}Would you collect the fragments of the Magic Core?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015767
text: {nl}The Magic Core pieces should be spread around outside of this vacant lot.{nl}If the goal was to destroy the Teleportation Magic Circle, the broken pieces of the Magic Core will have been thrown away there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015768
text: Serija must regain her energy for us to know about the goddess.{nl}You should go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015769
text: Follow Serija and go to section 3!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015770
text: Serija will know what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015771
text: Revelator, do you wish for my help?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015772
text: The goddess must be conscious still...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015773
text: Ah... The Teleportation Magic Circle cannot be used now.{nl}The Tala destroyed its Magic Core when they attacked.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015774
text: {nl}The Tala weren't always like this, but for some reason they sided with the demons.{nl}My strength wasn't enough to protect the magic circle from both of them...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015775
text: Thank you, Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015776
text: There is a Holy Place of Recovery at the Antra Vacant Lot,

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015777
text: {nl}There you can receive good energy to help you heal and recover.{nl}Serija can't move by herself yet, so I ask that you bring us some of that energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015778
text: I just hope the demons haven't taken the Holy Place of Recovery yet...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015779
text: Kupole Serija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015780
text: Won't it all be over now...?{nl}Please, tell me as soon as you find any traces of Dalia...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015781
text: But you must go.{nl}The goddess must be saved.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015782
text: {nl}Whatever it takes...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015783
text: Is it... Is that really okay...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015784
text: Do not worry, Serija.{nl}The Revelator and I will rescue Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015785
text: {nl}You should stay here and recover your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015786
text: I feel so sorry...{nl}But now I'm certain that only the Revelator can save the goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015787
text: If only the goddess still has her conscience, I can communicate with Her.{nl}I'll prepare to speak to Her. Warn me when you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015788
text: Serija has calmed down now.{nl}We should start by searching this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015789
text: Yes.{nl}The withering leaves and excessive vegetation of this forest are problems Aeglei and I have long argued over.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015790
text: Why do you ask?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015791
text: The inside of our house is a complete chaos and there's demon footprints everywhere.{nl}I couldn't find any notes either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015792
text: We can't give   up.{nl}Maybe we're just not seeing the rest of the beads.{nl}They could've   been kicked out of the way by monsters or...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015793
text: The demons may scare me, but as a herb gatherer I can't let this go.{nl}I think it's best to   destroy all the Aconites.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015794
text: This wizard... He's sided with the demons.{nl}Also, there are other leaders and followers of this plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015795
text: Yes, it was all thanks to you.{nl}Thank you so much... really.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015796
text: People often ask me if I wouldn't be better off living as a descendant of a noble family.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015797
text: {nl}But to me, studying literature and researching Wizard magic is much more worthy.{nl}Those are all things that made me grow and develop.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015798
text: My mentor, the previous Sage Master passed away during Medzio Diena.{nl}I didn't exactly inherit the position officially.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015799
text: {nl}After Medzio Diena, the school of Sage magic was nearly eradicated.{nl}That's why rebuilding it now as the Sage Master is not an easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015800
text: {nl}Still, it is my goal to bring back the school of Sage magic in whatever way I can.{nl}I think of it as my mission as the current Sage Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015801
text: Every single one of us possesses an inner divine trait, given to us by the goddesses.{nl}However, this inner divinity manifests only in a small minority.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015802
text: {nl}Those in whom this divinity manifests will suffer and will hurt.{nl}Any mental or physical suffering experienced by the goddesses will reflect in these people.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015803
text: {nl}Taoists are those who experience this pain through the manifestation of their inner divinity.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015804
text: Taoists experience the suffering of the goddesses more than any other type of cleric.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015805
text: However, I don't know what this poison is.{nl}But this dagger... How about you go meet the Ranger Master?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015806
text: They're late. My colleagues went to the Ishigiti Herb Farm to defeat the Gorgon.{nl}I don't wanna think that they were annihilated.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015807
text: You defeated the Gorgon yourself?{nl}It is fortunate that my colleagues are safe, but I don't know what they did as soldiers..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015808
text: From now on, be careful when using shared equipment.{nl}Nonetheless, an impressive show of strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015809
text: I can't believe I left Priest Pranas behind even if I was frightened by the demon...{nl}I don't deserve to be called a Chaser.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015810
text: You'll need a lot of utilities on your travels like potions and such.{nl}Make sure to stop by often since I have the cheapest prices around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015811
text: Revelator? I don't know what you're talking about.{nl}Do you perhaps mean the people like the Bokors or Oracles?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015812
text: It's been a while  since the prison was shut down, but the effects from the blessings are still there.{nl}Your powers as Revelator should be enough to liberate that energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015813
text: I am sorry. I cannot announce that demons have come this close to the city.{nl}I hope that you will understand the fact that I cannot spread confusion and fear among my people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015814
text: I, as the Highlander Submaster, am helping the immigrants the best I can...{nl}I am   worried if the migration orders aren't a big burden to the lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015815
text: Just remember...  You'll have to start from the beginning if you become incapacitated.{nl}I will not accept any results that come from working with colleagues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015816
text: Look for Sparnasman in Novaha Annex.{nl}Its horns are the materials that I've been looking for so be careful please.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015817
text: You've done better than any of my expectations.{nl}Now vow to fight for the goddesses as a Paladin for your faith and justice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015818
text: I was once a mage under Delmore Rephaim as well.{nl}But I ran after seeing him create the Kruvina, which simply made me feel sick.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015819
text: Those amplifiers have given us a lot of trouble, {nl}but as a Sapper I can't help but take an interest in them.{nl}Would you collect some for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015820
text: If you ever go to Carlyle's Mausoleum, be careful about them.{nl}No matter how much I think about it, they are not in their right minds.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015821
text: We want to ask for help, too. We want it more than anyone.{nl}Be it Orsha... or Fedimian, which is closer... But that's just something we can't do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015822
text: It seems to be inactive now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015823
text: The device gives off a warm, but dangerous feel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015824
text: Oh, you're a Revelator!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015825
text: Ah...{nl}This is what Goddess Dalia foresaw...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015826
text: {nl}I am Kupole Medena, I protect the Tevhrin Stalactite Caves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015827
text: {nl}Revelator.{nl}Please, save Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015828
text: Come with me to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1.{nl}I will tell you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015829
text: Revelator, you came.{nl}The day that Goddess Dalia foresaw has finally come.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015830
text: Dalia, the goddess behind the fate of humans, is trapped here in the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}She was caught in a demon conspiracy and now possesses the power of chaos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015831
text: {nl}But the power of chaos is far too strong and dangerous, and has taken over the Goddess.{nl}The immense power contained in Her could destroy the entire world...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015832
text: {nl}That is why we had no choice but to keep Goddess Dalia in the cave.{nl}The other Kupoles and I are here making sure She does not break loose of Her seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015833
text: {nl}Not long ago, however, the demons broke into the caves.{nl}We believe they want to break the Goddess' seal and use Her power of chaos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015834
text: {nl}But Goddess Dalia already predicted the existence of a Revelator.{nl}That a Revelator will soon appear at the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015835
text: {nl}I was searching for that very Revelator.{nl}But it seems the demons' side became stronger while I was away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015836
text: {nl}The Tala tribe are also joining their forces and causing chaos.{nl}I think it would be wise to reduce their numbers first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015837
text: I am glad Goddess Dalia was not mistaken in Her prophecy...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015838
text: This will not do.{nl}The Tala and the demons are still causing chaos and there's nothing we can do to stop them.{nl}I'm worried that they may have already broken the goddess' seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015839
text: There's a magic circle in the Abmathai Vacant Lot that leads to Goddess Dalia.{nl}You should meet Kupole Trija there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015840
text: I think I've found the Teleportation Magic Circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015841
text: Please, let Goddess Dalia be safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015843
text: {nl}This is odd...{nl}The magic circle has lost its light...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015844
text: Something is sure to have happened.{nl}I need to ask Kupole Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015845
text: Ah... If Medena brought you here...{nl}Are you perhaps the Revelator?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015846
text: Goddess Dalia's prophecy was right!{nl}Bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015847
text: It won't be easy collecting all the pieces.{nl}If possible, gather the bigger ones first.{nl}Revelator...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015848
text: You're back already.{nl}Let me have them.{nl}I'll have a look at them now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015849
text: Oh... It seems... The Magic Core pieces you brought back no longer have magic in them.{nl}I wonder if the core's magic was absorbed by the demons when it broke...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015850
text: We can't move with the magic circle on an empty magic core.{nl}Altough you might be able to make the core absorb more magic from defeated monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015851
text: Even a small amount of magic would help.{nl}Please defeat Green Flak monsters to recover the core's magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015852
text: Oh, this is demon essence...{nl}You collected this much from hunting Green Flak monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015853
text: {nl}It seems the core has absorbed their essence.{nl}Well, I didn't expect it to recover on pure magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015854
text: We should be able to use the demon essence on the magic core if we purify it.{nl}The Altar of Purification of Thyras Sanctuary ought to work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015855
text: {nl}On the other hand, I'm afraid the essence could break from the purifying energy.{nl}In that case, you will need to gather more Green Flak essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015856
text: Even with the purification, having to use demon essence...{nl}Makes me feel a little uneasy... but I guess there's no other choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015857
text: The demon essence looks free of all evil energy.{nl}You did well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015858
text: We should be able to use the purified demon essence now.{nl}I'll leave it to Medena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015859
text: Keep in mind, however, that if the demons notice that the Teleportation Magic Circle is restored, they will try to destroy it again.{nl}If they do, you will have to protect us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015860
text: Will Trija use the magic core the way we want, however...? I'm worried, but we must try and convince her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015861
text: Thanks to you we were able to restore the Teleportation Magic Circle.{nl}And yet it seems like using magic absorbed by demons was a problem, even after the purification.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015862
text: The Magic Core is too unstable for us to use the magic circle right away.{nl}And by the looks of it, it could be a while before it fully stabilizes...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015863
text: It's a shame we can't use the Teleportation Magic Circle yet...{nl}But we can't just wait around for it to become activated again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015864
text: {nl}If Goddess Dalia's seal is broken meanwhile, it will be a disaster.{nl}If we can't use the magic circle, we should move there in whatever way we can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015865
text: {nl}It will take some time but...{nl}If we take Lhysis Pathway we'll arrive at Section 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015866
text: It looks like someone blocked the way on purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015867
text: To tell you the truth, I'm not sure what will happen if Goddess Dalia's seal is broken either.{nl}All I know is that a terrible catastrophe will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015868
text: Oh no...{nl}It looks like the demons have blocked the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015869
text: Hm...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015870
text: {nl}There is another way.{nl}We could bring the magic core of the magic circle we restored over here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015871
text: Using the unstable magic core as a catalyst, then adding some divine energy, we can create an explosion.{nl}It should be enough to open up a path for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015872
text: {nl}I can't tell whether Trija will give us the magic core willingly, but it's the only way we have now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015873
text: What?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015874
text: {nl}She wants to blow up an unstable magic core??{nl}I know it's urgent, but that sounds too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015875
text: And we shouldn't use the magic core we restored like that...{nl}We may never be able to use the Teleportation Magic Circle again.{nl}We can't do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015876
text: I just pray that Goddess Dalia is safe...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015877
text: I knew that much power would open up a path for us.{nl}Hurry and move to Section 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015878
text: Please, you must save Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015879
text: That is true... This magic circle leads directly to Goddess Dalia...{nl}So if She were to be in danger, this magic circle wouldn't help us either way...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015880
text: ... alright. {nl}Take the unstable magic core.{nl}Instead, you must tell me about Goddess Dalia's condition.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015881
text: Revelator, thank you for rescuing Goddess Dalia.{nl}Although only Her spirit remains, I believe this would have been Her choice, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015882
text: {nl}The goddess may no longer be with us, but I will always protect this place.{nl}The demons are still attempting to take over, and the Tala are causing chaos as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015883
text: {nl}The Tala were a good-natured tribe before the demons arrived.{nl}After the demons came, I noticed their necklaces seem to have turned black.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015884
text: {nl}I think the evil energy of the demons in their necklaces is what made them turn violent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015885
text: I will give you some Sleep Powder to use on the Tala.{nl}Make them fall asleep and collect some of their necklaces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015886
text: If we leave them be, they will only keep harming us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015887
text: Thank you.{nl}As I thought, the necklaces feel evil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015888
text: It's possible the necklaces can also be purified at the Thyras Sanctuary's Altar of Purification.{nl}It is said the gem in the original Tala necklaces glows a beautiful blue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015889
text: Go to the Altar of Purification and return the necklaces to their original form.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015890
text: I don't think the necklaces will break this time.{nl}They may be contaminated with demon magic, but they aren't evil themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015891
text: This is it.{nl}The blue glow.{nl}This is the color of the original Tala necklaces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015892
text: It's time to return the purified necklaces to the Tala tribe.{nl}Find a way to place the necklaces on them again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015893
text: {nl}My guess is that they will become harmless again once they have the purified necklaces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015894
text: Remember to avoid harming them.{nl}It's the demons who are evil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015895
text: Do you mean the Tala stopped attacking after you gave them the necklaces?{nl}Thank you.{nl}Thanks to you the Tala tribe are back to who they were again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015896
text: That's odd...{nl}I don't feel the energy of the Kupole that guards this place... Alena...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015897
text: {nl}Something must have happened to Alena!{nl}We need to go to Vienas Vacant Lot!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015898
text: I think I've found Alena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015899
text: Kupole Alena

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015900
text: Medena... It's you...{nl}I'm so sorry.{nl}I couldn't protect this place...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015901
text: {nl}Ah, you brought... the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015902
text: I was fighting off the demons attacking Section 2 with Serija.{nl}Suddenly more and more demons and monsters started to appear and...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015903
text: {nl}The monsters haven't stopped using binding magic in this area; I can't break free from it.{nl}Please, defeat some monsters wandering around me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015904
text: {nl}Aim for the demon monsters and the Tala, who seem to be under their control...{nl}If you defeat them I can break free from their binding magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015905
text: I'm worried for Serija.{nl}She was with me when we were being attacked...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015906
text: Thank you.{nl}I was finally able to break free from the binding magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015907
text: But I believe the weak Kupole energy felt here belongs to Serija.{nl}All the demons did to me was keep me trapped here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015908
text: {nl}But Serija, they took her. They wanted to break Goddess Dalia's seal without interference, you see.{nl}They must have taken her to Section 2 somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015909
text: The Kupole in sight seems to be Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015910
text: Please save Serija.{nl}I feel her energy weaken and I'm worried for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015911
text: That's her! The Kupole trapped there, it's Serija!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015912
text: Serija!{nl}What happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015913
text: This voice... Medena... Medena, is that you?{nl}You're back...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015914
text: Then the person with you right now is the Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015915
text: It wasn't long after Medena left the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave to go searching for the Revelator.{nl}Crowds of demons started to invade this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015916
text: {nl}They restrained me and interrogated me about how to break Goddess Dalia's seal.{nl}But I wouldn't tell them, so they went to look for the goddess themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015917
text: {nl}I'm so worried for Goddess Dalia.{nl}The restraining device keeping me trapped should be around here somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015918
text: {nl}Please, destroy the device.{nl}I must find if Goddess Dalia is safe...!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015919
text: You should be able to destroy the other devices with ease now.{nl}Please hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015920
text: The devices are weaker than expected.{nl}Are they underestimating the power of the Kupoles?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015921
text: There's only one left now.{nl}It looked much stronger than the other devices you destroyed, however...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015922
text: Just hold on a little longer.{nl}Soon we can save Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015923
text: I no longer feel any evil energy{nl}Serija should be free now...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015924
text: {nl}But Serija's energy still feels very weak.{nl}If she's free, she's probably too weak to move properly, I suppose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015925
text: Materializing flowing energy is not an easy task.{nl}But I can help you, don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015926
text: Materialized recovery...{nl}Thank you.{nl}I can move better now, we should go find the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015927
text: We need to free Serija first...{nl}What should we do...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015928
text: That's brilliant!{nl}Any demon-made object will react to my divine energy, then it will be easier to destroy them!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015929
text: As long as their evil energy is not too strong, my divine force might just be enough to destroy the devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015930
text: These are the devices keeping Serija trapped, like you thought.{nl}They aren't as strong as I imagined.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015931
text: Goddess Dalia is in Section 3.{nl}We have no more time to waste now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015932
text: We can get to Section 3 if we cross Sjeti Pathway.{nl}I'll go first, you can meet me in Section 3 with Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015933
text: Please hurry.{nl}And don't forget to be careful.{nl}We can't let the demons know where the goddess is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015934
text: Right...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015935
text: {nl}I think I've got it.{nl}If the devices are running on evil energy, that means enough of it must be already stored inside them, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015936
text: If so, we can take the demons' magic stones and add more energy to the device.{nl}Add enough evil energy to them and they'll overload.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015937
text: I just can't forgive them.{nl}Not the monsters who attacked and trapped me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015938
text: Please clear out some monsters on your way there.{nl}I'm afraid they'll only create more problems if we let them be.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015939
text: I'm sure they'll be nothing but trouble if we don't get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015940
text: I was around the monsters for too long, it seems.{nl}My energy is not what it was anymore.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015941
text: There's a Holy Place of Recovery in Antra Vacant Lot.{nl}If you find out a way to materialize energy, you can materialize healing energy there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015942
text: Medena knows how to materialize healing energy, so I'm not worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015943
text: That's impressive.{nl}I know materializing healing energy is no easy task for humans...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015944
text: This healing energy...{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015945
text: Before we move to where the goddess is...{nl}We need to deal with the demons and monsters here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015946
text: If they've seen us, they'll tell the others about it{nl}We need to reduce their numbers before we take the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015947
text: We cannot let them know about us.{nl}Please, take care of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015948
text: Thank you.{nl}But there's still a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015949
text: You may be the Revelator, but you're still a human...{nl}It's easy for even Kupoles to lose themselves to the power of chaos surrounding Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015950
text: {nl}Go to Protas Sanctum and you will see several magic circles there.{nl}Step on the magic circles to receive protection.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015951
text: {nl}Their magic will protect you from the power of chaos, but one circle will not be enough.{nl}To receive full protection, you must step on all the magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015952
text: {nl}After you receive the protective magic, come back to meet the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015953
text: The Kupoles will also receive the protective magic.{nl}We should each charge our necklaces with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015954
text: Good.{nl}You seem fully protected.{nl}We're ready to meet Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015955
text: We'll move to the spot where Goddess Dalia is now.{nl}We'll move separately to avoid getting caught by the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015956
text: I'll go first. You and Medena can meet me at the site of the Luonisz Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015957
text: I'm glad you're here.{nl}But we have a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015958
text: Kupole Siute is in charge of protecting the site of the seal.{nl}But for some reason she's not answering to my voice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015959
text: {nl}We need Siute to disable the barrier for us, I wonder what happened...{nl}We might have to disable the barrier ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015960
text: {nl}There are lockout devices installed on the Slepus Seal, the Phromba Seal and the Pourma Seal, one in each.{nl}If all three devices are activated, we can disable the barrier from the outside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015961
text: {nl}Each lockout device must be activated less than one minute after the previous one, or they will all shut down.{nl}I'll stay and make sure the demons can't pass through here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015962
text: If one minute passes after you activate the first device, you will have to activate them all again.{nl}Don't forget.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015963
text: Well done.{nl}Now all that's left is disabling the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015964
text: Goddess Dalia is beyond this barrier.{nl}Don't get too close to Her, she can't tell allies from enemies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015965
text: Well, then... are you ready to meet the goddess?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015966
text: How did you purify Siute's darkness...?{nl}Could it be...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015967
text: {nl}With you here, we might really be able to save the goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015968
text: In the past, all the Kupoles protecting Goddess Dalia gathered here to join our divine forces.{nl}All of our energy, all of our strength was poured here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015969
text: {nl}At the time the goddess regained her senses for a moment, and She predicted the arrival of a Revelator at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}Then, She was taken once again by Giltine's evil energy and returned to Her state of chaos.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015970
text: {nl}She... never came back to her senses after that...{nl}She hasn't reacted to our divine forces anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015971
text: {nl}But She might react to your energy, Revelator.{nl}Your energy had the power to purify Siute's darkness, it could be possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015972
text: {nl}That is why I'm asking you.{nl}I'm going to prepare the same ceremony we performed then, and I want you to lend us your energy..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015973
text: Dalia?{nl}Our goddess... Do you hear me?{nl}Do you recognize me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015974
text: Goddess Dalia's senses have returned!{nl}I knew we could count on you, Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015975
text: Goddess Dalia controls the fate of humans...{nl}I am sure She will want to speak to you, Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015976
text: You may approach Her now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015977
text: Please, rid this place of the demons and save Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015978
text: This place is...{nl}Flooded with demon energy...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015979
text: {nl}I will be taken by the power of chaos once more and the seal will be broken.{nl}Then, a new catastrophe will fall upon humanity...{nl}You must run, run far away...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015980
text: We know Giltine's evil energy is growing again in Goddess Dalia.{nl}Soon She will once again be taken by the power of chaos and lose Her senses to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015981
text: {nl}But we can slow down the process.{nl}Our devices run on divine energy, which means there is a high amount of it running through the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015982
text: {nl}The divine energy makes glowing moss grow in these caves.{nl}This glowing moss itself is imbued with divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015983
text: {nl}Bring me some of this glowing moss.{nl}The divine energy in it is sure to have an effect.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015984
text: The monsters dislike divine energy and will destroy any rocks where the moss grows.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015985
text: Serija's voice is heard, crying out from somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015986
text: Dalia! Goddess Dalia!{nl}No... No...! What have the demons done...{nl}Nooo!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015987
text: Dalia... Our goddess...{nl}We must save Her...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015988
text: If Dalia's seal is broken, the world will... it will...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015989
text: We must find Goddess Dalia...{nl}Where could the demons have taken Her...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015990
text: Serija... She must be hurt... In her condition...{nl}She must have gone to Section 4.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015991
text: If the demons had ran away to Section 3, I would have heard about it from the other sisters.{nl}I'm worried for Serija. We should go after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015992
text: This voice...{nl}It's her... It's Serija's voice...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015993
text: The power of Giltine around me is weaker now...{nl}What happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015994
text: Serija suddenly disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015995
text: With Goddess Dalia's sacrifice we were able to stop Gesti, but the demons are still invading.{nl}We must protect this place, we can't let the goddess' sacrifice be in vain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015996
text: {nl}I'm so sorry to ask, but will you do something for me?{nl}I was injured when the demons attacked to take Goddess Dalia and it's hard to move.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015997
text: {nl}I don't think I can take the demons in Section 3 yet.{nl}I'm going to need you to clear out some out of the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015998
text: The pendants of the Kupoles who live here are imbued with protective magic to fight off the demons.{nl}That's the only way we can face their evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_015999
text: But with the constant demon attacks, I haven't been able to recharge my pendant.{nl}Can I ask you to replenish the protective magic of my pendant?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016000
text: Thank you.{nl}I won't need to worry for a while now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016001
text: Wait there, Alena.{nl}We will save you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016002
text: Serija is the one in charge of the Kupoles here at the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave, she can take care of herself...{nl}But this time the demons and monsters were just too many...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016003
text: {nl}They must have taken her to Section 2...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016004
text: Ah...! No! Serija!{nl}Wait!!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016005
text: You can't save Goddess Dalia like that!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016006
text: We need to release Serija and go see the goddess immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016007
text: You did well for your first time!{nl}Now we just need to tell Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016008
text: We need to save Goddess Dalia...{nl}Where could She be...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016009
text: The day the goddess' seal is broken...{nl}The catastrophe of 600 years ago will once again take over our world...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016010
text: I saw them take the goddess away and there was nothing I could do...{nl}I feel pathetic...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016011
text: I don't think we'll be able to find Her here, not like this...{nl}Where could the demons have taken Her?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016012
text: However... I know now.{nl}I know how the demons' numbers were able to rise so fast is so little time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016013
text: They created portals in the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave when Section 4 was empty.{nl}If we leave that portal alone, soon they will occupy the entire cave.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016014
text: We should close the portals before we go back to Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016015
text: We need to keep an eye on them at all times.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016016
text: This will reduce the flow of demons into the cave.{nl}Let's go back to Serija now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016017
text: While you and Medena were searching for the goddess I had time to calm down and reflect.{nl}I don't think we can find the demons who took the goddess without a plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016018
text: The demon monsters in here must know where She is.{nl}I think we need to read their memories from their spirits...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016019
text: {nl}Demon spirits are pure evil and can overtake the conscience of Kupoles.{nl}That's why we use cores to suppress and absorb evil when we read the minds of demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016020
text: {nl}The cores of Green Zolems should do the trick.{nl}It's possible that their cores are contaminated with evil demon energy, so we may have to purify them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016021
text: The Green Zolem cores are likely contaminated with evil demon energy.{nl}We need to purify them before we add divine energy to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016022
text: {nl}Only then can we use them to suppress evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016023
text: You've brought the cores.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016024
text: As I thought, the cores are imbued with evil energy...{nl}We'll need to purify them first.{nl}But for that, we'll need a lot of divine energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016025
text: The problem is that using that much divine energy will get the monsters' attention.{nl}I'll need you to take care of any monsters that might attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016026
text: With your help, the divine core is complete.{nl}This should suppress the demons' evil energy for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016027
text: Here, take the divine core.{nl}Use it against demon monsters to suppress and absorb their evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016028
text: Defeat the demons once you see their evil energy has disappeared.{nl}Then, Medena will read their spirits and find out where the goddess is.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016029
text: Like I said before, reading demon spirits isn't that simple.{nl}Medena will be in danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016030
text: The demons' memories must be accessed only after the core suppresses their evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016031
text: So that's what the demons were plotting...{nl}But something doesn't seem right.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016032
text: It took a good amount of effort for past Demon Kings to seal Goddess Dalia.{nl}A regular demon shouldn't be able to break the seal...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016033
text: What I know for sure is that they took Goddess Dalia to Section 5.{nl}Let's not waste any more time and hurry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016034
text: You need to go, now!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016035
text: Only you can save Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016036
text: That was close.{nl}I never thought they would open the portals for an ambush...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016037
text: We must be going in the right direction.{nl}I can feel the demons' power grow stronger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016038
text: This kind of interference was to be expected.{nl}The goddess will be waiting for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016039
text: Hurry and go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016040
text: We're almost in Section 5.{nl}Be strong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016041
text: Thank you.{nl}I knew you would make it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016042
text: {nl}So this is what it feels like to be surrounded by evil energy...{nl}I feel so uneasy, how could Siute endure this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016043
text: {nl}This... is bad...{nl}Something terrifying was about to happen, something much worse than I imagined...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016044
text: I couldn't get the exact location of the goddess from the memories of those demons but...{nl}Something big... was on its way to the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016045
text: {nl}It felt strange and frightening... Something this powerful... It can only be one of three beings.{nl}The three Demon Kings... Giltine's Demon Kings and Queen...{nl}Kartas, Baiga and Gesti...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016046
text: {nl}We can't face them like this.{nl}We must return to Serija and ask her what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016047
text: You say one of the three Demon Kings is coming to the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave?{nl}Oh... I see...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016048
text: {nl}I understand now...{nl}There was no way a group of lower demons could break the goddess' seal...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016049
text: {nl}Only a Demon King would be powerful enough to break the seal.{nl}But what about the power of chaos...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016050
text: {nl}There's only one way we can stop them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016051
text: {nl}The day Goddess Saule entrusted the Kupoles with Dalia, She created a divine orb.{nl}The orb has the power to control the seal, in the event of any danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016052
text: {nl}But as Goddess Saule lost Her power, so did the orb weaken.{nl}If only we can restore its strength, the seal will close itself again, even if a Demon King succeeds in opening it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016053
text: {nl}Revelator, I will give you the divine orb. Go find Goddess Saule in Septyni Glen.{nl}She will tell you how to recover the orb's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016054
text: Serija should know what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016055
text: This... is the orb I gave Serija when I left the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave...{nl}Does this mean the demons are trying to break Dalia's seal?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016056
text: {nl}A Demon King, you say...{nl}This weakened orb won't be able to stand against the power of a Demon King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016057
text: Goddess Saule Herself might not be able to fix the utensil.{nl}But She is the only one we can count on now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016058
text: Septyni Glen...{nl}I don't think I can make it that far from here.{nl}I'm afraid you must go there alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016059
text: I cannot restore the orb as I am still recovering my powers.{nl}However, my energy trapped at the Forest of Thorns is starting free itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016060
text: {nl}You will feel my energy near the Gate Route.{nl}Have the divine orb absorb it and it shall be recovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016061
text: I don't want to rush you, but time is scarce.{nl}Should Dalia's seal be broken, an immense disaster will take over our world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016062
text: You have done well.{nl}The divine orb and its restored power will help you face the Demon King.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016063
text: However, the fact remains that the orb itself is weakened.{nl}You will have one chance... One chance alone to use the power of the divine orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016064
text: You may use the orb to strengthen Dalia's seal.{nl}Or you may use its power to face the Demon King approaching.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016065
text: The divine orb may be used for one, and only one of these tasks...{nl}May you use it wisely and save Dalia, save our world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016066
text: You've restored the divine orb.{nl}It's a shame it can't be used more than once but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016067
text: We may only have one chance to use the orb, but its power will be enough to face the Demon King.{nl}Take the orb and stop the demons, save Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016068
text: It came to Section 5, where the goddess is.{nl}I expect the demons to increase their attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016069
text: We should clear out as many demons as we can before they attack.{nl}It'll be easier to face them if we reduce their numbers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016070
text: They're resilient creatures.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016071
text: We'll never get rid of them this way.{nl}We should find the goddess first!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016072
text: There's no way to tell exactly where She is...{nl}We need to search the entire Section 5.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016073
text: After we find Dalia...{nl}There will be no mercy for these demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016074
text: This evil aura... It can only be a demon barrier.{nl}If they made a barrier here, that means Dalia will be on the other side.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016075
text: But how to disable it... Other than the demons, only Dalia Herself will know...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016076
text: I knew the evil energy around here was too intense...{nl}It was an evil statue the demons erected.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016077
text: It's true we didn't see anything on our way here...{nl}They must have concealed the statue with magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016078
text: I have a Magic Searching Stone.{nl}We can use it to find objects hidden with magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016079
text: We must hurry, before the goddess loses her senses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016080
text: This is odd.{nl}We destroyed the statue, but the evil energy remains.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016081
text: No... Wait... It's not that the evil energy didn't go away.{nl}What I'm feeling now is a much more powerful energy!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016082
text: To the Punctas Vacant Lot!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016083
text: That was the last of the demons that took Goddess Dalia away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016084
text: The bad energy has disappeared!{nl}Now we need to stop the demons from doing any more evil deeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016085
text: {nl}Each section of the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave has an exorcising device for demons.{nl}I guess we'll need to use those...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016086
text: {nl}The device in Section 5 is a little different, though.{nl}It is very powerful, but just as dangerous. Activating it won't be easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016087
text: {nl}This exorcising device must be activated by turning on two secondary devices.{nl}One is at the Auckste Vacant Lot, the other at the Apateen Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016088
text: Goddess Saule said she feared the predictions of Goddess Laima would come true.{nl}I wonder if She foresaw Dalia being held captive here as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016089
text: This will put a stop to the demons' antics!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016090
text: All we need is to activate the Central Exorcising Device now!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016091
text: Let's go save Goddess Dalia!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016092
text: Hurry.{nl}Before the Demon King arrives!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016093
text: You are just in time, Revelator.{nl}I am glad you came.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016094
text: Give me the orb with Saule's energy.{nl}The divine orb is an object of the goddesses... Its power will multiply in my hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016095
text: With the power of the divine orb, I will put an end to this tiresome war.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016096
text: Goddess Dalia!!{nl}Dalia... She and Gesti...{nl}Our Dalia...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016097
text: Dalia... Why did She do it...{nl}If I knew this was Her plan all along... I would never have complied with Her...{nl}Why, oh why... Why did She sacrifice Herself...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016098
text: I can only thank you, Revelator.{nl}It was with your help that we defeated Gesti.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016099
text: I'm sure there was a reason for Dalia's decision...{nl}Her noble sacrifice will never be forgotten.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016100
text: And Dalia's body may have been sacrificed, but Her spirit lives on.{nl}Someday, maybe, She might even be revived.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016101
text: If you can, go and see the other Kupoles before you leave Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}I'm sure they will want to say goodbye to you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016102
text: Strangely, I can't seem to feel Dalia's spirit.{nl}Part of Her spirit must have become scattered with Gesti's attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016103
text: I still have the Magic Searching Stone.{nl}Please take it and find Dalia's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016104
text: You'll be able to communicate with Her spirit once you collect it in its entirety.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016105
text: Dalia's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016106
text: Savior... I commend you.{nl}Do not grieve for my sacrifice, for it was my own inescapable fate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016107
text: The curse on my right arm would forever have imparted Giltine's cruel magic in me.{nl}Abandoning my physical body was the only chance to escape it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016108
text: Gesti may have been defeated, but the power of chaos will return to obscure me.{nl}When it does, Giltine will seek me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016109
text: The world will once again be endangered, as it did when the power of chaos first took over me.{nl}So you must not grieve...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016110
text: You may speak to Dalia's spirit now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016111
text: It looks like the statues we destroyed were hiding an energy even more powerful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016112
text: Thank you, Savior.{nl}But our Tevhrin Stalactite Cave is still plagued with wandering monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016113
text: {nl}I would like to ask your help in ridding Tevhrin Stalactite Cave of them.{nl}It would be a good idea to start with the Green Zolems.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016114
text: These caves have been defiled by the demons and the monsters who helped them.{nl}What they did is unforgivable...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016115
text: Trija... we must think carefully.{nl}The demons could be on their way to Goddess Dalia as we speak.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016116
text: {nl}What good is it if Goddess Dalia is in danger?{nl}Please, give the Revelator the magic core, for Dalia's sake.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016117
text: We may have thwarted the demons' plans, but the monsters are still on their side.{nl}I think it's because of the energy of their evil talismans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016118
text: {nl}Please defeat the demons and take their talismans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016119
text: The demons' evil talismans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016120
text: Thank you.{nl} you were a great help in stabilizing the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016121
text: Something's happened.{nl}I feel an unstable energy taking over Section 4 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016122
text: I think the demons have reopened the portals there.{nl}Would you go and check whether the portals are open again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016123
text: What are they searching that makes them so persistent?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016124
text: Thank you.{nl}We'd be in deep trouble if the portals hadn't been closed in time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016125
text: So, did you find anything?{nl}A picture? What is it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016126
text: If you say no one was there, I bet Lina sent you here and ran off.{nl}She probably filled the Pharaz Vacant Lot with her supplements again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016127
text: Go there and get rid of the supplements.{nl}I'll go look somewhere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016128
text: Good.{nl}I'm counting on you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016129
text: Hurry and get rid of Lina's mess!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016130
text: Hurry up.{nl}We don't what else Lina is up to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016131
text: The place was filled with supplements?{nl}I knew it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016132
text: Seriously, the more you get rid of them, the more they pop up.{nl}We'll never clean up Lina's mess at this pace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016133
text: It's been four years, I'm at my limit.{nl}Anyway, thanks for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016134
text: You met Aeglei?{nl}Aeglei must have wanted to sabotage me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016135
text: I really don't understand these people!{nl}What is this talk about the vegetation...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016136
text: Everything is dying.{nl}Do you deny it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016137
text: I really can't understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016138
text: You think Aeglei may be right??{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016139
text: It... can't be true...{nl}We have to save the dying forest...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016140
text: The whole forest will die if Aeglei keeps interfering...{nl}Don't you understand that?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016141
text: How can you be such an idiot?{nl}I'm telling you were barely stopped the excessive vegetation and you want to save it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016142
text: You're just going to make it grow even more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016143
text: Traveller, what do you say?{nl}Am I right, or is Aeglei?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016144
text: What do you mean?{nl}Aeglei and I... there's no way we can be the same, is there?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016145
text: The leaves of this forest have been falling since Medzio Diena...{nl}It was hard dealing with my wish to save the forest and my worries about the vegetation...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016146
