text: {nl}I must have started to worry more about the forest at some point...{nl}I guess the part of me still worried for the vegetation is what turned into Aeglei...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016147
text: {nl}As we became two, we started to disagree.{nl}We only ever disagreed about saving the forest, however...{nl}And I knew her, despite never having seen nor met with her...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016148
text: If our constant fights were keeping the balance in the forest...{nl}Maybe living as two different people isn't such a bad thing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016149
text: Aeglei will try to stop me if I do too much.{nl}We need to find balance between us in a way that won't harm the refugees.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016150
text: However, may I ask you for one last favor before you leave?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016151
text: I have a Magic Sphere I've been meaning to finish, that will allow me to communicate with the other Kupoles.{nl}But I'm a little short on materials.{nl}I was busy making my supplements, I had no time for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016152
text: Thanks!{nl}You can use this to paralyze Rodejokel monsters around here and collect their essence!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016153
text: Just remember that you need to weaken them first, otherwise the paralyzing drug won't work!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016154
text: Thanks a lot, pal!{nl}Just weaken the Rodejokels and use the drug to paralyze them!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016155
text: After that you just need to take their essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016156
text: You're back.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016157
text: So you destroy all my supplement bottles to interfere with my plans?{nl}Do you know what you're doing?...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016158
text: You're turning your back on our dying forest!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016159
text: Are you saying Lina and I are in the same body?{nl}Me and that idiot?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016160
text: {nl}The same idiot trying to save the forest and forgetting about our little vegetation problem...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016161
text: I'm so confused...{nl}I can't believe Aeglei and I are the same person...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016162
text: All this time I've been fighting with her to save the forest...{nl}And we're one and the same...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016163
text: Sigh... I don't know if Lina is naive or just dumb.{nl}I was wondering why the Magic Sphere wouldn't activate even with the essence and - surprise - it's Lina's fault.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016164
text: She said she had everything but the essence. Well guess what, she forgot the glimmering powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016165
text: I'm sorry.{nl}I must have forgotten about it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016166
text: May I ask you one more favor?{nl}Will you get some glimmering powder from Nuttafly monsters?{nl}I need that powder to finish the Magic Sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016167
text: I completely forgot about it.{nl}Please, do me this one last favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016168
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}With this I can finally speak with the other Kupoles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016169
text: I want to ask the other Kupoles for advice on what to do about my situation with Aeglei.{nl}Thanks to your help we solved our problem and finished the Magic Sphere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016170
text: I'm very grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016171
text: Kupole in Danger (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016172
text: Kupole in Danger (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016173
text: I'll take care of the monsters and the Tala.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016174
text: I don't think I'm the savior you're looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016175
text: The Legend of the Goddess' Seal (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016176
text: The Legend of the Goddess' Seal (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016177
text: Can we use the Teleportation Magic Circle?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016178
text: I really don't think I'm the savior you're looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016179
text: How can we restore the magic circle?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016180
text: To the Goddess' Refuge (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016181
text: To the Goddess' Refuge (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016182
text: I'll purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016183
text: To the Goddess' Refuge (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016184
text: I can't; it's too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016185
text: Constant Interference (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016186
text: We should wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016187
text: Constant Interference (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016188
text: Let's go back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016189
text: One Step Closer to the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016190
text: There's no other way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016191
text: I'll find another way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016192
text: Brainwashed Tribe (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016193
text: I don't think that will work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016194
text: Brainwashed Tribe (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016195
text: That will be useless.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016196
text: Brainwashed Tribe (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016197
text: Weakening Aura (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016198
text: Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016199
text: I don't think that's important.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016200
text: Weakening Aura (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016201
text: Please wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016202
text: Another Kupole (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016203
text: Let's find Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016204
text: Another Kupole (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016205
text: What happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016206
text: Let's get some rest first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016207
text: Kupole Rescue Mission (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016208
text: We should investigate the devices we found on our way here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016209
text: Kupole Rescue Mission (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016210
text: Let's destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016211
text: I'm not so sure about this, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016212
text: Kupole Rescue Mission (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016213
text: Let's go, we can do this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016214
text: That's going to be difficult, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016215
text: Overloading with magic...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016216
text: Recovering Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016217
text: Is there a way to restore Serija's energy?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016218
text: I think my work here is done, goodbye.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016219
text: Where is the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016220
text: Blood Begets Blood

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016221
text: I'll defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016222
text: Dwindling Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016223
text: I'll be right back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016224
text: Less Eyes to See

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016225
text: Dangerous Encounter (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016226
text: Dangerous Encounter (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016227
text: Let's meet there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016228
text: I don't know where.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016229
text: Dangerous Encounter (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016230
text: I'll activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016231
text: Kupole in the Darkness (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016232
text: Let's go in.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016233
text: I'm too scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016234
text: Kupole in the Darkness (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016235
text: I don't think that's going to work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016236
text: Deranged Goddess (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016237
text: I don't want to do that, I'm scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016238
text: Deranged Goddess (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016239
text: I don't think that'll be worth much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016240
text: Deranged Goddess (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016241
text: Abducted Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016242
text: The wounds look serious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016243
text: Despite Urgent Matters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016244
text: Too Late Already

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016245
text: Before It's Too Late (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016246
text: It's okay, I'll find Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016247
text: I don't think I can find traces of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016248
text: Before It's Too Late (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016249
text: That doesn't sound very useful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016250
text: They Hid Her (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016251
text: I can do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016252
text: I don't think so.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016253
text: They Hid Her (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016254
text: I don't have the power to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016255
text: They Hid Her (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016256
text: I'll give it a try.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016257
text: Is that even possible?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016258
text: Transmitting read memories...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016259
text: They Hid Her (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016260
text: It will be hard to do it in these conditions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016261
text: I'll save the goddess with Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016262
text: They Hid Her (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016263
text: Just wait a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016264
text: Purifying the energy...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016265
text: With the Power of the Goddess (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016266
text: We should leave right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016267
text: Let's rest first; then we can leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016268
text: Explaining about the Demon Kings and asking what to do

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016269
text: Let me tell you what happened at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016270
text: With the Power of the Goddess (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016271
text: I'll find it and repair it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016272
text: Just wait a little longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016273
text: One Final Step

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016274
text: We should leave right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016275
text: Let's go a bit later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016276
text: Showing the orb and relaying Saule's instructions...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016277
text: Persistent Creatures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016278
text: Nah, that won't happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016279
text: Evil Talismans

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016280
text: No way that's going to happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016281
text: Preemptive Defense

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016282
text: I'll close as much as I can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016283
text: I think we should stop here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016284
text: Reducing Numbers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016285
text: The Place of the Hidden Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016286
text: Let's just look anywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016287
text: We should reduce the demons' numbers first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016288
text: Before the Demon King Arrives (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016289
text: Is there any way we can do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016290
text: Let's just give up on it.

text: Before the Demon King Arrives (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016292

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016293
text: I'm scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016296

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016304
text: Be strong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016305
