name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016308
text: Extremely Humanly

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016309
text: I'll solve it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016310
text: Hilda is back.{nl}Return to the Kupoles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016311
text: A Mediator is Born (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016312
text: I'll go a bit later.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016313
text: A Mediator is Born (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016314
text: Let me have some rest first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016315
text: Plot Twist (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016316
text: But what Aeglei said makes sense too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016317
text: I think Lina is right.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016318
text: Plot Twist (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016319
text: Are you fighting because of the leaves?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016320
text: I keep hearing two Kupoles speaking from the same body.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016321
text: Making the Magic Sphere (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016322
text: I'll think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016323
text: Making the Magic Sphere (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016324
text: What's the glimmering powder?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016325
text: Kupole in Danger

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016326
text: Talk to Kupole Medena at Khonot Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016327
text: Kupole Medena has a favor to ask of you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016328
text: Talk to Kupole Medena at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016329
text: Medena seeks your help to deal with the demons invading Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. Meet her there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016330
text: Talk to Kupole Medena

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016331
text: Talk to Kupole Medena at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016332
text: Defeat the Demons Attacking the Cave

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016333
text: According to Kupole Medena, more and more demons are attacking, joined by the Tala tribe. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016334
text: You have defeated the demons and the Tala as Medena requested. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016335
text: The Legend of the Goddess' Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016336
text: You have defeated the demons and monsters as requested by Medena. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016337
text: Go to the Teleportation Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016338
text: Kupole Medena thinks the demons are seeking the power of the sealed goddess. Go to the Teleportation Magic Circle and check on the condition of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016339
text: Kupole Medena thinks the magic circle looks strange. She wants you to speak to Kupole Trija, who manages the Teleportation Magic Circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016340
text: Talk to Kupole Trija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016341
text: Kupole Trija is in charge of the Teleportation Magic Circle that leads to the goddess. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016342
text: Collect the Pieces of the Broken Magic Core

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016343
text: Kupole Trija says the Magic Core of the Teleportation Magic Circle was shattered by attacking demons. In order to repair the core and use the magic circle again, she needs you to collect the pieces of the broken magic core.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016344
text: You have collected all the pieces of the magic core requested by Kupole Trija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016345
text: To the Goddess' Refuge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016346
text: You have collected all pieces of the broken magic core. Talk to Kupole Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016347
text: Gather the Scattered Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016348
text: Kupole Trija says the magic inside the core scattered when it broke. She believes the magic was absorbed by the demons and wants you to get it back by defeating Green Flaks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016349
text: The scattered magic was impossible to catch, but you did get some demon essence. Take it to Kupole Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016350
text: Defeat Green Flaks to Collect the Scattered Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016351
text: Defeat Green Flaks

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016352
text: You gave Kupole Trija the demon essence you collected. Keep talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016353
text: Purify the Demons' Evil Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016354
text: Kupole Trija says you can purify the evil energy of demon essence at the Altar of Purification. She warns you that the essence can be destroyed in the process of purification, in which case you will need to collect more from Green Flaks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016355
text: You have purified the demon essence as Kupole Trija requested. Go back to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016356
text: You have given Kupole Trija the purified demon essence. Keep talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016357
text: Protect Kupole Trija Restoring the Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016358
text: Kupole Trija believes the demons might attack while she's restoring the magic circle and asks you to protect her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016359
text: The magic circle looks finished now. Talk to Kupole Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016360
text: Constant Interference

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016361
text: The power of the magic circle is slowly coming back, but it might be too soon to use it. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016362
text: Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 2

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016363
text: Kupole Medena believes the demons are already looking for Goddess Dalia. Go with Medena to Section 2 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016364
text: Someone seems to have blocked the path to Section 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016365
text: Someone seems to have blocked the way to Section 2. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016366
text: Kupole Medena wants to use the magic circle's core to blow up the pile of carts blocking the way. She believes you can overload it with divine energy to create an explosion.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016367
text: Convince Kupole Trija and Get the Magic Core

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016368
text: Kupole Trija doesn't seem to want to give you the restored magic core. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016369
text: Use the Magic Core to Clear the Path

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016370
text: Kupole Trija is going to overload the unstable magic core with divine energy in front of the pile of carts blocking the way to blow them up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016371
text: The explosion of the unstable magic core has cleared the way. Move onto the next section.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016372
text: Brainwashed Tribe

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016373
text: Kupole Trija seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016374
text: Obtain Tala Tribe Necklaces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016375
text: Kupole Trija says the necklaces of the Tala have turned black, but can be purified to turn them good again. Use the sleep powder to sedate the Tala and obtain their necklaces. The sleep powder can be used on targets with HP under 50%.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016376
text: You have obtained the Tala necklaces. Return to Kupole Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016377
text: Steal the Tala's Necklaces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016378
text: You have collected the Tala's necklaces and given them to Kupole Trija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016379
text: Purify the Tala Necklaces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016380
text: Kupole Trija believes the Tala necklaces can be purified by the energy of the Altar of Purification. Go there and purify the necklaces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016381
text: You have purified the Tala necklaces as requested by Kupole Trija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016382
text: You have purified the Tala necklaces as requested by Kupole Trija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016383
text: Place the Purified Necklaces Back on the Tala

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016384
text: Kupole Trija has asked you to return the purified necklaces to the Tala tribe. She believes you can put them on after you overpower them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016385
text: The Tala tribe seems to have returned to their senses now that they have their necklaces back. Report to Kupole Trija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016386
text: Weakening Aura

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016387
text: You and Medena have arrived in Section 2. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016388
text: Look for the Other Kupole

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016389
text: Kupole Medena feels the energy of another Kupole. She feels it weaken and believes the Kupole in question might be in danger. Help her save the endangered Kupole.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016390
text: Talk to Kupole Alena

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016391
text: You found Kupole Alena being held captive by the demons. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016392
text: Kupole Alena is being restrained by evil magic. Talk to Kupole Alena to save her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016393
text: Kupole Alena believes that defeating the monsters watching her will weaken the binding magic. Defeat the Tala and demons monsters around her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016394
text: You have the defeated the monsters around Kupole Alena. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016395
text: Another Kupole

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016396
text: You succeeded in saving Alena, but Medena feels the energy of another Kupole. Talk to Kupole Alena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016397
text: Search for Another Kupole

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016398
text: Kupole Alena has asked you to rescue Kupole Serija. Medena believes the energy she feels belongs to Serija and wants your help to search for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016399
text: You and Medena seem to have found Kupole Serija. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016400
text: Talk to Kupole Serija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016401
text: You have found Kupole Serija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016402
text: Kupole Serija's confinement has made her weaker. Talk to her to find out you can rescue her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016403
text: Kupole Rescue Mission

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016404
text: Kupole Medena seems to have thought of something after listening to Serija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016405
text: Medena believes Kupole Serija is being confined by the unknown devices she saw on the way to find Serija. She wants to destroy the devices herself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016406
text: Kupole Medena used her divine energy on the restraining device to destroy it. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016407
text: You have destroyed the first restraining device. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016408
text: Destroy the Second Restraining Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016409
text: Kupole Medena wants to destroy the second restraining device. Observe the restraining device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016410
text: You defeated the attacking demons and destroyed the second restraining device. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016411
text: According to Kupole Medena, a single restraining device is left now. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016412
text: Obtain Demon Magic Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016413
text: An unknown energy seems to be protecting the restraining device. Kupole Medena wants to overload the device using the power of the demons' magic stones. Defeat Green Flammes to obtain their magic stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016414
text: Destroy the Third Restraining Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016415
text: You have collected all the magic stones. Use the demons' evil energy on the last device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016416
text: Defeat Green Flammes to Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016417
text: You have destroyed all restraining devices. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016418
text: Obtain Materialized Recovery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016419
text: Kupole Medena says there is a Holy Place of Recovery in the caves. She asks you to materialize the healing energy there and bring it to Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016420
text: You have successfully obtained the materialized healing energy. Deliver it to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016421
text: Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016422
text: Serija seems to feel better now thanks to the materialized recovery. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016423
text: Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 3

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016424
text: After her recovery, Kupole Serija now wants to find Goddess Dalia to make sure She is safe. Meet her in Section 3 with Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016425
text: Kupole Alena seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016426
text: Alena finds it hard to forgive the monsters that attacked Tevhrin Stalactite Cave and harmed the Kupoles. She doesn't want to regret sparing their lives and asks you to defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016427
text: You have defeated the monsters as requested by Alena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016428
text: Kupole Alena seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016429
text: Gather Recovering Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016430
text: Kupole Alena has lost too much of her power protecting her section from the demon attacks. Bring her some materialized recovering energy from the Holy Place of Recovery.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016431
text: You have collected the recovering energy. It looks a little odd, but deliver it to Alena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016432
text: Materialized Recovery

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016433
text: You have found Kupole Serija at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 3. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016434
text: Kupole Serija thinks the watchful demons forces could jeopardize your mission. Before finding the goddess, she asks you to reduce their numbers by defeating them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016435
text: You have defeated all onlooking demons nearby. Return to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016436
text: Dangerous Encounter

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016437
text: You have reduced the demons' numbers as requested by Kupole Serija. Ask her what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016438
text: Kupole Serija believes the darkness surrounding the goddess would be difficult to endure for a human. You must first receive the protection of her magic circles. You can receive the protective magic by standing on each circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016439
text: You have received the protective magic of the magic circles. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016440
text: You're back to Serija after receiving the protective magic of her magic circles. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016441
text: Go to the Goddess Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016442
text: Kupole Serija has asked you to meet her by the place where the Goddess seal is. You should go before the protective magic wears out, or you'll have to restore it at Protas Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016443
text: You have reached Serija with the protective magic intact. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016444
text: Serija has asked the Kupole in charge of the Goddess Seal site to undo the seal, but received no answer. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016445
text: Activate the Lockout Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016446
text: Kupole Serija has asked you to activate the Lockout Devices in order to manually release the seal. Remember, however, that you need to activate each device within one minute of each other.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016447
text: You have succeeded in activating all the lockout devices in time. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016448
text: Kupole in the Darkness

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016449
text: You have succeeded in activating all lockout devices. Tak to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016450
text: Purify the Kupole in the Darkness

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016451
text: After disabling the barrier, Kupole Siute appeared. She is surrounded by darkness, but she may be able to be purified with the power of the savior. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016452
text: For some inexplicable reason, the darkness surrounding Kupole Siute disappeared as soon as you lay your hand on her. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016453
text: For some inexplicable reason, the darkness surrounding Kupole Siute disappeared as soon as you lay your hand on her. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016454
text: Assist the Kupoles' Purification Ceremony

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016455
text: Kupole Serija believes your power could help purify the darkness taking over the goddess. Help her complete the purification ceremony by lending her your power.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016456
text: The purification ceremony seems to have been successful. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016457
text: Deranged Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016458
text: Goddess Dalia seems to have come back to her senses. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016459
text: Talk to Goddess Dalia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016460
text: Serija is glad the goddess has come back to her senses with your help and asks you to speak to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016461
text: Goddess Dalia has explained to you what happened before she lost her senses. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016462
text: After hearing your conversation with Goddess Dalia, Kupole Serija wants to ask you a favor. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016463
text: Gather the Mysterious Moss

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016464
text: The Tevhrin Stalactite Cave is imbued with divine energy and so is the moss that grows there. Collect some of this mysterious moss to use its divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016465
text: The lockout devices give out divine energy, which seeps into the ground and the moss that grows around them. Collect some of this mysterious moss to use its divine energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016466
text: Return to Kupole Serija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016467
text: You have collected all of the moss requested by Kupole Serija. Go back to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016468
text: The sound of Serija screaming is suddenly heard echoing somewhere. Hurry and go to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016469
text: Goddess Dalia has disappeared in front of your eyes. Ask Serija about the demons that took the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016470
text: Defeat Starlakhan

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016471
text: The demons have got Goddess Dalia. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016472
text: Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 4

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016473
text: Kupole Serija ran off to Section 4 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave before you could do anything. Hurry and go after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016474
text: Talk to Kupole Siute

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016475
text: Kupole Siute seems to want to ask you something. Talk to Siute.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016476
text: Siute doesn't think she can handle the monsters in Section 3, given her condition. She asks you to defeat the monsters on your way to meet Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016477
text: Kupole Siute seems to want to ask you something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016478
text: Recharge the Protective Magic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016479
text: Siute believes it was the lack of protective magic on her pendant that made her vulnerable to the darkness. She asks you to recharge her pendant with protective magic before  moving on to the next section.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016480
text: You have restored the protective magic on Siute's pendant. Return the pendant to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016481
text: Before It's Too Late

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016482
text: You have followed Serija to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 4. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016483
text: Search for Goddess Dalia

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016484
text: Kupole Serija is too weak to search for the goddess herself. Help her by looking for the demons that took Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016485
text: There are no traces of the goddess so far. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016486
text: You were unable to find Goddess Dalia, but in the process you discovered a strange portal. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016487
text: Destroy the Demon Portal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016488
text: Medena believes the demons are using the portal to infiltrate Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. She wants to destroy the portal to prevent them from interfering with your search.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016489
text: There are still no signs of the goddess, but you have destroyed the demons' portal. Report back to Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016490
text: They Hid Her

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016491
text: You're back after destroying the demon portal. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016492
text: Obtain Green Zolem Cores

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016493
text: Kupole Serija wants to read the memories of defeated demons to find out the whereabouts of the goddess. She is going to use the cores of Green Zolems to avoid being affected by the demons' spirits, which are incompatible with hers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016494
text: You have collected the Green Zolem cores as instructed by Kupole Serija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016495
text: You have collected the Green Zolem cores as instructed by Kupole Serija. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016496
text: Protect Kupole Serija

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016497
text: Kupole Serija is going to purify the evil energy of the cores you collected. The divine energy used to purify them could attract monsters, in which case you will need to protect her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016498
text: Kupole Serija has successfully purified the Zolem cores. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016499
text: Kupole Serija has successfully purified the Zolem cores. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016500
text: Use the Purified Zolem Cores to Collect Demon Memories

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016501
text: Kupole Serija believes using the purified Zolem cores on the demons will make them absorb their evil demon energy.  Medena is going to read their memories while you defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016502
text: The demons' memories contained a clue to the goddess' whereabouts. Dalia is apparently in Section 5. Report to Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016503
text: The demons' memories revealed that Goddess Dalia was taken to Section 5. Talk to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016504
text: Move to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016505
text: After finding out where the goddess is, Kupole Serija does not want to waste any more time. She feels too weak to go herself, but she wants you to go with Medena and rescue Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016506
text: A crowd of demons coming from a portal ambushed you on your way to Section 5. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016507
text: You have defeated the demons coming from the portal. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016508
text: Go to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016509
text: Kupole Medena fears that the demons will keep attempting to attack. She knows there is no time to waste, however, so she wants to hurry and carry on with the plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016510
text: Medena is in pain after absorbing a demon spirit. Purify the evil energy surrounding her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016511
text: Defeat the Demons That Abducted the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016512
text: With the Power of the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016513
text: You have purified the dark energy taking over Kupole Medena. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016514
text: Medena can feel a great malicious energy getting closer to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. Report this to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016515
text: Kupole Serija's divine orb is too weak to use against the demons. She believes the orb would be useful if imbued with the power of its creator, Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016516
text: The divine orb of Goddess Saule has lost its power. Go to Saule for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016517
text: Absorb Saule's Power

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016518
text: Saule feels like her powers haven't been completely restored yet. She believes, however, that you can obtain her energy from the Forest of Thorns, where she was held captive, and add it to the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016519
text: You have recharged the divine orb with Saule's energy. Return to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016520
text: You have recharged the divine orb with Saule's energy. Talk to Goddess Saule.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016521
text: The divine orb requested by Serija is now complete. The orb itself is still weak, however, and can therefore only be used once. Return to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016522
text: Kupole Serija seems to have something to say to you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016523
text: Kupole Serija seems to have accepted the decision of the goddess. She worries that the remaining demons will occupy Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. Defeat the demons for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016524
text: Defeat Green Zolems

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016525
text: Kupole Serija seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016526
text: Collect Evil Talismans

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016527
text: Kupole Serija believes the evil talismans used by the demons are affecting the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. She asks you to take their talismans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016528
text: You have collected the demons' evil talismans. Return to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016529
text: Defeat Demon Monsters and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016530
text: Destroy the Demon Portal

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016531
text: Kupole Serija believes the demons are still using portals located around Section 4 to infiltrate Tevhrin Stalactite Cave. She asks you to destroy their portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016532
text: You have destroyed the demon portals. Return to Kupole Serija.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016533
text: You have arrived at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5, where Goddess Dalia is. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016534
text: Medena worries that the demons occupying Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5 will try to stop you from rescuing Dalia. Defeat these demons before finding the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016535
text: You have defeated the demons in Section 5. Ask Kupole Medena about the next step in your plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016536
text: You have defeated the demons wandering in Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 5. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016537
text: Kupole Medena is certain about the goddess' whereabouts. Go find Dalia together.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016538
text: You seem to have found the place where the goddess lies. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016539
text: Before the Demon King Arrives

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016540
text: You have found the location where the goddess is thought to be, but a barrier stops you from advancing. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016541
text: Speak to Goddess Dalia Through Kupole Medena

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016542
text: Kupole Medena wants to confirm where the goddess is by communicating with Her. If Dalia is close, you will be able to speak with her through Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016543
text: You have spoken with Goddess Dalia. You must help her before she loses her senses. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016544
text: Goddess Dalia feels something in Section 5 is forcing evil energy onto Her. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016545
text: Kupole Medena hasn't seen any objects of evil energy around. She believes there are evil statues hidden by demon magic and wants to find them using a Magic Searching Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016546
text: You have found all the hidden evil statues. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016547
text: You have found and destroyed all hidden evil statues. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016548
text: Find the Source of Powerful Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016549
text: Kupole Medena feels an unknown source of powerful energy nearby. Go with her and find out the origin of this energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016550
text: Destroy the Last Evil Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016551
text: You have defeated the Lavenzard. Destroy the last evil statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016552
text: You have destroyed all the evil statues and their strange evil energy is no longer felt. Talk to Kupole Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016553
text: Activate the Auxiliary Devices

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016554
text: There are auxiliary devices assisting the cave's main exorcising device. These secondary devices must be activated in order to use it. However, each auxiliary device must be turned on one minute after the previous one, or they will all be disabled.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016555
text: Start the Exorcising Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016556
text: The exorcising device seems to have been activated now. Go and check the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016557
text: Powerful Being

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016558
text: Activating the exorcising device has dealt a great amount of damage to the demons. Ask Medena about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016559
text: The path to Goddess Dalia opened up after the evil statues were destroyed. Talk to Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016560
text: Talk to Demon Queen Gesti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016561
text: You succeeded in defeating Gesti after she tried to take over Dalia. Talk to Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016562
text: Examine Demon Queen Gesti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016563
text: Gesti is collapsed on the ground. Check on her condition.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016564
text: Gesti has released the seal of Goddess Dalia. Talk to Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016565
text: The Goddess' Sacrifice

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016566
text: Goddess Dalia has managed to subdue Gesti with the power of the Kupoles. Talk to Goddess Dalia.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016567
text: Defeat Demon Queen Gesti

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016568
text: Gesti is attacking once again. Defeat her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016569
text: Goddess Dalia has sacrificed Herself to eradicate Gesti. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016570
text: Goddess Dalia has sacrificed Herself to eradicate Gesti. Talk to Medena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016571
text: Comfort Kupole Medena

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016572
text: Kupole Medena is grieving for Goddess Dalia's sacrifice. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016573
text: Kupole Medena seems to have something to ask you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016574
text: Search for Dalia's Scattered Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016575
text: Medena believes Dalia's spirit was scattered after the final blow. Look for the pieces of Her spirit before it disappears.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016576
text: Talk to Dalia's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016577
text: You have collected all the fragments of Dalia's spirit. Combine them to speak with the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016578
text: Talk to Refugee Hilda

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016579
text: Hilda seems anxious, not knowing what to do. Ask her what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016580
text: Kupole Aeglei seems to have a favor to ask you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016581
text: Investigate Bethez Refuge and Tjibes Refuge

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016582
text: Kupole Aeglei is worried that Lina has done something wrong again and asks you to check Bethez Refuge and Tjibes Refuge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016583
text: You have investigated all the locations requested by Kupole Aeglei. Report back to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016584
text: Kupole Aeglei seems to have thought of something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016585
text: Dispose of the Supplements in Pharaz Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016586
text: Kupole Aeglei believes Lina will have stored her supplements at the Pharaz Vacant Lot and asks you to dispose of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016587
text: You have disposed of all of Kupole Lina's supplements. Report back to Kupole Aeglei.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016588
text: You have disposed of all of Kupole Lina's supplements as requested by Kupole Aeglei. It didn't feel very right, despite it being a favor for Aeglei. Go and talk to Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016589
text: Kupole Lina feels strange. Try talking to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016590
text: Kupoles Lina and Aeglei turned out to be the same person - an unexpected development. Talk to them to try and find out what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016591
text: The situation with Kupoles Lina and Aeglei is still confusing.{nl}Ask them about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016592
text: Kupoles Lina and Aeglei's problem seems to have reached some closure now.{nl}Confirm what you found out with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016593
text: Kupole Lina seems to have a favor to ask of you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016594
text: Obtain Rodejokel Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016595
text: Kupoles Lina and Aeglei are trying to complete a magic sphere. They want you to collect Rodejokel essence to use as material for the sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016596
text: You have collected the Rodejokel essence requested by Lina and Aeglei. Take the essence to Kupole Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016597
text: Kupoles Lina and Aeglei require one more material for their magic sphere. Talk to Kupole Lina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016598
text: Collect Glimmering Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016599
text: Kupoles Lina and Aeglei need some glimmering powder to complete their magic sphere. Collect some for Kupole Aeglei.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161005_016600
text: You have collected the glimmering powder requested by Kupoles Lina and Aeglei.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016601
text: Thank you for helping out. {nl}You've reduced my workload quite a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016602
text: Ah, it won't be effective to ones who have already been blessed, so please keep that in mind.{nl}Ashaq Underground Prison and Crystal Mine are included, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016603
text: I heard you defeated Ebonypawn.{nl}I'm sorry you had to do something that should be my responsibility, I'm not quite sure how to feel about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016604
text: {nl}In any case, thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016605
text: Was the Formine Armor useful?{nl}Actually, the Formine Armor was originally made for me by Mr. Juan over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016606
text: {nl}He made them for free, although he did complain about the materials.{nl}Still, Mr. Juan wanted to get all the materials himself then give away the finished armors.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016607
text: {nl}But Mr. Juan isn't so young anymore... He fell ill trying to make all those armors and had to stop.{nl}Then... he left me with the armors and passed away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016608
text: The records you are holding at the moment.{nl}Let me have alook.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016609
text: {nl}The Namu Temple Ruins...this record was there, you say?{nl}This information is much more valuable than we thought.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016610
text: {nl}This warrants further investigation. Until then I cannot say much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016611
text: {nl}I will hold my silence until we have certainty.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016612
text: The tombstone is up. Now to write a few words of praise to the victims.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016613
text: The monsters keep coming.{nl}Even if we defeat a thousand, will it be enough to reduce their numbers?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016614
text: {nl}In any case, we don't really have the military power to deal with this in Orsha...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016615
text: My friends and I made friendship badges.{nl}We were at the Pelke Shrine Ruins with the badges when a huge monster appeared, so we ran away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016616
text: We lost some of the badges while we were running away.{nl}I wanted to go find them, but I'm scared of the monsters so I gave up.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016617
text: In hard times, it's only natural to miss those dear to you...{nl}Justina must miss her family a lot...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016618
text: So it's true, flower branches really are mesmerizing.{nl}They're definitely different from any accessory I've ever seen.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016619
text: {nl}It's the first time I see an accessory so beautiful but mysterious at the same time.{nl}If you don't mind, may I look at them for a little longer?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016620
text: Thank you for letting me have another look at them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016621
text: They truly are ethereal.{nl}To think a simple couple of branches and flowers could be so fascinating...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016622
text: The people of our village must be worried for us, still living here at the Novaha Monastery.{nl}Especially Anne, who was always with me... She must be so worried...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016623
text: Rose is writing a letter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016624
text: I need to write Anne a letter.{nl}Please wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016625
text: Anne is writing a letter to Rose and her brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016626
text: Here.{nl}Please deliver this letter to Anne.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016627
text: I'm glad to hear Rose and Edmundas are okay.{nl}When Edmundas was taken by the demons, I really...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016628
text: {nl}I should write back to Rose and Edmundas.{nl}Just a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016629
text: Anne is very kind and thoughtful, I'm sure she's even more worried about us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016630
text: Please take this letter to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016631
text: Anne has a crush on someone!{nl}Wow, to think the little girl I knew now likes someone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016632
text: {nl}As a big sister, I should hear her out and comfort her but...{nl}At least I now know how she is doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016633
text: And please don't read the letter on your way there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016634
text: That sword pell... It was hard enough to make, I can't afford to lose it.{nl}I've been so busy lately I don't even know if I would have time to make another one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016635
text: It does look broken beyond repair though.{nl}I think I really need a new one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016636
text: {nl}I'm going to give you the tools to make the pell, so you can gather the materials and make a new one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016637
text: I know it's a pell meant for training, but try not to hit it too hard.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016638
text: Your companion has grown a lot, I see.{nl}It's almost like family now, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016639
text: Sometimes it's good to make food for your companion, you know.{nl}It'll be more loyal to you if you feed it something your made yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016640
text: Do you wanna try and make some food for your companion?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016641
text: I assume it's your first time making food for your companion, so I'll give you a bag with the cooking tools.{nl}There's a recipe and a few ingredients. Should be enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016642
text: Oh, right. I don't think there's any Raffly Leaves or Ellogua Flower Wine in there.{nl}You'll have to get those yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016643
text: So? Does your companion like the food?{nl}I bet it does, you made it yourself after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016644
text: Revelator, so nice to see you again!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016645
text: What have you been doing? I can't wait to know...{nl}Come on, tell me all about your new adventures!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016646
text: Mihail looks filled with expectation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016647
text: Last time someone broke this sword pell. I did make a new one but...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016648
text: You've had an audience with Goddess Gabija in Mage Tower and Goddess Vakarine in the Demon Prison?{nl}My word...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016649
text: I'm glad to hear the goddesses are safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016650
text: Did you defeat 1000 monsters?{nl}Their numbers seem to have reduced a little, but they're still many.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016651
text: I should send a report to Orsha.{nl}I'll collect some more information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016652
text: {nl}Would you be so kind as to deliver the report to Orsha for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016653
text: This report...?{nl}It was sent by the agent in Woods of the Linked Bridges.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016654
text: I'll read it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016655
text: The Lord of Orsha is reading the report.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016656
text: It seems eliminating even 1000 monsters didn't too much to reduce their numbers...{nl}We need to find a solution to protect the areas around Orsha from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016657
text: Lost Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016658
text: My ring... The ring I exchanged with Sarah for our wedding vows...{nl}Thank you for finding it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016659
text: I can go in peace now.{nl}But, where do I go...?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016660
text: Oh, if you guide me to the Owl Statue, I'll gladly follow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016661
text: Some spirits are still attached to a lost object and end up staying behind.{nl}They'll linger behind until their belongings are found.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016662
text: Thanks to you, another wandering spirit is now going home.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016663
text: Device Note

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016664
text: Good find.{nl}You read all my notes, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016665
text: Put the amount of all the foods we ate in order: that's the code to open the locking device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016666
text: Those are the friendship badges I made with my friends!{nl}We were playing at the Pelke Shrine Ruins when we saw a huge monster and ran away without the badges.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016667
text: {nl}I thought I had lost them forever, I'm so glad to have them back.{nl}But I'm afraid some of the badges are still missing; would you please find them for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016668
text: I don't know what monster it is.{nl}The only thing I can tell you is that it's huge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016669
text: You found them all.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016670
text: Gintas' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016671
text: I only hope... no one will ever fall victim to the Order of the Tree of Truth's lies again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016672
text: {nl}I know Margiris was keeping a record of the Order's activities somewhere.{nl}Find the records and take them to the Inquisitor Master, let people know what happened here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016673
text: The Inquisitor Master will know what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016674
text: So these are the records of the Tree of Truth, the order operating in Carlyle's Mausoleum?{nl}So many innocent spirits lured into a pitiful death by them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016675
text: {nl}I must make sure no more lives are taken in the name of such heresy.{nl}Thank you for your hard work.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016676
text: The ferrets already had their hands in our food, and now the village's offering tools...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016677
text: They'll steal anything, those lousy ferrets.{nl}Thanks for bringing back our offering tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016678
text: {nl}We can finally do a proper offering ceremony.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016679
text: We want to appease the spirits of the victims of Novaha.{nl}But the Monastery is so full of monsters we can't possibly erect a memorial there even if we want to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016680
text: {nl}Would... Would you maybe place the memorial at the Novaha Assembly Hall for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016681
text: Thank you.{nl}We will always remember them and make sure no one ever has to go through the same fate.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016682
text: I need to go see Justina, tell her about what happened here and deliver Gailus Legwyn's last words.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016683
text: I should spare you the inconvenience and go myself but...{nl}If so, I'll be counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016684
text: My father said that...?{nl}... Can you... please leave alone for a while...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016685
text: {nl}Ah...{nl}I just feel a little overwhelmed hearing about my father's last words...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016686
text: You're saying the ferrets were keeping these tools?{nl}We were looking for them all over the place.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016687
text: {nl}Um, I dunno if it's too much to ask, but would you find our other offering tools?{nl}We need them to pray for peace in our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016688
text: {nl}You could say those tools are what's keeping our village safe all these years, so you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016689
text: {nl}The Tala tribe are also joining their forces and causing chaos.{nl}I think it would be wise to reduce their numbers first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016690
text: This will not do.{nl}The Tala and the demons are still causing chaos and there's nothing we can do to stop them.{nl}I'm worried that they may have already broken the goddess' seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016691
text: Thanks to your help

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016692
text: was successfully completed.{nl}Keeping records of the time is a very important task.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016693
text: There have to be records for us to store them and create books worthy of keeping through the times.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016694
text: I'll take care of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016695
text: Unusual Eyes

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016696
text: I'll show you the Flower Branch.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016697
text: Good News

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016698
text: I'll deliver the news.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016699
text: I have other issues to tend to.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016700
text: Delivering Rose's letter...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016701
text: Delivering Anne's letter...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016702
text: Sword Pell Repair (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016703
text: I'll take responsibility and repair it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016704
text: I have no idea what you're talking about. Bye.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016705
text: Sword Pell Repair (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016706
text: My Precious Friend (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016707
text: How do you make the food?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016708
text: My Precious Friend (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016709
text: Best of the Best

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016710
text: How are you doing?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016711
text: Sharing stories about your journey...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016712
text: Monsters after Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016713
text: I'll bring the report to the Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016714
text: You ought to report to her yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016715
text: I'll bring any spirits to the Frail Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016716
text: Bring the lost spirit to the Frail Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016717
text: The Inmates' Secret Spots

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016718
text: I'll open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016719
text: The box is locked with a device.{nl}Find a way to unlock it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016720
text: Looking through the contents of the box...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016721
text: Victims' Request

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016722
text: I'll find Margiris' book.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016723
text: Relaying the events of Carlyle's Mausoleum...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016724
text: Ferrets and Their Grabby Hands

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016725
text: I'll get back the offering tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016726
text: Remembering the Victims (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016727
text: I'll erect the tombstones for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016728
text: You're better off asking someone else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016729
text: Erecting the tombstone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016730
text: Remembering the Victims (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016731
text: Carving a message for the victims on the tombstone...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016732
text: The memorial is complete.{nl}Return to Rona and deliver the news.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016733
text: Unexpected News

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016734
text: I'll go to the Squire Master myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016735
text: Kedora Merchant Alliance are helping new Revelators. Please use the scroll of Kedora Merchant Alliance on new Revelators who are between level 1 and level 25 near Orsha or Klaipeda, or at the Crystal Mine. However, you can't use it on Revelators who already received the benefits.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016736
text: Defeat the Monsters Attacking the Cave

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016737
text: While Kupole Medena was away, the demons' numbers grew ever wider, joined by the Tala tribe. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016738
text: You have defeated the demons, the Tala and the other monsters as Medena requested. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016739
text: Kupole Serija thinks the watchful demons forces could jeopardize your mission. Before finding the goddess, she asks you to reduce their numbers by defeating them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016740
text: Talk to Accessory Merchant Jurus

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016741
text: Accessory Merchant Jurus seems interested in your hair accessories. Talk to Accessory Merchant Jurus.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016742
text: Show the Flower Branch Accessory

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016743
text: Accessory Merchant Jurus wants to have a better look at the Flower Branch. Show him the Flower Branch accessory.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016744
text: Accessory Merchant Jurus seems jealous of your Flower Branch. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016745
text: Tell Rose that Anne is missing her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016746
text: Deliver Rose's Letter to Anne

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016747
text: Rose wrote a letter to her village telling people there how she's doing. Take the letter and give it to Anne.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016748
text: Deliver Anne's Letter to Rose

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016749
text: Anne wrote a letter to Rose telling her about the people of their village. Take the letter and give it to Rose.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016750
text: Sword Pell Repair

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016751
text: The Highlander Submaster looks furious. Try and find out why she's upset.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016752
text: Collect Sword Pell Materials

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016753
text: The Highlander Submaster wants you to build a new sword pell for having destroyed the last one. Collect materials to build a sword pell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016754
text: Repair the Sword Pell

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016755
text: You have collected enough materials. Repair the sword pell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016756
text: You have collected enough materials. Use the crafting tools to build a new sword pell.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016757
text: You have built a new sword pell. Talk to the Highlander Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016758
text: My Precious Friend

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016759
text: Talk to Companion Trader Toras

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016760
text: Companion Trader Toras looks like he wants to tell you something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016761
text: Collect Ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016762
text: Companion Trader Toras wants you to make some food for your companion as a token of appreciation. Collect the ingredients to make the food.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016763
text: Give Your Food to the Companion

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016764
text: You have made the food for your companion. Feed it to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016765
text: You have made the food for your companion. Feed it to a companion of level 300 or above.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016766
text: The companion loves your food. Talk to Companion Trader Toras.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016767
text: Revelator Mihail seems eager to greet you. Talk to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016768
text: Tell Revelator Mihail About Your Adventures

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016769
text: Revelator Mihail wants to know about your recent adventures. Tell him stories about your travels.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016770
text: Talk to Revelator Mihail.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016771
text: Even after defeating 1000 monsters, their numbers don't seem to have reduced. Tell Agent Pierneef.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016772
text: Talk to the Lord of Orsha

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016773
text: Agent Pierneef wants you to deliver the activity report to the Lord of Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016774
text: Talk to the Lost Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016775
text: There's a lost spirit wandering around Letas Stream. Talk to the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016776
text: Bring the Lost Spirit to the Frail Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016777
text: The spirit had been looking for an important object all along. Now that he has it back, help the spirit reach the Frail Owl Sculpture so he can finally move on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016778
text: The spirit has successfully reached the Frail Owl Sculpture. Talk to the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016779
text: Open the Inmates' Hidden Locking Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016780
text: You followed the strange notes and found a locking device. Try to unlock it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016781
text: Open the Locking Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016782
text: You followed the suspicious notes and found a locking device. It seems like there could be a clue as to how to open it in the notes themselves. Read the notes carefully and enter the code on the chatting window to unlock the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016783
text: You followed the suspicious notes and found a locking device. It seems like there could be a clue as to how to open it in the notes themselves. Read the notes carefully and open the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016784
text: Talk to the elder's granddaughter.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016785
text: Find the Friendship Badges

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016786
text: The elder's granddaughter made friendship badges with her friends but lost them during an accident. Find the badges for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016787
text: Find the Elder's Granddaughter's %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016788
text: Talk to Believer Gintas' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016789
text: Believer Gintas died a pitiful death at the hands of the Tree of Truth order and his spirit is still wandering in Carlyle's Mausoleum. Talk to him and help him move on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016790
text: Believer Gintas' spirit wants to cut evil by the root and tell the Inquisitor Master about his story so that no one else has to suffer under the Tree of Truth. Tell the Inquisitor Master about Believer Gintas.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016791
text: The head of the village is curious to know how the missing offering tools showed up. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016792
text: Retrieve the Offering Tools

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016793
text: The head of the village wants you to take back the rest of the offering tools from the ferrets. Defeat the ferrets and take back the tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016794
text: You have collected all of the offering tools. Return to the head of the village and give him the tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016795
text: Remembering the Victims

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016796
text: Talk to Rona

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016797
text: Rona still seems taken aback by the events at the Novaha Monastery. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016798
text: Set a Tombstone at the Novaha Assembly Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016799
text: Rona wants to erect a tombstone in the Novaha Monastery as a memorial to the victims of the demons' experiments. Unfortunately, she can't go there because of the monsters. Go to the Novaha Monastery and set up the memorial for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016800
text: Rona wants to erect a tombstone in the Novaha Monastery as a memorial to the victims of the demons' experiments. Unfortunately, she can't go there because of the monsters. Go to the Novaha Monastery and set up the memorial for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016801
text: Carve a Message to Honor the Victims

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016802
text: You have erected the tombstone. Carve a message to honor the victims on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016803
text: You have set up the memorial and carved a message for the victims. Return to Rona and let her know.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016804
text: Talk to Squire Williya.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161214_016805
text: Relay the words of Gailus Legwyn to the Squire Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20161221_016806
text: So the books are all gathered. Well done.{nl}As I promised to you, I will permit you to become a Hunter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016807
text: This is a dangerous area. What are you doing here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016808
text: This is not the type of monster that can be encountered here so it is rather strange.{nl}This world is such a mess now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016809
text: It's important to keep in mind what you want to become. {nl}That's never an easy thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016810
text: There might be more of these Large Kepas roaming in the area nearby.{nl}Could you take a look for me, please?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016811
text: Are you looking for someone?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016812
text: Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with that name on our list.{nl}You could try asking the other people to see if they know this Rexipher.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016813
text: Hold on for a minute. I've seen this before from a book.{nl}Wasn't Rexipher a Demon Lord who is part of the army of Baiga, the Demon King?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016814
text: Using the name of a demon, that seems like he doesn't have any good intentions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016815
text: Using the name of a demon, that seems like he doesn't have any good intentions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016816
text: I still need more Jukopus Leaves and Kepa Stems. {nl}But I don't want to just take them from you. How about trading it with the potions I have?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016817
text: Well done. This armor should prove to be useful when worn at the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016818
text: Well done. This armor should prove to be useful when worn at the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016819
text: Oh, this... Hold on.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016820
text: That's right. Rumpelstiltskin was a demon.{nl}So when his power and the power of the arrow collided, it started to disintegrate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016821
text: A long time ago, I was sending the sacred objects to Fedimian.{nl}But, I didn't realise it was on Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016822
text: Leopoldas never asks anyone for help.{nl}I never knew that you were this good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016823
text: Those demons threatened us after their covers have been blown and you saved us.{nl}It truly must be the will of the goddess that you came.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016824
text: Do the people of the Nestospa know about Albinas?{nl}I would have thought they would come here right away...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016825
text: I'm both furious and upset. {nl}If only we had gotten here sooner, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016826
text: Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you recover my comrades' mementos?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016827
text: It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016828
text: Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all our food supplies. {nl}They even took our food for today... Please help us, we need your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016829
text: Thank you. {nl}This will at least get us through the next few days.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016830
text: Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more mementos that need to be retrieved. {nl}My comrades will be unable to rest in peace without them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016831
text: So please help us. {nl}If you can return the rest of the mementos to us, we will provide compensation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016832
text: Thank you for bringing these back, though this still isn't enough... {nl} Sorry... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016833
text: We survived the immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl}Could you help us out a bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016834
text: Thank you. {nl}We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016835
text: Thank you. {nl}We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016836
text: There is a tombstone with rune inscriptions at Galeed Plateau, but it seems you're having trouble deciphering them.{nl}I can't go there myself, but if you bring me a rubbed copy I can interpret them for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016837
text: This looks like a sort of code.{nl}It should take a while for me to decipher it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016838
text: I must find out why my experiment failed.{nl}Could you secure some materials for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016839
text: Please, bring me Sluckty and Studia grass.{nl}I will make a mixture of them and drop it on the remains of Carnivore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016840
text: Finding the cause of failure is a must in order to improve.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016841
text: Welcome back.{nl}I will get on it right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016842
text: Lucienne Winterspoon? From the Winterspoons, the alchemist family?{nl}Are you saying an alchemist family is interested in our research?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016843
text: {nl}Very well, then... You may deliver this report to them.{nl}Please do tell them to read it carefully... and to help our forest in any way they can.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016844
text: Is this the report from the Barha Forest experiments?{nl}Alright, I'll have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016845
text: Lucienne Winterspoon is reading the report.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016846
text: Hm... Interesting.{nl}I think this can relate to my own research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016847
text: I can't leave now because of my studies but let them know I'll help with their experiments.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016848
text: You should give some serious thought on where you want to focus on from now on.{nl}It is no easy choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016849
text: That is a superb choice.{nl}You will be able to choose what Status you want to enhance{nl}by allocating points every time you level up from now on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016850
text: We need to retrieve as much as the management wants but...{nl}We've still got a lot of time left until the newcomers arrive.{nl}How about finding me some Manaryll Tombstones from Augalu Garden if you've got the time?{nl}You can just pick them up anywhere but I don't have the people to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016851
text: We need to retrieve as much as the management wants but we're a little short-handed{nl}We've still got a lot of time left until the newcomers arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016852
text: People there think it was because Fedimian is in the divine area where the the great statue of Goddess Austeja is.{nl}Now they're hard at work to rebuild the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016853
text: The people there think it's because of the statue of Goddess Zemyna in the Holy District, do they?{nl}In any case, any bit of effort is being put to use to rebuild the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016854
text: You can enter the instanced dungeon via this Notice Board.{nl}{nl}Intanced dungeons in other regions can also be accessed via their corresponding Notice Board, so keep that in mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016855
text: {nl}{nl}To enter the instanced dungeon, interact with the Notice Board one more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016856
text: Any missions you want to take from now on, just talk to my receptionists over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016857
text: {nl}For the most dangerous ones, it's always safer to go with other adventurers.{nl}You can always abandon the mission if it's too hard on you, so don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016858
text: {nl}Ramda's requests, especially, are gonna give you some hefty rewards.{nl}Her missions are always popular among all the adventurers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016859
text: Talking about what happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016860
text: This portal isn't working.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016861
text: Obtained the Soul Flower; return to the priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016862
text: Remove the protection spell above Amjene Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016863
text: Go to the Magic Power Supply Device in Ishinti Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016864
text: Road to the Ruthless Dungeon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016865
text: You can now use Instanced Dungeons!{nl}Press the F5 key to read the details in the Quest info window!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016866
text: Fedimian Mercenary Post

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016867
text: You can now use the Mercenary Post!{nl}Press the F5 key to read the details in the Quest info window!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016868
text: I saw some runes at Galeed Plateau...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016869
text: I'll get the rubbed copy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016870
text: I'm actually not that curious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016871
text: You have obtained a rubbed copy of the runes.{nl}Take it to the Rune Caster Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016872
text: Research For Success

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016873
text: How can I help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016874
text: Restoring Lucienne's Honor (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016875
text: I'll deliver the report right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016876
text: Please deliver the report yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016877
text: Delivering the report...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016878
text: Restoring Lucienne's Honor (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016879
text: I'll deliver the news to Gatre.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016880
text: Please ask someone else.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016881
text: Complete the last mission using the decoy at Grobis Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016882
text: This will be the last mission. Defeat the demons that killed the officer and his soldiers using the decoy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016883
text: Defeat %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016884
text: Place the Goddess Statue you got from Joana on the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016885
text: Lucienne Winterspoon asked you to bring the teeth of the Spions. Obtain the teeth from Blue Spions around.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016886
text: Lucienne Winterspoon has asked you to collect Spion Teeth. Defeat nearby Spions to obtain their teeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016887
text: Find the Entrance to the Underground Chapel Dungeon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016888
text: You can now participate in a simple tutorial about instanced dungeons.{nl}Feel free to take this quest if you are unfamiliar with instanced dungeons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016889
text: You are now allowed to use instanced dungeons.{nl}Instanced dungeons exist only in certain regions and help you raise your character faster.{nl}{nl}Type

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016890
text: in the chat window to see the location and recommended level of all instanced dungeons.{nl}First, check the location of the Underground Chapel Dungeon move there.{nl}{nl}Then, find the Underground Chapel Dungeon Notice Board.{nl}You can enter the instanced dungeon by interacting with its notice board.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016891
text: Visit the Fedimian Mercenary Post

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016892
text: You can now participate in a simple tutorial about the mercenary post.{nl}Feel free to take this quest if you are unfamiliar with the mercenary post.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016893
text: You are now allowed to play mercenary post missions that help you develop your character faster and receive different rewards.{nl}{nl}Start by talking to Receptionist Ramda at the Mercenary Post in Fedimian.{nl}Type

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016894
text: in the chat window to see the location and type of missions available, as well as the number of daily entries.{nl}{nl}First, find the Mercenary Post in Fedimian and speak with Manager Rota.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016895
text: in the chat window to see the location and type of missions available, as well as the recommended level and number of daily entries.{nl}{nl}First, find the Mercenary Post in Fedimian and speak with Manager Rota.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016896
text: Talk to the Rune Caster Master about the runes you found at Galeed Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016897
text: The Rune Caster Master seems interested in the runes you found. She wants you to bring her a rubbed copy of the runes so she can interpret them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016898
text: You have collected a copy of the runes. Bring it to the Rune Caster Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016899
text: After looking at the Carnivore fragment, Lucienne seems to be missing something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016900
text: Obtain the Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016901
text: Lucienne wants to find out why her experiment failed. Obtain the Sluckty and Studia grass she needs for her research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016902
text: You have collected all the materials Lucienne needs for her research. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016903
text: Restoring Lucienne's Honor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016904
text: Lucienne Winterspoon is interested in the research taking place at the Barha Forest. Relay this information to Gatre.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016905
text: Deliver the Report to Lucienne Winterspoon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016906
text: After hearing that Lucienne Winterspoon is interested in the Barha Forest research, Gatre asked you to deliver his report to her. Help Gatre by giving Lucienne his report.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016907
text: Upon reading Gatre's report, Lucienne seems amused. Talk to Lucienne Winterspoon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016908
text: Relay Lucienne's Promise

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170313_016909
text: Lucienne has expressed the will to help with the research of Barha Forest. Deliver the news to Gatre.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016910
text: A more important fact is what sort of target Lydia Schaffen hit. Or to put it more precisely, who she hit, would be of great significance.{nl}Whenever the royal records and the folklore handle this story, they do not reference the time when it arose.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016911
text: Kupole Server

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016912
text: Talk to the Rodelero Submaster at the Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016913
text: The Rodelero Submaster asked for a shield enhanced to level 4. Enhance a shield-type piece of equipment and show it to the Rodelero Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016914
text: Follower Donatas told you to gain some confidence by defeating Pawndels and Pawnds, so that you can transform into a demon using the demon transform scroll. After transforming yourself into a demon, talk to Pawndels and Pawnds, lure them to Apsauga Altar and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016915
text: Move to Klaipeda and Talk to Knight Commander Uska

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016916
text: Press the M key to open the map and follow the flag to Klaipeda.{nl}Knight Commander Uska is searching for people who dreamt of the goddesses. Tell him about your dream of the revelations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016917
text: The Rodelero Master wants you to bring a shield enhanced to about 4 levels. Enhance a shield-type equipment and get acknowledged by the Rodelero Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016918
text: The Dievdirbys Submaster has asked you to collect Sparnasman's Horns to use as carving material. Go to the Novaha Annex and defeat Sparnasman monsters to collect their horns.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016919
text: Talk to the Treasure Chest Helper

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170330_016920
text: Talk to the Treasure Chest Helper in Klaipeda, Orsha or Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016921
text: I will find the key to open the last seal. {nl} After opening a space with this scroll. Be careful, though, there may be other things there besides the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016922
text: It will be difficult finding the plants uphill but {nl} I'm only asking for three.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016923
text: On my way, I will take three Sweet Herbs. That medicine is disgusting.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016931
text: Mission complete. Report back to Donnes in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016932
text: Ahylas says he needs Amalas to make the crystal for unsealing. Get Amalas from Pamirstas Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016933
text: Talk to Rota, Klaipeda's Mercenary Post Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016934
text: You can now participate in a simple tutorial about Klaipeda's Missionary Post. {nl} Feel free to take this quest if you are unfamiliar with the missionary post.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016935
text: Talk with the manager and the receptionists.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016936
text: You are now allowed to play mercenary post missions that help you develop your character faster and receive different rewards.{nl}{nl} Start by talking to Receptionist Ramda at the Mercenary Post in Klaipedia.{nl} Type

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016937
text: in the chat window to see the location and type of missions available, as well as the number of daily entries.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170420_016938
text: in the chat window to see the location and type of missions available, as well as the recommended level and number of daily entries.{nl}{nl}First, find the Mercenary Post in Klaipeda and speak with Manager Rota.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016939
text: Hello! My name's Leticia and I'm in charge of the TP Shop.{nl}My shop is full of items that can help you in your adventures.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016940
text: Unlike other shops, here you can use

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016941
text: to purchase items.{nl}You can recharge your TP at our Steam page, and you also get up to 5 free TP, which automatically recharge 1 TP at a time every 2 hours.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016942

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016943
text: ,{nl}to boost your hair accessory stats, you need the

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016944
text: .{nl}You can dress up with the various

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016945
text: {nl}and move faster using the

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016946
text: . Feel free to look around, I'm sure you'll find what you need.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016948
text: Add

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016949
text: button on the items you want, then click

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016950
