name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016951
text: Now that you know the Shop, make sure to have a look once in a while.{nl}The

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016952
text: I gave you will be very useful too.{nl}I also recommend you try the

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016953
text: which is also sold here at the TP Shop!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016954
text: He was once very healthy, but these days he is old and weak both in mind and body.{nl}It was after Jonas went out to a visit with his servant.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016955
text: Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}He was once very healthy, but these days he is old and weak.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016956
text: This is an opportunity for us. The Cockats are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get their tails for us to use in our research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016957
text: Here's the tranquilizer. Use it on the Black Maizes.{nl}It'll be easier to collect their venom that way.{nl}

text: Fantasy of the Watcher (2)

text: Defeat the Infro Holder Shamans and Chafperor chasing Bronius!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016963
text: Talk to TP Merchant Leticia in town.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016964
text: Talk to TP Merchant Leticia in Klaipeda, Orsha or Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016965
text: Listen to the explanation on how to use the TP Shop.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016966
text: Watcher Kenneth told you to weaken the demons to less than half HP, then use the holy powers of the barrier to sever their souls and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016967
text: The wandering spirit is roaming Escanciu Village. Find the wandering soldier and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016968
text: Completed Operation Wooden Village. Let the Wandering Spirit know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170726_016969
text: Collect some Black Maize Venom as a gift to the Village Priest. You can only obtain Black Maize Venom by using Paralysis Powder on a Black Maize while its HP is below half.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170803_016970
text: If you don't have a Velheider, you can adopt one for free at the Companion Trader!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016971
text: Do you want to go fishing?{nl}There's a stream up here where you can catch fish and some neat items!{nl}The reason you have things other than fish come up is...{nl}... a secret!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016972
text: Here's how you fish.{nl}First, buy a fishing rod and some bait from my shop!{nl}Go to the stream and use your fishing rod, then place the bait on it to start fishing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016973
text: I also sell paste bait and fishing bonfires that can help you fish better.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016974
text: From where did all these Revelators appear...{nl}It must be your duty to save us.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016975
text: Click the {img help_button_normal 30 30} button in the system menu to open the Help section and see more information.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016976
text: Team Battle League Valis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016977
text: Try Fishing

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016978
text: Talk to Fishing Manager Joha in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20170912_016979
text: Let the Fishing Manager in Klaipeda tell you all about how to fish.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016980
text: If I wasn't for the migration order from Orsha, I may have been wandering, homeless.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016981
text: Are you doing the instanced dungeon tutorial?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016982
text: {nl}You can level up faster with the dungeons.{nl}Although, of course, it's always a little dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016983
text: {nl}You can come to me whenever you want to use an instanced dungeon.{nl}If you want to enter now, would you let me know again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016984
text: Revelator Pudhin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016985
text: Hm...?{nl}I meet many different people here due to unexpected circumstances.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016986
text: Are you, by chance, a Revelator?{nl}Did you come because you also heard the rumors about Goddess Jurate and the Loremasters?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016987
text: After Medzio Diena, rumors spread that the sea turned to land and demons appeared.{nl}And, to protect Goddess Jurate's domain, her priests also appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016988
text: I heard these rumors and came here to help the Loremasters of Goddess Jurate defeat the demons.{nl}I was delivering the necessary supplies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016989
text: But as I was moving the supplies, monsters appeared and took them and now I'm not sure what to do.{nl}If you are a follower of Goddess Jurate, would you mind lending me a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016990
text: Thank you.{nl} I will look around Husk Bridge, so please check if the monsters went another way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016991
text: Please be quick.{nl}As the number of demons increase so does the need for supplies. Everyone is becoming weary.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016992
text: Oh you found them all.{nl}I was starting to get worried when I found nothing around Husk Bridge...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016993
text: Thank goodness.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016994
text: Hm...?{nl} You would like to know exactly what happened here?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016995
text: Recently there were talks of an appearance by Goddess Jurate at Igyti Seashore.{nl} After that, to carry out the Goddess' meaning, Loremaster's began appearing around the Coral Plains.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016996
text: And upon hearing this news, Revelators also gathered to help Goddess Jurate and the Loremasters.{nl} In this place, demons trying to take Goddess Jurate domain have appeared and are creating quite the headache.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016997
text: Recently Loremasters with the strength of the Revelators are forcing the demons out.{nl} But the demons have placed suspicious devices here and there on the coast thus accelerating their return.{nl} If the rumors are correct, other coasts and the Coral Plains are also under attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016998
text: This area's Loremasters also heard Goddess Jurate's words and were fired up to fight, but it's still a difficult battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_016999
text: If you go a little further down, in Mopuli Lowlands is Ugnius, the leader of this area's Loremasters.{nl}Meeting with him would be good.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017000
text: Ah, the road ahead is filled with savage monsters so please be careful.{nl}But if you are able to clear the road of them, I would be thankful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017001
text: Loremaster Ugnius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017002
text: This is where I meet with others. Are you a Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017003
text: Please say that you will deliver the supplies to Ugnius.{nl}Then please travel safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017004
text: Ah, you are the Revelator who accepted the request from Pudhin.{nl} Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017005
text: Now that I think about it, you seem to be the Revelator that other Loremaster's have talked about..{nl} Are you the Revelator who helped us at Igyti Seashore?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017006
text: Yes, you are the Revelator from those rumors.{nl}I heard Berta and Daroul received a great amount of help from you at Igyti Seashore.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017007
text: Thanks to you we were able to hear Goddess Jurate again.{nl}From the goddess we were told that the demons want to corrupt both Epherotao Coast and Sorfus Coast and in order to make it their own.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017008
text: She requested that we get rid of the demons.{nl}And because of the help we've received from Revelators, we've been able to fight like this, thus far, but our strength is still lacking.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017009
text: Recently, as a form of sabotage, the demons destroyed the altar where we performed rituals to Goddess Jurate and this has fatigued us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017010
text: Oh, can you help us?{nl}We would be more than grateful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017011
text: If that's the case, could you carefully check the Sacred Coral Reef?{nl}That's where Goddess Jurate alter is located, but not too long ago it was attacked by demons{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017012
text: The Loremaster Narius went there to repair the altar but he has yet to return.{nl}Recently, because of the effect from demons, the monster there have become more violent causing us to have a hard time sending someone to bring him back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017013
text: So, I ask this of you.{nl}If you could go to the Sacred Coral Reef and check on Loremaster Narius' situation and why he has yet to return, I would be grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017014
text: Loremaster Narius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017015
text: Uhg..thank you for helping me.{nl}Thanks to you I'm still alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017016
text: It wasn't supposed to be a difficult task..{nl}After destroying the alter the demons left so without a Revelator's help I went alone, but what happened..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017017
text: Ah, you are the Revelator sent by Ugnius.{nl}Thanks to you I'm alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017018
text: As I was repairing the alter, monsters suddenly swarmed me and attacked.{nl}When the demons ran away after destroying the alter something seems to have called the monsters to this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017019
text: I'm sorry, but could you help me please?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017020
text: Then, could you please go back and bring Loremaster Ugnius?{nl}The monsters attacked by legs and I'm bleeding too much to move.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017021
text: The bleeding has stopped but I'm still in a difficult spot so please bring Ugnius here.{nl}Because of the monsters I wouldn't advise that he come alone, so please have either you or another Revelator protect him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017022
text: On your way back, please defeat Nimrah Damsels and collect their coral powder. Ugnius can use it to help treat my wounds. {nl}I'm sorry, but I must ask you for this favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017023
text: Hm..?{nl} Narius was attacked by monsters and was wounded?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017024
text: This is a problem.{nl}But I'm grateful that you collected Nimrah Damsel coral powder.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017025
text: If you sprinkle this powder on the wound and treat it, it helps heal serious injuries.{nl}We use the material from monsters in this area as medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017026
text: Please hurry.{nl} I ask of you..

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017027
text: There is no time to waste, we must hurry.{nl}Could you please protect this old man until the Sacred Coral Reef?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017028
text: The monsters have become more violent and more prone to attack, recently.{nl}I can handle one or two, but if three appear I will be in hot water.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017029
text: Then I will ask that you help.{nl}Let's move quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017030
text: Thanks to you, I've finished treating Narius.{nl}At first glance, it may seem that all is well, but due to the loss of blood, he needs to rest a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017031
text: Sorry but, in Narius's stead, could you please collect the material needed to perform the ritual?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017032
text: Then I will ask for your help.{nl}If you go down there you will see Blue Coral.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017033
text: Please bring back some.{nl}For regular rituals to the goddesses' we use sacred herbs or tributes as an offering.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017034
text: But for Goddess Jurate we usually offer coral or handcrafted coral ornaments.{nl}But, since we are in a rush, first dig up some Blue Coral and we will offer them to the Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017035
text: If you dig up and bring back the Blue Coral, I will be thankful.{nl}We must hear the voice of the Goddess again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017036
text: Oh, you finished so fast.{nl}Alright, time to prepare the ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017037
text: Are preparations complete?{nl}I will start the ritual ceremony.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017038
text: Did you hear the voice of the Goddess?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017039
text: {nl}The Goddess asked an important task of you and requested that I help.{nl}You may be a special Revelator, yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017040
text: Can you go to Iotheo Coast first?{nl}I will watch over Narius' condition until Revelator Pudhin arrives and then follow after you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017041
text: Then go first and find Revelator Nichi.{nl}Help her and I will follow soon after.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017042
text: Revelator Nichi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017043
text: An ordinary person here? Who are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017044
text: Revelator, I'm sorry, but can I make a request?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017045
text: I was collecting materials to repair the altar, when I noticed demons roaming around Tolata Sandbank.{nl}Demons sometimes appear in Iotheo Coast, but this region was still safe from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017046
text: The area of the destroyed altar and where they appeared in Tolata Sandbank are suspicious.{nl}I'm sorry, but could you investigate that area?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017047
text: Then I leave that to you.{nl}Please check what those demons are planning at Tolata Sandbank.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017048
text: They destroyed the altar but what else are they planning...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017049
text: This Red Crystal..?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017050
text: It's emitting an evil energy.{nl}But it's unclear if there is a connection between this and the increase in violent monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017051
text: I'll look into this.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017052
text: Ah, Loremaster Ugnius sent you?{nl}Then you are also a Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017053
text: I'm Revelator Nichi, a helper of the Loremasters.{nl} Here, at the Iotheo Coast, I've been fighting off the demon provoked Nimrah and Varle.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017054
text: From one day the number of Nimrah and Varle increased, and a suspicious device was set on a corrupted sandbank causing me to think that there is some plan behind this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017055
text: Hm..then the objective of the Nimrah and Varle is to occupy this coast.{nl}Because of the sealed Goddess' relics, the demons..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017056
text: There is a questionable location.{nl}I'll search one spot so could you check the occupied lowlands?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017057
text: There is nothing special about the low lands, but recently the Nimrah have flocked to occupy it.{nl}I'm not sure if that has something to do with all this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017058
text: Please clear the occupied lowlands of its patrols and of the Nimrah and Varle that are in the area.{nl} I'll check another location as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017059
text: I'll leave it to you to clear the lowlands of its patrols and of the Nimrah and Varle in the area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017060
text: First we must weaken the evil seal in order to purify the holy relic.{nl} If we use the ocean's energy to awaken the relic's power, we may be able to vanquish the evil aura.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017061
text: You're back?{nl}I heard from Revelator Nichi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017062
text: Hm..They created a magic circle and were performing a ritual ceremony..?{nl}It seems that the holy relic in that area is sealed and suppressed so that we are unable to find it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017063
text: As we investigate another location, could you break the magic circle?{nl} If the demons really are performing a ritual and are suppressing the holy relic, it will not be easy to break.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017064
text: Take this with you.{nl}It might prove helpful when breaking the demon's magic circle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017065
text: Be safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017066
text: Of course, it would be best if you found Goddess Jurate's second holy relic.{nl}From what the Goddess says, without it we will not be able to destroy the demon device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017067
text: Oh, that's the Goddess' holy relic!{nl}As shown with the sacrifice tools from the ancient records.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017068
text: Due to the demons, the Divine Energy was sealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017069
text: If you go to Kite Coral Reef you will find Ancient Coral Rock and Blue Coral.{nl}This Ancient Coral was blessed by Goddess Jurate and carries with it a strong energy from the ocean.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017070
text: If you take the Sealed Relic there and touch it against the Coral, the energy of the ocean will repel the evil and purify the relic.{nl}But keep in mind that if all of the ocean's energy is released, the Coral will need time to recharge.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017071
text: I'll leave this to you.{nl}While you are removing the evil from the holy relic, I will prepare the restoration.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017072
text: You've returned?{nl}Oh, the evil has been completely vanquished from the holy relic!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017073
text: I'll begin restoring the relic.{nl}While I'm doing that, could you please report back to me about the Corrupted Sandbank?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017074
text: The demons could be on the move since we took the sealed relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017075
text: Alright, I'll leave the Corrupted Sandbank in your hands.{nl}There may be attacks against other Revelators as well, so please prepare.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017076
text: And it would be a great help if you could cut down the number of Nimrah and Varle in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017077
text: Carefully examine the situation at the Corrupted Sandbank.{nl}There might be some changes to the Demon Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017078
text: The demons are arriving through a portal?{nl}The demons have set their sights on this area as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017079
text: It seems the small devices amplify the Kruvina that the Goddess spoke of, which then sends out an evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017080
text: The restoration is complete.{nl}The time has come to destroy that Suspicious Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017081
text: You have proven your skill, so you'll come with me to destroy the device.{nl}I will tell the other Revelators to head off any potential disruptions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017082
text: Go to the Corrupted Sandbank first and I'll follow after you.{nl}We'll meet there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017083
text: Alright, then I'll meet you at the Corrupted Sandbank.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017084
text: The device has be successfully destroyed!{nl}Now the Iotheo Coast corruption must be relieved!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017085
text: The Demon Device has been destroyed but some parts of the Coast are still corrupted.{nl}We must prepare to purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017086
text: The Kruvina is also an urgent matter, but if we leave this area like it is the demons may find a way to ambush us.{nl}The purification ceremony doesn't take long, so let's start.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017087
text: Could you take this bottle to Letave Plateau and bring back some Sea Aura?{nl}And on your way, please dig up some Jurate's Moss to use for the ceremony.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017088
text: If I ask the other Revelators to find the remaining materials it won't take long.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017089
text: You just need to bring back Sea Aura and Yulates Moss.{nl}The Plateau is still free from the influnce of demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017090
text: You collected everything so fast.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017091
text: Preparations for the purification ceremony are complete.{nl}Shall I begin?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017092
text: You removed the demon army from the Iotheo Coast{nl}Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017093
text: However, Kartas' subordinates have become smarter and swifter. {nl}When Kruvina was activated, Epherotao Coast became overrun with demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017094
text: Yet, with the help of the two holy relics, the devices protecting the Kruvina can be nullified and the Kruvina, destroyed.{nl}If the corruption accelerates our power will grow weaker.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017095
text: Please disrupt Kartas' Plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017096
text: If we are to follow the Goddess, we must be quick.{nl}I'll go on ahead, when you are ready come to Epherotao Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017097
text: Alright then, I will see you at Epherotao Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017098
text: Would you mind lending a hand?{nl}Thanks to the purification ceremony the corruption was removed, but parts of the Coast still retains an evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017099
text: I'm planning to purify these areas as well, but doing so alone will take me awhile.{nl}I can finish faster with your help,  so would you mind?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017100
text: Then take this Coral Talisman.{nl} It was made by Loremaster Ugnius.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017101
text: The talisman will direct you towards the evil energy.{nl}Just be careful since there may be demons or monsters waiting to attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017102
text: I'll deal with the other regions so please clear the Husk Reef and the occupied lowlands of its evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017103
text: All done?{nl}I also just returned{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017104
text: Thanks to you I was able to finish in no time.{nl}Now Iotheo Coast is free from corruption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017105
text: You still saw some demon forces in the area?{nl}The device was destroyed and the evil energy cleared, but these remnant forces could prove troublesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017106
text: To keep Iotheo Coast safe, I'm planning to drive those forces out. Would you join me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017107
text: Well then, please drive out the remaining Nimrah and Varle that are in the Iotheo Coast.{nl}It doesn't matter where.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017108
text: Then, I will leave this to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017109
text: Thank you.{nl}I will remain here and ensure that Iotheo Coast stays safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017110
text: There's no time to delay.{nl}The Revelators are carefully searching for Demon Devices in other locations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017111
text: Did you also come to scout Coral Forest Hill?{nl}There may be a Demon Device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017112
text: Alright, I'll leave that to you.{nl}Go to Coral Forest Hill and report back on the demons and the possible device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017113
text: If the demons are using the device as a warp, then they are planning to cross at once.{nl}There's no time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017114
text: Hm..the demons have started gathering here as well.{nl}Hurry, the device must be destroyed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017115
text: It may be difficult but it must be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017116
text: The demons have already started to summon their forces.{nl}Things will prove more difficult if we don't destroy that device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017117
text: Just like how the device in Iotheo Coast was destroyed, we must do the same to that one.{nl}It'll be dangerous, but it'll be possible with your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017118
text: Good.{nl}Then could you please go ahead first and rid the area around the device of its demon forces?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017119
text: I will leave dealing with the other device to the other Revelators and Loremaster.{nl}When they return I will explain the situation and join you right after.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017120
text: Let's meet in front of the device. Be safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017121
text: Thanks to you I arrived safely.{nl}Are you ready?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017122
text: Demons will flock here while we are trying to destroy the device.{nl}Just like before, please watch my back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017123
text: Thanks to you, the device was safely destroyed.{nl}Now we need to see how the other Revelators and Loremaster fared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017124
text: First, we should make our way to where the other Revelators went.{nl}I'll see you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017125
text: You're here.{nl}The other Revelators and Loremaster went below to deal with the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017126
text: Would you mind helping them?{nl}I also want to go, but the demons are acting strangely so I'm going to scout around first.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017127
text: Alright, then I have a request.{nl}Since there are already two other Revelators there, everything should finish quite soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017128
text: I would like to ask that you handle another Demon Device.{nl}I, on the other hand, will check the demons' reactions.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017129
text: Is the Demon Device destroyed?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017130
text: That's good to hear.{nl}Now that all the devices are gone we can set our sights on the Kruvina.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017131
text: But there's a problem.{nl}It looks like the demons have activated a trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017132
text: The path in the direction of the Massive Kruvina is overflowing with an evil energy.{nl}I've experienced a similar situation before.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017133
text: At that time, the Revelator who tried to remove the concentrated evil energy was badly hurt.{nl}If we continue on like this, reaching the Kruvina will be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017134
text: Revelator, there is no one here with greater skill than yourself.{nl}I must ask, could you destroy the evil energy along with the suppressor?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017135
text: Take this talisman with you.{nl}This talisman will keep you out of sight of the demons until you are closer.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017136
text: Okay, I will follow shortly.{nl}We'll meet at Iotheo Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017137
text: Oh, you've returned?{nl}Seeing as you've returned safely, I can assume it was a success!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017138
text: The surrounding area feels as though it's been released from the evil energy.{nl}You completed a dangerous task. Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017139
text: We can now head in the direction of the Massive Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017140
text: Let's make haste.{nl}I feel a strange magic stemming from the area around the Massive Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017141
text: The other Revelators and Loremasters will take care of the incoming demon reinforcements.{nl}And we will go to destroy the Massive Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017142
text: When you are ready, we'll leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017143
text: Without your help, we wouldn't have been able to destroy Kruvina.{nl}With only my divine energy, we may not have been as successful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017144
text: Now the only thing left is to restore the Coast to what it was.{nl}This is really all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017145
text: Hm?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017146
text: I feel a strange divine energy from the relic!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017147
text: I must listen to Goddess Jurate and purify this place.{nl}As you travel to other coasts and fight against the demons, I pray that Goddess Jurate keeps you safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017148
text: You have helped Goddess Jurate by saving this coast. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017149
text: Your name will forever be remembered amongst the Loremasters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017150
text: Well then, I will collect the other Revelators and Loremasters and meet you at the entrance to the Heart of the Sea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017151
text: The Varle will be blocking our way.{nl}But the other Revelators and Loremasters will fight them off so that we will have a chance to destroy the Massive Kruvina.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017152
text: Loremaster Emmanuelis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017153
text: Ah, you are the Revelator.{nl}You and Ugnius did well destroying the device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017154
text: During that time, I was monitoring the demon forces.{nl}After the device was destroyed, their movements through the portal also stopped, but it seems many problems still remain.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017155
text: The broken fragments of the device have been embedded in the soil.{nl}It's unclear what they are up to..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017156
text: Ugnius and I were discussing how to purify corruption areas, but we're not sure if this is all connected.{nl}If it's no burden to you, could you collect the fragments buried by the demons and bring them to me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017157
text: If you go to the location of the broken device you'll see shiny red fragments buried in the soil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017158
text: Hm, are those fragments fueling the corruption or accelerating it?{nl}Or could be blocking the purification..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017159
text: Oh, you collected more than expected!{nl}Thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017160
text: This will help us research more about the corruption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017161
text: Thanks to you and the other Revelators, the Kartas's plan has been disrupted.{nl}You deferred a potential attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017162
text: However, due to the demons, some areas have fallen under corruption.{nl}The Loremasters are planning to purify these areas, but the water has dried up and bring life back will take time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017163
text: I will work harder to prevent this disaster from happening again.{nl}I was the one protecting the ocean from evil...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017164
text: But now humans are protecting it from the demons working to defile it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017165
text: This is my small gift.{nl}The ocean's blessing will be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017166
text: It seems that the corruption is seeping into the soil.{nl}When we try to purify the coast the corruption simply returns again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017167
text: Because the fragments are buried deep within the soil, the corruption remains. And digging them all up would be a tiring task.{nl}However, another idea came to mind. Could you help?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017168
text: The remaining demon forces are preventing us from purifying the coast.{nl}Other Revelators and Loremasters are lending a hand, but the remaining number is too great.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017169
text: Would you be willing to help?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017170
text: Then I have a request.{nl}Unlike the other coasts, this area had the most devices and the most corruption.The number of demons is unbelievable.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017171
text: If you can finish off as many demons as possible, I would be grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017172
text: I'm sorry for giving you a difficult task.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017173
text: That was fast.{nl}Thank you for your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017174
text: I need to conduct deeper research on the Demon Device and restore the Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017175
text: Good.{nl}Please take this holy water.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017176
text: This holy water is blessed by Jurate and is mixed with a few materials used during exorcisms.{nl}I used the fragments you collected to test which materials would cause the corruption to react.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017177
text: I then sprayed the holy water on buried fragments and they melted away, purifying the area.{nl}So I recommend going to the Epherotao Coast and using the holy water on areas that feel corrupted.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017178
text: Please purify the coast.{nl}I will continue to research other ways to fight the corruption.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017179
text: It looks like the holy water was put to good use!{nl}Well done.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017180
text: The corruption has disappeared from view but there may still be some residue hiding out of sight.{nl}I'm grateful for your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017181
text: Ugnius and I will stay here and investigate the remaining corruption and purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017182
text: The demons are still greedy for the Coral Plains.{nl}{nl}Through your deeds you have protected the Coral Plains from the demons thus far, but they lie in wait for their next opportunity. {nl}I ask that you continue to protect the coral and the ocean.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017183
text: Dungeon Message

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017184
text: You can now use Instanced Dungeons!{nl}Press the F5 key to read the details in the Quest info window!

text: That's correct.

text: No, that's another person.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017193

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017194

text: Of course I will help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017197
text: That's a difficult request. I'll need some time.

text: Demons here too..?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017205
text: I can handle it

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017206
text: I'll do it later.

text: The Suspicious Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017208
text: Talk about what happened in Zeteor Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017209

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017210

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017211
text: There was nothing new.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017212

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017213
text: What do I have to do?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017214
text: Solve it as quickly as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017215
text: I'll check and come right back.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017216

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017217

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017245
text: Archivist Jonas seem to have finally regained his consciousness. Jonas told you to follow him as there is a task that you are qualified to do. In order for Jonas to guide you safely to Beacon Hill Pass, defeat monsters along the way.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017246
text: Find Sentinel Rian

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017247
text: You are now allowed to use instanced dungeons.{nl}Instanced dungeons help you raise your character faster.{nl}{nl}Type

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017248
text: In the chat window to see the location and recommended level of all instanced dungeons.{nl}First, check the location of the Underground Chapel Dungeon in Klaipeda.{nl}{nl}Then, find Sentinel Rian.{nl}You can enter the instanced dungeon by interacting with the sentinel.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017249
text: Speak with Revelator Pudhin

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017250
text: Revelator Pudhin seems to be facing a difficult situation. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017251
text: Retrieve the stolen supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017252
text: Revelator Pudhin said the monsters purposely robbed him of the supplies. Retrieve the items the monsters stole.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017253
text: All of the supplies that were stolen from Revelator Pudhin have been retrieved. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017254
text: You helped Pudhin recover the stolen supplies. Listen to what happened to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017255
text: Revelator Pudhin seems to have something to say to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017256
text: Deal with the savage monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017257
text: Revelator Pudhin said to go meet with Loremaster Ugnius in Mopuli Lowlands. While making your way there, deal with the savage monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017258
text: Speak with Loremaster Ugnius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017259
text: The savage monsters Revelator Pudhin mentioned have been taken care of. Talk to Loremaster Ugnius in Mopuli Lowlands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017260
text: Discuss with Loremaster Ugnius what happened at Igyti Seashore with Goddess Jurate and listen to a story about the Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017261
text: Loremaster Ugnius seems to have a request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017262
text: Find Loremaster Narius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017263
text: Loremaster Ugnius said that Loremaster Narius has not returned from repairing the altar. Carefully check for the Loremaster as the area has become dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017264
text: Speak with Loremaster Narius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017265
text: You've rescued Loremaster Narius. Go talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017266
text: Defeat the attacking monster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017267
text: Loremaster Narius is wounded. Ask him if there is a way to treat his injuries.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017268
text: Defeat the monsters and collect the medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017269
text: Loremaster Narius' injuries are serious. He has asked that you bring Loremaster Ugnius to treat him. On your way, defeat the monsters and collect the medicine that could help treat Loremaster Narius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017270
text: You've collected the medicine. Give the medicine to Loremaster Ugnius and explain the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017271
text: Loremaster Ugnius looks like he wants to go to Loremaster Narius. Talk with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017272
text: Escort Loremaster Ugnius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017273
text: Escort Loremaster Ugnius safely to Loremaster Narius. Protect Loremaster Ugnius from attacking monsters and escort him to Loremaster Narius' location.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017274
text: Check on Loremaster Narius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017275
text: Loremaster Ugnius is preparing a ritual to hear the voice of the Goddess Jurate. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017276
text: Collect Blue Coral

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017277
text: Loremaster Ugnius is asking you to collect some blue coral instead of Loremaster Ugnius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017278
text: You have collected all the coral Loremaster Ugnius requested. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017279
text: Loremaster Ugnius is about to start the offering ceremony to Goddess Jurate. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017280
text: Loremaster Ugnius seems to have something to say to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017281
text: Speak with Revelator Nichi

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017282
text: Loremaster Ugnius asked you to go to Iotheo Coast and meet with Revelator Nichi. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017283
text: Loremaster Narius seems to have a request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017284
text: Investigate Tolata Sandbank

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017285
text: Loremaster Narius said he saw a few demons roaming around Tolata Sandbank. Go investigate the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017286
text: You have found the suspicious crystal at Tolata Sandbank that Loremaster Narius mentioned. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017287
text: Revelator Nichi is preparing something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017288
text: Clear out the Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017289
text: Revelator Nichi has asked you to remove the Nimrah and Varle that roam the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017290
text: Occupied Lowlands Recon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017291
text: Revelator Nichi has asked you to clear out the Nimrah and Varle and to report back about the occupied lowlands. Go to the occupied lowlands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017292
text: Defeat the Nimrah and Varle

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017293
text: Loremaster Ugnius has arrived. Talk to him about what you saw at the occupied lowlands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017294
text: Search for the relic at the occupied lowlands

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017295
text: Loremaster Ugnius believes the magic circles seen at the occupied lowlands being used to seal the relic. Use Goddess Jurate's relic to break the magic circles and retrieve the relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017296
text: You have retrieved the relic that was sealed by the demons. Return to Loremaster Ugnius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017297
text: Break the magic circle and retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017298
text: Loremaster Ugnius seems to know a way to remove the seal from the sealed relic. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017299
text: Purifying the Sealed Relic

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017300
text: Loremaster Ugnius has recommended that you use the ocean's energy to wash the sealed relic. Go to Kite Coral Reef and use the energy in the coral to repel the evil from the relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017301
text: You have completed the task that Loremaster Ugnius requested of you. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017302
text: Loremaster Ugnius looks like he is going to remove the seal from the washed relic. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017303
text: Corrupted Sandbank Recon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017304
text: Loremaster Ugnius has asked you to scout out the suspicious device the demons have placed on the Corrupted Sandbank.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017305
text: It seems the demons have started to attack. Alert Loremaster Ugnius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017306
text: Eradicate the demon forces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017307
text: Loremaster Ugnius seems to have made a decision. Speak with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017308
text: Destroy the corrupted sandbank's suspicious device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017309
text: Loremaster Ugnius says to destroy the suspicious device at the corrupted sandbank as quickly as possible. He said he will meet you there. Go first to the Corrupted Sandbank.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017310
text: You successful destroyed the device. Speak with Loremaster Ugnius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017311
text: Loremaster Ugnius is preparing to purify the demon corrupted coast. Collect the necessary materials to complete the preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017312
text: You have collected all the material that Loremaster Ugnius requested. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017313
text: It seems that Loremaster Ugnius will begin the Purification Ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017314
text: Loremaster Ugnius has finished the ritual. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017315
text: Loremaster Ugnius went ahead first to the Epherotao Coast. Find Loremaster Ugnius at Epherotao Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017316
text: Revelator Nichi may be planning to remove the remaining corruption from the Iotheo Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017317
text: Clear the Iotheo Coast of the remaining evil energy

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017318
text: As Revelator Nichi said, the purification ritual cleared the source of the pollution but some evil still remains. Use the Coral Talisman given to you by Nichi and release this evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017319
text: You cleared the Iotheo Coast of the remaining evil energy. Go tell Revelator Nichi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017320
text: Revelator Nichi seems to have a request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017321
text: Defeat the demons at Iotheo Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017322
text: Revelator Nichi has asked you to defeat the remaining demon forces.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017323
text: You defeated the remaining demons as Revelator Nichi requested. Report back to Revelator Nichi.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017324
text: Loremaster Ugnius seems to have a scouting request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017325
text: Coral Forest Hill Recon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017326
text: Loremaster Ugnius has asked you to scout out Coral Forest Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017327
text: You have completed Loremaster Ugnius request to check Coral Forest Hill. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017328
text: Loremaster Ugnius seems determined about something. Speak with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017329
text: Deal with the demon forces at Coral Forest Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017330
text: Loremaster Ugnius has asked you to defeat the demon forces on Coral Forest Hill so that he can follow.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017331
text: Investigate the Demon Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017332
text: You defeated the demons on Coral Forest Hill according to Loremaster Ugnius' request. Go back to the demon device and wait for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017333
text: Defeat the demon forces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017334
text: Loremaster Ugnius has arrived. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017335
text: Protect Loremaster Ugnius

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017336
text: Loremaster Ugnius said he is going to destroy the device. While he is doing so, keep him safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017337
text: The device was successfully destroyed. Speak with Loremaster Ugnius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017338
text: Loremaster Ugnius has already gone ahead to locate the other Revelators. Follow him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017339
text: Destroy the Third Demon Device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017340
text: The other Revelator and Loremasters are working to destroy the third demon device. Go help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017341
text: The third demon device was destroyed. Speak with Loremaster Ugnius.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017342
text: Defeat the forces protecting the device

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017343
text: It seems like Loremaster Ugnius wants to explain more about the demon's trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017344
text: Avoid the demon's trap and destroy the suppressor

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017345
text: Because of the demon's trap, Loremaster Ugnius said the path to the Kruvina is too dangerous. Avoid the demon's trap and destory the suppressor.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017346
text: You destroyed the device blocking the way to the Massive Kruvina. Listen to Loremaster Ugnius next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017347
text: Destroy the Massive Kruvina at the Heart of the Sea.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017348
text: Loremaster Ugnius has said to go destroy the Massive Kruvina. He will gather the other Revelators and Loremasters and meet you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017349
text: Destroy the Massive Kruvina

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017350
text: You helped Loremaster Ugnius destroy the Massive Kruvina. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017351
text: Talk with Loremaster Emmanuelis

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017352
text: It looks like Loremaster Emmanuelis is researching the demon's effects on the coast. Speak to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017353
text: Collect the Demon Device Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017354
text: Loremaster Emmanuelis is researching the corruption effect of the demon device. Collect pieces of the broken device to help with his research.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017355
text: You have collected the pieces of the demon device. Return to Emmanuelis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017356
text: Emmanuelis seems like he has figured someone out. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017357
text: Purify the Corrupted Piles of Soil

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017358
text: The source of the corruption remains in the ground. Take the bottle that contains holy water from Loremaster Emmanuelis and use it to purify the corrupted piles of soil.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017359
text: You have purified all the piles of soil that Emmanuelis requested of you. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017360
text: Emmanuelis seems to have a request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017361
text: Eradicate the surviving demon forces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017362
text: Emmanuelis has asked you to defeat the remaining demon forces in Epherotao Coast. Go and eradicate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017363
text: As Emmanuelis requested, you have forced out all the remaining forces. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171128_017364
text: Defeat the remaining demon forces

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20171207_017365
text: The fact that a metal, Mana Metal, with such high resistance against magic exists is strange, but if such a metal does exist, then there couldn't have been enough to make more than one set of armor. The commander, Ruklys, would have been the only one wearing such an armor, otherwise it wouldn't make sense if the Mana Metal were distributed to that many of his troops.{nl}It is just as reasonable that the opposite was true.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017366
text: No place in the Kingdom is safe anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017367
text: Our Kingdom needs to be at peace again...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017368
text: My mother passed away when I was born.{nl}My father worked very hard to make sure I was raised properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017369
text: Now I want to do the same and earn the money to sustain him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017370
text: I came to Tenants' Farm looking for a stable life, but that isn't easy anymore.{nl}I feel like I'm only giving my father more to worry about.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017371
text: The combat style of the Nak Muay is very different from other kinds you may know. We attack the enemy with our hands, feet, elbows and knees.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017372
text: The risk of injury is high, and it is not an easy style to learn.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017373
text: No matter how strong you are, you must never underestimate your opponent.{nl}If you do, the Nak Muay technique becomes nothing but a means for violence.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180208_017374
text: Traveling Merchant Geraldas

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017375
text: However, I also have a request since this is a hard task.{nl}I would prefer to receive some Blue Gapcrab Shell as compensation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017376
text: Well then, off you go.{nl}I'll start working assuming that you'll bring me some quiality materials.{nl}{nl}You can find Blue Gapcrab at Nugara Sandbank in Cranto Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017377
text: The demons are still greedy for the Coral Plains.{nl}{nl}Through your deeds you have protected the Coral Plains from the demons thus far, but they lie in wait for their next opportunity. {nl}I ask that you continue to protect the coral and the ocean.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017378
text: Gem Draw Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017379
text: Shutdown

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017380
text: Unlock Legend Card Slot

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017381
text: Complete the quests to find the nine Revelations and unlock the Legend Card slot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017382
text: The Legend Card slot was unlocked by the power of the goddesses!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017383
text: Unlock the Legend Card slot with the power of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017384
text: Complete the nine Revelation quests and receive the power of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017385
text: Unlock the Legend Card slot at the statue of Goddess Ausrine in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017386
text: Collect Blue Gapcrab Shells at Cranto Coast

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180320_017387
text: Accessory Merchant Joana has asked for whole Gap Crab Shell in return for her services. Collect whole Gap Crab Shells from Igti Coast.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017388
text: Evoniphon...{nl}The Ranger Master still seems to hold some regret.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017389
text: Retiarius, and similar gladiators like the Murmillo, gain passionate support from the spectators while in the arena. But in the moments before defeat, that support crumbles like a castle made of sand.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017390
text: As a gladiator I have witnessed this many times.{nl}And, rather than live by the cries of the crowd, I have survived by my own determination and have ended here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017391
text: All of the arenas were destroyed after Medzio Diena.{nl} So I had assumed I would no longer have to take on the mantle of the gladiator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017392
text: But there is no way of knowing when or where these monsters and demons may attack, and now it is as though I am fighting for survival at a level higher than what I had faced in the arena.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017393
text: Ah, I... would like to ask you for something.{nl} I just need you to take this pouch to the Cleric Master.{nl} You can do that right?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017394
text: You won't forget right?{nl}Take that and give it to the Cleric Master.{nl}And, don't say that I was the one to send you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017395
text: You say you have something to give me...? This pouch?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017396
text: ... Ah, a donation. This is much needed. I thank you in the name of the Goddess.{nl}I promise to use this to help those who have been hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017397
text: I'm looking for a book. Lydia Schaffen's four books.{nl}I really would like to gather them all. If you have time, could you help me find them?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017398
text: The first book. Thank you for finding it. Please find the others as well.{nl}Once all the books are found, I promise to give you a copy.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017399
text: You found all the books. You've done well.{nl}Now wait here just a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017400
text: Alright, here. As promised, I've made a copy. Enjoy.{nl}And thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017401
text: There is an important task at hand, but no one to help me.{nl}Would you be willing to lend a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017402
text: Seems like there is no one I can give this task to... Ah, my apologies. I was thinking out loud and didn't notice you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017403
text: ... Ah, you really have no inclination to help?{nl} But this will benefit not only my fellow Peltastas but also you as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017404
text: Good answer.{nl}Now, go to Tenet Church B1, gather Black Glizardon Nails, and give them to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017405
text: It's fortunate that the Highlander Master found them to his liking. {nl}You worked hard. I hope that this strengthens you as well. Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017406
text: Oh, it's you. I just received a request for support from the Peltasta Master.{nl}We would like to help, but in our current situation it would be too difficult.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017407
text: If it's okay with you, you could lend us a hand.{nl}In my stead, could you go check on the Peltasta Master?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017408
text: There are rumors circling that a powerful monster is roaming around Crystal Mine 2F.{nl} Because of this the people living in the town next to the mine are feeling nervous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017409
text: In lieu of us, please go to Crystal Mine 2F, find the culprit behind the rumors and get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017410
text: So he was still on a rampage... You're lucky you weren't harmed.{nl}To continue to ease the minds of the townspeople, I will position some soldiers there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017411
text: Well done. Thanks to you I was able to finish my other tasks.{nl}I appreciate your continual help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017412
text: Thank you for your help before. Because of you we were able to keep our pledge with the Highlanders... but{nl}recently another problem has appeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017413
text: The highlanders promised to provide the Peltasta with a shield.{nl}And I was expecting to receive it yesterday but it never got delivered.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017414
text: If you have the time, would you please talk with the Highlander Master about this?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017415
text: I see, so that was the situation. Good job.{nl}Thanks to you our pledge with the Highlanders remains firm.{nl}Once again, thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017416
text: Hm... ah, sorry, I didn't see you there. I was lost in thought.{nl}... Wait. You look like you have some time on your hands. Care to help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017417
text: This fragrance... Yes, it's Evoniphon's.{nl}This is enough. Thanks for helping on such short notice.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017418
text: I'm currently researching something very fascinating.{nl}You can lend me a hand if you're interested. How about it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017419
text: Yes! My research can now go on to the next level.{nl}Thanks for the help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017420
text: If you would spare the time, there is something you can help me with.{nl}I promise it will be exciting. Will you accept?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017421
text: There is no need to feel guilty. You did very well.{nl}The rest of the task I will do myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017422
text: Uhhm... This will be annoying. Either way I will have to go get it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017423
text: Hm? What am I talking about?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017424
text: For your information, it's not easy to explain.{nl}But... if you agree to help I can tell you more.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017425
text: I will explain it very clearly.{nl}And I expect you to keep your word.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017426
text: I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is at the Miners' Village. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out. I'll leave it to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017427
text: I knew that one day I would finally see this for myself.{nl}Thank you. I will ensure that this treasure is properly stored.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017428
text: Wait, I have a single mission for you.{nl}This is very very important to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017429
text: So it was a success. {nl}You have matched my expectations. Well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017430
text: Hm... so he has appeared again... Oh, I didn't see you approach. Hahaha.{nl}Yes? Oh, you are wondering what I was mumbling about?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017431
text: Hm... well, if it's you...{nl}It would be good if you could hear me out. I have some important work for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017432
text: That is definitely the tip of the spear I drove into it.{nl}Hahaha, although I didn't defeat it myself, with this, it will become a story for the legends. Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017433
text: There is a book I wish to find.{nl}But it cannot be retrieved by normal means.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017434
text: It's because this book is one from another world.{nl}What do you think? Interested? Would you like to help?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017435
text: Good. First, I will need some ingredients.{nl}Please bring me the core of Corylus and the blood of Galok in Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017436
text: Excellent.{nl}Wait a moment. There is something I can make with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017437
text: Thank you for your patience.{nl}Now on to the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017438
text: Did you know? In Tenet Church 1F there is a small gap that opens into a two-dimensional world.{nl}To most people the area looks perfectly ordinary.{nl}But for Linkers such as myself, the gap can be found quite easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017439
text: I have made you a key so that you may find the entrance.{nl} I have also marked the location on your map, so take the key and go there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017440
text: With the key you will be able to enter the two-dimensional world.{nl}If you happen to locate the book, please bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017441
text: You have returned with the book. Thank you.{nl}Would you wait just a moment?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017442
text: You also showed particular interest in this book.{nl}Therefore, I have made you a copy so that you can read it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017443
text: I hope that you find the book compelling. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017444
text: I'm searching for an important book.{nl}This is a very precious book to me and I would be grateful if you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017445
text: Yes, this is it. This is the book. I was searching for it for so long...{nl}It's amazing that you were able to find it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017446
text: Thank you for your help.{nl}Please wait here.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017447
text: The Hunter Master said that I would trade?{nl}Yes, Tough Glizardon Leather for the book.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017448
text: Ohoh, that's the leather. Let's see...{nl}Hm... This is very sturdy. Very nice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017449
text: Well then, here is the book the Hunter Master wants.{nl}Make sure that he gets it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017450
text: He is helping repair the damaged city wall.{nl}But it seems that they have started to run out of material.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017451
text: Consider bringing him some rocks from the Miner's Village.{nl}Those rocks are known for their sturdiness. The Archer Master will also like them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017452
text: I know I should have sent a letter of apology and I'm sorry about that.{nl}In truth, I've been busy asking the Fletcher Master to send the shield he had promised.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017453
text: I've sent him numerous demands to do so, but he continues to reject me.{nl}What could be the problem... Would you mind checking on the Fletcher Master for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017454
text: The Fletcher Master should be at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.{nl}Go there and clarify the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017455
text: You've come from Klaipeda, you say?{nl}If it's because of the Highlander Master, go back. No amount of urging will change the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017456
text: Did you not hear me?{nl}I've received too many requests for arrows.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017457
text: Whatever the circumstances these requests take paramount.{nl}It will be awhile before I can complete yours.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017458
text: The demons from the mines attacked and took everything.{nl}I'm not sure why, but if you are talking about that book it was probably taken during that time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017459
text: The demons returned to Crystal Mine but...{nl}If you want to find that book, I would recommend checking the Mine Worker's Resting Place in Crystal Mine 2F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017460
text: The demons could be using it as a storing facility since there are already other supplies stacked there.{nl}The book should be there, or at least in that area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017461
text: I would like to repay you for the trouble you went through.{nl}I have prepared a copy of the book you found for me. I hope you will take a moment to read it in your free time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017462
text: After defeating it, please bring back the tip of the spear that remains skewered in its body. {nl}I would like to keep it as proof of our heated battle. Please do this for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017463
text: Raid Message

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017464
text: You have survived a formidable experience!{nl}Speak with the Wings of Vaivora NPC to record your experience and collect your reward!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017465
text: Guilty Conscience (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017466
text: I can at least do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017467
text: I won't do something that sounds so suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017502
text: The Sapper Master wants to donate and return the stolen goods to repent for the past. Find the stolen goods at Flude Island in West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017503
text: The Sapper Master wants to donate and return the stolen goods to repent for the past. Find the stolen goods at Flude Island in West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017504
text: Return the recovered stolen goods to the Item Merchant in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017505
text: Return the recovered stolen goods to the Item Merchant in Klaipeda.
