text: Deliver the pouch to the Cleric Master!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017508
text: You've successfully delivered the pouch to the Cleric Master. Report back to the Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017509
text: The Dream Bow Book

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017510
text: The Hunter Master asked you to help him search for the books. As the Hunter Master mentioned, search for the books at the Vubbe Outpost near the Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017511
text: Collect Tough Glizardon Leather in Tenet Church B1

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017512
text: The Hunter Master told the Quarrel Shooter Master that they could exchange the Tough Glizardon Leather for the book. Obtain Tough Glizardon Leather in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017513
text: You have collected enough Tough Glizardon Leather. Return to the Quarrel Shooter in Klaipeda and exchange them for the book.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017514
text: Deliver the book to the Quarrel Shooter, then speak with the Hunter Master for the whereabouts of the next one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017515
text: Collect Rocks from the Crystal Mine Entrance in Miners' Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017516
text: The Archer Master has the next book. Collect rocks from the Crystal Mine entrance in Miners' Village for the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017517
text: You've gathered the rocks the Archer Master would need. Go to the Archer Master in Klaipeda and exchange the rocks for the book.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017518
text: You've received the book from the Archer Master. Speak with the Hunter Master to collect the final one.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017519
text: Shield Over Flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017520
text: Obtain the coarse tree barks of Yognome in Tenet Church B1 as compensation for receiving help from the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017521
text: Pledge of Duty

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017522
text: The Peltasta Master gave you a mission. Obtain Glizardon's Black Nails from the Glizardon in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017523
text: Highlander Master request that you ask the Peltasta Master for help on his behalf.{nl}Go find the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017524
text: The Peltasta Master informed you that she received a request for help from Uska but doesn't have time to answer it. Go meet with Uska on behalf of the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017525
text: Commander Uska mentioned that the monsters appearing from Crystal Mine 2F are causing people in the Miner's Village to feel nervous. Go to Crystal Mine 2F to find the culprit and put end to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017526
text: The Peltasta Master says the Highlanders are not keeping their promise of supplying shields and asks that you put some pressure on them. Go check on the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017527
text: It seems that something happened to the Fletcher Master from whom the Highlander Master requested the trade. Meet the Fletcher Master in the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017528
text: The Fletcher Master told you to go back, but until the request is accepted, you can't.{nl}Speak to the Fletcher Master again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017529
text: The Fletcher Master told you that if you could defeat Moas, he will move up your request. Defeat Moas which is attacking merchants traveling between Fedimian Suburbs and Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017530
text: Fedimian's Investigator

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017531
text: The Sadhu Master told you that he saw a man who seemed to be Evoniphon talking to the Elementalist Submaster. Meet with the Elementalist Submaster and listen to the information about Evoniphon.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017532
text: The Elementalist Submaster remembers a man with a strange fragrance. Talk to the Elementalist Submaster about the whereabouts of this man.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017533
text: The Elementalist Submaster gave you the location of the person who seems to be Evoniphon is headed towards. The person was looking for ingredients and would likely be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017534
text: The Cryomancer Master told you to open a box in the Pyromancer Master's room and bring the contents to her. Something about it feels strange but let's open the box anyway.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017535
text: The Quarrel Shooter says he's been looking for the telescope that used to be in the Astral Tower and has found clues about the whereabouts of the lens. Try finding the lens in the Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017536
text: Defeat Shadowgaler

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017537
text: The Ranger Master mentioned an assassin named Evonipon and wants the venom sample he used. Collect samples of venom from the Vubbe in Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017538
text: A Book Not of This World

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017539
text: The Link Submaster has asked you to gather a few materials to help you find the book from another world. Collect Corylus Cores and Galok Blood from the monsters inTenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017540
text: You have gather all the necessary materials. Deliver them to the Linker Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017541
text: Speak with the Linker Submaster to find the book from another world.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017542
text: Take the key from the Linker Master and find the location of the two-dimensional world in Tenet Church 1F to recover the book.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017543
text: You have successfully found the book. Just as promised, deliver the book to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017544
text: Legend of the Winter Season

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017545
text: Crystal Mine 2F Book Investigation

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180418_017546
text: The Siauliai Miners' Village Mayor said that the demons returned to the Crystal Mine after  ransacking the Miner's Village. Check the area around the storage facility in Miner's Village 2F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180629_017547
text: Beauty Shop

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180629_017548
text: Solo Dungeon

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180704_017549
text: The Novaha Institute Chapparition has taken far too many lives.{nl}Rid us of it, in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180704_017550
text: The Paladin Master says that a cruel monster has been slaughtering people. Find the Bleak Chapparition boss monster at the Novaha Institute and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017551
text: Ane and Aldoni are supposed to have arrived by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017552
text: They're running late.{nl}They were in Fantomas street the last I saw them, I am worried something has happened to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017553
text: Please tell me straight away if something's happened to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017554
text: When we arrived the Quipmage was stealing the old research papers from the device.{nl}I was able to cast a tracking spell on the Quipmage while Aldoni provided the diversion.{nl}It's now heading for Spresti Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017555
text: I'm guessing that he is going to meet the Beholder there.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017556
text: Ane said that the Quipmage was headed for Spresti Lot.{nl}I don't know how long the tracking spell is going to last.{nl}Ane said that the Beholder may be there, but it's just her assumption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017557
text: What I was meaning to say is that we should stop him while he's on the move.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017558
text: The Quipmage is responsible for causing the incident at Nicopolis that took the lives of millions.{nl}And he is working with the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017559
text: He may even manage to escape the barrier and do harm on the outside world.{nl}I don't care if you come or not.{nl}I will go stop the Beholder and the Quipmage myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017560
text: I can't help but be worried about her. Let's follow her.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017561
text: Are you alright, traveler?{nl}I'm glad to see that you're okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017562
text: What happened to the Quipmage?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017563
text: It was reckless of Aldoni to face the Quipmage alone.{nl}But thanks to you, the damage done could be kept to a minimum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017564
text: The Old Research Papers have been switched and the Quipmage was also defeated.{nl}If the Beholder finds out, he will try to steal them again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017565
text: Take this to Lena of the Wings of Vaivora for safe keeping.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017566
text: Deliver the Original Copy of the Old Research Papers to Lena in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017567
text: So these are the research papers of the Quipmage that caused the incident at Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017568
text: Looks like it's written in the language of the demons.{nl}We will keep it safe so that it doesn't fall into the Beholder's hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017569
text: Hidden Research Archives

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017570
text: The City Under Threat (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017571
text: I'll go and have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017572
text: The City Under Threat (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017573
text: Will you be okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017574
text: Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017575
text: The City Under Threat (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017576
text: What are you going to do with the research papers?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017577
text: I trust you can do that on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017578
text: The Cryomancer Master says that he is looking for a book and he wants you to help him find it. Talk to the Mayor of Siaulai Miner's Village to ask about the book.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017579
text: Finding the Old Research Papers

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017580
text: Find the Old Research Papers.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017581
text: The City Under Threat

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017582
text: Look for the Rest of the Wizards

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017583
text: Go and find where the rest of the wizards are

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017584
text: Talk to Wizard Ane

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017585
text: Talk to Wizard Ane.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017586
text: Defeat the Quipmage

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017587
text: Chase the Quipmage and defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017588
text: Find and Defeat the Quipmage

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017589
text: Talk to the Wings of Vaivora

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20180827_017590
text: Talk to the Wings of Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017591
text: They're running late.{nl}They were in Fantomas street the last I saw them, I am worried something has happened to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017592
text: Ane said that the Quipmage was headed for Spresti Lot.{nl}I don't know how long the tracking spell is going to last.{nl}Ane said that the Beholder may be there, but it's just her assumption.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017593
text: It was reckless of Aldoni to face the Quipmage alone.{nl}But thanks to you, the damage done could be kept to a minimum.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017594
text: The Old Research Papers have been switched and the Quipmage was also defeated.{nl}If the Beholder finds out, he will try to steal them again.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017595
text: So these are the research papers of the Quipmage that caused the incident at Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017596
text: Looks like it's written in the language of the demons.{nl}We will keep it safe so that it doesn't fall into the Beholder's hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181017_017597
text: But, see, if someone talented like you can take me there...{nl}I can teach them not to disrespect their village chief.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181116_017598
text: Hmm... It is rather familiar... But I don't remember.{nl}Coud I have misplaced it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20181116_017599
text: Did you deliver the goods?{nl}If not, please do so. I don't have the courage to go myself...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20190104_017600
text: Ah, the Savior.{nl}What was it that you came for again?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20190104_017601
text: He says the pain started when the wizard came inside the Apega Protocol Room.{nl}I'll stay here and keep an eye on him. You go and find a way to stop this. Quick!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20190104_017602
text: There are no impossible missions for an Assassin.{nl}If so, only in dreams.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20190104_017603
text: As you already know, Assassins can find the weak spot of the toughest enemies.{nl}It doesn't matter how firmly they guard themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20190104_017604
text: Deliver the pouch from the Sapper Master to the Cleric Master!

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20190419_017605
text: Dungeon Secret Cube NPC

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191024_017606
text: Arts System

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191024_017607
text: Grimoire Monster

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191024_017608
text: The Paladin Master says that a cruel monster has been slaughtering people. Find the Chapparition at the Veidra Hall in Novaha Institute and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191024_017609
text: Defeated the Chapparition. Report to the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191024_017610
text: You have followed Laima's prophecy. Report to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191104_017611
text: Halloween 2019

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20191228_017612
text: 2019 TP Sale

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017613
text: I'm impressed that you've followed Rexipher all the way here, Savior.{nl}I thought you would have given up by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017614
text: {nl}This is a grave undeserved for a mere human like you, isn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017615
text: {nl}And the Guardians of the grave have been corrupted so they are not functioning correctly.{nl}What will you do now?

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017616
text: You must destroy the Guardians to move to the next floor, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017617
text: Looks like something up ahead is polluting the Guardians.{nl}If you are curious to find out what, follow me inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017618
text: Rexipher is getting closer to the Revelation here.{nl}The Guardians have begun to destroy the grave.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017619
text: {nl}Defeat the Guardians and protect the grave, Revelator.{nl}If you don't want to be buried in the grave along with Laima's Revelations.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017620
text: That... Could be a a better option for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017621
text: I was wondering what it was that corrupted the Guardians. It was a Denoptic.{nl}More than enough to cause men to flee in fear, but I'm sure you would be different.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017622
text: The last Guardian must have noticed Rexipher's presence.{nl}The grave is shaking with an ominous rumble.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017623
text: The Guardians have begun to destroy the grave up ahead.{nl}You do not have time.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017624
text: There are four Karolis' lights.{nl}Illuminating all four will maintain the altar's power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017625
text: Now, Soul Starvation is destructible.{nl}There must be magic circles around it but they can be easily disabled.{nl}Disable the magic circles and destroy the Soul Starvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017626
text: I do not believe it is no coincidence that god came to us.{nl}I sense the divine will of the goddess guiding you here.{nl}I pray she will continue to guide you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017627
text: I sensed something ominous in the shrine not too far from here.{nl}I am certain that they could use your help over there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017628
text: It may be too far to walk, so I will send you there.{nl}Think of it as my token of gratitude.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017629
text: Farewell... I wish you luck on behalf of all the owls of the forest.{nl}Goodbye... And take care...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017630
text: It's not hard to turn off the device after all. {nl}Seems like all you need to do is remove the power sources, which are set up separately.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017631
text: From the journals, it seems that we need to quickly remove the power sources.{nl}But it's strange... That magician won't let us remove the power source this easy...{nl}Maybe I'm being too cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017632
text: There are many sources of magic around. It's the Wendigo Escapees.{nl}Absorbing their life force may allow us to restore the Orb of Return.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017633
text: There are two altars, right?{nl}There should be another altar if you proceed further from the Altar of Confession.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017634
text: {nl}Everything depends on that altar now.{nl}I pray that the Goddesses are watching over us...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017635
text: The graveyard and the Grecketi Crossroads... Hmm. Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017636
text: You take care of the protection spell around the graveyard.{nl}Mihail and I will take care of the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017637
text: You are my only hope.{nl}The demons are upto something in Seir Forest.{nl}You can arrive at Seir Forest by going through Bellai Forest past the Outer Wall district.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017638
text: Please stop the demons' plan.{nl}Only you can stop them. I beg of you...

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017639
text: Hmm... I've not heard of a demon experiment before...{nl}Wait. There is something that I've heard that might peak your interest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017640
text: I saw black hooded figures in the area before.{nl}It wasn't just me. Modis the hunter saw it too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017641
text: Something that left an impression on me... It was the person with long white hair and a black coat.{nl}His skin was pale as a corpse, it creeped me out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017642
text: The hooded figures were busy entering and leaving thje Nesuga Meeting Hall.{nl}Could they have been up to something devious? Hmm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017643
text: Since you've offered to help, could you look into the matter?{nl}I am too freaked out about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017644
text: For the bait you want to get some Black Sawpent or Black Rajapearlite meat.{nl}We need some herbs too, to disguise our scent.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200128_017645
text: Personal Housing

text: Stop the facilities from being destroyed

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017657

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017658
text: Use the Ausrine Sculpture in the Central Square in Klaipeda to move to the Miner's Village

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017659
text: The Journey Begins (3) - Removed

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017660
text: Go to the 3F of Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017661
text: Someone is waiting for you at the third floor of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Go to the Royal Mausoleum 3F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017662
text: Someone is waiting for you at the third floor of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Go to the Royal Mausoleum 3F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017663
text: Eliminated the corrupted Guardians. Talk to the Guardian Stone Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017664
text: Talk to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017665
text: The Beholder says that the Denoptic is corrupting the Guardians. Find and defeat the Denoptic.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017666
text: Talk to the Beholder in Mausoleum 4F.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017667
text: Talk to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017668
text: To spread out the forest's divine force, you need to find and light up all of Karolis' light rays. Hurry and light up all four of Karolis' rays before their light dies out.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017669
text: Mardas says the magic circles protecting Soul Starvation must be removed. Deactivate all the protective magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017670
text: Move to the Gate Route

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017671
text: Goddess Saule says Bramble of Kvailas Forest is in the Thorn Forest. Pass through Gate Route and Sirdgela Forest to Kvailas Forest to find the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017672
text: Move to Sirdgela Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017673
text: In order to turn off the giant bracken device it's power source needs to be removed. Remove the power sources from the nearby power devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017674
text: Defeat the demons in Ashaka Prison 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017675
text: Release the spirit bestowed in the other Confession Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017676
text: Priest Irma believes your only hope lies on the blessing spirit of the last remaining altar. Release the spirit bestowed on the Confession Altar in the Second Watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0100_20200129_017677
text: Mage Melchioras has asked you to dispel the protection spell placed around the graveyard. Use the amulet on the objects protected by the cast to release it.
